properties.title: Caymus 1998 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 8700 Conn Creek Rd, Rutherford, CA 94573, USA
properties.description: Creamy black cherry aromas layered with fresh brussel sprouts and spicy arugula flavors of red plums and toasted oak.

properties.title: M. Chapoutier 1999 Le Méal Ermitage  (Hermitage)
properties.address: 18 Avenue Dr Paul Durand, 26600 Tain-l'Hermitage, France
properties.description: Chapoutier's selections of the best parcels of vines in Hermitage are set to become legendary. Sold under the ancient spelling of the appellation name (Ermitage), they represent the epitome of the power and concentration that lies behind the reputation of the appellation. This cuvée is the best of the collection, with its brooding, opaque character, suggesting rather than revealing power at this stage. Age it until your new-born baby is old enough to drink, and it will be just about ready.

properties.title: J.L. Chave 1999  Hermitage
properties.address: 37 Av. du Saint-Joseph, 07300 Mauves, France
properties.description: Jean-Louis, the son of Gérard Chave, is now in charge of the family business, as well as being president of the Hermitage wine producers. He is continuing the family tradition of making powerful statements of Syrah from Hermitage, combining massive structure and over-powering perfumes. This 1999 seems to have the best of the traditional world of tannic immensity and the modern world of beautiful, ripe fruit. A wine that will age for a very long time.

properties.title: Colgin 1999 Herb Lamb Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Aromas lean toward black cherry, chocolate and herbs, which sally forth on the palate serving up more dense fruit, licorice, coffee and beautiful toast flavors. Tannins are smooth, supple and ripe. Long, lush and decadent on the finish.

properties.title: Stag's Leap Wine Cellars 1998 SLV Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 5766 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Certainly one of the successes of the vintage. Packed with cassis, sage, plum, tobacco, earth and smoky oak, and perfectly dry and balanced. Sheer joy in the mouth, like liquid velvet. It changes every second, offering up tiers of flavors through the spicy finish.

properties.title: E. Guigal 1998 La Mouline  (Côte Rôtie)
properties.address: 7865 W Sahara Ave #104, Las Vegas, NV 89117, USA
properties.description: Even though the 42 months this wine has spent in new wood give it an intensely toasty character, the enormously soft, perfumed fruits and ripe, sweet flavors that go along with the wood produce a finely tuned, balanced wine that should age well over many years. As an expression of pure Syrah, there are few better.

properties.title: Quilceda Creek 1998 Cabernet Sauvignon (Washington)
properties.address: 11306 52nd St SE, Snohomish, WA 98290, USA
properties.description: After “fiddling around,” as he puts it, with blends in his '96 and '97 cabs, winemaker Alex Golitzin decided to go with straight Cabernet in '98, an exceptional vintage for Washington State. This is a tight, focused effort, with powerful black fruits augmented with herbs and spices and a hint of mineral. Young, tart and tannic, it will continue to improve as it knits together over the years. Editors' Choice.

properties.title: E. Guigal 1998 La Turque  (Côte Rôtie)
properties.address: 7865 W Sahara Ave #104, Las Vegas, NV 89117, USA
properties.description: A firm, dry, foursquare wine that has power and structure rather than the immediate perfumes of La Mouline, the partner cuvée from Guigal. This is the wine for those who want power with big tannins, and they don't come more powerful or tannic than this. Its aging potential is enormous:  after 10 years there should be more sign of the perfumed fruit which is there, somewhere.

properties.title: Domaine Jean-Michel Gerin 1999 La Landonne  (Côte Rôtie)
properties.address: 19 Rue de Montmain, 69420 Ampuis, France
properties.description: Here is a superbly rich and smooth wine. Aromas of violets and flavors of blueberries and red cherries along with dusty tannins, give this wine both immediate appeal and the promise of a good long-term future.

properties.title: Éric & Jöel Durand 1999 Empreintes  (Cornas)
properties.address: 343 Bloomfield Ave Unit D, Montclair, NJ 07042, USA
properties.description: A huge, ink-black wine with all the brooding majesty that gives Cornas its reputation. A blockbuster with enormous rich, sweet tannins. At the end it is the quality of the superripe fruit from old vines that dominates, but it is certainly a wine to keep for generations.

properties.title: E. Guigal 1999  Hermitage
properties.address: 7865 W Sahara Ave #104, Las Vegas, NV 89117, USA
properties.description: A massive wine, with its opaque, dense purple color, its huge tannins and its tight, powerful structure. When it develops—maybe in 10 or 15 years' time—the perfumed, juicy Syrah fruits that are just suggested for the moment are going to be as dominant as the tannins are now. What a wine it will be then.

properties.title: Switchback Ridge 1999 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1104 Adams St, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: A beautifully balanced wine, framed in plush, ripe, velvety tannins and backed by lush, black cherry, plum, blackberry, spice, herb and chocolate flavors. Gloriously complex, seamless in its elegance, the wine is packed with charm and personality; long on the finish.

properties.title: Dalla Valle 1999 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 7776 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Ripe, rich and elegant, this wine is brimming with black plum, strawberry, cassis, chocolate, spice and herb notes. It's smooth-textured and seamlessly integrated, even at this early stage. Firm, plush tannins and just the right amount of toasty oak frame the ensemble.

properties.title: Paul Jaboulet Aîné 1999 Chevalier de Sterimberg White (Hermitage)
properties.address: 25 Pl. du Taurobole, 26600 Tain-l'Hermitage, France
properties.description: Jaboulet's white Hermitage is named after the crusading knight who built and settled in the small chapel on the Hermitage hill. The wine itself is powerful, rich and concentrated, with heady perfumes of wild flowers and nuts. The palate combines a hint of wood, a full-bodied, oily texture and a stunning burst of acidity that leaves a crisp aftertaste.

properties.title: Paul Jaboulet Aîné 1999 La Chapelle  (Hermitage)
properties.address: 25 Pl. du Taurobole, 26600 Tain-l'Hermitage, France
properties.description: Jaboulet's view of its most famous wine seems to have changed. Although the concentrated, dense tannins and big black fruit flavors are still there, it has lost the huge brooding presence of past vintages, and now has a veneer of sophistication with superripe fruit, plums and dark jam tastes. Whether this 1999 will age as well as older vintages remains to be seen, but it will certainly be ready to drink sooner.

properties.title: Delas Frères 1999 Les Bessards  (Hermitage)
properties.address: 40 Bis Av. Jules Nadi, 26600 Tain-l'Hermitage, France
properties.description: Old vines in the Les Bessards vineyard on the Hermitage hill have offered up a majestic wine that has considerable power. With its strong, firm tannins and intense, brooding dark fruits, this is a wine that has obviously been made to last. With little use of new wood for this wine (only 10%), the structure and the complexity come entirely from the enormously ripe fruit and traditional fermentation.

properties.title: Hedges 1999 Red Mountain Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 53511 N Sunset Rd, Benton City, WA 99320, USA
properties.description: Hedges is one of a handful of Washington wineries producing top- caliber wines in significant quantities. This is their best deeply colored, elegant and Bordeaux-like in style and substance. Powerful, muscular black cherry fruit blends with dense, firm tannins, highlighted with elements of iron and earth. The wine, though young and compressed, is a perfect expression of Red Mountain Cabernet. About 20% Merlot is also in the blend. 2,100 six-bottle cases made. Editors' Choice.

properties.title: La Jota Vineyard 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (Howell Mountain)
properties.address: 1102 Las Posadas Rd, Angwin, CA 94508, USA
properties.description: A strong Cabernet that's so tightly wound in tannins, it's hard to appreciate, despite plenty of fruit. There's also a green olive earthiness to the sweet blackberries and cedar. Showing its immaturity now, so give it a good six years in the cellar.

properties.title: Montes 2010 Limited Selection Sauvignon Blanc (Leyda Valley)
properties.address: I-350, Millahue, Santa Cruz, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: This SB has one of Chile's best track records for high quality. The nose and flavors both exceed norms, with the former showing bold citrus, lime and melon aromas and the latter revolving around grapefruit, lime and gooseberry. It's ripe, healthy, pithy, acid-driven and piercing. Summer sipping calls.

properties.title: Dr. Loosen 2009 Wehlener Sonnenuhr Spätlese Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: 20501 Tranquility Ln, Oregon City, OR 97045, USA
properties.description: Loosen's 2009 spätlese from the Wehlener Sonnenuhr is a lush, medium-bodied wine loaded with honey and peaches. It's superripe and succulent, with a long, fruity finish. Try it with Szechuan dishes, which will buffer the sweetness of the wine while the wine tames some of the heat.

properties.title: Dry River 2009 Late Harvest Riesling (Martinborough)
properties.address: 192 Regent Street, Martinborough 5711, New Zealand
properties.description: Plump and slightly sweet, this late-harvest Riesling comes in at 10% alcohol—something along the lines of a rich spätlese in terms of its alcohol-acid-sugar balance. Notes of pineapple and crushed stone open up to melon fruit on the palate and finish long, with a bit of cinnamon or ginger spice.

properties.title: Kumeu River 2008 Coddington Chardonnay (Kumeu)
properties.address: 550 State Highway 16, Auckland 0892, New Zealand
properties.description: Perhaps the biggest of Kumeu River's 2008 Chardonnays, the Coddington offers waves of tropical fruit—pineapple and carambola—allied to mouthfilling richness and balanced by citrusy acids and hints of roasted nuts. Drink now.

properties.title: Reichsgraf von Kesselstatt 2009 Piesporter Goldtröpfchen Trocken GG Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Schloß Marienlay, 54317 Morscheid, Germany
properties.description: Like the Josephshöfer bottling, von Kesselstatt's 2009 GG from the Piesporter Goldtröpfchen boasts a salty minerality that underscores the ripe flavors of peach and orange zest. It's medium to full in body, and nearly bone dry, with a long, mouth-watering finish.

properties.title: S.A. Prüm 2009 Wehlener Sonnenuhr Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Uferallee 25, 54470 Bernkastel-Kues, Germany
properties.description: Makes an interesting contrast with the J.J. Prüm bottling from the same site, weighing in at a full 1.5% less in finished alcohol, and showing mineral-inflected passion fruit flavors and a touch of vanilla. The sweetness is finely balanced by mouthwatering acidity on the finish.

properties.title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2009 Pietracalda  (Fiano di Avellino)
properties.address: Località Cerza Grossa, 83050 Sorbo Serpico AV, Italy
properties.description: Pietracalda (which translates into “hot rock”) seems indeed to release aromas of sunbaked granite or river stone over lush background tones of peach, pear and yellow lemon zest. There's a drying, polished feel in the mouth with a touch of bitter almond on the close.

properties.title: Fournier Père et Fils 2009 Côtes de Morogues  (Menetou-Salon)
properties.address: Rte de la Garenne, 18300 Verdigny, France
properties.description: Particularly intense on the herbaceous front, the wine shows rich grapefruit and lemon zest flavors. Long, deep and delicious.

properties.title: Gadais Père et Fils 2009 Vieilles Vignes Sur Lie  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
properties.address: Rue des Perrières, 44690 Saint-Fiacre-sur-Maine, France
properties.description: Concentrated and very full in the mouth, the wine's acidity is tight, wrapped around lemon and grapefruit characters. Good depth of flavor in this intense wine.

properties.title: Würtz 2008 Geyerscheiss Riesling (Rheinhessen)
properties.address: 6 Rue du Bouxhof, 68630 Mittelwihr, France
properties.description: A unique style of Riesling, naturally fermented on the skins for 20 days prior to pressing. The result is intriguing: honey and baked apple notes tinged with peach-like ripeness and briny minerality. It's medium-bodied, crisp and dry yet with a sense of honeyed richness.

properties.title: Brandborg 2009 Gewürztraminer (Umpqua Valley)
properties.address: 345 1st St, Elkton, OR 97436, USA
properties.description: Do you like lemon drop cocktails? This is a lemon drop wine —so ripe and round and sweetly lemony it could almost pass for Limoncello. Despite the almost 14% alcohol, there is some sweetness, as you might find in a late harvest wine, albeit concealed by the acidity. Rose petals and talcum powder flavors coalesce into a firm, full, fruity, slightly sweet and also quite fragrant finish.

properties.title: Laird 2008 Red Hen Ranch Chardonnay (Oak Knoll District)
properties.address: 5055 Solano Ave, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Soft and rich, this Chardonnay shows intricately layered flavors of buttered toast, grilled peaches, orange jam, honeysuckle flowers and cinnamon. An opulent wine to drink now.

properties.title: Bosman Family Vineyards 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (Wellington)
properties.address: Lelienfontein, Hexberg Road, Wellington, 7655, South Africa
properties.description: A hint of spiced cured meat mixes with the assertive notes of cassis and black plum in the bouquet. The mouth shows more of an herbal character with flavors of licorice, cigar tobacco and pepper that linger through the close. Firmly structured but with a creamy feel and dissipating tannins.

properties.title: Huber 2007 Bombacher Sommerhalde R Trocken Spätburgunder (Baden)
properties.address: Heimbacher Weg 19, 79364 Malterdingen, Germany
properties.description: Toasty and dark-fruited, Huber's 2007 Bombacher Sommerhalde R falls somewhere between the Wildenstein and Malterdinger Bienenberg in style. It's less herbal and more powerful than the former, but not as muscular as the latter. The tannins are still silky, yet there's great intensity, ending on a long, slightly charred note. Drink 2012–2020.

properties.title: Tangent 2011 Paragon Vineyard Albariño (Edna Valley)
properties.address: 5828 Orcutt Rd, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.description: Racy and intensely flavored, this is high in acidity and has spectacularly concentrated flavors of apple, peach, citrus and tropical fruit. With no oak at all, the fruit stars—pure and clean. Even though the residual sugar is technically zero, the finish tastes sweet, so pair it with slightly sweet foods, especially Vietnamese, Chinese or Thai.

properties.title: Airfield Estates 2011 Pinot Gris (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 14450 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE #109, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: There is a sweet streak running through the fleshy fruit flavors of pear and peach. This is pure Pinot Gris, balanced with high acidity, sweet fruit and slightly bitter flavors of skin and rind.

properties.title: Bouchard Père & Fils 2010 Réserve  (Bourgogne)
properties.address: 892 Bd du Saguenay E, Chicoutimi, QC G7H 1L4, Canada
properties.description: Ripe and full bodied, this is packed with tasty fruits. Notes of pear, apricot and white peach mingle easily together, creating a forward, wine with the right depth of flavor.

properties.title: Tildio 2011 Lonesome Spring Ranch Sauvignon Blanc (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 70 E Wapato Lake Rd, Manson, WA 98831, USA
properties.description: Lightly scented with a Riesling-like petrol note, this pungent, grassy Sauvignon Blanc offers a crisply focused mix of celery, green berry and spring herb.

properties.title: Trenza 2010 Blanco White (Edna Valley)
properties.address: 5828 Orcutt Rd, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.description: Made from the folks behind Tangent, this blend of Grenache Blanc and Albariño is rich in orange, white flower and roasted almond flavors, brightened by zesty Edna Valley acidity. The oak brings a smoky creaminess and also some caramelized sweetness.

properties.title: Vignerons de Buxy 2010 Buissonnier  (Montagny)
properties.address: 4-6 Rte de Chalon, 71390 Buxy, France
properties.description: Soft and rounded, this is a ripe, full-bodied wine. It has pear and peach fruits, laced with lime-like acidity and notes of almond and yeast. With its bright, crisp finish, it's a wine to age over the next two years.

properties.title: Vincent 2010 Marie-Antoinette  (Pouilly-Fuissé)
properties.address: 2370 N Refugio Rd, Santa Ynez, CA 93460, USA
properties.description: From the Vincent family of Château de Fuissé, this is a ripe wine, with its green plum and nectarine fruits giving it roundness. At the same time, there is a bright, attractive edge of crispness, with a citrusy finish.

properties.title: Winery of Good Hope 2011 Unoaked Chardonnay (Stellenbosch)
properties.address: Rust en Vrede Farm, Off R44, Opposite Eikendal Estate, Stellenbosch, 7600, South Africa
properties.description: There's great vibrancy on the nose of this wine, with bright scents of ripe nectarine and pineapple core, framed by a floral accent reminiscent of rose water. The mouthfeel is light and accessible, with yellow apple and lime rind flavors. Drink now.

properties.title: Nickel & Nickel 2009 C.C. Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
properties.address: 212 S Main St Suite 100, Fort Worth, TX 76104, USA
properties.description: This 100% Cabernet is very dry, with hard tannins housing blackberry, plum, raisin and cedar flavors. It could develop bottle complexity over the years, but at this price, it's an expensive risk.

properties.title: Occasio 2011 Del Arroyo Vineyard Pinot Gris (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 2245B S Vasco Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.description: Slightly austere, this Pinot Gris is marked by aromas of orange blossom and cheese rind, with a crispness on the finish that resembles a ripe, green apple.

properties.title: Patz & Hall 2010 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 917 Business 141 N, Pound, WI 54161, USA
properties.description: Oaky and seemingly sweet, this is a showy wine whose appeal comes from its ripeness and richness. Vanilla and buttered toast notes from the oak dominate the tropical fruit and pineapple flavors. With its creamy, buttery mouthfeel, this is made to appeal to fans of the modern Chardonnay style.

properties.title: Mount Pleasant Winery 2010 Estates St. Vincent (Augusta)
properties.address: 5634 High St, Augusta, MO 63332, USA
properties.description: This is a red-smelling wine, with a note of strawberry-rhubarb preserves as the primary aroma. Light to medium bodied, it has a glossy feel due to the lithe tannins and well-managed acids. Easygoing and enjoyable, it finishes with a ripe strawberry-shortcake note and a slight tea-like bitterness.

properties.title: Excelsior 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Robertson)
properties.address: South Africa
properties.description: Consistently a good value selection, this showcases ripe black-fruit characteristics of cherry, berry and plum, alongside nuances of savory herbs and fresh menthol leaves. Medium weight, with a mouth-filling texture and a slightly chewy finish.

properties.title: Ramón Bilbao 2011 Valiñas Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.address: Av. Santo Domingo de la Calzada, 34, 26200 Haro, La Rioja, Spain
properties.description: Straightforward peach aromas come with a stalky, grassy side. It feels zesty, spritzy and citric, then tastes almost entirely of orange and tangerine, with a dry finish.

properties.title: Vignerons de Buxy 2011 Côtes d'Auxerre  (Bourgogne)
properties.address: 4-6 Rte de Chalon, 71390 Buxy, France
properties.description: Using grapes sourced from vineyards just outside of the Chablis region, this soft and white-fruited wine is attractive and fragrant. A touch of vanilla adds another dimension, lending a ripe feel. Ready to drink.

properties.title: Viña Ludy 2011 Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.address: 36458 A Muguiña, Pontevedra, Spain
properties.description: Saline, mineral, match stick and tropical fruit aromas define the bouquet. It feels plump but flat, with maderized flavors of white fruits that feature bitterness and not much kick. It's fleshy, remaining slightly bitter on the finish.

properties.title: Tormentoso 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paarl)
properties.description: This smells dark and concentrated, yet the blackberry and cassis core is lifted by a powdery, purple-potpourri accent. There's a strong woody presence on the palate, with baking spice and vanilla bean flavors that linger.

properties.title: White Springs 2009 Sauvignon Blanc (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 4200 NY-14, Geneva, NY 14456, USA
properties.description: There's a slightly dusty, grassy element to this understated Sauvignon Blanc, but the palate is nicely concentrated, with abundant yellow-peach and tangerine flavors. The lemonade-like acidity is brisk and refreshing. Drink now.

properties.title: Georges Duboeuf 2011  Saint-Véran
properties.address: 836 Rte de Fleurie, 71570 Romanèche-Thorins, France
properties.description: This is fragrant and lighthearted, with citrusy acidity that laces through the easy, bright green-apple texture. It's crisp, with a floral finish.

properties.title: HandCraft 2011 Artisan Collection Chardonnay (California)
properties.address: 309 N American Rd unit 11&12, Cheyenne, WY 82007, USA
properties.description: If you like your Chardonnay on the fruity side, this one's for you. It's rich in pineapple, orange and apricot jam flavors, with notes of buttered toast and cream.

properties.title: MAN Vintners 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Coastal Region)
properties.address: R44 Lievland Wine Estate, Klapmuts, 7625, South Africa
properties.description: A green streak runs through this wine, adding an herbal character to the black cherry and plum aromas and flavors. Low tannins and medium acidity produce an overall easy profile and light mouthfeel.

properties.title: Novy 2011 Sauvignon Blanc (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 20299 Quivira Rd, Bucyrus, KS 66013, USA
properties.description: This is exotic in grapefruit, apricot and honey flavors, with a green veggie streak that's courtesy of the chilly vintage. It's best described as tasting like a sweet-and-sour Chinese sauce.

properties.title: Page Cellars 2010 Autumn Chase Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1500 N Page Springs Rd, Cornville, AZ 86325, USA
properties.description: Sourced from the Sundance Vineyard, this is a soft and oaky Chardonnay, with a round, buttery finish. Best enjoyed in the next year or two.

properties.title: Comelli 2012 Sauvignon (Colli Orientali del Friuli)
properties.address: Largo Armando Diaz, 8, 33045 Nimis UD, Italy
properties.description: It delivers classic varietal aromas of tomato leaf, cut grass, hay and citrus. The crisp palate delivers juicy grapefruit, cantaloupe, exotic fruit and mineral alongside lively acidity that leaves a pristine finish.

properties.title: Hugl-Wimmer 2013 Wimmer Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Auf der Schanz 28, 2170 Poysdorf, Austria
properties.description: Ripe Concord pear and an intriguing, phenolic mouthfeel combine in this highly drinkable light white. There is enough weight to support food and a pleasing hint of savoriness as well as depth.

properties.title: Jäger 2013 Klaus Federspiel Grüner Veltliner (Wachau)
properties.address: Kremser Str. 1, 3610 Weißenkirchen in der Wachau, Austria
properties.description: Still closed, this will take a little time to come out of its shell. But it's worth the wait: there's pepper, zestiness and a streamlined, structured body. One word comes to mind: sleekness.

properties.title: Joseph Mellot 2013 Domaine des Emois  (Sancerre)
properties.address: Route de Ménétréol, 18300 Sancerre, France
properties.description: A single-vineyard wine, ripe with tropical and yellow fruits and with a rich texture. It is concentrated, full in the mouth with delicious juicy acidity as well as warm fruitiness. Its texture, cut with minerality, offers the possibility of aging. Drink from 2015.

properties.title: La Tunella 2012 Col Matiss Sauvignon (Colli Orientali del Friuli)
properties.address: Via del Collio, 14, 33040 Premariacco UD, Italy
properties.description: Bold and savory, it has intriguing aromas of grass, dried hay, stone fruit and dill. The rich, warm palate delivers yellow peach, candied ginger and grapefruit accented with sage and a vanilla note.

properties.title: David Hill 2011 Estate Reserve Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 46350 NW David Hill Rd, Forest Grove, OR 97116, USA
properties.description: There is an interesting floral component—white blossoms—coming through in the nose, and sailing along on top of flavors of buttered nuts. A somewhat oily mouthfeel is lifted by moderate acids, and the overall length and follow-through make this one of the better vintages of this affordably priced wine.

properties.title: Dr. Nägler 2012 Rüdesheimer Halbtrocken Riesling (Rheingau)
properties.address: Friedrichstraße 22, 65385 Rüdesheim am Rhein, Germany
properties.description: Whiffs of ripe red berries and stone fruit lend a particularly fruity tone to this just off-dry Riesling. While medium bodied in style, sumptuously ripe flavors of peach and nectarine give the palate a distinct plumpness. Wraps up tart and tight with a shower of citrus acidity.

properties.title: Eichinger 2013 Vom Berg Riesling (Kamptal)
properties.address: Langenloiser Str. 365, 3491 Straß im Straßertale, Austria
properties.description: Restrained but concentrated fruit rules. Grapefruit peel draws you in only to reveal almost candied, rich orange and citron on the streamlined, linear palate.

properties.title: Fritz Haag 2012 Brauneberger Juffer Spätlese Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Dusemonder Str. 44, 54472 Brauneberg, Germany
properties.description: Slightly earthy, savory tones of lanolin and herb lend complexity to a palate that's lavish with peach and quince jelly flavors. Semi-sweet in style, it's quaffable and refreshing with its fruity exuberance offset by a cutting, stark acidity.

properties.title: Glatzer 2013 Grüner Veltliner (Carnuntum)
properties.address: Rosenbergstraße 5, 2464 Göttlesbrunn, Austria
properties.description: Green pear peel, fresh cucumber and ripe, golden pears all unite to make a rounded, toothsome food wine that's also crisp and savory.

properties.title: Gradis'ciutta 2011 Bratinis White (Collio)
properties.address: Località Giasbana, 32/A, 34070 San Floriano del Collio GO, Italy
properties.description: This full-bodied and savory blend of Chardonnay, Ribolla Gialla and Sauvignon opens with lovely aromas of hawthorne, apple and stone fruit. The vibrant palate delivers yellow peach, nectarine, Golden Delicious apple and candied citrus alongside bright acidity.

properties.title: Johannishof 2012 Johannisberg V Kabinett Riesling (Rheingau)
properties.address: Grund 63, 65366 Geisenheim, Germany
properties.description: Hints of lemongrass and blossom lend lavish perfume to flavors of peach and cantaloupe in this ripe, richly fruity wine. Medium-sweet in style, it's backed by a piercing lemon acidity and zest notes that linger on the finish.

properties.title: Josef Jamek 2013 Ried Klaus Federspiel Riesling (Wachau)
properties.address: Josef-Jamek-Straße 45, 3610 Joching, Austria
properties.description: This is reminiscent of a very well-done fruit cocktail. Grape. melon and pear mingle amongst citrus freshness with some tropical hints of lychee mixed in. Wonderfully fruity, rounded and fresh with a zesty seam of acidity.

properties.title: Josef Schmid 2013 Vom Urgestein Riesling (Kremstal)
properties.address: Obere Hauptstraße 38, 3552 Stratzing, Austria
properties.description: A touch of flint, some spritz and the zesty tang of both lemon and grapefruit peel make this racy and sleek . An addictive seam of bright acid puls through to a long, lingering and clean finish.

properties.title: La Tunella 2012 Col Livius Friulano (Colli Orientali del Friuli)
properties.address: Via del Collio, 14, 33040 Premariacco UD, Italy
properties.description: Made from native grape Friulano and fermented in large casks, this full-bodied, sophisticated wine opens with delicate aromas that recall lemon blossom, acacia and walnut. The linear palate offers Bartlett pear, lemon zest and golden apple accented with notes of bitter almond. This will develop complexity over the next few years. Drink through 2018.

properties.title: Le P'tit Paysan 2012 Jack's Hill Chardonnay (Monterey County)
properties.address: 426 Alvarado St, Monterey, CA 93940, USA
properties.description: The subtle scent of vanilla soufflé translates as a soft mouthfeel and buttered toast flavors, resulting in a wine ready for meals both casual (roast chicken and mashed potatoes) or upscale (nut-crusted halibut atop polenta). There's ample acidity, but it still falls in the traditional California Chardonnay camp.

properties.title: Livio Felluga 2011 Terre Alte  (Rosazzo)
properties.address: Via Risorgimento, 1, 34071 Brazzano GO, Italy
properties.description: A blend Friulano (fermented in oak) and Pinot Bianco and Sauvignon (fermented in steel tanks), this has aromas of white fragrant flowers, subtle oak, toast and exotic fruit. The rich palate offers pear, apple, candied citrus, vanilla and butterscotch.

properties.title: Livio Felluga 2013 Friulano (Colli Orientali del Friuli)
properties.address: Via Risorgimento, 1, 34071 Brazzano GO, Italy
properties.description: Made from the denomination's premier white grape, this sleek wine has aromas of mature pear, white flower, dried hay, stone fruit and nut. The palate delivers creamy white peach, yellow apple, lemon zest and mineral balanced by refreshing acidity. It closes on a note of white almond.

properties.title: Livio Felluga 2013 Sauvignon (Collio)
properties.address: Via Risorgimento, 1, 34071 Brazzano GO, Italy
properties.description: Fragrances of exotic fruit, tomato vine and dried hay come with a hint of balsamic herbs. The savory palate delivers apricot, honeydew melon, and yellow bell pepper accented with notes of sage, mint and thyme. Pair this with asparagus risotto.

properties.title: Clos des Justices 2015  Bordeaux Blanc
properties.address: 9 Voie Communale, 33210 Preignac, France
properties.description: A fascinating dry wine made from a 3.6 acre parcel in the Sauternes appellation, planted with Sémillon vines dating back to 1929. While it is very young, it shows great potential with spice, apricot and peach fruit and just a touch of honey. It will develop well and should be left until 2018.

properties.title: Diwald 2015 Fuchsentanz Riesling (Wagram)
properties.address: Hauptstraße 35, 3471, Austria
properties.description: A beautifully pure, linear but generous rendition of Riesling from the loess soils of Wagram: this has a softer aspect but still is beautifully slender and exquisitely balanced. All this needs are a few rays of sunshine to be enjoyed to the full.

properties.title: Domaine du Petit Clocher 2014 Cabernet Franc-Cabernet Sauvignon (Anjou Villages)
properties.address: La Laiterie, 49560 Cléré-sur-Layon, France
properties.description: Dark in color, with cigar-box aromas, this wine is a rich blend of the two Cabernets. It has some firm tannins that are already well integrated into the red-berry fruits and acidity. It is ready to drink, although it will be much better from 2017.

properties.title: Domaine Martin 2015 Les Trois Versants Vieilles Vignes Sur Lie  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
properties.address: 6 Rue de la Garnière, 44690 Saint-Fiacre-sur-Maine, France
properties.description: This is a dense, rich wine that balances intense citrus fruit with a tight mineral texture. It is refreshing, crisp while also concentrated from the old vines. The wine is young and fruity and will be better from 2015.

properties.title: Dürnberg 2015 Tradition Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Weinviertel)
properties.address: Neuer W. 284, 2162 Falkenstein bei Poysdorf, Austria
properties.description: Ripe, almost tropical fruit notes appear: pineapple and orange zest are tempered by peppery yeastiness which becomes stronger and more expressive and textured on the palate. A phenolic backbone provides structure alongside zesty freshness. This packs a real punch.

properties.title: E. Guigal 2014 White (Côtes du Rhône)
properties.address: 7865 W Sahara Ave #104, Las Vegas, NV 89117, USA
properties.description: Guigal is one of those firms that seems to handle whites, reds and rosés with equal aplomb. This white has a fair dose of Viognier, which gives it a floral, apricotty nose, a rich, creamy palate and a spicy, gingery finish. Drink now.

properties.title: True Myth 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 5828 Orcutt Rd, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.description: Smashed blueberries, black gravel, caramel and a touch of oak smoke show on the nose of this stylishly labeled, widely available bottling from the Niven family. Juicy blackberry fruit leads the palate, bolstered by roasted coffee and shaved-chocolate flavors and rounded out by chalky tannins and strong acidic energy.

properties.title: Williams Selyem 2014 Unoaked Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 7227 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: This white will appeal greatly to those who prefer stainless-steel treatment, with its tangle of sour apple, sharp acidity and full but not heavy texture. It gets better in the glass, softening that sharpness and tang, opening up to elements of melon and lime.

properties.title: Williams Selyem 2014 Vista Verde Vineyard Late Harvest Gewürztraminer (San Benito County)
properties.address: 7227 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Concentrated jasmine aromas meet with touches of iodine, lemon curd, golden flowers and honey on the nose of this dessert wine. It's refreshingly light in body, but with a zesty lemon-skin acidity that cuts through the pear juice and Key-lime rind flavors. It's smooth and balanced.

properties.title: Winzer Krems 2015 Edition Chremisa Sandgrube 13 Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Stadtgraben 11, 3500 Krems an der Donau, Austria
properties.description: Bundled, firm notes of green pear convince right from the start. The exuberant but crisp fruit comes on a taut but dense palate that also fizzes with peppery, herbal savor. This crisp, slender wine echoes long.

properties.title: Artner 2015 Bühlweingarten Riesling (Carnuntum)
properties.address: Dorfstraße 93, 2465 Höflein bei Bruck an der Leitha, Austria
properties.description: A touch of passion fruit plays on the nose. The palate on the other hand is full of lime and lemon zest that counters this exuberant fruit. A lovely, playful high-wire act between fruit and freshness that provides immense refreshment.

properties.title: Biokult 2015 Made With Organic Grapes Grüner Veltliner (Austria)
properties.description: Creamy notes of pear still carry a hint of flinty smoke, but the pear notes rise with purity. The bright freshness of pure lemon lifts everything and makes for purity, ease, refreshment and blithe joy.

properties.title: Bray 2007 Verdelho (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
properties.address: 10590 Shenandoah Rd, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.description: This Portuguese variety, most often spelled “Verdejo,” isn't widely planted in California. But here, from Bray's estate vineyard, it has produced a lovely wine. Crisp and fine, with flavors of honeysuckle, lemongrass, peaches and candied ginger, it's the perfect accompaniment to Vietnamese or Burmese food.

properties.title: Breggo 2006 Wiley Vineyard Pinot Gris (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 11001 CA-128, Boonville, CA 95415, USA
properties.description: From the coolest, westernmost vineyard in the appellation comes this deliciously balanced wine. It's off-dry, with residual sugar of 1%, but the considerable acidity gives a clean structure to the flavors of peaches, green apples, honey and spices.

properties.title: Ca'Tullio 2007 Sdricca di Manzano Sauvignon (Colli Orientali del Friuli)
properties.address: Via Beligna, 41, 33051 Aquileia UD, Italy
properties.description: Here is a cheerful and fragrant Sauvignon with aromas of citrus, exotic fruit and natural rubber. The wine has good dimension and personality and a compact feel in the mouth that ends with bright freshness.

properties.title: Château de Pampelonne 2007 Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: 182 Chem. des Tamaris, 83350 Ramatuelle, France
properties.description: A blend of Tibouren, Cinsault, Grenache and Syrah, this is exactly the kind of authoritatively flavored yet nicely balanced rosé that Provence is famous for. Peach, cherry and melon scents all mingle easily, finishing with clean, minerally accents that invite another sip.

properties.title: Château de Pourcieux 2007 Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: 1 Rue de la Croix, 83470 Pourcieux, France
properties.description: A tight, minerally rosé, Pourcieux's 2007 would go well with chicken or fish dishes. It's very fresh in character, with hints of berries on the long, citrusy finish.

properties.title: Chateau Lafayette Reneau 2001 Owner's Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 5081 NY-414, Hector, NY 14841, USA
properties.description: Good Cabernet character all around. The nose is spicy and full, with tobacco, pepper and red berry fruit to start. On the palate, good tannic structure and a balance of big fruit, leather/tobacco and acid offer ageability and finesse. A good food wine—pair it with grilled beef this summer.

properties.title: Château Miraval 2004 Red (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: Miraval, 83570 Correns, France
properties.description: This blend of 80% Syrah and 20% Cabernet Sauvignon reveals plenty of blackberry and plum fruit, carried along by a full-bodied, somewhat tannic mouthfeel. Finishes with soft tannins, making it approachable in the near term.

properties.title: Companhia das Quintas 2006 Quinta do Cardo White (Beira Interior)
properties.address: R. da Fonte Nova, 3780 Sangalhos, Portugal
properties.description: Full, highly perfumed wine, with peanut and tangerine flavors that work well with the fresh acidity and citrus crispness. There is a good structure from the whole berry pressing that gives shape to the wine.

properties.title: Di Lenardo 2007 Vigneto Vigne da Lis Maris Chardonnay (Friuli Grave)
properties.address: Piazza Cesare Battisti, 1, 33050 Ontagnano UD, Italy
properties.description: This luminous wine has a smooth, creamy quality that is reinforced by generous aromas of pineapple, citrus, peach and a dot of vanilla. It tastes fruity and fresh, but doesn't lack in structure, and would pair well with mushroom risotto.

properties.title: Domaines Ott 2006 Château de Selle Clair de Noirs Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: 5093 Route de Flayosc, 83460 Taradeau, France
properties.description: A pale salmon colored rosé, this medium- to full-bodied wine offers scents of honeydew, red berries, peach and crushed stones and flavors to match. The only quibble is that it finishes a little abruptly. This is very good, but consumers should be on the lookout for the fresher 2007.

properties.title: Poggiobello 2007 Pinot Grigio (Colli Orientali del Friuli)
properties.address: Località Poggiobello, 12, 33044 Oleis UD, Italy
properties.description: This wine offers attractive brilliance and surprising aromatic intensity with harmonious notes of honey, stone fruit, fresh apricot and melon. It has a creamy, thick texture that underscores its great potential for food pairing.

properties.title: Quinta do Vallado 2006 Reserva White (Douro)
properties.address: Quinta do Vallado, Vilarinho dos Freires, 5050-364 Peso da Régua, Portugal
properties.description: With a strong element of new wood, this has pear flavors, and feels very round and soft. The acidity is there, but subordinate to the ripe, full fruit and the gently rounded structure. Imported by Michael Skurnik Wines.

properties.title: Seven Hills 2006 Pinot Gris (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 212 N 3rd Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: From the excellent Evergreen vineyard comes a complex wine with appealing minerality. The firm stone fruit/white peach flavors, though slightly underripe, are balanced and crisp. There's a slightly bitter edge to the finish.

properties.title: I Clivi 2004 Clivi Brazan Tocai Friulano (Collio)
properties.address: loc. Gramogliano 20, 33040 Corno di Rosazzo UD, Italy
properties.description: The nose here is redolent of ripe pear and Golden Delicious apple and has background shadings of honey and peach syrup. It is luminous, thick and creamy in appearance and offers a soft, chewy finish.

properties.title: Il Roncal 2006 Pinot Grigio Pinot Grigio (Colli Orientali del Friuli)
properties.address: Via Fornalis, 148, 33043 Cividale del Friuli UD, Italy
properties.description: There's a fragrant grassy or herbal quality that is backed by copious tones of mature fruit, melon and grapefruit. This is a distinctive, personality-driven wine with a creamy, full texture that would pair with shellfish or white meat.

properties.title: Il Roncal 2006 Vigneti Montebello di Fornalis Sauvignon (Colli Orientali del Friuli)
properties.description: Here is a creamy, rich Sauvignon with tones of mature yellow fruit, peach and melon. There are fresh almond accents and notes of dried herbs that add an interesting aromatic layer. Pair it with roasted radicchio or creamy asparagus soup.

properties.title: Marco Cecchini 2006 Bellagioia Pinot Grigio (Venezia Giulia)
properties.address: Località Case Cos, 33040 Faedis UD, Italy
properties.description: There's an attractive freshness to this Pinot Grigio that incorporates elements of citrus, grapefruit, peach, honey and acacia flowers. The mouthfeel is bright and fruity and is relaxingly smooth in texture.

properties.title: Marega 2004 Malvasia Istriana (Collio)
properties.address: Località Marega, 4, 37022 Fumane VR, Italy
properties.description: Here's a sophisticated expression of Malvasia with tones of toasted almond, melon and mature peach. You'll get honey and yellow rose and a nice mineral taste that gives the wine interesting dimension. Pair it with shellfish or delicate white meat.

properties.title: Jean-Marc Bernhard 2015 Mambourg Grand Cru Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 21 Grand Rue, 68230 Katzenthal, France
properties.description: There is an earthy touch to the almost overripe peach notes on the nose. The palate adds both sweetness and a subtle welcome hint of phenolic bitterness to the peachy fruit. Bright lemon freshness cuts through the medium-sweet palate to provide a fresh, almost lip-smacking finish. This wine is full of ripe expressive fruit flavors, giving equal billing to lemon and peach.

properties.title: Joseph Cattin 2016 Hatschbourg Grand Cru Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 35 Rue Roger Frémeaux, 68420 Vœgtlinshoffen, France
properties.description: A funky glint of smoke and yeast precedes rich notions of mirabelle and peach compote. The palate enforces this notion of rich sweet compote even more and adds a welcome lemony vein of freshness to it. There is great balance here between juicy ripe sweetish fruit and tangy uplifting freshness. The finish is off dry and generously fruited.

properties.title: Leo Steen Wines 2014 The Steen Chenin Blanc (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 53 Front St, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Danish sommelier-turned-winemaker Leo Hansen aims to make food-friendly wines, and this delicate Chenin is a great example. Light honey, candied lemon, lime pith and tangerine peel aromas show subtly on the nose. Sparkly acidity makes its clean and crisp nectarine, cherimoya and lime skin flavors pop, with pinpoint focus and a slight grip.

properties.title: Lobo 2014 Wulff Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Atlas Peak)
properties.address: 2275 Soda Canyon Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Blended with 8% Merlot and 6% Petit Verdot, this is a well-made wine from the mountain appellation. With integrated oak and a supportive undercurrent of acidity, it's rounded and rich in bright cherry fruit, the accents a mix of clove and graphite, finishing with balance.

properties.title: Lutum 2015 Durell Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 1945 Felder Rd, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.description: This producer's light take on the variety continues to impress with this vintage. Anise and oak hints combine on the nose to invite one in for an elegant taste of bright, juicy acidity and refined lemon and green apple flavors.

properties.title: Muzic 2015 Chardonnay (Collio)
properties.address: 3447 US-3, Thornton, NH 03285, USA
properties.description: This gorgeous white opens with scents suggesting white flower, orchard fruit, lemon pastry and a whiff of wet stone. The creamy palate delivers yellow apple, lemon zest, bitter almond and a savory mineral note. It's supremely elegant and surprisingly fresh for the vintage.

properties.title: Cave de Hunawihr 2016 Rosacker Grand Cru Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 48 Rte de Ribeauvillé, 68150 Hunawihr, France
properties.description: A full blast of very ripe peach hits the nose. The palate adds a touch of lemony freshness and a sweet rose perfume to this, creating an off-dry, floral and fruity swirl across the palate. There is something gentle about this, something charming and friendly. The lemony freshness keeps everything on the bright vivid side. The finish is lasting and off dry.

properties.title: Conclusion 2015 The Storyteller Proprietary White (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 12300 County Rd 92B, Zamora, CA 95698, USA
properties.description: This small production blend of 90% Viognier and 10% Sauvignon Blanc leads with fragrant, inviting floral qualities and well-defined layers of peach and apricot fruit. Light and bright, it's balanced, focused and utterly delicious.

properties.title: Domaine Barmès-Buecher 2015 Brut Nature Sparkling (Crémant d'Alsace)
properties.address: 30 Rue Sainte-Gertrude, 68920 Wettolsheim, France
properties.description: A touch of pepper accentuates the fresh notion of wet stone and citrus on the nose. The palate is bone dry and has a fresh fizzing mousse that accentuates, stone, pepper and green citrus even more. The slightly austere, bone-dry style will come into its own with other pure restrained flavors—think subtle Japanese dishes. The finish is brisk and superclean.

properties.title: Heitz 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 500 Taplin Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Tautly structured and lightly refreshing, this wine is an outstanding expression of high-toned stone fruit, lime and salt. The texture is seamless and round, with a lasting streak of juicy acidity.

properties.title: Ruby Hill Winery 2016 Reserve Collection Sauvignon Blanc (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 400 Vineyard Ave, Pleasanton, CA 94566, USA
properties.description: This big wine has everything required of the variety and more. It starts with vivid citrus, herb and melon aromas, then lays on ripe white peach, honeydew and mineral notes that fill out the palate and lend mouthfilling texture. Layering, complexity and diverse flavors make it special.

properties.title: Vignoble des 2 Lunes 2013 Comète Sparkling (Crémant d'Alsace)
properties.address: 21 Rue Sainte-Gertrude, 68920 Wettolsheim, France
properties.description: Lemon plays on the nose alongside hints of shortbread. The palate has a lovely rich creaminess and very fine elegant mousse, creating an impression of light-bodied richness. This is sophisticated and dry, elegant and creamy—very grown-up and utterly delicious.

properties.title: Balletto 2015 Estate Grown Estate Bottled Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 5700 Occidental Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.description: Apple skin, sea stone and lemon notes comprise the light-bodied narrative of this balanced, bright and complex wine. From a vintage known for its modest yields, this wine shows the quality of the producer's estate vineyards, which range across the appellation.

properties.title: Bisol 2016 Crede Brut  (Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)
properties.address: Via Follo, 33, 31049 Santo Stefano, Valdobbiadene TV, Italy
properties.description: Enticing scents of white flowers and citrus blossom lead the nose of this elegant wine. Silky and crisp, the bright palate delivers yellow apple, pear and a tangy hint of tangerine, framed in vibrant acidity and a polished perlage.

properties.title: Terlato 2012 Pinot Grigio (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 900 Armour Dr, Lake Bluff, IL 60044, USA
properties.description: This is an easy, fruity wine with sharp acidity that balances ripe flavors of citrus, tropical fruits, peaches, honeysuckle and vanilla bean. It finishes a little off-dry.

properties.title: Tololo 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Curicó Valley)
properties.address: 2 Commerce Dr # 3, Moorestown, NJ 08057, USA
properties.description: With grapefruit and orange aromas, this is on the ripe side, but the feel is fresh and flavors of citrus, white pepper, arugula and briny melon get the job done. Drink this quaffer soon and it will satisfy; hold it too long and it will lose its fresh character.

properties.title: Atwater 2008 Cuvée Brut Sparkling (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 5055 NY-414, Burdett, NY 14818, USA
properties.description: Dusty mineral notes mingle alongside pretty floral and apple aromas on this softly effervescent sparkling. A blend of 66% Pinot Noir and 34% Chardonnay, it's strikingly high in acidity but has pleasant lemon and apple flavors.

properties.title: Cantina Offida 2012 Passerina (Marche)
properties.address: Via Lava, 63073 Offida AP, Italy
properties.description: Made from yet another up and coming white grape from Central Italy, this opens with a pretty floral fragrance of wisteria and jasmine. The linear white peach, pear and citrus flavors are balanced by bright acidity.

properties.title: Charles & Charles 2012 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1 W Flatiron Crossing Dr, Broomfield, CO 80021, USA
properties.description: This young Chardonnay still shows plenty of yeasty scents and flavors, turning it almost beer-like. Light lemon and tea flavors, with a dash of baking spices, complete the picture.

properties.title: Dirler-Cadé 2011 Edelzwicker Réserve White (Alsace)
properties.address: 13 Rue d'Issenheim, 68500 Bergholtz, France
properties.description: An attractive blend in which Pinot Blanc seems to dominate, this wine is delicately creamy in texture with lively acidity and ripe apple and pear flavors. This is a wine to drink now.

properties.title: Errazuriz 2012 Max Reserva Chardonnay (Aconcagua Valley)
properties.address: E-639 18, Panquehue, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.description: Hailing from a very warm vintage, this smells like buttered movie popcorn and baked apple. In the mouth, there's adequate acidity and a touch of minerality. Flavors of tropical fruits run sweet and woody, while the finish drips honey and banana flavors.

properties.title: Ferrari-Carano 2012 Pinot Grigio (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 8761 Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: There's a touch of honeyed sweetness to this Pinot Grigio, but it finishes dry and clean with acidity. The Meyer lemon, honeydew, peach and green apple flavors are sunny and rip. It's a nice wine to drink with southeast Asian and fusion fare.

properties.title: Frédéric Mallo 2010 Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 2 Rue Saint-Jacques, 68150 Hunawihr, France
properties.description: This is a light and open wine, showing more fruitiness characteristic spice of Pinot Gris. It does have almond and green herb flavors, along with a touch of pepper and bitterness. Drink now.

properties.title: Jean-Baptiste Adam 2012 Tradition Pinot Blanc (Alsace)
properties.description: Just lightly peppery, this is a rounded, smooth wine. It has a creamy texture with baked apple and spiced pear flavor. The acidity is just right, with juiciness on the finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Jean-Baptiste Adam 2012 Tradition Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 5 Rue de l'Aigle, 68770 Ammerschwihr, France
properties.description: This is a softly spicy wine that is understated and light. With its brisk acidity and flavors of citrus and lychee, it is an easy, gentle wine that is ready to drink now.

properties.title: Justin 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 11680 Chimney Rock Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Simple and direct, this wine is characterized by flavors of blackberry, currant, mocha and oak. It's a softly tannic Cabernet with a large production of 48,000 cases. Dry and spicy, it's ready to drink now.

properties.title: Wolfberger 2012 Pinot Blanc (Alsace)
properties.address: 6 Grand-Rue, 68420 Eguisheim, France
properties.description: Soft and ripe, this is an attractive, light and fragrant wine. There is a good strand of acidity that runs through the wine, giving a counterpoint to the apple and spice flavors. Drink now.

properties.title: Prime 2011 Midoriya Hills Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 974 Franklin St, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.description: This vineyard has done well in warm years such as 2008, but in the chilly 2011 vintage, it's tart with acidity. A cranberry bite dominates all else, from the red currant flavors to the spicy, vanilla-accented oak from barrels.

properties.title: Rutherford Ranch 2012 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1680 Silverado Trail S, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Flavors of Meyer lemon, lime and grapefruit are accented with a tang of gooseberries in this wine. The finish is lively and dry, with a scour of mouthwatering acidity. Production was 2,500 cases.

properties.title: Henri Bourgeois 2012 Sancerre d'Antan  (Sancerre)
properties.address: 3535 Guerneville Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.description: From the classic sand and flint soil that makes up much of the Sancerre vineyard, this complex wine has both fruit and intense minerality. The touches of toast and almonds round out the still young wine, contrasting with the more steely core. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Aubichon Cellars 2012 Vista Hills Pinot Gris (Dundee Hills)
properties.address: 1326 N, OR-99W, Dundee, OR 97115, USA
properties.description: Distinctive, artisanal and sourced from a spectacular site, this was fermented in oak and barrel aged. The hock bottle indicates the Alsatian style, and the wine inside is both powerful and  sturdy, with supple, generous flavors of stone fruits running into light tropicality.

properties.title: Casella 2006 1919 Cabernet Sauvignon (South Australia)
properties.address: 1471 Wakley Rd, Yenda NSW 2681, Australia
properties.description: Despite reaching its eighth birthday, this is still an incredibly youthful vibrant purple color, with no signs of aging. Aromas and flavors of smoke, toast, black olive, vanilla and cassis are what you might expect from a much younger wine. The tannins are firm, yet the wine is fleshy enough to carry them into a long finish. Drink 2018–2025.

properties.title: Venteux 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.description: Luscious, intoxicating aromas of crème brûlée, vanilla liqueur and Bourbon barrel lift up ample purple and blue fruits on this rich wine from a 22-acre family vineyard. The mouthfeel is accordingly velvety, with plum flavors most prevalent. The three years of new French oak élevage  play a central yet nicely integrated role.

properties.title: Stift Göttweig 2015 Pfaffenberg Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
properties.description: The appetizing perfume of candied orange peel rises seductively from the glass. The palate counters with the very fresh but ripe fruit of fleshy juicy yellow mirabelles. These are joined by tangy, zesty grapefruit freshness, creating a concentrated fruit-driven palate of great tension and concentration. This is a wonderful tightrope act between tang and generosity. The finish is long and clean.

properties.title: Bell 2013 Clone 337 Unfiltered Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
properties.address: 6200 Washington St, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: From the Georges III Vineyard in the heart of the appellation, this 100% clonal-specific wine is juicy and generously seasoned in blackberry, tobacco and black pepper. With a huge presence on the palate, it finishes with dried herb and anise. Cellar through 2023.

properties.title: La Voix 2015 Here and Heaven John Sebastiano Vineyard Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 1520 E Chestnut Ct, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.description: Steve Clifton's music-meets-wine project taps into mandolinist Chris Thile and vocalist Aoife O'Donovan's song for this bottling. It shows rounded ripe mango, pineapple, Pink Lady apples and peach on the nose, framed by steely alkalinity and tight lemon rind. The flavors are soft, clean and easy to enjoy, with Asian pear, nectarine and a steady saltiness emerging toward the finish.

properties.title: Lava Cap 2014 Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (El Dorado)
properties.address: 2221 Fruitridge Rd, Placerville, CA 95667, USA
properties.description: Pure, concentrated grape flavors fill up this full-bodied and well-balanced wine. It's a pleasure to smell and taste the black currant and cherry character, deftly and lightly accented by baking spice. The velvety texture fills the mouth and propels those flavors through a lingering finish. It will drink best after 2018.

properties.title: Lincourt 2014 Rancho Santa Rosa Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 1711 Alamo Pintado Rd, Solvang, CA 93463, USA
properties.description: Light but inviting wood aromas from oak to acacia show on the nose of this bottling, along with red-pear skins, yellow-grapefruit pith and the slightest touch of marshmallow. The sip is more about chalky grip and the tightly woven texture than blunt flavors, with enough sour Key-lime and pink-grapefruit touches to entertain the palate.

properties.title: Anton Bauer 2015 Rosenberg Alte Reben Grüner Veltliner (Wagram)
properties.address: Neufang 42, 3483, Austria
properties.description: The nose wants to reveal next to nothing of this rich complex wine, but the palate hints at future glory. This is as tightly closed as a firm fist, but the rich fluidity of the palate is undeniable. There are glimpses of juicy yellow pear while dark flinty spice thunders in the background. Drink 2018–2025.

properties.title: Baileyana 2014 La Pristina Chardonnay (Edna Valley)
properties.address: 5828 Orcutt Rd, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.description: The nose on this wine by Burgundy-raised veteran vintner Christian Roguenant is very minerally and focused, showing chalk, crushed sea shells, lemon rind and a touch of Marcona almond. The texture is pleasantly grippy and taut, containing flavors of white peach, grapefruit pith and baking soda, all of which sail deep into the finish.

properties.title: Jäger 2015 Achleiten Smaragd Grüner Veltliner (Wachau)
properties.address: Kremser Str. 1, 3610 Weißenkirchen in der Wachau, Austria
properties.description: Lovely notions of both ripe and green pear rise from the glass. There also is a more savory edge reminiscent of moss and yeast. This comes out even more on the fresh concentrated palate with a lovely salty peppery nuance that makes this very moreish and thrilling. The flavors, amply supported by zesty citrus, just last.

properties.title: Bründlmayer 2015 Lamm Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.address: Zwettler Str. 23, 3550 Langenlois, Austria
properties.description: There is a distinct nutty smoky impression on the nose. The concentrated palate also comes with shades of vanilla and hazelnut, wrapping its fresh lemon and herbal spice into a warming intriguing cloak. It is the purity of the lemon that shines and lasts longest on the palate. This may be a bit young to drink now, so be patient and drink 2020–2030.

properties.title: Foley 2014 Rancho Santa Rosa Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 6121 East, CA-246, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.description: Light on the nose, this shows delicate aromas of Asian pear, honeysuckle, squeezed lemon wedge, fresh coconut flesh and a tiny bit of butter. The palate is also demure yet delicious, with lightly poached apples, squeezed lime and a chalky textural grip.

properties.title: Giesen 2013 The Fuder Single Vineyard Selection Matthews Lane Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.description: Fuder is German for a large wooden vessel, used in this case for the fermentation and aging of wine. Hints of struck-match complexity mark the nose, giving way to notes of grilled nectarine. The wine is full and rich in the mouth, with a mouthwatering finish that marries stone fruit and pink grapefruit into a stunning finale.

properties.title: Schramsberg 2011 Methode Traditionelle Brut Sparkling (Carneros)
properties.address: 1400 Schramsberg Rd, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.description: This sparkler was made from a majority of Chardonnay with a seasoning of Pinot Noir, the grapes grown at Hyde Vineyard, among other sites within the appellation. A doughy, tart wine, it brightly expresses green apple, orange, grapefruit and a more developed creaminess of biscotti, delighting in a persistence of lemon zest.

properties.title: Te Mata 2013 Cape Crest Sauvignon Blanc (Hawke's Bay)
properties.address: 349 Te Mata Road, Parkvale, Havelock North 4294, New Zealand
properties.description: This has come to epitomize the Hawke's Bay style of Sauvignon Blanc, typical in it's ripe fruit and oak treatment. Hints of vanilla and cedar frame passion fruit and pink grapefruit notes, then leave a lingering impression of Creamsicle behind on the silky-textured finish.

properties.title: Allram 2015 Gaisberg Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.address: Herrengasse 3, 3491 Straß im Straßertale, Austria
properties.description: The very gentle but seductive notion of sun-ripened red-cheeked mirabelle plums radiates like sunshine from the glass. With a further sniff there also is peppery greenery: yarrow and hay. The palate also unites this friendly fruit with the savory spice of these herbs and comes in a light-footed, compact and fresh package that just dances on the tongue. This is deceptively frivolous Grüner with a seriously delicious concentrated core.

properties.title: Allram 2015 Renner Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.description: The lifted nose promises purity, which the palate follows thorough on, with the gentle fruit of ripe pear and mirabelle plum and the softer freshness of ripe lemon. There is just a smattering of white pepper. All is held with great poise and freshness, and there is something utterly clean and pure about this.

properties.title: Anton Bauer 2015 Grande Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Wagram)
properties.address: Neufang 42, 3483, Austria
properties.description: Soft vanilla hints of oak creep into the mossy aromatic hints of green and yellow pear. There also is a generous core of ripe fruit, almost reminiscent of lychee. While this is fresh with citrus, the deep mellowness and gliding fluidity of the palate will win you over. The finish is clean and lasting.

properties.title: Bründlmayer 2015 Alte Reben Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.address: Zwettler Str. 23, 3550 Langenlois, Austria
properties.description: Funky yeast still holds sway on the nose. Underneath that are notions of ripe juicy pear and a soft hint of vanilla. The palate strikes a sonorous balance between smoky vanilla and gently peppered pears. There is concentration and promise. The finish is nutty and very long. This is still tightly closed and needs to unfurl, but will become a great gastronomic wine. Drink 2019–2025.

properties.title: Murrieta's Well 2016 Dry Rosé (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 3005 Mines Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.description: Seriously refreshing, this pink and copper-colored medium-bodied wine has dazzling citrus aromas, pink grapefruit and raspberry flavors and great acidity that wakes up the taste buds. Made from Grenache and Counoise grapes, it's just the thing for an alfresco lunch or to pour with appetizers before dinner.

properties.title: Novelty Hill 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14710 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: Dried herb aromas are at the fore of this Cabernet; exotic spice, smoke, licorice and cherry notes follow. Cherry and chocolate flavors coat the palate, showing vibrancy, while a distinctive espresso note marks the finish.

properties.title: Patz & Hall 2015 Alder Springs Vineyard Chardonnay (Mendocino)
properties.description: Almost as buttery as a croissant, this full-bodied and extremely flavorful wine has an aroma like butterscotch, flavor like melted butter and vanilla, and a lingering pastry-like accent on the finish. The texture is buttery, too, coating the palate and revealing layers of richness.

properties.title: Poseidon 2015 Estate Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.address: 1100 Milton Rd, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.description: Enticing complexity and spiciness give this wine a great personality. Aromas like toasted baguette join buttery and savory spice-cabinet flavors on a base of crisp apple. It shows a tasty oaky element that doesn't overwhelm.

properties.title: Rijckaert 2015 Vers Chanes  (Pouilly-Fuissé)
properties.address: Aux Correaux, 71570 Leynes, France
properties.description: Ripe, smooth and deliciously rounded, this is a generous wine. Spice and yellow fruits are right up front, supported by just enough acidity. The wine is rich and ready to drink.

properties.title: Sol Rouge 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 29 Avenue G, San Francisco, CA 94130, USA
properties.description: From two vineyards on Howell Mountain, this is a well-made medium-bodied wine, rich in chocolate and a taste of blackberry cobbler. Coffee accents a soft luxurious tannin structure and thick concentration that finishes with a tart acidity.

properties.title: Sol Rouge 2013 The Keep Red (Lake County)
properties.address: 29 Avenue G, San Francisco, CA 94130, USA
properties.description: Ripe and concentrated, this wine is also full bodied and quite tannic while maintaining a velvety mouthfeel. The abundant flavors of black cherry and dark chocolate are inviting and deep.

properties.title: Syncline 2016 Boushey Vineyard Picpoul (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 111 Balch Rd, Lyle, WA 98635, USA
properties.description: From an extremely rare grape variety for the state, this delivers citrus rind and flower blossom scents and sleek fruit flavors backed by mouth-puckering acidity. It screams for shellfish.

properties.title: Terroir Al Límit 2014 Pedra de Guix White (Priorat)
properties.address: Carrer Baixa de la Font, 12, 43737 Torroja del Priorat, Tarragona, Spain
properties.description: Despite a tan-meets-orange color, this Priorat white is fresh on the nose with apricot aromas. A solid texture with grip controls the palate, while dry white-fruit and orange-peel flavors end with slightly rubbery white-grape tannins.

properties.title: Knights Bridge 2015 West Block Chardonnay (Knights Valley)
properties.address: 1373 Lincoln Ave, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.description: Entirely fermented in French oak before an additional 18 months spent aging also in oak, this wine offers an intoxicating floral entry of apple blossom and lime. Creamy and velvety in texture, its taste profile ranges from spicy nutmeg and apple pie to clarified butter.

properties.title: MacRostie 2015 Bacigalupi Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 4605 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Golden-honey and pear flavors combine effortlessly in this lovely wine from the famous vineyard, which neighbors this producer along the appellation's Westside Road. Moderate acidity freshens a bold full-bodied approach defined by its backbone of smooth integrated oak.

properties.title: Asuncion Ridge 2014 Nefarious Red (Paso Robles)
properties.description: There is an impressive density to the nose of this blend of 88% Syrah and 12% Grenache, with blueberry and black currant showing alongside crushed gravel and tar. The palate is rich with dark fruits and dark spices, showing baked black plum torte, a touch of fennel and a tart finish.

properties.title: Asuncion Ridge 2016 Viognier (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 725 12th St, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Light honeydew and gardenia aromas show on the pleasant and clean nose of this well-restrained Viognier. The sip is as zippy and persistent with acidity as can be without losing the varietal character, allowing the ripe Gala apple and Anjou pear to show through the racy frame.

properties.title: Brecon Estate 2016 Albariño (Central Coast)
properties.address: 7450 Vineyard Dr, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Clean lines of grapefruit, lime and lemongrass make for a fresh, somewhat angular nose on this zesty tongue-tingling bottling. The palate begins with a round orange-candy flavor and then dives into the sharpness of lime skins and grapefruit peels, with a sizzle of acidity that goes long and deep.

properties.title: Domaine Charles Frey 2014 Nature Extra Brut Sparkling (Crémant d'Alsace)
properties.address: 1 Rue du Pinot Blanc, 67650 Dambach-la-ville, France
properties.description: Something of both fresh and dried pink grapefruit zest plays about the nose. The very frothy palate adds some spice to that, as well as a pleasant hint of bitterness. All the fruit is accentuated by the frothing bursting bubbles. Drink soon, ideally as an animating apéritif. The zesty finish is very appetizing.

properties.title: Dr. Pauly Bergweiler 2015 Noble House Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Gestade 15, 54470 Bernkastel-Kues, Germany
properties.description: Pristine honeydew, apricot and yellow peach notes entice on the nose. Pleasantly off-dry in style, the palate is lush and tropical, bursting with melon and mango flavors. A tight frame of acidity lends vibrance and edge. Drink now through 2020.

properties.title: Etude 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1250 Cuttings Wharf Rd, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.description: Truffled compost and chocolate mocha combine for a density of flavor and texture in this approachable, decadent wine. Medium in terms of body and length, it's abundant in leather and burly black fruit.

properties.title: Fess Parker 2015 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 6200 Foxen Canyon Rd, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.description: Nice and easy aromas of lemon sorbet, Gravenstein apple and jasmine emerge from this ever-reliable bottling from the late actor-turned-vintner's family winery. The flavors are also straightforward and quite quaffable, with a light acidity framing apple flesh and Anjou-pear slices.

properties.title: Gracianna 2015 Suzanne's Blend Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 6914 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: There's a lot to like in this youthful, concentrated white, from its tartness of green apple and lime to its mineral-laden acidity. Full bodied, it never loses that sense of verve on the palate, which helps rein in the ripeness.

properties.title: Apsara 2015 Kick Ranch Sauvignon Blanc (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 133 3rd Ave, Baraboo, WI 53913, USA
properties.description: Given time to settle in both used French oak and stainless steel, this is a nice effort from a well-respected vineyard that's big and juicy in grapefruit and melon. Made in a lighter style, it offers a bite of oak on the finish, leaving a substantial impression.

properties.title: Bodegas Paniza 2015 Sleever Garnacha Rosé (Cariñena)
properties.description: Packed in a pink bottle, this Garnacha rosé opens with prickly pink-grapefruit aromas. It's balanced on the palate, with a touch of oily weight. Orange and cantaloupe flavors leave a citric tang on the finish.

properties.title: Cameron Hughes 2014 Lot 526 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 205 Concourse Blvd, Santa Rosa, CA 95403, USA
properties.description: The nose on this bottling is very smoky and flinty, but also shows underlying pear and apple aromas. There's an intriguing lime-zest character to the palate, with a base of dried apples and a smoked-wood character that's hard to ignore.

properties.title: Castello Bonomi 2010 Dosage Zero Sparkling (Franciacorta)
properties.address: Via San Pietro, 46, 25030 Coccaglio BS, Italy
properties.description: This opens with aromas of orchard fruit, citrus and toasted bread crust. The firm palate offers lime, vanilla, oak and yellow apple skin alongside bracing acidity. A note of bitter almond marks the finish.

properties.title: Château la Freynelle 2014  Bordeaux
properties.description: The wine, unusually 100% Cabernet Sauvignon, is ripe and juicy with some smoky tannins in support. It has a finely perfumed character although touches of extraction give it a bitter edge. That should blow by, leaving an attractive fruity wine.

properties.title: Iron Horse 2011 National Geographic Ocean Reserve Blanc de Blancs Estate Bottled Chardonnay (Green Valley)
properties.address: 9786 Ross Station Rd, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.description: A portion of the proceeds from sales of this dry sparkler helps support marine protected areas and sustainable fishing. Tart and doughy, it imparts a bite of vanilla biscuit, apple pie, orange peel and lime. A streak of minerality gives it plenty of life atop the medium body.

properties.title: Jurtschitsch 2015 Käferberg Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.address: Rudolfstraße 39, 3550 Langenlois, Austria
properties.description: Softly perfumed stone fruits like ripe mirabelles shimmer in the glass and are supported on the palate with a zingy backbone of freshness. This is a wonderful union of ripe fruit flavors and exhilarating freshness. There is concentration at the core and a long whistle-clean finish.

properties.title: La Voix 2013 Ecstasy of Gold Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 1520 E Chestnut Ct, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.description: Dried elderberries and plum skins meet with cocoa, soy, cracked peppercorn and hoisin sauce unfold on the nose of this wine, made by Steve Clifton. The teriyaki and black-plum sauce touches kick into high gear on the palate, where roasted ancho chile-cocoa flavors prove quite savory and tasty.

properties.title: Malibu Rocky Oaks 2014 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
properties.address: Rocky Oaks Park, 107 Kanan Dume Rd, Malibu, CA 90265, USA
properties.description: One of the more promising wines coming out of the newer Malibu area, this Cab that is boosted by 10% Merlot and 4% Cabernet Franc. It shows deep blueberry, black currant and black olive on the nose, along with dill, pepper, spearmint and caramel-laced fudge. The intriguing palate offers black olive, black pepper and dark, deep fruit. It's well structured and tasty, like a salt- and pepper-crusted steak.

properties.title: Greywacke 2014 Pinot Gris (Marlborough)
properties.address: 47 Kennedys Road, Hawkesbury 7272, New Zealand
properties.description: Full bodied, rich and carrying a bit of residual sugar, this is a fine example of the variety's potential in Marlborough. Smoky, grilled-pear notes add hints of honey and melon on the palate, where despite its richness, the wine soars into a long, velvety finish. Drink now–2020, at least.

properties.title: Balletto 2015 Teresa's Unoaked Estate Grown Estate Bottled Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 5700 Occidental Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.description: This is a delightful wine, crowd pleasing and complex. It benefits from its lack of oak by focusing on its lifted fruit—a twist of fresh-squeezed lemon and grapefruit—its acidity nicely measured and not one-dimensional. The crisp freshness is complemented by a hint of white rock and subtle lushness on the back palate.

properties.title: R&A; Pfaffl 2015 Passion Reserve Riesling (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: 2505 E Pine St, Tulsa, OK 74110, USA
properties.description: Notions of very ripe, almost golden apricots shimmer in the glass. There is a touch of honey and a hedonistic peachy note that pervades this entire wine from first sniff to lasting finish. This is dry Riesling at its roundest and peachiest. I defy anyone not to drink a second glass. The finish is delicious and moreish.

properties.title: Williams Selyem 2014 Lewis MacGregor Estate Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 7227 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: This is the inaugural vintage of a new estate wine, from a 30-acre property on Eastside Road across the Russian River from the winery. Pear compote, anise and lemon candy wrap around voluptuous layers marked by green apple and orange peel, offering richness and weight in hearty measure.

properties.title: Wood Family Vineyards 2013 Especial Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 2407 Research Dr, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.description: This is a concentrated, substantive wine with great structure and layers of flavor that taste wonderful now and should improve with time. It coats the palate with rich black cherry, light oak spices and a hint of chocolate, while the full body makes it mouth-filling and luscious. It will drink best from 2019.

properties.title: Domaine Lucien Barrot et Fils 2013 La Sousto Red (Châteauneuf-du-Pape)
properties.address: Route Calade,, 11 Chem. du Clos, 84230 Châteauneuf-du-Pape, France
properties.description: This full-bodied, fleshy wine fits the typical Châteauneuf-du-Pape mold, delivering ample black-cherry and plum fruit, then layering atop hints of Mexican chocolate and baking spices. Drink now–2025.

properties.title: Frank Family 2012 Brut Rosé Sparkling (Carneros)
properties.address: 1091 Larkmead Ln, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.description: This méthode Champenoise blend of 76% Pinot Noir and 24% Chardonnay impresses with its inviting mousse of peach and strawberry. It's fresh and lush, aged on the lees for three years, giving it body without an overabundance of alcohol. Dry, it finishes with a twist of candied orange peel.

properties.title: Gilles Flacher 2013 Les Rouelles  (Condrieu)
