properties.address: Le Village, 07340 Charnas, France
properties.description: This is aged in barrel, but the power of the source's granitic soils is such that the oak is barely noticeable. Nasturtium blossom and apricot mark the nose, while the palate adds pineapple, cinnamon and clove. The wine is a bit oily in texture, but with a long, tropical-fruit-laced finish that brings admirable freshness, focus and energy.

properties.title: MacPhail 2014 Pratt Vineyard Vine Hill Road Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 6761 McKinley St, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.description: This is from a fantastic vineyard site in the Laguna Hills neighborhood of the appellation, and the second vintage of this particular selection from this producer. Generous lemony oak meets toast within a robust body of complex layers and salty caramel.

properties.title: Netzl 2015 Bärnreiser Grüner Veltliner (Carnuntum)
properties.address: Rosenbergstraße 17, 2464 Göttlesbrunn, Austria
properties.description: Yeasty roundness on nose and palate plays host to subtle explosions of spice: white pepper here, soft soy there. There is an underlying, streamlined citrus freshness that provides balance. A food wine par excellence: there is both body and finesse.

properties.title: William Fèvre 2008 Vaillons Premier Cru  (Chablis)
properties.address: 10 Rue Jules Rathier, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: Tight and mineral wine, with a great citrus character, fresh green fruits broadened by wood toast, while the acidity is as crisp as possible. It has a youthful apple skin texture, and would repay a couple of years' aging.

properties.title: Joseph Drouhin 2008 Domaine Drouhin-Vaudon Montmains Premier Cru  (Chablis)
properties.description: A wine that delivers great freshness, a bright lemon and grapefruit character, tautly mineral in character, almost steely, with a pure line of green fruits. Age for 2–3 years.

properties.title: Collovray et Terrier 2008 Domaine des Deux Roches Plénitude e Bonté  (Pouilly-Fuissé)
properties.description: Balanced, a wine that shows the right richness, spice, great wafts of fresh plums, peaches, lifted by acidity and rounded by a fine wood element.

properties.title: Grand Rêve 2007 Collaboration Series II Ciel du Cheval Vineyard Red Wine Red (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 12514 130th Ln NE, Kirkland, WA 98034, USA
properties.description: Ross Mickel (Ross Andrew Winery) made this Côtes du Rhône-style blend, a flashy riot of floral scents and earthy, funky fruit. Even with several hours breathing time it feels tight—decanting is mandatory. But give it a few years in the cellar and it will unpack even more layers of flavor. Dry and astringent in the mouth, it brings young flavors of cranberry juice and grape concentrate, plenty of acidity and minerality, and excellent depth.

properties.title: Gordon Brothers 2008 Six Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 671 Levey Rd, Pasco, WA 99301, USA
properties.description: The name references the clone number for this single-clone Cabernet Sauvignon. Since it is also a single-vineyard estate wine, it captures terroir in a meaningful expression. Still young, sharply defined and tannic, it is showing a lot of barrel flavors, especially clove. The Cabernet fruit is right in line with Gordon Brothers style, capturing the herbal aspects of the grape, in perfect balance, with a beautiful mix of cassis, earth and fresh, sweet herb. Very limited.

properties.title: Collovray et Terrier 2007 Vieilles Vignes  (Pouilly-Fuissé)
properties.address: La Cuette, 71960 Davayé, France
properties.description: Spicy, toasty wine, the fruit tropically rich. The texture is dense, the acidity important but not dominant. Delicious wine, now maturing well.

properties.title: Domaine Denis Jeandeau 2008  Viré-Clessé
properties.address: 116 Rue de la Planchette, 71960 Fuissé, France
properties.description: Spicy, toasty wine that balances the wood with rich fruit. Rounded, smooth texture, lifted by wood spice and apricot juice.

properties.title: Jarvis 2005 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2970 Monticello Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: It's all about sweet, delicious flavor in this 100% Cabernet. Dazzles the mouth with the essence of blackberries, cassis, cherry tart with the smoky crust, chocolate and exotic sandalwood, wrapped into the richest, finest tannins you can imagine. Compulsively drinkable, if a little too forward with its charms. Now–2013.

properties.title: Marcel Couturier 2008 Les Longues Terres  (Mâcon-Loché)
properties.address: 730 Rte de Fuissé, 71960 Fuissé, France
properties.description: Balanced, delicious wine, bringing in very fresh fruit, ripe apple flavors, a mineral streak of acidity and finely textured wood. Could keep for another 1–2 years.

properties.title: Marco Felluga 2007 Mongris Riserva Pinot Grigio (Collio)
properties.address: 959 W Fairbanks Ave, Winter Park, FL 32789, USA
properties.description: Here's a gorgeous Riserva expression of Pinot Grigio with a creamy, dense mouthfeel and prominent aromas of peach cream, apricot, almond paste and honey. Those yellow fruit flavors last long on the palate and would pair with shellfish or white meat. Very nice.

properties.title: Pierre Vessigaud 2008 Vers Pouilly  (Pouilly-Fuissé)
properties.description: Rounded with a good texture, this is a wine that has a good future. It has weight, fruit that is fresh and well wooded showing plenty of spice and bright acidity.

properties.title: D.R. Stephens 2012 Moose Valley Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
properties.address: 3524 Silverado Trail N, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: This wine is sanguine and elegant despite its full-figured size. Dried cranberry and cassis play on the palate, streaked by an elusive hit of white pepper. Bright and dancing in minerality, it finishes velvety and smooth, just the right amount of toasted oak showing through.

properties.title: Domaine Ostertag 2013 Zellberg Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 87 Rue du Finkwiller, 67680 Epfig, France
properties.description: Orange peel perfumes the rich pear notes and imbues them with the aromatic spice of citrus foliage and zest. The palate is full of friendly citrus and pear. Despite its texture and rich flavor, it's beautifully slender and light-footed, with an inherent, zesty brightness that makes this wine shine.

properties.title: Domaine Zind-Humbrecht 2013 Calcaire Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.description: The restrained and floral opening of jasmine and mandarin peel leads to a palate that holds just a touch of residual sugar, filling this gorgeously balanced Gewurztraminer to the brim with sweet citrus swirls of tangerine, satsuma and mandarin. Notes of orange blossom hover and are pulled into focus by the textured mouthfeel of this immensely elegant wine.

properties.title: Domaine Zind-Humbrecht 2013 Vieilles Vignes Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 2 Rte de Colmar, 68230 Turckheim, France
properties.description: Very ripe, red-cheeked Mirabelles and orange peel represent the aromatic top notes. With more air, mandarin juice becomes apparent, and the palate is wonderfully taut and concentrated. There is a haunting purity and a strong undertow of earth and stone that soars on the long finish.

properties.title: Iron Horse 2010 National Geographic Ocean Reserve Blanc de Blancs Sparkling (Green Valley)
properties.address: 9786 Ross Station Rd, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.description: Formidable acidity gives this lovely wine a freshness around complementary layers of rose petal and strawberry-pomegranate. Made from a blend of two Chardonnay clones, it adds additional notes of tangerine and lemon-lime on the lengthy, complex finish.

properties.title: Hahn 2013 SLH Estate Grown & Produced Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 37700 Foothill Rd, Soledad, CA 93960, USA
properties.description: There's an exciting array of aromas on the nose of this wine, with honeydew melon, citrus candy and barely ripe cantaloupe gaining complexity thanks to fresh scents of chive, oregano and thyme. It's light and easy on the palate, with lots of yellow grapefruit freshness, a pithy edge and a singing acidity on the finish.

properties.title: Jamieson Ranch 2013 Double Lariat Limited Production Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 3105 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: A crisp bouquet of orange zest marks the opening of this wine, an unexpected twist to the narrative of dried cranberry, blackberry and cloves. On the palate, this full-bodied wine offers ample weight and richness, before a wealth of dry tannins feature on the finish.

properties.title: Maurice Schoech & Fils 2013 Sonnenberg Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 4 Rte de Kientzheim, 68770 Ammerschwihr, France
properties.description: The slightly more evolved nose that effortlessly fuses crushed chamomile leaf and lemon zest also hints at dark fir honey. It glides seamlessly into a fast-flowing, straight channel of acidity. There is movement and poise in this virtual journey into freshness and aroma. It is the lemon that lasts longest on the palate, which is dry and of exquisite purity.

properties.title: Pride Mountain 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa County-Sonoma County)
properties.address: 3000 Summit Trail, Santa Rosa, CA 95404, USA
properties.description: Thick chocolate and tar exude on the nose before a palate of tar, leather and tobacco adds to the robust mix. Dry tannins aim and deliver on the lengthy finish after a medium-bodied impact of black tea, blueberry and black pepper.

properties.title: René Muré 2013 Côte de Rouffach Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: Clos Saint Landelin, 68250 Rouffach, France
properties.description: Taut citrus, cleansing lemon and brisk grapefruit show an uncompromsing, dry Riesling that majors in tense citrus and wet-stone flavors. There is a linearity and a very alluring purity that deserves to develop further. This is lovely and briskly refreshing now, but time in bottle will bring out more earthy, stony complexity. Drink 2017–2025.

properties.title: René Muré 2014 Signature Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.description: Earth and roses, lemon zest and orange flesh: these are the contrasts of this refreshing, toned but textured Gewurztraminer that shows the full weight of its rose perfume on the palate. Its dryness underlines earth rather than fruit, but has no less charm for that. On the contrary: the lingering aftertaste leaves a lasting impression.

properties.title: Vincent Vineyards 2013 Family Reserve Sauvignon Blanc (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.description: Enticing aromas of white lilies, nectarines, white peach, honey-lime water and chalky stone hit the nose on this wine from a new vineyard on Highway 154 in the likely-to-be-named Los Olivos District. The palate is creamy down the center but with tangy edges, offering flavors of lime yogurt and pink grapefruit pith.

properties.title: Miroballi Wines 2013 Grenache Blanc (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 59 Industrial Way, Buellton, CA 93427, USA
properties.description: This bottling from young winemaker Michael Miroballi shows lime blossom, chalk, fresh rain on concrete and nectarine flesh on the nose. The palate is exuberant with flavors but they're not ripe, instead showing lime peels and juice, a cement-like grip and a buzzing sensation that overtakes the mouth like a Sichuan peppercorn.

properties.title: Round Pond 2014 Reserve Sauvignon Blanc (Rutherford)
properties.address: 875 Rutherford Rd, Rutherford, CA 94573, USA
properties.description: In this full-bodied, well-earned Reserve-level wine, white peach, cantaloupe and lemon-lime define the ripeness of fruit on the palate, providing a fresh lushness around its substantive body and weight. A hit of decadent toffee lurks on the finish.

properties.title: Vino Con Brio 2006 Estate Pinot Grigio (Lodi)
properties.address: 24195 E 800 Rd, Kingfisher, OK 73750, USA
properties.description: The alcohol is nice and low on this fruity wine, and the apple, pineapple, honeysuckle and spice flavors are nicely balanced with crisp acidity. But it's definitely on the sweet side.

properties.title: Xanadu 2005 Cabernet Sauvignon (Margaret River)
properties.address: 316 Boodjidup Rd, Margaret River WA 6285, Australia
properties.description: Leafy and herbal on the nose, but the flavors are clean, favoring cassis over the green stuff. Light-bodied, with modest tannins, this would pair well with chops or burgers.

properties.title: Meridian 2006 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 7000 CA-46, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Here's a basic, Santa Barbara Chardonnay that shows off the region's cool-climate friendliness to the variety. It's dry and crisp and creamy, with pineapple, lime and oak flavors.

properties.title: Debonné 2006 Reserve Riesling (Grand River Valley)
properties.address: 7840 Doty Rd, Madison, OH 44057, USA
properties.description: Fresh minerality and dancing floral notes make the nose on this reserve Riesling enticing. On the palate, typical Riesling flavors of spice and flowers are slightly slowed by a viscous, heavier mouthfeel, but overall, the wine is harmonious. Great with a spicy Indian dish like Vindaloo—it could hold its own.

properties.title: Erath 2006 Pinot Blanc (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 1439 NW Marshall St, Portland, OR 97209, USA
properties.description: Erath's fresh and lightly fruity Pinot Gris is a bit more substantial than this new Pinot Blanc. Soft and fruity, this is a simple wine which does not challenge the palate in any way. All stainless steel fermented, it is the quintessential quaffer.

properties.title: Bogle 2005 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
properties.description: A little rustic and sharp, but perfectly okay if you're looking for an everyday Cab to elevate simple fare. It shows black currant and oak flavors, and is thoroughly dry.

properties.title: Debonné 2006 Lot 707 Reserve Riesling (Grand River Valley)
properties.address: 7840 Doty Rd, Madison, OH 44057, USA
properties.description: A slightly floral but lively nose is followed by a pretty, balanced spice and white flower mix on the palate with this offering from Ohio. Paired with a delicate Asian dish, this wine is a fun choice.

properties.title: Domaine Grossot 2005  Chablis
properties.description: Somewhat earthy and rustic, this is a fresh wine, with citrus notes and some yeastiness. The wine's fruit has finishing liveliness and crispness.

properties.title: Red Earth 2006 Cabernet Sauvignon (Adelaide Plains)
properties.address: 18L Camp Rd, Dubbo NSW 2830, Australia
properties.description: Starts off with a hint of vinyl on the nose, layered atop sour cherry and vanilla flavors. The slightly syrupy texture is offset by tangy acids on the finish. Imported by Walca International.

properties.title: Wagner 2006 Semi Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 9322 St Rt 414 Winery, Lodi, NY 14860, USA
properties.description: This Riesling has aromas that almost mimic a Chardonnay: toasty cream, vanilla, spice. On the palate, those more complex flavors continue, but are buoyed by some acidity and an intriguing touch of sweet flowers. Overall, a tasty sip.

properties.title: Terra Australis 2008 Chardonnay (South Eastern Australia)
properties.address: Lot 2 Railway Cres, Daylesford VIC 3460, Australia
properties.description: Fresh grassiness, interwoven with a mineral note and aromas of apple and pear make for an elegant opening. The rather dilute palate shows a surprising level of spritz but also some burnt orange flavors while the short finish betrays a hint of sweetness.

properties.title: Jasper 2006 Roy's Vineyard at Cherry Creek Chancellor (Iowa)
properties.address: 2400 George Flagg Pkwy, Des Moines, IA 50321, USA
properties.description: Anyone who doesn't like barnyard smells will want to steer clear of this funky example from Iowa. The crisp palate shows some cherry notes and little tannin. Finishes with some oily, ashy notes.

properties.title: Treleaven 2007 Dry Riesling (Cayuga Lake)
properties.address: 658 Lake Rd, King Ferry, NY 13081, USA
properties.description: Lime and slate notes make for a very nice opening but lead to a distractingly high level of spritz. The crisp palate is lacking in flavor and finishes on the watery side. Drink up.

properties.title: Red Mud 2007 Unoaked Chardonnay (South Australia)
properties.address: 8400 Graton Rd, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.description: Fresh but faint aromas of hay, candlewax and grass open this honest but simple effort. The palate lacks intensity but displays a bit of a mineral streak. Disappointingly short on the finish. Imported by Nelwood Wines.

properties.title: Castel Grisch 2007 Gewürztraminer (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 3380 County Rd 28, Watkins Glen, NY 14891, USA
properties.description: Instantly appealing aromas of rose water and kiwi fruit make for a great opener but yield to a one-dimensional palate. The short, slightly flabby finish shows pleasant orange rind notes.

properties.title: Alta Vista 2007 Finca Monte Lindo Chardonnay (Mendoza)
properties.address: Alzaga 3972, M5505 Chacras de Coria, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Strange Chardonnay. It smells and tastes more like feeble Torrontés than Chard. The palate offers only shearing apple fruit, and the finish is hard. Can't imagine anyone pegging this as Chardonnay.

properties.title: Midnight 2006 Estate Reserve Chardonnay (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 2925 Anderson Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Soft and gluey, with sweet, jammy flavors of pineapples and butterscotch. Tastes like cough drops.

properties.title: Rezonja 2005 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 100 N Hope Ave UNIT 15, Santa Barbara, CA 93110, USA
properties.description: Smells and tastes like inexpensive Port, with caramelized wood, baked cherry and sugared black currant jam notes.

properties.title: Rooster Hill 2007 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 489 NY-54, Penn Yan, NY 14527, USA
properties.description: Orange rind and Chinese spices make for an intriguing opener but the palate falls flat, with little to offer but a few simple lemon and lime flavors. Short finish.

properties.title: Rooster Hill 2007 Estate Gewürztraminer (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 489 NY-54, Penn Yan, NY 14527, USA
properties.description: While the aromas show some promise, they are disappointingly faint for a Gewürztraminer. This wine is an easy quaffer but lacks the palate richness typical of this variety. Crisp acidity and low alcohol (11.7%) make it a good hot weather choice.

properties.title: Castel Grisch 2007 Chancellor (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 3380 County Rd 28, Watkins Glen, NY 14891, USA
properties.description: Crisp and exceptionally low in tannin, the Chancellor grape is perhaps this continent's answer to the Gamay of Beaujolais. The brilliant garnet hue of this example will force you to pick up the glass. Unfotunately, what you find there won't hold your attention for very long. The aromas are pleasant but diffuse and lead to a one-dimensional palate with only a few faint notes of red fruits.

properties.title: Woomera 2006 Chardonnay (South Eastern Australia)
properties.address: Dewrang Ave, Woomera SA 5720, Australia
properties.description: Odd notes of Pez candy and confectioner's sugar open this new entry from Southeast Australia. With a watery palate and an almost nonexistent finish, the wine does not make as much of an impression as the catchy name.

properties.title: Dry Creek Vineyard 2015 Wilson Ranch Chenin Blanc (Clarksburg)
properties.address: 3770 Lambert Bridge Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: This medium-bodied wine smells light and herbal. It gets deeper and richer on the palate as ripe golden-apple flavors kick in and the texture seems to spread out.

properties.title: Frei Brothers 2015 Reserve Sauvignon Blanc (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 2018 Frei Bros Winery Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Stony lemon and a twist or two of grass dot zesty acidity in this clean, crisp and focused white, sure to be a pleasurable quaffer.

properties.title: Grafen Neipperg 2014 Trocken Spätburgunder (Württemberg)
properties.address: Schloßstraße 12, 74193 Schwaigern, Germany
properties.description: Succulent black cherry perfume is accented by hints of granite and smoked nut in this inviting Pinot Noir. The palate is fresh and approachable, boasting loads of ripe black cherry and plum flavors. Sunny acidity and soft, feathery tannins augment its easy, appealing feel. Drink now through 2020.

properties.title: Milbrandt 2014 Traditions Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 707 US-2 unit d, Leavenworth, WA 98826, USA
properties.description: The aromas bring notes of toasty spices, black currant, green pepper and blue fruit. The fruit and smoke flavors are smooth and easy drinking, with lightly grainy tannins providing support. It needs some more time to fully come together.

properties.title: Parras Wines 2015 Mula Velha Premium Branco White (Lisboa)
properties.address: N8-5 2 2460, 2460 Alcobaça, Portugal
properties.description: A fruity blend of local Lisboa grapes along with Chardonnay, this wine is rich and full of citrus and crisp apple flavors. It is a ripe wine with a creamy texture enhanced by toast from the wood aging. Drink this wine from late 2017.

properties.title: Raptor Ridge 2015 Grüner Veltliner (Chehalem Mountains)
properties.address: 18700 SW Hillsboro Hwy, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.description: The winery's consistently flavorful version of this grape puts a New World spin on an Old World grape. It's ripe, round and lightly spicy, with jicama, cucumber and fleshy pear fruit. The finish is persistent and tags you with a touch of heat.

properties.title: Sextant 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 2324 CA-46, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: There's deep density to the aromas of this wine, with black olive, crushed lava rocks and baked black-plum scents. An herbal kick to the front of the palate conveys bay leaf and oregano, followed by rich blackberry, turned loam and black-rock flavors.

properties.title: Von Schleinitz 2015 Estate Dry Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: Fragrant tangerine skins are glazed by an earthen streak of wax on the nose of this brisk, light-footed Riesling. Zesty and dry, the palate balances refreshing lime and lemon flavors against more savory elements of pollen and earth. Finishes crisp and clean.

properties.title: McFadden 2015 Blue Quail Pinot Gris (Potter Valley)
properties.address: 13275 S, US-101, Hopland, CA 95449, USA
properties.description: A tangy feeling on the palate makes this light-bodied wine especially refreshing. It has appley, floral aromas and flavors, good acidity and a clean, bracing texture.

properties.title: Migration 2014 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 1451 Stanly Ln, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.description: While most of this wine was fermented in French oak, a small percentage was held back in stainless steel. It finds a happy middle ground between creamy oak, even a touch of reduction, and a brightness of green apple and Jolly Rancher. It offers medium-bodied richness.

properties.title: Monte Volpe 2014 Pinot Grigio (Mendocino County)
properties.address: 1170 Bel Arbres Dr, Redwood Valley, CA 95470, USA
properties.description: This medium-bodied wine smells sweet but tastes dry. Vivid fruit aromas and flavors, and a lively, tangy mouthfeel add lots of personality. It smells like apples and honey and tastes like crisp apples and citrus.

properties.title: Pazo de Barrantes 2013 La Comtesse Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.address: Rúa Castaños, 20, 36636 Barrantes, Pontevedra, Spain
properties.description: Aromas of green melon and pear are calm like a lake with no breeze. This feels mildly creamy, while leesy briny melon and peach flavors turn somewhat bitter prior to a soft easy finish that doesn't sing but doesn't fall off.

properties.title: Domaine Laroche 2010 Les Clos Grand Cru  (Chablis)
properties.description: Concentrated and structured, this layers wood and vanilla flavors with a taut, mineral character. With its richness and well-balanced citrus, tropical fruit flaavors, it will certainly age for at least four years. Screwcap.

properties.title: Domaine Laroche 2010 Les Fourchaumes Vieilles Vignes Premier Cru  (Chablis)
properties.address: 22 Rue Louis Bro, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: This has extra richness that lends the wine concentration and ripeness. An intense structure of minerality is balanced by yellow fruit, bearing a round and full texture, with great depth of flavor. Age for at least five years. Screwcap.

properties.title: Lauren Ashton Cellars 2011 Roussanne (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14545 148th Ave NE #211, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: This stylish, well-defined Roussanne is crisp as a cucumber, with fruit flavors of citrus, green berry, apple and melon. This is immaculate and beautifully balanced.

properties.title: Pascal Bouchard 2009 Vaudésir Grand Cru  (Chablis)
properties.address: 3 Rue du Pressoir, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: Big and rounded, this tastes rich and packed with ripe fruit. It as weight and a yellow fruit flavor, with notes of red apple and canteloupe. It is soft, delicious and almost ready to drink.

properties.title: Byron 2010 Nielson Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.description: Santa Maria Valley's terroir shines through in this Chardonnay's brisk, mouthwatering acidity and fruit purity. The bright, vibrant guava and citrus flavors are enriched with a coating of sweet, smoky oak. There's a fascinating minerality, like a lick of sandstone rocks, that boosts its complex appeal.

properties.title: Chandon 2007 Vintage Brut Sparkling (Yountville)
properties.description: Rich and smooth, this has complex flavors of raspberry, almond biscotti, lime and vanilla, with a smoky note. The texture shows real finesse. Made from Pinot Noir and Chardonnay, it's a first class bubbly.

properties.title: Chanson Père et Fils 2010 Clos des Mouches Premier Cru  (Beaune)
properties.description: This is a very taut wine from the poorest soil in the Clos des Mouches Vineyard. This tastes of citrus fruit, with a powerful, spicy, complex finish that promises good aging.

properties.title: Château de Fuissé 2010 Les Combettes  (Pouilly-Fuissé)
properties.address: 419 Rue du Plan, 71960 Fuissé, France
properties.description: Rich and ultraripe, this is full of yellow fruit, melon and pineapple flavors. Contrasting with this fruitiness are notes of dense wood and spice. It has an elegant structure, with a crisp, citrusy finish.

properties.title: Del Dotto 2011 Cinghiale Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 1055 Atlas Peak Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Bone dry and crisp, this is rich in New Zealand-like gooseberry flavor, making it mouthwateringly savory. Yet it's entirely Californian with its notes of ripe pear, peach and pineapple. An elegant wine to drink now, this would make for an elegant apéritif.

properties.title: Nickel & Nickel 2009 Hayne Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
properties.address: 212 S Main St Suite 100, Fort Worth, TX 76104, USA
properties.description: Right now, the tannins are so fierce, they overshadow the jammy blackberry and cassis flavors. With such an elegant construction and balance, there's no reason it shouldn't develop in the bottle over the next 8–10 years.

properties.title: Domaine Jean-Paul et Benoît Droin 2010 Mont-de-Milieu Premier Cru  (Chablis)
properties.address: 14 Av. Jean Jaurès, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: Floral, fragrant and fruity, this has a lively character, with notes of apples and pears, and a great sweep of acidity. It shows freshness, crispness and richness at the same time.

properties.title: Jean-Claude Boisset 2009 Champ Gain Premier Cru  (Puligny-Montrachet)
properties.address: 849 Zinfandel Ln, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Still showing its youthful fruity character, this concentrated wine is going to develop richness while always retaining its elegance. The acidity and structured fruit lend a strong sense of minerality, although it keeps its ripeness. Age for 3–4 years.

properties.title: Joseph Drouhin 2010  Puligny-Montrachet
properties.address: 7 Rue d'Enfer, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: This is rich and opulent while still preserving its acidity and concentrated structure. It's floral and minerally, fragrant, round and crisp. Age for 3–4 years.

properties.title: Dark Horse 2014 The Original Sauvignon Blanc (California)
properties.address: 70665 B Line, Grand Bend, ON N0M 1T0, Canada
properties.description: This light-bodied wine smells fresh and tastes refreshing. It has lemon and herb aromas, delicate citrus flavors, good acidity and a lively mouth-feel.

properties.title: DFJ Vinhos 2015 Grand'Arte Alvarinho (Lisboa)
properties.address: 2070-681 Vila Chã de Ourique, Portugal
properties.description: A soft, creamy wine full of apple and pear fruits that are edged with crisp acidity. It is ripe, but still young; drink this attractive wine from 2017.

properties.title: Domaine Bernhard & Reibel 2014 Hahnenberg Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 21 Grand Rue, 68230 Katzenthal, France
properties.description: Notes of ripe, generous and fleshy plum lead to a well-shaped palate. Some muddied elements get in the way of precision but lend an earthier aspect. Drink soon.

properties.title: Domaine Bernhard & Reibel 2014 Tradition Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 21 Grand Rue, 68230 Katzenthal, France
properties.description: Lemon and green apple are the chief flavors of this easy Riesling that provides honest and uncomplicated refreshment. It finishes dry, with a fresh, lemony aftertaste.

properties.title: Domaine Costa Lazaridi 2015 Amethystos Blanc White (Drama)
properties.address: 2nd km Kapandriti Kalamos road, Kapandriti, 19014, Kapandriti 190 14, Greece
properties.description: This lively wine starts with aromas of white fruit, citrus and flowers. Ion the palate, exotic guava and pineapple and lemon mingle. An easygoing wine great for everyday enjoyment.

properties.title: Domaine de la Tour Blanche 2014 Riesling (Alsace)
properties.description: Light-footed, this wine is characterized by the clean, refreshing flavors of lemon zest and flesh. The palate is bright, with a dry, lip-smacking finish.

properties.title: Domaine Vincent Stoeffler 2015 Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 1 Rue des Lièvres, 67140 Barr, France
properties.description: Earthy ripeness of peach and yellow plum abounds. The palate is rounded and medium sweet, suggesting jellied and crystallized fruit confections with an appetizingly tart edge. Drink soon.

properties.title: Donati 2015 Pinot Blanc (Paicines)
properties.description: Exuberant Anjou pear, kiwi, fleshy nectarine and lemongrass aromas pop off the nose of this wine that would work well with a wide range of Asian food. The palate is framed by a jubilant acidity and shows flavors of ripe apple, pluot and a touch of salt.

properties.title: Frédéric Mallo 2014 Special Delivery Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 2 Rue Saint-Jacques, 68150 Hunawihr, France
properties.description: Ripe, almost overripe, notes of fleshy stone fruit like yellow plum make for a generous opening. The palate tones this down with freshness and a rich, warm feel. It finishes dry, with a distinct sense of warmth.

properties.title: Fulkerson 2015 Rosé (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 5576 NY-14, Dundee, NY 14837, USA
properties.description: Made from almost equal parts Pinot Noir and Dornfelder, this unusual dry rosé offers ripe (almost candied) cherry and raspberry notes juxtaposed against a refreshing mineral backbone. It's not deeply concentrated but thirst quenching and spry.

properties.title: Urbina 2015 Rosé (Rioja)
properties.address: Rancho san marcos, 22766 Villa de Juárez, B.C., Mexico
properties.description: This Tempranillo-based rosé is clean up front, with hints of citrus and chewing gum to the nose. A solid mouthfeel makes for a good palate, while this offers a quick pop of zesty citrus fruit that's backed by duller yeast and wheat notes on the finish.

properties.title: Vermeil 2013 Pickett Road Block Cabernet Sauvignon (Calistoga)
properties.description: A block selection from Frediani Vineyard, this offers smoky soy flavors around a thick concentration of chocolate and blackberry tart, the texture generously ripe. There's a bitterness of clove and black currant on the finish.

properties.title: Viña Maipo 2014 Vitral Cabernet Sauvignon (Chile)
properties.address: Tajamar 13, Santiago, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: While this smells a touch green and scratchy, there's enough berry and plum to the nose to get it going in a good way. Fresh and medium-bodied, this tastes of medicinal cherry and plum along with herbs. The finish tastes similar.

properties.title: Wagner 2014 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.description: Crisp and cutting, this zesty apple-scented wine offers loads of lemony refreshment. The palate is zippy and taut, invigorating with a clean mineral finish.

properties.title: Clos du Bois 2007 Sauvignon Blanc (North Coast)
properties.address: 19410 Geyserville Ave #9603, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.description: Acidity marks this mouth watering wine. It's crisp and tart, providing balance to the slightly sweet flavors of pineapple and apricot jam. Good price for a Sauvignon Blanc of this popular style.

properties.title: Cosentino 2007 Pinot Grigio (Solano County)
properties.address: 7415 St Helena Hwy, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: An easy white wine that shows brisk acidity supporting well-ripened fruit flavors that are a little sweet. Pears, citrus fruits, green apples, figs, vanilla and white peppers flood the mouth, wrapped into a creamy, honeyed richness.

properties.title: C&T; 2006 Skinny Dip Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Partially barrel-fermented, partly stainless steel, this is a fresh, crisp and easy white. With ripe citrus, fig, spear-mint, honey and spice flavors, it's nice as an apèritif, but will stand up to Thai or Vietnamese fare.

properties.title: De Bortoli 2007 dB Selection Chardonnay (South Eastern Australia)
properties.address: Rijksweg 14, 2880 Bornem, Belgium
properties.description: Full-bodied, soft in texture and loaded with peach and melon fruit, this is a tasty everyday Chard. Hints of custard and lime give it additional interest, while the finish ends on a citrusy (orange?) note. Drink now.

properties.title: Eden Canyon 2005 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 1919 CA-58, Creston, CA 93432, USA
properties.description: Not showing much succulence right now, but firm and sturdy, in keeping with the relatively cool vintage. There's green, minty taste alongside the berry, cherry and anise flavors. Could develop and soften with a year or so in the bottle.

properties.title: Feudo Montoni 2007 Catarratto (Sicilia)
properties.address: Via Val di Mazara, 2, 90144 Palermo PA, Italy
properties.description: This fresh, easy white (made from Catarratto grapes grown in central Sicily) offers notes of yellow peach, mineral, dried sage and exotic fruit. It's a simple, no-fuss wine that would pair with light salads or appetizers.

properties.title: Companhia das Quintas 2005 Quinta da Pancas Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon Cabernet Sauvignon (Estremadura)
properties.address: R. da Fonte Nova, 3780 Sangalhos, Portugal
properties.description: Even Cabernet Sauvignon, that defiantly international variety, takes on a Portuguese character. This has that dark chocolate, high acidity and dry, but juicy character that marks so many Portuguese reds. It also has a more unfortunate volatility that is just too prominent.

properties.title: Conti Zecca 2007 Donna Marzia Malvasia (Salento)
properties.address: Via Cesarea, 73045 Leverano LE, Italy
properties.description: This is a pretty Malvasia with drying tones of pear, hay and honeysuckle layered over the wine's smooth, clean texture. It is a very food-friendly wine that would pair with first courses or appetizers.

properties.title: Tablas Creek 2006 Grenache Blanc (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 9339 Adelaida Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Easy to like, with gentle, soft flavors of apricot jam, ripe pear, vanilla and honeysuckle. Tastes like there may be some residual sugar, making it a nice afternoon cocktail wine.

properties.title: Tortoise Creek 2006 Chardonnay (Central Coast)
properties.address: 959 W Fairbanks Ave, Winter Park, FL 32789, USA
properties.description: With a touch of smoky, honeyed oak, this Chard has forward peach, pear and tropical fruit flavors, balanced with a crisp streak of acidity. Nice and versatile, it's a good Chard at a fair price.

properties.title: Tangent 2006 Ecclestone White (Central Coast)
properties.address: 5828 Orcutt Rd, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.description: A blend of six varieties, but it's not a simple wine made from the leftovers that some wineries use for blends. Instead, it's crisp and fruity, not as dry as Tangent's varietal wines, but rich in Muscat orange, Riesling flowers, Pinot Gris citrus, Viognier tropical fruit and Pinot Blanc peach. One percent Albariño seems to add to the acidity.

properties.title: Torres 2006 Gran Viña Sol Chardonnay (Penedès)
properties.address: Carrer de Miquel Torres i Carbó, 6, 08720 Vilafranca del Penedès, Barcelona, Spain
properties.description: The bouquet deals some peach, custard and a slight hint of oak, while the palate runs racy, fresh and citrusy. If you like a fresher style with strong orange and tropical fruit flavors, this is your ticket. It's a controlled wine that meets expectations. With 15% Parellada.

properties.title: Graham Beck 2005 Gamekeeper's Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Robertson)
properties.address: 13303 W Maple St Suite 111, Wichita, KS 67235, USA
properties.description: Soft spice and blackberry on the nose are followed by rich, balanced layers of mint, toast and berry. The wine has a minerality that adds a fresh note to the mix. A big wine but not overly complex, this is a Cabernet for spicy dishes and beef stew. Imported by GBW, LLC.

properties.title: Jaillance 2004 Grande Tradition  (Clairette de Die)
properties.address: 355 Av. de la Clairette, 26150 Die, France
properties.description: Not too dissimilar from an Italian Moscato d'Asti, this offers exotic scents of oranges and tropical fruit. It's a bit sweet, but balanced in part by the bubbles. This would be great at brunch, or served on its own.

properties.title: York Mountain Winery 2006 Albariño (Edna Valley)
properties.address: 7505 York Mountain Rd, Templeton, CA 93465, USA
properties.description: Shows the qualities that are making this Spanish variety so popular. Bone dry, crisp in acidity, low in alcohol and palate-stimulating, this oak-free wine bursts with rich lemongrass, pineapple and peach flavors. That acidity makes it clean and vibrant and terrifically versatile at the table.

properties.title: Graham Beck 2005 Brut Rosé  (Western Cape)
properties.address: 13303 W Maple St Suite 111, Wichita, KS 67235, USA
properties.description: An appealing ripe strawberry nose leads on this flirty, easy-drinking sparkling wine from South Africa. Freshness and a touch of delicate minerality in the aromas, followed by light, elegant flavors of strawberry and yeast, make it a lovely wine for a summer day or to pair with myriad dishes. Creamy but fresh on the tongue, the wine has good body for a rosé. Imported by GBW, LLC.

properties.title: Goat Bubbles 2011 Sierra Madre Vineyard Crémant Sparkling (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 201 Vineyard Wy, Jasper, GA 30143, USA
properties.description: Vigorous bubbles present a Pinot Noir-like nose of crushed rocks, Indian spice and sour earth on one of the best Central Coast sparklers of the vintage. The intriguing flavors center on pluot and nectarine flesh, with fringes of salinity, lemon juice, cardamom and even dashes of curry.

properties.title: La Chablisienne 2011 Blanchot Grand Cru  (Chablis)
properties.address: 8 Bd Pasteur, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: Still tight and closed, this has the potential to be a very fine Grand Cru. It has a tight, steely character, a texture that brings out nervy minerality and the beginnings of rich citrus and white fruits. With the light touch of wood aging, this will age well. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Louis Jadot 2012 Le Clos Blanc Beaune Grèves Premier Cru  (Beaune)
properties.address: 62 Rte de Savigny, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: Part of the domaine of the Gagey family that runs Louis Jadot, this dense, wood-dominated wine has an austere character at this stage. Ripe, potentially full of yellow and creamy white fruits, it will always have a serious side. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Olivier Leflaive 2012 Charmes Premier Cru  (Meursault)
properties.address: 10 Pl. du Monument, 21190 Puligny-Montrachet, France
properties.description: This is full of steely acidity as well as complex fruit. It is rich, full of toast and spice that show up the generous swathes of yellow fruits that are just beginning to show their glory. It will develop over many years. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Pascal Bouchard 2012 Blanchot Grand Cru  (Chablis)
properties.description: Smooth and wonderfully ripe, this honeyed wine has weight and a velvet texture that rolls around the mouth. The tight acidity and crisp texture are enveloped by the embrace of the ripe fruits and generous feel. It's deceptively ready to drink but needs to age, so wait until 2018.

properties.title: Olivier Leflaive 2012 Sous le Dos d'Ane Premier Cru  (Meursault-Blagny)
properties.address: 10 Pl. du Monument, 21190 Puligny-Montrachet, France
properties.description: While the wine appears initially generous, it then reveals a strongly steely, tight and mineral character. Rich fruits give a full and rounded exterior, while the more textured center shows how well this wine will age. Honey and acidity reinforce the poised contrast. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Château de Fuissé 2012 Le Clos  (Pouilly-Fuissé)
properties.address: 419 Rue du Plan, 71960 Fuissé, France
properties.description: Dominated at this young stage by wood, this is a potentially rich and creamy wine. Its structure shines through, full and generous. The fruits and the acidity still have to develop, but already the wine is showing the rounded character of a great Pouilly Fuissé. It's a wine to age, so drink from 2016.

properties.title: Henri Goutorbe 2005 Spécial Club Grand Cru Brut  (Champagne)
properties.description: Goutorbe is a member of the Spécial Club grouping of grower producers, which tastes and approves each other's special cuvée. This 2005, with its ripe fruits and the beginnings of bottle age, is a worthy member. It has delicious apple and white peach fruits, lively acidity and a texture that is moving towards toastiness. The wine is ready to drink.

properties.title: Iron Horse 2009 Russian Cuvée Sparkling (Green Valley)
properties.address: 9786 Ross Station Rd, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.description: Made to commemorate the sparkling wine the winery produced for the Reagan-Gorbachev Summit Meetings in the 1980s, this blends 74% Pinot Noir and 26% Chardonnay in a richer style, still dry, and just recently disgorged in July 2014. Complex and creamy, it offers a seductive nose of ripe apple and custard, the flavors following through in a medium-weight, mellowed way.

properties.title: Laetitia 2010 Cuvée M Sparkling (Arroyo Grande Valley)
properties.address: 453 Laetitia Vineyard Drive, Arroyo Grande, CA 93420, USA
properties.description: Laetitia's finest reserve bottling of sparkling wine rises to the challenge in this vintage, with bright aromas of fresh pears, challah bread and cherimoya. The palate offers tropical touches of guava, with elements of soda and lime pith grounding the bubbly into a classic style.

properties.title: Morgan 2007 Rosella's Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 204 Crossroads Blvd, Carmel-By-The-Sea, CA 93923, USA
properties.description: The vineyard is far better known for powerful, concentrated Pinot Noir, and this Chardonnay shares those characteristics. It's a big, fruity wine, not showing much finesse, but plenty of sheer magnitude. Brims with tropical fruit, apple, exotic spice and oak flavors that finish dry. Could do interesting things over the years.

properties.title: Château Caillou 2006 Barrel sample  (Sauternes)
properties.address: 9 Caillou, 33720 Barsac, France
properties.description: 89—91 Barrel sample. Very rich fruit, very ripe, sweet wine tempered with botrytis dryness. Great full flavors of candied fruits and quince.

properties.title: Château Rahoul 2008 Barrel sample  (Graves)
properties.address: 4 Rte du Courneau, 33640 Portets, France
properties.description: 89-91 Barrel sample. Very Sauvignon aromas, lovely fresh herbaceous character. The wine has a fine freshness to it, light, with fruity grapefruit and lime flavors.

properties.title: Château de Rayne Vigneau 2008 Barrel sample  (Sauternes)
properties.address: 4 Le Vigneau, 33210 Bommes, France
properties.description: 89-91 Barrel sample. A firm dry wine, its character dominated by its dense structure. The fruit is just one of the many elements in this concentrated wine.

properties.title: Sojourn 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
properties.address: 141 E Napa St, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.description: This 100% varietal wine sourced primarily from Oakville Ranch Vineyard is exuberant with rich, round red fruit and earthy sage notes. Bright and lively, with underlying grip, it offers further full-bodied flavors of vanilla, dark chocolate and tobacco as it opens.

properties.title: The Tribe 2016 The Tribe Chardonnay (Lodi)
properties.address: 23837 US-385, Hill City, SD 57745, USA
properties.description: This is a grand wine with serious concentration and savory complexity to complement its base of ripe apple, melon and mango flavors. Subtle butter, nutmeg and mineral aromas lead to a rich palate, where its smooth and expansive mouthfeel finishes with creamy, spicy accents.

properties.title: Thörle 2015 Saulheimer Hölle Trocken Riesling (Rheinhessen)
properties.address: Am Norenberg 0, 55291 Saulheim, Germany
properties.description: It's hard to choose a favorite amidst Thörle's 2015 dry Rieslings yet this bottling is a standout for its expansive, deliciously clingy mouthfeel. It's lusciously fruity, boasting ripe apricot and white peach flavors balanced by taut acidity and a pleasantly bitter edge of tannins.

properties.title: Jean de la Fontaine 2008 La Majestueuse Brut Millesimé  (Champagne)
properties.address: 12 Rue Jean de la Fontaine, 02400 Château-Thierry, France
properties.description: Some wood aging for the Chardonnay in the blend of this mature vintage has given the wine its light toast and spice character. The wine is rich, smooth and generous with a full-bodied feel. It is now ready to drink.

properties.title: Marietta Cellars 2014 Game Trail Cabernet Sauvignon (Yorkville Highlands)
properties.address: Post Office Box 800, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.description: Big and rich yet also complex and layered, this wine has an extremely dark color and spicy, floral, perfumed fruit flavors that spread out for a mouthfilling texture. Full bodied, fascinating and luscious, it hails from a high-elevation vineyard in Mendocino County.

properties.title: Markus Wine Co 2016 Insieme Torrontés (Lodi)
properties.address: 17267A Sunrise St, Victor, CA 95253, USA
properties.description: While crisp and bracing due to tart apricot and green apple flavors, this wine deepens on the palate as compelling white raspberry, white peach and subtle floral, spicy notes unfold. Markus Niggli added 5% North Carolina-grown Traminette, making it an interesting and seriously delicious bottle to enjoy over a seafood lunch or as an apéritif.

properties.title: Maurice Schoech & Fils 2015 Mambourg Grand Cru Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 4 Rte de Kientzheim, 68770 Ammerschwihr, France
properties.description: A touch of honeycomb swings alongside ripe pear and peach notes, creating a very inviting appetizing nose. The palate emphasizes this juiciness even more with the slightest touch of residual sweetness and a flowing fluid palate that only shows its concentration towards the end. There are edges of honeysuckle spice before a fresh, lemony and dry finish.

properties.title: André Kientzler 2015 Kirchberg de Ribeauville Grand Cru Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 30 Rue des Romains, 68630 Bennwihr, France
properties.description: Ripe and textured notions of russet pear take center stage with this wine. The nose already signals at the generous fruitiness and the palate is pervaded with fresh poised juicy fruit. A touch of residual carbon dioxide adds liveliness alongside lemony brightness. The finish is dry and utterly moreish with its fruit-centered joy.

properties.title: André Kientzler 2016 Kirchberg de Ribeauville Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 30 Rue des Romains, 68630 Bennwihr, France
properties.description: The nose is still shy, with hints of lemon. This note also characterize the slender, dry and still-taut palate which also has a textured earthy element on which these lovely bright citrus accents are displayed. The finish is dry on this slender, young wine. Drink 2017–2025.

properties.title: Brooks 2015 Orchard Fold Vineyard Riesling (Eola-Amity Hills)
properties.address: 21101 SE Cherry Blossom Ln, Amity, OR 97101, USA
properties.description: Lovely aromatics conjure up rose petals, a dash of body powder and ripe citrus. The fruit is very ripe, with almost a candy character, and there's a sensation of powdered sugar. But despite the almost 14g/L residual sugar, it's more sweet/tart than syrupy, keeping it sappy and refreshing.

properties.title: Cave de Turckheim 2013 Brand Grand Cru Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 16 Rue des Tuileries, 68230 Turckheim, France
properties.description: Generous notes of ripe pear has edges of blossom and peach on the nose. The palate underlines the peachy notes with a judicious boosting touch of residual sweetness. A pleasantly bitter edge, reminiscent of pear peel, adds welcome texture while lemony brightness provides freshness and verve. The finish is off dry and very appetizing with its lovely balance of fruit and brightness.

properties.title: Chimney Rock 2014 Tomahawk Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
properties.description: Shy at first on the nose, this youthful beauty is defined by richness and robust body, the tannins firm and well-integrated. Woody and herbal, it shows classic varietal character, with currant and clove flavors and an Old World flair of dusty chalk and chocolate notes. It's persistent, pleasant and complex.

properties.title: Domaine Charles Frey 2016 Frankstein Grand Cru Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 1 Rue du Pinot Blanc, 67650 Dambach-la-ville, France
properties.description: The golden ripeness of yellow stone fruit is already apparent on the nose. On the palate a pleasantly bitter phenolic edge provides some structure to counter the luscious medium-sweet richness. That sweetness boosts all the fruit notes and lets them linger. It's a rounded, balanced and totally fruit-driven wine.

properties.title: Eleven Eleven 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (Rutherford)
properties.address: 620 Trancas St, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Candied lemon, tangerine and grapefruit zest flavors make for a deliciously refreshing and complex experience in this well-made wine. The bright palate is accented by tropical fruit and is acid-driven yet weighty in feel.

properties.title: Christophe Cordier 2014 Vielles Vignes  (Viré-Clessé)
properties.address: Lot. les Molards, 71960 Fuissé, France
properties.description: Plenty of toastiness in this ripe wine gives an extra element of acidity that needs to be tamed. At the same time, it has good white- and citrus-fruit flavors. Drink this attractive wine from 2017.

properties.title: Clos LaChance 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
properties.address: 1 Hummingbird Ln, San Martin, CA 95046, USA
properties.description: This affordably priced bottling is quite solid for the cost, showing deep black cherry, blueberry, cedar shavings, tobacco leaf and ash, cocoa and slight bay leaf on the nose. Chalky tannins show first on the sip, and then unwind to offer blackberry fruit, woody pencil shavings and a decent density.

properties.title: Domaine des Crets 2014  Mâcon-Villages
properties.address: 1240 Duhig Rd, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.description: This wine is warm with touches of wood and spice. Juicy pear and apple flavors are filled out with white peach, while the toast gives extra complexity and richness. The wine, from the first vintage in this newly named domaine by François Lequin (Lequin-Colin) and Matthieu Ponson, is attractive now, but will be better from 2017.

properties.title: Kristodd 2015 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1245 Main St, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.description: Lively acidity defined by a taste of lemon peel meets heftier overtones of fresh pear, providing a medium-bodied texture that should work well at the table. The finish highlights the lemony aspects of the wine.

properties.title: Loron et Fils 2014 Château de Mirande  (Mâcon-Villages)
properties.description: Ripe with tropical-fruit flavors, this wine has good acidity layered with spice and toastiness. A crisper structure behind this generous fruit will allow the wine to age, although it is drinkable now.

properties.title: Marcel Couturier 2014 Vielles Vignes  (Pouilly-Loché)
properties.address: 730 Rte de Fuissé, 71960 Fuissé, France
properties.description: This is a spicy wine, with balanced wood, yellow-fruit flavors and acidity that cuts through the spice and ripeness. A zing of citrus finishes this attractive wine in style.

properties.title: Paul O'Brien 2015 Rosato Rosé (Umpqua Valley)
properties.address: 609 SE Pine St, Roseburg, OR 97470, USA
properties.description: Despite the low abv, this is a dry rosé, made from 100% Sangiovese that was picked at 20.5 brix. It's delicate and satisfying—a pretty pale copper/rose color, with flavors of strawberry hinting at peach. There's a dusting of baking spices and cocoa, adding welcome highlights to the finish.

properties.title: Quinta da Raza 2015 Alvarinho-Trajadura Grande Escolha White (Vinho Verde)
properties.address: 4890-571 Celorico de Basto, Portugal
properties.description: Dominated by Alvarinho, this is a spicy, fruity and tangy wine. It is still young with a tight mineral edge that will soften to bring out a more creamy character. The after-taste, with its fresh citrus, should remain. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Maurice Martin 2014  Saint-Véran
properties.address: 331 Victory Rd, Winchester, VA 22602, USA
properties.description: This wine has a great future, offering good acidity, crisp fruitiness and a tangy aftertaste. But in six months it will reveal a richer yellow fruits that will give it a rounded, ripe character. Wait until 2017.

properties.title: Château Pape Clément 2008 Barrel sample  (Pessac-Léognan)
properties.address: 216 Av. Dr Nancel Penard, 33600 Pessac, France
properties.description: 88-90 Barrel sample. The wood is the dominant character here, the fruit hinting at herbacousness, but forced behind all that toast.

properties.title: Château Doisy-Daëne 2006 Barrel sample  (Barsac)
properties.address: 15 Gravas, 33720 Barsac, France
properties.description: 88—90 Barrel sample. Great acidity here, which freshens up the ripe peach and apricot flavors, balanced with kiwi fruit crispness. Excellent, lively, perfumed wine.

properties.title: Bellavista 2006 Uccellanda Chardonnay (Terre di Franciacorta)
properties.description: This is a sophisticated and rich white wine with pretty hues of stone fruit, almond and honeysuckle. The wine boasts thick density and long-lasting fruit flavors. Pair it with poached Norwegian salmon.

properties.title: Eventide Cellar 2006 Cabernet Sauvignon (Wellington)
properties.description: From exacting winemaker Andrew Barns, this rich, distinctive Cabernet starts with aromas of blackberry, black currant, mocha and mint, leading into approachable flavors of cherry, peppers, clove and spice. Fruity but balanced, and ready to drink now.

properties.title: Leasingham 2008 Magnus Riesling (Clare Valley)
properties.description: This wine earns every penny of its modest price tag with a bright palate of petrol, talcum powder and wet stones propping up aromas of white flowers, cumin and lime. The finish could be longer but with this stunning nose and palate, we're not complaining. Drink now.

properties.title: Schloss Gobelsburg 2007 Auslese Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.address: Schloss Str. 16, 3550, Austria
properties.description: A fresh delicate style, the sweetness fleeting over the fruit, giving an orange marmalade character, but retaining lightness, lifted by a final acidity.

properties.title: Gordon Brothers 2008 Sauvignon Blanc (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 671 Levey Rd, Pasco, WA 99301, USA
properties.description: Light and fresh, this carries just a vague hint of barrel toast, but essentially it was done all in stainless. The fruit is clean and pretty, lightly candied, lightly tropical, with notes of sweet cracker, brisk acid, sweet grass and sweet herb. It gathers strength in the finish and holds on nicely.

properties.title: Gorman 2008 Big Sissy Conner Lee Vineyard Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: Vinified in 100% new French oak, this is young, tight and showing the barrel flavors more than the fruit. As it opens, in come flavors of citrus skin, lemon drop and caramel. It's quite acidic, with good structure, and still has a yeasty finish.

properties.title: Château Guiraud 2006 Barrel sample  (Sauternes)
properties.description: 87—89 Barrel sample. There's plenty of botrytis here, giving a wine with a great fresh burst of acidity along with the sweetness.

properties.title: Anton Bauer 2008 Rosenberg Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Wagram-Donauland)
properties.description: There's great ripe fruit here, a wine that has both intense pepperiness and fresh acidity, speaking of terroir. While the wine is intense, it is also as crisp as possible, finally well concentrated and firm. Screwcap.

properties.title: Caves Aliança 2012 Quinta da Garrida Reserva Branco White (Dão)
properties.address: R. Comércio 444, 3780 Sangalhos, Portugal
properties.description: This is a tight, mineral-driven wine that's very textured. Its fruitiness comes from quince and pear skins with a definite structure. It is young, most likely requiring aging over at least 18 months.

properties.title: Veiga da Princesa 2012 Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.address: 36435 Arbo, Pontevedra, Pontevedra, Spain
properties.description: This fresh, young Albariño is offering mild citrus and pear aromas. The palate is crisp, light in weight and good as a whole, with citrus, green apple and nectarine flavors. On the finish, peach and papaya flavors show a tinge of bitterness.

properties.title: Ventana 2011 Estate Chardonnay (Arroyo Seco)
properties.address: 38740 Los Coches Rd, Soledad, CA 93960, USA
properties.description: Comprised of equal parts sweet, toasty oak, brisk acidity and ripe tropical fruit and citrus flavors, this Chardonnay is successfully made in the popular style. It's creamy and rich, with a vanilla honey sweetness. Easily Ventana's best Chard ever.

properties.title: VML 2011 Gewürztraminer (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: This Gewürz is on the sweet side, but it's clean and crisp in acids, and offers wildly rich citrus, tropical fruit, exotic spice, vanilla bean and white flower flavors. Great with today's Chinese, Vietnamese, Thai or Burmese fare.

properties.title: Prà 2011 Monte Grande  (Soave Classico)
properties.address: Via della Fontana, 31, 37032 Monteforte d'Alpone VR, Italy
properties.description: A blend of Garganega (80%) with 20% Trebbiano, this fruit-forward Soave Classico is aged in large oak casks for extra density and personality. Indeed, it shows a sophisticated style with yellow rose and stone fruit followed by vanilla and almond nut.

properties.title: Quinta de Chocapalha 2011 White (Lisboa)
properties.address: Quinta de Chocapalha, Rua Carles Duff, 2580-081, Portugal
properties.description: Dominated by Viosinho, a grape found more often in the Douro, this wine has a fascinating perfumed character. It's smoky, with white currant and green herbs, and a steely edge that adds to the tight structure of the wine.

properties.title: Sutcliffe 2009 Canyon of the Ancients Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Colorado)
properties.address: 12174 County Rd G, Cortez, CO 81321, USA
properties.description: Although the aromas of cassis, spiced blackberry, maduro and dried herb are restrained on first sniff, with some air and coaxing they become more assertive. The medium-bodied palate has a pliant core, and the tightly coiled tannins come alive on the finish.

properties.title: Vista Hills 2011 Treehouse Estate Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 6475 NE Hilltop Ln, Dayton, OR 97114, USA
properties.description: An elegant wine with low alcohol yet clean, crisp, persistent flavors, this captures both melon and pear fruit, with peach blossom highlights. Call it a Euro style; it's fresh and subtle.

properties.title: Le Buche 2011 Olivi Orhora Verdicchio (Toscana)
properties.address: Strada Vicinale delle Buche, 25, 53047 Sarteano SI, Italy
properties.description: This blend of Verdicchio (90%), Viognier and Sauvignon Blanc opens with fragrant aromas of honeysuckle, white rose, exotic fruit and papaya. The wine shows balanced structure and acidity with long endnotes of peach and yellow fruit.

properties.title: Les Crêtes 2011 Chardonnay (Valle d'Aosta)
properties.description: Here's a balanced and bright Chardonnay from a cool climate region in northern Italy that shows crisp aromas of peach and citrus followed by light shadings of spice and bitter almond. The wine is silky and smooth with more citrus on the close.

properties.title: Louis Galud 2011  Pouilly-Fuissé
properties.address: 254 Saint Helena Hwy S, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Produced by Georges Duboeuf under a separate brand name, this is an attractive, fruity wine. It has a ripe, tropical and citrus character that brings out fragrant aromas and flavors. While it's not for much aging, it is a wine with a steely edge that could mature over the next few months.

properties.title: Manuel Olivier 2010 Vieilles Vignes  (Bourgogne Aligoté)
properties.address: 7 Rue des Grandes Vignes, 21700 Nuits-Saint-Georges, France
properties.description: With just that extra touch of concentration from old vines, this is a ripe, full and creamy wine, its acidity rounded out and given extra depth from the rich fruits. It has some weight and density at the end.

properties.title: Mauro Sebaste 2011  Roero Arneis
properties.address: Via Garibaldi, 222 bis, 12051 Gallo CN, Italy
properties.description: Here's a great Roero Arneis from northern Italy that offers so much more personality and regional character than your average Italian white. Fresh citrus and fruit tones are backed by dusty mineral shadings that give the wine a smooth and polished feel.

properties.title: Newsome-Harlow 2012 Sauvignon Blanc (Calaveras County)
properties.address: 403 Main St, Murphys, CA 95247, USA
properties.description: A juicy, tropical Sauvignon Blanc ripe for warm weather sipping, textured in mango, pineapple and a hit of fresh pear. Intense with a savory taste on the finish, this white is perfect on its own or ideal with seafood or crackers smothered in goat cheese.

properties.title: Andreola 2012 26esimo I Brut  (Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)
properties.address: Via Cavre, 19, 31010 Farra di Soligo TV, Italy
properties.description: A tiny element (just 3%) of Chardonnay goes a long way to add extra depth and intensity to this friendly Italian sparkler. It offers subtle sweetness followed by tight atoms of ginger, white flower and citrus.

properties.title: Anne Amie 2012 Pinot Gris (Oregon)
properties.address: 6580 NE Mineral Springs Rd, Carlton, OR 97111, USA
properties.description: This is a young, yeasty wine with a scent of fresh citrus. Lemon and grapefruit are the main flavors, with a textural, refreshing mouthfeel and a hint of minerality.

properties.title: Bortolomiol 2012 Ius Naturae Millesimato Brut  (Prosecco di Valdobbiadene Superiore)
properties.address: Via Giuseppe Garibaldi, 142, 31049 Valdobbiadene TV, Italy
properties.description: Made with organically-farmed grapes, Ius Naturae represents a new school in the production of Prosecco Superiore—a wine more often associated with winery technique rather than vineyard practice. The results are very satisfying, with bright citrus and lime followed by brisk effervescence.

properties.title: Zardetto 2012 Tre Venti Brut Millesimato  (Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)
properties.description: This is a very beautiful and satisfying Brut expression of Prosecco Superiore that delivers dry sensations of talc powder and crushed stone backed by white flower and citrus. The close is steely crisp and bright.

properties.title: Zenato 2009 Sergio Zenato Riserva  (Lugana)
properties.address: Strada San Benedetto, 8, 37019 Peschiera del Garda VR, Italy
properties.description: This handsome bottle of white wine opens to creamy aromas of stone fruit and cantaloup melon backed by vanilla mousse and even a distant touch of cinnamon spice. The mouthfeel is smooth and soft.

properties.title: Coppo 2011 La Rocca  (Gavi)
properties.address: Via Alba, 68, 14053 Canelli AT, Italy
properties.description: Coppo's beautiful La Rocca Gavi is precisely the kind of wine you'll want to serve with smoked salmon, grilled tuna or fresh vegetables. There's a crisp, flinty quality that gives the wine a bright and lively feel followed by tones of citrus and honeydew melon.

properties.title: Corte Adami 2010 Vigna della Corte  (Soave)
properties.address: Via Circonvallazione, 32, 37038 Soave VR, Italy
properties.description: This thick and creamy expression of the Garganega grape (the main component of all Soave whites) delivers melon, peach, tangerine skin and white almond. The wine is soft and round on the close. Pair it with white meat or shellfish.

properties.title: Robert Mondavi 2012 To Kalon Vineyard Fumé Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 7801 St Helena Hwy, Oakville, CA 94562, USA
properties.description: From the winery's signature vineyard and old Sauvignon Blanc vines, originally planted in 1959, this wine offers complexity and intrigue. Flavors range from crisp lemon to savory fennel and herb, a long, lingering finish sealing the deal.

properties.title: Tempus Cellars 2011 Sagemoor Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 760 C St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: This 100% varietal aged 22 months in French oak (22% new) needs time to open up. Once it does, it brings notes of dried herbs, dark coffee, cherry, plum and pencil eraser. It's elegant in style while showing good concentration to the chocolate and cherry flavors, supported by lightly chalky tannins.

properties.title: Howard Park 2012 Miamup Cabernet Sauvignon (Margaret River)
properties.address: 543 Miamup Rd, Cowaramup WA 6284, Australia
properties.description: This supple, easy-drinking Cabernet features appealing ripe cassis and vanilla shadings. Hints of black cherry and graham cracker add nuance, while the texture is a bit creamy on the midpalate, turning dusty on the finish. Drink now–2020.

properties.title: Preisinger 2013 Grüner Veltliner (Burgenland)
properties.description: Peppery, spicy red apple notes mingle with yeasty overtones in this rounded yet streamlined Grüner. Spice and minerality hold the foreground. There is citrus verve at the core and one can almost taste wet stones. Lovely now but this will age gracefully.

properties.title: Henry Earl 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 25 E Main St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: This wine offers notes of woodspice, butterscotch, coffee and blackberry. The fruit flavors are lighter in style with mouthwatering acids and firm, grippy tannins that need some time or perhaps a big, juicy steak to tame them.

properties.title: Koyle 2013 Costa Sauvignon Blanc (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Fundo Angostura Sin numero, Canadilla, San Fernando, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: Hailing from the coolest section of Colchagua's coastline, this is almost neutral on the nose except for some citrus and sweaty notes. The palate is full, chunky and noticeably more creamy than past vintages. Grapefruit, passion fruit and briny flavors finish full and citrusy. Drink now.

properties.title: Wakefield 2012 Riesling (Clare Valley)
properties.description: Lime zest and green apple mark this wine's nose and palate, dominating the senses at this early stage of the wine's evolution. A bit of dustiness emerges on the long, dry finish.

properties.title: Wakefield 2012 Jaraman Riesling (Clare Valley-Eden Valley)
properties.address: 8297 Diagonal 1500 Road, Stuart, OK 74570, USA
properties.description: This Riesling shows a bit of honeyed development already, hinting at orange or tangerine marmalade on the slightly abbreviated finish. Enjoy it over the next few years.

properties.title: Coach House 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: A cool-vintage red that clocks in at a low (for Washington) alcohol, this wine is aromatically reticent with notes of green herbs, cherry, tomato paste and barrel spices. It's tart with puckering acid and firm tannins, but good fruit intensity throughout. Drinking quite young now, it will be best after 2017 and should have a long life ahead of it.

properties.title: Ded.Reckoning 2013 Plunder Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1055 Atlas Peak Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Immediately appealing, this draws you into the glass with dark plums and blackberries accented by barrel spices. It's medium bodied with a silky feel, plush fruit flavors, and a lingering, fruit-filled, almost irresistible open finish.

properties.title: Fritsch 2013 Schlossberg Grüner Veltliner (Wagram-Donauland)
properties.address: Schlossbergstraße 9, 3470 Oberstockstall, Austria
properties.description: A subtle nose of citrus suggests a restrained wine. Indeed, the palate is slender, citrus-fresh and light, but enlivened by the peppery varietal edge that invariably adds interest. Clean, crunchy finish.

properties.title: Neil Ellis 2012 Chardonnay (Stellenbosch)
properties.address: R310 Helshoogte Rd, Idasvallei, Stellenbosch, 7600, South Africa
properties.description: Subtle scents of buttered toast and candied citrus peel add interest to the fresh tropical-fruit core of peach, guava, fig and mango. Medium acidity gives the palate good lift, while the lime-zest finish is clean and mouthwatering. Enjoy now.

properties.title: Radford Dale 2011 Chardonnay (Stellenbosch)
properties.address: R44, Farm Rust en Vrede no 1322, Opposite Eikendal, Stellenbosch, Cape Town, 7600, South Africa
properties.description: A subtle smokiness lends an intriguing streak to the nose of this wine, partnering harmoniously with scents of crisp red apple, melon rind, green fig and orange zest. Well balanced and approachable, the medium-weight palate offers clean flavors of apple, lime and softly toasted brioche. Enjoy now.

properties.title: Standing Stone 2013 Ice Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.description: Lavish floral notes perfume this lusciously sweet ice-style Riesling. Honeyed apples and fresh figs burst on the palate, their flavors intensified on the finish with a hit of zesty lemon acidity.

properties.title: Michel Gassier 2010 Nostre Païs White (Costières de Nîmes)
properties.address: Château de Nages, Chemin des Canaux, 30132 Caissargues, France
properties.description: This well-ripened white is mainly Grenache Blanc, part of which is matured in oak for six months. The melon flavors hint at vanilla and peach, and although it's a rich, moderately oaky wine, it remains crisp on the finish. Drink through the end of 2012.

properties.title: Rocky Hill 2010 Richard Dinner Vineyards Pinot Gris (Sonoma Mountain)
properties.description: Although there's no oak on this wine, it was aged on the lees, which gives it a creamy richness. Slightly sweet, it has pleasant, clean flavors of citrus fruits, peaches and green apples.

properties.title: Rôtie Cellars 2010 Southern White White (Washington)
properties.description: Half Viognier, 30% Roussanne and 20% Marsanne, this well-crafted Rhône-style blend is spicy with a bright mix of citrus fruits. Lemon/lime and orange scents and flavors dominate, with a fresh, forward palate impression.

properties.title: Artesa 2010 Pinot Blanc (Carneros)
properties.description: Feels and tastes like a Chardonnay, with some smoky oak influences and a medium-weight body framing orange, pear, green apple, white flower and vanilla flavors. Delicious and easy to drink now.

properties.title: Cameron Hughes 2007 Lot 287 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Lots of rich blackberries, cherries and chocolate in this Cab, but it's no mere fruit bomb. It's saved by a fine structure of acids and tannins. Very nice price for a wine this good.

properties.title: Cameron Hughes 2009 Lot 267 Cabernet Sauvignon (Spring Mountain District)
properties.description: Impressive in concentrated mountain fruit, this Cabernet has a gigantic core of ripe blackberries, blueberries and cherries. It's a sweet wine, in the fruity sense, but is fully dry, and balanced with fine tannins and acidity, not to mention a firm minerality that comes from the earth.

properties.title: Cantina Tollo 2010 Pecorino (Terre di Chieti)
properties.address: Via G. Garibaldi, 68, 66010 Tollo CH, Italy
properties.description: One of the most exciting white wine varieties to emerge from Italy in the past five years, Pecorino delivers a sturdy, creamy mouthfeel backed by intense aromas of apricot, butterscotch, candied orange peel and fragrant yellow rose. Pair it with pasta, white meats or shellfish.

properties.title: Casa L'Angel 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Valencia)
properties.description: Round, sweet and ripe smelling, then tight and rubbery in the mouth, with full tannins that smack down with force. The palate is medium in depth, with dark plum and berry flavors in front of a sweet, molasses-tinged finish. Very good for affordable Spanish Cabernet.

properties.title: Château d'Or et de Gueules 2009 Qu'es Aquo Red (Costières de Nîmes)
properties.description: This pure Carignan from 80-year-old vines is really interesting aromatically, featuring hints of clove, cinnamon and lavender, but its substantial tannins clamp down hard on the palate, raising the question of whether it has enough fruit concentration to age successfully. Drink now with tannin-taming rare beef or lamb, or cellar it and hope.

properties.title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2010 Sauvignon Blanc (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14111 NE 145th St, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: Almost indistinguishable from its companion Horse Heaven Vineyard bottling, the Columbia Valley Sauvignon Blanc also clocks in at a modest 12.5% alcohol. It offers light, succinct, pure varietal flavors, on the cool side with green apple, peavine, and a bracing minerality.

properties.title: Dauvergne & Ranvier 2010 Vin Gourmand Rosé (Costières de Nîmes)
properties.description: This is a medium-bodied, fresh and fruit-driven example of rosé. The berry, peach and lime flavors make for uncomplicated fun and refreshment. Drink this blend of Grenache and Cinsault over the next few months.

properties.title: Domaine Brusset 2009 Les Boudalles Red (Ventoux)
properties.description: A fruit-driven style, with cherry and raspberry notes accented by hints of chocolate and coffee. It's ripe and creamy on the midpalate, just fading a little too quickly on the finish. Drink now–2013.

properties.title: Mas Oncle Ernest 2008 Instant Présent Red (Ventoux)
properties.address: 325, chemin du rat collet blanc, 84340 Entrechaux, France
properties.description: With its distinctively briary, herbal edge, this wine stands out in a crowd. Ample cracked pepper spices up chocolate and plum flavors in this medium-bodied 60-40 blend of Grenache and Syrah. Drink now–2016.

properties.title: Single Wheel 2013 Third Spoke Patrician Verona Vineyard Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.description: Quite distinct from its Single Wheel companion bottlings, there's a rustic, slightly savory tone to pressed apple and pear flavors in this off-dry Riesling. It's light bodied and spry with a brisk, lemony finish.

properties.title: Skyfall 2014 Pinot Gris (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 201 Tresser Blvd Suite 500, Stamford, CT 06904, USA
properties.description: Reduced aromas provide significant distraction at the outset, with floral and tropical notes fighting to get to the surface. The palate doesn't entirely stay together, as if the wine can't make up its mind which way it wants to go. White grapefruit flavors come through on the finish.

properties.title: Thibault 2014 Fernand & Sons Sauvignon Blanc (Coteaux du Giennois)
properties.address: 6 Rue des Moutiers, 51390 Bouilly, France
properties.description: The flint soil of the vineyard shows in the steely, mineral character of this wine. It is all about structure at this stage, subduing the citrus fruits that are developing. It will fill out over the next few months, so drink from late 2016.

properties.title: Tussock Jumper 2013 Moscato Rosé (Valencia)
properties.description: While this foamy rosé is not elevated, it should appeal to those who like sweet Moscato bubblies. Candied flavors of raspberry, lychee and dried mango finish with a note of pineapple syrup.

properties.title: Domaine Pascal Bouchard 2014 La Classique  (Chablis)
properties.address: 3 Rue du Pressoir, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: Soft, crisp and fresh, this light wine has some tangy fruit as well as bright citrus. A slight texture and attractive final acidity are enhanced at the end by a juicy apple character. Drink now.

properties.title: Domaine Sautereau 2014 Côte de Reigny Rosé (Sancerre)
properties.address: 18300 Crézancy-en-Sancerre, France
properties.description: This is a crisp, fruity and well-balanced wine. Along with its red-currant fruit and bright acidity, it has a touch of caramel that adds richness. The wine is ready to drink.
