properties.title: Feliz Noche 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Santa Barbara County)
properties.description: Aromas of clay, lime zest and faint white flowers show on the very reserved and restrained nose. The palate is also shy, with light pear juice, slightly sour lemon curd and a slight gravel component.

properties.title: V. Sattui 2012 Preston Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Tar and black fruit emerge from the shadows of big tannins that pucker on the palate, begging for more time to soften. Robust and full bodied with a warm ripeness, it finishes flat.

properties.title: Joseph Mellot 2014 Les Milets Rosé (Reuilly)
properties.address: Route de Ménétréol, 18300 Sancerre, France
properties.description: A fresh, pale rosé from Pinot Noir, this has acidity coming from the red-currant fruits and crisp raspberries. With its light texture and total fruitiness, it's a wine to drink now.

properties.title: Louis Chevallier 2014  Mâcon-Villages
properties.description: This wine is soft, simple, fruity and ready to drink. It has apple and apricot tones and light acidity to keep it fresh, with a bright and refreshing aftertaste.

properties.title: Tousey 2014 Riesling (Hudson River Region)
properties.address: 1774 New York, U.S. 9, Germantown, NY 12526, USA
properties.description: Brisk and light-footed, there's a delicacy and restraint to tart grapefruit and honeydew flavors in this off-dry Riesling. It's not a deeply concentrated or complex wine, but offers thirst quenching refreshment. Drink now.

properties.title: Domaine Alban Roblin 2014  Sancerre
properties.description: Soft and gently fruity, this immediately attractive wine has plenty of acidity that points up the apple and green plum fruits and final freshness. The wine is ready to drink.

properties.title: Domaine Cordaillat 2014 Rosé (Reuilly)
properties.address: 5 Rte de Massay, 36260 Reuilly, France
properties.description: Made from Pinot Gris, this pale colored wine has just a blush of rosé. It is so fresh and perfumed, only lightly textured. A fine apéritif style, the wine has juicy red currant flavors, topped with orange zest. Drink now.

properties.title: Domaine de Villargeau 2014 Les Genêts Gris Sauvignon Blanc (Coteaux du Giennois)
properties.description: This is an herbal, cool wine. Concentrated citrus flavors percolate through the wine to give freshness and bright acidity. It's light, very crisp and ready to drink.

properties.title: Domaine Pierre Duret 2014  Sancerre
properties.address: 123 Atlantic Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11201, USA
properties.description: This is a fresh, herbaceous wine, with green fruits, citrus and tangy, zesty acidity. A young, juicy character contrasts with a more textured aftertaste. Drink now.

properties.title: Wunsch & Mann 2013 Cuvée Reine Clothilde Reserve Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 9 MetroTech Center, Brooklyn, NY 11201, USA
properties.description: Earthy notes of forest floor and white field mushroom precede the fruitier notions of ripe fresh and dried pear on nose and palate. This wine has a balm-like quality to the texture and a depth of developed flavor. The dried apple finish is dry, lasting and clean.

properties.title: Tondré 2013 Tondre Grapefield Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: Gonzales, CA 93926, USA
properties.description: Intriguing notes of honey, poached pear, apple with drizzled caramel and a light touch of marzipan show on the nose on this bottling that leans somewhat sweet in aromas. But the sip is dry, with Asian pear, jasmine and honeysuckle elements, quite crisp and engaging for the palate on multiple levels.

properties.title: Woodward Canyon 2013 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.description: Blended with 13% Syrah, this wine opens with notes of cassis, smoke, sweet herb, vanilla and tar. The black-fruit flavors are full bodied but still retain a sense of vibrancy and deftness. The finish stretches out and the tannins provide some chew.

properties.title: Imagery 2015 Wow Oui White (Pine Mountain-Cloverdale Peak)
properties.address: 14335 Sonoma Hwy, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.description: This is a fun, complex wine, a blend of 79% Sauvignon Blanc, 18% Muscat Canelli and 3% Viognier, all mountain-grown. Orange blossom and jasmine permeate the inviting entry before waves of creamy tangerine and peach play on the palate, lifted by lively acidity.

properties.title: Kobler 2015 Bacigalupi Vineyards Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: There's a measured richness on the nose of this impressive white, grown in the heart of the appellation's Westside Road neighborhood. Lemony salt and a touch of stone complement the integrated, present oak, rewarded by a complex texture and finish.

properties.title: Bogle 2014 Reserve Chardonnay (Clarksburg)
properties.description: This is a full-bodied and extroverted wine. It smells like melted butter and baking spices and tastes like nougat and caramel with just a touch of sweetness. Oaky in a moderate way, it offers great citrus and pineapple on the midpalate and a lingering finish.

properties.title: Chalone Vineyard 2014 Heritage Vines Estate Grown Pinot Blanc (Chalone)
properties.address: 32020 Stonewall Canyon Rd, Soledad, CA 93960, USA
properties.description: Exotic yellow-spice notes meet with lean lime pith on the light and crisp nose of this old-vine expression from a historic winery. Meyer-lemon rind and juice show brightly on the palate, where grippy chalkiness complements rich lemon-curd flavors.

properties.title: Domaine Roland Schmitt 2015 Glintzberg Riesling (Alsace)
properties.description: A clean aspect shines through this wine that offers all the freshness of green and yellow citrus along with a herbal glint, perhaps of citrus foliage. This is concentrated and comes with disarming purity and freshness that's wonderfully precise and dry.

properties.title: Domaines Schlumberger 2014 Les Princes Abbés Riesling (Alsace)
properties.description: Riesling has an ability to unite opposites: ripeness and tartness of fruit, a slender frame and unexpected weight. This dry and harmonious wine shows off these contradictions perfectly. A spiky freshness of citrus meets the generosity and juiciness of stone fruits. It is the dialectic between them that thrills.

properties.title: Rock Wall 2011 Uncle Roget's Grenache Rosé (Yolo County)
properties.description: A wisp of a wine that's dark-salmon in color, this is made entirely from Grenache grapes grown near the town of Davis. It's dry, light and fun, offering a strawberry and watermelon fruitiness, with a trace of spice on the end.

properties.title: Salvatore Principe 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: 18425 Highland Valley Rd, Ramona, CA 92065, USA
properties.description: At first, this smells charred and meaty, but blackberry, leather and roasted plum aromas soon sneak out. This runs big, with good acidity and manageable tannins. Flavors of cherry and cassis are lively and familiar.

properties.title: Talamonti 2011  Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo
properties.description: A delicious rosato made from the hearty Montepulciano grape, this opens with pretty aromas of garden flower, wild berry, dried mint and white almond. This is crisp, fresh and would pair with fried calamari rings.

properties.title: Triennes 2010 Sainte-Fleur Viognier (Vin de Pays Var)
properties.address: Le Logis de Nans, D560, 83860 Nans-les-Pins, France
properties.description: This is a smooth, orange- and peach-flavored wine, with a rich almost oily texture. It's rounded with light acidity on the finish. With its weight, this is a wine for food.

properties.title: Agustí Torelló Mata 2009 Aliguer Brut Vintage Sparkling (Cava)
properties.description: This is a little wayward and funky on the nose, with a lightly pickled aroma. It's a forward Cava with a yeasty, creamy feel. Its acidity and proper bubbles set up flavors of pastry, powdered sugar and sweet apple. The finish is quick, ending with a white-pepper flavor.

properties.title: Aveleda 2011 Aveleda Branco White (Douro)
properties.description: A new wine in the Aveleda line-up, this is rich and rounded. It's aromatic, with a full mouthfeel and flavors of pear and green apple lifted by acidity. The finish is full and fruity.

properties.title: Ballentine 2011 Betty's Vineyard Malvasia Bianca (St. Helena)
properties.address: 2820 St Helena Hwy, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Could almost be classified as a dry table wine, it's so rich in acidity and minerally on the finish. However, there's just enough honey to call it off-dry and dessert style. Either way, it's a stylish wine, crisp and clean, with orange and pear flavors. Great as a simple accompaniment to fresh fruit, ricotta or mascarpone dishes.

properties.title: Banfi 2011 Centine Bianco White (Toscana)
properties.address: 1111 Cedar Swamp Rd, Glen Head, NY 11545, USA
properties.description: This Tuscan blend of Sauvignon Blanc, Chardonnay and Pinot Grigio opens with crisp, almost tart, tones of citrus, exotic fruit and honeydew. The wine shows substance in the mouth and enough heft to pair with tuna or chicken salad.

properties.title: Companhia das Quintas 2011 Pancas Branco White (Lisboa)
properties.address: R. da Fonte Nova, 3780 Sangalhos, Portugal
properties.description: This is a piercingly fresh wine from vines close to the Atlantic Ocean. The citrusy acidity is balanced by riper yellow fruit and pineapple. Age for a few months, but it can also be consumed now.

properties.title: Duckhorn 2011 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.description: With vibrant acidity and a keen taste of mineral—like a lick of cold steel—this Sauvignon Blanc is also rich in citrus and tropical fruit flavors. A touch of oak and lees aging imparts a creamy, smoky yeastiness. More importantly, it has a seemingly sweet finish, so pair accordingly with appropriate fare.

properties.title: Black Stallion 2014 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Salted caramel and baked apple contribute to the rich, full-bodied luxuriousness of this wine. Matchstick, lemon tart and pineapple add to the experience, finishing tart and with substance.

properties.title: J. Scott Cellars 2014 Pinot Gris (Oregon)
properties.address: 520 Commercial St unit g, Eugene, OR 97402, USA
properties.description: A light tawny shade, this shows scents of straw and orange peel. The mouthfeel and somewhat deadened fruit flavors suggest some premature oxidation is occurring. Overall it lacks freshness, and should be consumed shortly.

properties.title: Kunde 2014 C.S. Ridge Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Valley)
properties.address: 9825 Sonoma Hwy, Kenwood, CA 95452, USA
properties.description: From the winery's estate, this wine opens in pretty floral notes of jasmine and orange blossom, following on the full-bodied palate with baked pear and vanilla. It finishes tart and dry.

properties.title: Adega Cooperativa de Borba 2015 Monte Claros Colheita Branco White (Alentejo)
properties.address: Largo Gago Coutinho e Sacadura Cabral 25, 7151-913 Borba, Portugal
properties.description: A light, citrus dominated wine, this is fresh and fruity. It has an attractive, clean palate, simple fruits and crisp acidity. The wine is ready to drink.

properties.title: Lucky Star 2013 Chardonnay (California)
properties.address: 10 4th St Suite 208, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.description: Fresh, tangy and citruslike from the aroma through the finish, this light- to medium-bodied wine has crisp acidity and light fruit flavors. It's very appealing for occasions when the wine doesn't have to be a show-off.

properties.title: Quinta da Lagoalva de Cima 2015 Lagoalva Sauvignon Blanc (Tejo)
properties.address: Quinta Lagoalva De Cima, 2090-222 Alpiarça, Portugal
properties.description: This is a Sauvignon Blanc in a ripe, tropical fruit style. It is soft with only the faintest herbal, citrus tang. The fruit is smooth, rounded allowing just the right space for the acidity to finish the wine with a lift. Drink now.

properties.title: Quinta de Porrais 2015 Porrais White (Douro)
properties.address: R. do Cimo da Eira, 5090-016, Portugal
properties.description: Because it comes from vines in one of the coolest parts of the Douro, high on the plateau north of the river, this is a fresh, fruity wine. It has crisp apple acidity that is made richer by touches of apricot and light spice. The wine is tight, a straight line of clean acidity. Drink from the end of 2016.

properties.title: Quinta do Casal Monteiro 2015 Margaride's White (Tejo)
properties.address: Estrada Municipal 1, 2080-201 Almeirim, Portugal
properties.description: Chardonnay and Arinto make a particularly satisfying blend with the roundness of the Chardonnay given a fresh, crisp lift by Arinto. This wine is soft while shot through with lemon acidity. Light and fruity, it is ready to drink.

properties.title: Rutherford Hill 2013 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Intensely generous in toffee and buttered caramel, this wine veers into a perception of sweetness, held up by a thick presence of oak. Medium bodied, it tastes heavier than expected.

properties.title: Santa Ema 2015 Reserva Chardonnay (Leyda Valley)
properties.address: Izaga 1096, Isla de Maipo, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: Grassy aromas feature a note of green banana and yeast. This feels round but hardly chunky, with reasonable core acidity. Flavors of citrus and apple are simple and clean, while a lemon-lime note and a hint of honey take care of the ending.

properties.title: Trig Point 2014 Signpost Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
properties.description: Muted on the nose, this tightly wound white is thickly textured yet light bodied in fruit and power. Apple and melon are the stars of the show, gently riding a wave of chalky tannin.

properties.title: Tussock Jumper 2014 Riesling (Rheinhessen)
properties.description: A touch of mineral astringency accents crisp, primary flavors of white peach and melon in this sprightly off-dry Riesling. It's not a complex wine but tart tangerine acidity marks a refreshing finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Mount Veeder 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: Mt Veeder, California 94558, USA
properties.description: This is a brawny, leathery expression of the variety, explosive on the palate in brambly blackberry and black cherry. Leather, coffee and tobacco give it additional edge and savory qualities that work within its full-bodied, ripe and rich context.

properties.title: Oyster Bay 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.description: This ticks all the Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc boxes: cut grass, snow pea, nectarine and citrus, all bundled into a medium-bodied wine that comes across as dry, silky and refreshing.

properties.title: R&A; Pfaffl 2015 Goldjoch Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Weinviertel)
properties.description: Gently savory hints of yeast on the nose lead to an easy, refreshing palate. This is light, with notes of citrus and pear, but it has a concentrated core and comes with a clean, moreish finish and harmonious balance.

properties.title: Sidebar 2015 Kerner (Mokelumne River)
properties.description: An apple scent and crisp, fruity, lightly herbal flavors lend plenty of refreshment to this graceful, medium-bodied and unoaked wine. It has great acidity and a dry but not austere personality. Kerner is a cross of the German grape varieties Riesling and Trollinger.

properties.title: Terlato 2013 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
properties.description: A substantial addition of 18% Merlot and smaller touch of 2% Cabernet Franc contribute to the heartiness and warmth of this wine that is tight in tobacco and graphite, with a smattering of coconut. Bittersweet chocolate, clove and dried herb contribute aroma and full-bodied flavor.

properties.title: Theopolis 2014 Symphony White (Yorkville Highlands)
properties.address: 32674 CA-128, Yorkville, CA 95494, USA
properties.description: Generous aromas of rose petal and lemon zest meet dry but fruity flavors recalling crisp kiwi and apricot in this dramatic, flavorful wine made from the Symphony grape variety. The texture is crisp and tangy, and the flavors are vivid.

properties.title: Uvaggio 2015 Zelo Bianco White (Carneros)
properties.address: 820 Randolph St, Napa, CA 94581, USA
properties.description: This proprietary blend combines 63% Pinot Grigio from Carneros, 22% Traminer from Carneros and a small percentage of Moscato Giallo from Lodi. Together they harmonize in a light, crisp and floral bouquet of apricot, ginger and lemon, never becoming overly fussy and instead focusing entirely on refined refreshment.

properties.title: Vigilance 2015 Chardonnay (Red Hills Lake County)
properties.description: Lush without being overtly oaky in aroma, this wine has a wonderful, creamy texture, lots of ripe pear and melon flavors, full body and a nicely viscous mouthfeel. Pair its richness with richness, counterpointing scallops or even a steak.

properties.title: Kurt Angerer 2015 Eichenstaude Riede Kiesling Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.description: The easy joy of sun-drenched stone fruit is evident on nose and palate. The exuberance is only increased by a smattering of lively white pepper and savory yeast. A total joy.

properties.title: Loveblock 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.description: Gooseberries and yellow plums mark the nose of this medium-bodied wine. Some grassy-herbal elements add freshness and nuance, while the finish is long, dry and filled with stone fruit. Drink now.

properties.title: Martinshof 2015 Reserve Weissburgunder (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Obere Kellergasse, 2183 St. Ulrich - Neusiedl/Zaya, Austria
properties.description: A smoky, almost meaty tone of hazelnut is the first impression on the nose. This smokiness carries over onto the lemon zest, which defines the palate. This is poised and streamlined and will stand its gentle but firm ground at the table.

properties.title: La Crema 2014 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
properties.description: This juicy, medium-bodied wine offers a mix of crisp lemon meringue and richer notions of pear compote and biscotti. Grapes are sourced from a range of vineyards, including Saralee's.

properties.title: Domaine du Haut Bourg 2013 Pavillon Sur Lie  (Muscadet Côtes de Grandlieu)
properties.address: 11 Rue de Nantes, 44830 Bouaye, France
properties.description: The wine is fruity while still being closed up and tight. That allows for hints of the apple flavors to come through while still retaining a nervy, steely character. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Girardet 2012 Chardonnay (Umpqua Valley)
properties.description: Done entirely in stainless steel tanks, this includes a percentage of fruit from Girardet's original 1971 plantings. It went through full malolactic, resulting in a broad, somewhat dilute wine with lightly spiced flavors of green and yellow apples. Notes of lemongrass and metal come up in the finish.

properties.title: Viña Bisquertt 2014 La Joya Gran Reserva Gewürztraminer (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Av. Del Condor 590, Huechuraba, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: Tropical fruit and white-flower aromas are foxy and strained. This is scattered and flabby on the palate, with pithy, lightly bitter citrus flavors blending with sweet mango in front of a tropical finish with papaya, mango and sugary melon notes.

properties.title: Montresor 2014 Campovalentino  (Lugana)
properties.address: Via Ca' di Cozzi, 16, 37124 Verona VR, Italy
properties.description: Aromas of pressed white flower and a hint of stone fruit lead the nose. The simple palate offers subtle green apple and unripe yellow peach alongside bright acidity.

properties.title: Saget la Perrière 2014 La Petite Perrière Sauvignon Blanc (Vin de France)
properties.description: This is a gentle style of Sauvignon Blanc that has just a touch of herbaceousness to go with the fresh, young grapefruit and crisp apple flavors. It's a wine to drink this summer.

properties.title: Cantina di Soave 2013 Rocca Sveva  (Soave Classico)
properties.description: Fragrances suggest white spring flower and green melon. The light, straightforward palate offers Granny Smith apple and green pear alongside bright acidity.

properties.title: Indomita 2014 Duette Premium Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: Ruta 68, Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.description: An oaky bouquet is led by vanilla and sawdust aromas. This is chunky and round on the palate, with woody flavors of green-leaning stone fruits. The finish is oaky and creamy in feel, with moderate flavors of peach and nectarine.

properties.title: Antoine Simoneau 2014 Cuvée St-Georges Sauvignon Blanc (Touraine)
properties.address: 21 Rue des Vignes, 41400 Saint-Georges-sur-Cher, France
properties.description: This gently ripe wine has generous apple flavors, tropical fruits and the freshest warm, rounded aftertaste.

properties.title: Alto Los Romeros 2012 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Cam. Padre Hurtado 695, Alto Jahuel, Buin, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: Smoky, cooked berry aromas lead to a full, flabby, rubbery-feeling palate with baked black-fruit flavors that suggest baking spices. A soft finish is low on verve and tastes a bit sugary and sweet.

properties.title: Bodegas Langa 2012 Pi Garnacha Blanca (Spain)
properties.description: Floral white-flower aromas settle on buttercup and lees notes, while in the mouth this is creamy but low on structure. Yeasty peach and apple flavors finish chunky, and overall low acidity is an issue.

properties.title: Communication Block 2011 Lampyridae Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Mount Veeder)
properties.address: 21610 N Davis Rd, Lodi, CA 95242, USA
properties.description: Made from 100% Cabernet, this wine shows the intensity of fruit that Mount Veeder is capable of expressing. It also has excellent acidity. But the tannins are astringently strong, giving a numbing sting to the palate. This certainly needs time. Give it until 2022 and beyond.

properties.title: Luis Duarte 2012 Rubrica Branco White (Alentejano)
properties.address: 71 Park St, Troy, MI 48083, USA
properties.description: In this still-young wine, flavors of wood aging show strongly and the ripe and rich fruit still needs time to develop. As it does, the blend of Antão Vaz, Verdelho and Viognier will bring out a great perfumed character and rich fruitiness. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Ottella 2011 Molceo  (Lugana Superiore)
properties.description: Yellow peach, pear, mineral, Alpine herbs and almond jump out of the glass. The elegant but structured palate delivers a great depth of flavors alongside crisp acidity. It's already delicious but will also develop more complexity over the next few years. Drink now through 2016.

properties.title: Dr. Hermann 2012 Erdener Treppchen Herzlay Spätlese Goldkap Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: Earthy aromas at the outset subside to reveal bright tangerine, honey and saffron notes on this intensely fruity, medium-sweet wine. It's punchy on the palate, with streaks of sweet mango and peach preserve, but anchored by hints of spice and dust that are complex and intriguing. This finishes long, with a slick of honey and wax.

properties.title: Amapola Creek 2009 Estate Bottled Unfined & Unfiltered Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
properties.description: There's a great wine lurking inside big, hard tannins, but it's going to take some time to express itself. If you chew the wine, you'll discover a core of intensely ripe black berries and currants. The finish is thoroughly dry and spicy in cinnamon, clove and black pepper, with hints of cocoa. Stash this in the cellar until 2020.

properties.title: Beauregard 2012 Beauregard Ranch Chardonnay (Ben Lomond Mountain)
properties.address: 10 Pine Flat Rd, Santa Cruz, CA 95060, USA
properties.description: Ben Lomond is a newish appellation in the cooler, western part the Santa Cruz Mountains (the eastern part favors Cabernet Sauvignon). And by the evidence of this luscious wine, it's a great place for Chardonnay. With plenty of winemaker bells and whistles, it's rich and complex, showing tropical fruit, tangerine, lemon custard, honey, buttered toast and cinnamon flavors, brightened with mouthwatering acidity.

properties.title: Burgess 2010 Estate Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2921 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: The grapes come from the winery's estate vineyards on Howell Mountain, and you can sense the mountain intensity, both of tannins and fruity concentration. The flavors are impressive, suggesting black currant and mocha, with a minerality that grounds the wine. The tannins will help the wine evolve until 2020–2022, but you can drink it now.

properties.title: Terra de Falanis 2012 Bla Bla Bla Premsal (Vi de la Terra Mallorca)
properties.description: Buttery oak aromas cover up any white-fruit character this Mallorcan white might have in store. Resiny, corny, overly oaky flavors finish like a bowl of buttered movie popcorn.

properties.title: Sawtooth 2014 Estate Grown Pinot Gris
properties.description: Aromas of reduction and overripe fruit are followed by off-dry flavors that lack cohesion.

properties.title: Cellier des Chartreux 2013 Chevalier d'Anthelme White (Côtes du Rhône)
properties.description: Otherwise charming aromas of apple, pear, wet stone and citrus are marred by a hint of something cidery or varnishy. The overall effect isn't completely unpleasant, just lacking a little in purity and freshness.

properties.title: 3 Horse Ranch Vineyards 2014 Vivacious White
properties.address: 5900 Pearl Rd, Eagle, ID 83616, USA
properties.description: This wine's peach, melon and flowers aromas are bright. The palate is dry and fleshy with a bitter note that distracts.

properties.title: Black Box 2014 Moscato (California)
properties.description: Aromas are mildly floral, fresh and fruity and the flavors are sweet and mouthfilling. This could be a cocktail wine for people with sweet tooths or something to go with dessert.

properties.title: Plumb Cellars 2014 Afternoon Delight Estate Viognier (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 39 E Main St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: This wine starts out quite reductive, with sulfurous aromas that provide significant distraction. The flavors are light and show a pleasing elegance but can't make up the difference.

properties.title: 3 Horse Ranch Vineyards 2014 3 Horse Ranch Vineyard Pinot Gris
properties.description: Aromas of melon and pear lead to fleshy ale, apple and citrus flavors with a pinch of sugar sweetening the finish. There's some interest but the concentration doesn't seem all there.

properties.title: V. Sattui 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1111 White Ln, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: This is a dull, hugely tannic wine. It's hard to penetrate, with its robust use of dry oak and heat. The finish delivers a shot of gunpowder and graphite.

properties.title: Ghost Pines 2014 Winemaker's Blend Chardonnay (Monterey County-Napa County-Sonoma County)
properties.description: The majority of the grapes for this wine hail from Monterey County, with a large portion also coming from Napa County. The remaining 19% are from Sonoma County. In all, the wine is a tad simple and generic, not offering much in the way of aroma or flavor.

properties.title: Main & Geary 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 329 S Main St, Erie, KS 66733, United States
properties.description: This wine is tight and tannic, with a rustic hint of leathery saddle and barnyard that makes it hard to highly recommend.

properties.title: Whispering Tree 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: Volatile aromas provide significant distraction. The black- and blue-fruit flavors are easy drinking but can't provide enough counterbalance.

properties.title: Black Box 2014 Pinot Grigio (California)
properties.description: Unusually dry and tangy, this light-bodied wine smells like celery and herbs, and tastes very lean and straightforward.

properties.title: Osprey's Dominion 2012 Fumé Blanc Sauvignon Blanc (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.description: There's a hint of smoke that adds a dark edge to the pretty white floral notes of this easy drinking, elegantly balanced Sauvignon Blanc. It's dry and refreshing on the palate, while hints of waxy minerality and bitter lime pith lend complexity to the finish.

properties.title: Peju 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Rich, ripe and flashy, this Cabernet scores high on the deliciousness factor. That is Peju's speciality, and here they have produced a gorgeous wine of soft tannins, creaminess and ripe black currant, anise and dark chocolate flavors. Tasty now, and will stay fresh for up to five years.

properties.title: Gainey 2011 Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.description: Dry, mouthwatering in acidity, and with a firm steeliness to the citrus and tropical fruits, this Chardonnay is fancy enough to drink with rich fare, like crab. It shows the elegance of the Santa Rita Hills, at a fair price.

properties.title: Kasuari 2010 Parady Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: A big Cabernet, showing the dramatic mouthfeel that well-made Napa Cabernet always has. It's full bodied, dry and softly tannic, with classic blackberry and currant flavors. Should hold in the bottle for about six years.

properties.title: J.V. Fleury 2009 Red (Châteauneuf-du-Pape)
properties.description: This is rather fresh in style for a 2009 from the Southern Rhône, with bold cherry and chocolate notes, reasonably crisp acids and softly dusty tannins. That said, it's a mouth-filling wine, but one that's harmonious and easy to drink.

properties.title: Ridge 2011 Estate Monte Bello Vineyards Chardonnay (Santa Cruz Mountains)
properties.description: Rich, ripe and flashy, with honey, pineapple and orange jam and toasty oak flavors. It's brightened with crisp acidity. With some heat from alcohol, it's deliciously approachable now.

properties.title: Sineann 2012 Wy'East Vineyard Pinot Gris (Columbia Gorge (OR))
properties.address: 8400 Champoeg Rd NE, St Paul, OR 97137, USA
properties.description: An aromatically distinctive wine, with notes of peanut shells, dried apricot, and lees. A hair off dry, it's broad and textured, with vibrant acidity, finishing just a touch bitter.

properties.title: François Lurton 2011 Gran Lurton Corte Friulano White (Mendoza)
properties.description: This yellow-tinted blend of Friulano, Chardonnay, Viognier and Pinot Gris is classy and smoky on the nose, with no shortage of toasty oak. Core apple, melon and citrus flavors are rich and smooth, while this finishes round and full in body. Corte Friulano is really good for an oddball Argentine white blend.

properties.title: Georges Duboeuf 2011 Emile Beranger  (Pouilly-Fuissé)
properties.address: 836 Rte de Fleurie, 71570 Romanèche-Thorins, France
properties.description: This is a fresh wine that also has a strong sense of structure. It's textured with white fruits coming through a nervy acidity and minerality. Hints of wood are tantalizing and round the wine out at the end.

properties.title: O. Fournier 2010 Alfa Crux Sauvignon Blanc (Uco Valley)
properties.description: With feline aromas of juniper bush, grass and sweaty citrus, this is true Sauvignon Blanc. Oak aging has lent an easiness to the mouthfeel, which shows good acidity. Flavors of green fruits, melon and pithy bitterness end in chalky clarity. This is one of Argentina's best Sauvignon Blancs.

properties.title: Palmer 2012 Sauvignon Blanc (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.address: 5120 Sound Ave, Riverhead, NY 11901, USA
properties.description: A hint of spritz introduces this brisk, fresh Sauvignon Blanc, adding verve to concentrated notes of waxy white florals, peach and grapefruit. Mineral tones and a whiff of green lend complexity to the finish.

properties.title: Waters Crest 2012 Sauvignon Blanc (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.description: This bright, intensely citrusy Sauvignon Blanc boasts concentrated lemon rind and white blossom notes highlighted by a shower of minerality. It's a dry, refreshingly brisk wine with hints of wax and honey that add richness to the palate.

properties.title: Dirler-Cadé 2008 Belzbrunnen Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 13 Rue d'Issenheim, 68500 Bergholtz, France
properties.description: The wannabe Grand Cru of Belzbrunnen has produced this marvellously mature wine. It's fully ripe and shows its perfumed flavors strongly. The acidity is still very present, giving a tight presence to this impressive wine.

properties.title: Domaine Albert Mann 2011 Schlossberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
properties.description: This is a very mineral and structured wine. Strong citrus and white peach flavors are accompanied by a hint of toast, along with brisk acidity and a steely texture. It's a complex combination that promises aging. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Domaine Charles Baur 2011 Cuvée Charles Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 29 Grand-Rue, 68420 Eguisheim, France
properties.description: An aromatic wine with great depth, this is complex and concentrated. It brings out a great tangy, zesty, steely character that has freshness as well as richness in equal measure. White fruits and red currants leave a crisp, taut aftertaste.

properties.title: Garofoli 2006 Selezione Gioacchino Garofoli  (Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico Superiore)
properties.address: Via Colle Ravara, 19, 60030 Serra De' conti AN, Italy
properties.description: Already seven years old when tasted, this stunning wine demonstrates the aging potential of top Verdicchios. It has a layered fragrance of dried acacia flower, broom and beeswax, while the palate delivers a lovely depth of flavors that recall ripe yellow peach, lemon drop, tangerine and sage, with a hint of honey on the close.

properties.title: Hatzimichalis 2008 Kapnias Vineyard Zygos Cabernet Sauvignon (Atalanti Valley)
properties.address: Χουλέβαινα, Atalanti 352 00, Greece
properties.description: Aromas of red fruit, vanilla and cigarbox start this Cabernet Sauvignon from Greece. Its flavors are rich but balanced—cinnamon, cedar, cherry and savory spice—and the wine finishes clean and dry. Elegant with ageable potential.

properties.title: Silverado 2010 Mt. George Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 6121 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: This Cabernet is a guaranteed cellar candidate. It's enormously rich and extracted, with flavors of blackberries, currants, plums and mocha, but finishes firm, dry and tannic. Give it at least four more years in a cellar.

properties.title: Southard 2011 White Wine White (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 670 Tibbling Rd, Selah, WA 98942, USA
properties.description: Scott Southard has flipped the percentages from the 2010 vintage, placing Roussanne in the driver's seat, and Viognier holding up one third of the blend. Bright, tropical fruits are set in a frame of lusciously toasty oak, with highlights of roasted almonds and a bit of butter. Firm and substantial, with excellent depth.

properties.title: Umani Ronchi 2012 Casal di Serra  (Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico Superiore)
properties.description: Notes of hawthorne, acacia and tropical fruit open this quintessential expression of Verdicchio. The fresh, juicy palate is loaded with pineapple, creamy white peach and lemon custard flavors, accented by hints of balsamic herbs and ocean-like salinity. Energizing mineral adds to the depth. Hold for 2–3 years to develop complexity or enjoy now for the fruit purity.

properties.title: Klipfel 2009 Clos Zisser Kirchberg de Barr Grand Cru Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 1 Rue Rotland, 67140 Barr, France
properties.description: Certainly sweet, this is a rich wine that is maturing well. It has weight and spice and a soft, opulent texture. It's sourced from grapes grown on the steep slopes above the city of Barr. Drink now and until 2018.

properties.title: Mas de la Dame 2010 Coin Caché White (Vin de Pays des Alpilles)
properties.description: This is a full-bodied and rich wine with touches of vanilla and toast from wood aging that are integrated into flavors of ripe apricot, lime and herbs. Drink now, and until 2019.

properties.title: Cave de Kientzheim-Kaysersberg 2011 Furstentum Grand Cru Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 29 Grand-Rue, 68240 Kaysersberg, France
properties.description: Although the sweetness is not indicated on the label, this is a medium-dry wine, edging towards the sweeter end. It has intense spice, intense perfume, and flavors of rosewater and tropical fruits. It should age well, so drink until 2019.

properties.title: Alta Maria 2012 Rancho Viñedo Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.description: This classic cool-climate California Chardonnay shows intensely concentrated kumquat, lime and peach flavors, off set by bright acidity. There's quite a bit of oak on it, but it's balanced, and adds a pleasant layer of buttered toast flavor.

properties.title: Cave de Kientzheim-Kaysersberg 2010 Schlossberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 29 Grand-Rue, 68240 Kaysersberg, France
properties.description: This is a rich and full-flavored wine that still has plenty of aging ahead of it. It has a very floral character that is followed by green fruit and spice, and sustained by a tight, steely texture. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Columbia Crest 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 178810 WA-221, Paterson, WA 99345, USA
properties.description: The reserve is still tightly wound, but expressive, with firm, focused flavors of cassis fruit, backed with a refreshing minerality. Chewy and stylish, its briary fruits carry through a long, sculpted finish with light accents of herb.

properties.title: Domaine de Terrebrune 2010 Red (Bandol)
properties.description: This wine is concentrated with ripe, juicy fruit along with brisk acidity and a delicious sense of Southern French herbs. The wine has weight as well, giving it fine aging potential. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Summers 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
properties.description: This is a beautiful, classic 100% varietal Cabernet Sauvignon, but it's also immature in hard tannins, which is a telltale mark of this mountain appellation. The wine is bone dry and complex, with waves of blackberries, black currants, cassis, minerals and cedar. It clearly wants time in the cellar. Best after 2013.

properties.title: Tenuta Olim Bauda 2003 San Giovanni Moscato (Piedmont)
properties.description: This Moscato Passito from northern Italy opens with crisp and pristine aromas of yellow rose, honey, stone fruit and white almond. On the close, the wine is sticky, sweet and succulent. Pair it with vanilla cream or panna cotta with caramel.

properties.title: Loimer 2008 Schelllmann Gumpoldskirchen Cuvée White (Thermenregion)
properties.description: Rich wine, a blend dominated by the rare Rotgipfler and Zierfandler, with great ripe layers of tropical fruits, peach and spice, perfectly balanced with full acidity. Fred Loimer of the Kamptal also produces this Schellmann brand in the Thermenregion, with concentrated dense and deliciously ripe wines. Screw cap.

properties.title: Altvs 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Made in the modern cult style, this soft, ripely lush Cabernet is immediately likeable for its blackberry-pie filling, black currant liqueur, chocolate, licorice and smoky sweet oak flavors. It's California Cabernet at its heady, opulent best. Drink now.

properties.title: Barberani 2006 Moscato Passito Villa Monticelli Moscato (Umbria)
properties.description: Villa Monticelli Passito represents one of the best dessert wines to come from Umbria, central Italy. Made from air-dried grapes, the wine sports a amber-copper color and opens with syrupy aromas of white raisins, candied fruit, honey and loads of apricot.

properties.title: Planeta 2008  Passito di Noto
properties.description: This luminous Passito di Noto (a dessert wine from Sicily made with air-dried grapes) offers bright and defined aromas of orange and almond blossoms, honey, dried apricot and sweet summer fruit. There's a touch of piquant spice and acidity to break through the wine's natural sweetness and thickness.

properties.title: Feudi della Medusa 2005 Aristeo White (Isola dei Nuraghi)
properties.address: Via S. Michele, 36, 09010 Pula CA, Italy
properties.description: From the dreamy Mediterranean paradise known as Sardinia comes this opulent dessert blend of Nasco and Malvasia Bianca. The syrupy wine exhibits a dark amber-copper color with aromas of toasted almond, butterscotch, caramel, dried apricot and candied fruit. It shows density and grit, and yes, there's even a touch of piquant spice on the close.

properties.title: Gorman 2007 The Bully Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
properties.description: Wonderfully rich, with a lush and luxurious mid-palate, this young wine is packed with berries and cassis, elevated with some citrusy acidity, and deep with notes of gravel and smoke. This wine is still hard and unresolved. Give it a lot of decanting, or just age for a few years.

properties.title: Arndorfer 2008 Die Leidenschaft Riesling (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Weinbergweg 16, 3491 Straß im Straßertale, Austria
properties.description: Beautifully perfumed, this is now maturing. It has an elegance, lightness of touch and a wonderful almond and spice character. The fruit is softened and rounded, with the acidity lending a vivid aftertaste.

properties.title: Cameron Hughes 2009 Lot 246 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 205 Concourse Blvd, Santa Rosa, CA 95403, USA
properties.description: A great Cabernet for drinking now with upscale dishes. Production was 2,700 cases, but it's worth a search. Tastes classy and elegant, with rich blackberry, currant, anise and oak flavors that are dry and complex. For this price, it's a huge value.

properties.title: Commanderie de la Bargemone 2011 Rosé (Coteaux d'Aix-en-Provence)
properties.description: From this estate founded in the 13th century comes a finely made wine. Its dryness combines well with great flavors of red currant, raspberry and lime. It is delicious with food or as an apéritif.

properties.title: Domaine de l'Hermitage 2011 L'Oratoire Rosé (Bandol)
properties.description: This is a finely balanced wine, showing its crisp acidity and its fruitiness along with a richer character that lends weight. This is both immediately attractive and worth aging for a few months.

properties.title: Domäne Wachau 2010 Kellerberg  Trockenbeerenauslese Riesling (Wachau)
properties.address: Dürnstein 107, 3601 Dürnstein, Austria
properties.description: Fully-botrytized grapes were harvested in December for this liquorous, smooth wine. Aromas of orange peel and wild-flower honey come together with the intense acidity. This opulent wine should age for many years. Screwcap.

properties.title: Château de Beaucastel 2009 Coudoulet de Beaucastel Red (Côtes du Rhône)
properties.address: Chem. de Beaucastel, 84350 Courthézon, France
properties.description: Beaucastel's Côtes du Rhône is like a mini Châteauneuf-du-Pape in its blend of grapes and its sourcing, just outside that famous appellation. The 2009 is a very successful and flattering Coudoulet, with scents of garrigue and cherry followed by a palate that's round and lush without being at all heavy. Long and velvety on the finish.

properties.title: Two Mountain 2010 Chardonnay (Rattlesnake Hills)
properties.description: A standout in a flight of pricier Chardonnays, this young wine is tight and focused, with a pretty toasty edge. Fresh apple and white peach flavors have taken on a lot of new oak, but have the stuffing to absorb it, especially with a bit more bottle age. A lot of vanilla, custard and almond-cookie goodness fills out the finish.

properties.title: Hermann Moser 2011 Gebling Riesling (Kremstal)
properties.address: Bahnstraße 36, 3495 Rohrendorf bei Krems, Austria
properties.description: Pure in character, this has a taut line of perfumed white fruits, with a nervy, tight character. It is young, needing several years of aging to bring out its complex flavors.

properties.title: Zull 2011 Innere Bergen Riesling (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Schrattenthal 9, 2073 Schrattenthal, Austria
properties.description: A beautifully perfumed wine, with aromas of white flowers and white fruits. It's rich and full of complex ripe fruits, with a smooth texture. Intense acidity marks the finish. Screwcap.

properties.title: Franz Haas 2009 Manna White (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)
properties.address: Villner Str., 6, 39040 Montan, Autonome Provinz Bozen - Südtirol, Italy
properties.description: This is an oak-aged blend of Riesling, Chardonnay, Sauvignon Blanc and Traminer that opens with a deep, soft bouquet of vanilla, exotic fruit, stone fruit and honey. Pair this gorgeous wine with shellfish or white meat.

properties.title: Nigl 2010 Senftenberger Pellingen Erste Lage Privat Grüner Veltliner (Kremstal)
properties.address: Kirchenberg 1, 3541 Senftenberg, Austria
properties.description: A wine that pushes the concept of Grüner to its limits. It is powerful, dense and concentrated, with spice, lychee and apricot flavors. This is full bodied, superrich. Screwcap.

properties.title: Stonestreet 2010 Sauvignon Blanc (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 7111 CA-128, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: A very fine Sauvignon Blanc that's pure, fresh and crisp. This shows uplifted citrus fruit, gooseberry, date and spice flavors. It's an excellent example of the variety; only 387 cases were produced.

properties.title: Alpha Omega 2009 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1155 Mee Ln, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: After years of trying, Alpha Omega finally hits the bullseye. It's everything you want in a fine Chardonnay, with ripe citrus and tropical fruit flavors, a rich oaky, creamy overlay and bracing acidity.

properties.title: Arrowood 2009 Reserve Speciale Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 14347 CA-12, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.description: Buttery and creamy, with tiers of tangerine and tropical fruit flavors that turn honeyed on the finish. Despite the richness, there's elegance and balance throughout.

properties.title: La Crema 2010 Chardonnay (Arroyo Seco)
properties.address: 3575 Slusser Rd, Windsor, CA 95492, USA
properties.description: This Chardonnay is marked by brisk acidity, and pure, clean flavors of pineapples, golden mangoes, stony minerals and smoky butter. It's made for drinking now with upscale fare.

properties.title: Loimer 2011 Lenz Riesling (Kamptal)
properties.address: Haindorfer Vögerlweg 23, 3550 Langenlois, Austria
properties.description: This is a rich Riesling, with soft apple and creamed-pear flavor as well as perfumed notes of white flower and white currant. The wine has a dense texture, giving both concentration and a mineral core. Screwcap.

properties.title: Château La Nerthe 2015 White (Châteauneuf-du-Pape)
properties.address: Rte de Sorgues, 84230 Châteauneuf-du-Pape, France
properties.description: The finest example of La Nerthe's regular white cuvée I can recall, this is a creamy-textured, elegant blend of 40% Grenache Blanc, 40% Roussanne, 10% Clairette and 10% Bourboulenc. Hints of graphite and grilled pear mark the nose, followed by succulent notes of pear, melon and pineapple. There are no hard edges at all in this medium- to full-bodied wine. Drink now.

properties.title: Cielo 2009 Purple Mountain Cabernet Sauvignon (Saddle Rock-Malibu)
properties.description: Dark and rich, this bottling is redolent of kirsch, crème de cassis, star anise and cola. The palate is framed by leathery tannins and pinpoint-like acidity that carry through to the finish, offering cola, dried black cherry and licorice flavors. A harbinger of Malibu's potential.

properties.title: DeMorgenzon 2013 The Divas Chenin Blanc (Stellenbosch)
properties.address: Stellenbosch Kloof Rd, Stellenbosch, 7599, South Africa
properties.description: This is a rich and seductive yet well-balanced Chenin, offering ripe notes of stone fruit and melon that are framed by threads of lanolin, beeswax, graphite and fynbos. The medium-weight palate is bright and clean, as fresh citrus and green fruit tones are partnered with lively acidity and a pithy citrus and melon-rind flavor on the ensuring finish. Drink now–2020.

properties.title: Robert Weil 2014 Riesling Sekt Brut Sparkling (Rheingau)
properties.address: Mühlberg 5, 65399 Kiedrich, Germany
properties.description: Toasted nut, smoke and slate aromas lend complexity and nuance to this high-pitched Riesling Sekt. Lemon-lime acidity and vivacious effervescence give the palate an electric feel, countered nicely by delicate swirls of sweet red apple and caramel. It's concentrated and boldly penetrating through a long finish.

properties.title: Stonestreet 2014 Estate Chardonnay (Alexander Valley)
properties.description: From vineyards at 400 to 1,800 feet in elevation, this wine opens with an intensely aromatic nose of honey and caramel. Sultry and seductive, with full-bodied fruit concentration, it emanates spicy fig, pear and quince, finishing bright with stony minerality.

properties.title: Volker Eisele Family Estate 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 3080 Lower Chiles Valley Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: This subtle, classically-styled red includes 6% Merlot, all of the fruit hailing from the producer's organic Chiles Valley estate. It's bright with red and blue fruit and earthy accents of mushroom and clove. Moderate tannin buoy it without bogging it down, giving it broadness on the palate and carrying its flavors long into the finish.

properties.title: Paumanok 2014 Tuthill's Lane Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.description: Ripe fleshy blackberry and plum notes are pristine and pretty in this richly textured Cabernet Sauvignon. It's densely concentrated on the palate, but brisk acidity and glimmers of violet, lavender and graphite lend levity and freshness. Approachable already yet regal with fine firm tannins, it's ready to drink now but should continue to improve for at least another decade.

properties.title: Marqués de Murrieta 2011 Capellanía Viura (Rioja)
properties.description: Waxy aromas of dried stone fruits and potent oak open this classy barrel-fermented Viura. A refined palate with cutting acidity energizes woody pear and apple flavors. On the finish, resiny oak and a wave of oxidized Sherry notes are highly complex but maybe not for everyone.

properties.title: Reichsgraf von Kesselstatt 2015 Graach Josephshöfer Monopol Kabinett Grosse Lage Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Schloß Marienlay, 54317 Morscheid, Germany
properties.description: Dusty slate and spice tones intensify this brisk, grapefruit-laced Kabinett from the famed Josephshöfer site. Sweet-tart lemon and tangerine flavors are scintillating and brisk, enriched by a luscious mineral slick that lingers on the palate. Its sharp, linear style is attractive already but should meld gorgeously from 2021.

properties.title: Eric Kent 2014 Sangiacomo Green Acres Hill Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
properties.description: This vineyard designate opens with toasted oak aromas before unleashing friendly, fruit-forward layers of green apple and pear that mellow on the palate. Softly textured, medium-bodied and measured in acidity, it lingers on the finish in nutmeg and lemongrass flavor.

properties.title: Flora Springs 2015 Soliloquy Sauvignon Blanc (Oakville)
properties.address: 677 St Helena Hwy, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: This is a delicate signature white, with lovely honeysuckle and flint aromas. High-toned acidity buoys layers of grapefruit and preserved lemon flavor, finishing with well-defined minerality.

properties.title: St. Pauls 2013 Sanctissimus Riserva Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)
properties.description: Glossy and structured, this opens with aromas suggesting acacia honey, toasted hazelnut, crushed stone and a hint of light spice. The smooth but firm palate offers mature yellow apple, tangerine zest and a honeyed mineral note while fresh acidity brightens the creamy flavors. Drink through 2020.

properties.title: Janzen 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Peppery and meaty, this 100% varietal wine is sourced from select estates around the valley. With lively acidity beneath its rich, ripe blackberry and cassis flavors, it shows sturdy tannin and a mild finish.

properties.title: McGregor 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 5503 Dutch St, Dundee, NY 14837, USA
properties.description: Complexity abounds on this spicy cedar-toned Cabernet Sauvignon. Ripe red-plum and cherry flavors are juicy and plush yet balanced briskly by sharp edges of acidity and graphite. It's intensely earthy, studded with notes of bramble and autumn leaf. Fine feathery tannins lead a long lingering finish.

properties.title: Schloss Saarstein 2013 Serrig Schloss Saarsteiner Spätlese Erste Lage Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Schloss Saarstein, 54455 Serrig, Germany
properties.description: Pristine white peach mingles with saffron, candle wax and dusty minerals in this enticingly spry wine, but the shriekingly high acidity cuts the palate with a razor's edge. Welcome touches of honey add some balance towards the finish.

properties.title: Shannon Ridge 2012 High Elevation Cabernet Sauvignon (Lake County)
properties.address: 13888 Point Lakeview Rd, Lower Lake, CA 95457, USA
properties.description: This fragrant confection smells like caramel and toasted French bread, and tastes like milk chocolate and cherries without the sugar. It is medium-bodied, very smooth in texture and almost sweet on the finish.

properties.title: Tablas Creek 2012 Estate Grown & Bottled Roussanne (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 9339 Adelaida Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Tropical notes rule the nose, with guava most prominent, yet white flowers present as well. There is lemon rind-driven acidity on the apple juice-laden palate, making for a pleasant wine for drinking with light fare.

properties.title: Terra do Castelo 2013 Selección White (Ribeiro)
properties.description: Powdery notes, bath oil and white-fruit aromas make for a fragrant nose. This is solid on the palate, with citric acidity and a slight oiliness to the feel. Flowery nectarine and orange flavors set up a weighty but fresh finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Vinum 2013 Chardonnay (Monterey)
properties.address: 69 Cross Rd, Basking Ridge, NJ 07920, USA
properties.description: Light in color, this good-deal wine presents lime sorbet and chalk on the nose. That green citrus persists on the palate alongside salt, sea shell and barrel smoke.

properties.title: Naia 2013 Las Brisas White (Rueda)
properties.address: Camino San Martín, 47491, Valladolid, Spain
properties.description: Floral, whitefruit aromas are mild on the nose. Citrus, melon and tropical fruit flavors ride on a balanced palate showing brightness without being sharp or scouring. The weighty finish of this Verdejo, Viura, and Sauvignon Blanc blend shows presence but isn't too heavy.

properties.title: Playtime 2013 Blonde Chardonnay (Lake County)
properties.description: Danish pastry aromas lead to flavor nuances of cream, ripe apple and Anjou pear. With a smooth, soft texture and nice sense of layering, it's fresh, not heavy, with just enough acidity to keep it lively.

properties.title: Robert Hall 2013 Viognier (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3443 Mill Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: A pungent perfume of peach arises from this wine, but a flinty character keeps it grounded. The energetic peach-lemonade palate straddles the tension between acidity and rather present tannins for a white wine.

properties.title: Domaine Pommier 2006 Croix aux Moines  (Chablis)
properties.address: 31 Rue de Poinchy, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: Impressively ripe and dense, with maple syrup and citrus characters giving a delicious, full wine. Kiwi and green plum dominate the fruit, while the concentrated underlying structure gives a soft cushion of richness.

properties.title: Loredona 2007 Viognier (Lodi)
properties.description: This is bottled in one of those tall, thin Alsace-type bottles, and while it's technically a dry table wine, it could almost be a dessert wine. There's a sugary edge to the peach, pineapple, honey and wildflower flavors. With crisp acidity, the wine is basically off-dry.

properties.title: Mitolo 2007 Jester Cabernet Sauvignon (McLaren Vale)
properties.address: 141 McMurtrie Rd, McLaren Vale SA 5171, Australia
properties.description: Crisp black cherry and mint aromas burst from the glass, then carry over onto the chunky, authoritative palate before finishing slightly dusty and astringent. This medium-bodied Cabernet features plenty of intensity, it just needs a little time to settle down into a more refined package.

properties.title: Montes 2007 Classic Series Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
properties.description: Good but common as Chilean Cabs go. It's a jumbled mass of bulky fruit, raw power, sweet oak and spice. The mouthfeel is tannic, grabby and big, while the flavors of black cherry and raspberry are nice but generic. Finishes with spice and a hint of hickory. 20,000 cases produced.

properties.title: Aresti 2008 Estate Selection Chardonnay (Curicó Valley)
properties.address: Unnamed Road,, Río Claro, Maule, Chile
properties.description: Here's a simple, standard Chardonnay that is more neutral than anything, but at this level that's really what one should expect. The palate is a touch chunky and warm, with flavors of melon and citrus. And the finish is citric, with a little sugar and also a spot of pithy bitterness.

properties.title: Domaine Pommier 2007  Chablis
properties.description: This tense, crisp wine is all green fruit, very straight, very fresh. Apple, pink grapefruit and almonds come together in a wine that has no complexity, but offers plenty of pleasure.

properties.title: A-Mano 2007 Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)
properties.description: A-Mano delivers a no-fuss Pinot Grigio with a lean mouthfeel and crisp aromas of citrus, peach and grapefruit. Pair this wine with informal snacks or finger foods.

properties.title: Castelluccio 2006 Lunaria Sauvignon Blanc (Forlì)
properties.description: Beautifully packaged and presented, this Sauvignon from the Adriatic flank of Italy offers aromas of exotic fruit, citrus and dried herbs. This expression of the variety is less vibrant than others but does offer an easy, no-fuss approach overall.

properties.title: Ventisquero 2007 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Apalta, Santa Cruz, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: Slightly brambled on the nose, but more than that there's a strong essence of candied fruit, marshmallow and overt sweetness to the bouquet. Once it settles, the wine offers creamy, candied red-fruit flavors and then a sweet, slightly tannic finish. Wide and voluminous, but not overly refined. 25,000 cases made.

properties.title: Marsuret 2014 Rive di Guia  (Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)
properties.address: Via Barch, 17, 31049 Valdobbiadene TV, Italy
properties.description: Alluring scents of wisteria, citrus and white peach lead the nose on this elegant sparkler. The lively palate doles out Bartlett pear and green apple alongside a creamy mousse and vibrant acidity, while a white almond note closes the finish.

properties.title: Navarro 2013 Chardonnay (Mendocino)
properties.description: It's easy to appreciate the buttery aromas, vivid and tangy fruit like crisp apples and Bosc pears, and lively texture with appetizing acidity, elegance and raciness. It's not a big wine but a finely detailed one.

properties.title: Zarate 2013 Balado Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.description: Grassy, mildly sweaty aromas are yeasty and suggest Sauvignon Blanc or Verdejo. A fleshy, pulpy palate is round and solid, while nectarine and melon flavors get a boost from core acidity. A full-flavored, leesy finish is slightly fleshy and plump. Drink now.

properties.title: Col Vetoraz 2014 Dry  (Valdobbiadene Superiore di Cartizze)
properties.address: Str. delle Treziese, 1, 31049 Valdobbiadene TV, Italy
properties.description: Floral scents of rose, acacia and a whiff of white tree fruit lead the way. On the palate, bright acidity lifts up white peach, green apple and lemon drop while a creamy mousse adds softness. It closes on a note of candied citrus zest.

properties.title: Château de Lavernette 2013 Vignes de la roche  (Beaujolais Blanc)
properties.description: Made from hand-harvested Chardonnay from certified biodynamic vineyards, this is a pure, crisply fruited wine. Delicious red apples dominate along with tangy, mineral acidity. As it ages, it will produce a ripe and creamy character. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Chronic Cellars 2013 Stone Fox White (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 2020 Nacimiento Lake Dr, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: This blend of 66% Grenache Blanc and 34% Viognier is almost dessert-like in aromas, conveying lemon candy and browned honey. The palate proves very dry, with flavors of orange-blossom honey, marzipan and lemon, without any perceptible sweetness.

properties.title: Concannon 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 4590 Tesla Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.description: Enticing aromas of blackberry, coffee and roasted fennel in a pork au jus mark the nose. The palate shows dark purple fruits, chai spice and cinnamon latte foam.

properties.title: Corkscrew 2013 Luma Blanc Riesling (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 16 SW Broadway St, Ocala, FL 34471, USA
properties.description: Billed as a Riesling blend, this white has plenty of petrol on the nose to give it intrigue, followed by a dry, crisp and sharp sensibility of grapefruit pith and savory lime.

properties.title: Giribaldi 2012 Matteo Giribaldi Metodo Classico Sparkling (Vino Spumante)
properties.address: Via della Fontana, 1 Bis, 12050 Rodello CN, Italy
properties.description: Delicate scents of white flowers and white orchard fruit lead the nose while the refreshing palate offers yellow apple, lime and lemon pastry. It's crisp and clean, with lively acidity and small vivacious bubbles.

properties.title: Budeguer 2011 Cuatro Mil Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: Ruta Provincial 15 km 31,5, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Aromas of raspberry, blackberry, green herbs and tar set up a blocky, jammy, chunky palate. Plum, raspberry, currant, pepper and oaky flavors are grainy and spicy, while a woody finish tastes resiny, chocolaty and toasty.

properties.title: Cà di Rajo 2014 Cuvée del Fondatore  (Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)
properties.address: Via del Carmine, 2, 31020 Rai TV, Italy
properties.description: Aromas of Spanish broom and peach lead the nose. The vibrant, refreshing palate offers crisp green apple, Bartlett pear and lime alongside bracing acidity tempered by small but invigorating bubbles.

properties.title: Calavera 2014 Dragone Vineyard Albariño (Calaveras County)
properties.address: 11300 Cienega Rd, Hollister, CA 95023, USA
properties.description: An aroma like baking bread and flavors like apricots, butter and almonds combine for a generous taste impression. The texture matches crispness and smoothness, providing good balance. This is dry, light bodied and feels lean while still delivering upbeat flavors.

properties.title: Château Sainte Roseline 2016 Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.description: A ripe yeasty wine in a variation of a classic Provencal skittle bottle, with red fruits and a nutty character. It is fat, full with plenty of citrus fruitiness. With a crisp aftertaste, it is bright at the end.

properties.title: Clos des Amis 2015 Olivelands Vineyards Chardonnay (Ventura County)
properties.address: 20262 S Mountain Rd, Santa Paula, CA 93060, USA
properties.description: Light white peach and apple aromas show off this boutique bottling from one of the few commercial projects in Ventura County. There'a plenty of tension on the palate, with tangy citrus and buttery nut flavors, which ultimately feel a little soft.

properties.title: Collection des Anges 2016 Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: 1086 Rue Bruce, Dunham, QC J0E 1M0, Canada
properties.description: A smooth and soft wine, this is packed with ripe fruit and attractive balanced acidity. There is a layer of caramel as well as spicy raspberry that give the wine extra warmth. Drink now.

properties.title: Domaine de Ménard 2016 Colombard-Sauvignon Colombard-Sauvignon Blanc (Côtes de Gascogne)
properties.address: A Ménard, 32800 Bretagne-d'Armagnac, France
properties.description: Accounting for 60% of the blend, the herbal Colombard beats out the equally herbal Sauvignon Blanc (the remaining 40%) in this light blend. The wine does have a soft side that is expressed in some ripe apple and apricot fruitiness. The wine is fruity, crisp and ready to drink.

properties.title: Estandon 2016 Domaine de Caseneuve Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: 765 Bd Bernard Long, 83170 Brignoles, France
properties.description: This pale wine is light, bright and fruity. It has a tangy edge along with plenty of crisp acidity. The aftertaste is clean, packed with fruitiness with a soft texture.

properties.title: Tug Hill 2014 Cuvée Rosé Sparkling (New York)
properties.description: Bright and cheery, this delicately sweet Marquette sparkling offers loads of fresh forward grapey flavor. It's a simple and straightforward wine but briskly composed.

properties.title: Valentin Bianchi 2016 Elsa Bianchi Torrontés (Mendoza)
properties.address: Ruta 143 y calle Valentín San Rafael Mendoza AR, Bianchi, M5600 BCJ, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Gritty citrus aromas are dialed down. This feels racy and fairly well balanced. Mild but fresh flavors of lime, lychee and tropical fruits finish citrusy and collected. This is nothing special, but it's true and good for Torrontés.

properties.title: Valle dell'Acate 2016 Zagrà Grillo (Sicilia)
properties.description: This crisp, refreshing wine opens with subtle white flower, orchard fruit and wet stone aromas. The bright, simple palate offers citrus, peach and saline hints.

properties.title: William Hill Estate 2015 Chardonnay (North Coast)
properties.address: 1761 Atlas Peak Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Vanilla aromas and sweet butter and baked apple flavors make this medium-bodied wine appealing and easy to enjoy. The acidity is very light, and the texture soft.

properties.title: Adirondack Winery 2015 Barrel Aged Adirondack Overlook Chardonnay (New York)
properties.description: Slightly dusty oak tones of dill, vanilla and sweet spice accentuate the maturity of this barrel-aged Chardonnay. It's a full bodied, densely textured wine with lingering flavors of dried apple and pear. Drink now.

properties.title: Antica Hirpinia 2015  Fiano di Avellino
properties.description: This wine's nose is initially quite shy, releasing a whiff of Mediterranean herb with some air. The simple palate offers citrus and a saline flavors while crisp acidity gives it a fresh finish.

properties.title: Atwater 2014 Dry Middle Block One Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 5055 NY-414, Burdett, NY 14818, USA
properties.description: Crisp pears and apples abound in this light-bodied dry Riesling. It's delicate in concentration but pleasantly lemony. The wine finishes briskly but freshly.

properties.title: Buttonwood Grove 2015 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.description: Delicate hints of crushed mineral and white flower linger in this dry appley Riesling. Soft acidity lends a slightly broad, flat feel to the palate but the finish is clean and crisp.

properties.title: Château de Brigue 2016 Les Meyans Elégance Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: 2 Place Louis Pasteur, 83340 Le Luc, France
properties.description: The Cinsault that dominates this blend creates a light and gently fruity wine. It has attractive acidity and just the lightest of red-fruit flavors. The aftertaste is soft and tangy with orange zest.

properties.title: Château de Saint-Martin 2016 Eternelle Favorite Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: Rte des Arcs, 83460 Taradeau, France
properties.description: This Provence cru classé estate has produced a refreshingly fruity wine. With its red-currant and citrus flavors and tight mineral acidity, it is both textured and really crisp. Drink now.

properties.title: Château Pigoudet 2016 Pigoudet Première Rosé (Coteaux d'Aix-en-Provence)
properties.address: Route de Jouques, 83560 Rians, France
properties.description: The wine comes from a large estate east of Aix-en-Provence. With its light fruitiness and attractive acidity, the wine is ripe with red-berry fruits and finishes with a fine crisp aftertaste. The wine is refreshing and very drinkable now.

properties.title: Clos des Amis 2016 Rosé (Ventura County)
properties.description: This pink blend of Mourvèdre and Grenache shows rosy aromas as well as a bitter orange scent and yeasty qualities. The palate is light in both flavor and texture but makes for a refreshing hot day sipper.

properties.title: Collavini 2015 Pinot Grigio (Collio)
properties.address: Via della Ribolla Gialla, 2, 33040, 33040 Corno di Rosazzo UD, Italy
properties.description: This straightforward white has a shy nose, while the lean, simple palate suggests green apple and lemon. Firm acidity gives it a crisp, refreshing finish.

properties.title: Damiani 2015 Bollicini Sparkling (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 4704 NY-414, Burdett, NY 14818, USA
properties.description: Blossomy in perfume, this Prosecco-inspired Finger Lakes sparkling offers fresh fruity citrus and red-apple flavors. It's softer and looser in petillance than wines made with Damiani's traditional method of bottling but striking acidity lends bold upright structure. Drink now.

properties.title: Demetria 2014 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 6701 Foxen Canyon Rd, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.description: Key lime and honeysuckle scents show on the nose of this bottling. Pithy green apple flavors and tightly wound tension mark the palate, finishing rather short.

properties.title: Domaine de la Sanglière 2016 La Sanglière Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: 3886 Rte de Léoube, 83230 Bormes-les-Mimosas, France
properties.description: Softly fruity, the wine is warm and with gentle red-fruit flavors. It is an easy-quaffing style with just the right amount of acidity and a light caramel and spice aftertaste. Drink now.

properties.title: Domaine D'en Ségur 2016 Le Rosé (Côtes du Tarn)
properties.description: This is a soft and fruity wine. It has gentle acidity and a ripe blend of Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc. The wine, with its strawberry flavor, is immediately attractive. Drink now.

properties.title: Domaine Guillaman 2016 Les Pierres Blanches White (Côtes de Gascogne)
properties.address: A Guillaman, 32330 Gondrin, France
properties.description: Dominated by crisply herbal Colombard, this is a light and fruity wine typical of the Gascony region. With citrus, red currant and orange-zest flavors, it is bright, breezy and ready to drink immediately.

properties.title: Bodega Zafado 2015 Chardonnay (Mendoza)
properties.address: 457 S Algiers St, Murphys, CA 95247, USA
properties.description: Resiny oak sticks out, while the palate is grabby and sticky in feel. This tastes like lemony pushcart hotdogs and the briny water they sit in, followed by a woody, low-fruit finish.

properties.title: Del Rio 2013 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Rogue Valley)
properties.address: 52 N River Rd, Gold Hill, OR 97525, USA
properties.description: Tannic and earthy, this is dominated by the scents and flavors of dried mushrooms. There are hints of fruit leather, and not much else.

properties.title: Twisted Cedar 2013 Moscato (Clarksburg)
properties.description: This medium-bodied and sugary tasting wine has lots of apple and pear flavors. The texture is soft and the finish very sweet.

properties.title: Fillaboa 2013 Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.description: Mature mealy apricot aromas lead to a spent palate with unfocused cidery flavors that taste old and demanding. This finishes heavy, pulpy and without much point or pleasure. Albariño is meant to be fresh and friendly, but this is neither.

properties.title: Peñascal 2014 Sauvignon Blanc (Vino de la Tierra de Castilla y León)
properties.description: Aromas of canned peas and beans indicate this was probably fresher smelling nine months ago. Zesty and solid on the palate, this tastes oily, pyrazinic and briny, with stone fruit notes.

properties.title: Quinta do Casal Monteiro 2014 Terra de Touros Arinto (Tejo)
properties.description: A gentle light wine that seems diluted. It has only hints of fruit and acidity, all very easy and ripe to drink. The wine is ready.

properties.title: Hinman 2014 Pinot Gris (Oregon)
properties.address: 27012 Briggs Hill Rd, Eugene, OR 97405, USA
properties.description: This wine has a perceptible tawny tone despite its youth, and the scents also seem to suggest that the wine is slightly oxidized. Whiffs of sherry and apple cider lead into a soft, flat, rather dull palate of nondescript fruit.

properties.title: Castro Martin 2013 A2O Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.address: Rúa Puxafeita, 3, 36636 Ribadumia, Pontevedra, Spain
properties.description: Melon, apple and peach pit aromas are dusty but that's about it. This feels flat, with little acidity or kick. Flavors of peach and apple cider end similarly, with no vitality to the finish.

properties.title: Quady 2014 Electra Moscato (California)
properties.description: This smells heavily of grape skins, and tastes like golden raisins. The texture is slightly fizzy and very thick, and the flavors are very sweet.

properties.title: Valdelainos 2014 Verdejo (Rueda)
properties.description: This is an underripe stench bomb with pyrazines coming at you from every direction. The nose is like a bowl of cactus and nettle, while the palate is harsh. Flavors of bitter pithy grapefruit show all that can go wrong with this variety.

properties.title: Wines & Winemakers 2014 Companhia das Lezírias Herdade de Catapereiro Rosé (Tejo)
properties.address: 701 W 11th St, Coffeyville, KS 67337, USA
properties.description: A strange orange-pink color for a wine that is somewhere between fruity and sweet and acid and bitter. This one hasn't found a balance.

properties.title: Vega Sindoa 2014 Chardonnay (Navarra)
properties.address: 2 Commerce Dr # 3, Moorestown, NJ 08057, USA
properties.description: Stalky and foul on the nose, this Chardonnay doesn't smell inviting. Oily and heavy on the palate, this tastes of resiny oak, related cream and bland white fruits.

properties.title: Campelo 2014 Rosé (Vinho Verde)
properties.description: Soft and sweet, this is a light and fruity wine. Touches of raspberry are balanced by acidity. Drink now.

properties.title: Trailhead 2009 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Polished and flavorful, and a good price for this wealth of creamy pineapples, limes and peaches. Really rich all the way through to the spicy finish.

properties.title: Upland Estates 2008 Old Vine Cabernet Sauvignon (Snipes Mountain)
properties.description: If you are looking for elegant, moderate (13.7%) alcohol and old vine Cabernet flavors, here is your wine. Astringent tannins and lightly herbal, earthy undertones set the stage for the complex midpalate. No fruit dominates, but rather a mix of cranberry and rhubarb, strawberry and pomegranate, along with streaks of caramel from aging in American oak.

properties.title: Guenoc 2009 Chardonnay (Lake County)
properties.description: A light-colored, lemon-zesty, cool-vintage Chardonnay that's fruit forward but has great balance and finish, light on the tongue and easygoing all around. With stone fruit and a hint of vanilla, this affordable white should also be fairly easy to find (almost 4,000 cases made) and a successful pairing with a range of lighter salads and seafood dishes.

properties.title: Villa Maria 2010 Cellar Selection Dry Riesling (Marlborough)
properties.description: At 7.5 g/L of residual sugar, this is more off-dry than dry, but the acidity is high enough to provide a sense of crispness. In this plump, medium-bodied Riesling, peach and citrus strike a fine balance, ending with a dollop of lime sherbet. Drink now–2018.

properties.title: Taft Street 2010 Sauvignon Blanc (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 2030 Barlow Ln, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.description: A clean, bone-dry Sauvignon Blanc with plenty of mouthwatering acidity to get those tastebuds whistling. It has polished flavors of lemons, limes, grapefruits, vanilla and white pepper. Good value.

properties.title: William Hill Estate 2007 Bench Blend Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1761 Atlas Peak Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Still gritty in tannins at nearly four years of age, but very rich in fruit, showing concentrated blackberry, currant, cassis and mineral flavors, accented with sweet, smoky cedar wood. The mouthfeel is elegant on this dry, complex wine, which should be decanted.

properties.title: Domaine Costa Lazaridi 2009 Amethystos Rosé (Drama)
properties.address: 2nd km Kapandriti Kalamos road, Kapandriti, 19014, Kapandriti 190 14, Greece
properties.description: Vanilla, strawberry and cherry on the nose leads into a spicy but balanced blend of fresh and fruity flavors. The wine offers ample minerality so it's clean on the tongue. Delightful and flirty, and good with fruit desserts.

properties.title: Yellow Tail 2009 Reserve Chardonnay (South Eastern Australia)
properties.address: 1471 Wakley Rd, Yenda NSW 2681, Australia
properties.description: Round and lush, with boldly oaky notes of caramelized nuts and vanilla accenting tropical fruit. Drink now.

properties.title: Yorkville Cellars 2010 Randle Hill Vineyard Sémillon (Yorkville Highlands)
properties.address: 25701 CA-128, Yorkville, CA 95494, USA
properties.description: A subtle Sémillon that would make for a delightful apéritif or pair expertly with seafood, its crème brûlée and citrus—mostly grapefruit and lime—go easy on the tongue.

properties.title: Cartograph 2010 Floodgate Vineyard Gewürztraminer (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: This is a nice, crisp and properly varietal Gewürztraminer. It's dryish to semi-sweet, with pleasant citrus fruit, lychee, green apple and honeysuckle flavors, liberally spiced. There's no oak at all.

properties.title: Cerro Prieto 2008 Paso Bordo Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 21700 Baja California, Mexico
