properties.description: This ripe, rich wine can't quite get around its alcohol level, which is 15.8%. That gives it some heat, as well as a sweetness that makes the blackberries, cherries and raspberries taste like jam. Earns points for the clean, unapologetic interpretation of Paso Robles fruit.

properties.title: Château La Dournie 2009 La Dournie Red (Saint-Chinian)
properties.address: LA DOURNIE, 34360 Saint-Chinian, France
properties.description: This blend of 60% Syrah, 25% Grenache and 15% Carignan offers prominent wild gamy notes framed by aromas of ripe berry compote, crushed violets and soft, lush mocha creaminess. The palate is elegant and fruit-driven, with the soft spice accents unfolding on the finish.

properties.title: Chateau Montelena 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Starts out fine and impressive, but as this wine breathes a certain imbalance emerges. There's a green unripeness to the blackberries and cherries, although the wine does exhibit fine tannins and a balanced approach to oak. Drink now.

properties.title: Domaine de Nizas 2010 Rosé (Coteaux du Languedoc)
properties.description: Composed of 40% Syrah, 40% Grenache and 20% Mourvèdre, this fruit-forward rosé offers powerful notes of ripe red berries framed with a candied orange peel and watermelon sweetness. Fleshy on the palate with a full texture and body.

properties.title: Domaine Sainte-Eugénie 2009 Red (Corbières)
properties.description: This wine needs some time to open up after pouring to fully express itself. With time, rich notes of black currant, brambly berry and black cherry grace the nose and mouth, with a touch of licorice root and espesso unfolding after swallow.

properties.title: Domaines Barons de Rothschild (Lafite) 2010 Los Vascos Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Pres. Alvear 151, M5504 ABH, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Solid and sturdy up front, with earthy berry and cassis aromas. Feels lively and a bit grabby, with plenty of red fruit in the plum and berry range. Finishes with a hint of smoky oak and toast. A good wine from a cool vintage.

properties.title: G. Moulinier 2009 Tradition Red (Saint-Chinian)
properties.address: 170 Lyle Snowden Rd, Lyle, WA 98635, USA
properties.description: Wild barnyard notes dance among the rich dark fruit and berry core. Garrigue and bramble accents add more character to the smooth and silky mouth, while the medium finish lands on a softly oak-kissed flavor. Drink now.

properties.title: Hogue 2010 Late Harvest Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: Labeled late harvest, but not terribly sweet, this includes small amounts of Muscat, Gewürztraminer and Chenin Blanc in the blend. Lemony with both citrus rind and sweet candy flavors, it's a useful, off-dry wine with a slightly sugary finish.

properties.title: Stag's Leap Wine Cellars 2013 Artemis Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 5766 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: A bold, leathery and savory wine, this offers dark chocolate and black pepper within a soft layering of full-bodied approachability and ripe, red berry and currant.

properties.title: K Vintners 2014 Powerline Viognier (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 820 Mill Creek Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: Coming off the winery's estate vineyard, this wine displays vibrant aromas of toast, honeysuckle and orange peel. The palate is rich and oily in feel, showing a mixture of fruit and barrel, with the latter not quite seeming to have fully integrated.

properties.title: King Estate 2015 Chardonnay (Oregon)
properties.description: This light and well-made wine drinks easily and tastes just as clean and fresh as you would expect from this Oregon producer. It's crisp and inviting, with a solid structure revolving around green apple fruit and fine details of just-picked herbs.

properties.title: Manzwine 2014 Dona Fátima White (Lisboa)
properties.description: Only recently identified, the Jampal is a rare and ancient local grape from the western Lisboa area, close to the ocean. It produces a crisp, tight and mineral-textured wine. This example is fresh, lively and bright with sliced apple and lime flavors and a fruity aftertaste. It is ready to drink.

properties.title: Beckmen 2014 Cuvée Le Bec Red (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 2670 Ontiveros Rd, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.description: This is a great everyday wine, with well-integrated aromas of pressed boysenberry, dried black cherry, black pepper and a touch of asphalt. Blueberry, beef crust, soy and pepper converge on the palate. The wine is smooth enough to work with a variety of dishes but packed with enough action to serve alone as well.

properties.title: Cadaretta 2015 SBS Semillon-Sauvignon Blanc (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: Sauvignon Blanc makes up a full 89% of this blend. It offers light aromas of melon, grass, tropical fruit and citrus that are followed by tart zingy flavors, with the concentration seeming a bit light.

properties.title: Campolargo 2015 Branco Barrica Arinto (Bairrada)
properties.address: bairro 3780, Estr. São Lourenço do Bairro 43, 3780, Portugal
properties.description: The typical citrus and bright fruits of the Arinto grape shine in this wine. It is lively and fruity with pear and kiwi flavors. A touch of wood adds a richer side to the wine. Drink now.

properties.title: Vins El Cep 2011 Claror Gran Reserva Brut Nature Sparkling (Cava)
properties.description: Briny apple and nectarine aromas are within the proper framework of brut nature. Citric and stone-fruit acidity makes for a racy palate, while this tastes mostly of peach and nectarine along with some salt and brine. A firm finish is acidic and dry.

properties.title: McFadden 2015 Blue Quail Pinot Gris (Potter Valley)
properties.description: A tangy feeling on the palate makes this light-bodied wine especially refreshing. It has appley, floral aromas and flavors, good acidity and a clean, bracing texture.

properties.title: Migration 2014 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 1451 Stanly Ln, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.description: While most of this wine was fermented in French oak, a small percentage was held back in stainless steel. It finds a happy middle ground between creamy oak, even a touch of reduction, and a brightness of green apple and Jolly Rancher. It offers medium-bodied richness.

properties.title: Monte Volpe 2014 Pinot Grigio (Mendocino County)
properties.description: This medium-bodied wine smells sweet but tastes dry. Vivid fruit aromas and flavors, and a lively, tangy mouthfeel add lots of personality. It smells like apples and honey and tastes like crisp apples and citrus.

properties.title: Vionta 2006 Estate Bottled Single Vineyard Limited Release Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.address: Parroquia de Simes, Lugar Axis s/n, 36968 Meaño, Pontevedra, Spain
properties.description: Vionta aims for the racy, lively style of Albariño, and for the most part it nails it. Aromas of peach and nectarine are youthful and pure, while the flavors of apple, peach and lime are pleasant. Not over the top but instead it achieves balance and ease. Imported by Freixenet, USA.

properties.title: Sumarroca 2005 Brut Nature Gran Reserva Cava Sparkling (Penedès)
properties.address: Barrio El Rebato Crta. de Sant Sadurní a Gelida, km. 15, 08739 Barcelona, Spain
properties.description: Dry, pure and attractive on the nose, with crisp apple and lemon-lime flavors. This wine performs on an even keel from start to finish, and it's dry, tangy and correct as far as brut nature cavas go. Verges on elegant.

properties.title: Clos du Val 2005 Reserve Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 5330 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: This big Chardonnay, which was entirely barrel fermented, is tasting a bit too oaky. It was sourced from the winery's estate Carneros vineyard and shows that appellation's crisp acids, along with bright tropical fruit and spice flavors. But the sweet, charry vanilla and caramel from barrels tends to dominate.

properties.title: Astoria 2006 Casa Vittorino 20 Anni Dry  (Prosecco di Conegliano e Valdobbiadene)
properties.description: The nose here is deeply redolent of fresh fruit with distinct tones of peach, apricot, citrus, Granny Smith apple and pear. Additional complexity is added by background tones of spring flowers, almond and baked biscuits.

properties.title: DFJ Vinhos 2006 Alvarinho-Chardonnay White (Estremadura)
properties.address: 2070-681 Vila Chã de Ourique, Portugal
properties.description: In his continual quest for unusual blends, DFJ winemaker José Neiva has come up with this mix of the Vinho Verde grape Alvarinho and Chardonnay. When it is young, as here, the fresh, crisp Alvarinho dominates, giving lively, vibrant green-fruit flavors. Some weight underneath hints at the Chardonnay.

properties.title: Frei Brothers 2005 Reserve Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 2018 Frei Bros Winery Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Polished and sophisticated, with lush green apple, pineapple, buttered toast and cinnamon flavors. Likeable for its balance and sheer drinkability.

properties.title: J. Lohr 2005 Arroyo Seco Vineyard Chardonnay (Arroyo Seco)
properties.address: 6169 Airport Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Barrel-fermented and aged on the lees, this Burgundian-style Chard is creamy and rich in ripe tropical fruit flavors and new oak. It's a big wine, forward in pineapple and mango flavors that are honey-ripe and crisp.

properties.title: Mesa 2006 Opale  (Vermentino di Sardegna)
properties.description: Packaged in an elegant but very heavy bottle, this Vermentino from Sardinia offers fruity aromas of peach and nectarine backed by good length and consistency. Pair this refreshing wine with shellfish or spaghetti con vongole.

properties.title: Naia 2006 Naiades Verdejo (Rueda)
properties.address: Camino San Martín, 47491, Valladolid, Spain
properties.description: Definitely a particular wine, meaning it's fully oaked and probably not for everyone. But if you don't mind full-out barrel notes on your citrusy Verdejo, then you should like it. There's honey, toast, popcorn, pepper and vanilla aromas and flavors, all courtesy of barrel fermentation. It's also smooth and clean, with good core acidity and balance. Nice wine; not Burgundy; not for all palates.

properties.title: Naia 2007 Las Brisas White (Rueda)
properties.description: In cooler vintages like 2007, this white blend from Bodegas Naia excels. It gets going with pear, apple and light, leesy aromas in front of a citrusy palate that is a knock-off for varietal Sauvignon Blanc. Flavors of grapefruit, lime and gooseberry should be familiar, and the crisp fresh-lettuce finish is a winner. Good stuff for the money.

properties.title: Tarapaca 2008 La Isla Gran Reserva Sauvignon Blanc (Leyda Valley)
properties.description: Tomato leaf and nettle aromas join with grapefruit and tropical fruit. This is both more pungent and rounder than the Reserva, with greater concentration and verve.

properties.title: W.H. Smith 2006 Piedra Hill Vineyard Bronze Label Cabernet Sauvignon (Howell Mountain)
properties.description: A very nice, elegant and complex Cab, showing firm mountain tannins that give a somewhat dry astringency to the rather sweet cherry, blackberry, mocha and cedar flavors. Its future is hard to predict. Now through 2010.

properties.title: Arnaldo Caprai 2006 Grecante Grechetto (Colli Martani)
properties.address: Località Torre, 1, 06036 Montefalco PG, Italy
properties.description: Caprai's luminous Grechetto from central Italy is full-bodied and opulent and offers layers of honey, stone fruit, yellow rose and vanilla cream. The wine has power and persistency thanks to its natural density and richness.

properties.title: Clos La Chance 2005 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
properties.address: 1 Hummingbird Ln, San Martin, CA 95046, USA
properties.description: Extraordinarily ripe, this Cab erupts with pie-filling blackberry, cherry, currant and chocolate flavors. It's not exactly sweet, but seems so, especially with the caramelized oak coating. Drink now with a grilled steak.

properties.title: Domaine des Corbillières 2007 Sauvignon Sauvignon Blanc (Touraine)
properties.description: Classic, intensely herbaceous and grassy, this is fine cool-climate Sauvignon Blanc. It keeps some restraint as the fresh grapefruit flavors soften out midpalate. The final flavor, though, is full-on asparagus and green fruits.

properties.title: Domaine Gibault 2007 Sauvignon Blanc (Touraine)
properties.description: Fruity, with delicious apricot flavors and some weight from aging on the lees, this is a ripe, full-bodied Sauvignon Blanc. It is full of boundless fruit and fresh acidity and finishes rich but crisp.

properties.title: Fairhope 2006 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 323 De La Mare Ave A, Fairhope, AL 36532, USA
properties.description: A solid Cabernet. Ripe, tannic and well-oaked, it displays a range of blackberry, currant, cedar and spice flavors, girded with a firm minerality. Dry and balanced, it's a bit astringent and young now, and could develop interesting bottle complexities.

properties.title: Felipe Rutini 2007 Chardonnay (Mendoza)
properties.address: Km 10.5, RP89, Tupungato, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Simple but fresh, with mild lemon and melon aromas propped up by a kiss of oak. The palate is plump, fruity and melony, with toasted corn and baked apple nuances. Comes together well.

properties.title: Feudo Arancio 2006 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sicilia)
properties.description: Feudo Arancio consistently delivers Best Buy value wines and this dense Cabernet Sauvignon is no exception. Aromas include big berry fruit, cherry, spice, mineral and dried herbs. It has good complexity overall with a gritty, raw texture.

properties.title: Finca El Origen 2007 Reserva Torrontés (Cafayate)
properties.address: Unnamed Road, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: The best wine in the El Origen portfolio is this Torrontés from northerly Cafayate. It's true to the blueprint, showing fresh lychee, honeydew and acacia aromas, which are followed by lemon-lime flavors, green-herb notes and a touch of citrus pith. Drink now to enjoy this one's lingering tropical freshness. Imported by Carolina Wine Brands USA.

properties.title: Fog Alley 2007 Unoaked Chardonnay (Central Coast)
properties.address: 2620 Dakota Ave, South Sioux City, NE 68776, USA
properties.description: Tastes like it comes from Edna Valley, with its dryness, great burst of juicy acidity and jammy Mandarin orange, lime, kiwi and Meyer lemon flavors. Great with crab cakes dressed in a mango salsa.

properties.title: Buehler 2013 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 820 Greenfield Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: The producer takes a hands-off approach to its wines. In this case the tactic may not have paid off, the wine muted, dull and slightly sour. The acidity veers in the wrong direction vis-a-vis the fruit, which suggests tart green apple and lemon.

properties.title: Eterna Juventud 2013 Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.description: Aromas of canned peaches and children's vitamins lack appeal. This feels fleshy and far from precise, with a mix of oxidized white-fruit and bitter flavors that leads to a mealy finish.

properties.title: Corvidae 2013 Wise Guy Sauvignon Blanc (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 309 Gangl Rd, Wapato, WA 98951, USA
properties.description: This lightly aromatic wine offers notes of herbs and kiwi. The flavors and acid seem dilute.

properties.title: Serenity 2013 Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
properties.description: Intensely smoky aromas seep through the palate of this unusual Chardonnay. Fresh apple and lemon flavors are pleasant, but overwhelmed by savory nut and smoke tones.

properties.title: Stina's 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Wahluke Slope)
properties.address: Fircrest, WA 98466, USA
properties.description: This lightly volatile wine shows notes of cherry cola, dried fruit and woodspice. It doesn't drink entirely dry with the alcohol riding high on the medicine-cabinet flavors.

properties.title: Avelina 2012 Ringer White (North Coast)
properties.description: With very neutral aromas and flavors, this medium-bodied and reasonably crisp wine will be fine for everyday meals. Made from 60% Chardonnay and 40% Viognier, it is quiet and subdued. .

properties.title: Two Mountain 2011 Brothers Reserve Chardonnay Copeland Vineyard Chardonnay (Rattlesnake Hills)
properties.description: Barrel notes of burnt popcorn and char overtake any varietal aromas on this wine. Flavors seem quite light accented by a lightly creamy feel.

properties.title: Finca Los Olmos 2014 Wise Ass Chardonnay (Maipú)
properties.address: 21301 Kathy Ln, Spicewood, TX 78669, USA
properties.description: Flower and hay aromas lead to simple pear and spice flavors in this basic white. Mild woody notes show on the finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Fujishin 2013 Reserve Viognier
properties.description: Notes of ash partner with white pepper, herbs and peach. This wine is very light in style without the concentration to stand it up.

properties.title: Cascade Ridge 2013 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: Aromas on this wine are faint with notes of soda water, vanilla and peach. The stone-fruit flavors seem washed out and dilute.

properties.title: Alias 2013 Chardonnay (California)
properties.address: 26150 Asti Rd, Cloverdale, CA 95425, USA
properties.description: This is a basic white wine with a few quirks. It smells floral and appley, and tastes quite dry and a bit sharp while carrying a candylike marshmallow note.

properties.title: Jaffelin 2010 Les Chapitres de Jaffelin  (Bourgogne)
properties.address: 2 Rue Paradis, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: Round and softly fruity, this white Burgundy comes with a hint of vanilla. With its ripe apple, lime and yellow fruit flavors, it's instantly drinkable. The finish is touched by acidity.

properties.title: Gentilini 2010 Cellar Selection Robola (Cephalonia)
properties.address: Argostoli-Airport rd, Minia 281 00, Greece
properties.description: Notes of orange and lemon preserves on the nose lead into flavors of orange, lemon and vanilla on the palate. It finishes with a touch of spice.

properties.title: Domaine Luquet 2011  Mâcon-Fuissé
properties.address: 101 Rue du Bourg, 71960 Fuissé, France
properties.description: Initially closed, this wine soon reveals a crisp, zesty texture and flavors of citrus and green apple. With its minerally character, Mâcon-Fuissé is a sort of poor man's Pouilly-Fuissé, although it often shows more softness.

properties.title: Domaine Vrignaud 2011  Chablis
properties.description: Soft and ripe, this Chablis has white fruit and citrus flavors. The palate reveals a yeasty character that intrudes on the fresh fruit.

properties.title: Fonterenza 2011 Rosa di Fonterenza Rosato (Toscana)
properties.address: Localita' Podere Fonterenza, 99, 53024 Sant'Angelo In Colle SI, Italy
properties.description: This organic, Sangiovese-based rosato opens with subtle tones of raspberry and citrus. The palate has a slender feel.

properties.title: Barra of Mendocino 2010 Chardonnay (Mendocino)
properties.address: 7051 N State St, Redwood Valley, CA 95470, USA
properties.description: This is a light, bright Chardonnay that would be a great wine to serve at casual dining situations or at larger gatherings. The finish bears an acidic kick

properties.title: Cookies & Cream 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
properties.address: Fawn Creek Township, KS 67301, USA
properties.description: Dry and tannic, this has adequate blackberry, currant and oak flavors.

properties.title: Domaine Luquet 2011 Les Mulots  (Mâcon-Villages)
properties.address: 101 Rue du Bourg, 71960 Fuissé, France
properties.description: Soft and simple, this has a pear flavor, a touch of vanilla and a creamy texture, plus crisp, lemon-zest-like acidity on the finish. Drink this now.

properties.title: Januik 2015 Cold Creek Vineyard Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: This wine offers light pear, citrus, cream and lees aromas. The palate is broad and lightly creamy in feel, lacking only a bit of concentration.

properties.title: Kestrel 2016 Falcon Series Viognier (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 19501 144th Ave NE C-900, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: Bright melon and lime zest aromas lead to lightly sweet, broad, fleshy fruit flavors in this wine. It's not entirely representative of the variety but still brings a lot of freshness and appeal.

properties.title: Kingston Family 2016 CJ's Barrel Sauvignon Blanc (Casablanca Valley)
properties.description: Aromas of field greens and wax bean are restrained on the nose. This has a round palate with citric acidity. Flavors of briny green fruits finish slightly closed and bitter. This wine reflects the 2016 vintage which was a cloudy, wet one in Casablanca.

properties.title: L. Tramier & Fils 2015 Collection  (Viré-Clessé)
properties.address: 14 Rue de Chamerose, 71640 Mercurey, France
properties.description: This ripe, smooth and lightly toasty wine is a rich product of this warm vintage for whites. Yellow and ripe melon fruits are balanced by sufficient crisp acidity to give the wine a bright edge. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Louis Max 2016  Mâcon-Milly Lamartine
properties.description: Wood and spice aromas lead to wood and rich yellow-fruit flavors, creating a warm character that's immediately attractive. With final acidity, this tangy wine is well balanced. Drink now.

properties.title: Michael Mondavi Family Estate 2014 Emblem Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 7801 St Helena Hwy, Oakville, CA 94562, USA
properties.description: This weighty wine has small percentages of Petit Verdot, Petite Syrah, Merlot and Zinfandel, contributing to robust and impactful tannins and ripe fruit. Juicy and approachable on the palate, it highlights touches of tar and clove.

properties.title: Milbrandt 2015 Pinot Gris (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 707 US-2 unit d, Leavenworth, WA 98826, USA
properties.description: This shows light lime, green apple and herb aromas. It drinks dry, with abundant apple flavors supported by tart acidity.

properties.title: Miner 2016 Viognier (California)
properties.description: Stainless-steel fermented, this wine is made from grapes grown in Paso Robles and Lodi and is intensely concentrated. Pretty aromatics of honeysuckle open up before thick rich layers of lushly ripe peach flavor ride in.

properties.title: Muga 2016 White (Rioja)
properties.description: Spiced apple and light oak aromas are clean and attractive. This wine feels racy and pure, with good acidic kick. Flavors of nectarine and wood are compatible, while this barrel-fermented Viura (with 10% Malvasia) is solid on the finish.

properties.title: Municipal Winemakers 2016 Debra Blush Wine Rosé (California)
properties.description: Winemaker Dave Potter heads to his old haunting grounds around Rancho Cucamonga to source fruit for this fun bottling, which shows wet soil and sour cherries on the nose. The palate is very down the middle and built to please, with flavors of cherry and baking spice.

properties.title: Pierre Chardigny 2015 Les Cornillaux  (Saint-Véran)
properties.address: 90 Chemin du Creux du Vic, 71570 Leynes, France
properties.description: Wood and spice flavors add extra richness to an already-ripe wine. Opulent and full, it's laced with toast and warm mango and peach fruits. A wine to drink young, it's ready now.

properties.title: Rabble 2016 Mossfire Ranch Rosé (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3090 Anderson Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: A pale pink in the glass, this light and clean bottling shows aromas of chalk, pink flowers, watermelon and a slice of lime. It's crisp on the sip with a tight texture, offering a very quaffable bubblegum flavor.

properties.title: SeaGlass 2016 Rosé (Monterey County)
properties.address: Westport Winery Garden Resort, 1 S Arbor Rd, Aberdeen, WA 98520, USA
properties.description: This is a great option for a widely available and affordable rosé. A very pretty pink in color, it shows baked strawberry, rose petals and vanilla ice cream on the nose. The sip tightens around cherry and strawberry-brioche flavors.

properties.title: Suertes del Marqués 2015 Trenzado White
properties.address: Unnamed Road, 38315, 38315, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain
properties.description: Hailing from the volcanic soils of Tenerife in the Canary Islands, this blend of Pedro Ximénez and Listán Blanco opens with aromas of citrus peel and honey. A powerful palate is angular and smacking. Salty citrus flavors reflect an ocean influence, while the wine is strong on the finish.

properties.title: Sylvaine et Alain Normand 2016  Mâcon La Roche Vineuse
properties.address: 10 Allée en Darèze, 71960 La Roche-Vineuse, France
properties.description: Ripe fruit aromas show alongside an equally rich, creamy palate. This wine has attractive lemon and crisp apple flavors, touched by wood to give a smooth, rich aftertaste. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Terra d'Oro 2016 Chenin Blanc-Viognier (Clarksburg)
properties.address: 20680 Shenandoah School Rd, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.description: This is a light and easy-sipping wine. Floral, apple and lightly herbaceous aromas lead to generous fruit flavors like Pippin apples and white peaches while a good balance of crispness and richness shapes the mouthfeel.

properties.title: True Myth 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.description: This widely available bottling by the Niven family is a very safe and reliable expression of Cab, with black plums, crushed slate, a touch of oak, some purple flowers and a little soy on the nose. The palate is also down the middle, with earth, wood and dark fruit all present, framed by strong acidity and firm but not overwhelming tannins.

properties.title: Umani Ronchi 2009 Casal di Serra Vecchie Vigne  (Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico Superiore)
properties.description: Using fruit sourced from old vines, Umani Ronchi flexes its creative muscle with this beautiful white wine. It is fermented in stainless steel and cement for 10 months, an elaborate process that adds softness and creaminess to the finish. It also renders enduring aromas of apricot and vanilla custard.

properties.title: Domaine Bott-Geyl 2010 Les Eléments Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 1 Rue du Petit Château, 68980 Beblenheim, France
properties.description: A rich concentration of honey and botrytis gives this wine balanced sweetness. Full bodied and ripe, this has a spice character that is well contained with serious flavors of mineral and almond.

properties.title: Domaine Viticole de la Ville de Colmar 2009 Hengst Grand Cru Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.winery: Domaine Viticole de la Ville de Colmar
properties.address: 2 Rue du Stauffen, 68000 Colmar, France
properties.description: This dry, spicy wine has its white fruit flavor layered over attractive acidity. It feels firm, and its flavors of almond and lychee are balanced with an austere structure. Give this wine at least three years.

properties.title: Doyenne 2011 Rosé (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 14300 NE 145th St Suite 101, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: Vibrant, coppery salmon in color, this lively and delightful rosé is two-thirds Grenache and one-third Mourvèdre, all stainless steel-fermented. Pretty watermelon and strawberry flavors are accented by streaks of cracker and mineral.

properties.title: Dürnberg 2011 Rosenberg Select Riesling (Niederösterreich)
properties.description: This intensely aromatic wine has perfumes of peach, apricot and ripe plum. These fruits dominate the warm, ripe palate, with just a hint of minerality.

properties.title: Falcone 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3572 Old Tyler Rd, Red Wing, MN 55066, USA
properties.description: This delicious wine shows Paso ripeness in the form of blackberry, cherry, anise and chocolate, with soft tannins and just enough acidity to balance the richness. The cool vintage played a part here, giving the wine long hangtime flavors while keeping the alcohol level low.

properties.title: Freemark Abbey 2011 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Sweet tangerine, tropical fruit and honey flavors mark this Chardonnay. It was wise on the winemaker's part to avoid the malolactic fermentation, because the fresh apple acidity livens up the richness. With a touch of buttered toast from new oak barrels, it's a savory wine to drink now.

properties.title: Freemark Abbey 2011 Viognier (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Very rich in tropical fruit, orange, apricot, lime, Asian pear and honey flavors, this tastes like an orchard in a glass. It's so powerful in fruity essence that it tastes sweet until the finish, which turns nicely dry and crisp in acidity. It defines Viogner's exotic, unctuous side. Nice now with today's modern Asian fusion fare.

properties.title: Adams Bench 2009 Artz and Shaw Red Mountain Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 13590 NE Village Square Dr Suite 1040, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: This two-vineyard blend of two-thirds Merlot and one-third Cabernet Sauvignon is a well-balanced mix of brambly berry flavors, with details of leaf and clean earth. Both vineyards are well established and are located in prime Cabernet country on Red Mountain.

properties.title: Agustí Torelló Mata 2007 Gran Reserva Brut Nature Barrica Macabeo (Cava)
properties.description: Like the barrica (barrel) in its name implies, this is a toasty wine, with vanilla, yeast and elegant white-fruit aromas. Full bodied, it has citrus and apple notes, with mild oxidation in front of the toasty finish. A classy Cava to drink now.

properties.title: Bell 2009 Claret Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: A very nice wine that shows the smooth, complex tannin structure, ripe fruit and dry balance you'd want from a Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon. You'll like the blackberry, cherry and cedar flavors, enhanced by touches of dried herb and cocoa. Drink now–2015 for fruity freshness.

properties.title: Cave de Ribeauvillé 2007 Gloeckelberg Grand Cru Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.description: This rich, sweet wine is honeyed, with a crisp, balancing lemon character. It is full and rich, touched by spice as well as mango and yellow peach. A delicious dessert wine, this is now ready to drink.

properties.title: Zuccardi 2010 Q Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: Costa Canal Uco s/n - Paraje Altamira, San Carlos, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Opening with subtle berry aromas and hints of herb, rubber and leather, this is sturdy as a rock, with dry, spicy plum and cassis flavors. Powerful but restrained, it's neither overextracted nor too grapy.

properties.title: Hugel 2010 Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 3 Rue de la 1E Armée, 68340 Riquewihr, France
properties.description: Despite its richness, this is an elegant, balanced wine. The acidity is a fine partner to the ripe white fruits and spice-driven edge. It is dry and full bodied, with the possibility of aging for a couple of years.

properties.title: Joanne Weir 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: This soft, lush Cabernet features lots of richness. At four years old, it's drinking well now, with mocha-infused black cherry, cassis and cedar flavors.

properties.title: Kuentz-Bas 2010 Trois Chateaux Sylvaner (Alsace)
properties.address: 14 Route des Vins, 68420 Husseren-les-Châteaux, France
properties.description: The name Trois Chateaux  (three castles) refers to the three ruined towers that lurk over the Kuentz-Bas village of Husseren. The wine, produced from biodynamic grapes, is deliciously fruity, with a crisp apple character. Concentrated and stylish at the same time.

properties.title: Colterenzio 2010 Atisis Cornell Gewürztraminer (Alto Adige)
properties.description: This fragrant Gewürztraminer from one of the best producers in northern Italy offers aromas of jasmine and honeysuckle, with background tones of apricot and candied exotic fruit. It's creamy and rich on the finish.

properties.title: Emile Beyer 2010 Lieu dit Hohrain Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 7 Pl. du Château Saint-Léon, 68420 Eguisheim, France
properties.description: In 2007, this was produced as a late-harvest wine. In 2010, by contrast, it is a crisp, apple- and pear-flavored wine. It has bright fruit, lively acidity and just an edge of sweetness.

properties.title: Santos & Seixo 2016 Rotas de Portugal Branco White (Alentejano)
properties.description: This rich wine is full and fruity. It has generous ripe apple and pear flavors, with a creamy texture that's full in the mouth. The acidity and the creaminess work well together in a wine that is great for an apéritif.

properties.title: Sketchbook 2014 Artist's Red (Mendocino County)
properties.address: 501 Parducci Rd, Ukiah, CA 95482, USA
properties.description: Bold, concentrated and full bodied, this wine brings effusive black cherry and blueberry aromas, a Port-like fruit concentration, good bracing texture and decent balance.

properties.title: Famille Laplace 2016 Aramis Petit Manseng-Sauvignon White (Vin de France)
properties.address: 64330 Aydie, France
properties.description: Honey and quince aromas and apricot and spice flavors bring out the medium sweetness of this finely balanced wine. There's plenty of acidity to balance its great fruitiness and honeyed succulence. Drink now.

properties.title: Frank Family 2015 Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.address: 1091 Larkmead Ln, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.description: This wine is highly ripe and voluptuous, with a distinct boldness of tropical flavor and almond paste. Full figured, it's embraced by a generosity of oak that makes itself known.

properties.title: Ghostrunner 2016 Ungrafted Red (Lodi)
properties.address: 304 Railroad Ave, Winters, CA 95694, USA
properties.description: This concentrated and fruity red blend has effusive black-cherry aromas, ripe black-plum flavors and a slight sweetness that makes the texture smooth and soft.

properties.title: Jean Perrier et Fils 2016 Abymes Cuvée Gastronomie Jacquère (Savoie)
properties.description: Freshly sliced apple aromas make a refreshing start for this crisp, mineral and citrus-laden wine. Its acidity is upfront, calling for food. It has a zesty texture and a further kick of acidity at the end.

properties.title: LangeTwins 2016 Prince Vineyard Chenin Blanc (Clarksburg)
properties.description: A grassy grapefruity aroma and fresh citrus flavors make this medium-bodied wine refreshing, while a touch of sweetness on the palate and finish takes off the edge of acidity. It's light to medium bodied.

properties.title: Lionel Osmin & Cie 2016 San de Guilhem Kaléidoscope White
properties.address: 9 Rue Ada Byron, 64000 Pau, France
properties.description: It's no wonder this wine is called Kaleidoscope: a blend of Viognier, Gewürztraminer, Riesling and Muscat, it's unique and multifaceted. The varieties have come together very satisfactorily, giving perfumed and plenty of ripe fruitiness. With its touches of lychee, apricot and spice and crisp, tight acidity, it's ready to drink now.

properties.title: Arrowood 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
properties.description: Two vineyards go into the making of this wine, including Stonestreet Estate. A nose of plum and dried cherry ride along an extracted palate of relative lightness and notes of soy and tomato leaf.

properties.title: Brassfield 2016 Rosé (High Valley)
properties.description: This light-orange-colored wine has quite a bit of red wine character, from the raspberry aromas to rather meaty grapey flavors, smooth texture and medium to full body.

properties.title: Casanel 2015 Patricia Marie Pinot Gris (Middleburg)
properties.address: 17956 Canby Rd, Leesburg, VA 20175, USA
properties.description: This wine starts off on notes of lemons, almond skins and mushrooms. The palate is quite different with lots of green flavors, from grassiness, to green apple and celery stalks. This is simple in body and has a long nutty finish.

properties.title: Ojai 2007 Clos Pepe Vineyard Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.description: Huge, rich, white Burgundy style Chardonnay. Has a pie-filling fruity richness of pineapples, lemondrop, pears, kiwi fruit and exotic kumquats, balanced with fine, minerally acidity, and wrapped into a buttercream texture. The oak is flamboyant, but perfectly in keeping with the wine's volume. Dazzling and dramatic, from a vineyard that just keeps performing better and better.

properties.title: Williams Selyem 2008 Allen Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: Amazingly rich, one of the most opulent Chardonnays you can drink now. Just wows the mouth with pineapple, pear, exotic tropical fruit, crème brûlée, vanilla custard, buttered toast and cinnamon spice flavors that go on and on through the finish. Also shows fine, tart acidity, which provides needed balance. Yes, it's superripe, but this is what California Chardonnay does at its best.

properties.title: Tantara 2007 Talley Rincon Chardonnay (Arroyo Grande Valley)
properties.description: Massively rich, with pronounced, sweet, smoky oak flavors and a rich vein of tart, creamy lees highlighting the underlying fruity ripeness. Shows flavors of grilled pineapples, tropical mangoes and pears, balanced with crisp acids. Tremendously delicious and compelling.

properties.title: Melville 2008 Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 5185 CA-246, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.description: Massive, opulent, oozing in pineapple créme brulée, honey, buttered toast and cinnamon spice flavors. Totally decadent, and fortunately set off with brisk, citrusy acidity. Calling all lobsters, and don't forget the drawn butter. Sheer hedonism in a glass, at a fantastic price.

properties.title: Au Bon Climat 2007 Los Alamos Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 813 Anacapa St #5b, Santa Barbara, CA 93101, USA
properties.description: Massively fruity and oaky, this is an atom bomb of a Chardonnay. You either love this style or you hate it. The pineapple tart, apricot, pear, peach, crème brûlée, buttered toast, vanilla cream and cinnamon spice flavors go on and on. Beyond the utter richness is firm acidity and a bracing minerality. Defines California-style decadence, but drink now, as the wine will quickly go downhill.

properties.title: Tantara 2008 Bien Nacido Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 2330 Westgate Rd, Santa Maria, CA 93455, USA
properties.description: Superrich, ripe and flamboyant, if not particularly subtle. Dazzles for its tsunami of grilled pineapple custard, pear tart, golden mango and Key lime pie richness, accented with sweetly, caramelized oak, and brightened with brisk acidity. A racy, decadent crowd pleaser.

properties.title: Henri Bourgeois 2008 Le M.D. de Bourgeois  (Sancerre)
properties.description: The initials refer to the vineyard of Mont Damné, the steepest vineyard in Sancerre. The wine reflects the stony character of the soil, coming through with great intensity. It is powerful, flinty, with a biting citrus character, deliciously taut and intense.

properties.title: Vineyard 7&8 2007 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Spring Mountain District)
properties.description: Bring this bottle straight to the cellar. Don't even think about opening it before, say, 2013. All you'll get is a mouthful of hard, sandpapery tannins. But it's a very deeply flavored Cabernet, packed with massive blackberry, black currant, plum and cedar flavors, and there's a granitic minerality that must come from the soil. Very finely crafted.

properties.title: Conspire 2009 Sauvignon Blanc (Rutherford)
properties.description: A beautiful, fancy Sauvignon Blanc, crisp and dry and complex. If you're looking for a California white to drink with a perfect roast chicken, it's a fine choice. Shows ripe, lush citrus, tropical fruit, peach, mineral and white flower flavors, finished with dusty cinnamon spices.

properties.title: Fritz 2008 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: Really delicious, a rich, opulent wine that beguiles from first sip to last. It's sweetly caramelized and vanilla-oaky, with crisp acidity brightening ultraripe flavors of pineapples, golden mangoes and buttered toast.

properties.title: Gramercy 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: Though mostly Cabernet from an excellent Horse Heaven Hills vineyard, this also includes 15% Merlot from Pepper Bridge. It coats the tongue with velvety softness and drying tannins. It suggests elegance and breed immediately, Cabernet's classic cassis married to herbal grace notes and a strong mineral streak. A lovely food wine.

properties.title: Au Bon Climat 2008 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 813 Anacapa St #5b, Santa Barbara, CA 93101, USA
properties.description: Opulent and captivating, this Chard captures the rich, bells and whistles style of California, while maintaining a sense of style and elegance. Coastal acidity provides a bracing structure for the ripe pineapple, lime, pear, white flower and mineral flavors.

properties.title: Iron Horse 2008 Native Yeast Chardonnay (Green Valley)
properties.address: 9786 Ross Station Rd, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.description: This is a very rich Chardonnay. It has complex, lush flavors of pineapples, lemons, limes, oranges and the smoky vanilla notes from 100% new oak. High acidity fortunately provides crisp balance. Almost too much of a good thing, it calls for equally rich fare, such as lobster or Ahi tuna tartare.

properties.title: Maroon 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (Yountville)
properties.description: This Cab is drinking very dry, tannic and austere in its youth. It really needs time in the cellar to soften and throw some sediment, and allow the heart of black currants and dark chocolate to emerge. Should begin to show interest after 2013.

properties.title: Martin Ray 2006 Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Cruz Mountains)
properties.description: A beautiful wine for drinking now, although it will take a few years in the cellar. Dry and soft, it offers appealing, complex flavors of blackberries, cherries, anise, mocha and sweet smoky oak, wrapped into firm but fine tannins. Gets more interesting as it airs and warms in the glass.

properties.title: Arbor Crest 2007 Stillwater Creek Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 4705 N Fruit Hill Rd, Spokane Valley, WA 99217, USA
properties.description: A single vineyard, 100% varietal Cabernet Sauvignon, this is deep, dark, dense, chewy and tannic. Yet it still captures some delicate floral aromas as well as smoke and rock and black fruits. You go from flower to fruit to earth and black olive in a rush of full-bodied flavor.

properties.title: Brander 2009 Cuvée Nicholas Sauvignon Blanc (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.description: A blend of Sauvignon Blanc, with one-quarter Sémillon, this white blend was aged on the lees in oak barrels. It shows the balanced elegance this bottling by Brander usually displays. Entirely dry, with a crisp burst of acidity, its flavors are of citrus fruits, white flowers, vanilla, minerals and a touch of tart, New Zealand-style gooseberry. Great with roast pork or, if you can get it, wild boar.

properties.title: Château d'Esclans 2008 Garrus Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.description: The top rosé from Sacha Lichine's Esclans estate, this is wood aged and the flavors of wood are apparent, if subtle. The wine has a great smooth texture, the fruit well integrated, showing richness as well as elegance. Not classic Provence, but certainly impressive.

properties.title: Domaine Carneros 2006 Brut Rosé Sparkling (Carneros)
properties.address: 1240 Duhig Rd, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.description: Sometimes you want the richness of a rosé sparkler, and with this Pinot Noir and Chardonnay blend, you get plenty of flavor. Although its dry, it's flamboyant in raspberries, strawberries and vanilla, along with the stimulating yeast of a great bubbly. Just great on its own, or drink with sushi or roast salmon.

properties.title: Testarossa 2008 Rosella's Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 300 College Ave, Los Gatos, CA 95030, USA
properties.description: Made of equal parts ultraripe pineapple and exotic lime fruit, coupled with sweet, smoky crème brûlée and buttered toast from oak and lees stirring, this is a super-rich Chardonnay. Don't drink it too cold; it matures and knits together as it breathes in the glass.

properties.title: Testarossa 2008 Sanford & Benedict Vineyard Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.description: Made in a leaner, acidic, minerally style, this bone-dry wine feels ultra-clean and distinguished in the mouth. It's austere, but you'll find a core of pineapples, apples and limes. Great with a shellfish-inspired risotto. Elegant and food-friendly, it should develop over the next 4–5 years.

properties.title: Martin Ray 2006 Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
properties.address: 2191 Laguna Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.description: A fine, fancy Cabernet. It shows Diamond Mountain's famously hard tannins, but they're so finely ground, the wine is actually drinkable now, with a brief decant. It's entirely dry, with complex waves of blackberries, cherries, currants, violets, mocha, minerals and, of course, plenty of sweet smoky oak.

properties.title: Notre Vin 2006 Cabernet Sauvignon Rosé (Howell Mountain)
properties.address: 11010 Estate Ln, Windsor, CA 95492, USA
properties.description: A very rich blush wine made from the same Cabernet grapes that go into the winery's expensive dry table wine. It's silky and wonderfully crisp, with deep flavors of raspberries, rose petals and vanilla spice. Wonderful with mushroom risotto, or with little puff pastry appetizers.

properties.title: D'Arenberg 2008 The Noble Mud Pie Viognier-Pinot Gris-Marsanne White (Adelaide)
properties.address: Osborn Rd, McLaren Vale SA 5171, Australia
properties.description: d'Arenberg has a quartet of sweet wines from 2008, and this blend of Viognier, Pinot Gris and Marsanne represents a terrific value. It's syrupy sweet, redolent of honey-drizzled, spiced poached pears. To quibble, it could be a touch more complex and crisp, but it is still a succulent mouthful of dessert wine for drinking over the next few years.

properties.title: Darcie Kent Vineyards 2014 DeMayo Vineyard Chardonnay (Livermore Valley)
properties.description: Strong aromas and flavors like buttered toast and caramel make this full-bodied wine an extrovert. The texture is broad and soft, and candy-like flavors keep coming on the finish.

properties.title: Pflüger 2014 Dürkheimer Michelsberg Trocken Riesling (Pfalz)
properties.address: Gutleutstraße 48, 67098 Bad Dürkheim, Germany
properties.description: The Dürkheimer Michelsberg bottling maintains the richness of texture and body of many of Pflüger's dry Rieslings. It's concentrated in apple and pear flavors, but zestier acidity and an herbal freshness lend a leaner, edgier feel. Drink now through 2019.

properties.title: Robert Hall 2012 Cavern Select Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3443 Mill Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Blueberry fruit, purple flowers and licorice break through the very dense cloud of finely knit tannins that frame the entire experience of this best-of-house bottling. Dark-roast coffee beans and hints of blackberry fruit can be found once sipped, but this needs years to evolve. Luckily, it has the excellent tannins and bright acidity needed to do so.

properties.title: Silver Mountain 2013 Chardonnay (Santa Cruz Mountains)
properties.address: 402 Ingalls St unit #29, Santa Cruz, CA 95060, USA
properties.description: Elegant aromas of pan-seared apples, cream, chamomile, browned butter, sea-salt caramel, cinnamon and cider play into the lush nose of this bottling. The apple-butter character consumes the lush palate, settling into walnut oil and marzipan. It's a richer style, and very well put together.

properties.title: Shaw and Smith 2013 M3 Chardonnay (Adelaide Hills)
properties.address: 136 Jones Rd, Balhannah SA 5242, Australia
properties.description: There comes a point when the pursuit of restraint becomes fruitless, and while this wine shows a wonderfully silky texture and an elegant finish, its subtle aromas and flavors of roasted cashew and citrus are indeed understated.

properties.title: Alma Rosa 2014 Pinot Gris (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 1623 Mission Dr, Solvang, CA 93463, USA
properties.description: Very light in the glass, this bottling from Richard Sanford's label shows apples, orange rind, scratched lime and tonic notes on the nose. Once sipped, the intriguing texture is grippy, the flavors are tightly wound and the finish is mouthwatering, with lemon, lime pith and kumquat elements.

properties.title: Andriano 2015 Floreado Sauvignon (Alto Adige)
properties.description: White spring flower, citrus and a whiff of tomato leaf lead the nose. Bright and linear, the palate offers juicy white grapefruit, pineapple and a hint of mineral alongside tangy acidity.

properties.title: Avondale 2014 Anima Chenin Blanc (Paarl)
properties.address: Klein Drakenstein Road, Lustigan Rd, 7646, South Africa
properties.description: Low-intensity aromas of grilled apple, quince and pear purée dance on the bouquet, with a faint hint of straw in the background. Bright acidity and a pronounced citrus flavor results in a fresh and accessible mouthfeel, while the finish offers touches of toasted challah and clove. Drink now.

properties.title: Bennett Lane 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 3340 CA-128, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.description: Tannic and robust, this reserve-tier wine offers smoothly chiseled tannin and full-bodied flavors like brick, black cherry, leather and clove. It begs to be paired with hearty meat dishes.

properties.title: Cantina Produttori San Michele Appiano 2012 Appius White (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Via Circonvallazione, 17-19, 39057 Appiano sulla strada del vino BZ, Italy
properties.description: Made with 65% Chardonnay, 15% Sauvignon, 10% Pinot Grigio and 10% Pinot Bianco, this elegant white offers aromas of white flower, tropical fruit, mint and whiffs of toasted oak. The structured palate delivers Golden Delicious apple, vanilla, oak and lemon zest. A mineral note closes the lingering finish.

properties.title: Companhia das Quintas 2014 Quinta do Cardo Reserva Branco Siria (Beira Interior)
properties.address: R. da Fonte Nova, 3780 Sangalhos, Portugal
properties.description: French oak-aging has resulted in a wine that's both smooth and fruity. With summer blossom aromas, attractive acidity and a toasty edge, it's stylish, elegant and ready to drink now.

properties.title: Falkner 2015 Chardonnay (Temecula Valley)
properties.address: 40620 Calle Contento, Temecula, CA 92591, USA
properties.description: This is proof that excellent Chardonnay can come from this warm region in Southern California. Key lime pie, peach blossom and shaved apple aromas show on the nose. The palate sizzles with acidity and a savory hit of sea salt, with a core of Asian pear and stone fruit flavors.

properties.title: Ferrari-Carano 2015 Fumé Blanc (Sonoma County)
properties.description: With searing, upfront acidity, this wine takes on a briny character that accents the high-toned lemon zest and melon notes on the palate. Aged only in old French oak and stainless steel, its fruit remains fresh and unencumbered through the finish.

properties.title: Four Lanterns 2014 Third Blue Hour Cabernet Sauvignon (Templeton Gap District)
properties.description: Fresh pressed blackberry and boysenberry scents meet wet clay and gravel on the nose of this bottling from one of Paso Robles' cooler corners. Vibrant acidity shows on the palate, with light tannins that frame its plump berry and graphite flavors.

properties.title: Giornata 2015 Fiano (Paso Robles)
properties.description: Kudos to Brian and Stephy Terrizzi for introducing this fascinating grape from southern Italy to Paso Robles. Rich white peach and poached pear aromas are edged with sharper mineral scents and boosted by vanilla undertones. The palate leads with bright acidity then explores red apple, cantaloupe and stone fruit flavors, proving easy to like but also tempered with restraint.

properties.title: Hestan 2012 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: This wine has a classic personality: round and soft in tannin, with a chalkiness lurking behind herbal tobacco leaf, tomato, cedar and rose notes. Full-bodied, it doesn't hold back on ripeness but displays more savory character than fruit.

properties.title: Hound's Tree 2015 Cabernet Sauvignon (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.address: 335 Bedford Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11211, USA
properties.description: While plush blackberry, dried fig and cherry aromas are rich and ripe on the nose, this voluptuous Cab is surprisingly structured and taut on the palate. It's rich and luscious in red fruit yet firmly anchored with cranberry acidity and a fine firm fringe of tannins. It's amply lavished in vanilla, spice and toast, but wears these embellishments well.

properties.title: Jorge Ordóñez & Co. 2015 Selección Especial 1 Moscatel (Málaga)
properties.address: 222 E Ridge Rd, McAllen, TX 78503, USA
properties.description: Don't let the near nonexistence of color fool you, because this is a nice racy-sweet Moscatel. Aromas of citrus peel and air freshener are mild, while this feels juicy. Tropical fruit and citrus flavors finish lean except for a touch of viscosity.

properties.title: Kale 2014 Heritage McGah Vineyard Red (Rutherford)
properties.address: 708 1st St, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.description: This blend of 87% Grenache, 8% Mourvèdre and 5% Syrah is big, bold and robustly flavored, showing its youth. Juicy cherry and licorice flavors are edged in smoke and tannin. The cinnamon-laced finish is soft and long.

properties.title: EOS 2008 Reserve Chardonnay (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 2300 Airport Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Clean and crisp in acidity, with a rich overlay of smoky, caramelized oak, this Chardonnay has appealing pineapple, peach and lime fruit flavors. There's a honey sweet finish, although the wine itself is totally dry. Good price for all this opulence.

properties.title: Frenzy 2009 Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.description: This value-priced offering starts off with slightly subdued notes of passion fruit, but gains a bit of intensity on the palate. It's a simple, tropically fruity Sauvignon Blanc with a soft, easygoing finish.

properties.title: Herdade da Malhadinha Nova 2009 Monte da Peceguina Branco White (Alentejano)
properties.address: Herdade da Malhadinha Nova, 7800-601 Albernoa, Portugal
properties.description: A soft and rich wine, lined with fresh pear, bitter almonds, fresh herbs and a glint of citrus. It is full bodied, while remaining fresh.

properties.title: Fernwood 2007 Estate Grown Redwood Retreat Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Cruz Mountains)
properties.address: 7137 Redwood Retreat Rd, Gilroy, CA 95020, USA
properties.description: You'll find thick tannins and soft acidity in this wine, which offers direct, jammy blackberry and cassis flavors. It's quite a rich wine that seems best now and for the next few years.

properties.title: Midsummer Cellars 2013 Tomasson Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
properties.address: 264 Crystal Springs Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: There's a nice aspect of polished tannin behind this vineyard-designate that gives it a refined sensibility, and a roundness of ripeness that becomes almost overwhelming. An aroma of crayon plays with sturdier elements of baked bread and blackberry jam for a concentrated, full-bodied finish.

properties.title: Raphael 2015  Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico
properties.address: 39390 NY-25, Peconic, NY 11958, USA
properties.description: This fresh, simple white smells of white wild flower and yellow stone fruit. The zesty palate offers lime and Bosc pear alongside tangy acidity that leads to a clean finish.

properties.title: Alcardet 2015 Sommelier Tempranillo-Syrah-Garnacha Rosé (La Mancha)
properties.description: Cotton candy and apple cider aromas give way to a mild palate with soft acidity but a sense of complexity. Plump red-fruit flavors are not specific, and overall this blend of Tempranillo, Syrah and Garnacha is appealing but slightly vacuous.

properties.title: Brooklyn Oenology 2014 As If Courage Rosé (New York)
properties.address: 67 West St, Brooklyn, NY 11222, USA
properties.description: While red apple, raspberry and bramble aromas on this rosé are restrained, ruddy, slightly overripe cherry and strawberry flavors build on the palate. Dry and full-bodied in style, it finishes with a touch of exotic spice.

properties.title: Castellari Bergaglio 2014 Fornaci  (Gavi)
properties.address: Frazione Rovereto, 136, 15066 Gavi AL, Italy
properties.description: This opens with subdued aromas of orchard fruit and a whiff of hazelnut. The racy palate is a bit lean but still offers Bosc pear, lime, bitter almond and a trace of mineral. Drink soon.

properties.title: Castellari Bergaglio 2014 Rolona del Comune di Gavi  (Gavi)
properties.address: Frazione Rovereto, 136, 15066 Gavi AL, Italy
properties.description: This has subtle aromas suggesting beeswax, green pear and a whiff of nut. The lean, racy palate offers lemon zest, crisp Granny Smith apple and bitter almond alongside brisk acidity.

properties.title: Domaine la Colombette 2015 Notorious Pink Grenache Rosé (Vin de France)
properties.description: A fashionable pale-salmon color, this dainty rosé opens with delicate floral aromas of sweet pea and white clover that are framed by fruity tones of red cherry and strawberry. The palate is fleshy and fruit-forward, buoyed by ample acidity that finishes fresh.

properties.title: Zuccardi 2015 Serie A Torrontés (Salta)
properties.description: Powdery aromas of acacia blossom and bath oil come prior to a slightly oily feeling palate. Pithy citrus, melon and papaya flavors finish with a touch of greenness.

properties.title: Ten Sisters 2015 Single Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.address: 7000 CA-46, Paso Robles, CA 93428, USA
properties.description: A bit austere, this is an undeniably crisp offering. Delicate herbal notes accent underripe pineapple and white grapefruit, then end on a dry, stony note.

properties.title: Hunt Cellars 2010 Cloud 9 Destiny Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.description: Smashed blueberries, cracked peppercorns and pressed purple flowers show on the nose of this bottling. The palate is sour-leaning with dried plum and pine needle flavors, held together by sticky tannins that are mouth-coating and a bit tense.

properties.title: Kohl 2015 Gelber Muskateller (Niederösterreich)
properties.description: Tender notes of elderflower fill the nose with an almost confected note. The palate is fresh, crisp and clean with the same aromatic swing. A summer wine to be drunk as soon as possible for fragrant refreshment.

properties.title: Lionel Osmin & Cie 2015 Villa Grand Cap White (Vin de France)
properties.description: A true wine from southwest France, this brings together grapes from Gascony and Gaillac. It is delicate and fruity. The freshest green-fruit flavors come together with intense acidity and a tang that is poised and crisp.

properties.title: Fabre en Provence 2015 Château de la Deidière Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.description: From one of the four properties bought by great-grandparents of the present owner, this wine is light, bright and totally up-to-the-minute in its crisp freshness. Red fruits and touches of citrus dominate along with the lightest touch of tannin. It will make a great apéritif.

properties.title: Malabaila 2014 Pradvaj  (Roero)
properties.description: Subdued aromas of pear and white spring flower lift out of the glass. The lean palate offers grapefruit, pear bitter almond and mineral alongside tangy acidity.

properties.title: Malvirà 2014 Non Filtrato  (Roero)
properties.description: Lime blossom, bread crust and a whiff of toast lead the nose. Slightly fizzy when first poured, the lively palate offers citrus, green Anjou pear and bitter nut while a hint of flinty mineral closes the finish.

properties.title: Marchesi di Barolo 2015 del Comune di Gavi  (Gavi)
properties.description: The nose isn't very expressive but eventually reveals whiffs of pressed white flower and orchard fruit. The straightforward palate offers suggestions of mature yellow apple, candied lemon drop and a bitter almond note.

properties.title: Martellotto 2014 La Bomba Cabernet Sauvignon (Happy Canyon of Santa Barbara)
properties.description: Caramelized meats, dark cherry fruits, tar and pencil lead elements emerge on the nose of this bottling. The flavors are reminiscent of charred beef, with charcoal, turned earth and dark chocolate set against dried blueberry background.

properties.title: Ramón Bilbao 2014 Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.address: Av. Santo Domingo de la Calzada, 34, 26200 Haro, La Rioja, Spain
properties.description: Quiet aromas of peach and nectarine are subdued in nature. This feels melony, with pulpy weight cut by solid acidity. Nectarine, melon and apple are standard-issue flavors, while the finish is mild and fleshy in feel.

properties.title: 14 Hands 2012 The Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.description: Aromas of cherry, vanilla and herb are reserved. The mocha and cherry flavors are sweet and soft with a cranberry lick on the finish.

properties.title: Adelaida 2013 Finder White (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 5805 Adelaida Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Chalk, Key lime, macaron and slight scents of wool greet the nose on this blend of 40% Grenache Blanc, 28% Viognier, 20% Picpoul Blanc and 12% Roussanne. It's very clean and crisp once sipped, with a seared-lemon character in the midpalate and limestone minerality contributing to a decent grip for a white wine.

properties.title: Alta Alella 2013 Private Reserve Brut Nature Sparkling (Cava)
properties.address: Camí Baix de Tiana, s/n, 08328 Alella, Barcelona, Spain
properties.description: After an early aromatic blast of sulfuric matchstick, this turns for the better while providing scents of citrus, fresh-cut grass and minerals. The palate is zesty, with briny flavors of nectarine and orange. A minerally, slightly salty finish keeps this on course.

properties.title: Atwater 2013 Middle Block One Riesling (Seneca Lake)
properties.description: Intense lemon-lime acidity contrasts luscious yellow cherry and peach flavors in this vibrant, penetrating Riesling. Semidry in style, it's fine and filigreed in texture yet powerful enough to maintain a strong, long finish.

properties.title: Blackbird Vineyards 2014 Arriviste Rosé (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 604 Main St, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.description: This vibrantly light, restrained wine comes from some hallowed vineyards, including Hudson, Stagecoach and Crocker & Starr, the blend comprised of 38% Cabernet Franc, 34% Cabernet Sauvignon and 28% Merlot. Dark in color, it offers aromas of cherry liqueur and orange, and remains dry on the palate, low in power and high in minerality.

properties.title: Brady Cellars 2012 Blue Mountain Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 2489 Harvest Meadow Pl, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Made entirely from Cabernet from a single vineyard block, this wine explores the variety's more savory side, with aromas of leafy herbs, green pepper, cigar box, musk and dark chocolate. The cherry flavors are tart backed by chewy tannins.

properties.title: Cave des Producteurs de Vouvray 2012 De Chanceny Brut Excellence  (Vouvray)
properties.description: A significant touch of bitterness in this wine spoils the otherwise attractive tropical fruit. It suggests the wine is too young and going through one of Chenin Blanc's growing-pain stages. Keep the wine until 2017 when it will broaden out and be all about perfumed fruit.

properties.title: Sbragia 2012 Home Ranch Chardonnay (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 9990 Dry Creek Rd, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.description: This wine offers a ripe abundance of apple and pear, veering almost into tropical flavors. It conveys richness amid a streak of high acidity, the oak semi-restrained. It finishes in vanilla crème brûlée.

properties.title: Sinor-LaVallee 2014 Pinot Gris (San Luis Obispo County)
properties.address: 550 1st St, Avila Beach, CA 93424, USA
properties.description: Delicious aromas of yellow cake batter, lemon and a touch of butter greet the nose on this wine by Mike Sinor. The palate proves much more delicate than the nose suggests, with yellow pear fruit and rain-on-cement minerality.

properties.title: Thirsty Owl Wine Company 2014 Lahoma Vineyard Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 6799 Elm Beach Rd, Ovid, NY 14521, USA
properties.description: Zesty lime and lemon notes cut a razor's edge through this buoyantly fruity, floral dry Riesling. Bright peach, mango and melon flavors are lip smacking on the palate, nuanced by a hint of savory dried herbs. It's a refreshing, delicately framed wine to enjoy now.

properties.title: Thurston Wolfe 2014 Albariño (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 588 Cabernet Ct, Prosser, WA 99350, USA
properties.description: Aromas of pear and tropical fruit lead to off-dry fruit flavors with a zing of acid that draws out the finish. It's perfect for a warm afternoon.

properties.title: Tussock Jumper 2014 Chenin Blanc (Western Cape)
properties.description: Herbal fynbos, sweet grass and lime leaf aromas are upfront on the nose of this wine, followed by supporting notes of Anjou pear, honeydew rind and honeysuckle. It's attractive and easy drinking, with refreshing citrus and green apple flavors that finish crisp and clean. Drink now.

properties.title: Hermann J. Wiemer 2014 Dry Riesling (Seneca Lake)
properties.description: Smoke and slate extend from nose to finish on this intensely mineral dry Riesling. On the palate, flavors of pristine white grapefruit and waxy lemons penetrate deeply, finishing long with a bracing crush of lime and salt.

properties.title: Hermann J. Wiemer 2014 Semi-Dry Riesling (Seneca Lake)
properties.description: Whiffs of crushed mineral and candle wax lend mineral intensity to crisp, concentrated green plum and honeydew flavors in this semi-dry Riesling. Lime acidity cuts through the midpalate, leading into a long, slightly floral finish. Year after year, it's an exceptional bargain wine of consistent value.

properties.title: Hiedler 2015 Urgestein Riesling (Kamptal)
properties.address: Am Rosenhügel 13, 3550 Langenlois, Austria
properties.description: Gentle Mirabelle and lemon envelope nose and palate in a refreshing but soft embrace. This delicate wine combines lightness of touch with immense and sprightly citrus freshness. It works like a lemon sorbet: it cleanses, refreshes and tones. The lasting citrus flavors are a real bonus.

properties.title: Sanford 2014 Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 5010 Santa Rosa Rd, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.description: Sweet lemon blossoms and fresh-pressed tangerines provide the juicy core to the nose on this appellation blend, which gains aromatic complexity from the sharper orange rind and slate minerality. Sea salt and Meyer-lemon flavors meet with white peach on the palate, which is framed by a chalky grip and is very mouth-watering.

properties.title: Schloss Gobelsburg 2015 Langenlois Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.address: Schloss Str. 16, 3550, Austria
properties.description: Fresh, herb and miso-tinged yeast for now is the chief flavor on this zesty, fresh and punchy yet slender little number. There is pepper and pear, but also soy and salt, with a lovely hint of both fizz and peach framed by super-zesty lemon freshness. You simply want to drink more.

properties.title: The Withers Winery 2014 Peters Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 21509 Snow Hill Rd, Brooksville, FL 34601, USA
properties.description: A light imprint marks this high-toned wine, expressive in crisp green apple, citrus and stone. Fresh in lemony acidity, it builds up to a medium body in the glass, offering impressive complexity and refreshment.

properties.title: Vignobles Laffourcade 2014 Château de l'Echarderie  (Quarts de Chaume)
properties.description: Perhaps less intense than some wines from this appellation, this is still a sweet, honeyed wine that is shot through with lemon acidity. It is poised and very stylish with yellow fruits and orange marmalade that are caught in a web of botrytis. Drink this wine from 2020.

properties.title: Wieninger 2015 Herrenholz Grüner Veltliner (Vienna)
properties.address: Stammersdorfer Str. 31, 1210 Wien, Austria
properties.description: Freshly cut Conference pear peel notes abound. The palate has a slightly phenolic, pleasantly bitter edge that will come into its own with food. The beautiful pear and aloe vera notes last long after the last sip. This deserves a whole evening of your attention—the flavors here unfold slowly.

properties.title: Domaine du Petit Clocher 2014 Chenin Blanc (Anjou)
properties.address: La Laiterie, 49560 Cléré-sur-Layon, France
properties.description: This is a beautiful nut and orange-flavored white wine. It has a mineral texture that is developing well into rich pear flavors that are lightly touched by honey. The wine from this estate in the Layon Valley is likely to age well. It can be drunk now, but it will be better from 2018.

properties.title: Domaine les Grands Presbytères 2013 Vieilles Vignes Sur Lie  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
properties.description: The flinty soil of the area of Saint-Fiacre gives a strongly mineral character to this wine. Coming from old vines with an average age of 40-years-old, it is just mature, rich and with great complexity. It is a fine wine, ready to drink now.

properties.title: Efeste 2014 Evergreen Vineyard Riesling (Ancient Lakes)
properties.description: The aromas of ripe peach, jasmine, honeysuckle and mineral pop. It drinks just off dry, with a spritz of stone-fruit and citrus flavors that extend on the finish.

properties.title: Fidelitas 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
properties.description: One hundred percent varietal, this wine is a blend of fruit from Quintessence (69%), Fidelitas Estate, Canyons and Red Heaven Vineyards. Aromas of cassis, black licorice, barrel spice and dried black cherry lead to elegant dark fruit flavors backed by lightly chewy tannins. It shows a lot of finesse.

properties.title: Blackbird Vineyards 2015 Arriviste Rosé (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Winemaker Aaron Pott saignées nearly equal parts Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Cabernet Sauvignon to craft this impressively complex, light-bodied and ethereal celebration of cranberry, strawberry and grapefruit. It shows more tartness on the finish as it pushes a final, refreshing suggestion of mandarin orange.

properties.title: Bonnet-Huteau 2015 Les Gautronnières Sur Lie  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
properties.address: La Levraudière, 44330 La Chapelle-Heulin, France
properties.description: The wine is smooth, ripe and deliciously creamy in texture. It has apricot as well as citrus fruits, fine acidity and a stylish, crisp aftertaste. The wine finishes with a flourish of pepper and spice.

properties.title: Carol Shelton 2015 Wild Thing Rendezvous Rosé (Mendocino County)
properties.description: One of the deepest colored rosés around, this wine has fresh, exuberant red-fruit aromas, while flavors bring as much complexity and depth as many full-fledged reds. Made from Carignane grapes, it does not follow the current vogue of pale-pink wines and is worth seeking out for its concentration.

properties.title: Brander 2011 Sauvignon Blanc (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 2401 N Refugio Rd, Santa Ynez, CA 93460, USA
properties.description: Brander's first Sauvignon Blanc of the cool 2011 vintage is delicious: It tastes dryish to slightly off-dry, with excellent acidity brightening the citrus and tropical fruit flavors.

properties.title: Fournier Père et Fils 2010 Côtes de Morogues  (Menetou-Salon)
properties.address: Rte de la Garenne, 18300 Verdigny, France
properties.description: One of the small Sauvignon Blanc areas close to Sancerre, Menetou-Salon produces a light, crisp and herbal style of wine. This fits that bill well, its freshness contained within the flavors of hedgerow fruits and tangy acids.

properties.title: Siegel 2011 Crucero Reserva Chardonnay (Maipo Valley)
properties.description: A bit oily and fleshy on the bouquet, with toasty oak aromas. It feels good, with a proper meshing of acidity and body weight. Flavors of orange and apple come with oak-based cinnamon notes, while the finish is tropical, warm and long.

properties.title: Joseph Mellot 2011 Le Montarlet  (Sancerre)
properties.address: Route de Ménétréol, 18300 Sancerre, France
properties.description: This is a soft wine, with light green-plum and apple flavors, and an asparagus edge that comes through on the finish. Ready to drink. Screwcap.

properties.title: Montes 2011 Classic Series Sauvignon Blanc (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: I-350, Millahue, Santa Cruz, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: Varietally and regionally correct, with green, grassy, punchy aromas of citrus, white pepper and jalapeño. This is prickly in the mouth, with lively acidity and flavors of lime, scallion, green apple and bell pepper. It finishes with cut and juicy acids.

properties.title: Domaine Fouassier 2010 Sur le Fort  (Sancerre)
properties.address: 180 Av. de Verdun, 18300 Sancerre, France
properties.description: This is a herbaceous wine with dominant green fruit, followed by acidity and fine flavors of sweet currant, kiwi and thyme. It is fresh and ready to drink.

properties.title: Trerè 2015 Arlùs Albana (Romagna)
properties.address: Via Casale, 19, 48018 Faenza RA, Italy
properties.description: Floral aromas of acacia and Spanish broom mingle with yellow stone fruit and toasted nut. On the medium-bodied palate, a note of bitter almond underscores ripe apricot and tangerine zest. Fresh acidity lifts the rich flavors.

properties.title: Vazart Coquart & Fils 2010 Grand Bouquet Blanc de Blancs Brut Chardonnay (Champagne)
properties.address: 6 Rue des Partelaines, 51530 Chouilly, France
properties.description: Based in the Côte des Blancs, this producer has made a soft, ripe style of Blanc de Blancs. It's smooth and creamy in texture, drinkable now with its hint of toastiness balanced by crisper apple flavors.

properties.title: Adega Cachín 2015 Peza do Rei White (Ribeira Sacra)
properties.description: Stone-fruit, orange peel and Ribeira Sacra's textbook schist-driven aromas make for a moderately complex and interesting nose. This is tightly wound, with an acidic backbone. Flavors of white peach, pithy citrus and mild bitterness finish with a waxy but firm texture. It's 70% Godello with Treixadura and Albariño.

properties.title: Broken Earth 2015 Albariño (Paso Robles)
properties.description: Gravenstein apple, honeysuckle and jasmine aromas show on the relatively boisterous nose of this bottling from a large vineyard on Highway 46 east of Paso Robles. There is compellingly grippy texture to the sip, with ripe flavors of pear and honeydew melon. A salty acidity takes it to the next level.

properties.title: La Chablisienne 2014 Dame Nature  (Chablis)
properties.address: 8 Bd Pasteur, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: This is anything but a simple Chablis. Made from organically grown grapes, it's smooth, ripe and generous. Old vines in the blend lend concentration—loaded with apple and pear flavors and just the right amount of acidity. It's s ready to drink.

properties.title: Labouré-Roi 2015 Les Baudines Premier Cru  (Chassagne-Montrachet)
properties.address: Rue Lavoisier, 21700 Nuits-Saint-Georges, France
properties.description: This textured and toasty wine shows a gentle acidity through its spice and warm apple and apricot flavors. Its mineral edge is tangy, zesty and attractive. Built to age for the medium term, it will be ready drink from 2019.

properties.title: Qupé 2015 Sawyer Lindquist Vineyard Viognier (Edna Valley)
properties.address: 4665 Santa Maria Mesa Rd, Santa Maria, CA 93454, USA
properties.description: Extremely light in color, this age-worthy bottling offers very light, clean and delicate aromas of crisp Asian pear and Gravenstein apple. The sip is quite high-toned, with the slightest touches of melon, pear and citrus peels, showing deft restraint for an often unctuous grape. A hint of white peach arises on the finish.

properties.title: DeLille 2015 Chaleur Estate Blanc White Wine White (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14300 NE 145th St Suite 101, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: This wine is a blend of Sauvignon Blanc (73%) and Sémillon. Aromas of tropical fruit (that include kiwi and pineapple, along with toast and herb) lead to sleek spicy fruit flavors, with generous tropical flavors on the finish. It needs some time to settle in but shows a lovely sense of balance.

properties.title: Errazuriz 2016 Max Reserva Sauvignon Blanc (Aconcagua Costa)
properties.address: E-639 18, Panquehue, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.description: Pungent stony citrus aromas include a distinct whiff of passion fruit. This feels tight, crisp and elegant on the palate, while slightly salty citrus flavors suggest grapefruit and sea brine. A briny finish retains snap and freshness.

properties.title: Fattoria Paradiso 2015 Vigna dell'Ulivo Albana (Romagna)
properties.address: Via Palmeggiana, 285, 47032 Bertinoro FC, Italy
properties.description: Heady aromas of pressed yellow flower, acacia honey and apricot follow over to the rounded palate along with yellow peach and nectarine. Fresh acidity provides lift while a bitter-almond note backs up the finish.

properties.title: Fornacelle 2015  Vernaccia di San Gimignano
properties.description: Hawthorn, honeysuckle and white stone fruit aromas meld together on this mouthwatering white. The rounded medium-bodied palate offers ripe yellow apple, yellow pear and juicy tangerine alongside a hint of bitter almond. Fresh acidity lifts the creamy flavors.

properties.title: Frost Bitten 2015 Riesling (Yakima Valley)
properties.description: The aromas leap out of the glass, with notes of potpourri, dried orange peel and honey. It drinks sweet, with viscous-feeling flower and marmalade flavors, with white flowers lingering on the finish.
