properties.title: Guicciardini Strozzi 2015 Titolato Strozzi  (Vernaccia di San Gimignano)
properties.description: Heady aromas of acacia flower, pear and yellow stone fruit lift out of the glass. On the ripe medium-bodied palate, tangy citrus notes underscore creamy yellow apple while almond and a hint of mineral signal the close.

properties.title: Wieninger 2009 Vienna Hills Riesling (Vienna)
properties.address: Stammersdorfer Str. 31, 1210 Wien, Austria
properties.description: From the hills around Vienna, this Riesling is a rich style, emphasizing fruity lemon and apricot flavors as well as steely acidity. It's a fine combination with a tightly perfumed aftertaste. Screw cap.

properties.title: Winzer Krems 2009 Edition Chremisa Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Stadtgraben 11, 3500 Krems an der Donau, Austria
properties.description: A rich and creamy character, underlined by pepper, sets this wine on a broad road. It has fine acidity as well, but it is the ripe structure that gives the wine character. There are delicious final apricot fruit flavors.

properties.title: Ojai 2008 Bien Nacido Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.description: This is the ripest of Ojai's current trio of '08 Chardonnays, with tropical fruit, apricot and pear flavors, but it also shows the winery's telltale acidity, dryness and minerality. Drink now.

properties.title: Pessagno 2008 Sleepy Hollow Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 1645 River Rd, Salinas, CA 93908, USA
properties.description: Made in the modern style of superripe fruit and lots of oak, this Chardonnay is massive in the long hangtime tropical fruit, pear and peach flavors that the vineyard so easily achieves. It's not complex, but it sure is delicious, oozing with honey and spices. Drink now–2013.

properties.title: Spier 2006 Private Collection Cabernet Sauvignon (Stellenbosch)
properties.description: This is a rich and concentrated wine with welcoming aromas of black fruits, bacon, African violets and soft black pepper. The mouth is as intense as one would anticipate with more concentrated dark plum and currant flavors and accents of coconut on the long finish. The tannins are gripping and the structure firm; try with hearty red meat dishes for a superb pairing.

properties.title: Fleur Du Cap 2007 Unfiltered Cabernet Sauvignon (Stellenbosch)
properties.description: The nose of this Cab is very inviting with heady aromas of black cherry, cassis and blueberry infused with leather and woody spice. More of the same unfolds on the palate with cedar notes supporting the dark fruit. The mouthfeel is round and full but structured with tightly woven tannins carrying through the long finish.

properties.title: Foxen 7200 2007 Grassini Family Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Happy Canyon of Santa Barbara)
properties.description: As this Cabernet develops in the glass, the oak takes over, offering rich aromas and flavors of caramel, vanilla and wood spices. Underneath is a nice Cabernet with cherry and blackberry flavors. The wine is dry and crisp and fairly tannic. A study in progress.

properties.title: Antica 2009 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 3700 Soda Canyon Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: A softly gentle, ultrarich Chardonnay. Fruity flavors of pineapples and Key lime pie are enriched with notes of caramelized vanilla, buttered toast, sautéed banana and honey. A stony minerality offers much needed weight and balance. Delicious. Drink now.

properties.title: Bonterra 2009 Chardonnay (Mendocino County)
properties.address: 2350 McNab Ranch Rd, Ukiah, CA 95482, USA
properties.description: Made in the Bonterra style of exceedingly pure fruit, this Chardonnay brims with delicious tangerines and pears. It has pretty acids that make it feel clean in the mouth. A delightful wine made even richer with a touch of new oak.

properties.title: West Cape Howe 2007 Book Ends Cabernet Sauvignon (Western Australia)
properties.description: This wine shows some of the cool-climate notes associated with Western Australia and its maritime climate; green tobacco and other herbs intertwine with bright cassis fruit. At the same time, the fine quality of the tannins is evident in this wine's velvety texture, which makes it a pleasure to drink. Best now–2017.

properties.title: Wieninger 2009 Vienna Hills Grüner Veltliner (Vienna)
properties.address: Stammersdorfer Str. 31, 1210 Wien, Austria
properties.description: A racy Grüner, crisply fruity and packed with both acidity and the typical varietal spice. It has fine balance with ripe apples adding to the mix, leaving a wine with a great final tang. Screw cap.

properties.title: Winzer Krems 2009 Kellermeister Privat Kremser Kremsleiten Riesling (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Stadtgraben 11, 3500 Krems an der Donau, Austria
properties.description: An impressive, rich Riesling that shows a balance between tropical fruit flavors as well as textured acidity. Apple and pineapple come together harmoniously with perfumes and a delicious juicy aftertaste.

properties.title: Olsen Estates 2007 Rouge des Coteaux Red (Yakima Valley)
properties.description: An interesting Rhône blend (40% Grenache, 26% Cinsault, 23% Syrah and 11% Mourvèdre) sappy and bright, with a generous mix of berries. Still tasting quite young and tight, this may benefit from additional cellar time.

properties.title: Marenco 2005 Passrì di Scrapona Moscato (Strevi)
properties.description: Passrì di Scrapona is a highly concentrated and rich dessert wine that shows very nice aromatic balance and intensity. Aromas here include toasted almond, apricot, honeysuckle and loads of honey. The wine feels syrupy and shows big weight and density on the long, sweet finish.

properties.title: Bollig-Lehnert 2012 Trittenheimer Apotheke Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Johannes-Trithemius-Straße 62, 54349 Trittenheim, Germany
properties.description: While remarkably lithe and delicate in style, this complex auslese is lusciously concentrated, with ripe peach and nectarine flavors balanced by hints of smoke, spice and musk. It's zippy and bright, with tart tangerine acidity and a wave of minerality on the finish.

properties.title: Charles Ellner 2004 Brut Prestige  (Champagne)
properties.address: 6 Rue de la Côté Legris, 51200 Épernay, France
properties.description: This is a rich, maturing wine that is full of toasty, yeasty flavors that are finely integrated with the orange zest and apple flavors. It is just right to drink now, at a midway point between youth and maturity but it will age for several more years. Drink until 2020.

properties.title: Dão Sul 2012 Quinta do Encontro Encontro I Branco Arinto (Bairrada)
properties.address: Quinta Das Sarzedas, Currelos Aptd. 28, Carregal Do Sal, Viseu, 3430-211 Carregal do Sal, Portugal
properties.description: Initially this wine is smooth and creamy textured. As it opens up it shows a cool, crisp character, with white apple fruits and layers of spice from wood aging. It's an elegant wine, very balanced already, but likely to age for several years. Drink now and until 2020.

properties.title: Domaine de Bellene 2011 Les Charmes Dessus  (Santenay)
properties.address: 39 Rue du Faubourg Saint-Nicolas, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: There is a great balance here between the creamy fruit and the wood flavors. Apricots, ripe apples and melon are spiced with the right amount of toastiness. The wine has a rich, warm feel. It is still young, so wait until 2015 to drink.

properties.title: Domaine de Bellene 2011  Savigny-lès-Beaune
properties.address: 39 Rue du Faubourg Saint-Nicolas, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: Because strong toast aromas show through this wine, its attractive full fruit will need time to come through. The wine, with its firm, almost red-wine structure, needs to age until 2016 before drinking.

properties.title: Dr. Heidemanns-Bergweiler 2012 Graacher Himmelreich Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: Fresh, herbaceous notes on the nose and palate lend elegance to this rich, round Riesling, full of sweet canteloupe and peach flavors. It's delicately structured, with a zingy strike of citrus acidity and hints of spice that carry long on the finish.

properties.title: Elk Cove 2012 Estate Riesling (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 27751 NW Olson Rd, Gaston, OR 97119, USA
properties.description: Bone dry, this succulent, citrus-soaked Riesling is a textural marvel. Mixing grapefruit, lime and pear fruit flavors, its racy acidity underscores its complexity.

properties.title: Failla 2012 Estate Vineyard Chardonnay (Fort Ross-Seaview)
properties.address: 3530 Silverado Trail N, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Lots of purity, with acidity and stony minerality providing earthy balance to the lemon, lime and mango fruit flavors. Thoroughly dry, it's a classy wine to drink now.

properties.title: La Follette 2011 Lorenzo Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: This wine is as dry as Chardonnay gets, almost severe, with the alcohol an amazingly low 13.2% by volume. The lean, angular mouthfeel provides hints of Meyer lemons, limes and wet stones, with a bit of tropical fruits suggesting that this is California, despite the vintage being the chilliest in memory. Drink it through 2020, but never too cold.

properties.title: Jean Berteau 2014 Reserve Red (Côtes du Rhône)
properties.description: This is a bit rustic in style, with sweaty leather and clove notes layered over subdued fruit, but the roundness in the mouth and silkiness on the palate amply compensate.

properties.title: Matetic 2012 Corralillo Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
properties.description: Rich, oaky aromas of coconut and vanilla are matched by earthy, almost nutty berry and cassis scents. This is tannic, grabby and slightly abrasive, while chocolate, cherry and cassis flavors end long, strong and ripe. Drink through 2018.

properties.title: Paco & Lola 2014 Lolo Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.address: 8222 E 103rd St Ste 129, Tulsa, OK 74133, USA
properties.description: Pristine apple and peach aromas lead to a zesty, clean palate of citric acidity and minerality. Nectarine, tangerine and lime flavors control the front palate, while a stony, crystalline finish is refreshing as can be.

properties.title: Rôtie Cellars 2014 Grenache Blanc (Washington)
properties.description: This is an up-and-coming variety for Washington and this wine displays why. Hailing from Olsen Vineyard, it's all about acid and texture, with the sleek starfruit and citrus-peel flavors playing second fiddle. Pair it with shellfish.

properties.title: Jean Berteau 2014 Reserve White (Côtes du Rhône)
properties.description: This is an attractive, plump white blend for early consumption. Pineapple and toasted almond notes mark the nose, while the fruit flavors on the palate are subtly reminiscent of pineapple and melon.

properties.title: Murphy-Goode 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
properties.description: This medium-bodied wine offers ample fresh fruit flavors and a smooth texture that's not too tannic or tight on the palate. It smells like red cherries and plums, tastes almost like strawberries, and carries that fruity freshness through the finish. It's a well-made wine to enjoy soon.

properties.title: Robert Mondavi 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: This value-driven wine has a touch of spearmint and bay leaf on the nose, and remains savory and herbal on the palate. A bit of heft builds around black cherry and raspberry, ending seamlessly with only the faintest taste of toasted oak.

properties.title: Savage Grace 2014 Red Willow Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 19501 144th Ave NE Suite F1100, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: Coming from a vineyard better known for its reds, this wine is a field blend of eight clones of the variety. It offers aromas of white grapefruit, oyster shells and whiffs of tropical fruit. Flavors are fleshy in feel while retaining tart, citric acidity.

properties.title: Tardieu-Laurent 2012 Vieilles Vignes  (Gigondas)
properties.address: Rte de Cucuron, 84160 Lourmarin, France
properties.description: While some cuvées seem to handle the oak better than others, this wine comes across as full of toasted coconut and vanilla. There's some dark cherry fruit and savory herbs in support, but the oak dominates, albeit it in a popular, user-friendly way.

properties.title: Alain Jaume et Fils 2013 Grand Veneur White (Châteauneuf-du-Pape)
properties.address: Rte de Châteauneuf, 84100 Orange, France
properties.description: This full-bodied blend of Clairette (60%) and Roussanne (40%) is concentrated but a bit simple, with aromas and flavors of grilled pineapple. It's crisp and clean on the flavorful finish.

properties.title: Andis 2014 Cuvée Blanc Roussanne-Viognier (Sierra Foothills)
properties.description: Vivid, fresh apple aromas and flavors plus light banana and butter notes and a tangy but rich texture make this medium-bodied, Rhône-style wine more than simple refreshment. There is depth and interest in the fruit flavors and the mouthfeel. It's made from Roussanne and Viognier grapes.

properties.title: Atwater 2013 North Block Seven Riesling (Seneca Lake)
properties.address: 5055 NY-414, Burdett, NY 14818, USA
properties.description: Initial notes of dust and earth blow off to reveal a luscious, sunny spectrum of yellow peaches and nectarines. It's a curious, enticing wine, honeyed and ripe, yet delicate and dancing in mouthfeel. Hints of fennel and spice add complexity to a long, lingering finish.

properties.title: Fiuza 2011 Premium Alvarinho-Chardonnay (Tejo)
properties.address: Largo Gen. Guerra nº2, 2080-184 Almeirim, Portugal
properties.description: Both herbal and tropical in character, this wine presents a fascinating mix between cool and warm climate grapes from the same region. The mineral, tight texture holds these two disparate flavors together to give a balanced wine that is ready to drink.

properties.title: Fiuza 2012 Red (Tejo)
properties.description: A smooth and rich wine that has a good mix between wood aging and ripe plum flavors. Tannins present a judicious support for the full fruits. Drink from the end of 2014.

properties.title: Girlan 2012 Indra Sauvignon (Alto Adige)
properties.description: A zesty wine, its fragrances suggest stone fruit, cut grass, pineapple and a mineral note. The bright, lively palate delivers yellow peach, papaya and citrus alongside a steely mineral note and crisp acidity.

properties.title: Willamette Valley Vineyards 2011 Estate Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 8800 Enchanted Way SE, Turner, OR 97392, USA
properties.description: Done in the winery's soft and fruity style, this estate-grown Chardonnay spent 10 months in French oak, half new. Buttered pears and a whiff of barrel toast create a forward, approachable wine ready for drinking in 2014.

properties.title: Abbazia di Novacella 2012 Sauvignon (Alto Adige)
properties.description: Heady floral aromas of white spring flowers come with accents of exotic fruit and cut grass. The juicy fruit palate offers pineapple, mango and papaya. Crisp acidity leaves a clean finish.

properties.title: La Montagne 2012 Sierra Madre Vineyard Pinot Blanc (Santa Barbara County)
properties.description: The vineyard is in the Santa Maria Valley, and the wine shows that area's crisp acidity, as well as long hangtime orange, Meyer lemon and golden mango fruit flavors. It's a rich, interesting wine to drink now.

properties.title: Magness 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 6148 NY-14, Rock Stream, NY 14878, USA
properties.description: This is your everyday Cab, dry and tannic, but with rich, ripe black currant and cassis flavors that lead to the long finish. Drink now, but you'll want to decant it for a few hours.

properties.title: Malavasi Daniele 2012  Lugana
properties.address: Località Casina Sacco, 25010 Pozzolengo BS, Italy
properties.description: Floral aromas suggest yellow spring flowers and whiffs of tropical fruit. The juicy fruit palate offers apples, pineapple, peach, citrus and almond notes brightened by crisp acidity.

properties.title: Marangona 2012  Lugana
properties.address: Localita' Marangona, 1, 25010 Pozzolengo BS, Italy
properties.description: This fragrant Lugana opens with aromas of Spanish broom, pressed flower petals, ripe stone fruit, and hints of Mediterranean herbs. The savory palate offers juicy peach, green apple, lemon drop and mineral alongside fresh acidity. White almond marks the finish.

properties.title: Peter Jakob Kühn 2012 Stock & Stein Trocken Riesling (Rheingau)
properties.address: Mühlstraße 70, 65375 Oestrich-Winkel, Germany
properties.description: Waxy lanolin and lemon-skin notes scent this dry, intensely linear Riesling. The palate is stark, with lime and lemon flavors accented by a stony mineral tone that lingers on the finish.

properties.title: Abbazia di Novacella 2012 Kerner (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)
properties.address: Via Abbazia, 1, 39040 Novacella BZ, Italy
properties.description: Made from the Kerner grape, which is a hybrid of Trollinger and Riesling, this silky wine begins with aromas of apricot and grapefruit, with undertones of nutmeg and clove. The crisp palate delvers white peach, pear and mineral alongside fresh acidity.

properties.title: Abbazia di Novacella 2012 Praepositus Sylvaner (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)
properties.description: Aromas recall fragrant spring flowers, white tree fruit and mineral. The linear palate delivers ripe pear and juicy yellow apple while fragrant herbs and mineral add depth.

properties.title: Andriano 2013 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)
properties.description: Savory and medium-bodied, it's loaded with sensations of juicy green apple, Bartlett pear, Spanish broom, almond and citrus peel. The creamy palate is brightened with crisp acidity that give balance and a brisk finish.

properties.title: Cà dei Frati 2012 I Frati  (Lugana)
properties.description: ensations include white flowers, juicy white peach, green apple, mango, and toasted almond. The supple palate is supported by crisp acidity that leaves a refreshing finish.

properties.title: Cantina Terlano 2011 Nova Domus Riserva White (Alto Adige)
properties.description: A blend of 60% Pinot Bianco, 30% Chardonnay and 10% Sauvignon, it conveys aromas of oak, lemon drop and candied fruits. The round palate offers intense but fleeting sensations of Golden Delicous apples and butterscotch. This is already accessible so drink soon.

properties.title: Dorigo 2014 Ribolla Gialla (Friuli Colli Orientali)
properties.address: SP79, 1, 33040 Premariacco UD, Italy
properties.description: Fresh and delicately scented, this offers aromas of white spring flower, orchard fruit and citrus. The vibrant palate shows crisp apple, white peach and lemon zest balanced by firm acidity.

properties.title: Erste Neue 2014 Classic Sauvignon (Alto Adige)
properties.description: Varietal aromas of tomato vine, elderflower, gooseberry and citrus lead the nose and follow through to the palate along with grapefruit, sage and mineral. Racy acidity leaves a crisp finish.

properties.title: Fiegl 2013 Leopold White (Collio)
properties.description: Aromas of white flower, crushed herb, fennel and cut grass emerge on this vibrant white. The bright palate shows citrus zest, mint and mineral alongside crisp acidity.

properties.title: Fruscalzo 2014 Friulano (Collio)
properties.description: Beeswax, acacia honey and toasted nut aromas carry over to palate along with yellow apple and mineral. It closes on a note of bitter almond.

properties.title: Gigante 2013 Chardonnay (Friuli Colli Orientali)
properties.address: Località Rocca Bernarda, 3, 33040 Corno di Rosazzo UD, Italy
properties.description: Delicate aromas of yellow flower, beeswax and orchard fruit lead the way. The palate is bright and straightforward while offering tastes of yellow apple skin, citrus and a hint of mineral carried by bright acidity.

properties.title: Weinreich 2013 Trocken Riesling (Rheinhessen)
properties.description: Ripe, succulent yellow peaches and tangerines seem grazed by razor-edged shards of lime and grapefruit in this dry, squarely structured Riesling. Light-footed and lively, it's straightforward refreshment to be enjoyed now through 2018.

properties.title: Von Der Leyen 2014 Riesling (Nahe)
properties.description: While the nose is subdued, the palate of this off-dry Riesling is unexpectedly fruity, brimming with juicy peach and nectarine flavors. It's simple and straightforward but a refreshing, satisfying sip. Drink now through 2017.

properties.title: Peter Zemmer 2014 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Weinstraße, 24, 39040 Kurtinig an der Weinstraße, Autonome Provinz Bozen - Südtirol, Italy
properties.description: Aromas of wisteria and green apple lead the way on this straightforward white. The tangy palate tastes of juicy pear, citrus and a hint of white almond while zesty acidity and a mineral note give the finish a slight lift.

properties.title: Plaisance Ranch 2014 Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (Applegate Valley)
properties.description: Barrel-fermented in neutral wood, this gives a quick whiff of buttered croissant, then dives into a moderately ripe palate with lime, pineapple and lemon rind. It's an all-purpose and appealing wine that is drinking nicely right now.

properties.title: Poggiobello 2014 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
properties.address: Località Poggiobello, 12, 33044 Oleis UD, Italy
properties.description: This opens with aromas of hay, pressed yellow flower and orchard fruit. The direct palate offers yellow apple skin, toasted nut and a mineral note alongside invigorating acidity.

properties.title: Previous 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 2805 Spring Mountain Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Closed and youthful, this wine is medium in build and subtle in oak. It conveys a briny streak throughout the palate, and a distinct taste of candied lemon.

properties.title: Primosic 2014 Santa Lucia Pinot Grigio (Collio)
properties.description: Gold with copper hues, this opens with aromas of wildflower, tangerine zest and a whiff of crushed stone. The vibrant palate offers rennet apple, lime, ginger drop and a hint of mineral alongside mouthwatering acidity.

properties.title: Quinta da Romeira 2014 Prova Régia Arinto (Lisboa)
properties.description: Arinto is the real local grape of the small city of Bucelas where this quinta is located. This fresh wine shows its light mineral and citrus character very well. It also brings out riper fruit flavors that fill it out and give it a rich character. The wine is ready to drink now.

properties.title: Hans Lang 2013 Gutswein Trocken Riesling (Rheingau)
properties.description: Freshly pressed apple and pear are brightened by squirts of lemon and lime in this refreshing dry Riesling. Zesty and spry, it's a thirst-quenching wine for everyday drinking now through 2018.

properties.title: Kandarian 2012 Croft Vineyards Sauvignon Blanc (Willamette Valley)
properties.description: Kandorian makes a stainless-steel version of Sauvignon Blanc, and also this heavily-oaked style, which is about as far in the other direction as possible. It's deep gold, scented with strong whiskey-barrel aromas, and tasting of nut oil and superripe apples, plus plenty of oak.

properties.title: Kettmeir 2014 Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)
properties.description: Delicate aromas of orchard fruit and white spring flower mingle together while the reserved but refined palate offers green apple and mineral. Crisp acidity and a hint of mineral give it a clean finish.

properties.title: Lawer 2014 Cannon Block Estate Grown Chardonnay (Knights Valley)
properties.description: Fleshy and full-figured, this wine is made in a big, expansive style. It's rounded in vanillin oak and a bite of honeycomb, with lighter accompaniments of mango and pear.

properties.title: Roche 2013 Barrel Select American Oak Reserve Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.address: 122 W Spain St, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.description: Thick, rich and ripe in vanilla, the American oak in this wine is pronounced and intense, wrapping itself around notes of candied apple and toffee-caramel.

properties.title: Ronco dei Tassi 2014 Sauvignon (Collio)
properties.description: Grapefruit, mineral and freshly cut grass aromas lead the way. On the palate, brisk acidity supports pink grapefruit, tangerine and a mineral note.

properties.title: Trapiche 2007 Oak Cask Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: C. Nueva Mayorga s/n, M5513 Maipú, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Opening aromas of cola and dark fruits are belied by the tangy, edgy palate that's fresh in terms of its raspberry and plum flavors but not all that deep or complex. A clean, straightforward wine with zest but limited flavors.

properties.title: Kenwood 2005 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
properties.description: Soft and fleshy, this Cab has forward flavors of berries, chocolate, cedar and spices, with a touch of sweaty leather. Polished and easy to drink now.

properties.title: Zuccardi 2008 Serie A Chardonnay-Viognier (Mendoza)
properties.description: Mild, light aromas of apple, toast, mineral and petrol are solid before they evaporate, while the palate is easygoing and on target, with citrus and apple flavors. Without calling it overly exciting or complex, we like the mix of Chardonnay and Viognier because it's lively, fresh and perfectly drinkable.

properties.title: Bodegas Julián Chivite 2008 Gran Feudo Rosado Rosé (Navarra)
properties.description: Sweet and sour aromas amount to a prickly bouquet, while the palate has some flesh as well as freshness. Nectarine and spiced apple flavors are solid but pithy, and overall the wine is good but lacks concentration. Good for everyday quaffing.

properties.title: Caves Aliança 2008 Galeria Branco Bical (Bairrada)
properties.address: R. Comércio 444, 3780 Sangalhos, Portugal
properties.description: Initially a tightly textured, apple and pear skin flavored wine. As it opens up, it shows creamy, fresh fruit, with pear and white currant freshness, finished with green walnuts and a burst of acidity.

properties.title: DFJ Vinhos 2008 Grand'Arte Chardonnay Chardonnay (Estremadura)
properties.address: 2070-681 Vila Chã de Ourique, Portugal
properties.description: Creamy, green plum- and wood-flavored Chardonnay, clean, somewhat anonymous. Hints of citrus and acidity help keep the wine fresh, giving a final, easy crisp finish.

properties.title: Gigante 2007 Sauvignon (Colli Orientali del Friuli)
properties.description: Here's a flatter, perhaps more neutral expression of the fragrant Sauvignon variety that offers citrus-like zest in the mouth and tonic aromas of exotic fruit, papaya and mango. Pair this wine with appetizers or finger foods—but avoid anything with lemon because the wine already has a strong citric side.

properties.title: Furlan 2008 Castelcosa Sauvignon (Venezia Giulia)
properties.address: Vicolo Saccon, 48, 31020 San Vendemiano TV, Italy
properties.description: There's a pure almond note here of Amaretto, marzipan and almond milk. In fact, there's not much else except for distant notes of white flower and peach. The mouthfeel is tonic and fresh but thin.

properties.title: Cline 2008 Marsanne Roussanne (Sonoma Coast)
properties.description: Dry and crisp, but a little heavy in fruity extract. Shows direct flavors of apricots and orange meringue pie filling.

properties.title: Bodega Don Bosco 2006 Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipú)
properties.description: Opens with light but earthy raspberry aromas and plum, and then it breaks up a bit with airing. The palate is lean but fresh and gritty, with cherry and cola flavors in front of a limited, narrow finish. Run-of-the-mill, which isn't bad given the price.

properties.title: Bastianich 2008 B Sauvignon (Venezia Giulia)
properties.address: Via Darnazzacco, 44/2, 33043 Cividale del Friuli UD, Italy
properties.description: This is a clean and compact Sauvignon (in a screwcap bottle) with floral-like aromas of white flower, honeysuckle and jasmine backed by sweet exotic fruit. The wine is thin and compact in the mouth with a tart citrusy finish.

properties.title: Borges 2008 Gatão White (Vinho Verde)
properties.description: This familiar brand of Vinho Verde has long been in a sweeter style. But this latest vintage seems to have brought out the fresh, crisp fruits, and pushed back the sweetness. The result is a delicious summer apéritif style that leaves a clean, light taste in the mouth.

properties.title: Elgin Vintners 2009 Viognier (Elgin)
properties.description: Fresh and light with ripe fruit notes of red apple and apricot spiced with hints of white florals and lime zest. The medium weight mouth is juicy and clean, the ripe stone fruit flavors carrying through to the close. Drink now.

properties.title: Mi Sueño 2008 Chardonnay (Los Carneros)
properties.description: Flamboyantly rich and manipulated Chardonnay, with buttered popcorn, tropical fruit and caramaelized toast flavors. Feels a little heavy-handed, but lots of Chard lovers will like it.

properties.title: Rocca del Principe 2009  Fiano di Avellino
properties.description: This expression of Fiano comes forward with crisp, clean aromas of freshly cut lemon, orange blossom and almond paste. The mouthfeel is tonic and lean, but the real point here is the wine's freshness.

properties.title: Skouras 2009 Almyra Chardonnay (Peloponnese)
properties.description: This fresh but spicy Chardonnay starts with tropical fruit, citrus and floral aromas leading into a great fruit and acid balance. The minerality keeps the wine fresh and lifted, giving it a food-friendly edge. A great go-to white.

properties.title: Taverna 2009 Dry Muscat Moscato Giallo (Basilicata)
properties.description: Handpicked Moscato Giallo grapes are vinified as a dry white wine that opens with intensely fragrant aromas of peach, honeysuckle, papaya and mango. The nose is really beautiful and the mouthfeel is indeed dry and simple with a touch of zest and sour spice on the close.

properties.title: Terredora 2009 Coda di Volpe (Lacryma Christi del Vesuvio)
properties.description: This luminous Lacryma Christi opens with bright aromas of citrus, pear, stone fruit and shows slight hints of vanilla and pine nut as well. It sits tight on the palate thanks to its crispness and tonic firmness.

properties.title: Ventisquero 2009 Reserva Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
properties.description: Pretty good, sturdy and clean. The nose shows good white fruits and minerally notes, with a bit of toast. In the mouth, it's healthy and sweet, with tropical flavors of melon and papaya along with creamy pear. Finishes sweet, with some vanilla.

properties.title: KWV 2010 Sauvignon Blanc (Western Cape)
properties.description: Soft grass, green gooseberry and a hint of fig unfold on the nose, while ripe green plum and lime rind fill the medium-weight mouth. Clean and easy to drink; pair with crab salad canapés.

properties.title: Ara 2009 Resolute Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.description: Riper in style than Ara's Composite bottling, offering straightforward pineapple fruit and a clean, refreshing style. It's nicely balanced, with a mouthwatering finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Château du Coing de Saint-Fiacre 2009 Coing de Sèvre Sur Lie  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
properties.address: Le Coin, 44690 Saint-Fiacre-sur-Maine, France
properties.description: An intensely fresh wine, touched lightly by spritz that brings out the lemon character. The acidity lifts the whole wine deliciously.

properties.title: De Sante 2008 Old Vine Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.description: This is a richly sweet Chardonnay, made in the popular style, for drinking now. The orange, pineapple and apricot flavors are savory, and the oak gives caramel notes.

properties.title: Domaine de Pajot 2009 Les Quatre Cépages White (Vin de Pays des Côtes de Gascogne)
properties.description: A very perfumed wine, with white flower aromas, flavors of herbs and spice. It has weight as well as acidity, a tangy structured edge. Screwcap.

properties.title: Domaines Barons de Rothschild (Lafite) 2010 Los Vascos Sauvignon Blanc (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: Pres. Alvear 151, M5504 ABH, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Pungent and sweaty smelling, with nettle and other sharp aromas. Surprisingly, the palate is short on acidity so there's a flat feel along with green, salinic flavors that border on vegetal. For proof, there's a clear wave of asparagus to the finish. Not as good as in past years.

properties.title: Eventide Cellar 2009 Viognier (Wellington)
properties.description: Ripe and fruit forward with lush notes of melon, banana and sweet tropical fruit citrus throughout. Medium weight, the finish is loaded with juicy fresh peach flavors. Drink now.

properties.title: Gadais Père et Fils 2010 Emotions  (Muscadet)
properties.description: Bright young wine, with an attractive lemon character, very fresh and crisp. Simple Muscadet for the summer.

properties.title: Grafen Neipperg 2008 Trocken Spätburgunder (Württemberg)
properties.address: Schloßstraße 12, 74193 Schwaigern, Germany
properties.description: A pretty, vibrant Pinot Noir from southern Germany, featuring strawberry and raspberry fruit, some slightly herbal nuances and a bright, lively finish. Drink now–2013.

properties.title: Valentin Bianchi 2012 Elsa Bianchi Chardonnay (Mendoza)
properties.description: Light aromas of tropical fruits and white flowers are basic and open. An average feeling palate carries sweet flavors of tropical fruits like pineapple and mango accented by vanilla. Throw in a sprinkle of powdered sugar and you get the picture.

properties.title: Vetrère 2011 Cré Vendemmia Tardiva Fiano (Salento)
properties.address: sp Monte Iasi Montemesola km 16, 74123 Taranto TA, Italy
properties.description: This is a sweet and thin dessert wine with aromas of peach, pear and honey that are muddled at times. The price is pretty good, however, for those who want to try a late harvest Fiano Minutolo.

properties.title: Tenute Mater Domini 2011 Marangi Sauvignon Blanc (Salento)
properties.description: This is a bright and fragrant Sauvignon from the deep south of Italy that shows citrus and melon with back notes of almond and dried sage. The wine does not offer the aromatic intensity of the variety but it does offer good structure on the close.

properties.title: Villa Pozzi 2012 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)
properties.description: This easy-drinking Grigio from the deep south of Italy opens with bright lemon and peach followed by a thick, waxy feel in the mouth. It could use a tad more acidity to keep it fresh.

properties.title: Vina Robles 2012 Huerhuero Viognier (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3700 Mill Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Almost as sweet as a dessert wine, this Viognier has flavors of white sugar and a fruit juice blend of oranges, mangoes and peaches.

properties.title: Vinum 2011 White Elephant White (California)
properties.description: Made in a rich, ripe style, this Chenin Blanc-based blend has enough acidity for balance. It offers rich golden mango, orange and honey flavors.

properties.title: Miracle Valley 2011 Viognier (Virginia)
properties.description: With its notes of button mushroom and mineral, this bottling has earthy appeal. Browned apple and toasted baguette scents complete the bouquet. Medium bodied and broad in feel, the palate offers a note of toasted almond that adds a touch of bitter tension. The acidity is mild on the attack, but it gains some vigor as the wine progresses across the palate.

properties.title: Arrowood 2010 Reserve Speciale Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
properties.description: You'll find tropical fruit flavors in this Chardonnay, but they're not strong enough to stand up to the weight of oak. It's a little too soft as well. Disappointing.

properties.title: Aveleda 2012 Grinalda White (Vinho Verde)
properties.description: Off dry, crisp, and with a strong citrus element that gives a lemon-candy character to the wine. It's a light, bright wine that's great for drinking this summer. Screwcap.

properties.title: Bella Bollè 2012  Moscato d'Asti
properties.address: 2410 Land O' Lakes Blvd, Land O' Lakes, FL 34639, USA
properties.description: Packaged in a bright blue bottle, this fresh Moscato d'Asti delivers soft aromas of peach and white flower followed by a spicy touch of crisp acidity that you can really feel at the back of the tongue. Pair this easy wine with spongecake, fresh strawberries and whipped cream.

properties.title: Casarena 2012 505 Chardonnay (Mendoza)
properties.address: Brandsen 505, M5544 BDK, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: This standard Chardonnay opens with blowsy melon and papaya aromas. The palate holds onto that melony feel while dealing honeydew, papaya and fleshy apple flavors. The finish tastes sweet and kind of flat.

properties.title: Cave de Lugny 2012 Florières  (Mâcon-Villages)
properties.description: A very soft, fruity wine, with a gentle, creamy texture and light acidity. It's fresh with vanilla and pear flavors, and ready to drink.

properties.title: CK Mondavi 2012 Willow Springs Moscato (California)
properties.description: Made in the sweet, crisp and fruity style that made Moscato catch on with so many consumers, this could double as a dessert sipper. It has flavors of orange meringue pie and vanilla honey.

properties.title: De Martino 2015 Legado Reserva Sauvignon Blanc (Casablanca Valley)
properties.description: Pungent briny citrus aromas announce a lean, tangy palate. This edgy SB features zesty, sharp citrus and green-herb flavors, which are typical for Casablanca. A dilute finish displays watered-down snap.

properties.title: Giesen 2016 Pinot Gris (New Zealand)
properties.address: 26 Rapaura Road, Renwick 7273, New Zealand
properties.description: Is it possible for a wine to taste like a blenderized bowl of fruit salad? That comes close to describing this mix of pear, melon and pineapple. It's medium bodied and seems almost sweet, then finishes clean and refreshing.

properties.title: Grey's Peak 2015 Waipara Sauvignon Blanc (Waipara)
properties.description: Sourced from a region along the eastern coast of the South Island, this is fresh and greenish on the nose—think green onion, cut grass, lime—yet riper-tasting, offering hints of stone fruit and melon. It's a pleasant mix that finishes soft and easy. Drink now.

properties.title: Treleaven 2014 Semi-Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 658 Lake Rd, King Ferry, NY 13081, USA
properties.description: Zippy white grapefruit and lemon juxtapose more savory tones of crushed mineral, pressed apple and pear in this off-dry Riesling. The palate is sprightly and bright with a clean, moderately persistent finish. Drink now through 2019.

properties.title: J. Lohr 2014 Seven Oaks Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.description: Baked boysenberries, purple flowers and baking spice show on the nose of this widely available bottling. The palate is quite minerally, with crushed lava rocks, followed by cooked elderberry, black-cherry pie and a touch of clove.

properties.title: Keira 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: A blend of Stillwater Creek and Conner Lee Vineyard fruit, this wine brings aromas of dried cherry and cranberry. The flavors are restrained but still show depth, seeming a bit dried out.

properties.title: Pine Ridge 1997 Cabernet Sauvignon (Howell Mountain)
properties.description: Blackberries and some funk in the nose: earth, leather, even a whiff of banana. Dark chocolate and an interesting citrus element add character to the standard berry fruit in the mouth. It's youthful juice, needing time to flesh itself out; now there's a lot of rambunctious black oak, which makes the wine seem a bit one-dimensional.

properties.title: Rieflé 1996 Steinert Tokay Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.description: There's a funky, waxy edge to this wine that adds complexity to its honeyed melon, lime and pear aromas and flavors. It's quite full-bodied, and carries a bit of residual sugar as well, making it a prime candidate to match with mild curries and the like.

properties.title: Thunder Mountain 1997 Bates Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Cruz Mountains)
properties.description: Thunder Mountain wines often display a lot of character and evoke strong responses from our tasters. This ultradark Cabernet is no exception, with its overt heavy toast and black-olive aromas and flavors, heavy extraction, and full, but somewhat astringent, mouthfeel. Through all this it remains compelling, if not presently accessible. Needs five to seven years.

properties.title: Shafer 1997 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: A little reticent and cool at first; patient airing allows it to open up and display raspberry, cola and herbal aromatics, followed by spicy black-cherry fruit. It's a very clean, pure, proper wine that will competently grace most dinner tables.

properties.title: Louis Latour 1998 Morgeot Premier Cru  (Chassagne-Montrachet)
properties.address: 18 Rue des Tonneliers, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: Very firm and tight, with streaks of mineral and textures of earth. Unyielding and a bit over-sulfered, but it hints and depth and concentration.

properties.title: Topel 1997 Hidden Vineyard Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendocino)
properties.address: 125 Matheson St, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Opens with bright, tart fruit displaying berry, cherry and rhubarb qualities. This north-country candidate has good scale and mouthfeel. Berry, earth and leather flavors, smooth dry tannins, and a dusty earth note on the finish close out this medium-weight and balanced offering. Drink now through 2008.

properties.title: The Terraces 1997 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Dark berry, leather and herbaceous notes on the nose open to cherry, currant and tobacco flavors—it's all very much in the Bordeaux vein. The mouthfeel is similar: somewhat lean and angular but very flavorful, with an expansive cherry flavor on the spicy, long finish. Has good tannic structure, and may merit a higher score with some age. Hold for four to six years, and then drink til 2012.

properties.title: Karl Lawrence 1997 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Interesting aromatics of cumin, tree bark, chocolate and more on top of black fruit: cassis and plum, mostly. Oak and currants bring it home, with a fair share of toasted oak speaking up on the finish. Rich, plush and drinkable almost immediately.

properties.title: Dry Creek Vineyard 1997 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.description: A creamy drop of vanilla turns the red fruit this way and that; at one moment it's peppery and offers tastes of fennel, and then it is pure plums and cassis. Dry, dusty and earthy, this wine shows solid fundamentals. The early line is for a strong future.

properties.title: August Briggs 1997 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Mountain)
properties.description: Black fruit with a touch of prune and meat on the nose. Oak-lashed plums and currants in the mouth taste a bit burnt from the wood treatment. A woody express train, with lots of coffee. Fans of dark, structured, oaky wines will get a kick out of this one.

properties.title: Merryvale 1997 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Rich, dense and cool, with an overt menthol streak. The fat, tangy fruit has a cedar edge and also a pronounced piercing quality. Round, voluminous, tannic and in general quite big. Now the wood is a bit heavy-handed. A year or two on its side should help it along.

properties.title: Robert Mondavi 1997 SLD Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
properties.description: A little prune, cherry and tobacco mix on the nose with some leafiness, creating a bouquet similar to Bordeaux. Black cherry and licorice are the predominant flavors, and in the end game there's a subdued coffee-tinged, reserved character to it.

properties.title: Lolonis 1997 Private Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Redwood Valley)
properties.description: Easy-drinking, this is an example of a lighter, but still very satisfying style of Cabernet. The bouquet is tart berries, cedar, tobacco and rhubarb. Smooth and evenly textured, the palate displays cola and sweet tobacco flavors. Tangy tannins and dried fruit and spice flavors on the finish close this forward charmer from Mendocino.

properties.title: Herzog 1997 Special Edition Warnecke Vyd Cabernet Sauvignon (Chalk Hill)
properties.address: 3201 Camino Del Sol, Oxnard, CA 93030, USA
properties.description: A big mouth-filling offering with lots of oak/cedar and coffee/mocha shadings. Sweet-and-sour stewed berry flavors and black-toast accents play on the fairly large-scaled palate. A tart chocolate note enters on the finish, which displays firm but fine tannins. It's the best Cabernet we've ever tasted from this Kosher winery, and it should improve over the next two to four years.

properties.title: Domaine Denis Gaudry 1999 Pouilly Fume  (Pouilly-Fumé)
properties.description: Crisp, with grapefruit aromas and flavors, this is textbook Loire Sauvignon Blanc. A mild smoky, mineral note adds complexity, and the full fruit is clean and ripe, yet not at all sweet. Pulls it all off with lots of class and style. This is still the model the New Zealanders are using in their Sauvignon Blanc efforts.

properties.title: M. Trinchero 1997 Founder's Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Plummy aromas, black-cherry and oak, and accents of vanilla and cream. It's tight now, fairly begging for time to unfold. Presently the cherry core borders on tart. With time it should soften.

properties.title: Stonehaven 1999 Chardonnay (Limestone Coast)
properties.description: Opening with an attractive buttery, leesy, toasty oak nose, this Chardonnay shows good fruit complexity, blending stone fruits, citrus and melon flavors against an appealing mineral-chalk element. Good mouthfeel and a lengthy finish complete the package.

properties.title: B.R. Cohn 1997 Olive Hill Estate Vyds Special Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
properties.address: 15000 Sonoma Hwy, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.description: Crisp in the nose, with nuances of graham cracker, menthol, mushroom and herbs. Those herbal notes carry into the flavor profile and mix with plum and oak. It opens up a little and becomes fairly friendly on the finish, where the tannins are medium.

properties.title: Louis Latour 1998  Chassagne-Montrachet
properties.description: Scents of pineapple and hazelnuts open into a lush, spicy, forward, slightly toasty wine with immediate drinkablility and appeal.

properties.title: Liparita 1997 Vineyard Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Packed in upfront, with some atypical grassy, wildflower aromas. Chunky fruit and Port-like flavors make a statement, as does a black-tea note on the finish. Slightly clumsy now, the hope here is that some time in the cellar will help weld any incongruent elements.

properties.title: Guenoc 1997 Reserve Bella Vista Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: An inviting and fragrant nose of blackberry, soy, vanilla and pine opens this medium-weight offering. Tangy, with tart berry, brown sugar and tobacco, it has a bracing mouthfeel with firm acidity, reading almost like a Tuscan red on the palate. Tart and sweet, the finish is brisk.

properties.title: Louis Latour 1998 Château de Blagny Premier Cru  (Meursault)
properties.description: Richly scented with citrus blossoms, mineral and spice. Nicely balanced and light, the flavors are layered and intermingled through an elegant, firm, satisfying finish.

properties.title: Elk Cove 2015 Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
properties.description: One of Oregon's finest values in Pinot Gris, this offers big, juicy flavors of luscious apple and pear, backed with punchy citrus. The ample acidity tastes of lemon and grapefruit, and a notable wash of minerality comes up in the finish. The blend includes small percentages of Gewürztraminer and Muscat.

properties.title: Frankland Estate 2014 Rocky Gully Riesling (Frankland River)
properties.address: 530 Rocky Gully-Frankland Rd, Frankland River WA 6396, Australia
properties.description: This vintage of Rocky Gully Riesling comes across as quite ripe and rich despite the modest alcohol content. Smoky hints of struck flint and heating oil spice up flavors of baked apple and vanilla, then linger on the finish.

properties.title: Balthasar Ress 2014 Feinherb Riesling (Rheingau)
properties.description: Blossoms and pink grapefruits scent this fresh, fruity wine. Off dry in style, it's concentrated in plush, tropical flavors of guava and mango yet calibrated neatly by a vein of lime acidity. It's guzzably fresh and approachable but refined enough for elegant dining occasions. Drink now through 2019.

properties.title: Cantine di Marzo 2015  Greco di Tufo
properties.description: Juicy and delicious, this has aromas of ripe orchard fruit and fragrant Spanish broom. The succulent palate doles out crisp Granny Smith apple, Anjou pear, nectarine and mineral alongside bright acidity.

properties.title: Chanson Père et Fils 2013 Bastion Premier Cru  (Beaune)
properties.description: Aromas of this wine show considerable wood. On the palate, the wood is very present, giving acidity as well as layers of toast and spice. Hints of yellow fruit show through, suggesting the possibility of a ripe, rich wine in the future. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: Cusumano 2015 Shamaris Grillo (Sicilia)
properties.address: 432 S Main St, Old Forge, PA 18518, USA
properties.description: Apple, yellow flower and sea breeze aromas lead the way. The bright, elegant palate displays lemon, lime and walnut alongside vibrant acidity. A mineral vein underscores the savory flavors. Drink now or hold another two or three years for more complexity.

properties.title: Jean-Marc Bernhard 2014 Pinot Blanc (Alsace)
properties.description: Very subtle hints of ripe, red apple hover above the glass. They become more apparent and richer on the slightly spiced palate that also shows hints of pepper and saffron. There is concentration on the palate and ample definition and structure provided by clean, brisk freshness.

properties.title: Kale 2015 Rosé (Sonoma County)
properties.description: A majority of Grenache and tiny bit of Mourvèdre from Kick Ranch and McGah Vineyard were racked to concrete egg for fermentation, with the intent of preserving freshness. Successful in that quest, this orange-pink wine is dry, tangy and well-integrated in terms of acidity, subtle in cranberry, dried cherry and orange, with a light, refreshing finish.

properties.title: Lava Cap 2015 Estate Bottled Sauvignon Blanc (El Dorado)
properties.description: Light herb aromas and vivid apple flavors make this medium-bodied wine delicious, while the tangy, nervy texture keeps the mouth tingling. It has great balance, concentration and length on the finish.

properties.title: Leon Beyer 2015 Pinot Blanc (Alsace)
properties.description: Summer fruit and fresh ripeness dominate: think red apple, yellow plum and breezy lemon freshness. This wine is really uplifting, light, fresh and friendly: it paints a picture of summer aperos under open skies. Drink soon.

properties.title: Château Coussin 2016 Le Rosé de S Rosé (Mediterranée)
properties.description: This light blend of wines from across Provence is crisp but somewhat lacking in flavor. It has a light, bright aftertaste. Drink now.

properties.title: Columbia Crest 2015 Reserve Boushey Vineyard Grenache Blanc (Yakima Valley)
properties.description: Light aromas of rose petal, herb and spice lead to dry, white grapefruit flavors that fall a bit flat.

properties.title: Quinta da Lagoalva de Cima 2016 Espirito Lagoalva Rosé (Tejo)
properties.address: Quinta Lagoalva De Cima, 2090-222 Alpiarça, Portugal
properties.description: This is a light, bright rosé that is made to drink as young as possible. It is crisp with raspberry fruit and gentle acidity. Drink now.

properties.title: Santa Rita 2016 120 Reserva Especial Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
properties.description: Creamy aromas of milk chocolate and berry fruits set up a moderately gripping palate. Nonspecific berry and clove flavors finish plump and chewy, with a strong oak character on the close.

properties.title: Santa Rita 2016 120 Reserva Especial Rosé (Central Valley)
properties.address: 2923 Grand Ave, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.description: This red-colored rosé smells a bit briny, like pickled strawberry. The palate is somewhat round, with initial flavors of raspberry and strawberry that turn a bit peppery on the finish.

properties.title: Armstrong Family 2015 Dineen Vineyard Riesling (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 14 W Main St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: The aromas are surprisingly light considering the variety, with whiffs of both lime and peach. It drinks dry, with the variety difficult to discern.

properties.title: De Martino 2015 Viejas Tinajas Muscat (Itata Valley)
properties.description: This tan-colored Muscat was fermented and aged in clay amphora, hence the “viejas tinajas” name. Aromatically, this is strained and smells vaguely of apricot and citrus peel. The palate is drawing due to heavy skins contact during fermentation and aging, while a short set of bitter apricot flavors is more challenging than pleasurable. Better to wait for the 2016. This is past its prime.

properties.title: Sevtap 2013 Ayla Late Harvest Viognier (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 23 E Canon Perdido St, Santa Barbara, CA 93101, USA
properties.description: Walnut oil, orange rinds and burned caramel converge for a Scotch-like aroma on the nose of this late harvest wine. Sour orange and bitter walnut flavors show on the sip.

properties.title: Snoqualmie 2015 ECO Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: Quite light aromas are followed by dry, somewhat diluted fruit flavors. The variety seems to get lost and it drinks more like a generic white wine.

properties.title: Unparalleled 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
properties.address: N2185 Sleepy Hollow Rd, Kewaunee, WI 54216, USA
properties.description: Pressed plum and dried berry meet with leather on the nose, becoming a bit musty over time. The dusty flavors carry to the sip, where underripe bramble provides tang but little else.

properties.title: Viña Chocalan 2016 Reserva Chardonnay (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Ruta G60 km 6, Melipilla, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: Yeasty aromas of white flowers and ham don't stir much interest. This feels medium in body and fairly bland. Yeasty flavors of vanilla and white fruits are more nondescript than particular.

properties.title: Stickybeak 2015 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: This is a muddled, roughly textured effort, rich and ripe in cinnamon apple that hides its oak use well.

properties.title: Wakefield 2016 Promised Land Unwooded Chardonnay (South Australia)
properties.description: Passion fruit, melon and guava flood across the palate in waves of unnuanced tropical fruit. This is medium-bodied and plump in the mouth, with an almost juice-like feel.

properties.title: Lafage 2015 Chardonnay (Vin de France)
properties.description: This ripe, fruity, rounded wine has a soft texture, rich apricot fruit and just enough acidity. The texture is immediately attractive—fruity with a touch of crispness at the end. Drink now.

properties.title: Casal da Coelheira 2016 Rosé (Tejo)
properties.address: N118 1331, 2205-681 Tramagal, Portugal
properties.description: A ripe and soft style of rosé with its full strawberry fruits and only light acidity. Fruity and smooth, this bend of Touriga Nacional and Syrah is ready to drink.

properties.title: DeLorimier 2013 Smith Orchard Vineyard Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 2001 CA-128, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.description: Sticky, puckering tannins wake up the palate and grab it for a wild ride in this reserve-level wine, which is densely ripe and burly in blackberry and tar.

properties.title: Quinta do Cavalinho 2016 Herdade dos Templários White (Tejo)
properties.description: This is a very herbal wine with a grassy, perfumed character from the Riesling and Moscatel in the blend. It doesn't come off.

properties.title: Famiglia Meschini 2015 Unoaked Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
properties.description: Aromas of pink grapefruit and passion fruit are more in the Sauvignon Blanc field than your typical Chardonnay. Citric and bouncy on the palate, this tastes of tart grapefruit, orange peel and salt, and it stays that way through the finish.

properties.title: Porta 2000 Chardonnay (Cachapoal Valley)
properties.address: 425 Aviation Blvd, Santa Rosa, CA 95403, USA
properties.description: The gold luster is eye grabbing, and the nose doesn't back off as it yields cream, vanilla and toast atop tropical fruit. The mouth is full, with creamy pear and apple fruit and lots of oak. It's on the plus side in terms of power and weight, but it's largely balanced and clean.

properties.title: Foxes Island 1999 Chardonnay (Marlborough)
properties.description: Toasted wheat bread is layered with fresh peaches and honey in this lightweight yet flavorful Chardonnay. Peach and vanilla flavors finish cleanly, marked by a lingering toasty edge.

properties.title: Caroline Bay 2000 Chardonnay (Hawke's Bay)
properties.address: Virtue Avenue, Timaru Port, Timaru 7910, New Zealand
properties.description: An oaky style, yet one that doesn't seem heavy or overdone. Buttered apple and toast aromas set off cinnamon and cashew flavors and a long, spicy-nutty finish.

properties.title: Stonehaven 2001 Chardonnay (South Eastern Australia)
properties.address: Padthaway SA 5271, Australia
properties.description: This wine could be the poster boy for Australian Chardonnay. The nectarine and peach aromas and flavors are coddled by a touch of vanilla and the entire package is soft, juicy and easy to drink. It's nothing fancy, just yummy weekday wine.

properties.title: Errazuriz 2000 La Escultura Estate - Reserva Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: E-639 18, Panquehue, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.description: Attractive aromas of pear and coconut set the stage for clean, fruity pear and apple flavors. This wine is balanced, offering length on the palate and finish, but also defined flavors and freshness. By all indications it's well made, and best of all it tastes as it should. Best Buy.

properties.title: Nga Waka 2000 Chardonnay (Martinborough)
properties.address: 6 Kitchener Street, Martinborough 5711, New Zealand
properties.description: Starts off with toasted almond, pear and citrus aromas, evolving into pear and orange in the mouth. This medium-weight Chard is a nice drink that finishes with some slightly aggressive wood and a trace of grapefruit.

properties.title: Arthur's Creek 1999 Chardonnay (Yarra Valley)
properties.address: 225 Shaws Rd, Arthurs Creek VIC 3099, Australia
properties.description: Wow—talk about contrasts. The nose is way over the top, a grotesque parody of a butterscotch sundae. The finish is multilayered and complex, featuring echoes of toast and white peaches. In between is a somewhat neutral-tasting wine. You may love it or you may hate it—it's that kind of wine.

properties.title: Salena Estate 2001 Chardonnay (Riverland)
properties.address: 837 Bookpurnong Rd, Bookpurnong SA 5333, Australia
properties.description: This warm-climate Chard shows its origins in its ripe, sweet peach-nectar aromas, kissed with caramel and smoke. Weighty in the mouth—close to syrupy—then it finishes cleanly in a burst of tart, lime-like acidity.

properties.title: Plantagenet 1999 Mount Barker Chardonnay (Western Australia)
properties.address: Lot 45 Albany Hwy, Mount Barker WA 6323, Australia
properties.description: Leads off with dusty, nutty, sugary aromas, like the bottom of the bag of honey-roasted peanuts, but there's also hints of buttered toast, ripe pears and black pepper. Flavors are simpler—caramel and pineapple—and it's heavy on the palate.

properties.title: Willow Creek 2001 Unoaked Chardonnay (Mornington Peninsula)
properties.address: 166 Balnarring Rd, Merricks North VIC 3926, Australia
properties.description: From a cool-weather region, this tangy, slightly sharp Chardonnay aims at a Chablis style and almost pulls it off. Smells ripe, with pear and guava notes, but the palate is less so—grapefruit and lima-bean flavors prevail.

properties.title: Alfredo Roca 2015 Dedicación Personal Sauvignon Blanc
properties.address: Ruta Provincial 165 esq. La Pichana, Cañada Seca, M5603XAG San Rafael, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Dusty stone-fruit and white-flower aromas are mature, while the palate is linear and citric. Dry salty flavors of pineapple and tangerine finish with notes of mustard, lemon and brine.

properties.title: Aquinas 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa County-Sonoma County-Lake County)
properties.address: 47W614 IL-38, Maple Park, IL 60151, USA
properties.description: This red sources from across three appellations and four varieties, all aged in a mix of French and American oak for one year. That oak imparts a smoky element around thick, concentrated baked fruit and big, lasting tannin weight, showing plenty of leathery tobacco.

properties.title: Clos Teddi 2015 Rosé (Patrimonio)
properties.address: 2040 Niderer Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Ripe and full, this wine is balanced with its rich strawberry fruit, with enough acidity to keep everything fresh. It's a fruity, spicy wine that is ready to drink.

properties.title: Two Vines 2014 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 324 Hillcrest Dr, Cape Girardeau, MO 63701, USA
properties.description: This is a straightforward, varietally correct wine, with aromas of apple and spice. The palate is on the lighter side of medium bodied, bringing a sense of texture.

properties.title: Vintales 2015 Sunset Rosé (Western Cape)
properties.address: 8021 Paseo Avellano, Carlsbad, CA 92009, USA
properties.description: This is a very fragrant and floral rosé, reminiscent of peach gummy candies, orange blossom and orange-ginger tea. The palate is surprisingly lush, with round ripe-fruit flavors that are just barely lifted on the finish. Drink now.

properties.title: North by Northwest 2015 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 20980 NE Niederberger Rd, Dundee, OR 97115, USA
properties.description: Subdued aromas of melon and apple lead to medium-bodied fruit flavors. It comes off as a bit generic, with the variety seeming to get lost.

properties.title: Root:1 2015 Sauvignon Blanc (Casablanca Valley)
properties.description: A bland pickled nose announces a simple palate with just enough acidity to keep things upright. Mild flavors of orange and green herbs revert to pickled on the finish.

properties.title: Sofia 2014 Blanc de Blancs Sparkling (Monterey County)
properties.address: 21825 161st Ave E, Graham, WA 98338, USA
properties.description: Very light in color, this bottling by the Coppola family shows sweeter aromas of Gravenstein apple, ripe pear, honeysuckle and tuberose on the nose. It's also a tad sweet on the palate, especially for today's sparkling standards, but will surely attract a wide fan base thanks to apple custard, cotton candy and plumeria-like flavors, all dissected by racy bubbles and acidity.

properties.title: Paul Buisse 2015 Sauvignon Blanc (Touraine)
properties.address: 40 E Main St, Saluda, NC 28773, USA
properties.description: From vines on the slopes of the Cher River this softly herbal wine has attractive gooseberry and lime flavors. Its young fruitiness is light, bright and ready to drink.

properties.title: Cave de Bissey 2014 Le Clos d'Augustin  (Bourgogne Aligoté)
properties.address: 14 Rue des Millerands, 71390 Bissey-sous-Cruchaud, France
properties.description: This is a soft style of Aligoté with creamed apple and pear flavors and a gentle texture. The wine has crisp acidity and a lively bright aftertaste. Drink now.

properties.title: Domaine Trouillet 2015 Coeur de Pouilly  (Pouilly-Fuissé)
properties.address: Rte des Concizes, 71960 Solutré-Pouilly, France
properties.description: This is a simple, fruity wine. It has a pear flavor, light minerality and a zingy aftertaste. Smooth and rounded, it looks as though it will be ready to drink from early 2017.

properties.title: Educated Guess 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1607 1st St, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.description: While the majority of the grapes for this wine are from Napa, small additions come from Lake, Sonoma and Solano counties. It holds a healthy dose of Merlot too. Simple in richness and ripeness, its flavors highlight bacon and charred oak, the tannins dusty and firm.

properties.title: Finca El Origen 2016 Estate Malbec Rosé (Uco Valley)
properties.address: Unnamed Road, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Basic aromas are low on fruit. This has a cutting, citric feel that's centered around juicy acidity. Sour grapefruit and tangerine flavors end with lasting citric acidity.

properties.title: Fournier Père et Fils 2015 Sauvignon Blanc (Val de Loire)
properties.address: Rte de la Garenne, 18300 Verdigny, France
properties.description: Inspired by Sancerre, but with grapes from other parts of the Loire, this soft, herbal and green-fruit flavored wine is refreshing and lightly textured. Drink now.

properties.title: Presqu'ile 2012 Blanc de Blancs Sparkling (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 5391 Presquile Dr, Santa Maria, CA 93455, USA
properties.description: The best of a strong series of sparklers from this winery and vineyard on the western edge of the appellation, this Chardonnay-based bubbly shows light toast, chalk and lemon mousse on the pure and appealing nose. The effervescence is quite aggressive, with spectacular foaming on the sip that sizzles from front to back, carrying a soft texture but framed by racy acidity.

properties.title: Sante Arcangeli 2015 Duet Chardonnay (Santa Cruz Mountains)
properties.address: 79 North St, Pescadero, CA 94060, USA
properties.description: The small 2015 vintage didn't give John Benedetti much to work with, but he sources 60% from Bald Mountain Vineyard in Bonny Doon and 40% from Split Rail in Corralitos to deliver this stunner. Aromas of Marcona almond, buttered croissant and lemon preserves lead into a palate full of acidic energy. Salty, savory flavors of roasted nuts meet with warm buttercream and fresh lemon spray on the palate. It provides a full experience.

properties.title: Diatom 2016 Hillard Bruce Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 329 N F St, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.description: Freshly cut Anjou pear, crisp apple, hints of honeydew and lime skin show on the nose of this vibrant bottling by Greg Brewer. There is bouncy acidity and a fine-grained, chalky grip to the sip, delivering chilled green-melon and lime-sorbet flavors. It's tangy yet laced with stony minerality and intriguing texture.

properties.title: Red Car 2012 Vivio Vineyard Roussanne (Bennett Valley)
properties.address: 8400 Graton Rd, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.description: From a cool site, this is a viscous, oily white. Crisp in pear and almond, it drinks light and yet has enough heft on the mouthfeel to stay interesting and compatible with food. If Roussanne is a varietal of interest, this wine (made in small amounts) should be on the list of those to try.

properties.title: Keuka Spring 2014 Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 243 Route 54, East Lake Rd, Penn Yan, NY 14527, USA
properties.description: Peach nectar and citrus blossoms perfume this intensely concentrated off-dry Riesling. It's lusciously peachy keen, but notes of dusty mineral and a zippy streak of lime acidity lend complexity and balance. It's satisfyingly juicy and penetrates through a long, lingering finish.

properties.title: L'Ecole No. 41 2014 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 41 Lowden School Rd, Lowden, WA 99360, USA
properties.description: This wine is a blend of Evergreen, Schmitt and Oasis vineyards. It displays a mixture of butter, tropical fruit and red-apple aromas that lead to creamy feeling flavors and a drawn-out finish that impresses.

properties.title: Les Trouvés 2013 White (Washington)
properties.address: 111 E Jewett Blvd, White Salmon, WA 98672, USA
properties.description: A blend of Roussanne, Marsanne and Viognier, this wine offers restrained aromas of spice, almond and flowers. The palate shows a good sense of texture and tension as well as length.

properties.title: Rodney Strong 2012 Alexander's Crown Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 11455 Old Redwood Hwy, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: This comes from a vineyard established in 1971—one of the first in the appellation to contribute a single-vineyard bottling of the variety. It features a treasure trove of rich red cherry, leathery tannin and dry mocha on the palate, emboldened by a twist of cedar and dried herb.

properties.title: Rodney Strong 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 11455 Old Redwood Hwy, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Rich in sweet oak and almond paste, this is a concentrated, fulsome and big wine, creamy in mouthfeel and approach. It gets fruitier in the glass, sharing flavors of baked apple pie with brioche.

properties.title: Seven Falls 2012 GPS Stonetree Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Wahluke Slope)
properties.address: 1450 McMillan Ave, Penticton, BC V2A 8T4, Canada
properties.description: With the vineyard's GPS coordinates emblazoned prominently on the bottle, this 100% varietal wine leads with aromas of blue and black fruit, with high-toned herb and graphite accents. The dark-fruit flavors are rich but maintain their balance, with a finish that lingers.

properties.title: Spring Mountain Vineyard 2013 Estate Bottled Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2805 Spring Mountain Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: With delicate aromas of orange blossom and lime, this wine takes on a viscosity of texture on the palate, offering plump flavors of peach and guava. Refined and well made, the finish is a combination of vanilla and caramel.

properties.title: Stift Klosterneuburg 2014 Hengsberg Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Rathauspl. 24, 3400 Klosterneuburg, Austria
properties.description: Peardrop lingers aromatically on the nose, the palate reveals riper pear fruit on the palate, a lovely balance of crisp green and juicy yellow pear with that telltale spray of white pepper and herbal spice. The finish is clean and refreshing.

properties.title: V. Sattui 2014 Dry Riesling (California)
properties.address: 1111 White Ln, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: This aromatic wine does a great job of combining effusive fruit with a lively balance. Beautiful orange blossom and honeysuckle aromas blend into delicious apple flavors while a tangy, lemon-zest sensation lights up the texture.

properties.title: V. Sattui 2014 Off-Dry Riesling (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1111 White Ln, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: A medium-sweet wine with 2.19% residual sugar, this has a sweetness like ripe white peach topped by a honeysuckle rose, but it remains light and never cloying. The nutty finish begs for blue cheese.

properties.title: Wieninger 2014 Nussberg Grüner Veltliner (Vienna)
properties.address: Stammersdorfer Str. 31, 1210 Wien, Austria
properties.description: The nose is shy and just suggests peppery watercress, the ultralight palate follows up with fresh, zesty lemon flavors. The body of this wine is light and almost weighless, but brings the full refreshment factor with a zesty, peppery edge.

properties.title: Daou 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 2777 Hidden Mountain Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: A very high-toned, wound-up nose slowly reveals chalky aromas, concentrated purple fruit and crushed violets on this bottling by the Daou brothers. The palate is also tight and slow to release, with hints of dark chocolate chips, espresso bean and black fruit lingering behind a walls of tannins and bright acidity. This will age well, but certainly wait a little longer to open.

properties.title: Duckhorn 2013 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1000 Lodi Ln, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: From a selection of vineyards across the Napa Valley, including Brown Ranch in Carneros, this is a woody, herbal wine, full bodied on the midpalate, with flavors of peach and vanilla. It has aged in both French oak and stainless steel to keep the oak in check, and finishes with fresh Meyer lemon.

properties.title: Ebner-Ebenauer 2014 Bürsting Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Laaer Str. 5, 2170 Poysdorf, Austria
properties.description: The ripe flavor of Conference pear segues into a zesty, peppery and focused body full of refreshment and verve. This is very slender and linear but incredibly expressive. Citrus fizzes alongside pepper to create a lasting impression. A clean, lip-smacking finish.

properties.title: College Cellars 2012 Clarke Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 3020 E Isaacs Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: This student-produced wine shows aromas of cocoa, cashew and cherry along with green pepper. Flavors are somewhat wood-dominated with vanilla and chocolate riding high over cherry. Overall there are some distractions but there's still much to enjoy.

properties.title: Columbia Crest 2013 Grand Estates Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 178810 WA-221, Paterson, WA 99345, USA
properties.description: The oak makes the largest impression on this wine, with the notes of vanilla and butterscotch out in front of apple and apricot. It's creamy in feel, trailing slightly toward the finish.

properties.title: Domaine LeSeurre 2013 Barrel Select Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 13920 NY-54, Hammondsport, NY 14840, USA
properties.description: Smoke and dusty mineral tones are offset by fragrant white blossom and peach in this off-dry Riesling. Extended aging in neutral oak barrels lends depth to the palate despite its briskness. It finishes with a lingering lacy sweetness.

properties.title: Las Colinas Del Ebro 2013 Garnacha Blanca (Terra Alta)
properties.address: 7730 N MacArthur Blvd Suite A Suite A, Irving, TX 75063, USA
properties.description: Yeasty aromas of green melon and apple are clean and stony. This Garnatxa Blanca is juicy, fresh, well cut and minerally in feel, with citrusy flavors of lime and tangerine. The same goes for the finish, which is crisp, light and steady.

properties.title: Burnt Bridge 2012 Les Collines Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1500 Broadway St, Vancouver, WA 98663, USA
properties.description: This wine offers notes of Hershey's chocolate along with high-toned herbs and dried cherries. The cranberry and chocolate flavors are tart, puckering and full bodied with a firm squeeze of dry tannins and a cranberry-filled finish.

properties.title: Kennedy Shah 2012 Reserve DuBrul Vineyard Riesling (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 839 13th St, Hammonton, NJ 08037, USA
properties.description: This aromatic wine suggests green apple, tangerine and flowers. It drinks dry with stone fruit and citrus flavors that have a fleshy feel.

properties.title: Zero One Vintners 2010 The Wild Sky Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 4836 Newport Ave, San Diego, CA 92107, USA
properties.description: This appealing wine offers vanilla, café au lait, black currant, herbs and pepper. Silky-soft black olive flavors show good concentration and length backed by dry tannins.

properties.title: Mark Ryan 2013 Viognier (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14475 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: Coming from a blend of Ciel du Cheval, Red Willow and Olsen vineyards, this appealing wine brings notes of pear, lemon twist and mineral. It's restrained in feel with notes of stone fruit and barrel spices.

properties.title: Murphy-Goode 2013 Single Deck Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 241 Healdsburg Ave, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Ethereal and light, this is an understated Chardonnay for the producer, who offers several variations on the grape this vintage, this one sourced from an Eastside Road estate vineyard. Beeswax, tropical papaya and pear are the highlights, with a finish dusted in vanilla.

properties.title: Autoritas 2013 Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: 5100 US Hwy 98 N, Lakeland, FL 33809, USA
properties.description: Licorice, blackberry, cassis and plum aromas are concentrated and fruity. This feels fresh, with choppy tartaric acidity creating high tones across the mouthfeel. Baked blackberry flavors are limited but good, while a jammy, black-fruit finish is smooth, with just enough bracing acidity.

properties.title: Buttonwood 2014 Zingy Sauvignon Blanc (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 1500 Alamo Pintado Rd, Solvang, CA 93463, USA
properties.description: The expected cut-grass element shows on the nose of this wine from the longtime organic estate, but it also features riper, warmer aromas of nectarine, fragrant lemon skins and a slate minerality. There's lots of energetic pop on the sip, which shows more grass alongside lime juice, pith and skin.

properties.title: Cave des Producteurs de Vouvray 2013 Les Fosses d'Hareng  (Vouvray)
properties.address: 38 Rue de la Vall. Coquette, 37210 Vouvray, France
properties.description: This dry wine has that combination of tight minerality and great acidity that is common to young Chenin Blanc. It comes from a narrow valley carved into the steep cliffs of Vouvray, giving a wine that has richness as well as this tangy aftertaste.

properties.title: Scroll 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
properties.address: 1400 Schramsberg Rd, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.description: Medium-strength, this wine opens with a bouquet of black cherry and raspberry, unveiling an intensity of smoke and heat as it goes. Cradled in oak, it flattens on the midpalate before rising in strength and length on the finish.

properties.title: Sculpterra 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 5015 Linne Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: A mix of dried and fresh blueberry notes arises on the nose of this wine, alongside gravel and soft cedar elements. It's very purple on the palate, with more blueberry, olallieberry and grape candy, proving tasty but not especially complex. The tannins keep it firm.

properties.title: Seven Hills 2013 Late Harvest Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
