properties.address: 212 N 3rd Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: Aromas are quite delicate for the variety and style, with fresh flowers, peach and whiffs of lychee. The palate is similarly restrained, showing elegance with the lightly sweet stone fruit flavors that are accented by bright acidity. It's all about nuance.

properties.title: Seven Hills 2013 Old Vines Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 212 N 3rd Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: The aromas of this jazzy wine disclose lime leaf, white peach and slate. The off-dry flavors of flowers, pear and stone fruit are typical of Washington in their intensity and detail.

properties.title: Sterling 2012 Cellar Club Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
properties.address: 1111 W Dunaweal Ln, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.description: Black in color, this is an extracted, powerful wine, with sturdy tannins and a taste of black licorice. Full bodied and robust, it finishes steeped in black pepper and leather.

properties.title: Thirsty Owl Wine Company 2014 Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 6799 Elm Beach Rd, Ovid, NY 14521, USA
properties.description: Piercing lime notes hit a staccato beat against ripe, luscious white grapefruit in this spry, zesty Riesling. A shade off dry, it's vibrant yet satisfyingly easy drinking. Enjoy now for its youthful exuberance.

properties.title: Three Rivers 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 5641 US-12, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: Blended with 9% Sémillon, this wine has aromas of lemon curd, starfruit, barrel spices (18% new French oak) and fig. It's full bodied, with a creamy feel and a lingering finish.

properties.title: Three Rivers 2014 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 5641 US-12, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: All the fruit for this wine comes from Bacchus Vineyard. Aromas of jasmine, honeysuckle and apricot lead to medium-sweet stone-fruit flavors that linger.

properties.title: La Clarine Farm 2013 Jambalaia Rouge Red (Sierra Foothills)
properties.address: 7721 Snowbird Ln, Somerset, CA 95684, USA
properties.description: Ignore the sediment in this unfiltered wine and find vibrant fruit aromas, fresh and zesty red-fruit flavors and a vivid acidity that creates good balance. It has a light to medium color, bright cherry and cranberry flavors, moderate tannins and a fairly rich texture.

properties.title: Louis Bernard 2014 Red (Côtes du Rhône)
properties.address: 1662 Grand Ave, St Paul, MN 55105, USA
properties.description: This isn't the biggest or ripest Côtes du Rhône, but it balances hints of greenness with fresh cherry fruit. The floral notes on the nose are attractive, while the wine finishes firm and crisp.

properties.title: Mercer 2014 Sauvignon Blanc (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 3100 Lee Rd, Prosser, WA 99350, USA
properties.description: This has lively, very varietal aromas of kiwi, grass and pineapple. The palate is fleshy in feel with rich fruit flavors, tart acids and a Key lime finish.

properties.title: Montevina 2014 Glass Falls Pinot Grigio (California)
properties.address: 20680 Shenandoah School Rd, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.description: Aromas like crisp green apples and flavors of ripe white peaches combine in this fresh-tasting and medium-bodied wine. The texture is lively but smooth around the edges, and the wine is very appetizing.

properties.title: Nicolas Gaudry 2014  Pouilly-Fumé
properties.address: 21 Rue des Gominets, 58150 Tracy-sur-Loire, France
properties.description: Perfumed green fruits, a crisp texture and layers of tight acidity all point to a wine that is too young to drink. Its hints of ripe white fruits and tangy orange peel are still developing. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Pacific Rim 2013 Selenium Vineyard Ice Wine Riesling (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 8111 Keene Rd, West Richland, WA 99353, USA
properties.description: Ice wines are a rarity in Washington. This one offers aromas of orange peel, flowers and candied ginger, seeming to show a touch of oxygen exposure. It's sweet (155g/L residual sugar) but is still quite deft in style.

properties.title: Altavins 2015 Almodí Petit White (Terra Alta)
properties.address: Ctra. Vilalba dels Arcs, s/n, 43786 Batea, Tarragona, Spain
properties.description: Stony fresh aromas of lime and grapefruit are light and clean. This blend of Garnacha Blanca, Chardonnay and Sauvignon Blanc is steady on the palate. Flavors of dry lime and wet stones are slightly pithy, while this finishes firm and dry.

properties.title: HandCraft 2015 Artisan Collection Pinot Grigio (California)
properties.address: 309 N American Rd unit 11&12, Cheyenne, WY 82007, USA
properties.description: Light aromas like canteloupe and flavors like honeydew melon make this wine fruity and easy to enjoy. It's medium bodied, fruity and smooth.

properties.title: Cheval Quancard 2015 Lafleur Mallet  (Sauternes)
properties.address: La Mouline, 4 Rue du Carbouney, 33560 Carbon-Blanc, France
properties.description: Sémillon dominates this rich wine. Spice and honey are balanced by ripe peach and apricot flavors. The acidity cuts right through to give an almost crisp character to this sweet wine. It will develop quickly, so drink from late 2017.

properties.title: College Cellars 2015 Viognier (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 3020 E Isaacs Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: The flower and peach aromas are light but provide plenty of intrigue. It drinks dry with light ale and stone-fruit flavors, showing persistence on the finish.

properties.title: Domaine Bousquet 2014 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Tupungato)
properties.address: Mendoza Province, Argentina
properties.description: Earth, leather and herbal aromas blend with riper berry notes on the nose. This feels choppy, with cheek-scraping tannins. Flavors of minty herbal black fruits finish with chocolate, herbal flavors and stickiness.

properties.title: Emina 2015 Sauvignon Blanc (Rueda)
properties.address: Carretera de San Bernardo s/n, 47359 Valbuena de Duero, Valladolid, Spain
properties.description: Round, chunky aromas of grapefruit and passion fruit settle on friendly and varietally correct. This is snappy and solid in feel, with lime, orange and nectarine flavors. An acid-driven finish holds the line and doesn't taste bitter or green.

properties.title: Owl Ridge 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Hills Lake County)
properties.address: 2064 Gravenstein Hwy N Unit 120, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.description: This sturdy, well-made wine has lightly charred aromas, tasty cherry flavors and moderate tannins to give the texture some grip.

properties.title: Pacific Rim 2015 Spring Creek Vineyard Grüner Veltliner (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 8111 Keene Rd, West Richland, WA 99353, USA
properties.description: One of just a handful of varietal bottlings made in the state, this wine offers aromas of white pepper, fresh vegetables and flowers. It drinks dry with elegantly styled fruit flavors.

properties.title: The Lane 2014 Beginning Single Vineyard Chardonnay (Adelaide Hills)
properties.address: 5 Ravenswood Ln, Hahndorf SA 5245 Ravenswood Ln, • hahndorf SA 5245, Australia
properties.description: This is a plush, rounded wine, lacking much edge or cut, yet concentrated and flavorful. Roasted hazelnuts and cashews frame creamy pineapple fruit, ending in soft ripples of citrus. Drink now.

properties.title: Villa Giada 2015 Andrea Faccio  (Moscato d'Asti)
properties.address: Regione Ceirole, 10, 14053 Canelli AT, Italy
properties.description: This frothy dessert wine opens with delicate aromas of honeysuckle, chopped herb and yellow stone fruit. The soft creamy palate shows peach, candied nectarine zest and a hint of apricot.

properties.title: Rutini 2015 Trumpeter Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: Km 10.5, RP89, Tupungato, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Cherry and cassis aromas are earthy, with hints of green herbs and cheesy oak. This feels a bit raw and scratchy, but fresh. Red-fruit flavors of currant and plum finish with snappy acidity and clampy tannins.

properties.title: Cortes de Cima 2012 White (Alentejano)
properties.address: 7960-189 Vidigueira, Portugal
properties.description: With some wood aging, this is an attractive, smooth and ripely fruity wine. The vanilla and spice wood flavor underlines the peach and apricot fruits that are still young and fresh. It could do with another few months in bottle, so wait until the end of 2014.

properties.title: Cru 2012 Appellation Series Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 20146 Rd 21, Madera, CA 93637, USA
properties.description: This rich, good Chardonnay is easy to drink. The tropical fruit, apricot and peach flavors are accented with oak, and balanced with acidity.

properties.title: Echeverria 2013 Classic Collection Sauvignon Blanc (Curicó Valley)
properties.address: 35°05'59.8"S 71°18'07. - Av. Eyzaguirre 3215, Puente Alto, Molina, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: Saline and basic citrus aromas feed into a fresh, light-bodied palate with citrus, lettuce and minerally flavors. A modest, firm finish is light but clean. This epitomizes the good qualities of value-priced Chilean SB.

properties.title: Fraccaroli 2013 Pansere  (Lugana)
properties.address: Via Str. Berra, 4, 37019 Peschiera del Garda VR, Italy
properties.description: An easy-drinking wine, it conveys aromas of tropical fruit, Bartlett pear and a hint of saline. The palate offers green apple, banana and almond alongside crisp acidity.

properties.title: Franz Haas 2012 Gewürztraminer (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Villner Str., 6, 39040 Montan, Autonome Provinz Bozen - Südtirol, Italy
properties.description: This wine opens with intense floral aromas that recall room freshener and cold cream. The dense palate offers exotic fruit and flavors that suggest canned peaches alongside a hint of clove. It has a bitter, nutty finish.

properties.title: Herdade do Rocim 2012 Branco White (Alentejano)
properties.address: Estrada Nacional 387, 7940-909 Cuba, Portugal
properties.description: A warm, ripe and fruity wine that holds a mix of crisp apple acidity and richer yellow fruits. There is just enough acidity to give freshness while the wine has a richer, full character. It should age until 2015.

properties.title: Herdade do Rocim 2012 Olho de Mocho Rosé (Alentejano)
properties.address: Estrada Nacional 387, 7940-909 Cuba, Portugal
properties.description: This attractive and fruity rosé is very dry and rich. With red fruits, a sense of texture and just a hint of tannin, this is a food rosé, firm and ready for summer 2014.

properties.title: Kenwood 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 9592 Sonoma Hwy, Kenwood, CA 95452, USA
properties.description: At this price, and with wide availability, this is a great Cabernet for everyday consumption. It's dry, tannic and rich in black currants and oak, with a brisk edge of acidity to cut through oily beef and cheeses. Production was 43,200 cases.

properties.title: La Cappuccina 2013  Soave
properties.address: Via San Brizio, 125, 37032 Costalunga VR, Italy
properties.description: It opens with a delicate fragrance of yellow spring flowers and exotic fruit. The juicy palate offers up pear, honeydew melon and banana peel with a hint of nut on the finish. Simple but well-made.

properties.title: LangeTwins 2012 Estate Grown Chardonnay (Clarksburg)
properties.address: 1525 E Jahant Rd, Acampo, CA 95220, USA
properties.description: This attractively priced wine has nice acidity and subtle flavors of pear and lemon. A pronounced swaddling in oak reveals itself on the nose and mid-palate. Enjoy it with food on the richer side.

properties.title: Loacker 2012 Tasnim Sauvignon Blanc (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)
properties.address: St. Justina Straße, 3, 39100 Bozen, Autonome Provinz Bozen - Südtirol, Italy
properties.description: Not very expressive, it opens with subdued aromas that recall lemon peel and toast. These carry over to the palate along with a note of butterscotch. There's not enough fruit richness to support the racy acidity.

properties.title: Maso Poli 2012 Pinot Grigio (Trentino)
properties.address: Strada del Vino, 33, 38015 Lavis TN, Italy
properties.description: This Pinot Grigio from Trentino—part of which is barrel aged—offers aromas of pear, apple, oak and flint. The linear palate delivers restrained lemon peel, apple and oak sensations in a lean but elegant style.

properties.title: Perla del Garda 2010 Madre Perla  (Lugana)
properties.address: Via Fenil Vecchio, 9, 25017 Lonato del Garda BS, Italy
properties.description: This starts with aromas of lemon peel, grapefruit and mineral, with a hint of toasted bread crust. The linear palate offers lemon drop, nectarine and apples alongside racy acidity but it lacks fruit richness.

properties.title: Quinta das Arcas 2013 Arca Nova Colheita Loureiro (Vinho Verde)
properties.address: Quinta das Arcas, 4440-392 Sobrado, Portugal
properties.description: Made from one of the star grapes of Vinho Verde, this is a ripe, creamy wine. It has hints of lemon zest, along with grapefruit and a herbal aftertaste. It is crisp and ready to drink.

properties.title: Willamette Valley Vineyards 2011 Bernau Block Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 8800 Enchanted Way SE, Turner, OR 97392, USA
properties.description: Despite its special designation, this is a dilute wine with thin fruit flavors. The core of green apple is accented with a hint of barrel toast (17 months in French oak, 29% new). The acidity seems muted. Drink up.

properties.title: Stark-Condé 2011 Unfined and Unfiltered Cabernet Sauvignon (Stellenbosch)
properties.address: Oude Nektar Farm Jonkershoek Valley, Stellenbosch, 7600, South Africa
properties.description: This is a layered, earthy selection, with upfront aromas of leather and cigar box complemented by fruity tones of blackberry and cassis. The medium-weight palate is lush and velvety, and the tannins are fine yet firmly structured. Boysenberry preserves and black pepper linger on the finish.

properties.title: Müller-Grossmann 2013 Alte Reben Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Kremstal)
properties.address: Lindengasse 25, 3511 Palt, Austria
properties.description: A softly fruited, pear-scented Grüner full of super-clean, green Conference pear aromas. Grapefruit and lemon highlights brighten the creamy yet slender midpalate. A gentle wine but with focus and huge charm.

properties.title: Stadt Krems 2013 Kremser Wachtberg Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Kremstal)
properties.address: Stadtgraben 11, 3500 Krems an der Donau, Austria
properties.description: Hints of green Conference pear with even gentler notes of aloe vera make for an inviting nose. The palate is tight, concentrated and linear, but still full of charm. At the core a very refreshing citrus zestiness radiates. A very elegant wine.

properties.title: Tement 2013 Berghausener Sauvignon Blanc (Südsteiermark)
properties.address: Zieregg 13, 8461 Zieregg, Austria
properties.description: The hinted lushness of passion fruit plays intriguingly around the straight-laced acidity of this classy Sauvignon Blanc. The body is light but profound. Very refreshing on its own or with light, delicate foods.

properties.title: François Lurton 2011 Gran Araucano Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Km 29 Ruta - l.72, Lolol, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: Lightly herbal, spicy aromas of tobacco, forest floor, juniper and pepper accent core blackberry, cassis and cherry aromas. This Cabernet is tight and mildly tannic, but not fierce or demanding. Ripe blackberry, coffee, mocha and vanilla flavors finish spicy, toasty and oaky. Drink through 2020.

properties.title: Garage Wine Co. 2011 Lot #37 Maipo Alto Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Camino San Antonio Caliboro KM 5.8 San Javier de Loncomilla, Maule, San Javier, Maule, Chile
properties.description: This small-lot Cab (350 cases) is classically Chilean at all check points. The nose is spicy and full of cassis and berry flavors along with tobacco, olive and mild eucalyptus notes. A bright, lively palate is bolstered by acidity, while plum and red-berry flavors are oaky, spicy and peppery, with a toasty, slightly rooty finish. Drink through 2020.

properties.title: Giant Steps 2011 Tarraford Vineyard Chardonnay (Yarra Valley)
properties.address: 314 Maroondah Hwy, Healesville VIC 3777, Australia
properties.description: Despite it's modest reported alcohol level, this is a plush, rounded example of Chardonnay, loaded with fruit. A whiff of woodsmoke frames pineapple and mango, adding complexity while still allowing the tropical notes to shine through. Drink now–2017.

properties.title: Wieninger 2013 Nussberg White (Wiener Gemischter Satz)
properties.address: Stammersdorfer Str. 31, 1210 Wien, Austria
properties.description: The scent of freshly cut, green Conference pears plays subtly around the nose while the palate is more definite. Mouth-coating phenolic structure is countered by fresh acidity and warm alcohol. This still needs time to come into its own but promises an intriguing flavor bases of beeswax, fruit and earth.

properties.title: Clover Hill 2007 Pipers River Vintage Release Méthode Traditionnelle  (Tasmania)
properties.address: 17 Clover Hl Ln, Robesonia, PA 19551, USA
properties.description: Fully mature, this is a medium-bodied, creamy-textured sparkling wine that could handle main-course duties. Notes of brioche dominate, filled out by hints of pineapple and citrus, followed by a lingering finish.

properties.title: Penley Estate 2012 Phoenix Cabernet Sauvignon (Coonawarra)
properties.address: McLean Rd, Coonawarra SA 5263, Australia
properties.description: Full bodied and richly textured, this is an approachable wine that should nonetheless drink well through at least 2025. Toasted coconut accents cassis and blackberry fruit, folding in hints of vanilla on the long, mouthwatering finish.

properties.title: Vignobles Berthier 2013 Terre de Silex Sauvignon Blanc (Coteaux du Giennois)
properties.address: 20 route de Cosne Les Clairneaux, 18240 Sainte-Gemme-en-Sancerrois, France
properties.description: This is one of a range of three wines from different soils. Silex soil is flinty, giving, as here, ageworthy, structured wines. It is dense, powerful and with a range of steely textures that dominate the very crisp, taut and nervy fruits. Drink this from 2017.

properties.title: Prieler 2013 Seeberg Pinot Blanc (Burgenland)
properties.address: Hauptstraße 181, 7081 Schützen am Gebirge, Austria
properties.description: Ripe, tropical overtones of mango and passion fruit accompany the more usual ripe pear notes of this concentrated wine. There are mineral hints on the palate, where weight, flavor and freshness are in perfect accord. This is lovely now but will age very gracefully.

properties.title: Rôtie Cellars 2012 Southern Blend Red (Washington)
properties.address: 3861 1st Ave S Suite F, Seattle, WA 98134, USA
properties.description: A blend of Grenache (65%), Mourvèdre (25%) and Syrah, this suggests peppery spices, stewed raspberries, game and high-toned spices. The palate is the star, full bodied, textured and richly flavored. An orange peel accent leads to a warm finish.

properties.title: Schloss Gobelsburg 2013 Renner Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.address: Schloss Str. 16, 3550, Austria
properties.description: Very concentrated notes of zesty grapefruit peel mingle with punchy, peppery watercress on a rather concentrated palate. Freshly ground pepper intriguingly pops up here and there. This is a weighty wine that definitely belongs on the table.

properties.title: Parducci 2015 Small Lot Blend Chardonnay (Mendocino County)
properties.address: 501 Parducci Rd, Ukiah, CA 95482, USA
properties.description: A smoky scent and earthy, crisp-apple flavors make this medium-bodied wine a change of pace from the average butterball Chardonnay. It has welcome acidity and a nicely smooth texture.

properties.title: Quinta Nova de Nossa Senhora do Carmo 2015 Rosé (Douro)
properties.winery: Quinta Nova de Nossa Senhora do Carmo
properties.address: Covas do Douro, 5085-222, Portugal
properties.description: This is a fashionably pale rosé, as light and bright in color as it is on the palate. Fruity, attractive and ready to drink, it has zesty orange peel and crisp wild strawberry flavors.

properties.title: Robert Hall 2015 Rose de Robles Rosé (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3443 Mill Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Deep pink in color, this blend of 42% Syrah, 30% Grenache, 11% Cinsaut, 11% Mourvèdre and 6% Counoise offers light strawberry and pomegranate aromas on the tightly wound nose. Bountiful, refreshing acidity powers the palate, but the flavors are sparse, just hinting at sour raspberry and pomegranate.

properties.title: South Coast 2016 Dry Gewurztraminer (Temecula Valley)
properties.address: 34843 Rancho California Rd, Temecula, CA 92591, USA
properties.description: Round peach, ripe nectarine, melon and Anjou pear aromas shows on the nose of this bottling, tempered by a grassy and wet steel character. The palate shows poached apple and pear flavors, accented with lime.

properties.title: Swedish Hill 2015 Humphreys Vineyard Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 4565 NY-414, Romulus, NY 14541, USA
properties.description: Dusty minerals and smoked nuts permeate through savory tones of apple and pear in this off-dry Riesling. It's a light-footed wine with soft yielding acidity.

properties.title: Three Brothers 2015 3 Degrees of Riesling Sweet Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 623 Lerch Rd, Geneva, NY 14456, USA
properties.description: Earthier and dustier than the drier versions of Riesling in this series, this sweet-style wine permeates with notes of crushed rocks and bramble. Soft yielding acidity and slightly sugary sweetness linger on the finish.

properties.title: Tin Barn 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
properties.address: 21692 8th St E Ste. 340, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.description: Blended with small amounts of Merlot, Cabernet Franc, Petit Verdot and Malbec, this is an austere, unfussy red made in modest quantities that has crisp red currant and cranberry flavors interwoven with cedar and dried herb.

properties.title: Vergelegen 2015 Schaapenberg Vineyard Reserve Sauvignon Blanc (Stellenbosch)
properties.address: Vergelegen Wine Estate, Lourensford Rd, Somerset West, Cape Town, 7130, South Africa
properties.description: This wine opens softly, with faint aromas of lemon-lime citrus and lean green fruit. The medium-weight palate offers a bit more concentration in green plum and lime tones, finishing pithy and somewhat bitter.

properties.title: Martinez & Martinez 2015 Tudor Hills Vineyard Pinot Grigio (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: Martinez, CA 94553, USA
properties.description: Aromas of ripe (leaning almost overripe) apple, melon and orange peel are followed by medium-sweet fruit flavors. It needs more acid to stand it up.

properties.title: Ideology 2014 Blondie Gone Wild Red Hen Vineyard Chardonnay (Oak Knoll District)
properties.address: 5225 Solano Ave, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Dark gold in color, this wine is marked by floral jasmine aromas before toasty oak and weightiness take over on the palate. Green apple and tropical flourishes provide additional richness.

properties.title: Millbrook 2015 Castle Hill Vineyard Riesling (Hudson River Region)
properties.address: 26 Wing Rd, Millbrook, NY 12545, USA
properties.description: Savory apples and pears mingle into lemon and bramble in this slightly earthy off-dry Riesling. Sunny tangerine acidity is easy but bright, leading a delicately sweet finish.

properties.title: Rive Droite Rive Gauche 2015 White (Côtes du Rhône)
properties.address: 10 Quai du Priourat, 33500 Libourne, France
properties.description: From a small cave cooperative in Laudun, this is a solid Rhône white blend of 55% Grenache Blanc, 40% Bourboulenc and 5% Clairette. It's a full-bodied, slightly oily wine, delivering pear, melon and pineapple flavors tinged with cinnamon and brown sugar. Drink now.

properties.title: Rubinna 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1188 Vineyard Ave, Pleasanton, CA 94566, USA
properties.description: Robust and sanguine, this softly layered wine offers a simple take on the variety—a study in blackberry, leather and peppercorn flavors.

properties.title: Bouchard Finlayson 2014 Sauvignon Blanc (Walker Bay)
properties.address: R320, Hermanus, 7200, South Africa
properties.description: Muted, soft scents of green apple, orange peel and underripe banana dance on the nose, while the zippy, prickly palate offers pithy flavors of citrus zest, ending slightly bitter. Drink now.

properties.title: Broken Earth 2014 Chardonnay (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 1650 Ramada Dr, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: This bottling from winemaker Chris Cameron shows smoky touches of vanilla and caramel on the nose, proving quite ripe and buttery. Dried lemon skin and smoked white meat flavors show on the palate, making this a solid weeknight sipper for anyone who likes a full-bodied Chardonnay.

properties.title: Domaine de Lamothe 2015 White (Côtes de Gascogne)
properties.address: Lamothe, 81140 Sainte-Cécile-du-Cayrou, France
properties.description: A blend of Colombard and Chardonnay, this wine is crisp and fruity. It has attractive bright acidity with lemon fruitiness and a mineral texture. The wine is ready to drink.

properties.title: Latah Creek 2015 DenHoed Vineyards Pinot Gris (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 13030 E Indiana Ave, Spokane Valley, WA 99216, USA
properties.description: Starting off slightly reduced, this wine has aromas of dried red apple that lead to just off-dry, full apple flavors, finishing bitter.

properties.title: Experience 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2327 N 400 Rd, Edgerton, KS 66021, USA
properties.description: Perfumed in cassis and chocolate, this wine starts out with soft layers of fruit, but lacks structure and definition, making for a simple, lighthearted quaff.

properties.title: François Lurton 2015 Hacienda Araucano Reserva Sauvignon Blanc (Lolol Valley)
properties.address: Km 29 Ruta - l.72, Lolol, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: Gritty, uric, green aromas come in front of a round palate with little cut. Vegetal, bitter flavors of bell pepper and grapefruit finish with another wave of bitterness.

properties.title: Delectus 2012 French Wedding Cabernet Sauvignon (Knights Valley)
properties.address: 1091 St Helena Hwy, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: This bitter wine is high-octane in puckering tannin and very ripe fruit. The finish leans towards a taste of pencil shavings and tobacco.

properties.title: Aguirre 2014 Kunza Sauvignon Blanc (Maule Valley)
properties.address: Fundo Santa Ana de Liucura, Villa Alegre, Maule, Chile
properties.description: Almost neutral on the nose, an herbal arugula element finally emerges. The palate is light and crisp, with a bitter aftertaste.

properties.title: Wilridge 2014 Estate Dessert Wine Wilridge Estate Vineyard Muscat Blanc (Naches Heights)
properties.address: 250 Ehler Rd, Yakima, WA 98908, USA
properties.description: This wine is listed at 19.5% alcohol and it smells every bit of it. Alcohol aromas overwhelm any sense of the variety and provide a burn to the floral flavors.

properties.title: Aguirre 2014 Gaucho Andino Chardonnay (Maule Valley)
properties.address: Fundo Santa Ana de Liucura, Villa Alegre, Maule, Chile
properties.description: This has overripe tropical-fruit aromas on the nose. Wheaty, oxidized flavors finish with a note of mushy fruit.

properties.title: Kirkland Signature 2013 Signature Series Mountain Cuvee Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 14030 NE 145th St, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: This wine has artificial, plastic-like aromas that mar its opening and make it barely acceptable to drink.

properties.title: Tucannon 2014 Cabernet Franc Rosé (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 40504 Demoss Rd, Benton City, WA 99320, USA
properties.description: This wine is a medium cherry-red color, with some bricking. The volatiles are quite high and lead to off-dry cherry flavors.

properties.title: S.A. Prüm 2006 Wehlener Sonnenuhr Trockenbeerenauslese Erste Lage Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Uferallee 25, 54470 Bernkastel-Kues, Germany
properties.description: Lip-smacking is an inelegant yet apt word to describe the unctuousness of this nectar of honey, saffron and marmalade. It's delightfully rich and creamy, yet gorgeously balanced, seared by a razor's edge of lemon-lime acidity. It's an exceptional wine now, penetrating and persistent, but will surely delight for decades to come.

properties.title: Thörle 2011 Saulheimer Hölle Trockenbeerenauslese Riesling (Rheinhessen)
properties.address: Am Norenberg 0, 55291 Saulheim, Germany
properties.description: Waxy minerals mingle with deep, concentrated tones of orange and tangerine in this lusciously sweet Riesling. Vibrant and complex, it's marked by tart tangerine acidity that sears through the midpalate. Swathes of saffron and exotic spice soften a long, lingering finish. While delicious already, its minerality and composure should only improve from 2020-2025.

properties.title: S.A. Prüm 2006 Wehlener Sonnenuhr Beerenauslese Erste Lage Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Uferallee 25, 54470 Bernkastel-Kues, Germany
properties.description: As delicate and spry as a silken mist, this sweet-style Riesling balances honeyed apricot and peach flavors against a backdrop of intense minerality and acidity. It darts and dances on the tongue yet penetrates deeply, leaving a long lasting impression. It's approachable now, yet should improve till at least 2025.

properties.title: The Eyrie Vineyards 2014 Estate Chardonnay (Dundee Hills)
properties.address: 935 NE 10th Ave, McMinnville, OR 97128, USA
properties.description: Even if winemaker Jason Lett tripled the price of this wine, it would still be a standout among its peers. This opens with intense aromatics of pineapple fruit, bracing acidity and compelling length. On the second and third day after opening, it remained quite fresh and expressive, with further details of fruit and mineral beginning to emerge. Drink now through 2035.

properties.title: S.A. Prüm 2011 Wehlener Sonnenuhr Old Vines GG Erste Lage Dry Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Uferallee 25, 54470 Bernkastel-Kues, Germany
properties.description: This late-release GG is a stunning showcase of how just a few years of bottle age impact a dry, richly concentrated Riesling. Yellow peach and grapefruit tones shine brightly still, but are glazed by layers of slick, penetrating minerals. While moderate in alcohol, it feels dense and creamy on the palate. The finish meanders almost endlessly, punctuated playfully by strikes of lemon-lime acidity. It's singing now, but should improve till at least 2020.

properties.title: The Eyrie Vineyards 2013 Original Vines Reserve Chardonnay (Dundee Hills)
properties.address: 935 NE 10th Ave, McMinnville, OR 97128, USA
properties.description: The oldest Chardonnay vines in the Willamette Valley, planted in 1965, create a spicy, textural, refined wine with tremendous length and detail. All the wine was aged in neutral wood, which shines a light on the beautiful fruit, with green apple, almonds, and hints of butter and vanilla.

properties.title: Cartuxa 2013 Pêra-Manca Branco White (Alentejo)
properties.address: Q.ta de Valbom, 7001-901 Évora, Portugal
properties.description: The name of the wine goes back to the 15th century when it was exported to the Portuguese colonies. It is an iconic wine in Portugal; the white is a blend of Antão Vaz and Arinto. Aged in wood, it has density and concentration as well as opulent yellow fruit and pear flavors. It is a beautiful wine, rich while also so stylish. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Sheldrake Point 2013 Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 7448 County Rd 153, Ovid, NY 14521, USA
properties.description: Zesty lime and crushed stones lend revitalizing tang to this squeaky-fresh Riesling. Off dry in style, it's chock full of sweet peach and tangerine flavors. Forward and fruity, it's appealing yet elegant.

properties.title: Koenig Vineyards 2012 Williamson Vineyard Viognier
properties.address: 21452 Hoskins Rd, Caldwell, ID 83607, USA
properties.description: Generous aromas of apricot and peach come with a guava accent. It's full bodied and viscous in feel, with sweet stone-fruit flavors that linger.

properties.title: Preston 2012 L. Preston Red (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 9282 W Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: The longtime Dry Creek producer offers a complex intermingling of 60% Syrah, 14% Grenache, 14% Mourvédre, 6% Carignane and 6% Cinsault here, the overall blend high-toned in raspberry and licorice. Not overly oaked, the floral nose maintains itself from start to finish, along with a velvety mouthfeel and plenty of structure. It's made from organic grapes.

properties.title: Analemma 2013 Atavus Vineyard Gewürztraminer (Columbia Gorge (WA))
properties.address: 1120 State Rd, Mosier, OR 97040, USA
properties.description: Coming from 45-year old plantings, this warm-vintage wine is quite aromatically light for the variety, with notes of quinine, spice, pear and flowers. It drinks dry with a broad feel to the lightly spritzy fruit. Spice flavors are backed by a sense of acid balance that draws out the finish. This wine takes time to get going but proves worthy.

properties.title: Bellangelo 2013 Chardonnay (Seneca Lake)
properties.address: 150 Poplar Point Rd, Dundee, NY 14837, USA
properties.description: While the nose suggests a hint of pressed apple, the palate on this richly textured Chardonnay is bright with yellow plum and apple flavors touched with spice, smoke and cream. Revitalizing acidity freshens the midpalate, leaving the finish brisk and clean.

properties.title: Sparrow Hawk 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 11905 Tamiami Trail N, Naples, FL 34110, USA
properties.description: Closed on the nose at first, after opening there's a lot of intrigue to this savory Chardonnay, bright in acidity and deftly layered on the palate in herbal thyme and baked pear. Medium in weight it has a salty, briny edge that's a ton of fun.

properties.title: Château Lamothe de Haux 2012 Valentine par Valentine Réserve  (Bordeaux Blanc)
properties.address: 295 Chemin de l'Église, 33550 Haux, France
properties.description: This wood-aged wine achieves a good balance between the toast and the bright citrus fruits. It's ripe, full of fruitiness and with a crisp texture that contrasts with the smoky backdrop. The aftertaste suggests the wine will benefit from another year's aging, so drink from 2016.

properties.title: Mesa 2011 Opale  (Vermentino di Sardegna)
properties.address: Località Su Baroni, 09010 Sant'Anna Arresi SU, Italy
properties.description: Aged only in stainless steel, this expression of Vermentino offers fragrant aromas that span from natural rubber to apricot. The wine is creamy and smooth on the finish, with a touch of spice.

properties.title: Pedroncelli 2010 Three Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 1220 Canyon Rd, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.description: Smooth and rich, this has pleasing flavors of blackberries, currants, dried herbs and cedar that are marked by firm tannins. Dry and full-bodied, it's a classic Cabernet to drink now and over the next four years or so while it's still fresh and fruity. This bottling routinely earns Editor's Choice awards.

properties.title: Santa Alicia 2009 Gran Reserva de Los Andes Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Circunvalación Máximo Valdés 4135, Pirque, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: This is a spicy number with a minty green aroma along with cherry, molasses and smoke notes. The mouthfeel is edgy and lively, while the flavors of vanilla, cocoa and herbal plum and berry are solid and composed. It's solid but a bit herbal on the finish.

properties.title: Tenute Soletta 2011 Sardo  (Vermentino di Sardegna)
properties.address: Regione Signor Anna, 07040 Codrongianos SS, Italy
properties.description: Fresh and fragrant, oozing with jasmine, honey and stone fruit notes, this shows the best of Sardinian white winemaking. There's a touch of sweetness that is well balanced and not too heavy.

properties.title: Baglio del Cristo di Campobello 2011 Adènzia White (Sicilia)
properties.address: Contrada Favarotta Strada Statale 123 Km. 19, 92023 Campobello di Licata AG, Italy
properties.description: This 75-25 blend of Chardonnay and Grillo (aged only in stainless steel) makes a great companion to fresh seafood dishes. The wine offers loads of citrus and pear notes, with a chalky mineral overtone and bright acidity.

properties.title: Black Stallion 2011 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 4089 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: A touch of honey brings a sense of sweetness to the flavors of lemon candy, pineapple juice, green melon and vanilla. Tart acidity provides fine vitality and balance. This shows real Napa Valley finesse.

properties.title: Westrey 2010 Reserve Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 1065 NE Alpine Ave, McMinnville, OR 97128, USA
properties.description: This is a soft, broadly fruity Chardonnay, with near-tropical ripeness. Banana and papaya flavors dominate, accented by pretty baking spices and a touch of mineral.

properties.title: Bründlmayer 2011 Kamptaler Terrassen Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.address: Zwettler Str. 23, 3550 Langenlois, Austria
properties.description: One of the entry-level wines from Bründlmayer, this is all about the fruit. It is fresh and perfumed, with just a touch of pepper that adds zestiness. It's a pleasure to drink now, and the creamed pear and citrus flavors are already in harmony.

properties.title: Clos du Val 2011 Lone Cypress Ranch Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.address: 5330 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Leaner and earthier than many Chardonnays, with notes of green and dried herbs alongside the citrus and tropical fruits. Oak plays a modest role. All in all, this discrete wine is best enjoyed now.

properties.title: Cusumano 2011 Cubìa Insolia (Sicilia)
properties.address: 432 S Main St, Old Forge, PA 18518, USA
properties.description: This 100% Insolia opens with a bright golden color and tight aromas of apricot, candied fruit, lemon mousse and pear. It shows nice intensity and a bright note of bitter almond on the close.

properties.title: Domaine Bru-Baché 2010  Jurançon
properties.address: 39 Rue Barada, 64360 Monein, France
properties.description: The lightest of the dessert wines made by Claude Loustalot, this is fruity, fragrant and medium sweet, with refreshing acidity. The crisp texture combines hints of honey and apricot jam. Drink now.

properties.title: Antonio Caggiano 2007 FiaGre White (Campania)
properties.address: Contrada Sala, 3, 83030 Taurasi AV, Italy
properties.description: This distinctive wine boasts aromas of pine resin and maple syrup that add spicy accents to this otherwise fruit-driven white wine from Campania. You can feel the southern sunshine in the mouth thanks to the wine's slightly sweet nature and powerful finish. A Marc de Grazia selection, various American importers.

properties.title: Cusumano 2007 Insolia (Sicilia)
properties.address: 432 S Main St, Old Forge, PA 18518, USA
properties.description: Cusumano's bright Insolia is a distinctive wine with personality in the form of mineral, pear, peach, almonds and herbal tones that come directly from the quality of the fruit. The mouthfeel is warm and sticky, thanks to Sicily's strong sunshine.

properties.title: DFJ Vinhos 2007 Alvarinho - Chardonnay White (Estremadura)
properties.address: 2070-681 Vila Chã de Ourique, Portugal
properties.description: On the face of it, this is an unlikely combination. But the ripeness of the Chardonnay and crisper, perfumed Alvarinho go well together, a wine that shows richness and lightness, as well as pear and lemon flavors. The finishing acidity is very refreshing.

properties.title: Hugh Hamilton 2007 Jim Jim Unoaked Chardonnay (McLaren Vale)
properties.address: 94 McMurtrie Rd, McLaren Vale SA 5171, Australia
properties.description: Smells pure and citrusy, offering up scents of lemon curd, grapefruit zest and lime juice, then adds rounder melon notes on the palate, which is rather fat and shows a bit of alcohol. Zesty on the finish, but warm, too.

properties.title: Tasca d'Almerita 2007 Regaleali White (Sicilia)
properties.address: Contrada Regaleali, 90020 Sclafani Bagni PA, Italy
properties.description: Here is a delicately fragrant blend of Sicilian grapes with pretty tones of white flower, acacia, kiwi and peach. This competitively priced wine is fresh and light and would make a perfect pairing with tuna salad or salmon carpaccio.

properties.title: Casa de Campo 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: 1501 S Tamiami Trail #501, Venice, FL 34285, USA
properties.description: Briny raspberry aromas are a bit murky. This smacks down hard with acidity, while the flavors run toward earthy, generic plum and berry. A salty finish with animal notes is firm but struggles with cleanliness.

properties.title: Ancient Peaks 2012 Sauvignon Blanc (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 22720 El Camino Real, Santa Margarita, CA 93453, USA
properties.description: Thin and watery, with acid-driven grapefruit and sour gooseberry flavors.

properties.title: Bread & Butter 2011 Chardonnay (California)
properties.address: Fawn Creek Township, KS 67301, USA
properties.description: This is dry and crisp in acidity, with suggestions of oranges and buttered toast that wash out in the finish.

properties.title: Acordeón 2011 Torrontés (Cafayate)
properties.address: Tupungato, Mendoza Province, Argentina
properties.description: A gold color indicates maturation, while loud, tropical fruit aromas fold in lychee, citrus blossom and sweat. The palate is electric due to citric acidity, while flavors of orange, tangerine, lemon-lime and grapefruit finish with a chalky feel.

properties.title: San Antonio 2011 Heritage Blanc Vintage White (Central Coast)
properties.address: 737 Lamar St, Los Angeles, CA 90031, USA
properties.description: Blended from several popular grape varieties, this wine tastes a tad tired and oxidized. The citrus and tropical fruit flavors are beginning to turn dried out and sherried. Drink up.

properties.title: EOS 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
properties.address: 2300 Airport Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Light in body, with prickly acidity highlighting thin berry and oak flavors.

properties.title: Pulenta Estate 2011 VIII Chardonnay (Mendoza)
properties.address: Ruta Provincial 86 km 6,5 Alto Agrelo, M5509 Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: A yellow color announces that this isn't in tip-top shape. Stalky, waxy aromas confirm that, while a chunky, creamy feeling palate is low on acid and is showing oxidized, Sherry-like aromas of vanilla and nuts.

properties.title: Castle Rock 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa County)
properties.address: 75 Malaga Cove Plaza #7, Palos Verdes Estates, CA 90274, USA
properties.description: A dreary, simple wine, as thin as water with a few drops of blackberry syrup. It's also soft and bitter on the finish.

properties.title: San Juan Vineyards 2012 Chardonnay (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 3136 Roche Harbor Rd, Friday Harbor, WA 98250, USA
properties.description: This volatile, sharp-toned wine barely makes the cut. Those who are particularly sensitive to scents of nail-polish remover may wish to steer clear. Despite relatively low alcohol and high sugar, it burns a bit in the finish.

properties.title: Hector Wine Company 2011 Pinot Blanc (Seneca Lake)
properties.address: 5610 NY-414, Hector, NY 14841, USA
properties.description: Pleasant apple, pear and white-flower aromas are accompanied by a slightly earthy, mushroom-like note on this dry Pinot Blanc. It's stark and lean with acidity, savory apple flavors and a brisk finish.

properties.title: Viña Bisquertt 2013 Petirrojo Reserva Chardonnay (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Av. Del Condor 590, Huechuraba, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: Candied white-fruit aromas are generic and rudimentary. This feels flat and doesn't show much life on the palate. Flavors of canned pear, oak and related spice finish bland.

properties.title: Llai Llai 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Bío Bío Valley)
properties.address: E-639 18, Panquehue, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.description: While the nose is pungent and true to the variety, there isn't much else positive to say about this cypher of a Sauvignon Blanc. The palate is plump yet fizzy, while the flavor profile offers citrus, bitterness and nothing more.

properties.title: Cousiño-Macul 2012 Chardonnay (Central Valley)
properties.address: Av. Quilín 7100, Penalolen, Peñalolén, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: Mellow and floral on the nose, this turns loud and aggressive in the mouth. Candied lime and mango flavors finish rugged and screaming.

properties.title: Wunsch & Mann 2011 Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 9 MetroTech Center, Brooklyn, NY 11201, USA
properties.description: A bitter wine with tart apple and pear flavors, this has a hard edge. Drink now.

properties.title: San Pedro 2013 Gato Negro Sauvignon Blanc (Central Valley)
properties.address: Av Vitacura 2670, Las Condes, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: With little varietal character on the nose, this qualifies as a basic, plump white wine with mild fruit, oily notes and some bitterness.

properties.title: Chilensis 2012 Reserva Chardonnay (Maule Valley)
properties.address: Av Vitacura 4380, Vitacura, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: Light and tropical on the nose, this is flabby on the palate and tastes dull and sweet, with a creamy aftertaste and low acidity.

properties.title: Vistamar 2012 Sepia Reserva Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: Rosario Nte 615, Las Condes, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: This perenially mediocre wine is a little worse in 2012. It smells blowsy, floral and strange, while in the mouth it's like oaky apple cider. Flavors of cider and faux oak are less than impressive, as is the overall balance.

properties.title: Uvaggio 2014 Zelo Bianco White (Carneros-Napa Valley)
properties.address: 820 Randolph St, Napa, CA 94581, USA
properties.description: Intensely floral on the nose, this is a blend of 70% Pinot Grigio grown in Carneros, 15% Traminer also grown in Carneros, and 15% Moscato giallo from Lodi, which the producer has previously employed in delightful wines of its own. Lilting and bright, it has substance behind the equal balance of fruit and spice, offering a taste of lemony ginger and pear.

properties.title: Silverado 2013 Estate Grown Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.address: 6121 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: A thick, rich and balanced expression of great, estate-owned dirt, this wine has well-developed elements of green apple, pear and lemon, with teases of wet stone and gravelly minerality.

properties.title: Sur de los Andes 2012 Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: Clodomiro Silva s/n, M5565, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: This full-bodied, layered Cabernet opens with mossy, damp aromas that suggest a forest after a rain. The palate is direct and solid, with good depth. Flavors of cola, baked plum, raisin and chocolate finish strong and with previously announced notes of cocoa, mocha and prune. Drink through 2019.

properties.title: Fable Mountain 2012 Jackal Bird White (Western Cape)
properties.address: 2330 SC-11, Travelers Rest, SC 29690, USA
properties.description: Lush and toasty, this blend of 45% Chenin Blanc, 20% Grenache Blanc, 17% Roussanne, 9% Chardonnay and 9% Viognier is complex yet balanced. Scents of toasted apple, pear, beeswax, almond and brioche frame the nose, while the palate offers additional notes of clove-spiked orange and lemon custard. Ample acidity lifts the smooth mouthfeel and sweet-spiced finish. Drink now–2018.

properties.title: Domaine François Schmitt 2014 Pfingstberg Grand Cru Paradis Riesling (Alsace)
properties.description: Lemon notes are subdued by earth on the nose but they shine on a rather textured, palate that needs some air to open up. There is concentration at the core and generous freshness that lights up everything. Subtle but totally worthwhile with a clean lemon finish.

properties.title: Domaine Martin 2014 Les Trois Versants Vieilles Vignes Sur Lie  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
properties.description: The wine is rich and concentrated for a Muscadet. With intense fruits and acidity, it is deliciously fruity and crisp. There is a tangy texture that gives the wine zest and minerality. The aftertaste is so fresh and zingy.

properties.title: Dr. Hermann 2014 H Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: Swirls of penetrating peach and honey flavors pack a mighty punch in this dazzling, sunny sip. Off dry in style, it's an easy going yet elegant wine accented by saffron, blossoms and reverberating tangerine acidity. Drink now through 2017.

properties.title: August Truth 2013 Sangiacomo Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 1307 Lincoln Ave, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.description: A voluptuous wine that's both thick and luxurious, this vineyard-designate reveals hearty elements of crème brûlée and burnt sugar atop grandma's apple pie. It remains in balance through the richness.

properties.title: Mario Schiopetto 2013 Sauvignon (Collio)
properties.address: Via Palazzo Arcivescovile, 1, 34070 Capriva del Friuli GO, Italy
properties.description: Hay, tomato leaf and stone fruit aromas waft out of the glass. The elegant palate is a bit more reserved than the nose, offering yellow peach and chopped herb. Crisp acidity brightens the flavors while a graphite note closes the finish.

properties.title: Max Ferd. Richter 2014 Brauneberger Juffer Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Hauptstraße 85, 54486 Mülheim (Mosel), Germany
properties.description: Puckery lime and lemon flavors collide into lavish streaks of honey and marmalade in this penetrating, lip-smacking kabinett. Delicately composed with the faintest hint of sweetness, it reverberates through a high-toned, tangerine finish. Drink now through 2018.

properties.title: Newton 2013 Unfiltered Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 3111 St Helena Hwy, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: New winemaking and a sizable replanting effort at the producer's Spring Mountain estate are starting to show dividends in this new release, a full-bodied style true to its heritage. Bright acidity pops around a taste of pomelo and yuzu, giving the wine a zest of lemon before a caramelized finish.

properties.title: Pierre Sparr 2014 Mambourg Grand Cru Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 14 Rue de Hoen, 68980 Beblenheim, France
properties.description: The nose is an intricate blend of rose petal, sandalwood and the ripe red-speckled skin of plump mirabelle plums. The palate echoes this perfectly, with an off-dry, cushioned and plump feel that just bathes all the senses in ripe fruit. The warm finish again emphasizes the ripe, plump fruit.

properties.title: Kuentz-Bas 2014 Pfersigberg Grand Cru Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 14 Route des Vins, 68420 Husseren-les-Châteaux, France
properties.description: Softly hinted aromatics of dried peach suggest warmth and ripeness on the nose. The just off-dry palate follows with fluid, gentle richness and a phenolic, textured midpalate. The freshness of the acidity highlights the nuance between very ripe and dried yellow plums. A subtle wine but with a core of subdued richness.

properties.title: Livio Felluga 2012 Abbazia di Rosazzo  (Rosazzo)
properties.address: Via Risorgimento, 1, 34071 Brazzano GO, Italy
properties.description: Made with Friulano, Pinot Bianco, Sauvignon, Malvasia and Ribolla Gialla, this structured white opens with enticing aromas of candied citrus zest, light oak, chopped herb and almond. The firm palate offers baked apple, nectarine, coconut, toast, vanilla and a confectionary note.

properties.title: Tolosa 2013 1772 Chardonnay (Edna Valley)
properties.address: 4910 Edna Rd, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.description: Salt, chalk and grapefruit-pith aromas make for a judiciously restrained approach on the nose of this wine, which comes from heritage clones. The palate is mineral-driven with white rock flavors as well as green apple and lime-pith notes.

properties.title: Hooker 2014 Breakaway Chardonnay (Knights Valley)
properties.address: 444 W, IN-26, Pine Village, IN 47975, USA
properties.description: Akin to a lemon drop, this wine offers a richness of fruit and oak along with balance. It conveys a mix of gingersnap, baked apple and lemon meringue, particularly on the finish. Medium to full bodied, it's a layered and complex expression of the variety that's right for the table.

properties.title: Palacios Remondo 2012 Placet Valtomelloso Viura (Rioja)
properties.address: Av. de Zaragoza, 1, 26540 Alfaro, La Rioja, Spain
properties.description: Waxy peach and baked apple aromas are a touch dusty as well. This barrelfermented Viura feels round and peachy, while flavors of buttered toast, white pepper and bitter melon finish with fortitude. This is an interesting take on Viura that should age and improve through 2024.

properties.title: Pazo de Señorans 2011 Colección Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.address: Lg, Rua Vilanoviña, 36616 Paradela, Pontevedra, Spain
properties.description: Apple and peach aromas are smooth, sophisticated and minerally. This special-selection, aged Albariño is citrusy but full in body. Orange, nectarine and papaya flavors finish with strong composition. At this stage, this is more about feel, texture and complexity than flavors. Drink now.

properties.title: Airlie 2014 Dry Gewürztraminer (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 15305 Dunn Forest Rd, Monmouth, OR 97361, USA
properties.description: Truly dry, with barely perceptible 6g/L of residual sugar, this is intensely aromatic. A strong and lingering impression of talcum powder dominates. It's a potent, powerful, penetrating wine, true to variety, but a bit of a challenge with food.

properties.title: Snoqualmie 2014 Winemaker's Select Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 660 Frontier Rd, Prosser, WA 99350, USA
properties.description: Out of the gate, reductive aromas provide some distraction from the lime-leaf and stone-fruit aromas. It drinks quite sweet with abundant apricot flavors.

properties.title: Sagelands 2014 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 45 E Main St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: Aromas of pear and tropical fruit precede lighter-styled flavors that taper toward the finish.

properties.title: Backhouse 2014 Pinot Grigio (California)
properties.description: Made in a richer-than-usual style, this wine shows floral and melon aromas, medium to full body, dry honeydew melon flavors and a smooth rather than crisp texture.

properties.title: TerraNoble 2013 Gran Reserva White (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: San Clemente, Maule, Chile
properties.description: If the blend of Riesling and Sauvignon Blanc isn't jarring enough, then the wine's combination of high acid and heavy oak should be. This smells like plywood and sawdust, while the palate is both racy and resiny. Oaky, toasty, bitter flavors of lemon and underripe nectarine hold onto a barrel-driven flavors on the finish.

properties.title: Fulkerson 2014 Juicy Sweet Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 5576 NY-14, Dundee, NY 14837, USA
properties.description: Juicy sweet is an apt moniker for this fruity, forward Riesling. The grapey, sugary palate is a bit confected in style, but easy and approachable.

properties.title: Rutherford Hill 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 200 Rutherford Hill Rd, Rutherford, CA 94573, USA
properties.description: Generic, this wine offers huge tannins and underwhelming fruit, finishing sour and somewhat tart.

properties.title: Tololo 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Curicó Valley)
properties.address: 2 Commerce Dr # 3, Moorestown, NJ 08057, USA
properties.description: Cherry and berry aromas are a bit hot and saucy. This feels chunky and borderline sticky, with hard raspberry and plum flavors. This is marginal, even for basic commercial Cabernet.

properties.title: Ventosa 2012 Tocai Friulano (Seneca Lake)
properties.address: 3440 NY-96A, Geneva, NY 14456, USA
properties.description: Tart and lean, this unusually brisk Tocai Friulano juxtapoes savory apple and citrus against a bounty of leafy green and herbal tones. It's refreshingly spry but vegetal in tone.

properties.title: Estampa 2014 Estate White (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Ruta 90, Km.45 O'Higgins CL, Palmilla, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: Bland, pithy citrus aromas come with notes of saline solution and pool water. This is 85% Viognier and 15% Chardonnay, and the body is plump but vague. Flavors of papaya and pickle juice finish green, briny and melony.

properties.title: François Lurton 2013 Hacienda Araucano Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Km 29 Ruta - l.72, Lolol, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: Earthy, leathery berry and mushroom aromas don't stir much interest. This feels tannic and heavy, while flavors of baked berry fruits and caramel finish hot and rugged.

properties.title: Chilcas 2013 Reserva Chardonnay (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: San Rafael, Maule, Chile
properties.description: Blatant aromas of popcorn don't allow for much fruit expression on the nose. This is heavy and lacking in vitality. Flavors of toast, burnt wood, barrel resin and tropical fruits finish soft.

properties.title: Convergence Zone 2014 Drizzle Ciel du Cheval Vineyard Pinot Gris (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 10808 428th Ave SE, North Bend, WA 98045, USA
properties.description: This wine still seems to be in its shell, showing considerable reduction that persists in the aromas and flavors. It drinks off dry with broad apple flavors.

properties.title: Kunde 2013 Kinneybrook Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 9825 Sonoma Hwy, Kenwood, CA 95452, USA
properties.description: There's a mix of sweetness and greenness to this wine, a 100% varietal that is somewhat dull and unformed on the palate. It finishes slightly sour.

properties.title: Tricky Rabbit 2015 Reserva Estate Bottled Sauvignon Blanc (Maule Valley)
properties.description: There's nothing too tricky about this dilute, mealy smelling Sauvignon Blanc that's blended with 10% Carmenère for a reason we can't explain. With drawing white-grape tannins, this tastes green and citrusy, with a scallion note to the finish.

properties.title: One Hope 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (California)
properties.address: 8301 St Helena Hwy, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: This low-key, medium-bodied wine has subdued aromas and flavors, and a slight touch of herbs and lemon to lend personality. It's smooth in texture.

properties.title: Chono 2015 Single Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Leyda Valley)
properties.address: 80 4th Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11217, USA
properties.description: This opens like an exploding hand grenade filled with pyrazines and jalapeño extract. The narrow, acidic palate is lacking in depth, but at least it's fresh. Briny, green flavors of jalapeño and bell peppers never let go, while the finish is tart and green, with a lasting note of bell pepper.

properties.title: Casa Ferreirinha 2012 Vinha Grande Branco White (Douro)
properties.address: R. Carvalhosa 19, 4400-032 Vila Nova de Gaia, Portugal
properties.description: A finely made wine that is smooth and ripe. With a mix of citrus. melon and tropical fruits, it is balanced, touched by light wood aging, and feels rich while also elegant. The wine can be drunk in the next year, giving a delicious fruity character.

properties.title: Vista Hills 2012 Treehouse Estate Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 6475 NE Hilltop Ln, Dayton, OR 97114, USA
properties.description: Ripe, round and fleshy, this brings generous tree fruits annotated with bright spices. It's clean, fresh and has a hint of mint in the finish.

properties.title: Bischöfliche Weingüter Trier 2012 Dom Dry Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Gervasiusstraße 1, 54290 Trier, Germany
properties.description: Jasmine and honey notes are intensely aromatic on this dry, elegantly framed Riesling. It's tightly focused on the palate, with crisp white peach and melon-rind notes accompanied by a refreshing, but piercing lime acidity. Perfect as an apéritif, or to accompany delicate fowl or cheese dishes.

properties.title: Château d'Arlay 2008 White (Côtes du Jura)
properties.address: Château d'Arlay, 2 Rte de Proby, 39140 Arlay, France
properties.description: Although the wine is mature, it also has freshness that comes through strongly as aromatic and yellow-fruit driven. The acidity is intense, full of character while fruitiness continues right to the end.

properties.title: Baron Knyphausen 2010 Erbacher Siegelsberg Grosse Lage Riesling (Rheingau)
properties.description: Sunny and ripe on the nose, with whiffs of honey, orange rind and yellow raisin, this dry, full-bodied wine is textured and broad. The palate is rich, as if streaked with mineral oil, but cut with searing lemon and tangerine acidity. It finishes moderately long, with a hint of floral flair.

properties.title: Baron Knyphausen 2011 Erbacher Steinmorgen Erstes Gewächs Erstes Lage Riesling (Rheingau)
properties.description: Crisp stone fruit, citrus and mineral tones lend a briskness and levity to this dry, full-bodied Riesling. It's expansive and richly textured on the palate, with a refreshing tangerine acidity that lingers on the finish.

properties.title: Domdechant Werner 2011 Hochheimer Domdechaney Erstes Gewächs Trocken Riesling (Rheingau)
properties.address: Rathausstraße 30, 65239 Hochheim am Main, Germany
properties.description: White grapefruit, peach and blossom notes are perfumed and pretty on this dry, full-bodied Riesling. The palate feels weighty and ripe, but bright, with flavors of quince jelly and yellow plum, along with a zesty, focused minerality that carries from start to finish.

properties.title: Drew 2012 Albariño (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 9000 CA-128, Philo, CA 95466, USA
properties.description: The only Albariño in Mendocino County, this one's got cool-climate written all over it, restrained in alcohol yet fruity in tropical citrus and melon. High in acidity, it unfolds crisp and clean. Fruit comes from two vineyards also used by Drew for Pinot Noir and Syrah. There's a nuanced layer of creaminess on the back palate and finish, making the wine a mouthwatering accompaniment to shellfish.

properties.title: Dry Creek Vineyard 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 3770 Lambert Bridge Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: This Cab is deeply layered, full-bodied and bone dry, with thick, raw-boned tannins that call for some time in the cellar. With modest alcohol and fine acidity, it will have no trouble negotiating the next 6–8 years, allowing the cherry and blackberry flavors to shine through.

properties.title: Ferrari-Carano 2010 Mountain Vineyards Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 8761 Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: An impressive Cabernet, but one in need of cellaring. The primary fruit flavors of blackberries and blueberries are delicious, as is the fancy coating of smoky oak. And the tannins are rich and sweetly ripe. Give it until 2016 or 2017 to begin to integrate.

properties.title: Grgich Hills 2012 Fumé Blanc Estate Grown Dry Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1829 St Helena Hwy, Rutherford, CA 94573, USA
properties.description: Like the label says, this wine is absolutely dry. It's also very crisp in acidity, with a mouthwatering tartness that has the taste of freshly-squeezed lime juice. The fruit flavors also include pineapples, grapefruits and Meyer lemons, with slightly richer notes of peaches and Asian pears. This elegant Sauvignon should be easy to find, with more than 11,600 cases produced.

properties.title: Peter Lehmann 2008 Mentor Cabernet Sauvignon (Barossa)
properties.address: Para Rd, Tanunda SA 5352, Australia
properties.description: This is a full-bodied yet crisp and firmly tannic Cabernet that appears in need of further cellaring. A prominent eucalyptus character accents notes of cassis and espresso, while the finish is a bit tough and gritty at this stage. Try 2018–2025.

properties.title: Clearview 2009 Reserve Chardonnay (Hawke's Bay)
properties.address: 194 Clifton Road, Te Awanga 4180, New Zealand
properties.description: This full-bodied, ripe, lush wine boasts layers of peach and pineapple fruit that verge on being overly tropical, but has an edge of citrusy acidity that pulls it back from the brink. Delicious over the next year or two.

properties.title: Rex Hill 2011 Chardonnay (Chehalem Mountains)
properties.address: 30835 OR-99W, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.description: Young, sharp, oaky and wound up tightly, this is a focused wine of medium concentration. Green and yellow apples hold down the core of fruit, and trail out with a hint of butter on the tongue.

properties.title: Rijckaert 2011 En Paradis Chardonnay (Arbois)
properties.address: Aux Correaux, 71570 Leynes, France
properties.description: This is a densely textured wine, full of flavors of lemon zest and green apples. The intense fruitiness lights the palate with a crisp feel as well as final, tight acidity.

properties.title: Scarlett 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
properties.description: Ripe blackberry, cherry and cassis flavors join with caramelized oak to yield this rich, opulent Cabernet. It's an elaborate wine, but too young, with brusque tannins. Give it until 2020–2021 and see how it's doing.

properties.title: Schloss Johannisberger 2011 Gelblack Feinherb Riesling (Rheingau)
properties.address: 65366 Geisenheim, Germany
properties.description: Smoke and dried herb notes accent sunny citrus and peach aromas on this refreshingly off-dry Riesling. Flavors of tart stone fruit and tangerine bristle on the palate, finishing crisply, with a hint of floral perfume.

properties.title: Susana Balbo 2007 Crios Torrontés (Salta)
properties.address: Cochabamba 7801, M5509, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Smooth on the bouquet, with papaya, melon and other more neutral fruit aromas. The palate shows a teaspoon or two of sugary sweetness, while melon, mango and ripe apple flavors fill things out. A pleasant wine with a lightly candied way to it. Simple and basic, and decidedly not bitter.

properties.title: Thomas Fogarty 2004 Vallerga Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 19501 Skyline Blvd, Woodside, CA 94062, USA
properties.description: A little hot and tannic, with a young Port feeling, except that the wine, which is 100% Cabernet, is totally dry. Hard to tell where it's going. Grown in Yountville.

properties.title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2005 Indian Wells Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14111 NE 145th St, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: The Indian Wells Cabernet Sauvignon seems a little reductive at the moment; odd, since the 2005 vintage was forward, almost fat, and the wine has been in bottle for quite some time. It should definitely be decanted and aired out before serving, which will help to push the fruit flavors forward. The finish is just slightly dilute, but the wine is well-made and may just be suffering from some of the occasional dumbness that strikes Cabernet.

properties.title: Finca El Portillo 2008 Estate Bottled Sauvignon Blanc (Uco Valley)
properties.address: Mendoza Province, Argentina
properties.description: Honest Sauvignon aromas of citrus and grapefruit set out the welcome mat. The palate follows suit with varietally correct grapefruit and lime flavors, while the finish shows club soda and other drying aspects. Not a world-beater but a pleasing wine.

properties.title: Patz & Hall 2006 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 917 Business 141 N, Pound, WI 54161, USA
properties.description: A nice Chardonnay that feels pedigreed and well-made, with crisp acidity and a creamy texture framing very ripe tropical fruit and citrus flavors. The oak dominates, however, making the wine heavy in sweet, caramelized toast.

properties.title: Kenwood 2005 Jack London Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
properties.address: 9592 Sonoma Hwy, Kenwood, CA 95452, USA
properties.description: Peppery and hot, with blackberry and currant flavors wrapped into firm tannins. Not showing much openness now, but feels like it has the potential to develop with a few years in the bottle.

properties.title: Stonegate 2010 Collection Chardonnay (California)
properties.description: Toasty oak, pineapples, oranges and vanilla combine in this Chardonnay to make it an easy-drinking everyday sipper. It seems little sweet, like jam.

properties.title: Terrazas de Los Andes 2010 Altos del Plata Chardonnay (Mendoza)
properties.address: Cochabamba y Thames, M5509 Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Chunky and murky on the nose, with melon and papaya aromas. Feels round but light in the center, with vanilla, pear and melon flavors. Fleshy and simple on the finish.

properties.title: Caposaldo 2011 Moscato (Pavia)
properties.address: 13303 W Maple St Suite 111, Wichita, KS 67235, USA
properties.description: Here's an easy, no-fuss Moscato with a bright, crystalline appearance and fresh aromas of spring flower, peach and honey baked almond. The wine presents a full, creamy finish with mild foaming and effervescence.

properties.title: Sebastiani 2009 Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.description: Too sweet, like pineapple and pear juice sweetened with white sugar. The underlying wine is pretty good, with decent acidity and a clean minerality. But that sweetness is over the top.

properties.title: Benegas 2008 Luna Benegas Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: Aráoz 1600, M5507 Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Citric smelling, with clipped aromas of berry fruits. Choppy tannins, heat and raisiny, sweet, cooked berry flavors and stemmy notes finish herbal tasting but full in feel.

properties.title: Michel Torino 2010 Don David Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Calchaquí Valley)
properties.description: Cloudy to the eye, with overly green aromas of tomato and bell pepper, along with spice and dried cherry. Feels hot and acidic, with a clipped, cutting palate full of berry flavors, herbs and green pepper. Fresh but herbal on the finish.

properties.title: Amadores 2010 Chardonnay (Mendoza)
properties.address: Av. Pres. Castillo 4181, K4700 San Fernando del Valle de Catamarca, Catamarca, Argentina
properties.description: Stalky aromas of burnt hay blend with white fruit scents. Bland apple and stalky flavors are balanced by decent acidity, then finishes with burnt, oily accents.

properties.title: Jean-Baptiste Adam 2012 Les Natures Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 5 Rue de l'Aigle, 68770 Ammerschwihr, France
properties.description: This has great depth of flavor with its fresh apple and pear fruits and touch of spice. It's off dry while balanced with acidity and a crisp texture. Drink now.

properties.title: Kirkland Signature 2011 Mountain Cuvée Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 14030 NE 145th St, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: Soft, supple plum envelopes an oaky structure in this Cabernet, supported by 15% Merlot. Coffee and chocolate complete the picture, finishing strong at the end, resulting in a value-priced wine of attractive flavor and immediate accessibility.

properties.title: Leon Beyer 2012 Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 8 Pl. du Château Saint-Léon, 68420 Eguisheim, France
properties.description: This is a dry wine, very spicy, with a tight, taut texture and strongly mineral character layered with citrus as well as pepper. It's a food wine with its almost crisp aftertaste.

properties.title: Louis M. Martini 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 254 Saint Helena Hwy S, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Slightly reduced, this wine offers a chalky, tannic backbone to an otherwise juicy explosion of rich black cherry, the whole accented throughout by firm oak and cigar box.

properties.title: Mirassou 2012 Chardonnay (Central Coast)
properties.description: Building on 150 years and six generations of winemaking tradition, the winery trends toward a leaner style, with the classic California buttercream aroma cut by tart green apple. In this good everyday sipping wine, flavors that range from pear to barely ripe pineapple prove approachable but not distinctive.

properties.title: Marilena Barbera 2013 Inzolia (Sicilia)
properties.address: SP79, 92013 Menfi AG, Italy
properties.description: A delicate floral fragrance of Spanish broom comes with a whiff of pear. The vibrant palate offers green apple, citrus and just a hint of bitter almond on the crisp finish.

properties.title: Alessandro di Camporeale 2013 Kaid Sauvignon (Sicilia)
properties.address: Contrada Mandranova, 90043 Camporeale PA, Italy
properties.description: Aromas of exotic fruit, cut grass and crushed tomato vine lead the nose. On the palate, hints of fresh Mediterranean herb add interest to the grapefruit and lime flavors. Firm acidity gives it a zesty finish.

properties.title: Borjón 2012 Valle de Napa Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 11270 Shenandoah Rd, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.description: A layering of 100% new French oak takes center stage in this wine, which is leathery and rustic. Black currant and tight-grain tannin compete for attention atop a noticeable seasoning of dried herb.

properties.title: Bowers Harbor 2013 Smokey Hollow Riesling (Old Mission Peninsula)
properties.address: 2896 Bowers Harbor Rd, Traverse City, MI 49686, USA
properties.description: Fresh lemon and crushed mineral tones ride over restrained aromas of tart peach and apple skin. The palate shows underripe pear and sour lemon, with a finish reminiscent of Pixy Stix.

properties.title: DiamAndes 2013 Perlita Chardonnay (Uco Valley)
properties.address: Clodomiro Silva S/N Vista Flores Tunuyan Mendoza, M5565 Vista Flores, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Tropical-fruit aromas are balanced by crisper apple and pear scents, while the palate is plump, round and easygoing. Flavors of pear, melon, green banana and wood spice end creamy but with adequate acidic cut.

properties.title: Domaine Charles Baur 2012 Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 29 Grand-Rue, 68420 Eguisheim, France
properties.description: Opulently spicy, this wine is rich, smooth and packed with lychee and mango flavors. Medium sweet in style, it is round, ripe and altogether enticing. Drink now.

properties.title: Emile Beyer 2013 Tradition Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 7 Pl. du Château Saint-Léon, 68420 Eguisheim, France
properties.description: With a sense of structure and balance between honey and fruit, this is an attractive, food-friendly wine. It is off dry although the spice core gives a drier edge. Allow the wine a few more months in bottle; drink from late 2015.

properties.title: Las Valles 2013 Viura-Chardonnay (Cariñena)
properties.address: 71 Park St, Troy, MI 48083, USA
properties.description: Dusty smelling and a touch dilute on the nose, this Viura-Chardonnay blend displays aromas of green apple, citrus and vanilla. The palate is juicy, citric and clean, with tangerine, lemon peel and white grapefruit flavors. This is an ideal quaffing wine.

properties.title: McIlroy 2012 Signature Edition Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 4605 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Tropical fruit drips from this barrel-fermented Chardonnay, accented in golden honey and toasted oak. Crisp at first, then oaky, it feels a bit disjointed but manages to resolve its issues on the finish, a nice combination of the two.

properties.title: Paul Blanck 2013 Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 29 Grand-Rue, 68240 Kaysersberg, France
properties.description: Intensely perfumed, this wine has huge spiciness. Considering the richness, it's surprising how the acidity cuts through and gives a fresh character. The wine is crisp and rich at the same time, and ready to drink.

properties.title: Dr. Heidemanns-Bergweiler 2013 Graacher Himmelreich Spätlese Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Gestade 15, 54470 Bernkastel-Kues, Germany
properties.description: Bruised apple and smoke notes penetrate throughout this pert, delicately framed Riesling. Rich honey and peach flavors cast warmth onto its tart, briskly acidic midpalate.

properties.title: Gorman 2015 Old Scratch Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: The aromas are redolent with notes of candy corn, peach and spice. The palate is full bodied and rich, with a layered creamy feel to the stone-fruit flavors. It shows some warmth on the finish.

properties.title: Villa Maria 2015 Cellar Selection Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.address: 118 Montgomerie Road, Māngere, Manukau 2022, New Zealand
properties.description: Round and ample in the mouth, this medium-full-bodied wine combines green notes of cut grass and snap pea with ripe stone fruit, then ends crisp and grapefruity. It's a fine example of Marlborough Sauvignon that's widely available and well priced.

properties.title: Volker Eisele Family Estate 2014 Gemini Semillon-Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 3080 Lower Chiles Valley Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: A delightfully memorable blend of 76% Sémillon and 24% Sauvignon Blanc, this is a lithe, crisp and medium-bodied experience. The grapes were organically grown, whole-cluster pressed and fermented in stainless steel. It shines in Meyer lemon and wet stone, just a hint of creamy tropical fervor bubbling beneath the surface.

properties.title: Wilson and Wilson 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1960 Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Spearmint and a tease of green olive invite one into this smooth, leathery wine, firm in grippy tannin and supportive oak. Made by Alan Viader of the Viader winemaking family in the Napa Valley, it shows power and grace in equal measure.

properties.title: Dubost 2015 Alexandrine White (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 9988 Chimney Rock Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
