properties.description: Cool-climate pyrazinic aromas are punchy and feline. This feels good but weaker and more dilute than in most years. Briny, pickled citrus flavors follow the nose, while this ends lean and green but solid enough.

properties.title: Santa Rita 2015 120 Sauvignon Blanc (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: 2923 Grand Ave, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.description: Grassy, slightly green aromas are fresh and suggest cactus pad. This is easy on the palate, with flavors of citrus fruits and green herbs, such as tarragon and rosemary. A crisp finish is just solid enough to maintain integrity.

properties.title: McGregor 2015 Pinot Noir Rosé (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 5503 Dutch St, Dundee, NY 14837, USA
properties.description: While the nose is quite bold, boasting concentrated notes of strawberry leather and caramel, the palate on this delicately framed rosé is demure. It's a bit light in concentration with soft acidity, but an easygoing quaffer for early consumption.

properties.title: Poggio al Tufo 2015 Vermentino (Toscana)
properties.address: Località Poggio Cavalluccio 6199, 58017 Pitigliano GR, Italy
properties.description: Here's a fun informal white that has delicate aromas of yellow stone fruit and a whiff of wild flower. The simple but well-made palate offers yellow peach and a citrusy note. Enjoy as an apéritif or pair it with light first courses.

properties.title: Klinker Brick 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
properties.address: 15887 Alpine Rd, Lodi, CA 95240, USA
properties.description: An aroma like maple syrup on waffles and similar, sweet-seeming flavors are reminiscent of breakfast, but this will pair well with slow-cooked barbecue. Most of that spicy sweetness comes from oak barrels or add-ins, complementing the full body and light tannins.

properties.title: Les Collines 2014 Red (Côtes du Rhône)
properties.address: 4137 Hood Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: Hints of sweaty saddle leather, cherries and dark chocolate mark the nose and palate of this wine. This medium-bodied wine doesn't show much in the way of tannins, making it easy to drink now and probably best drunk up before 2020.

properties.title: McGregor 2014 Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.description: Savory, sightly bruised tones of pressed apple and pear persist throughout this briskly composed wine. Off dry in style, it's limned by a comforting edge of honey and sweet-tart tangerine. Drink now through 2019.

properties.title: Pura 8 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (Rapel Valley)
properties.description: Lanolin and squash aromas indicate that this is fading. The palate is wide and fleshy but lacking in a focal point. Flavors of spiced pumpkin and aged apple are a bit like holiday pie, while modest acidity on the finish ensures that this is bland on the exit.

properties.title: Uvaggio 2015 Dolce Moscato (Lodi)
properties.address: 820 Randolph St, Napa, CA 94581, USA
properties.description: This fascinating, sweet but light wine wraps lemongrass and thyme flavors around lemon and peach for interesting layers of complexity. The sweetness helps to round the texture and carries everything into a long finish.

properties.title: Trust 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 760 C St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: Appealing, very varietal aromas of fresh and dried herb, cherry and earth lead to a tart, flavorful yet restrained fruit flavors, complete with a lovely sense of balance and a stretched-out finish.

properties.title: Beauregard 2010 Brut Nature Rose Méthode Champenoise Estate Grown Sparkling (Ben Lomond Mountain)
properties.address: 10 Pine Flat Rd, Santa Cruz, CA 95060, USA
properties.description: This lightly pinkish-yellow blend of 80% Pinot Noir and 20% Chardonnay is yeasty at first, with aromas of nectarine and red apple quickly arising through the fervent, lavish foam. The palate is steely in texture, with flavors of light raspberry, red-apple skins and sour-plum rinds culminating in a bready finish.

properties.title: Imagery 2014 Upper Ridge Riesling (Pine Mountain-Cloverdale Peak)
properties.description: This producer continues to impress with varieties that are outside the usual suspects, showing finesse with this dry expression of waxy apple and tart lemon. Creamy on the palate, it exuberantly releases stony minerality as it goes, finishing with a taste of wet stone.

properties.title: Domaine des Cognettes 2005 Tentation Sélection Vieilles Vignes  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
properties.address: 25 Rte de Saint-Crespin, 44190 Clisson, France
properties.description: This is really mature Muscadet, yet it's certainly not too old. It is toasty, with almond, spice and vanilla flavors plus the concentration that comes from old vines. It is a fascinating wine, ripe and with considerable depths. The wine is, of course, ready to drink.

properties.title: Domaine Vincent Carême 2014 Le Clos  (Vouvray)
properties.address: 1 Rue du Haut Clos, 37210 Vernou-sur-Brenne, France
properties.description: This single-vineyard wine has great aging potential. The minerality and tension in this wine with its apple fruit and texture is still resolving itself. Wait at least until 2019 before drinking.

properties.title: Diamond Creek 2013 Red Rock Terrace Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1500 Diamond Mountain Rd, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.description: Red Rock is the warmest of the producer's estate blocks, seven north-facing acres holding high-iron soils. The wine pleases instantly, showing a mix of dried herb, spearmint and dark cherry within a structured, accessibly oaked and mellowed package.

properties.title: Dos Lagos Vineyards 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Atlas Peak)
properties.address: 141 Dos Lagos Dr, Dripping Springs, TX 78620, USA
properties.description: Velvety smooth and lengthy on the palate, this 100% varietal, estate-grown wine from an appellation known for power and robust flavor reveals a depth of black licorice, clove and plum amidst a richness of peppery meat, which would also suggest a fine pairing. Part of its beauty is the abundance of violet aromas on the nose.

properties.title: Elena Walch 2010 Kastelaz Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Andreas Hofer Str., 1, 39040 Tramin an der Weinstraße., Autonome Provinz Bozen - Südtirol, Italy
properties.description: This is a well-priced Pinot Bianco that opens with a clean, bright bouquet of melon, pear, stone fruit and white flower. It offers impressive smoothness of texture and a bright, food-friendly disposition.

properties.title: Buehler 2009 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
properties.address: 820 Greenfield Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Nice, classic black currant and cedar flavors in this dry young wine, with some firm minerality. The tannin structure is evident in the form of a tough astringency. Give it 6–8 years in the cellar.

properties.title: Chappellet 2010 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1581 Sage Canyon Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: This effort is similar to Chappellet's past vintages, with citrus and tropical fruit flavors, tastefully accented by oak and brightened with a squeeze of lemony acidity.

properties.title: Château Barbanau 2011 L'Instant Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.description: This is a bright, fresh raspberry-flavored wine. It's fruity and layered with attractive, crisp acidity. A touch of spice accents the finish.

properties.title: Château Rimauresq 2011 Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.description: A delicious, crisp and fruity wine that's textured with minerality and a tang of lemon zest. On the palate a raspberry flavor dominates, with layers of acidity and a lively, bright aftertaste.

properties.title: Clos Cibonne 2010 Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: Chem. de la Cibonne, 83220 Le Pradet, France
properties.description: Based on Tibouren, a red grape found in Provence, this is a perfumed wine that tastes of the regions herbs and lavender. Both warm and light, it has notes of spice, red plum and a delicate aftertaste.

properties.title: Pride Mountain 2010 Vintner Select Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 3000 Summit Trail, Santa Rosa, CA 95404, USA
properties.description: This is always a gigantic wine, and its success depends on technically balancing its various parts. The 2010 delivers the usual richness, with vast, deep fruit, mineral, oak and leesy flavors. It's as full bodied as a red wine, but a little heavy for a Chardonnay. Not an ager, it's best enjoyed now with the richest Chardonnay-friendly dishes.

properties.title: Sijnn 2010 White Chenin Blanc-Viognier (Malgas)
properties.address: Malagas, Malgas, 7441, South Africa
properties.description: This blend of 57% Chenin Blanc and 43% Viognier is opulent and forward. Rich scents of baked apple, clove-spiked orange, honeysuckle and hazelnut crisp dance on the nose and mouth, but the palate remains lifted with fresh acidity and a saline note. Accents of spice and toast remain through the long close. A gorgeous wine now, but it should age beautifully through 2015.

properties.title: Türk 2010 Eiswein Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
properties.description: Harvested in December, this marries opulent flavors of honey and orange marmalade with intense acidity. Ready to drink in its youth, but it's likely to age for many years. Screwcap.

properties.title: Merryvale 2010 Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.address: 1000 Main St, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: This is a good followup to Merryvale's 2009. While it was barrel fermented in nearly half new French oak, it never feels overly manipulated or fussy. Marked by crisp acidity and Carneros minerality, it's an elegant, clean wine, with subtle Meyer lemon, lime and Asian pear flavors.

properties.title: Michael Pozzan 2010 Annabella Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.description: A clean, spicy Chardonnay, with classic flavors of oranges, green apples, pears and spices. The oak influence is minimal, allowing the fruit and acidity to star. This shows an elegance that places it at the forefront of Chardonnays in this price range.

properties.title: Domaine Houchart 2011 Rosé (Côtes de Provence Sainte-Victoire)
properties.address: 1550 Hendersonville Rd Suite #102, Asheville, NC 28803, USA
properties.description: This is a crisp, fruity and delicate wine. With its pale gray-pink color and lively acidity, it has both concentration and lightness; it's so poised.

properties.title: Donati 2010 Pinot Blanc (Paicines)
properties.address: 2720 Oak View Rd, Templeton, CA 93465, USA
properties.description: Tasting similar to Chardonnay, this has a buttery, creamy texture that frames orange, citrus and tropical fruit flavors. It gains extra points for delicacy and balance. The appellation is in San Benito County, about 25 miles inland from Monterey.

properties.title: Felsner 2010 Vordernberg Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Kremstal)
properties.address: Ortsring 61, 3485, Austria
properties.description: Big and rich, this is just settling into its stride. It has weight and richness, with taut acidity as well as a forward, concentrated, fruity character. For food and for aging.

properties.title: Allram 2010 Hasel Alte Reben Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.address: Herrengasse 3, 3491 Straß im Straßertale, Austria
properties.description: Combining richness and freshness, this has a crisp apple flavor that mingles with smooth-textured yellow fruit. Its ripe while still preserving its taut finish. Screwcap.

properties.title: Mauro Sebaste 2010  Moscato d'Asti
properties.address: Via Garibaldi, 222 bis, 12051 Gallo CN, Italy
properties.description: Mauro Sebaste has produced a creamy, elegant Moscato d'Asti with lovely notes of white flower and soapy foam. Sweet flavors of peach and honey are followed by a touch of zesty lemon.

properties.title: Olivier Leflaive 2009 Aligoté du Domaine  (Bourgogne Aligoté)
properties.description: From one of the Leflaive family vineyards close to Puligny-Montrachet, this is as rich as Aligoté can get. Even so, the texture is crisp, with fresh kiwi and herbs, finishing with intense acidity.

properties.title: Robert Oatley 2010 Pinot Grigio (Adelaide Hills)
properties.address: 3/100 Pacific Hwy, St Leonards NSW 2065, Australia
properties.description: This Pinot Grigio is faintly coppery in color (trendy in some circles), with slightly floral and citrus overtones. It's modest in alcohol, but reasonably plump on the midpalate, delivering melon and apple-skin flavors before finishing crisp and refreshing. Drink now.

properties.title: Valley Legend 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
properties.description: With a soft mouthfeel and upfront cherry, blueberry and blackberry flavors, this Cabernet puts all its chips on sheer deliciousness. It's a winner, but not an ager. Drink now.

properties.title: Francis Ford Coppola 2009 Black Label Diamond Collection 1910 Type Claret Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
properties.address: 300 Via Archimedes, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.description: A rich, lusty wine, dry and easy to like for its array of blackberry, cherry, anise and sandalwood flavors. Made from the traditional Bordeaux varieties, based on Cabernet Sauvignon, it really pleases the palate. Drink now.

properties.title: Francis Ford Coppola 2010 Votre Santé Chardonnay (California)
properties.address: 300 Via Archimedes, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.description: Lots to like in this smooth, polished Chardonnay. It shows plenty of ripe pineapple, peach and pear flavors, with overtones of vanilla and buttered toast. Good price for the quality.

properties.title: Franz Haas 2009 Moscato Rosa Moscato (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Villner Str., 6, 39040 Montan, Autonome Provinz Bozen - Südtirol, Italy
properties.description: Moscato Rosa is a crimson-colored sweet wine with dark ruby highlights that offers simple but fresh aromas of wild raspberries and blueberries. The wine's bouquet is fragrant, sweet-smelling and intense. Drink it as an apéritif or with fruit-based desserts.

properties.title: Viña Cobos 2010 Felino Chardonnay (Perdriel)
properties.address: Costa Flores s/n y, RN7, M5509 Perdriel, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Light oak aromas blend nicely with white flower scents and peach notes. The palate is round, smooth and honest, with plump flavors of vanilla, pear and melon. Oaky on the finish, then dry and toasty. Nice for a warm-weather Chard.

properties.title: Bosio 2011  Moscato d'Asti
properties.address: 10, Strada Borelli, Santo Stefano Belbo, CN 12058, 12058 Santo Stefano Belbo CN, Italy
properties.description: Luca Bosio's pretty Moscato d'Asti opens with characteristic aromas of ginger, tangerine skin and acacia flower. This sweet sparkler presents a mouthful of creamy foam and bright bubbles.

properties.title: Cakebread 2010 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.description: With bright, zesty acidity, this Sauvignon Blanc is clean and vibrant in orange, pineapple, lime and gooseberry flavors. If only it finished drier, it would be superb.

properties.title: J Ludlow 2008 Kemsley 1550 Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 2890 Grand Ave, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.description: Fresh and jammy in raspberries, cherries and blackberries, this wine trades complexity for sheer fruity power and lusciousness. Drink now.

properties.title: Michele Chiarlo 2010 Nivole  (Moscato d'Asti)
properties.address: Strada Nizza-Canelli, 99, 14042 Calamandrana AT, Italy
properties.description: This precious Moscato d'Asti opens with soft foam and sweet aromas of peach, honey, almond blossom and jasmine. Pair this delicious dessert wine with fruit ice cream or semifreddo.

properties.title: Abbazia di Novacella 2010 Praepositus Moscato Rosa Moscato (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Via Abbazia, 1, 39040 Novacella BZ, Italy
properties.description: Made using Moscato Rosa, this is a unique dessert wine that opens with a deep ruby color and bright aromas of wild berry and white chocolate. Smooth, sweet and thick, it also shows a touch of tannic firmness on the close.

properties.title: Mont Tauch 2009 Le Dog de Christophe Cabernet Sauvignon (Vin de Pays d'Oc)
properties.address: 2 Rue Cave Coopérative, 11350 Tuchan, France
properties.description: Ripe raspberry, spicy red plum and licorice unfold on the nose, while soft flavors of cassis chime in on the palate. Light weight and watery with a short finish.

properties.title: Masies d'Avinyo 2008 Abadal Picapoll (Pla de Bages)
properties.address: Sta. Maria de Horta de Avinyó, 08279 Santa Maria de Horta de Avinyó, Barcelona, Spain
properties.description: Oily and frankly a bit skunky on the nose. The palate is spritzed yet soft, with chunky, blowsy, generic white fruit flavors. Doesn't inspire; this winery's red wines are better.

properties.title: Bougrier 2009 Doulce France  (Vouvray)
properties.description: A medium-sweet wine, attractively nutty in character with dried apricot flavor and some acidity.

properties.title: Mount Baker 2007 Late Harvest Viognier (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 4298 Mt Baker Hwy, Everson, WA 98247, USA
properties.description: Sugary, with a chemical aroma and a sharp, volatile finish.

properties.title: Domaine Terlato & Chapoutier 2009 Lieu Dit Malakoff Viognier (Pyrenees)
properties.address: 900 Armour Dr, Lake Bluff, IL 60044, USA
properties.description: The wine looks a touch amber-like at the rim, with aromas of butterscotch and cracked pepper. The flavors carry a bruised-fruit character, and the wine seems a bit flabby on the palate. Not up to this project's usual high standards.

properties.title: Doña Paula 2010 Los Cardos Sauvignon Blanc (Mendoza)
properties.address: Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza Province, Argentina
properties.description: Hard, oily, prickly and not impressive by global Sauvignon Blanc standards. The palate deals semisour grapefruit and passion fruit flavors, and the finish is a monotone continuation of the primary flavors.

properties.title: Luigi Bosca 2009 Gala 3 White (Maipú)
properties.address: San Martín 2044, M5507 Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Gold in color and about as overoaked as a white wine can be. This blend of Viognier, Chardonnay and Riesling is all resin and barrel spice. It actually offers some sophistication in terms of mouthfeel, but overall it's grossly out of balance and brutally dominated by oak-based aromas and flavors.

properties.title: Midnight 2016 Aurora Reserve White (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 2925 Anderson Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Clean and smooth lines of pear, lemon peel and nectarine are very fresh and easy in this blend of 71% Grenache Blanc, 15% Viognier and 14% Roussanne. It's straightforward on the palate, with Asian pear and melon-rind flavors. A great sunny day wine.

properties.title: Pierre-Yves et Olivier Fichet 2016 Château London  (Mâcon)
properties.address: 651 Route d'Aze, 71960 Igé, France
properties.description: This is a warm, rich wine. Its fruit is muted at this stage although there's potential in the good acidity and smooth, juicy texture. Let it open out more and drink from 2018.

properties.title: Stottle 2013 Dineen Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 2641 Willamette Dr NE ste e, Lacey, WA 98516, USA
properties.description: This opens with cherry cordial, cranberry, herb and barrel spice aromas that seem a bit off. The palate is marked by sweet cherry and cranberry flavors that trail off quickly on the finish.

properties.title: Portal del Montsant 2011 Santbru White (Montsant)
properties.description: Fully mature, oxidized aromas include a heavy note of popcorn and oak along with aged pear and apple. This wine is ripping with acidity, while flavors lean towards salty, lightly baked apple. A finish based mostly on acid means this should stay vital for years to come.

properties.title: Anthony Road 2016 Pinot Gris (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 1020 Anthony Rd, Penn Yan, NY 14527, USA
properties.description: Pristine white grapefruit and pear are accented by hints of fennel and saffron in this light-bodied, dry Pinot Gris. Sunny lemony acidity lends a soft, yielding feel to the palate.

properties.title: Balancing Act 2015 Cabernet Sauvignon (Washington)
properties.description: Fruit forward aromas of plum, black currant, herb and spice lead to lightly sweet blue and black fruit flavors in this wine. Grainy tannins provide support, delivering easy-drinking appeal.

properties.title: Balancing Act 2016 Chardonnay (Washington)
properties.description: Almost effervescent on first pour, this wine is brightly aromatic, with apple, pear and melon notes. The palate shows no obvious oak influence, with a rounded mouthfeel and Granny Smith apple-like acidity. It's a pleasing, straightforward example of the variety.

properties.title: Boekenoogen 2015 Estate Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 24 W Carmel Valley Rd, Carmel Valley, CA 93924, USA
properties.description: There's a noticeably sweet quality to this bottling that will appeal to some but turn off others. Spun sugar, buttercream, honeysuckle and orange mousse show on the nose, while the palate offers flavors of apple butter, brown sugar and lemon custard.

properties.title: Bosco Nestore 2016 Donna Bosco Rosato (Colline Pescaresi)
properties.description: This has delicate but alluring orange blossom, Mediterranean herb and wild berry scents. The bright, savory palate doles out crushed red cherry, raspberry and white pepper hints alongside crisp acidity. It has a clean, fresh finish.

properties.title: Carmen 2014 Gran Reserva Los Quillayes Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
properties.description: Heavy oak on the nose means aromas of pencil lead, wet cement and blacktop are in the lead. This wine feels resiny and tannic, with a similar woody flavor accenting herbal black fruit. Although this is a good Cabernet, it's quite oaky.

properties.title: Castellroig 2014 Terroja de Sabaté i Coca Xarel-lo (Penedès)
properties.description: Briny citrus-peel aromas show a pyrazinic green side and a touch of corn tortilla. A somewhat dilute palate is bolstered by a shock of citric acidity, tasting of stone fruits and citrus. On the finish, early nectarine notes are replaced by briny flavors.

properties.title: Château des Bormettes 2016 Cuvée Hélène White (Côtes de Provence La Londe)
properties.address: 903 route du Pellegrin, 83250 La Londe-les-Maures, France
properties.description: From vines close to the sea, this wine does have a salty tang to its ripe soft fruits. Flavors of creamed apples and spice fill the glass, giving a smooth wine with just enough acidity. Drink now.

properties.title: Domaine de la Jobeline 2016  Mâcon-Villages
properties.address: 887 Rte de la Roche Vineuse, 71960 Verzé, France
properties.description: This delicious wine balances acidity and citrus fruits with riper melon and pear flavors. It offers an attractive, refreshing crisp edge. Drink now.

properties.title: Martinsancho 2009 Verdejo (Rueda)
properties.address: C. Torcido, 1, 47491 La Seca, Valladolid, Spain
properties.description: Citrusy and full on the nose, with a fleshy palate that sports fresh white grapefruit and passion fruit flavors. This is a textbook Verdejo from Rueda with modest sweaty notes, grapefruit galore, citrus pith and minerality. Drink now.

properties.title: Miner 2007 Stagecoach Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: This is a big, rich, extracted, dryly tannic Cabernet. The suggestion is ageability, but the wine seems to lack the dynamic tension to ride out the years. It has plenty of ripe blackberry fruit, but snaps to a quick finish. Quite good, but a disappointing expression of the Stagecoach Vineyard.

properties.title: Mont Marçal 2008 Rosado Brut Sparkling (Cava)
properties.address: Carrer Maset dels Cosins, 58, 08732 Castellví de la Marca, Barcelona, Spain
properties.description: A subtle wine made entirely from Trepat. Aromas of strawberry and toast are mixed well, while the palate is juicy, crisp and correct, with raspberry and plum flavors along with a dose of dry spice. Light, toasty and perfectly dry on the back end. Nothing spectacular but gets things right.

properties.title: Occasio 2010 Del Arroyo Vineyard Rose of Pinot Noir Rosé (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 2245B S Vasco Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.description: Occasio continues to build its case for being a winery to watch out of the Livermore Valley, releasing this lively, raspberry and honeycomb rosé made from Pinot Noir grapes out of its Del Arroyo Vineyard. The Pommard clone fruit was cold soaked in stainless steel, then pressed from the skins and racked again into stainless steel. A rosé with some meat on its bones, it's way more than an aperitif and will stand strongly aside a full range of summer foods.

properties.title: Snoqualmie 2009 Sauvignon Blanc (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: Dramatically reduced production coupled with a fine vintage add up to a stellar Snoqualmie Sauvignon Blanc in 2009. Loaded with melon, citrus and apple fruit flavors, this brisk and refreshing wine is reminiscent of a racy Quincy. Perfect springtime sipper.

properties.title: Hobo 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 412 Timothy Rd suite c, Santa Rosa, CA 95407, USA
properties.description: A very nice price for a Cabernet this good. It's drily tannic and interesting, with berry, currant and herb flavors that offer a degree of complexity. Good grapes went into the making of this wine, and good winemaking too. Drink now.

properties.title: La Chablisienne 2006 Mont de Milieu Premier Cru  (Chablis)
properties.address: 8 Bd Pasteur, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: A ripe, full wine, immediately accessible, speaking both of minerality and fresh acidity. The fruit goes right to the green apples, kiwi and juicy lemon flavors, but the structure is bold and rounds out these crisp fruits. A wine for aging, perhaps 2–3 years.

properties.title: Montes 2008 Limited Selection Leyda Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Leyda Valley)
properties.address: I-350, Millahue, Santa Cruz, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: Smells like an ocean breeze mixed with field greens, citrus and passion fruit. Montes has been a leader in Chile's movement toward coastal SB, and this one is blasting with grapefruit, green apple, passion fruit and minerality. In the mouth, it has some weight and richness; but that's balanced by zippy acidity. Can't imagine a better match for ceviche or tuna tartare.

properties.title: Faiveley 2007 Fourchaume Premier Cru  (Chablis)
properties.description: A wine that brings out soft richness, with a creamy apple texture layered with green plum skin tannins. The wine has some tautness as well, giving a tight structure that opens up. There's a great mineral, steely streak, with freshness showing through on the finish.

properties.title: Concha y Toro 2006 Marques de Casa Concha Cabernet Sauvignon (Puente Alto)
properties.description: At over $20 the brand's Best Buy days are behind it, but this Cabernet still unfolds in serious but elegant form. The nose is dusty and dark, with cassis and blackberry aromas. Meanwhile, the feel is juicy and fresh, and the palate is just sizable enough. Flavors of cassis, chocolate and coconut are modern and friendly, while the finish of cocoa, mocha and marmalade is exciting.

properties.title: Kali Hart 2007 Chardonnay (Monterey County)
properties.description: This is a sort of second tier wine from Talbott. It's a strongly flavored Chardonnay and extremely ripe, with pineapple jam, apricot-infused crème brûlée and sweet vanilla-butterscotch flavors. But for all the richness, it's crisp and bone dry. Easy to find, with 20,000 cases.

properties.title: Maison Champy 2006 Les Enseignères  (Puligny-Montrachet)
properties.address: 5 Rue du Grenier À Sel, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: This wine goes deliciously towards the citrus flavors, spiked with minerality. However it does also offer some richness, flavors of pears and ripe red apples, softened with melon. It is balanced, vibrant, a full wine that also shows structure.

properties.title: Milbrandt 2006 Traditions Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 707 US-2 unit d, Leavenworth, WA 98826, USA
properties.description: Here is another great value from the Milbrandt brothers, based upon their impeccable vineyard sources (they own 1600 acres, mostly in the Wahluke Slope AVA). Dense and dark, ripe and compact, this Cab/Merlot/Petit Verdot blend brings plenty of macho and muscle, layers of black fruits, black smoke, black tea and black olives. Get the idea? It's a beautiful effort, and really shines at this price point.

properties.title: Olivier Leflaive 2006 Montée de Tonnerre Premier Cru  (Chablis)
properties.description: Firm and tight, a wine that reveals more structure than fruit initially, leaving the citrus and grapefruit flavors to emerge later. Then it closes up again, keeping some of the mineral austerity. Keep this wine for a year.

properties.title: Santa Rita 2006 Medalla Real Special Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: 2923 Grand Ave, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.description: Few $20 Cabs from anywhere are going to deliver like Medalla Real does. From first impressions, which include aromas of toast, coffee, prune and devilish berry, you know it's a good one. The feel is generous and the balance spot on, so the plum, berry, coffee and chocolate flavors have structure and support. A complete wine with length, mint and lavish tannins.

properties.title: Dusted Valley 2007 Old Vine Chardonnay (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 980 Merlot Dr, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: This is delicious, concentrated and showing a range of nuances; along with ripe apple and pear flavors come spicy hints of cinnamon and baking spices. Firm acids, good balance, and more texture and length than most domestic Chardonnays in this price range.

properties.title: Domdechant Werner 2013 Hochheimer Trocken Riesling (Rheingau)
properties.address: Rathausstraße 30, 65239 Hochheim am Main, Germany
properties.description: Touches of honey, saffron and spice lend warmth and suppleness to this dry, exceptionally brisk Riesling. It's a bit lean on the palate, but vivaciously fresh, finishing on a deliciously astringent bite of lime pith.

properties.title: Foradori 2013 Fontanasanta Nosiola (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)
properties.description: Enticing aromas of Alpine wildflowers, chopped herbs, toasted nuts and citrus zest mingle in the glass. The vibrant palate offers hazelnut, juicy nectarine, pear and energizing mineral alongside refreshing acidity.

properties.title: Penley Estate 2011 Aradia Chardonnay (Coonawarra)
properties.address: McLean Rd, Coonawarra SA 5263, Australia
properties.description: Coonawarra is Cabernet country, but this Chardonnay is a solid contender. Subtle toast and citrus aromas show admirable restraint, while there's ample weight and the flavors of pineapple and melon finish clean and citrusy.

properties.title: Abbazia di Novacella 2013 Praepositus Sylvaner (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)
properties.address: Via Abbazia, 1, 39040 Novacella BZ, Italy
properties.description: Aromas suggest citrus, acacia flower, and hints of vanilla and honey. The creamy palate offers Bartlett pear, sage and lemon drop brightened by fresh acidity.

properties.title: Quinta da Lagoalva de Cima 2012 Red (Tejo)
properties.description: This blend of Touriga Nacional and Syrah brings together two perfumed grapes in an harmonious whole. The wine is structured and also richly fruity. It has a great swathe of spiciness from the wood, giving an almost-sweet character while still sustaining the tannins. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Ilsley 2010 Single Vineyard Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
properties.description: Earthy, this wine offers substantial layers of dried herb and cranberry. Denser overtones of oak and tannin are pronounced on the midpalate, the tannins weighty and firm. A lift of acidity picks up on the finish. The wine will benefit from time in the cellar, through 2015.

properties.title: Tenuta Luisa 2013 Ribolla Gialla (Venezia Giulia)
properties.description: Enticing aromas of jasmine, honeysuckle and citrus blossom lead the nose on this polished wine. The sleek palate delivers juicy pear, crisp apple and nectarine zest. It's fresh and balanced, with bright acidity.

properties.title: Le Morette 2014 Mandolara  (Lugana)
properties.address: Viale Indipendenza, 19/d, 37019 Peschiera del Garda VR, Italy
properties.description: Aromas of tropical fruit, peach, white flower and cut grass lead the nose on this medium-bodied white. The round, juicy palate offers peach, tart green apple, banana and nectarine skin alongside tangy acidity.

properties.title: Lieubeau 2013 Domaine de la Fruitière Gneiss de Bel Abord Sur Lie  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
properties.description: This tight, taut and crisp wine needs some time to bring out its true fruity character. Behind the texture, ripe green plums and fresh apples are cut with lime juice. The wine is still young and could benefit from a few more months. Drink from late 2015.

properties.title: Lis Neris 2012 Jurosa Chardonnay (Friuli Isonzo)
properties.address: Via Gavinana, 5, 34070 San Lorenzo Isontino GO, Italy
properties.description: Aromas of butter, toast, oak and dried citrus lead the nose. The round, structured palate offers baked Golden Delicious apple, nectarine zest, vanilla and butterscotch. Enjoy soon before the fruit fades.

properties.title: Lis Neris 2012 La Vila Friulano (Friuli Isonzo)
properties.address: Via Gavinana, 5, 34070 San Lorenzo Isontino GO, Italy
properties.description: Pressed white flower, nut and dried apricot lead the nose. The firm, structured palate offers baked yellow peach, candied citrus zest, toasted almond and mineral alongside bright acidity.

properties.title: Mas Blanch I Jové 2013 Saó Blanc White (Costers del Segre)
properties.address: Paratge Llinar Pol. 9 Parc. 129, 25471 Pobla De Cervoles ( La ), Lérida, Spain
properties.description: Oaky aromas of almond, vanilla and peach settle on a palate with grip and acidity. Flavors of toasted almond, baked apple and briny apricot finish with forward acidity. This is a blend of Garnacha Blanca and Macabeo, but it's the white Garnacha that sticks out.

properties.title: Tramin 2014 Sauvignon (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Str. del Vino, 144, 39040 Termeno sulla Strada del Vino BZ, Italy
properties.description: Classic varietal scents of gooseberry, tomato leaf, cut grass and a touch of tropical fruit lead the nose. The tangy palate offer white peach, pink grapefruit and mineral alongside zesty acidity.

properties.title: Irony 2014 Small Lot Reserve Chardonnay (Monterey County)
properties.address: 9786 Ross Station Rd, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.description: Light in the glass, this solidly priced bottling shows light vanilla, caramel sea salt, squeezed lemon and white peach on the plump and approachable nose. The palate sizzles with the chalky energy of pink-grapefruit peels, with poached-apple flavors laced across pithy texture and a steely elegance.

properties.title: Joseph Cattin 2014 Hatschbourg Grand Cru Muscat (Alsace)
properties.address: 35 Rue Roger Frémeaux, 68420 Vœgtlinshoffen, France
properties.description: An utterly seductive perfume of Muscat grape, honeysuckle and peach rises from the glass. The palate does not quite follow up this promise and adds a hint of sweetness to create a perfumed, light-bodied wine. Drink soon.

properties.title: Kössler 2014 Sauvignon (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Unterrainer Straße, 17B, 39050 San Paolo BZ, Italy
properties.description: This is bright and crisp, with aromas of hay, passion fruit and citrus. The tangy palate shows classic varietal flavors, including grapefruit, kiwi, honeydew melon and mineral alongside lively acidity.

properties.title: Viña Mayor 2013 Barrel Fermented Verdejo (Rueda)
properties.description: Aromas of wood grain, minerals and apple set up a creamy, plump palate with leesy apple, pear and melon flavors. This barrel-fermented Verdejo is mild, creamy, leesy and steady on the finish, which holds form and doesn't break up.

properties.title: Andriano 2014 Finado Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)
properties.description: Classic varietal scents of yellow apple meld with hints of white flower and crushed rock. The apple note carries over to the refined palate together with pear and lively acidity while a mineral note revitalizes the finish.

properties.title: Schmitt Söhne 2014 Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: A cool, alpine streak runs through this easygoing but refreshing Riesling, revealed through greenish glimmers of pine frond and fresh herb. Off dry in style, it calibrates sweet-tart green plum and apple notes against streaks of lime and lemon. Drink now.

properties.title: Bastgen 2014 Blauschiefer Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: Touches of sweet berry and blossom lend flair to this vivaciously fresh, fruity Riesling full of fresh apple, pear and lemon flavors. Sweet-tart honey and lemon brighten the midpalate. The finish is brisk but clean. Drink now through 2017.

properties.title: Caldaro 2014 Carned Kerner (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Kellereistraße, 12, 39052 Kaltern, Autonome Provinz Bozen - Südtirol, Italy
properties.description: Heady aromas of mango and yellow peach follow through to the zesty, full-bodied palate along with a mineral note. Bracing acidity brightens the flavors and leaves a tangy finish.

properties.title: Cantina Valle Isarco 2014 Sauvignon (Alto Adige)
properties.description: This fragrant white opens with aromas suggesting tomato vine, cut grass and gooseberry. The slender, rather angular palate offers fresh herb, grapefruit, green melon, mineral and a note of yellow bell pepper. It has a crisp, racy finish.

properties.title: Castelfeder 2014 Vom Stein Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Franz-Harpf-Straße, 15, 39040 Kurtinig an der Weinstraße, Autonome Provinz Bozen - Südtirol, Italy
properties.description: Lightly scented, this linear white opens with aromas of orchard fruit and wildflower. The lithe, elegant palate delivers crisp green apple, pear and flinty mineral while racy acidity provides plenty of verve and freshness.

properties.title: Chacewater 2012 Nell Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Hills Lake County)
properties.address: 5625 Gaddy Ln, Kelseyville, CA 95451, USA
properties.description: Coming from perhaps the best part of Lake County to grow Cabernet, this smooth and well-balanced wine is full bodied but light on its feet. It smells like raspberries and vanilla, and tastes jammy and almost sweet.

properties.title: Coruce 2012 Chardonnay (Antelope Valley of the California High Desert)
properties.description: Ripe but measured aromas of buttery apples, plump vanilla cake and baking spice show promise for this new growing region high above the Los Angeles basin. The flavors are broad, with candied apples, vanilla-laced lemon rinds, white flowers and a touch of pineapple.

properties.title: Domaine Charles Baur 2014 Eichberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
properties.description: Lemon notes are tinged with earthiness, on the palate a light, lemony vein dominates, backed by some texture and apple fruit. The finish is clean.

properties.title: Dopff Au Moulin 2013 Schoenenbourg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 2 Av. Jacques Preiss, 68340 Riquewihr, France
properties.description: Notes of earth mix with notes of leafy apple on the nose, the dry, fresh palate continues in that earthy vein and finishes dry with a bruised apple flavor.

properties.title: Falkenstein 2013 Val Venosta Sauvignon (Alto Adige)
properties.description: Cut grass, tomato vine and gooseberry aromas almost jump out of the glass. The tangy, racy palate offers grapefruit, papaya, a light kiwi note and a hint of mineral alongside brisk acidity.

properties.title: Cousiño-Macul 2006 Lota Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Av. Quilín 7100, Penalolen, Peñalolén, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: Displays a lot of Macul-driven eucalyptus on the nose, but also leather, licorice and herb aromas. The color is dark, and the structure and tannins are both firm. Tastes of powerful cassis and blackberry and shows concentration. Finishes thick, smooth and a touch syrupy. Drink now through 2014.

properties.title: Dr. H. Thanisch (Erben Müller-Burggraef) 2009 Bernkasteler Badstube Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: This kabinett possesses lovely balance, marrying sweet pineapple aspects with zesty citrus notes. The fruit is lush to the point of slightly covering the underlying minerality, but remains clean and racy on the finish.

properties.title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2006 DUBL Greco Brut Metodo Classico Greco (Campania)
properties.description: This is a very special, one-of-a-kind sparkling wine. Made in the metodo classico with indigenous Greco grapes (from the southern Italian region of Campania) the wine rests on the lees for 24 months to achieve extra richness and opulence on the nose and mouth. Ripe aromas of peach, melon and almond rise to the forefront.

properties.title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2009 Serrocielo Falanghina (Sannio)
properties.address: Località Cerza Grossa, 83050 Sorbo Serpico AV, Italy
properties.description: This is a really fantastic wine and one of the best expression of Falanghina available today. (Perhaps the best.) What sets it apart is the purity of its fruit aromas. Citrus, white mineral and tonic fruit aromas hint at the crisp and smooth palate.  Would wash down well with fish, salad or spaghetti con vongole.

properties.title: Hartenberg 2007 The Eleanor Chardonnay (Stellenbosch)
properties.address: Bottelary Road Koelenhof, Stellenbosch, 7605, South Africa
properties.description: There's a definite oaky backdrop to this wine, adding spice and toast to the rich baked red apple, peach bit and brioche flavors. An orange blossom accent freshens up the rich flavors and the full but balanced mouth. The long finish is loaded with toasty hazelnut character.

properties.title: I Capitani 2009 Gaudium  (Fiano di Avellino)
properties.address: via Bosco Faiano, 15, 83030 Torre Le Nocelle AV, Italy
properties.description: Gaudium is a radically unique expression of Fiano that might not appeal to everyone but that definitely shows careful craftsmanship and execution. The nose is redolent of crushed clove and exotic spice (aromas you'd almost expect to find in a red wine) closely followed by fresh melon, pear and peach.

properties.title: Terre del Principe 2007 Ambruco Pallagrello (Terre del Volturno)
properties.description: Ambruco is a softly layered and rich wine that imparts opulent aromas of chocolate, sweet spice, dark fruit, plum, prune and licorice. There's a touch of bitterness in the mouth but otherwise the mouthfeel is thick and dense enough to smooth out any wrinkles.

properties.title: Dr. Pauly Bergweiler 2009 Bernkasteler alte Badstube am Doctorberg Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Gestade 15, 54470 Bernkastel-Kues, Germany
properties.description: Sweet and lush in the house style, but lighter on its feet than many of the other bottlings from Dr. Pauly-Bergweiler, this kabinett shows some intriguing fumé-like notes on the nose, then delivers ripe melon and pear fruit on the palate. Finishes long.

properties.title: Dr. Pauly Bergweiler 2009 Wehlener Sonnenuhr Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Gestade 15, 54470 Bernkastel-Kues, Germany
properties.description: In a flight of five 2009 kabinetts from the Sonnenuhr, this was the most alcoholic (at 9.5% abv), but the extra weight    didn't stand out beyond a bit of extra creaminess on the palate. Hints of lees and slate add complexity to the apple and citrus notes, then linger elegantly on the finish.

properties.title: Dr. Pauly Bergweiler 2009 Wehlener Sonnenuhr Spätlese Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: Lush, honeyed and tropically fruited, this epitomizes the Dr. Pauly-Bergweiler house style. It seems sweeter than many other 2009 spätleses, with its considerable sugar evident on the long finish. Drink it on its own, or alongside spicy Asian cuisine.

properties.title: Paul Cluver 2009 Chardonnay (Elgin)
properties.address: Paul Cluver Estate Wines, N2, Kromco Turn off, De Rust Estate, Grabouw, 7160, South Africa
properties.description: Medium-intense aromas of ripe pear and soft herbs transition into the mouth alongside developing flavors of apricot and clementine citrus. Medium weight with a good crispness and a clean but lingering finish. 5,400 cases imported.

properties.title: Ridgeback 2008 Viognier (Paarl)
properties.description: Here's a gorgeous Viognier that is showing very well. Soft toasted brioche topped with baked red apple, ginger and orange clove spice aromas transition into flavors of spiced peach and orange oil in the full mouth. Well balanced with a long, spicy finish.

properties.title: Sorrentino 2009 Fior di Ginestre Passito 500ml White (Pompeiano)
properties.description: Made with a blend of Falanghina and Coda di Volpe grapes, this amber-colored passito opens with aromas of white raisin, maple syrup, honey, toasted almond and sweet marzipan. It's a creamy, rich wine that would pair with aged cheese or sweet desserts alike.

properties.title: Stark-Condé 2007 Unfined and Unfiltered Cabernet Sauvignon (Stellenbosch)
properties.description: Cigar box and mulberry spice aromas lead the nose of this Cab, with fruity notes of black berry and cassis providing the backdrop. Full and lush in the mouth, the ripe black fruit carries through to the finish alongside accents of roasted coffee grounds. 550 cases imported.

properties.title: Studert-Prüm 2009 Wehlener Sonnenuhr Spätlese Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: Light in body, with a fine backbone of taut acidity, this is a throwback to a time when spätleses were slightly drier than today. Delicate scents of crushed stone and pressed flowers are underscored by hints of green apple and lime. This would make a fine apéritif on its own, or could perhaps partner subtle seafood dishes.

properties.title: Domaine Carneros 2007 Brut Sparkling (Carneros)
properties.description: This is a glamorous, fashionable wine that gives the pleasure you want in a bubbly. It's dryish and crisp, with doughy yeast, raspberry and lime flavors. A good price for a California sparkling wine of this quality.

properties.title: Falcone 2009 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
properties.description: Falcone wisely reins in the fruity richness and oak on this wine, allowing acidity and citrus flavors to star. That is a nod to Santa Barbara's cool-climate terroir, not winemaker interference. The wine is dry, crisp and minerally, with subtle lime, Meyer lemon and Asian pear flavors, with a hint of oak. A lovely restaurant wine at a fair price.

properties.title: Miguel Torres 2012 Santa Digna Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
properties.description: Solid but flat aromas of olive and leafy berry fruits introduce a midland palate of moderate bounce and average body. Raspberry, plum, currant and herbal flavors finish fresh, but also woody and slightly bitter in taste.

properties.title: Montevina 2013 Omira Hills Chardonnay (California)
properties.address: 20680 Shenandoah School Rd, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.description: Pleasant floral aromas and sunny fruit-bowl flavors meet light buttery, earthy touches in this rather light-bodied wine. This shows nice complexity on the palate, with pear, peach and apple flavors.

properties.title: Nardello 2012 Monte Zoppega  (Soave Classico)
properties.description: Aromas of toasted oak, candied citrus, pressed white flower and vanilla lead the nose and follow through to the palate, along with nectarine zest and baked apricot. Enjoy soon to capture the remaining freshness and fruit.

properties.title: Domaine Gavoty 2014 Cuvée Tradition Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.description: A fragrant and fruity wine, this is full of red-raspberry and orange-zest flavors. It is full, with a light touch that comes from the acidity and tangy aftertaste.

properties.title: Domaine Jean-Luc Mader 2014 Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.description: Nose and palate are full of juicy, rose-scented plums. A good dose of sweetness boosts those flavors even more, but fails to create overall balance. This is rather rich and full bodied.

properties.title: Dutton Estate 2014 Dutton Ranch Kylie's Cuvee Sauvignon Blanc (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: Fermented in stainless steel and then aged in neutral oak, this estate-driven white is crisp and complex, with what comes off as an intensity of dark oak. Gooseberry and lychee provide an intrigue on the nose, before a concentrated finish reveals high acidity.

properties.title: First Colony 2013 Estate Reserve Chardonnay (Monticello)
properties.address: 1650 Harris Creek Rd, Charlottesville, VA 22902, USA
properties.description: With use of 30% new French oak and the remainder in neutral barrels, this wine offers aromas of brioche, lemon custard and white flowers on the nose. The ample, rounded body is carried by a citrus vein that leads to a buttered-popcorn finish. There's just enough acidity to keep things lively and balanced.

properties.title: Billsboro 2013 Sawmill Creek Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 4760 W Lake Rd, Geneva, NY 14456, USA
properties.description: While a touch candied and confected in style, this Cabernet Sauvignon is chock full of ripe, rich black cherry and berry flavors. Plush and juicy, it's best enjoyed in its youth.

properties.title: Haak 2013 Dry Blanc du Bois (Texas)
properties.description: This bottling of an American hybrid grape demonstrates a floral side of the variety, with potpourri aromas riding over lychee and grapefruit. Green apple-skin flavors mark the light-bodied palate while sprtizy acidity keeps everything energized.

properties.title: Hess Collection 2014 Shirtail Creek Vineyard Chardonnay (Monterey)
properties.address: 4411 Redwood Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: This stainless-steel bottling shows overwhelming white-flower elements on the nose, from tuberose to honeysuckle to jasmine, cut by a bit of baking soda. The palate is so floral and aromatic that it almost tastes like a different grape, with sharp apples, more tuberose and a steely frame.

properties.title: Knapp 2014 Semi Dry Gewürztraminer (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 2770 Ernsberger Rd, Romulus, NY 14541, USA
properties.description: Decadently ripe peach and blossom notes are accented by a curious touch of vanilla sugar in this sunny, off-dry Gewürztraminer. It's a hint reedy on the palate, but refreshingly brisk and easy drinking.

properties.title: Old Soul 2013 Chardonnay (Lodi)
properties.description: Interesting nuances of honey, peach and spiced pear light up this medium-bodied, extremely fruity and flavorful wine. It's opulent and soft enough to pair well with spicy food or to serve with salty cheeses.

properties.title: St. Julian 2013 Reserve Traminette (Lake Michigan Shore)
properties.address: 518 W 14 Mile Rd #4205, Troy, MI 48083, USA
properties.description: A heady, floral aroma of rose petal meets faint tones of grapefruit rind and unripe tropical fruit on the nose. Round in weight, the palate is riper in character, with an additional note of honey on the close.

properties.title: Lamoreaux Landing 2011 Estate Bottled Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 9224 NY-414, Lodi, NY 14860, USA
properties.description: Touches of vanilla, spice and smoked nuts lend complexity to straightforward apple, lemon and pear flavors in this dry, medium-bodied Chardonnay. It's refreshing and easy drinking with a brisk, clean finish.

properties.title: Wölffer 2014 Trebbiano (The Hamptons, Long Island)
properties.description: Spine tingling acidity and sharp lemon and lime flavors mark this zesty dry Trebbiano. Crisp green apple and nectarine notes fill out the midpalate a bit. The finish is brisk and clean.

properties.title: Salomon Estate 2013 Finniss River Braeside Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Fleurieu Peninsula)
properties.description: This Southern Hemisphere adventure from an Austrian winemaking family can turn out some interesting wines. In this case, it's a medium-bodied wine that's firm yet silky in feel, marrying cassis and tobacco leaf with subtle, balanced oak.

properties.title: Sidewood 2015 Chardonnay (Adelaide Hills)
properties.address: 6 River Rd, Hahndorf SA 5245, Australia
properties.description: this is a lovely effort and a great value from Sidewood in the Adelaide Hills. Grilled peaches provide the flesh, while a bright, citrusy note adds focus and length to this ripe, rich Chardonnay. Drink now–2020.

properties.title: Terlato 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
properties.address: 900 Armour Dr, Lake Bluff, IL 60044, USA
properties.description: This is a tart, fresh and full-bodied wine that shows off the Rutherford appellation in its lush dustiness and firm, integrated tannin. Coconut shavings and crisp red fruit complement classic characteristics of cedar and dried herb.

properties.title: The Four Graces 2015 Pinot Blanc (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 9605 NE Fox Farm Rd, Dundee, OR 97115, USA
properties.description: Refined flavors of lime, grapefruit, pineapple, citrus skin and stone combine in a clean crisp delightful wine. The naturally bright and refreshing acidity puts a pleasant pucker into the finish, and will have you reaching quickly for that next glass.

properties.title: Joseph Cattin 2015 Hatschbourg Grand Cru Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 35 Rue Roger Frémeaux, 68420 Vœgtlinshoffen, France
properties.description: A very soft scent of pear rises from the glass. The mellowness of this pear fruit is expressed fully on the concentrated palate. Bosc pear shimmers and is boosted by slight residual sweetness. The finish is off dry, balanced and generous.

properties.title: Maxville 2015 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.description: This is a high-toned white driven by citrus and pear flavors, with a punch of oaky power and full-bodied richness on the finish.

properties.title: André Kientzler 2014 Geisberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 30 Rue des Romains, 68630 Bennwihr, France
properties.description: A slight apple scent perfumes the nose. The palate expresses more tart apple fruit and shows a central line of taut lemony freshness. The flavors are very clean and might need a little cellar age to come into their own. The finish is clean and dry. Drink now through 2020.

properties.title: André Kientzler 2015 Osterberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
properties.description: An earthy hint on the nose cloaks ripe and charming red-apple fruit. The palate comes across as more diffuse but has ample freshness. The body is powerful but dry, characterized by the texture of apple peel. The lemon freshness on the dry finish is lasting.

properties.title: Claiborne & Churchill 2015 Dry Gewürztraminer (Central Coast)
properties.address: 74 Claiborne Wy, Starkville, MS 39759, USA
properties.description: This pioneering Alsatian-inspired winery always amazes with this distinctive and approachable bottling. Bright botanical aromas of mandarin orange rind, honeysuckle and pear give way to a zesty palate full of preserved citrus and marmalade flavors, all set against a firm structure and racy acidity. The finish—which is bone dry—opens with nectarine notes, then sails off with a flash of herbs.

properties.title: D'Arenberg 2013 The Coppermine Road Cabernet Sauvignon (McLaren Vale)
properties.description: D'Arenberg's Coppermine Cabernets are often tannic and austere upon release, so be warned should you decide to open one in the next year or two. The aromas and flavors are classic this year, seamlessly marrying cassis and cedar, but finishing dry, astringent and firm. Drink 2020–2030+.

properties.title: Flowers 2014 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
properties.description: This is a delightfully fresh yet creamy wine that delivers a spectrum of styles and flavors. Anise and tart apple notes accent the floral-driven experience, unfettered by oak, which plays but a supporting role.

properties.title: Don Manuel Villafañe 2014 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.description: Spicy woody aromas include a note of mushroom. This feels hard and ultratannic, with acidity suggestive of red-wine vinegar. A wiry mix of salt and sour flavors is attached to savory plum fruit, while this pinches down on a drying abrasive finish.

properties.title: Montonale 2016 Rosa di Notte Chiaretto Rosato (Garda)
properties.description: Alluring aromas of spring wild flower and woodland berry set the tone on this tangy, refreshing rosato. It's succulent and savory, boasting wild cherry, crushed raspberry, white pepper and a salty note before a bright finish.

properties.title: Panther Creek 2015 Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 14455 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE Suite B, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: This is a tasty and fruity wine. It's front loaded with a juicy mix of apple and fresh sliced pear. Fermented entirely in stainless steel, it fills the mouth with flavor and a pleasing, textural grip.

properties.title: Selva Capuzza 2013 Menasasso Riserva  (Lugana)
properties.address: Località Selva Capuzza, 25015 Desenzano del Garda BS, Italy
properties.description: This wine opens with toasted nut, dried herb and citrus zest aromas. On the linear, lean palate, thyme and mineral notes back up yellow apple flavors, with lively acidity. It closes on a bitter almond note.

properties.title: Shaw 2014 Road Block Reserve Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 3901 NY-14, Dundee, NY 14837, USA
properties.description: This light-footed Riesling is restrained in fruit, offering subtle hints of lemon and pear, but its slightly chalky, dusty mineral tone is exhilarating. Its delicately semisweet, with a fresh tangerine finish.

properties.title: Silver Thread 2016 STV Estate Vineyard Dry Pinot Noir Rosé (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 1401 Caywood Rd, Lodi, NY 14860, USA
properties.description: Dainty strokes of crisp-tart raspberry and watermelon rind accent this finely textured rosé. It's a brisk delicately concentrated wine with a brambly lingering finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Tasca d'Almerita 2016 Cavallo delle Fate Grillo (Sicilia)
properties.description: Yellow stone fruit, pear and tropical fruit aromas lead the nose. On the zesty palate, bright acidity underscores yellow peach and honeydew melon flavors that linger into the crisp finish.

properties.title: Tenuta Luisa 2015 Friulano (Isonzo del Friuli)
properties.address: Via Campo Sportivo, 13, 34070 Mariano del Friuli GO, Italy
properties.description: Aacacia flower, dried herb, nut and honey aromas carry over to the rounded palate, along with yellow apple skin and toasted almond notes. Tangy acidity brightens the finish.

properties.title: Tenuta Rapitalà 2016 Grillo (Sicilia)
properties.address: Contrada Rapitalà, 90043, 90043 Camporeale PA, Italy
properties.description: White flower, orchard fruit and banana aromas lead the nose while the vibrant palate doles out white peach, Bartlett pear, citrus and saline flavors. Tangy acidity provides loads of freshness.

properties.title: Tussock Jumper 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (New Zealand)
properties.address: 11079 Resort Road, Ellicott City, MD 21042, USA
properties.description: this medium-bodied Sauvignon Blanc shows only a bit of grassiness. Rather than green, it offers predominantly pineapple, grapefruit and even a touch of stone fruit, finishing with a citrusy flourish.

properties.title: Vigne Guadagno 2015  Greco di Tufo
properties.address: Via Amerigo Vespucci, 83030 Taurasi AV, Italy
properties.description: Ripe Bosc pear, yellow apple, herb and citrus zest aromas follow through to the medium-bodied palate, along with tangy acidity. A hint of white almond backs up the crisp finish.

properties.title: Vignobles Raymond 2016 Elodie Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: 1584 St Helena Hwy: MAIN ENTRANCE 849 Zinfandel Ln: TRUCK ENTRANCE, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Fruity, crisp with red-currant and citrus flavors, this is a bright, vivacious wine. There is a tight mineral edge that contrasts with the fruitiness and turns this into a food friendly wine. Drink now.

properties.title: Julia's Dazzle 2016 Benches Vineyard Rosé (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 14450 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: This pale peach-colored wine brings vibrant aromas of strawberry and cherry. It's lightly spritzy, drinking almost completely dry with weighty feeling fruit flavors.

properties.title: La Rajade 2015 Ribolla Gialla (Collio)
properties.description: Wildflower and ripe apple aromas lead the nose while the palate offers mature pear fruit and fennel touches. A pleasant bitter almond note signals the close.

properties.title: Les Maîtres Vignerons de la Presqu'île de Saint-Tropez 2016 Mas de Pampelonne Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.winery: Les Maîtres Vignerons de la Presqu'île de Saint-Tropez
properties.description: From a vineyard just behind the beach at Pampelonne, this wine has 20% Tibouren, a rare grape in Provence rosé. That adds to the spiciness as well as the crisp acidity. It is a light and lively wine, fresh and full of lime as well as red berries. Drink now.

properties.title: Les Vins Bréban 2016 Domaine des Monticoles Rosé (Coteaux Varois en Provence)
properties.address: Av. de la Burlière, 83170 Brignoles, France
properties.description: Pale, just pink in color, the wine is refreshingly light and crisp. With its attractive red-currant flavors, the wine is lively, bright and bone dry. Drink now.

properties.title: Zenato 2014 Riserva Sergio Zenato  (Lugana)
properties.description: Citrus zest, pineapple and oak aromas carry over to the lean, linear palate, joining hints of toasted nut and vanilla. Brisk acidity provides the racy framework.

properties.title: One Woman 2015 Gewürztraminer (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.description: Big honeysuckle, sweet caramel and stone-fruit aromas are backed on the palate with concentrated tangerine and melon flavors. It's a bold fruity wine with luscious body and yielding acidity but tea tannins and grapefruit flavors lend structure.

properties.title: Adirondack Winery 2015 Island Sunset Cabernet Franc Rosé (New York)
properties.description: Whiffs of tea leaves and tobacco lend earthiness to this slightly savory but exotic appealing rosé. There's plenty of red-cherry and raspberry flavor, but it's slightly muted, embraced in shrouds of Cabernet Franc's brambly leafy character. It's a unique, full-bodied rosé to try over dinner with poultry or other white meats.

properties.title: Gruber Röschitz 2013 Der Königsberg Riesling (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Winzerstraße 46, 3743 Röschitz, Austria
properties.description: Overtones of candied lemon peel steal into the more general fresh zestiness here, hinting at aromatic richness and purity. The palpable, zesty midpalate highlights the citrus qualities even more. Verve and freshness in a glass.

properties.title: Andrew Januik 2012 Stone Cairn Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 14710 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: The second vintage from this winery brings roasty-toasty barrel notes along with coffee, butterscotch, cherry, pencil lead and an herbal grace note. The chocolate and cherry flavors are silky in feel backed by a gentle squeeze of tannins, with coffee flavors lingering on the finish.

properties.title: Arndorfer 2013 Strasser Weinberge Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.description: Green pear, miso and soy sauce mingle spicily on the nose. The palate is a combination of rich, rounded yeastiness and fresh, zesty lemon. Sage and white pepper provide further layers. This is full of interest and freshness.

properties.title: Mark Ryan 2012 Dead Horse Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 14475 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: This wine still seems to be in its shell with brooding notes of bittersweet chocolate, blackberry, raspberry and woodspice. It's a full-bodied mouthful of a wine. Layered black and red fruit flavors show good depth and density along with a firm structure of supporting tannins. Just a baby now, it should last well in the cellar until 2025 or more.

properties.title: Pamplin 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 31235 NE Bell Rd, Sherwood, OR 97140, USA
properties.description: Almost entirely varietal (3% Petit Verdot) with the fruit mostly split between Elephant Mountain and Alder Ridge vineyards, this wine is a bit aromatically locked up at present with notes of cherry, green herbs and blue fruit. It's medium bodied in feel, with the oak dialed back (33% new French), tart acids and a gentle squeeze of tannins with bitters on the finish. It should only improve with additional time in the bottle and has a lot life ahead of it.

properties.title: Alain Brumont 2008 Château Bouscassé Vendemiaire  (Pacherenc du Vic Bilh)
properties.description: Harvested in October, this gold-colored wine has a wonderful line of acidity that gives freshness. At the same time, there is richness, honey, ripe apricots and a hint of noble rot. Drink either as an apéritif or with fruit at the end of a meal.

properties.title: Buena Vista 2012 Eleanora's Selection Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: Golden colored, this is a clean, hedonistic wine, with a nose of rich coconut flake followed by caramel and baked apple. Enjoy with winter fare or as a gloomy day turns to night.

properties.title: Chateau de l'Oiselinière 2007 Les Grands Gâts Sur Lie  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
properties.description: As it ages, Muscadet becomes more like Chardonnay. Here, the wine has developed ripe tropical fruit notes and a smooth, creamy texture. The seven years of age has softened the fruit and acidity, leaving a rich wine that is deliciously ready to drink now.

properties.title: Veramonte 2012 Ritual Sauvignon Blanc (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.description: With yeasty aromas of Animal Crackers, vanilla and pear, this is more warm, soft and sweet than in the past. The year's warm characteristics are draped all over the palate, which is soft and wide. Flavors of creamy white fruits and vanilla finish with lychee and grapefruit. This lacks some spine and vivacity but will be good through the end of the year.

properties.title: Volker Eisele Family Estate 2011 Gemini White (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 3080 Lower Chiles Valley Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: This is the winery's Graves-style Sémillon-Sauvignon Blanc blend. It's smoothly textured and a little soft, with citrus, herb and spice flavors that finish with a touch of toasty oak.

properties.title: Anton Bauer 2012 Spiegel Grüner Veltliner (Wagram-Donauland)
properties.description: A light, refreshingly textured wine, very fruity and bright. Citrus and green plums cut through the tangy texture giving a clean, crisp character. The wine is immediately drinkable. Screwcap.

properties.title: Apex 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 357 Port Ave, Prosser, WA 99350, USA
properties.description: 100% Cabernet Sauvignon from a variety of vineyards across eastern Washington, it seems a bit muddled with light notes of cherry, chocolate, and oak spice but may improve with some additional time in bottle.

properties.title: Jack Nicklaus Wines 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Rich and opulent, in the popular style, this Cabernet offers soft, oak-driven flavors of blackberries, black cherries and cherry liqueur. It's a gentle, delicious and fancy wine, if a little one-dimensional. Drink now.

properties.title: Joseph Carr 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa County)
properties.address: 9301 N US 75-Central Expy 1000 Tower I, Suite 500, Dallas, TX 75231, USA
properties.description: There's lots of rich, ripe blackberry and cherry jam, dark chocolate and cassis liqueur flavor in this dry, stylish Cabernet. While it's a little on the direct side, and is not an ager, it's a fine value, showing real Napa sophistication.

properties.title: Château de Fontenille 2012  Entre-Deux-Mers
properties.description: Rich and fruity, this wine shows warm white fruit and a touch of spice. The wine is soft, its currant and pink grapefruit flavors lifted by acidity but with a rounded finish.

properties.title: Gordon Estate 2012 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 671 Levey Rd, Pasco, WA 99301, USA
properties.description: This is a solid, all-purpose Chardonnay, a bit less oaky and oily than some previous efforts from Gordon, but showing firm, clean, ripe apple and pear fruit. The wine is balanced and smooth, delivering plenty of no-frills fruit flavor for the price.

properties.title: O•S Winery 2010 The Tusk Elephant Mountain Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Yakima Valley)
properties.description: The bright cherry fruit is a bit high-toned, and the mouthfeel has a slight soapiness. Fruit flavors are full and broad, the blackberries augmented with a streak of graphite.

properties.title: Summerwood 2012 Grenache Blanc (Paso Robles)
properties.description: A nice interpretation of Grenache Blanc. Blended with a drop of Viognier, it shows notes of orange and peach jam, honey, vanilla and toasty oak. The alcohol level is high. Drink up.

properties.title: Pride Mountain 2009 Vintner Select Cuvée Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 3000 Summit Trail, Santa Rosa, CA 95404, USA
properties.description: This 100% Cabernet sure is oaky, but the butterscotch, toast and caramel flavors blend in seamlessly with the fruit, which is of gargantuan proportions. It's intense in mountain-concentrated blackberries, black currants and crème de cassis, with a complex note of green olives and mint. Just at the beginning of a long life, it will develop in the bottle for at least 10 more years.

properties.title: René Muré 2011 Clos Saint Landelain Vorbourg Grand Cru Vendanges Tardrives Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.description: Gold in color, this sweet, spicy wine is full of ripe, opulent fruits and textures. Very honeyed, it exudes richness from the apricot and spiced orange fruits. It is delicious now, but will be so much better, so drink until 2022.

properties.title: Château Fuissé 2011 Les Brûlés  (Pouilly-Fuissé)
properties.description: Complex wine that has both great fruitiness and great structure. It's very ripe, dense and textured, a wine with weight and a feeling of warmth. Brûlés means burnt because the vineyard has great exposure to the sun and that gives a powerful and concentrated wine. Age for 5–6 years.

properties.title: Mumm Napa 2005 DVX Sparkling (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 8445 Silverado Trail, Rutherford, CA 94573, USA
properties.description: This is the winery's top brut, and what a gorgeous wine it is. Blended equally with Pinot Noir and Chardonnay, it shows lime, tangerine and strawberry flavors that are subtle and rich. The mousse is very fine, giving it a silky texture. Beautiful to drink now.

properties.title: Piña 2010 Ames Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
properties.description: A complex, ageworthy wine that combines contradictions but somehow is complete and wholesome. The cool vintage shows up in the form of green olives and sweet green peas, a taste that's unusual for Oakville but one that works well alongside the more traditional black currants and sweet oak. The tannins are pure Oakville, rich, ripe and dramatically layered. Beautiful in every respect, this 100% Cab will reward cellaring. Begin popping the cork in 2018.

properties.title: Esterházy 2009 Trockenbeerenaulese White (Burgenland)
properties.address: Trausdorf 1, 7061 Trausdorf an der Wulka, Austria
properties.description: A very sweet wine that still manages to keep a dry element to it. It has as power, richness and great concentration, a smooth texture and final acidity. All in all, a wine that demands attention and aging.

properties.title: Gérard Bertrand 2011 Tautavel Hommage aux Vignerons Red (Côtes du Roussillon Villages Tautavel)
properties.description: This is a dense, concentrated and expressive wine, although it's still young and promises more beauty and elegance with age. Aromas of African violets and cocoa nibs marry harmoniously with the fleshy black-fruit core. Jammy, ripe plum and cherry flavors lead the lush and slightly creamy palate, transitioning into notes of roasted coffee and chocolate, and finally ending on a sweet toasted-oak and baking-spice accent. It's richly delicious now, but patience will also be rewarded; try after 2016.

properties.title: Hillinger 2012 Eiswein Traminer (Burgenland)
properties.description: The wonderfully intense acidity of this Eiswein is balanced by rich honey and fruit flavors. It has a fine line of purity and freshness, with a long, satisfying finish. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Jean-Marc Bernhard 2008 Maimbourg Grand Cru Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 21 Grand Rue, 68230 Katzenthal, France
properties.description: Now fully evolved, this is a rich, sweet wine, very ripe and spicy. Balancing the soft texture, the wine has honeyed acidity that shows some freshness. It's a superb wine that is now ready to drink.

properties.title: Peter Nicolay 2014 Dry Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Gestade 15, 54470 Bernkastel-Kues, Germany
properties.description: Waxy lime and lemon peels perfume this fresh, floral Riesling. It's invigoratingly crisp, boasting tart green-melon and tangerine flavors and racy hits of lime and lemon acidity. An elegant wine for a very approachable price.

properties.title: Quinta da Lagoalva de Cima 2014 Lagoalva Barrel Selection Branco Sauvignon Blanc (Tejo)
properties.address: Quinta Lagoalva De Cima, 2090-222 Alpiarça, Portugal
properties.description: Sauvignon Blanc and wood don't always go together. Here they do, because the fruit is still dominant, just supported by the hints of toast that have smoothed out the tense acidity and herbal character. Yellow fruits and pears are lifted with citrus flavors. The wine will be ready to drink starting from mid-2016.

properties.title: Raccaro 2014 Malvasia (Collio)
properties.address: Via S. Giovanni, 87, 34071 Cormons GO, Italy
properties.description: Lovely aromas of Spanish Broom, white cherry, peach and light spice emerge on this radiant, elegant wine. The crisp palate offers Kaiser pear, apple, nectarine zest, white pepper and a hint of ginger. Vibrant acidity carries the flavors while a pronounced mineral note energizes the finish.

properties.title: Reichsgraf von Kesselstatt 2014 Wiltinger Trocken Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: A vein of chalky minerality extends through this dry, briskly structured wine, lending intensity and edge to softer, honeyed tones of peaches and apricots. It's vital and fresh yet persistent on the finish. Drink now through 2019.

properties.title: Hubert Meyer 2014 Winzenberg Grand Cru Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.description: Beeswax and ripe pear appear with a subtle lift on the nose. There are evolved notes of earth and polished wood that dance above the ever-present softly sweet pear fruit. This is a slender wine rounded out with fruit that echoes softly. The finish is dry.

properties.title: Jean-Baptiste Adam 2014 Kaefferkopf Grand Cru Vieilles Vignes Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 5 Rue de l'Aigle, 68770 Ammerschwihr, France
properties.description: A very subdued nose leads to a rather earthy, dry palate where all the fruit hides behind some slightly rounded lemon freshness. There is gradually more apple fruit with some air and an earthy finish with a long, fresh, lemony tang.

properties.title: Kuentz-Bas 2014 Eichberg Grand Cru Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 14 Route des Vins, 68420 Husseren-les-Châteaux, France
properties.description: The merest touch of dark honey appears on the nose. The palate is bright with lemon-accented but ripe pear notes. There is texture and a balanced richness. There is an inherent juiciness that makes you want more. The finish is dry and beautifully clean.

properties.title: Robert Klingenfus 2012 Bruderthal Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
properties.description: Gentle notes of lanolin play amongst the ripe apple fruit, promising an evolving wine. The palate is taut and dry and shows great purity. This is straightlaced, willowy and slender and at that transition point from youthful freshness to evolving maturity. Lovely now, will drink well 2016–2020.

properties.title: Tenuta La Ponca 2014 Friulano (Collio)
properties.description: Aromas of nut, apple skin, pear and chopped sage lead the nose while the fresh, inviting palate shows citrus zest, yellow apple and crystallized ginger. A blast of tangerine and a mineral note back up the finish.

properties.title: Torre Rosazza 2014 Pinot Bianco (Friuli Colli Orientali)
properties.address: Località Poggiobello, 12, 33044 Manzano UD, Italy
properties.description: Aromas of fragrant spring blossom, orchard fruit, hazelnut and bread crust lead the nose on this refined white. The elegantly structured palate offers creamy yellow apple, lemon drop and mineral alongside crisp acidity that leaves a tangy finish.

properties.title: Villa San Juliette 2014 Sauvignon Blanc (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 6385 Cross Canyons Rd, San Miguel, CA 93451, USA
properties.description: A crisp, tight, stony nose of wet cement, chilled lime peels and chopped lemongrass emerges from this offering from winemaker Matt Ortman and celeb-proprietors Ken Warwick and Nigel Lythgoe. The palate packs lots of bright verve , with the warmth of sliced green pears and green papaya, the sizzle of Key-lime juice and the racy spice of white pepper.

properties.title: Von Schleinitz 2012 VS Brut Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: Orange blossoms and freshly cut apples and pears perfume this lavishly fruity, floral Riesling sparkling. It's sprightly and sheer on the palate with a fine, persistent effervescence.

properties.title: Wolfberger 2012 Rangen Grand Cru Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.description: Earth and undergrowth flavors are woven through the rich pear tones which begin to shine with great, slightly sweet ripeness when exposed to a little air. The phenolic texture provides a counterpoint, supported by lemony freshness. Lovely balance.

properties.title: Zuani 2014 Vigne White (Collio)
properties.description: Compelling scents of white spring flower, stone fruit and a whiff of nut weave throughout this blend of Friulano, Chardonnay, Sauvignon and Pinot Grigio. The vibrant palate delivers yellow apple, orange zest, almond and mineral alongside tangy acidity.

properties.title: Yalumba 2014 The Y Series Viognier (South Australia)
