properties.address: 40 Eden Valley Rd, Angaston SA 5353, Australia
properties.description: A terrific deal, this is as varietally correct and rich a Viognier as you'll find for the price. Honeysuckle and apricot notes are carried by a slightly oily texture, yet the wine finishes long and elegantly. Vegan. Drink now.

properties.title: Margerum 2014 Sybarite Sauvignon Blanc (Happy Canyon of Santa Barbara)
properties.address: 19 E Mason St, Santa Barbara, CA 93101, USA
properties.description: Plush and bright passionfruit aromas waft from this bottling drawn from five different vineyards, yet they are linked to sharper grass, lime rind and yellow grapefruit-pith tartness. Extreme energy shows on the sizzling palate, where Key lime, lemongrass and lemon peels conspire for a light-but-sharp experience.

properties.title: Martin Ray 2013 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: A 100% varietal wine, this offers tremendous quality for the price, a well-crafted showcase for currant, cedar and bark that remains savory at its core. Grippy in tannin and contained oak, it's drinkable now but will benefit from time in the cellar, through 2021.

properties.title: Two Vintners 2013 Sal May's Discovery Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 18570 142nd Ave NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: This is a Cabernet prototype from an up-and-coming vineyard. The brooding aromas of anise, cassis and barrel spice seem quite locked up at present. The black cherry and fine grained, highly structured tannins show an exquisite sense of balance that persists through the finish.

properties.title: Varozza 2010 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
properties.description: Made in a tiny amount by consulting winemaker Kristy Melton, this 100% varietal wine is from some of the oldest Cab vines in the Napa Valley, still dry-farmed. Concentrated in cedar, blackberry and currant, it's soft and smooth, with shocks of dark chocolate and malt, its finish robust and grippy. Drink now through 2020.

properties.title: Terra Valentine 2013 Wurtele Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Spring Mountain District)
properties.description: A 100% varietal wine, this is a tense study in black cherry, blueberry, and dry chalky tannins, which need further time to resolve. Still puckering on the finish, it offers streaks of cedar, pencil lead and coconut that are still integrating. Drink now through 2023.

properties.title: Inconceivable 2013 After the Floods Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: High toned aromas of spice, herbs and sweet plum are followed by black currant and blackberry flavors. It brings undeniable appeal.

properties.title: K Vintners 2012 Stoneridge Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 820 Mill Creek Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: Exploring the herbal side of the variety, this wine offers aromas of green herbs, pencil box, vanilla, barrel spice and cherry. The cherry and black fruit flavors are generous and appealing, lingering on the finish.

properties.title: Claude Lafond 2014 Clos Fussay Tête de Cuvée Sauvignon Blanc (Reuilly)
properties.description: The late Claude Lafond was the driving force behind the renaissance of Reuilly. His wines, such as this with its balance between crisp herbal flavors and ripe, almost tropical fruit, bring out the richness of the appellation. This wine, with its final minerality, is ready to drink.

properties.title: Claude Riffault 2014 Les Chailloux  (Sancerre)
properties.address: 26 rue des Champs des Prés, Maison Sallé Maison Sallé, 18300 Sury-en-Vaux, France
properties.description: Named after the stones in the vineyard, this tense, dense wine is still young. With steely acidity and a strongly mineral, chalky texture, it needs to age. Stone fruits, acidity and a strongly herbal character are just beginning to integrate. Drink from the end of 2017.

properties.title: Domaine Fouassier 2014 Les Romains  (Sancerre)
properties.address: 180 Av. de Verdun, 18300 Sancerre, France
properties.description: Grown on southwest-facing slopes, this is a ripe, full wine with a natural warmth as well as a mineral texture. It is still tight and needs to age with its gooseberry and herbal edge as well as more flinty, smoky background. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Eric Kent 2013 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 1160 B Hopper Ave, Santa Rosa, CA 95403, USA
properties.description: From three vineyards, including Roberts Road, this wine impresses in floral honeycomb and a freshness that belies its medium-bodied weight and pithy texture, finishing in vanilla that never gets sweet.

properties.title: Vins d'Orrance 2013 Kāma Chenin Blanc (Western Cape)
properties.address: 5621 La Jolla Blvd, La Jolla, CA 92037, USA
properties.description: Rich, slightly oxidized notes of red apple and yellow melon are laced with accents of bitter orange peel and herbal tones. Medium weight, with a softness to the midpalate, it's enlivened by ample acidic lift. Flavors of toasted apple and pear fade into notes of sweet spice and beeswax on the finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Flora Springs 2013 Rutherford Hillside Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
properties.address: 677 St Helena Hwy, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Soft and supple yet powerful on the palate, this is generously seasoned with smoky oak and meat aromas. Tobacco and clove flavors keep it savory and are complemented by black currant fruit.

properties.title: Charles & Charles 2015 Art Den Hoed Vineyard Riesling (Washington)
properties.address: 1 W Flatiron Crossing Dr, Broomfield, CO 80021, USA
properties.description: This wine charms with aromas of freshly sliced green apple, white peach, wet stone and flowers. It drinks off dry, with zippy acidity providing plenty of tension to keep the interest high.

properties.title: Château Bélingard 2014 Réserve White (Bergerac Sec)
properties.description: This wood-aged blend of Sauvignon Blanc and Sémillon has ripe fruits and plenty of the crisp acidity typical of the vintage. Its wood touches are subtle, just enough to give a creamy texture. The wine has a rich texture and will certainly age for another few months. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Crux 2015 GSM Rosé (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: Lively strawberry and orange flavors adorn a richer biscuity midpalate in this Rhône-inspired blend. Limited in production, it doesn't hold back on depth, breadth and freshness.

properties.title: Darioush 2014 Signature Series Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Floral and honeyed on the nose, this voluptuously full-bodied and intensely caramelized wine is salty and bold in tropical flavor. A lilt of salty lime accents its honeysuckle and pear notes.

properties.title: Spier 2016 Vintage Selection Sauvignon Blanc (Coastal Region)
properties.address: R310 Baden Powell Dr, Stellenbosch, 7603, South Africa
properties.description: Lovely scents of fynbos and sweet grass mingle with fruity tones of melon rind, gooseberry and underripe mango on the nose and mouth. The fresh and inviting palate offers more of the same, with lingering hints of citrus zest, lime leaf and white currant on the medium-length finish. It's zippy, but layered and flavorful, with excellent overall balance and harmony.

properties.title: Steele 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Hills Lake County)
properties.description: Full-bodied but easy to drink, this well-modulated wine from a section of Lake County known for excellent reds combines nicely ripe flavors with a smoothly tannic texture. It has ripe plum and raisin notes, a lightly spicy, smoky oak accent and a lingering finish.

properties.title: The Farm Winery 2013 LPF Cabernet Sauvignon (Adelaida District)
properties.description: This bottling, which is enhanced by 2% Petit Verdot, shows deep black plum, dark chocolate and bright strawberry touches with a slight hint of barnyard on the nose. The latter element carries into the palate as well, adding nuance to the black cherry, fennel and milk chocolate flavors, all wrapped in firm tannins.

properties.title: Thomas George 2014 Baker Ridge Vineyard Estate Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 8075 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: This lightly oaked vineyard-designate wine effortlessly combines tart green apple and preserved lemon flavors, textured with stony minerality. Balanced and food-friendly, it offers power and concentration even as it finishes.

properties.title: Fenestra 2012 Riesling (Arroyo Seco)
properties.address: 83 Vallecitos Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.description: Imparting a hint of petrol and wax on the nose, this Riesling is thickly textured with flavors of ripe apple, peach and pear. With nice acidity, it finishes dry.

properties.title: Frank Family 2012 Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.description: This Chardonnay needs a few more months to come around. It's tart with acidity, along with oak and tropical fruit flavors that have plenty of potential, but haven't meshed together yet.

properties.title: Gorka Izagirre 2012 White (Bizkaiko Txakolina)
properties.description: Almond skins, apple essence and minerality drive the nose on this white from the Basque country. A zesty, slightly spritzy palate deals nectarine, apricot and green-apple flavors. The finish is clear and minerally, with crisp acidity.

properties.title: Alta Vista 2012 Premium Torrontés (Salta)
properties.description: Citrus and tropical fruit aromas blend together in clean, attractive fashion. The palate is crisp and cleansing due to firm acidity, while flavors of lime and pithy orange finish tight. This is a clean, clear presentation of Salta Torrontés.

properties.title: Jorge Ordóñez & Co. 2011 Botani Moscatel Seco Moscatel (Málaga)
properties.address: 222 E Ridge Rd, McAllen, TX 78503, USA
properties.description: With aromas of honey, papaya and white flowers, this dry Moscatel from Málaga announces its ripe character. In the mouth, this is weighty and creamy more than racy and direct. Flavors of sweet melon and bitter peach pit come with anise and nutmeg, while the finish is long and offers a candied orange flavor.

properties.title: La Carraia 2012  Orvieto Classico
properties.description: This charming, easy-drinking blend of Grechetto, Procanico, Malvasia and Verdello opens with a fragrance of yellow flower and spice. The palate offers flavors of tropical fruit, apple and lemon-lime, with a clean, refreshing finish.

properties.title: Olivi 2012 Coreno White (Toscana)
properties.description: Coreno is a blend of Trebbiano and Malvasia grapes that hail from over fifty-year-old vines. It has aromas of stone fruit and pear, while the palate boasts flavors of peach, lemon cream, vanilla and well-integrated oak.

properties.title: Palazzone 2012 TIXE Pinot Grigio (Umbria)
properties.address: Località Le Vigne, 203, 53040 Palazzone SI, Italy
properties.description: For fans of Pinot Grigio, this copper-hued wine—the natural color yielded by Pinot Grigio grapes—is a must try. It delivers juicy pear and apple flavors, along with spice and mineral notes and crisp, quenching acidity.

properties.title: Schmitges 2011 Grey Slate Dry Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: A hint of honeysuckle perfume lends flair to this dry, easy-quaffing Riesling. It's fairly straightforward on the palate, with fresh apple and lemon flavors, but brisk and bright, with pineapple acidity and a swathe of fresh herbs on the finish.

properties.title: Bodega Rancho 2011 Viognier (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.description: This showcases Viognier's rich, exotic side, with flavors of tropical fruit, orange, vanilla-cream, honeysuckle and spice. It's a big, flamboyant wine, but dry, and nicely balanced with crisp acidity and a touch of mineral.

properties.title: Bründlmayer 2006 Kamptaler Terrassen Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.address: Zwettler Str. 23, 3550 Langenlois, Austria
properties.description: Despite its maturity, this still has fresh pear and grapefruit flavors, which combine with almond, cream and currant notes, producing a round, smooth wine.

properties.title: Red Tail Ridge 2011 RTR Vineyard Semi-Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 846 NY-14, Penn Yan, NY 14527, USA
properties.description: Aromas of smoke and sweet apple introduce an intensely flavored palate that's full of ripe yellow peach, waxy flower and fresh fennel. Off-dry and bold in structure, it finishes with a hint of lanolin and a lingering minerality.

properties.title: René Muré 2010 Signature Pinot Blanc (Alsace)
properties.description: A delicious aroma of creamed apple wafts from this wine, which has notes of tropical fruit, mango and ripe pear. It is opulent and rounded, with just the right amount of balancing acidity. Screwcap.

properties.title: Tarara 2010 Honah Lee White White (Virginia)
properties.address: 13648 Tarara Ln, Leesburg, VA 20176, USA
properties.description: An enticing, heavy-duty blend of 40% Viognier, 40% Petit Manseng and 20% Roussanne, this is rich, round and unctuous, with bold notes of golden stone fruit, orange Creamsicle, lemon tartlet and caramelized nut. The acidity is soft across the midpalate, but it brightens on the warm, medium-length finish. To appreciate the full spectrum of aromas and flavors, don't drink this too cold.

properties.title: Tercero 2010 Camp 4 Vineyard Grenache Blanc (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 2445 Alamo Pintado Ave Unit 105, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.description: This has that distinctive diesel-fuel aroma often associated with Riesling; while that aroma is atypical of Grenache Blanc, this remains a successful wine. Bone dry, bright in acidity and mineral-driven, it shows a citrus flavor, in addition to that petrol note.

properties.title: Kuentz-Bas 2010 Sélection Muscat (Alsace)
properties.address: 14 Route des Vins, 68420 Husseren-les-Châteaux, France
properties.description: This is a dry and elegant style of Muscat, maintaining the grape's natural fragrance along with its acidity and refreshing green fruit flavor. That puts it in the food-friendly category, a wine to pair with difficult vegetables, such as asparagus or artichoke.

properties.title: L'Ecole No. 41 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 41 Lowden School Rd, Lowden, WA 99360, USA
properties.description: This pure, Columbia Valley Cabernet is blended from a variety of widely separated vineyards. The fruit is forward, pushing black cherry and cola notes to the front of the palate, layering in a streak of milk chocolate, and finishing with smooth, supple tannins.

properties.title: Northstar 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: This starts with a startling but tangy lemon-tea flavor. Cinnamon and plum notes enter the palate, which are underscored by rather chalky acidity, and finished with a coffee highlight.

properties.title: Dürnberg 2011 Falkensteiner Tradition Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
properties.description: Warm and creamy, this fills the palate with apple and pink grapefruit flavors. A touch of spice adds interest to this ripe, fruity effort that is ready to drink. Screwcap.

properties.title: Bella Vetta 2008 Ami's Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Howell Mountain)
properties.address: 6633 E Main St, Maryville, IL 62062, USA
properties.description: This shows the intense mountain flavors of previous releases, with dense flavors of blackberry, cherry and currant, and plenty of smoky oak. The tannins are dense but negotiable. There's a sharpness throughout that may its limit ageability.

properties.title: Bialla 2008 Vita Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Bialla has held back this 2008 for release nearly a year after the lovely 2009. The wine is soft, complex and drinkable now, with blackberry jam and oak flavors, but it's definitely high in alcohol, which gives it a cellar-limiting heat.

properties.title: Paradise Peak 2012 Riesling (Washington)
properties.address: 820 County Rd 3592, Paradise, TX 76073, USA
properties.description: A sweet-smelling wine with notes of overripe pear, pineapple and jasmine. It also drinks quite sweet (26g/L residual sugar) but doesn't have the acid or flavor concentration to match.

properties.title: Château des Demoiselles 2013 Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.description: The barnyard aroma gives a less than fresh feel. A bitter edge suppresses the red fruits, leaving a hard aftertaste.

properties.title: Millésimé 2012 Le Jardin Viognier (Paso Robles)
properties.description: Thin and simple, this Viognier just doesn't have enough to satisfy. While it's nicely dry and crisp, the orange and peach flavors are watery.

properties.title: Man O' War 2012 Gravestone Sauvignon Blanc-Semillon (Waiheke Island)
properties.description: This blend of 70% Sauvignon Blanc and 30% Semillon is lean and racy. Grassy, lemony notes on the nose include a touch of pickled jalapeño, while an acidic laser beam of citrus creases the palate, leaving behind a puckery, austere impression.

properties.title: Carlos Serres 2012 Serres Tempranillo-Garnacha Rosé (Rioja)
properties.address: Av. Santo Domingo de la Calzada, 40, 26200 Haro, La Rioja, Spain
properties.description: With an orange leaning to its pink tint, this is struggling to maintain its fruit and freshness. Flavors of peach and apricot pits finish round and soft.

properties.title: Tupun 2013 Torrontés (Tupungato)
properties.address: la Gloria, Tupungato, Mendoza, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: The nose is limited and narrow, not fruity or tropical as it should be. A plump, soft palate is low on pulse, while lychee and honeydew flavors end bland and slightly bitter.

properties.title: Coquerel Family Wine Estates 2011 Terroir Sauvignon Blanc (Calistoga)
properties.description: The chief deficiency is unripeness. You'll find green, minty, tart notes of citrus fruits and gooseberries.

properties.title: Paradise Peak 2012 Sweet Gewürztraminer (Washington)
properties.address: 820 County Rd 3592, Paradise, TX 76073, USA
properties.description: A sweet (40 g/L residual sugar), easy drinker with notes of spice, rose petal and lime leaf that needs more acid to pull them all together.

properties.title: Acre Twenty-one 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1031 McKinstry St, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.description: This Cabernet doesn't seem to have fully ripened with notes of jalapeño pepper, green herbs and cherry with a light styling and gritty tannins.

properties.title: Naked Mountain 2012 Chardonnay-Riesling White (Virginia)
properties.address: 2747 Leeds Manor Rd, Markham, VA 22643, USA
properties.description: Broad melon-like and apple-like aromas lead onto the medium-size palate. Soft acids give a malleable texture.

properties.title: Dillon 2011 Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (Yountville)
properties.description: Simple and watery, it has oaky flavors of citrus fruits and peaches. There's not much going on, but it is dry and crisp in acidity.

properties.title: Aperture 2014 Oliver's Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
properties.description: Complemented with 11% Cabernet Franc, this vineyard designate from winemaker Jesse Katz shines in fragrant plum, raspberry and blackberry flavors. Softly layered and balanced, it teases with dark chocolate and clove hints.

properties.title: Château Gassier 2016 Cuvée 946 Rosé (Côtes de Provence Sainte-Victoire)
properties.address: Château Gassier, 13114 Puyloubier, France
properties.description: Aged in wood, this wine is rich and spicy. Its fruit though is beautifully in balance, ripe with raspberry and red-currant fruits that are shot through with lemon acidity. This is a full-bodied wine, impressively structured and likely to age for a year or two. It is named after the 946 steps up the mountain behind the estate. Drink from late 2017.

properties.title: Darioush 2014 Sage Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 4240 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: From the producer's estate vineyard on Mount Veeder, this 100% varietal vineyard designate is oaky, viscous and intensely flavored with green apple, melon and peach. Delicious honeysuckle and grapefruit peel aromas make it all the more compelling, balancing its voluptuous weight and ripeness.

properties.title: Sohm & Kracher 2012 Single Vineyard Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: 4195 Chino Hills Pkwy #675, Chino Hills, CA 91709, USA
properties.description: This wine's dried pear, hay and hayflower scents create an immediate impression of richness. The palate underlines all of these generous flavors with a unique, streamlined freshness that illuminates. This is what happens when good Grüner Veltliner benefits from a little bottle age: Its herbal, lifted allure comes to the fore. Savor this.

properties.title: Parallel 2014 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 3125 St Helena Hwy North, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Crisp with peach and apricot goodness, this full-bodied white's gravelly texture works to its advantage, providing both steely acidity and grip. That grit becomes velvety smooth as the wine opens in the glass, making it irresistibly seductive and inviting.

properties.title: Domaines Ott 2016 Château Romassan Rosé (Bandol)
properties.address: 5093 Route de Flayosc, 83460 Taradeau, France
properties.description: Dominated by the local Mourvèdre grapes, this is a ripe and complex wine. Its acidity is integrated with rich yellow fruits, spice and perfume. The wine is floral, poised and very stylish. Drink from late 2017.

properties.title: Spy Valley 2014 Envoy Johnson Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.address: 37 Lake Timara Road West, Marlborough 7276, New Zealand
properties.description: Envoy is Spy Valley's top range of bottlings. In this case, it's a single-vineyard wine that's fermented and matured in oak for 11 months. It's medium-bodied and silky in texture, with distinctive fumé notes, hints of struck match, and layers of passion fruit and grapefruit flavors. Dry, austere and long on the finish, it's a compelling example of New Zealand Sauvignon Blanc.

properties.title: August West 2015 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 540 Barneveld Ave suite k, San Francisco, CA 94124, USA
properties.description: Very restrained aromas of Meyer-lemon pith, apple blossoms and scratched Key lime show on the nose of this appellation blend. There is a slightly burnt butter character to the sip, where touches of sweet corn and vanilla meet with citrus tang. Altogether, it's a very light expression of the region.

properties.title: Baer 2016 Shard Unoaked Stillwater Creek Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 19501 144th Ave NE #F100, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: Lightly reduced aromas of pear, apple and herb lead to a bright, crisp, clean palate. The aromas don't all seem in harmony at present but the palate brings plenty of enjoyment.

properties.title: Domaine Jean-Michel Gerin 2015 La Champine Viognier (Collines Rhôdaniennes)
properties.address: 19 Rue de Montmain, 69420 Ampuis, France
properties.description: This is almost as impressive as Gerin's La Champine Syrah, which is a tremendous achievement as Viognier seems much harder to do well. Hints of crushed stone and struck flint add nuance to the ripe apricot aromas, while the exotic, tropical fruit flavors of mango and pineapple are reined in by a touch of citrus-pith bitterness. Drink now–2018.

properties.title: Mercy 2016 Zabala Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Arroyo Seco)
properties.description: The nose on this bottling is quite reductive at first, with cut grass and damp herb aromas mixing up with dried seaweed and light lemon peel. There is a tart green-grass flavor to the palate, but also a slightly riper Anjou pear component, with a salty freshness emerging toward the finish.

properties.title: Saintsbury 2015 Heritage Block Old Wente Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.address: 1500 Los Carneros Ave #9742, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.description: Intense and high in acidity, this wine skirts the edge of ripeness in its salty, briny take on the variety, a nod to an historic clone. Floral, it persists in apple blossom and tart Meyer lemon, finishing crisp and fresh.

properties.title: Sandler 2015 Cuvée Ma Belle Heintz Ranch Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 540 Barneveld Ave ste k, San Francisco, CA 94124, USA
properties.description: Coconut oil, buttercream and vanilla custard show on the nose of this bottling from a historic vineyard. Flavors tighten up on the sip, where a grippy texture shows squeezed lemon and the slightest hint of tropicality.

properties.title: Talbott 2015 Logan Sleepy Hollow Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.description: Quite yellow in the glass, this bottling shows cohesive and familiar aromas of buttered toast, jasmine, orange marmalade, sandalwood and smoke on the nose. The palate packs lemon and butter together with walnut oil, proving quite rich and even heavy at times.

properties.title: Tenor 2015 Sauvignon Blanc (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 16116 140th Pl NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: The aromas are generous, with notes of freshly cut wood, custard and herb. The palate is full bodied, rich and creamy in feel. The wood shows prominently and it brings warmth on the finish.

properties.title: Bernard Magrez 2014 Le Prelat White (Laudun)
properties.description: Bernard Magrez's wine empire seems to have no limits, as he's recently expended into this relatively obscure little section of the Southern Rhône known for its white wines. This medium- to full-bodied blend of Grenache Blanc, Clairette, Viognier and Roussanne features modest pear and pineapple flavors and a refreshing zing of citrus zest on the finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Jean-Luc Colombo 2015 Les Abeilles de Colombo Red (Côtes du Rhône)
properties.address: 10 Rue des Violettes, 07130 Cornas, France
properties.description: Being based in the Northern Rhône, Colombo's Côtes-du-Rhône always incorporates a decent proportion of Syrah, 30% in this vintage. There's 10% Mourvèdre, with the other 60% being Grenache. It's medium to full in body, with supple tannins and superripe plum and chocolate flavors that pick up hints of raisin. Drink now.

properties.title: Lamoreaux Landing 2016 Estate Bottled Dry Rosé (Finger Lakes)
properties.description: This is still quite closed on the nose, suggesting more mineral and struck flint than fruit. The palate opens gradually, introducing prettier cherry-blossom and strawberry notes, along with a rich lusciously enveloping mouthfeel. The finish is slightly warming.

properties.title: Lava Cap 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (El Dorado)
properties.address: 2221 Fruitridge Rd, Placerville, CA 95667, USA
properties.description: This is an ebullient wine, full of herb, grapefruit and wet-earth aromas as well as very tangy yet sweet-seeming citrus flavors. It has good concentration and stays fresh through the finish.

properties.title: Achaia Clauss 2015 Demestica White Moschofilero (Peloponnese)
properties.description: Honey, lemon and an herbal spin on the nose give this wine a distinctive start. Flavors of clean, zesty citrus and a spin of ripe melon add to the elegance. Easy to drink but elegant.

properties.title: B.R. Cohn 2015 Cabernet Sauvignon (North Coast)
properties.address: 15000 Sonoma Hwy, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.description: Savory flavors like salt, peppered roast beef and rosemary shape the taste of this medium-bodied, velvet-textured and nicely concentrated wine. It has fine-grained tannins to support the mouthfeel, but not enough to overwhelm.

properties.title: Board Track Racer 2015 The Chief Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: Light aromas of cocoa, herb, licorice and barrel spice are followed by medium-bodied cherry flavors. The finish seems a bit clipped.

properties.title: Boekenoogen 2015 Bell Ranch Vineyard Viognier (Monterey)
properties.address: 24 W Carmel Valley Rd, Carmel Valley, CA 93924, USA
properties.description: White-peach aromas meet with vanilla butter and honeysuckle on the nose, yet there is a tension apparent amid the ripeness. The sip starts with an edgy texture and crisp acidity that cut across flavors of nectarine and apple.

properties.title: Casa do Valle 2015 Grande Escolha White (Vinho Verde)
properties.address: 4860-167, Portugal
properties.description: This is a bold wine, full of ripe apple and peach fruit flavors. It is delicious, juicy with a tight texture and zesty acidity. There is an opulent, rich aftertaste that is mouth-filling and perfumed. The wine is ready to drink now although it will be better from 2017.

properties.title: Jean-Christophe Perraud 2014  Saint-Véran
properties.address: 1044 Bd Pierre-Laporte, Brigham, QC J2K 4R3, Canada
properties.description: Peach and apricot flavors dominate this ripe, full-bodied wine that has plenty of acidity to back up the richness. Still developing, it will emerge as a ripe, concentrated wine that will be generous and full. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Louis Latour 2014  Puligny-Montrachet
properties.address: 18 Rue des Tonneliers, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: This wine is pure and fruity, with a strong, tight line of minerality. It is perfumed with apple and grapefruit flavors and a light touch of wood, with good acidity at the end. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Alex Gambal 2014  Puligny-Montrachet
properties.description: This crisp wine is currently tightly closed. It is textured and mineral, with apple and citrus flavors coming through slowly. This perfumed wine needs to age. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Miner 2013 Emily's Cuvée Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 7850 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Offered in remembrance of winery co-founder, Emily Miner, this wine is softened by 5% Cabernet Franc, the grapes coming from a handful of vineyards, including Stagecoach and Emilio's Terrace. Dried herb, graphite and sagebrush highlight a tight structure that's grippy and savory, with understated oak. Drink now through 2023.

properties.title: Prinz Salm 2014 Kabinett Riesling (Nahe)
properties.description: Hints of caramelized sugar and saffron lend a spicy touch to fresh apple and lemon in this off-dry Riesling. Spine tingling acidity freshens the midpalate, leading a vibrantly refreshing lemon-lime finish.

properties.title: Rijckaert 2014 Vieilles Vignes  (Pouilly-Fuissé)
properties.description: A toasty, smoky element to this concentrated wine balances with the rich apricot fruit and the mineral texture. Acidity and a citrus line cut through the generous, full flavors. The aftertaste shows the wine is still young. Wait to drink until 2017.

properties.title: Roco 2013 RMS Brut Sparkling (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 13260 NE Red Hills Rd, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.description: This ambitious debut from Argyle's founding winemaker is the first sparkling wine to be released under his own Roco label. Rollin Michael Soles crafted this classic blend of two-thirds Pinot Noir and one third Chardonnay from three Willamette Valley vineyards. It's a young, tart wine that's still a bit leesy, with precisely defined apple and citrus fruit. Retasted after being open for 24 hours it had just begun to expand and reveal the promise locked away in the bottle. Drink 2020–2030.

properties.title: Viña Cobos 2013 Bramare Cabernet Sauvignon (Luján de Cuyo)
properties.address: Costa Flores s/n y, RN7, M5509 Perdriel, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Cool, herbal aromas of tomato leaf, oregano and beef stew set up a chewy palate with grabby tannins. A mix of savory spices and minty, baked berry flavors end with peppery notes, chunky weight and a tough of heat. Drink through 2022.

properties.title: Willi Haag 2015 Brauneberger Juffer Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Burgfriedenspfad 5, 54472 Brauneberg, Germany
properties.description: Honeycomb and saffron lend an earthen sheen to this intensely tropical Riesling full of sweet-tart tangerine, pineapple and melon flavors. It's juicy and buoyantly fruity, yet also complex, balanced by bristling acidity and a lingering tea-note astringency.

properties.title: Dr. Pauly Bergweiler 2015 Dry Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Gestade 15, 54470 Bernkastel-Kues, Germany
properties.description: In contrast to a nose that's more mineral than fruit, the intensity of this wine's voluptuous nectarine and yellow peach flavors surprise. It's dry in style but with a succulent fruitiness that clings delectably to the palate. Finishes long and lean with a tang of steely minerality. Drink now through 2019.

properties.title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2014 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: Pear, butter and spice aromas lead to tingly, broad-feeling flavors that are straight down the fairway.

properties.title: Chilcas 2013 Single Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
properties.description: Concentrated aromas of licorice, mocha and generic black fruits are low on elegance. This is grabby and strong, with herbal plum and cassis flavors that finish chunkily and deep, with good texture. Expect a saucy, herbal aftertaste.

properties.title: Clavo Cellars 2012 Ole Albariño (Paso Robles)
properties.description: Unique aromas of chamomile, dried orange peel, hay and smoked chicken show on the nose of this bottling. The palate is also a wash of intrigue, with smoked lemon peels, roasting chicken, oregano and other dried herbs.

properties.title: Gamache 2014 Estate Grown Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: Pear, almond and toast aromas lead to dry, elegant fruit and lees flavors. It's a uniquely styled offering of the variety.

properties.title: Genoa 2014 Tell-Tale Super-Tuscan-Style White (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 19501 144th Ave NE c1100, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: A blend of near-equal parts Pinot Grigio, Chardonnay and Sauvignon Blanc, this wine brings aromas of overripe pear and apple and toasted grapenuts that lead to dry, lightly fruit flavors. It's a straightforward quaffer.

properties.title: Ferrari-Carano 2014 Fumé Blanc (Sonoma County)
properties.description: Given time in both French oak and stainless-steel, this wine combines grapefruit with melon and stone fruit like apricot to offer an unctuous weight on the palate. It finishes dry and balanced with shy acidity.

properties.title: Santa Alicia 2013 Gran Reserva de Los Andes Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
properties.description: Gritty, leathery aromas register as less than fully ripe. In the mouth, this Cabernet is a touch biting. Limited cherry and plum flavors come with burnt, herbal notes, while an earthy finish tastes of salt and chocolate.

properties.title: Leto 2013 The Hidden One Old Vine Estate Grown Chardonnay (St. Helena)
properties.address: 761 Technology Way, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: From vines planted in the 1960s, and given time in 100% French oak, this dry, unctuous wine is tropical in character. A mix of pineapple and nutmeg teases its way into notes of canned corn.

properties.title: Maryhill 2014 Viognier (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: The pear, nectarine and floral aromas seem to lack clarity. This wine is full of stone-fruit flavors that bring a touch of sweetness and lead to a warm finish.

properties.title: V. Sattui 2014 Riesling (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 1111 White Ln, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: This light-bodied, aromatic wine smells like roses and a bowl of fresh fruit. Flavors are lightly sweet and peachy, the texture tangy and the finish sugary.

properties.title: Standing Stone 2014 Old West Block Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 9934 NY-414, Hector, NY 14841, USA
properties.description: While the nose is a bit closed off, pristine apple, pear and grapefruit flavors shine brightly on the palate of this dry, brisk Riesling. Fruity, forward and fresh, it's an uncomplicated yet satisfying quaffer. Drink now.

properties.title: Stony Lonesome 2014 Estate Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Finger Lakes)
properties.description: Zesty aromas of grapefruit and tangerine skins perfume this bright, citrusy Grüner Veltliner. While dry in style with a thirst-quenching, juicy demeanor, the palate is marked by curious hints of pollen and fennel. Drink now.

properties.title: Barker's Marque 2014 Arona Certified Sustainable Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.address: 11079 Resort Road, Ellicott City, MD 21042, USA
properties.description: This is a light-bodied, quaffable Sauvignon Blanc. Ripe aromas and flavors of peach and nectarine marry with passion fruit and some slightly discordant herbal notes, then finish quickly.

properties.title: Viña Casablanca 2014 Cefiro Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.description: Aromas of olive, green herbs, mixed spices and black plum set up a full, grabby palate. Flavors of generic black fruits, bitter herbs and eucalyptus finish minty and leafy, with weight and cushion.

properties.title: Perry Creek 2011 Altitude 2401 Fair Play Farms Cabernet Sauvignon (El Dorado)
properties.description: This big but smooth wine has very ripe aromas and flavors that convey dried plums and rosemary. It's very full bodied and fine tannins keep the texture softer than usual.

properties.title: Two Angels 2011 Mayacamas Mountains Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
properties.address: 6808 US-24, Huntington, IN 46750, USA
properties.description: Grapes for this wine were sourced from the new appellation known as the Moon Mountain District, the higher-elevation, eastern-lying range above Sonoma Valley. The bottling also contains small amounts of Merlot, Malbec and Petit Verdot. Light bodied and restrained, it's briary, dusty and tannic, with sour cherry and cranberry flavors that get juicier on the finish.

properties.title: Smoke Tree 2016 Rosé (California)
properties.description: Light and nutty, this combines a majority of Grenache with Zinfandel, Mourvèdre and Tempranillo. Fermented in stainless steel tanks, it maintains fresh acidity with its lightly ripe strawberry and watermelon fruit.

properties.title: Sweet Cheeks 2015 Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 27007 Briggs Hill Rd, Eugene, OR 97405, USA
properties.description: Done in a fresh and leesy style, this offers minimalistic fruit flavors, but strong suggestions of phenolics such as apple skins, grapefruit pith and lemon peel. The underlying mineral-drenched acidity keeps it lively.

properties.title: Trocard 2016  Bordeaux Blanc
properties.address: 465 Jean Trocard, 33570 Les Artigues-de-Lussac, France
properties.description: Crisp and with good acidity, this is a light, fruity and forward wine. Lively, balanced and with plenty of taut fruitiness at the end, it is very ready to drink.

properties.title: Undurraga 2016 Sibaris Gran Reserva Sauvignon Blanc (Leyda Valley)
properties.address: Cam. a Melipilla 34, Talagante, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: This light-colored, almost clear, SB opens with pungent, fairly sharp aromas of sea brine and sweaty citrus fruits. In the mouth, this is tight, edgy and pointy due to blazing acidity. Citrus, bell pepper and green-herb flavors finish peppery and with scouring acidity.

properties.title: Vignerons de Tutiac 2016 Carrelet d'Estuaire Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
properties.description: Pay attention to the Tutiac winemakers north of Bordeaux, who have produced another good wine. Bright red fruits give it a crisp character, packed with acidity and lively fruitiness. It's a great summer apéritif wine. Drink now.

properties.title: Vignerons de Tutiac 2016 Lalande Bellevue Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
properties.description: Intense acidity gives this wine character. It is taut and nervy, with a mineral texture. The bright, crisp red-fruit background to this acidity will assert itself over the coming months. Drink from late summer 2017.

properties.title: Whalebone 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 8325 Vineyard Dr, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Bolstered by 14% Petite Sirah, this bottling offers a stunning array of herb and earth scents that surround a core of black plum and minty licorice spice. The palate shows rounded purple fruit and more herbal notes, and the acidity is strong but balanced.

properties.title: Adega Mãe 2015 White (Lisboa)
properties.description: Better known in the Douro, the Viosinho grape has found another home in the cool coastal Lisboa region. The wine is crisp, tangy and with a great zing of acidity. It is also fruity, full of apple and citrus flavors. Drink this attractive wine now.

properties.title: Ironstone 2015 Chenin Blanc (California)
properties.address: Ironstone Vineyards, 1894 6 Mile Rd, Murphys, CA 95247, USA
properties.description: Apple skin and white peach flavors and a smooth, rather rich mouthfeel lend quite a bit of personality to this unusually low-alcohol wine. It tastes a touch sweet, or at least quite ripe, but is balanced by tangy acidity.

properties.title: Martin Ray 2014 Synthesis Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: This blend of Cabernet Sauvignon with 6% Cabernet Franc and 4% Petit Verdot from several appellations within the Napa Valley is soft and smoothly textured, offering brawny black cherry and toasted wood flavors.

properties.title: Nodland 2013 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 11616 E Montgomery Dr #69, Spokane Valley, WA 99206, USA
properties.description: Aromas are barrel forward, with notes of char, vanilla, toast and sweet spice. The barrel notes continue on the palate, overwhelming the fruit almost completely. It's a shame as there's good things to be had underneath.

properties.title: Quinta do Noval 2015 Cedro do Noval Branco White (Douro)
properties.address: N322-3, 5085 Pinhão, Portugal
properties.description: This is a lightly wood-aged wine, full of fruit with just a touch of spice. Smoothly textured, the wine is all the better for an extra year of aging before release. That broadens the fruit while leaving plenty of crispness and fine acidity. Drink now.

properties.title: Ribafreixo 2015 Pato Frio Grand Escolha Antão Vaz (Alentejano)
properties.description: This is a young wood-aged wine with rich toast. While the toast does smother the fruit at the moment, there are enough crisp acidity and citrus flavors in the background to come through as the wine matures for another year or two. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Slow Press 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (Monterey County)
properties.description: Welcoming bubblegum, key lime, grass and cement aromas check many Sauvignon Blanc boxes in this widely available and reliable bottling. The palate leads with decent structure, but then ripeness prevails, with peach and more bubblegum notes.

properties.title: Alfredo Roca 2006 Chardonnay
properties.address: Ruta Provincial 165 esq. La Pichana, Cañada Seca, M5603XAG San Rafael, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Way too much banana, mango and sugar. Not a prime-time player.

properties.title: Concha y Toro 2004 Don Melchor Cabernet Sauvignon (Puente Alto)
properties.description: In recent years, with winemaker Enrique Tirado firmly at the helm, Don Melchor has gotten better and better. And while 2004 was an average year in Chile, this ranks as the best Melchor we've sampled. The wine has beautiful blackberry, cola and pepper aromas in front of cassis, cherry, plum, nutmeg and cinnamon flavors. It's brawny but balanced, with excellent natural acidity. Best from 2008–2012.

properties.title: Rock Hollow 2010 Vintner's Selection Sauvignon Blanc (Santa Barbara County)
properties.description: Nicely crisp in acidity, this has a minerally scour that cleans the mouth. The pineapple, lime and guava flavors are strong, and the finish seems just a little sweet.

properties.title: Arthur Metz 2010 Brut Millesimé Sparkling (Crémant d'Alsace)
properties.description: This rounded, yeasty wine features apple, bitter almond and some fruity acidity. It is full, rich and creamy-textured.

properties.title: Casa do Valle 2011 Rosé (Vinho Verde)
properties.description: Pale red in color, this fruity rosé was one of the originals in the current pink Vinho Verde trend. It is still one of the best. It has a lively, ripe strawberry note accompanied by a touch of caramel and bright acidity.

properties.title: Casa Silva 2011 Angostura Gran Reserva Chardonnay (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Unnamed Road, Angostura, San Fernando, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: This wine smells subtly of hickory and resin but is otherwise neutral on the nose. It feels creamy, smooth and woody, with oak leading the flavor profile, with other notes of melon and honey. This is a plump, oaky, honeyed style of Chardonnay.

properties.title: Casal Paço Padreiro 2008 Aphros  Reserva Bruto Loureiro (Vinho Verde)
properties.address: Sitio Casa Nova, Refóios Do Lima, Viana Do Castelo, 4990, Portugal
properties.description: This crisp, bright sparkler gets depth of flavor from the Loureiro grape. It has a taut texture that makes this fruity, fresh wine a perfect match for food.

properties.title: Dão Sul 2011 Cabriz Colheita Seleccionada White (Dão)
properties.description: This round and smooth wine has apricot, peach and pear flavors, which create a soft texture and attractive acidity. It has a warm, rich feel. This wine is for food.

properties.title: Dillon 2009 Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (Yountville)
properties.description: With flavors of buttered toast, vanilla, sweet mango and orange jam flavors, this is as rich, ripe and oaky as they come. Finishing with a honeyed accent, it's made to appeal to consumer's who enjoy the popular style.

properties.title: Gérard Bertrand 2010 Grenache-Vermentino White (Languedoc)
properties.description: Aromas of waxy apple skin and white melon rind lead the nose, though a soft lemon oil accent unfolds in the back after the wine warms. The mouthfeel is round yet lifted, with ripe melon and sweet citrus flavors that are balanced by a good acidic cut to the finish. Drink now.

properties.title: William Cole 2011 Columbine Special Reserve Sauvignon Blanc (Casablanca Valley)
properties.description: Cool and green smelling, with briny notes and whiffs of green pepper and sea foam, this shows intensity, while the flavors veer toward lime, passion fruit and green herb. It's nervy and tasty on the finish.

properties.title: Montes 2010 Alpha Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
properties.description: On the nose, there are cider, oak and baked corn notes. The palate is full of oak and resin flavors that prevent the fruit from emerging immediately. It tastes of hickory, apple and melon on the palate and finish.

properties.title: Oberon 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: This is elaborate, but too soft for a great Napa Cabernet. That absence of structure accentuates its ripeness, giving it tastes of candied cherry and licorice. On the plus side, it's dry and smooth, with lots of smoky new French oak. Drink now.

properties.title: oops 2011 Chardonnay (Central Valley)
properties.description: Although it's not very aromatic, the nose on this wine is easygoing, with mild peach and apple aromas. It feels fresh and medium bodied, with apple, peach and melony flavors, the latter perhaps due to the blend's 14% white Carmenère. It shows mellow oak notes and latent acidity on the finish.

properties.title: Pine Ridge 2010 Dijon Clones Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.address: 5901 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: The underlying wine here is fine, crisp and minerally, with green apple fruit. Lots of new oak, however, sticks out, in the form of buttered toast and butterscotch.

properties.title: Ruby Red 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.description: You'll find good, ripe and savory flavors of blackberry, currant and spice. A touch of oak and a sweet licorice note give this 100% Cabernet a candied appeal. It can't quite escape its rustic mouthfeel, but it's a nice glass of red wine.

properties.title: Efeste 2013 Big Papa Old Block Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: This is the first vintage of this wine to include estate fruit, along with fruit from Klipsun, Bacchus and Red Willow. A complex medley of herb and spice aromas accented by purple flowers is followed by bold yet still refined dark-fruit flavors that linger on the finish. It has the tannin to go the distance. Best after 2020.

properties.title: Plantagenet 2014 Chardonnay (Great Southern)
properties.address: Lot 45 Albany Hwy, Mount Barker WA 6323, Australia
properties.description: This is a terrific Chardonnay at a great price, offering subtle notes of toasted grain upfront, followed by bright lemon-lime fruit and crisp acidity. It's medium-bodied, so it won't overpower whatever food you serve it with and the laser beam of citrusy acidity on the finish is wrapped in a gauzy sheath of pleasant nuttiness. Drink now–2020, possibly longer.

properties.title: Jean Edwards 2013 Stagecoach Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Black currant stars in this mountain wine, juicy and brushy in big, pillowy tannin. Still tightly wound, it shows complexity and plenty of natural structure, begging for more time in the bottle to allow for the gunpowder, smoky oak and dark, lush black fruit to marry further. It should show best 2020 through 2023.

properties.title: Johannishof 2015 Johannisberg Hölle GG Riesling (Rheingau)
properties.description: Fresh apricot, melon and grapefruit abound from nose to finish in this brisk yet delectably fruity Riesling. It's dry and lithe in body yet penetrating and juicy. Zesty lime acidity lingers brightly on the finish.

properties.title: Dr. Loosen 2014 Wehlener Sonnenuhr GG Alte Reben Grosse Lage Dry Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: Zesty lime and green melon notes resonate throughout this ethereally light but scintillating dry Riesling. Dusty mineral and pollen notes lend an earthen dimension to crisp, green plum and herb on the palate. It's spine tingling and revitalizing yet lingers persistently on the finish.

properties.title: Galerie 2015 Naissance Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 12557 Steiner Rd, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.description: This gentle, complex white offers lovingly crafted waves of tropical lychee and golden-apple minerality, with bites of wet stone, gravel and lemon. Balanced in acidity and a lightness of being, it's meant for the table or kitchen, to sip happily while making a meal.

properties.title: Tyrrell's 2011 Vat 1 Semillon (Hunter Valley)
properties.address: 1838 Broke Rd, Pokolbin NSW 2320, Australia
properties.description: At six years of age, this is just coming into its own. Hints of green fruit remain, tempered by notes of wet stone and toasted marshmallow, harbingers of the full maturity that will arrive in a few years. It's not as lean or edgy as it must've been as a young wine, but is rounding beautifully into form. Drink now–2025.

properties.title: Xanadu 2015 DJL Chardonnay (Margaret River)
properties.address: 316 Boodjidup Rd, Margaret River WA 6285, Australia
properties.description: It's good to see this Margaret River stalwart return to the States. The 2015 DJL is a slightly nutty, toasty wine, plump and silky in texture. Pear, melon, vanilla and citrus notes finish long.

properties.title: Cristom 2015 Estate Pinot Gris (Eola-Amity Hills)
properties.address: 6905 Spring Valley Rd NW, Salem, OR 97304, USA
properties.description: Lovely from the first sniff on, this is packed with mineral-drenched fruit flavors. Pear flesh and skin dominate, along with suggestions of cucumber and white melon. The leesy minerality is a great palate cleanser.

properties.title: Domaine Pichot 2015 Le Peu de la Moriette  (Vouvray)
properties.address: 70 Rue de la Vall. de Nouy, 37210 Vouvray, France
properties.description: This single vineyard wine has enormous potential. At this stage it is dry and not quite integrated. But with the rich fruitiness, the hints of yellow fruits and the tight mineral character, this wine will age extremely well. Drink from 2021.

properties.title: Quinta de Soalheiro 2015 Reserva Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)
properties.description: A rich wood-aged wine, this is dense and creamy. With acidity and toast, ripe apples as well as spice, the wine is made to age. Coming from the Alvarinho heartland of Melgaço on Portugal's northern border, the wine has minerality and great intensity. It will be good until at least 2020.

properties.title: Seven Hills 2014 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
properties.description: Aromas of barrel spice are up front on this locked-up wine, followed by pencil lead, herb, vanilla, black currant and cherry. The palate brings a compelling sense of texture, juxtaposed by aggressive tannins that need a significant amount of time to come into their own. Don't go near it for a decade but it should last well beyond that. Best from 2027–2035.

properties.title: Stewart Cellars 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 6752 Washington St, Yountville, CA 94599, USA
properties.description: Fermented in stainless steel and neutral oak, this light-bodied, well-structured white impresses with pretty citrus blossom scents and tart, high-toned acidity. Pungent with lemon and lime flavor, it develops bolder melon and pear notes as it opens in the glass.

properties.title: Whalebone 2013 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.description: From a vineyard named for the oceanic deposits found there, this bottling offers blackberry syrup, vanilla, clove and black tea aromas. Like the nose, the palate offers a minty lift to its boysenberry and blackberry fruit. It's framed by strong acidity and soft tannins that build after several sips.

properties.title: Wunsch & Mann 2013 Steingrubler Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
properties.description: A touch of lanolin plays alongside dried citrus peel on the nose. The palate has richer rounder notes of dried and fresh pear alongside a lively streak of lemon freshness. This is just on the cusp of evolution and will continue to develop. The depth of lemony fruit is there to sustain it. The finish is long, lasting, lemony and dry.

properties.title: Margerum 2015 D Sauvignon Blanc (Happy Canyon of Santa Barbara)
properties.address: 19 E Mason St, Santa Barbara, CA 93101, USA
properties.description: Extremely light in color, this top-shelf Sauvignon Blanc from McGinley and Grassini vineyards is compelling on all fronts. Fresh, lively and suave key lime, sliced nectarine and wet sidewalk aromas mark the nose. The palate is tense and nervy, with a grippy texture and energetic acidity that invigorates its crisp citrus and river stone flavors.

properties.title: Passing Time 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 18808 142nd Ave NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: The inaugural release of this wine, this hails largely from the esteemed Klipsun Vineyard. Alluring aromas of herb, earth, cherry liqueur and black fruit lead to sweet, sappy black-fruit flavors and burly but still well-integrated tannins. It's only going to get better with additional time in the bottle. Best after 2023.

properties.title: Domaine Zind-Humbrecht 2015 Herrenweg de Turckheim Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 2 Rte de Colmar, 68230 Turckheim, France
properties.description: A bright dash of lemon is colored with a hint of yeast and flint. The palate, which brims with ripe Amalfi lemon notes, also has that slight flinty stony touch. But it is the lemon that characterizes the compact, precise and dry body. It is the zestiness that brightens and enlivens. Very refreshing, with wonderful balance and tension. Drink now through 2027.

properties.title: Domaine Zind-Humbrecht 2015 Turckheim Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.description: Both amplitude and generosity are apparent from the first sniff with ripe pear dominating the flavor spectrum. The body is concentrated and balances the full fruit with pleasant tingling zestiness. This is dry and precisely drawn, with a zesty finish.

properties.title: Domaine Zind-Humbrecht 2015 Turckheim Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 2 Rte de Colmar, 68230 Turckheim, France
properties.description: Grapefruit and quince make for an exciting opening amidst some yeasty notes. On the palate, aromatic quince and plum notes reflect the generosity of the vintage while remaining dry and light-bodied. There is an ease here, of drinking and thinking, of sipping and being refreshed. This goes down far too easily on deceptively light feet. The finish is of refreshing lemon zest.

properties.title: Dry Creek Vineyard 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.description: This well-made wine, blended with small percentages of Petit Verdot, Cabernet Franc, Malbec and Merlot, is an astounding value. Currant and cranberry notes and an underbelly of tannins play together in a smooth texture of rich concentration.

properties.title: François Baur 2015 Herrenweg Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 3 Grand'rue, 68230 Turckheim, France
properties.description: Lifted, almost herbal citrus freshness dominates the nose, making for an inviting appetizing opening. The palate comes in with generous ripe pear fruit on a slender body. The flavors are boosted by some residual sweetness. The off-dry finish is of lasting, adorably brilliant, pure pear fruit.

properties.title: Gustave Lorentz 2013 Burg Riesling (Alsace)
properties.description: Fresh notes of ripe lemon zest are suffused with hay flower and earth notes. The palate majors on zesty, lively and aromatic citrus: tangerine and Amalfi lemon above all. This is dry and bright, slender and precise, yet never lets go of its earthy touch. The finish is expansive and clean.

properties.title: Work 2013 Lamya's Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 3190 CA-128, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.description: From a site in Calistoga, this wine delivers juicy tobacco, char and black fruit flavors, with a concentrated structure and new French and American oak. Savory leather and black pepper notes close out the long finish.

properties.title: Tertulia 2012 Phinny Hill Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 1564 Whiteley Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: Brooding aromas of spice box, herb, purple fruit and wood spice are followed by medium-bodied cranberry flavors. The tannins bring a sense of astringency, requiring some time in the cellar to (hopefully?) soften.

properties.title: Thomas Carteron 2016 L'Excellence Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.description: Proudly claiming to be a blend of eight grape varieties, this wine is soft and gently fruity with a spicy background that gives it a bitter edge. That will blow off in a few months, so drink this food friendly wine from late 2017.

properties.title: Tormaresca 2016 Calafuria Negroamaro Rosato (Salento)
properties.description: Red berry, violet and a whiff of clove lead the nose. Bright and fruity, the refreshing palate doles out crushed raspberry, wild cherry and a savory note of pink peppercorn.

properties.title: Ponga 2015 Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.description: Another impressive bargain-priced 2015 Sauvignon Blanc. Consumers looking for summer 2017 refreshment should grab some of this for its crisp flavors of pineapple, passion fruit and grapefruit. Drink now.

properties.title: Airfield Estates 2015 Viognier (Yakima Valley)
properties.description: Aromas of tangerine zest, peach and flower are followed by dry clean fruit flavors that show no apparent oak influence, with citrus notes lingering on the finish.

properties.title: Bertaini 2016 Sereole  (Soave Colli Scaligeri)
properties.address: Via Novare, 2, 37024 Arbizzano-Santa Maria VR, Italy
properties.description: This opens with white flower, yellow stone fruit and honeydew melon aromas. The fruity sensations carry over to the palate, with a tangerine zest note and tangy acidity that leads to a juicy finish.

properties.title: Trivento 2016 White Orchid Reserve Torrontés (Mendoza)
properties.address: RP60 & Jerónimo Ruiz, M5517, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Tropical aromas are a tiny bit grassy and oily. In the mouth, this is acidic and tangy, while lime and green-herb flavors are snappy. Crisp citric acidity creates sizzle on a racy finish.

properties.title: Vionta 2015 Limited Release Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.address: Parroquia de Simes, Lugar Axis s/n, 36968 Meaño, Pontevedra, Spain
properties.description: As this enters its second year in bottle, the nose is still clean and punchy, much like fruit salad. A plump solid mouthfeel holds flavors of salty peach. Beyond that, there's not a lot to say about this standard Albariño. Drink immediately.

properties.title: Winzerkeller Andau 2016 Blaufränkisch Rosé (Burgenland)
properties.description: This wine opens with a touch of fleshy ripeness. The palate is expansive, brimming with fresh red berry notes. Light in body, it finishes with uplifting lemon.

properties.title: Highland Cellars 2015 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.description: This easygoing off-dry Riesling boasts pretty orange blossom and white-peach perfume. Crisp stone-fruit flavors on the palate are accented by honey and bee pollen. The finish is long and zesty.

properties.title: Hightower 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 19418 E 583 PR NE, Benton City, WA 99320, USA
properties.description: The aromas come off as quite green, with notes of bell pepper and garden herbs more reminiscent of a Cabernet Franc. The flavors are elegant and show more of the same. It's an exploration of Cabernet's greener side, surprising considering the warmer vintage and region.

properties.title: CàMaiol 2015  Lugana
properties.description: On the nose, this suggests thyme, toasted nut and ripe orchard fruit. The firm palate offers mature citrus zest and ripe pear flavors while a bitter almond note marks the finish.

properties.title: Cantina di Monteforte 2016 Vicario  (Soave Classico)
properties.description: Spring blossom and white stone fruit aromas delicately set the tone for this wine. On the straightforward palate, fresh acidity underscores ripe pear and yellow apple flavors while a hint of almond signals the close.

properties.title: Cass 2016 Mr. Blanc White (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 7350 Linne Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: This blend of 75% Marsanne and 25% Roussanne is extremely floral, fruity and tropical on the nose, with coconut, mango, guava and tuberose scents. Acidity helps keep that ripeness in check on the palate, but the tropical flavor is powerfully persistent.

properties.title: Castello di Spessa 2015 Ribolla Gialla (Collio)
properties.description: This wine's golden apple, yellow pear and beeswax aromas carry over to the bright, straightforward palate, along with a hint of citrus. It has a clean, fresh finish.

properties.title: Château Carpe Diem 2016 Castillo Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: 4436 route de Carcès, 83570 Cotignac, France
properties.description: A rich blend of Grenache and Cinsault, this is rounded and generous. With ripe strawberry fruit and a full mouthfeel, the wine is packed with berries and light acidity. Drink now.

properties.title: Château d'Astros 2016 Domaine d'Astros Cuvée Prestige Rosé
properties.address: Route de Lorgues, 83550 Vidauban, France
properties.description: Just north of Saint-Tropez, this large estate has produced a rounded fruity wine. It has a soft crushed strawberry flavor that is balanced by attractive generous acidity. The wine is ready to drink.

properties.title: Château la Calisse 2016 Rosé (Coteaux Varois en Provence)
properties.address: 5055 Route de Draguignan, D560, 83670 Pontevès, France
properties.description: From the color, it could be a white wine. To taste, though, it is certainly rosé. It has an attractive crisp character with plenty of bright fruit and acidity. The aftertaste continues the dry fruity theme. Drink now.

properties.title: Château Roubine 2016 La Vie en Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.description: The rose-embossed bottle sets the scene for a soft, perfumed and fruity wine. It has attractive acidity as well as ripe red berries. With its spice and herbal edge, the wine is also textured, a contrast to the fine fruit. Drink now.

properties.title: Compagnie Viticole de Provence 2016 Domaine Saint Jean le Vieux Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.description: Grenache, Cinsault and Syrah form a soft warm blend that is ready to drink. It has acidity and spice as well as red berries. It's a fine apéritif style with its light touch and final crispness. Drink now.

properties.title: Ecker 2010 Grüner Veltliner (Austria)
properties.description: Rounded and creamy wine. It has an edge of pepper, its acidity melding easily into the apple and pear fruit flavors. It finishes easily with a ripe pineapple note. Screwcap.

properties.title: Fontana Candida 2010  Frascati Superiore
properties.description: A Roman classic that often appears on trattoria tables besides grilled vegetables or insalata di mare, this classic Frascati Superiore offers subtle aromas of dried hay, citrus and pear.

properties.title: Capestrano 2009 Passerina (Marche)
properties.description: Here's an easy, no-fuss white wine from central Italy (made with native Passerina grapes) that offers subtle aromas of peach and citrus over a bright, zesty mouthfeel. Pair this wine with fried vegetable tempura.

properties.title: Cas'Almare 2010 Torrontés (Mendoza)
properties.description: Smells wet and salinic, with a slightly acrid note coming on late. Feels tangy, tight and zesty, with oily lime and lychee flavors. Finishes hard, nutty and mildly bitter.

properties.title: Cortenova 2010 Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)
properties.address: Via Brescia, 3a, 25040 Nigoline BS, Italy
properties.description: This well-priced Pinot Grigio (in a screwcap bottle) is simple and clean with crisp aromas of lemon drop and white peach backed by a tight, bright feel in the mouth.

properties.title: Domaine Costa Lazaridi 2010 Oenodea White (Drama)
properties.description: This white blend of Malagousia and Moscholfilero starts with aromas of bright citrus, tropical fruit and a hint of musky spice. On the palate, it's a creamy blend of tropical fruit and peach, though slightly clumsy. The wine finishes with a spicy spin.

properties.title: Farnese 2009  Trebbiano d'Abruzzo
properties.description: There's a mature note of apricot or cantaloupe melon that opens the nose of this golden Trebbiano-based wine from central Italy. That ripe fruit element is backed by a drying touch of talc powder or crushed mineral.

properties.title: François Lurton 2011 Pinot Gris (Mendoza)
properties.address: Mendoza Province, Argentina
properties.description: Hard and like a match on the nose, with sulfur and peach pit aromas. Has a good mouthfeel to support pithy peach and green melon flavors. Finishes creamy, but with a mild bitterness.

properties.title: Haut Marin 2010 Rosé (Côtes de Gascogne)
properties.description: Made from Cabernet Sauvignon, this is a caramel-dominated rosé, the red berry fruit some way behind. It is fresh, with some attractive acidity. Screwcap.

properties.title: Hensley 2009 Hillside Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 29300 AR-300, Roland, AR 72135, USA
properties.description: There's too much of everything in this Cabernet. The fruit is massively extracted and sweetly jammy. The oak is a heavy plaster of sweet caramel. The result is impressive for sheer size, but unbalanced. Unlikely to improve with age.

properties.title: Kumbaya 2010 White (California)
properties.description: The varietal mix of this wine, which is undisclosed on the label, doesn't matter. All you need to know is that it's slightly sweet, soft and simple in citrus, pear and honeysuckle flavors.

properties.title: La di Motte 2010 Pinot Grigio (Venezie)
properties.description: There's a generous, sunny quality to this Italian Pinot Grigio that comes across with ripe aromas of apricot, melon and Golden Delicious apple. There's a fullness to the mouthfeel as well with soft, slightly sweet fruit flavors at the end.

properties.title: Laurier 2009 Chardonnay (Los Carneros)
properties.description: Like a fruit juice drink, with sugary pineapple, mango and orange flavors. The acidity is bright, but this Chardonnay is more like a dessert wine than a dry table wine.

properties.title: Maipe 2011 Rosé of Malbec Rosé (Mendoza)
properties.address: 331 Victory Rd, Winchester, VA 22602, USA
properties.description: Crisp up front, but not overly aromatic or fruity. Feels kind of thick and chewy, with gummy, sweet berry flavors that suggest cherry and plum. Feels a little cloying and cooked on the finish, especially for a young 2011.

properties.title: Santa Sofia 2010  Soave Classico
properties.address: 47018 Santa Sofia, Province of Forlì-Cesena, Italy
properties.description: Simple and bright with clean lines, this easy-drinking Soave Classico offers citrus, white peach and talc powder aromas. Pair it with fried finger foods or spicy Thai spring rolls.

properties.title: Alysian 2009 Westwise Farms Clone 4 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 1337 Grove St STE D, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Tastes overworked and sweetly heavy, with super-extracted pineapple jam, orange tapioca and butterscotch flavors. A heavy hand has been applied here.

properties.title: Carpineto 2010 Valcolomba Vermentino (Maremma)
properties.address: SP 16 Chianti-Valdarno, 50022 Greve FI, Italy
properties.description: Valcolomba is a pure expression of Vermentino from Maremma in southern Italy with ripe aromas of melon, peach and passion fruit. The mouthfeel is smooth, easy and creamy soft.

properties.title: Donovan-Parke 2010 Sauvignon Blanc (California)
properties.description: This is a sugary-sweet Sauvignon Blanc, with the flavor of a pineapple, pear and orange fruit drink. It's a little on the soft side, which accentuates the sweetness.

properties.title: Kirkland Signature 2010 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Grave)
properties.description: You can't beat this price for a Pinot Grigio with natural freshness and pristine aromas of stone fruit and citrus. The nice thing is that it tastes Italian made, and not like many of the commercial, generic Grigios on the market today.

properties.title: Malibu Rocky Oaks 2010 Chardonnay
properties.address: Rocky Oaks Park, 107 Kanan Dume Rd, Malibu, CA 90265, USA
properties.description: This stainless-steel Chardonnay from above Malibu starts out light, tasting of grapefruit and orange, and is fairly crisp with a nice dollop of anise, but finishes too tart, almost sour as if it's been oddly acidified.

properties.title: Morgenhof 2010 Fantail Pinotage Rosé (Stellenbosch)
properties.address: Morgenhof Wine Estate, Klapmuts Road, R44, Stellenbosch, 7600, South Africa
properties.description: A pale salmon color, this rosé shows ripe notes of cocoa-dusted cherry and strawberry alongside sweet citrus oil. Creamy and full in the mouth, it's a richer rosé that can stand up to heartier fare.

properties.title: Napa Creek 2009 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 4054 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: So sweet in pineapples and oranges despite a crisp spine of acidity, it quickly palls, making it hard to take a second sip. But lots of Chardophiles will like it.

properties.title: Pianetta 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon (Monterey)
properties.address: 829 13th St, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Way too sweet for a table wine that's supposed to be dry. Almost like a dessert wine, with sugary cherry and raspberry flavors.

properties.title: Grotta del Sole 2007 Coda di Volpe (Lacryma Christi del Vesuvio)
properties.description: Slightly oxidized aromas of butterscotch and caramel follow mature fruit tones of melon, apricot and yellow peach. The wine is silky and fine on the close.

properties.title: Barton & Guestier 2009 Rosé Red (Côtes de Provence)
properties.description: With some richness, this is a drink-now rosé. The initial fresh fruit has diminished, leaving a rounded, caramel-flavored wine without acidity.

properties.title: Little Stone Vineyard 2009 Sauvignon Blanc (Sonoma County)
properties.description: Watery and a little fizzy, with sugary flavors of oranges, lemons, limes and honey. Will appeal to those who like a slightly sweet wine.

properties.title: Releaf 2009 Made With Organically Grown Grapes Chenin Blanc (Western Cape)
properties.address: 846 NY-14, Penn Yan, NY 14527, USA
properties.description: Medium intense aromas of tangerine citrus and crushed yellow flowers transition to flavors of dried grass, red apple and a touch of mushroom powder. Drink now.

properties.title: Chilensis 2009 Reserva Chardonnay (Maule Valley)
properties.address: Av Vitacura 4380, Vitacura, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: Tropical notes on the nose are as good as it gets; otherwise it smells like air freshener. In the mouth, it's waxy and flat, with bland apple and vanilla flavors. Finishes pithy.

properties.title: Sorrentino 2008 Natì Coda di Volpe (Pompeiano)
properties.address: Follow SorrentinoVini Signs, Via Panoramica, 6, 80042 Boscotrecase NA, Italy
properties.description: This is an interesting, outright strange wine that opens with a full golden color and an aromatic veil of smoke, dust or chalky mineral over exotic fruit and peach. One item out of place is the alcohol, which emerges strong in the mouth.

properties.title: Spadafora 2009 Vigna Fiego Rosé (Donnici)
properties.address: Zona Industriale, 18, 87050 Mangone CS, Italy
properties.description: This rosé blend of Magliocco, Greco Nero and Malvasia from Calabria offers lean intensity and aromas of rose petal and small berry. There's a touch of sour almond as well and the wine is slightly bitter and muddled in the mouth.

properties.title: Chilcas 2009 Single Vineyard Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
properties.description: Generic and monotone on the nose. The palate is nothing more than wet and chunky, while the flavors are soft, sweet and candied, with vanilla and toffee overriding any fruit. A creamy dullard with a lot of vanilla and hardly any pulse.

properties.title: Viu Manent 2010 Secreto de Viu Manent Viognier (Colchagua Valley)
properties.description: Barely noticeable lime and orange aromas sit mute on the nose, which is reduced and artificial smelling. The palate has a hard feel and generic flavors of white fruits. Amid sweetness there's a chemical bitterness. Not one of this winery's better products.

properties.title: Red Pony Ranch 2009 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
properties.description: With loads of oak, pineapple and orange honey flavors, this sweet Chardonnay will appeal to those who like this heavy, over-the-top style.

properties.title: Miguel Torres 2009 Cordillera Reserva Privada Barrel Fermented Chardonnay-Viognier (Chile)
properties.description: Big and gold, with aromas of corn, sweat and vegetal white fruits. This is soft, dull and rich stuff, with an oaky, dry palate of apricot and papaya. Seems over the hill already and it's not yet two years old. 88% Chard and 12% Viognier.

properties.title: Joseph Mellot 2012 Le Montarlet  (Sancerre)
properties.address: Route de Ménétréol, 18300 Sancerre, France
properties.description: One of the more herbaceous Sauvignons in Joseph Mellot's range, this is crisp, leaning to green fruits although with an underlying feeling of ripeness. There is a touch of minerality in the texture, giving the acidity a taut, nervy feeling at the end. Screwcap.

properties.title: Poças 2012 Coroa d'Ouro White (Douro)
properties.address: R. Visc. das Devesas 168, 4401-901 Vila Nova de Gaia, Portugal
properties.description: This ripe wine is full of apple fruits with a tight streak of citrus acidity. It's a food wine, showing a creamy texture, a light texture and attractive acidity.

properties.title: René Sparr 2011 Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 14 Rue de Hoen, 68980 Beblenheim, France
properties.description: The full, rich nature of Alsace Pinot Gris is perfectly—and simply—expressed in this full wine. With its exotic fruits, rounded texture and perfumed spice, it has just an edge of sweetness that turns it into a great wine for Thai or Chinese food. Screwcap.

properties.title: Ribafreixo 2012 Pato Frio Antão Vaz (Alentejo)
properties.address: 7960 Vidigueira, Portugal
properties.description: Pato Frio—cold duck—suggests this a summer picnic wine. It certainly has the freshness and crisp elegance. But it also some weight, ripe apple and citrus fruits and a texture that suggests it could age a few months longer.

properties.title: Sebastiani 2012 Sauvignon Blanc (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 389 4th St E, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.description: This is a good, brisk Sauvignon Blanc whose citrus and tropical fruit, peach and vanilla flavors are delicious. Bright acidity makes it feel clean and zesty.

properties.title: Stoller 2012 Estate Exclusive Riesling (Dundee Hills)
properties.description: Despite the low alcohol, this is quite dry and tart, with a lemony base and some orange-pekoe flavors also. Not a complex Riesling, but light and pleasantly sippable.

properties.title: Domaine Weinbach 2011 Schlossberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
properties.description: This is, quite simply, great Riesling. It has all the subtlety that the grape can produce, as well as a sense of longevity. There's an intensity of fruit—apples and citrus—that cuts through the texture, leaving a beautiful, lingering aftertaste. Still young, drink from 2016.

properties.title: Caldwell 2010 Gold Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Big, rich, and dramatic are just a few words that describe this 100% Cabernet grown on the low-yielding estate vineyard in Coombsville. It's lush with black currants, yet bracing in tannins, with a minerality that makes it feel firm and grounded. The barrels are 100% new French oak, lending a savory level of char and vanilla. This is clearly a wine to cellar for a long time. Start enjoying it in 2018, and it is likely to develop bottle complexity throughout the 2020s.

properties.title: Gramercy 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: This thrilling wine, sourced from the Phinny Hill vineyard in the Horse Heaven Hills, displays all the tense power of great Washington Cabernet Sauvignon. Deep flavors of berry, plum and cassis are threaded with gravelly streaks of tar, coffee and anise. Aged in 40% new French oak, it strikes a perfect balance through a long finish.

properties.title: Domäne Wachau 2012 Achleiten Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
properties.address: Dürnstein 107, 3601 Dürnstein, Austria
