properties.description: Super-tight and not yet willing to charm, this presently gives little more than the heady spritz of ripe lemon peel, but the stony background, concentration on the palate and a haunting, zesty length all point to future reward. Be patient with this and it will repay you thousandfold, with honeyed richness, luscious peach and a strong mineral backbone. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Southard 2010 Whipping Boy Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: Alcohol that reaches these levels is often a complexity killer, but not here. This is a stunningly delicious wine, with ripe, powerful and concentrated black fruits. Baking spices, tar, pencil lead, even a whiff of compost all add to the complexity and the depth of flavor is magnificent. This can age at least a decade but is delicious already!

properties.title: Trimbach 2007 Cuvée Frédéric Emile Riesling (Alsace)
properties.description: One of Trimbach's top wines, this impressive Riesling, with all its bottle time, is maturing beautifully. It has that petrol character that is typical of aged Riesling, as well as a strong sense of steeliness and intense acidity on the finish. It is probably at its peak now, but will drink well until 2018.

properties.title: Domaine Weinbach 2011 Cuvée Laurence Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.description: Laurence Faller is the family winemaker at Domaine Weinbach, and this wine is a tribute to her skills. It is a wonderful blend of rich fruits, warm spice and tight acidity, with a finish that lasts and lasts in the mouth. It is a very fine wine, designed for aging, and would be best enjoyed after 2016.

properties.title: Domaines Schlumberger 2009 Kessler Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 100 rue Theodore Deck, Siège social :, 3 Rue des Cr Populaires, 68500 Guebwiller, France
properties.description: There is both wonderful bite and density to this great wine. It has a weighty texture full of ripe, rich fruit. At the same time, the wine is bone dry and crisp with acidity. It' s just beginning to mature, and while enjoyable now, it's better to wait until 2016.

properties.title: Stone The Crows 2011 Three Twins Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: After a great inaugural 2010 vintage, this is another impressive Cabernet from this winery. The vineyard is in the Pritchard Hill area, and the wine is 95% Cabernet with 5% Petit Verdot. It's a lush wine that's rich in black currant, cocoa and plum flavors, enhanced by smoky oak. The wine shows enormous complexity, with layers of minerals and dried herbs that are hard to describe. It has a long life ahead of it, so drink now–2022, at least.

properties.title: Hunnicutt 2010 9-3-5 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: A worthy followup to the splendid 2008 and 2009 vintages, this 100% Cabernet is a blend of grapes from St. Helena, Rutherford and Oakville. It defines Napa Cabernet with lush, intricate and complex favors of blackberry jam, cassis liqueur, milk chocolate and caramelized oak that finish dry and long. The tannins are refined, but thick. This is a wine for the cellar. Start enjoying it after 2017.

properties.title: René Muré 2010 Clos Saint-Landelin Vorbourg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
properties.description: So intense and concentrated, this wine epitomizes the essence of Riesling. Steely, tight, very nervy and bone dry, it is packed with flavors of citrus, orange zest, grapefruit and green apple skins. The texture of this young wine is beautifully crisp. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Signorello 2010 Padrone Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: This is 100% Cabernet Sauvignon, grown in the winery's estate vineyard, on the east side of Napa Valley. It's awesomely rich and ripe, delivering heady blackberry, blueberry, cassis liqueur, cola and new oak flavors that are as long in the finish as they are deep. With thick tannins, it's clearly a wine you need to cellar. Drink 2016–2020 and beyond.

properties.title: Domaines Schlumberger 2008 Kitterlé Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
properties.description: An astonishing wine, this showchases mature Riesling flavors with abundant fruit, a classic petrol character, and a strong, steely texture. It's structured with tight texture and intense acidity that lingers on the finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Domaine de la Bégude 2010 Red (Bandol)
properties.description: Generous and opulent, this is a wine that has both fine perfume and ripe black-fruit flavors. There is a deliciously juicy element to the wine, yet it's balanced with ample acidity. With its attractive, herbal edge, this is a wine that can age. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Domaine Weinbach 2011 Cuvée Ste Catherine Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.description: Characteristically perfumed, this Pinot Gris is full bodied with a richness of texture. It is complex on the palate with notes of nuts, spice and an edge of citrus fruit. Age this wine and don't drink before 2016.

properties.title: Gramercy 2011 The Third Man Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: Grenache and Syrah are the mainstays here, with a splash of Mourvèdre completing the Third Man blend. For the first time, Uplands contributes some of the fruit. It's immensely fragrant, fruity, peppery and rich with flavors of strawberry, raspberry, cherry and plum. There is nothing simple here; scents and flavors compound and linger, and the more you look, the more you find.

properties.title: Lauren Ashton Cellars 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
properties.description: Don't look for this new producer to remain under the radar for long; this is the third successive vintage featuring beautifully crafted, distinctive wines. The Red Mountain fruit has that region's stony minerality. Immaculate, tart red currant and cherry flavors, still tight and young, are wrapped with lightly toasty notes from barrel aging.

properties.title: Domaine Sorin 2010 Red (Bandol)
properties.address: 1617 Rte de la Cadière, 83270 Saint-Cyr-sur-Mer, France
properties.description: This is a finely perfumed, elegant wine. It has a dark structure with a touch of wood, remarkable fruit concentration and dusty tannins that hang suspended within blackberry flavor. It's a wine with great potential—drink from 2016.

properties.title: Domaine Tempier 2011 La Tourtine Red (Bandol)
properties.description: The initial impression of this wine is lean and austere. Lively acidity and a firm, dark, magnificent structure brings out intense flavors of plum skins. It needs several years in the bottle to show its best. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Domaines Schlumberger 2010 Saering Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
properties.description: This is a perfumed, complex wine that veers between showcasing the freshest fruit flavors and hints of maturity. It's fresh with berry notes and intense with acidity, but rich in texture as well. This is a wine to age much longer, so don't drink before 2017.

properties.title: Domäne Wachau 2012 Kellerberg Smaragd Grüner Veltliner (Wachau)
properties.description: This wine boasts a creamy palate, with aromas of fresh and baked apples that transition to flavors of apple crumble laced with citrus zest. Concentration, precision and lively acidity mean that this will pair well with many fatty foods. It's glorious now, but its acidity means that you can expect pleasant development over the next five years.

properties.title: René Muré 2007 Clos Saint Landelain Vorbourg Grand Cru Vendanges Tardives Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: Clos Saint Landelin, 68250 Rouffach, France
properties.description: Although certainly sweet, this wine is much more than that. Alongside the honey and syrup flavors are intensely bright pineapple flavors and lively acidity. It's the balance of this wine that is so impressive, with all the elements properly in place. Drink now and until 2020.

properties.title: Armida 2014 Durell Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
properties.description: Caramel apple and honeyed, biscuity notes combine, layering richness upon richness in this single vineyard wine. A full-bodied, concentrated expression, its darker elements are complemented by an underlay of Key lime that provides a respite of freshness.

properties.title: Von Strasser 2013 Estate Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
properties.description: Raspberry and cranberry flavors and a twist of cinnamon stick accent the firm tannins of this estate wine, marked by classic red currant, cedar and dried herb notes. Medium-bodied and modest in oak, it shows a clarity of crisp acidity.

properties.title: Yalumba 2015 Made With Organic Grapes Chardonnay (South Australia)
properties.description: This is a medium-bodied, richly textured Chardonnay that deserves a place on any table. Grilled pineapple and peach notes convey ripeness without excessive oak or weight, finishing long and plush. Drink now–2020.

properties.title: Hugel 2014 Cuvée Les Amours Pinot Blanc (Alsace)
properties.address: 3 Rue de la 1E Armée, 68340 Riquewihr, France
properties.description: Crisp notes of freshly peeled pear mingle with a creamier aspect on the nose. The palate is a similarly appetizing and attractive mix of crisp freshness and creamy roundness. The body is very light but clean. The finish shines with fresh lemon.

properties.title: I Veroni 2007  Vin Santo del Chianti Rufina
properties.description: Made of 60% Malvasia, 30% Trebbiano and 10% Sangiovese, this opens with apricot and orange jam aromas. The warm, structured palate delivers toasted almond, chestnut honey and dried fig flavors. Drink through 2025.

properties.title: Katnook Estate 2014 Founder's Block Cabernet Sauvignon (Coonawarra)
properties.description: It's been some time since Katnook last submitted samples, so it's reassuring to see that quality there remains high. This medium-bodied Cabernet boasts crisp acids and fine tannins, highlighting notes of red currants, olives and bay leaves. Drink now–2025.

properties.title: Tournon by Michel Chapoutier 2014 Mathilda White (Victoria)
properties.description: Free of restrictive appellation contrôlée regulations, Chapoutier's Australian team blends 85% Viognier and 15% Marsanne in this intense, concentrated white. Yellow plums and grilled pineapple notes aren't exceeding complex, but offer plenty of enjoyment, finishing ripe, rich and long. Drink now.

properties.title: Acacia 2014 Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.description: This wine shows crisp apple and pear notes over a backdrop of minerality. Its ripe fruit is ribbed with anise, fennel and lemongrass scents.

properties.title: Avancia 2015 Cuveé de O Godello (Valdeorras)
properties.description: Melony floral aromas are friendly and easygoing. On the palate, this is clean and precise, with moderate weight and a touch of oak. Lime and kiwi flavors are a bit sweet, with a welcome oaky offset. On the finish, this Godello fades nicely, with core acidity extending the ride.

properties.title: Boeckel 2014 Zotzenberg Grand Cru Sylvaner (Alsace)
properties.description: This is from Alsace's only Grand Cru vineyard for the Sylvaner grape. The 2014 vintage is not as expressive as usual but still shows the inherent graceful and very fine-boned structure of this underrated variety. Pay attention to the lovely texture and beautiful slenderness.

properties.title: Bonterra 2015 Made With Organic Grapes Chardonnay (Mendocino County)
properties.description: Ripe fruit meets butter and spice in this medium-bodied, smooth and integrated wine. It opens with Bosc pear and golden apple aromas, melding with vanilla and marzipan notes, its richness of flavor nicely buoyed up by acidity.

properties.title: Proidl 2015 Hochäcker Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
properties.address: Oberer Markt 5, 3541 Senftenberg, Austria
properties.description: Fresh citrus has a tang of green apple on the nose. The palate colors this with an equally zesty dollop of grapefruit, but something riper, richer, almost of dried fruit, also swings in there. This is intriguing and fresh, zesty and taut, lip-smacking and moreish. I feel that this will give up its secrets with a little more bottle age, but it already is delicious now.

properties.title: Ramey 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 25 Healdsburg Ave, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Sites from throughout the valley contribute to the lovely layering of this accessible wine, softly structured and classically inspired in its dried herb and distinct purity of cassis. Delicate despite its ripeness and power, it leaves a smoky hint of sweet tobacco on the finish.

properties.title: Loimer 2015 Seeberg Riesling (Kamptal)
properties.description: Fragrant ripe apricot, edged with notions of citrus foliage streams from the glass. The same intriguing flavor combo of ripeness and freshness, aroma and full fruit, makes up the precise and clean palate. The finish is lip-smacking and still veers and shimmers between full-on fruit ripeness and tart zesty citrus.

properties.title: Malat 2015 Höhlgraben Reserve Alte Reben Grüner Veltliner (Kremstal)
properties.address: Hafnerstraße 12, 3511 Palt, Austria
properties.description: Hints of soy and pepper color the generously ripe notions of yellow pear and red apple on the nose. The palate reinforces the spiciness with more shimmering white pepper and the ripeness with extra juiciness. This is rounded but fresh, and just so full of sunny friendly fruit. The appetizing and moreish finish returns to that initial soy-like spice.

properties.title: Allram 2015 Gaisberg Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.address: Herrengasse 3, 3491 Straß im Straßertale, Austria
properties.description: The very gentle but seductive notion of sun-ripened red-cheeked mirabelle plums radiates like sunshine from the glass. With a further sniff there also is peppery greenery: yarrow and hay. The palate also unites this friendly fruit with the savory spice of these herbs and comes in a light-footed, compact and fresh package that just dances on the tongue. This is deceptively frivolous Grüner with a seriously delicious concentrated core.

properties.title: Allram 2015 Renner Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.description: The lifted nose promises purity, which the palate follows thorough on, with the gentle fruit of ripe pear and mirabelle plum and the softer freshness of ripe lemon. There is just a smattering of white pepper. All is held with great poise and freshness, and there is something utterly clean and pure about this.

properties.title: Anton Bauer 2015 Grande Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Wagram)
properties.description: Soft vanilla hints of oak creep into the mossy aromatic hints of green and yellow pear. There also is a generous core of ripe fruit, almost reminiscent of lychee. While this is fresh with citrus, the deep mellowness and gliding fluidity of the palate will win you over. The finish is clean and lasting.

properties.title: Bründlmayer 2015 Alte Reben Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.description: Funky yeast still holds sway on the nose. Underneath that are notions of ripe juicy pear and a soft hint of vanilla. The palate strikes a sonorous balance between smoky vanilla and gently peppered pears. There is concentration and promise. The finish is nutty and very long. This is still tightly closed and needs to unfurl, but will become a great gastronomic wine. Drink 2019–2025.

properties.title: Schramsberg 2011 Methode Traditionelle Brut Sparkling (Carneros)
properties.address: 1400 Schramsberg Rd, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.description: This sparkler was made from a majority of Chardonnay with a seasoning of Pinot Noir, the grapes grown at Hyde Vineyard, among other sites within the appellation. A doughy, tart wine, it brightly expresses green apple, orange, grapefruit and a more developed creaminess of biscotti, delighting in a persistence of lemon zest.

properties.title: Te Mata 2013 Cape Crest Sauvignon Blanc (Hawke's Bay)
properties.address: 349 Te Mata Road, Parkvale, Havelock North 4294, New Zealand
properties.description: This has come to epitomize the Hawke's Bay style of Sauvignon Blanc, typical in it's ripe fruit and oak treatment. Hints of vanilla and cedar frame passion fruit and pink grapefruit notes, then leave a lingering impression of Creamsicle behind on the silky-textured finish.

properties.title: Hiedler 2015 Ried Kittmannsberg Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.description: Lovely and generous notes of juicy ripe pear are most inviting on the nose. The concentrated punchy palate cuts in with welcome lemon zestiness and that wonderful Grüner spiciness of freshly milled white pepper. The lovely texture of the midpalate, combined with that lemony verve, is totally disarming.

properties.title: J. Lohr 2014 Hilltop Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.description: This appealing wine is widely available. Blueberry, vanilla cream and gingerbread make for an inviting nose. The palate packs layers of intriguing, ripe and easily lovable flavors: baked strawberries, vanilla ice cream, blueberry sauce and baking spice.

properties.title: Baileyana 2014 Firepeak Chardonnay (Edna Valley)
properties.address: 5828 Orcutt Rd, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.description: Burgundy-raised vintner Christian Roguenant gets to show his stuff in this line of Firepeak wines. Wet cement, honeysuckle, crisp Asian pear and the slightest hints of tropicality show on the nose, while the palate offers yellow grapefruit, lemon skins, squeezed lime and lime-blossom flavors, wrapped around nervy tension.

properties.title: Bründlmayer 2015 Vincents Spiegel Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.description: A haze of hazelnut and wood smoke envelopes the poised concentrated lemon and green-pear fruit on the palate. There is incisive freshness and a concentrated core with a downright lip-smacking finish. It would be a waste to drink this now when everything about this bundled, energetic wine still needs to unfurl. Give this time. Drink 2020–2030.

properties.title: Ebner-Ebenauer 2015 Bürsting Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Laaer Str. 5, 2170 Poysdorf, Austria
properties.description: Rich notes of yeast on the nose promise a rounded wine, while on the palate they become even more pronounced and deliver a big hit of lasting umami flavors. Here and there white pepper pokes through with its freshness supported by leavening citrus notes. This is powerful stuff: Handle with care and pair with food that is both subtle and robust—just like the wine.

properties.title: Liberated 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (North Coast)
properties.description: This is a dense yet dry wine, with a ripe blackberry jam aroma and flavor. Firm tannins give it pleasant grip; splashing it into a decanter will open it up.

properties.title: Michele Chiarlo 2015  Moscato d'Asti
properties.address: Strada Nizza-Canelli, 99, 14042 Calamandrana AT, Italy
properties.description: This fragrant, foaming dessert wine opens with aromas of yellow stone fruit, chopped herb and a floral note of jasmine. The rich, bright palate doles out apricot, yellow peach, grilled sage and candied nectarine zest alongside a delicate mousse and fresh acidity.

properties.title: 12 Linajes 2015 Verdejo (Rueda)
properties.description: This Verdejo hits the sweet spot, with a crisp nose focused on green-apple aromas. The palate has a free-flowing feel and well-presented flavors of apple, peach and melon. An easy-fading finish ends this well.

properties.title: Caves Transmontanas 2007 Vértice Gouveio (Douro)
properties.address: R. de São Domingos 22, 5070 Alijó, Portugal
properties.description: Wood fermentation has give this 85% Gouveio and 15% Rabigato wine a smooth character. That contrasts with the background fruitiness and tightly crisp acidity. The green fruits bring out a mineral texture as well as adding a fine zest to the aftertaste.

properties.title: Vollereaux 2009 Brut Tradition Millésime  (Champagne)
properties.address: 48 Rue Léon Bourgeois, 51530 Pierry, France
properties.description: This is a rich wine that's full of crisp fruit notes, with a touch of minerality. Ripe yellow fruits and melon come to the fore, balanced by the attractive acidity and tangy aftertaste. It is ready to drink.

properties.title: Bellavista 2009 Pas Operé Extra Brut Sparkling (Franciacorta)
properties.description: Aromas of mature Golden Delicious apple, honey, walnut and bread crust lead the nose. The concentrated palate offers extremely ripe yellow apple, citrus zest, toast and bitter walnut alongside a vibrant, persistent perlage.

properties.title: Bellavista 2010 La Scala Brut Sparkling (Franciacorta)
properties.description: Aromas of toasted nut, oak and ripe citrus lead the nose. The soft palate offers mature yellow apple, candied lemon zest, roasted hazelnut and a hint of pastry cream alongside an airy perlage.

properties.title: Black Stallion 2014 Poseidon Vineyard Limited Release Chardonnay (Los Carneros)
properties.description: From a well-known vineyard in the heart of the appellation, this full-bodied, fulsome wine opens in a blur of buttercream and butter, before allowing for concentrated seasonings of ginger, nutmeg and preserved lemon to appear. Let it open for the full effect.

properties.title: Castello Bonomi 2009 Cru Perdu Sparkling (Franciacorta)
properties.description: A blend of 70% Chardonnay and 30% Pinot Nero, this offers aromas of white stone fruit and toasted bread crust. The palate delivers mature Golden Delicious apple, hazelnut and a hint of candied tangerine. A refined perlage provides the backdrop.

properties.title: Vicente Faria Vinhos 2016 Animus Branco White (Vinho Verde)
properties.description: This crisply fruity wine is primarily composed of the local Loureiro grape. It is light, bright, dry and full of citrus flavors. Drink now.

properties.title: Zorzal 2015 Eggo Blanc de Cal Sauvignon Blanc (Tupungato)
properties.description: Crisp grapefruit and celery aromas set up a round palate with a pulpy texture. Flavors of scallion, citrus peel and grape skins finish citrusy on one hand and pyrazinic on the other. Possibly of interest, this was fermented and aged in egg-shaped concrete tanks.

properties.title: Blanchard & Lurton 2014 Gran Vin White (Vista Flores)
properties.description: Mild white-fruit aromas come with overt oak scents. A theme of heavy oak is continued on this barrel-driven blend of Tocai, Viognier, Pinot Gris and Chardonnay. Woody flavors outweigh milder spiced apple notes, while this remains oak-dominated on the finish.

properties.title: Broadway Vineyards 2014 Estate Grown Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.description: This wine is full bodied and rich on the palate, with a woody reminder of oak. Spicy apple notes are lifted by spritzy acidity.

properties.title: J. Lohr 2015 Gesture Viognier (Paso Robles)
properties.description: Round and ripe frangipani, jasmine, honeysuckle and white peach aromas contribute to the pretty nose of this bottling, even though they feel as confected as bubblegum. There is a vibrant energy to the palate, which is rich in poached pear, baked apple, dried ginger and caramel flavors. Over the top but pleasant.

properties.title: Jean-Luc Colombo 2015 La Redonne White (Côtes du Rhône)
properties.address: 10 Rue des Violettes, 07130 Cornas, France
properties.description: This wine blends 70% Viognier with 30% Roussanne, so it shows some of the flamboyant apricot fruit of the former, and some of the medium-bodied structure of the latter. It's clean and correct, with a bit of citrus on the finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Mulderbosch 2016 Chenin Blanc (Western Cape)
properties.description: There's a prevailing nuttiness to the nose and mouth of this Chenin, with assertive tones of toasted hazelnut and straw throughout. Flavors of honeydew and baked apple unfold on the medium-weight palate, ending on a spiced orange-cream note. Drink now–2018.

properties.title: Opta 2015 White (Dão)
properties.description: This wine is delicious, citrus- and yellow fruit-flavored, crisp and intensely fruity. With layers of acidity, a zesty texture and a bright aftertaste, it's already ready to drink.

properties.title: Pierre Gruber 2015  Mâcon-Villages
properties.description: This feels fittingly warm for a southern Burgundy wine. It's ripe with yellow fruit, a soft texture, attractive acidity and a crisp aftertaste. Drink now.

properties.title: Provenance Vineyards 2015 Estate Grown Sauvignon Blanc (Rutherford)
properties.description: This wine is full bodied, lush and oaky, with a generosity on the midpalate that speaks to a ripe vintage. Lemon-lime flavors and high acidity give way to a creaminess of tropical fruit and girth.

properties.title: Chakana 2016 Maipe Torrontés (Mendoza)
properties.description: This is an aromatic floral Torrontés with hints of air freshener and bath oil on the nose. A palate with zesty acidity frames crisp flavors of citrus pulp and peel. A racy finish tastes of lime before showing patented varietal bitterness.

properties.title: Château Bélingard 2015 Bélingard White (Bergerac Sec)
properties.description: This is a classic Bordeaux-style white wine with its cool herbal character and light perfume from the Muscadelle in the blend. The wine has no oak aging, just ripe fruit that has citrus, pineapple and green fruit flavors. Drink now.

properties.title: Corte Mainente 2015 Cengelle  (Soave)
properties.description: Aromas of lemon, white flower and white stone fruit lead the nose while the bright, juicy bright palate offers pear, peach and nectarine zest. A note of white almond caps off the finish.

properties.title: Derby 2013 Derby Vineyard Albariño (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 525 Riverside Ave, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Hazelnut, candle wax, dried apple and nectarine aromas show on the nose of this rich and nutty bottling. Similar flavors show on the palate, including dried apples, Meyer lemon, and a honeyed character that lasts into the finish.

properties.title: Estancia 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 980 Bryant Canyon Rd, Soledad, CA 93960, USA
properties.description: Slightly shy dark fruit, spice and gravel aromas show on the nose of this affordably priced bottling. Cranberry, dried herb and mineral flavors are apparent on the palate, which finishes on a fruit punch note.

properties.title: Estancia 2015 Sauvignon Blanc (Monterey County)
properties.description: Easygoing wet cement, kiwi and nectarine aromas make for a standard but pleasing Sauvignon Blanc experience with this bottling. There is interesting grip to the palate, which pulls its flavors—apple, lime and bitter orange—forward.

properties.title: Excelsior 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (Robertson)
properties.address: South Africa
properties.description: Tight, nervy aromas of lime peel, green plum and gooseberry are hit with hints of grass and fresh herbs. The lightweight, sprightly palate boasts a fresh lemon-lime flavor and refreshing acidity that results in an extremely mouthwatering finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Barnstormer 2015 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.description: Zippy acidity drives this dry medium-bodied Riesling. Its fresh green-apple and lime flavors are delicate in concentration but refreshingly crisp. Drink now through 2020.

properties.title: Fairvalley 2015 Sauvignon Blanc (Western Cape)
properties.description: Soft, waxy apple skin, verbena and lime leaf aromas unfold on the nose and carry through to the medium-minus-weight palate. This is well-balanced and easy to enjoy, with medium acidity and a hay accent on the finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Judge Palmer 2015 Ellis Alden Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Alexander Valley)
properties.description: Tropical pineapple and guava flavors are restrained and balanced in this bright, soft and seductively smooth vineyard designate. Its high-toned acidity delivers stone and lemon peel characteristics, finding more citrus-tinged focus on the finish.

properties.title: Kevin White 2015 Red (Yakima Valley)
properties.description: A blend of 44% Syrah, 31% Grenache and 25 Mourvèdre, this wine is aromatically very pure, with plenty of red and blue fruit, speckled with bay leaf, herb and black-pepper accents. It possesses a thrilling plush mouthfeel, with olive and black-fruit flavors, showing a fine sense of purity.

properties.title: Leindl 2013 Seeberg Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.description: Ripe stone fruit notes, especially aromatic Mirabelle plum, rise from the glass, alongside more evolved chamomile tisane scents. With its slight bottle age, this shows where evolution can lead Grüner Veltliner. The palate retains its zesty, salty savoriness yet is wonderfully concentrated. Juicy Mirabelle reappears on the long, savory finish.

properties.title: Lone Madrone 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (York Mountain)
properties.description: York Mountain actually predates Paso Robles as an appellation, so it's great to see Neil Collins making such excellent wine from its nearly forgotten western slopes. This bottling shows stewed blackberry, balsamic fig, licorice spice and purple flower touches on the nose. The well-integrated palate uses sprightly acidity to deliver blackberry and blueberry flavors, with thyme, nettle, dill and graphite accents.

properties.title: Mirabeau 2016 Etoile Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: 5 Cr Gambetta, 83570 Cotignac, France
properties.description: This is a new wine designed to be a “grown-up rosé” from the Cronk family who moved from London to Provence in 2009. It is a ripe fruity and rich blend of Grenache and Syrah. Weight as well as contrasting acidity give a structured character that balances well with the intense fruitiness. Drink the wine from late 2017.

properties.title: Sbragia 2013 Neal Cabernet Sauvignon (Howell Mountain)
properties.description: Another of the producer's mountain reds, this features rough-hewn tannin that grips the palate with tenacity and power, yielding to show juicy acidity and fully realized cedar, dusty cranberry and cassis flavors.

properties.title: Sohm & Kracher 2013 St. Georg Grüner Veltliner (Burgenland)
properties.description: Rich and developed dried pear and apricot notes stream from the nose of this wine, signifying its evolution. The palate is dry but rich with fruit and an emollient sense of vanilla spice. This is structured and bold, holding ample power within its broad shoulders and plenty of length on the finish. Pair with an equally potent dish or cellar and drink through 2020.

properties.title: Testarossa 2015 Brosseau Vineyard Chardonnay (Chalone)
properties.address: 300 College Ave, Los Gatos, CA 95030, USA
properties.description: Winemaker Bill Brosseau tapped into his family's vineyard to produce this light and delicate wine. Its aromas suggest white flowers, key lime and chalk, while its flavors are high-toned and tight, recalling chilled pear, lime and pomelo pith. A graphite-like minerality adds complexity.

properties.title: Vineyard 36 2013 Thirty Six Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: This 100% varietal wine shines with high-toned red currant and raspberry flavors, exhibiting bright acidity on the moderately built palate. Tight-grained tannin provides structure, balancing the emphatic fruit.

properties.title: Waters 2016 Patina Vineyard Rosé (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.description: This rare single-vineyard rosé is all Syrah. Pale peach in color, it brings aromas of blood orange and strawberry that are followed by a textured lively palate with an extended finish. It's one of the best rosés the state has produced to date.

properties.title: Wieninger 2016 Vienna Hills Grüner Veltliner (Vienna)
properties.address: Stammersdorfer Str. 31, 1210 Wien, Austria
properties.description: There's an exotic edge to the nose of this wine, suggesting juicy, ripe mango and passion fruit. The palate is zesty and fresh and still rings with yeasty savor. It's slender yet concentrated and has a lasting flavor that encompasses yeasty richness and citrus tones. Lip-smackingly refreshing.

properties.title: Bernard Magrez 2016 Excellence des Muraires Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.description: Almost white in color, this is a rich wine with intense red-currant and raspberry fruits. It is a dry wine, destined to partner food, with fine acidity as well as a herbal edge. It is a concentrated wine, ready to drink from the end of 2017.

properties.title: Château de Gayon 2009 Gouttes de Soleil  (Pacherenc du Vic Bilh)
properties.description: This is a golden, mature and sweet wine that comes from the white wine appellation of the Madiran region. It balances ripe apricot and honey with intense acidity to create a beautiful wine. The zesty marmalade and final crispness are delicious. Drink now.

properties.title: Château Sainte Marguerite 2016 Fantastique Rosé (Côtes de Provence La Londe)
properties.address: 381 Rte de Valcros, 83250 La Londe-les-Maures, France
properties.description: This is the top wine from the Jean-Pierre Fayard family Provence cru classé estate. It is full of ripe red fruits supported by a mineral texture. The wine is generous, bone dry but packed with great fruitiness and finished with refreshing acidity. This sophisticated wine could do with a few more months, so drink from late 2017.

properties.title: Frostwatch 2014 Ophira Chardonnay (Bennett Valley)
properties.description: Fennel, oak, apple and pear notes blend together in this full-bodied wine with robust structure and richness. Crème brûlée flavors join ginger and nutmeg elements, as the acidity refreshes and rewards.

properties.title: Portalupi 2016 Las Brisas Vineyard Vermentino (Carneros)
properties.description: Grassy, floral and herbal, this nice white comes from a well-regarded site devoted to the variety. Melon and fuzzy peach flavors highlight its dry, diluted palate, with moderate acidity.

properties.title: Shooting Star 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Lake County)
properties.description: This well-balanced, flavorful and medium-bodied wine will pair nicely with many different meat, poultry and pasta dishes without distracting from the food. It smells lightly spicy, tastes like raspberries and red cherries and has light tannins that add some needed grip.

properties.title: Amalaya 2016 Esperanza Por Un Milagro White (Salta)
properties.description: Terpenes and other gritty aromas control a nose that's fresh but short on fruit. This blend of 85% Torrontés and 15% Riesling is made more vital by angular citric acidity. Mildly pyrazinic green flavors are offset by passion fruit and lychee notes prior to a crisp, racy finish.

properties.title: Bonny Doon 2014 Pinot Doonier Sparkling (California)
properties.description: This dark red sparkling wine made from Pinot Noir and Pinot Meunier smells like Dr. Pepper, has lively bubbles and leaves a dry, very fruity impression on the palate. Dark cherry and ripe plum flavors dominate.

properties.title: Brancher 2016 Extra Dry  (Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)
properties.description: Aromas of spring wildflower and white stone fruit lead the nose while the foaming, off-dry palate doles out creamy yellow pear and candied citrus peel. Bright acidity lifts the rich flavors.

properties.title: Broadside 2015 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.description: Bright red plum fruit is underscored by strong herbal aromas in this widely available bottling. It's fruity on the palate, with a green pepper edge that grows minty as it approaches the finish. A great, refreshing style of Cabernet for barbecues.

properties.title: Declaration 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: With its compelling label art, this wine offers intense ripeness and lingering vanilla- and cola-like sweetness. Softly textured, it's unfussy in its expression of baked cherry and blackberry fruit.

properties.title: Grey's Peak 2016 Barrel Fermented Sauvignon Blanc (Waipara Valley)
properties.address: 376 Omihi Road, Waipara 7483, New Zealand
properties.description: This is a ripe, oaky wine from Waipara, just north of Christchurch on New Zealand's South Island. Pineapple, mango and honey characters dominate on the nose. The palate is rich and on the flabby side, the oak overpowering much of the fruit, but those who like their powerfully oaked whites will dig this version.

properties.title: Leonard Kreusch 2016 Bernkasteler Kurfürstlay Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: Deeply earthy and savory tones juxtapose sunny peach and apricot in this feather-light, off-dry wine. Brisk texture and spine tingling acidity are thirst quenching and fresh. Drink now.

properties.title: Luna 2015 Reserve Estate Pinot Grigio (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2921 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Lush texture meets crisp acidity in this full-figured exploration of ripe peach and pear. Nutty and quietly floral, it ends in a voluptuous finish of smoky spice.

properties.title: Mark Ryan 2014 Lonely Heart Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
properties.description: This 100% varietal wine is a blend of fruit from Ciel du Cheval and Obelisco vineyards. Aromatically expressive, it boasts directly appealing notes of black plum, cassis, violets and dark spice, with the fruit very primary. The black-fruit flavors coat the palate from end to end and bring a compelling mouthfeel. The tannins are there but are beautifully integrated. It will be best from 2022–2030.

properties.title: Pietradolce 2016 Rosato (Etna)
properties.description: Made with 100% Nerello Mascalese, this crisp savory rosato boasts aromas and flavors of red cherry, crushed strawberry, baking spice and juicy tangerine. A flinty mineral note lingers on the bright finish.

properties.title: Robert Weil 2015 Trocken Riesling (Rheingau)
properties.description: Whiffs of white peach and yellow cherry intensify on the palate of this punchy, concentrated dry Riesling. It's buoyantly juicy and fruity, full of fresh stone fruit and citrus flavors. Vibrant acidity and deep veins of crushed slate lend refreshment to a long finish. It's an exceptionally balanced wine at a bargain price.

properties.title: Seufert 2015 Yamhill Vineyard Pinot Blanc
properties.description: This pure varietal effort includes 20% that was barrel fermented. This is flat-out delicious and overflowing with ripe fruits: a pleasing blend of oranges, peaches and papayas. It's rich enough to stand in for your favorite Chardonnay, while offering flavors that more closely resemble a New World take on a white Rhône blend.

properties.title: Sidebar 2015 Ritchie Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: Finding wine from this vineyard site at this price is unheard of and reason enough to jump on this bottling. It also happens to taste great—a combination of melon and preserved lemon flavor, with spicy acidity and a lift of grapefruit peel and wet stone that keeps it exotic.

properties.title: Silver Stag 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 5260 Country Ln, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Blended with small amounts of Petit Verdot and Cabernet Franc, this lovely, earthy and herbal wine is lightly spiced with clove and pepper notes. Fresh with forest-like scents, it hails from Coombsville beneath Mount George.

properties.title: Vinum 2015 Chenin Blanc (Clarksburg)
properties.description: This exciting, refreshing, superbly balanced wine has crisp green apple aromas and lively, almost electric lemon, lime and cucumber flavors. It's a great choice for lunch or with an appetizer course, since it's sure to get the conversation—as well as the appetite—going.

properties.title: Canvasback 2014 Grand Passage Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
properties.description: The aromas are quite wound up at present, with notes of vanilla, Moroccan spice, woodspice, pencil lead and brooding dark fruit. The palate is full of concentrated black cherry and blackberry flavors along with well-integrated tannins. It shows some pleasing subtleties, so give it time to open up.

properties.title: Casa da Torre 2013 Quinta do Cruzeiro Reserva White (Vinho Verde)
properties.description: Aged on its lees for 10 months after harvest, the wine has a rich character that also shows in the light gold color. There is a nutty toasty character to this wine that gives it extra complexity and richness. Drink this impressive wine now

properties.title: Château d'Alix 2016  Pessac-Léognan
properties.description: This 40-acre estate in Pessac-Léognan has produced a spicy, wood-aged wine from 100% Sauvignon Blanc. The wine has a tang while also having concentration, a touch of toast and a floral aftertaste. It will age for a few years, and be ready from 2019.

properties.title: Domaine Pichot 2015 Coteau de la Biche Sec  (Vouvray)
properties.address: 70 Rue de la Vall. de Nouy, 37210 Vouvray, France
properties.description: This dry wine shows hints of honey as well as pure sliced apple and white stone fruits. It is deliciously crisp, bright with acidity, almonds and a tangy texture. The wine is totally ready to drink in its fruity youth.

properties.title: Foley 2014 T Anchor Ranch Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 6121 East, CA-246, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.description: Tight and wound up on the nose, this bottling shows lime blossom and tangerine skin aromas with laser-sharp focus. Tangerine, sea salt and lime flavors show on the palate, where flinty minerality accents all that lush citrus.

properties.title: Goodfellow 2014 Richard's Cuvée Whistling Ridge Vineyard Chardonnay (Ribbon Ridge)
properties.address: 888 NE 8th St, McMinnville, OR 97128, USA
properties.description: This reserve-level cuvée is the star of Goodfellow's Chardonnay lineup in 2014. Toasty, sleek and stylish, it deftly skirts the border of stone and tropical fruits, melding the best of both. Buttered-nut flavors coat the lingering finish. In short, here is a textbook example of Oregon Chardonnay.

properties.title: Henri Bourgeois 2014 La Demoiselle des Bourgeois  (Pouilly-Fumé)
properties.address: 3535 Guerneville Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.description: From vineyards owned by the producer just across the river from its home base in Sancerre, this wine has the rich intensity that is proper to a Pouilly Fumé. It has bold ripe fruits and a toasty edge along with a strong minerality from the flinty soil. Drink this wine from 2018.

properties.title: Testarossa 2014 Diana's Chardonnay (California)
properties.address: 300 College Ave, Los Gatos, CA 95030, USA
properties.description: The winery's best-barrel bottling of Chardonnay, this excels on all fronts, showing lemon peels, browned butter, creamy lily and pan-seared apples on the light, crisp yet savory nose. The mouthfeel is rich but decorated with zesty line of salty acidity that cuts through the lemon-curd flavors. Altogether mouthwatering, it's perfect for a seaside meal.

properties.title: Galerie 2013 Pleinair Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 12557 Steiner Rd, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.description: A reduction of tar and meaty leather at first overrides elusive fruit in this 100% varietal wine. It's alluring nonetheless, for its soft tannins and toasted hits of oak. Currant, clove and tobacco give a savory, compelling and complex edge to the full-bodied frame.

properties.title: Josmeyer 2014 Le Dragon Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: Dégustation uniquement sur RDV, 76 Rue Clemenceau, 68920 Wintzenheim, France
properties.description: Aromatic notions suggest Bosc pear, the ripe peel of Navel oranges, the crunch of apple—all conveying perfect ripeness countered with freshness. This wine is refreshing and full fruited and yet rounded. It's a harmoniously balanced, dry wine of total freshness.

properties.title: Myka 2013 Côtes du Cruz Red (Santa Cruz Mountains)
properties.address: 3405 Carson Ct, Placerville, CA 95667, USA
properties.description: An impressive, cool-climate take on a Rhône blend, this mix of 60% Syrah, 25% Grenache and 15% Mourvèdre shows fresh boysenberry, black pepper, crushed lavender and potpourri on the fresh nose. Lots of lively energy lands on the palate, where more pepper and purple fruits are enhanced by dried fennel, crushed marjoram, tarragon and layers of sharp yet savory flavor.

properties.title: B Cellars 2013 Blend 23 White (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 703 Oakville Cross Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: This is an unusual blend of 55% Sauvignon Blanc, 39% Chardonnay and 6% Viognier from a selection of fine vineyard sites, including Maldonado. Baked pineapple, mango, anise and lemongrass ride along tightly grained texture and a tension of acidity, finding a manageable weight of viscosity on the finish.

properties.title: Boekenoogen 2013 Bell Ranch Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Monterey)
properties.address: 24 W Carmel Valley Rd, Carmel Valley, CA 93924, USA
properties.description: Dark in the glass, this bottling from deep in the Carmel Valley shows black currant, espresso, slate and dense violets on the nose. The solidly thick structure makes for a luxurious mouthfeel, a great format to enjoy prominent flavors of blueberry, blackberry, pepper, cedar and crushed coffee beans.

properties.title: Chappellet 2013 Signature Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1581 Sage Canyon Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: This lovely wine offers classic elements of cedar and tar built around a medium-bodied weight of soft, complex texture. Smoky oak never detracts from the layering of black licorice and blackberry that builds as it goes, this wine defined most by its substantial length.

properties.title: Domaine Zind-Humbrecht 2014 Roche Calcaire Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 2 Rte de Colmar, 68230 Turckheim, France
properties.description: The perfumed scent of ripe, red-cheeked Mirabelle plums is joined by some lovely bitter notes of fir honey. The palate shows the typical 2014 freshness, adding passion fruit, pear peel, honeycomb and grapefruit pith to this aromatic tableau. In between, seams of pepper and honeysuckle are highlighted by bright, zesty acidity. The wine offers an irresistible contradiction of structure and enthusiasm.

properties.title: Walt 2014 La Brisa Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 380 1st St W, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.description: Rich sugar-apple and pear tart provide warmth and decadence to this wine. Despite its voluptuous nature, the wine is also layered and complex in intriguingly satisfying ways. A touch of ripe peach and salty pretzel figure into the mix quietly, yet harmoniously.

properties.title: Testarossa 2014 Lone Oak Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 300 College Ave, Los Gatos, CA 95030, USA
properties.description: Apple cream, squeezed tangerine and a touch of popcorn make for nice, easy and yet layered aromas on the nose of this bottling by the Los Gatos-based single-vineyard-focused winery. Flavors of Gravenstein apples, browned butter and toast pop on the palate, where an intriguing flinty character pushes this into another level.

properties.title: Château Jolys 2013 Cuvée Jean  (Jurançon)
properties.address: 330 Rte de la Chapelle de Rousse, 64290 Gan, France
properties.description: Apricot and mango aromas give this wine an immediate opulence. It is ripe and honeyed although with the enormous, age-worthy acidity and flavors of pineapple and passion fruit. The wine is still so young and should not be drunk before 2019.

properties.title: Dachshund 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
properties.address: 610 Perrineville Rd, Hightstown, NJ 08520, USA
properties.description: Full bodied, and firm textured, this wine emphasizes complexity and mouthfeel over simple fruitiness. It smells like ripe plums, tastes like cardamom and black cherry, and shows good balance between flavors, acidity and body.

properties.title: Maximin Grünhäuser 2014 Trocken Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Maximin Grünhaus 1, 54318 Mertesdorf, Germany
properties.description: Dusty saffron, earth and bitter minerals lend a savory tone to this otherwise appley, lime-inflected dry Riesling. It's crisp and sheer on the palate but the finish is bold with a steely, cool resonance. Drink now through 2019.

properties.title: Quinta da Lagoalva de Cima 2015 Lagoalva Rosé (Tejo)
properties.address: Quinta Lagoalva De Cima, 2090-222 Alpiarça, Portugal
properties.description: A blend of Syrah and Touriga Nacional, this is a dry wine that is just crisp, light fruit. Dominant red berry flavors are smooth, without any tannins and only the lightest texture. From its pale color to its soft fruit, this is a delicious modern rosé.

properties.title: Quintas de Melgaço 2015 QM Lagar Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)
properties.address: Ferreiros de Cima, 4960-010, Portugal
properties.description: A ripe young wine, this has rich apricot and apple flavors. It has concentration as well as a crisp, mineral texture. The wine comes from the heartland of Alvarinho in the far north of Portugal, across the river Minho from the Albariño Spanish vineyards. The wine should be aged and drunk from 2017.

properties.title: Reaper 2014 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 8546 Pete Wiles Rd, Middletown, MD 21769, USA
properties.description: Crisp upon entry, this wine evolves into a thicker, richer style of texture and ripe flavor, with a depth of caramel streaking through baked apple and pear compote with a medley of melon. It satisfies in its full-bodied generosity.

properties.title: Rodney Strong 2014 Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 11455 Old Redwood Hwy, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: This well-made, widely distributed wine will serve a range of purposes and palates. Spiky acidity meets a muddle of apple, caramel and baked overtones of pineapple seasoned in nutmeg. Medium-bodied and food-friendly, it offers a long finish.

properties.title: Rutherford Hill 2013 Limited Release Chardonnay (Carneros-Napa Valley)
properties.address: 200 Rutherford Hill Rd, Rutherford, CA 94573, USA
properties.description: Sour apple and fennel characterize this wine upon entry. These follow through on the nose and palate around a concentrated core of golden honey and lemony acidity.

properties.title: San Simeon 2014 Estate Reserve Viognier (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 442 Slo San Simeon Rd, San Simeon, CA 93452, USA
properties.description: Sprightly lime and peach aromas mix with seared orange rind and hints of white flowers on the nose of this bottling. The riper aromas tighten up on the sip, where tart green apples cut the suave nectarine-flesh flavors as white peach slowly emerges.

properties.title: La Follette 2013 Sangiacomo Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 409A Healdsburg Ave, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: This youthful wine might just be holding some of its nuances back, but for now it's singularly minded in caramel and toffee with a baked-apple pie vibe, wrapped in generous oak.

properties.title: Clinton 2013 Victory White Seyval Blanc (Hudson River Region)
properties.address: 115 Cow Hill Rd, Clinton, CT 06413, USA
properties.description: While pressed apple notes seem savory on the nose, the palate of this dry Seyval Blanc is surprisingly fresh boasting a delicate honeydew flavor. There's not a lot of concentration or power, but it's pleasant and crisp, with lingering lemon-lime acidity.

properties.title: Domaine Rieflé-Landmann 2012 Rieflé Bihl Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 7 Rue du Drotfeld, 68250 Pfaffenheim, France
properties.description: This is a single-vineyard wine from Pfaffenheim. Giving a touch of spice as well as delicate acidity, it's light, bright and fruity. Crisp right through and attractively perfumed, it is ready to drink now.

properties.title: La Merika 2013 Pinot Grigio (Monterey)
properties.address: 233 Adobe Canyon Rd, Kenwood, CA 95452, USA
properties.description: The nose is weak, with just slight pear and fleeting wet rocks, and the flavors aren't powerful either: apples, pears, lime pith and barely ripe peach. It's an easy-to-drink summer wine, good with a crab louie.

properties.title: Robert Klingenfus 2013 Orfèvre en Arôme Signature Pinot Blanc (Alsace)
properties.address: 60 Rue de Saverne, 67120 Molsheim, France
properties.description: Fresh and crisp, this citrusy wine is bright with lemon and young green fruit flavors. The palate is light with a hint of spice. Wait until mid-2015 to let the extreme youth mature.

properties.title: Santa Alicia 2013 Reserva Espiritu de Los Andes Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Circunvalación Máximo Valdés 4135, Pirque, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: Mint and oak aromas mingle with berry tones on the nose. Upon entrance the wine feels flabby, however after a few seconds the juicy acidity kicks in. Flavors of underripe berry and olive dominate the palate, with a slightly oaky finish.

properties.title: Veo 2013 Grande Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: 6770 Greenville Ave, Dallas, TX 75231, USA
properties.description: Rubber aromas pervade on the nose. A grippy tannins dominate resin notes of wood and spice over a hint of fruit. A slightly herbaceous finish brings this wine home.

properties.title: Veramonte 2014 Sauvignon Blanc (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.description: Earth and matchstick define the nose of this easygoing wine. The palate is quiet, with low-intensity flavors of passion fruit and citrus that finish mildly pithy.

properties.title: Vieil Armand 2013 Tradition Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: WUENHEIM FR, 1 Rte de Cernay, 68360 Soultz-Haut-Rhin, France
properties.description: Lemon and summer flower aromas set the scene for this fresh and attractive wine. It is light and bright, dry while also fruity. Acidity and a crisp texture give it a lively aftertaste.

properties.title: Viña San Vicente 2013 Geiser Tatio Reserve Sauvignon Blanc (Maule Valley)
properties.address: Ruta 66 91, San Vicente de Taguatagua, San Vicente, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: Vanilla wafer, slightly mealy apple and citrus aromas open this slightly unfocused wine. The palate is flat, with flavors of green fruit and citrus that finish abruptly.

properties.title: Helfrich 2013 Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 102 Rue du Général de Gaulle, 67520 Marlenheim, France
properties.description: There are strongly spicy aromas to this gentle Gewurztraminer. It's off dry, keeping some acidity amid the ripe lychee and nutmeg flavors. It's an approachable wine, ready to drink now.

properties.title: Santa Rita 2013 Reserva Sauvignon Blanc (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: 2923 Grand Ave, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.description: Green fruit aromas, grassy notes and hint of sulfur define the bouquet on this herbaceous wine from a cool vintage. Bell pepper, pea and green bean flavors finish with a hint of tropical fruit.

properties.title: Decoy 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 1000 Lodi Ln, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Chewy and robust in tannins, this was given a year in French oak barrels, 35% of it new. The oak is still working its way through the fruit, which includes Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot. Jammy in thick raspberry and plum, it features a dose of chocolate on the finish.

properties.title: Château Larroque 2013  Bordeaux Blanc
properties.address: A Larroque, 32390 Sainte-Christie, France
properties.description: Intensely herbaceous, this is almost too fruity and crisp for its own good. It's dominated by juicy citrus fruits, gooseberries and forward acidity. Drink from 2015.

properties.title: Santa Alicia 2014 Reserva Espiritu de Los Andes Estate Bottled Chardonnay (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Circunvalación Máximo Valdés 4135, Pirque, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: This simple Chardonnay is tropical fruit driven, with a floral aroma and a twang of resiny oak. The palate seems slightly disjointed in feel, briny in flavor and citric on the finish.

properties.title: Chimney Rock 2006 Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
properties.address: 5350 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: You'll want to give this young Cab some time in the cellar, because it's locked down in tannins. Buried underneath the astringency is a wealth of sweet black currants and savory anise and sandalwood. Try after 2011.

properties.title: Tiefenbrunner 2010 Kirchleiten Sauvignon (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Schloßweg, 4, 39040 Entiklar, Autonome Provinz Bozen - Südtirol, Italy
properties.description: This is a seriously gorgeous Sauvignon that bursts opens with enormous fragrance and finishes with piquant spice that tingles in the mouth. In between are luscious layers of citrus blossom, exotic or passion fruit and tomato leaf.

properties.title: Château Jolys 2009 Cuvée Pauline  (Jurançon Sec)
properties.address: 330 Rte de la Chapelle de Rousse, 64290 Gan, France
properties.description: The vintage has given a rich wine, one that is still young. Over the wood notes are ripe yellow fruits, orange marmalade and intense acidity. Age this concentrated wine for 2–3 years.

properties.title: Masciarelli 2007 Marina Cvetic'  (Trebbiano d'Abruzzo)
properties.address: 144 Moore Rd, Weymouth, MA 02189, USA
properties.description: Creamy, rich and immensely satisfying, this carefully crafted Trebbiano d'Abruzzo opens with mature notes of apricot, lemon zest, vanilla cream and pineapple. The mouthfeel is what sets its apart, however: It's decadently opulent and long-lasting.

properties.title: Attems 2008 Cicinis White (Collio)
properties.address: 43 E Ohio St, Chicago, IL 60611, USA
properties.description: From the Frescobaldi's wine venture in northeast Italy, Cicinis is a rich and sophisticated blend of white grapes (Sauvignon, Friulano and Pinot Bianco) that delivers toasted almond, apricot, pineapple and freshly baked piecrust. This luscious, oak-driven white would pair with risotto, chicken or lobster.

properties.title: Colterenzio 2009 Lafòa Sauvignon (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Weinstraße, 8, 39057 Girlan, Autonome Provinz Bozen - Südtirol, Italy
properties.description: Lafòa is one of the best expressions of Sauvignon from Italy. Careful fruit selection and oak aging create a wine that is important aromatically, as well as structurally. Pristine flavors of citrus, peach and honeysuckle are backed by a creamy feel and a touch of -piquant spice.

properties.title: Honig 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 850 Rutherford Rd, Rutherford, CA 94573, USA
properties.description: Honig's basic Napa Valley Cabernet is consistently rich and drinkable at a young age. This 2008 is their best in many years, showing ripe blackberry, black currant and dark chocolate flavors, grounded with a firm minerality. Give this elegant young Cabernet a few hours in a decanter.

properties.title: Turnbull 2009 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 8210 St Helena Hwy, Oakville, CA 94562, USA
properties.description: Softly delicious, this Cabernet is perfect for drinking now. Its blackberry, currant and cocoa flavors are housed in wonderfully ripe, accessible tannins. Shows the elegance of a superior Napa Cab.

properties.title: Vie di Romans 2009 Ciampagnis Vieris Chardonnay (Friuli Isonzo)
properties.address: Loc. Vie di Romans, 1, 34070 Mariano del Friuli GO, Italy
properties.description: Gorgeous, opulent and intense, Chardonnay Ciampagnis Vieris boasts a precise vein of dusty mineral or crushed stone that serves as the wine's backbone. Surrounding it are plusher tones of stone fruit, creamy vanilla and exotic fruit.

properties.title: Lis Neris 2007 Lis White (Venezia Giulia)
properties.address: Via Gavinana, 5, 34070 San Lorenzo Isontino GO, Italy
properties.description: Lis is a gorgeous blend of Pinot Grigio, Chardonnay and Sauvignon that shows the best of northeast Italy. Beautifully balanced aromas, including stone fruit and vanilla cream, are offset by a smooth, creamy mouthfeel.

properties.title: Joh. Jos. Prüm 2009 Graacher Himmelreich Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Uferallee 19, 54470 Bernkastel-Kues, Germany
properties.description: Soft and relatively open in style, with captivating aromas of wet mossy stones and ripe melon and hints of pear and lychee on the palate. Very approachable now for a young Prüm.

properties.title: Monteverro 2008 Chardonnay (Toscana)
properties.address: Strada Aurelia capalbio, 11, 58011 Capalbio GR, Italy
properties.description: From southern, coastal Tuscany comes this opulent, richly textured Chardonnay that competes with the best of France and California. Thick layers of yellow rose, vanilla and apricot drive a creamy, long-lasting mouthfeel. The wine delivers sophistication, class and personality.

properties.title: Tulip Winery 2012 Just Cabernet Sauvignon (Galilee)
properties.address: כפר תקווה, Israel
properties.description: Aromas of black cherry, lavender and thyme provide a good introduction to flavors of cassis, lavender and thyme, with a hint of smoke and orange peel. Smooth tannins coat the mouth and are joined on the back palate by a pleasing jolt of orange zest and tart cranberry.

properties.title: Kumeu River 2011 Coddington Chardonnay (Kumeu)
properties.address: 550 State Highway 16, Auckland 0892, New Zealand
properties.description: For whatever reason, the Coddington lacks the extra dimension of the other 2011 Kumeu River Chardonnays. It's still an excellent wine, just linear and crisp, with subtle toast framing citrusy fruit.

properties.title: Lusco 2013 Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.address: Lugar Grixo-Alxen, s/n, 36458 Salvaterra de Miño, Pontevedra, Spain
properties.description: Crisp but also dusty and leesy on the nose, this offers enticing pear and apple aromas in front of a fresh, snappy, pure palate. Flavors of nectarine, green plum and citrus fruits finish linear, with cutting acidity and a stony quality. Drink through 2015.

properties.title: Prinz Salm 2013 Felseneck Wallhausen Trocken GG Erste Lage Riesling (Nahe)
properties.address: Schlossstraße 3, 55595 Wallhausen, Germany
properties.description: Layers of wet stones and smoke pervade this dry, deeply mineral wine. It's full in body, yet gossamer in mouthfeel and marked by searing lemon-lime acidity. Tightly wound still, it's a structured, complex wine likely to improve after 2018.

properties.title: J. Davies 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
properties.address: 1210 Grayson Ave, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: A generous expression of mountain Cab, accompanied by 14% Malbec, also estate-grown, this rich, soft wine is remarkable for its texture and mouthfeel, which is velvety and smooth. Peppercorn, dried herb and chocolate pronounce themselves on the palate, provoking thoughts for a similarly accented meal. Enjoy through 2021.

properties.title: Jack Creek 2013 Kruse Vineyard Chardonnay (Central Coast)
properties.address: 5265 Jack Creek Rd, Templeton, CA 93465, USA
properties.description: This winery is striving to show that Burgundian varietals can work in the cooler Willow Creek region of Paso Robles, where sea breeze comes through the Templeton Gap. This bottling provides good evidence, with aromas of crushed rocks, vanilla toast, roasted apple and peach. Brisk apple cider dominates the palate, picking up roasted almonds in the midpalate and possessing quite a bit of pear skin grip.

properties.title: Joseph Cattin 2012 Hatschbourg Grand Cru Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 35 Rue Roger Frémeaux, 68420 Vœgtlinshoffen, France
properties.description: Still developing, this big, rounded and rich wine bursts with spice and an opulent texture. Moving towards being glorious, it's structured with a dry core of spice while flaunting more tropical fruit flavors. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Keller Estate 2012 La Cruz Vineyard Pinot Gris (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 5875 Lakeville Hwy, Petaluma, CA 94954, USA
properties.description: Unctuous and intoxicating in dried apricot, honey and peach, this is a lovely example of the variety, which is rarely planted in Northern California, let alone on the Sonoma Coast. This shows the grape's promise, offering both crispness and creaminess on the palate and finish.

properties.title: Kriselle 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Rogue Valley)
properties.address: 12956 Modoc Rd, White City, OR 97503, USA
properties.description: Though definitely grassy in the nose, this round and juicy wine has compelling freshness. Flavors of grapefruit, lime, fresh herbs and a dash of wintergreen give complexity and length.

properties.title: Granbazán 2013 Etiqueta Verde Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.address: Lugar de Tremoedo, 46, 36628, Pontevedra, Spain
properties.description: Melon, nectarine and minerally aromas are textbook as far as Albariño goes. The palate on this ready-to-drink winner is a bit fleshy, but with ample spine. Melon, lees and white pepper flavors finish clean and true, with firm malic acidity.

properties.title: Donelan 2013 Venus Roussanne-Viognier (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 3352 Coffey Ln STE D, Santa Rosa, CA 95403, USA
properties.description: From 98% Roussanne and 2% Viognier, Venus delights in honey, jasmine and lemon zest, given time in both stainless steel and neutral oak. Crisp and light, it also offers complex herbal undertones, the fruit coming from relatively cool sites in Bennett Valley and the Russian River.

properties.title: La Grille 2013  Rosé d'Anjou
properties.address: Rte de Huismes, 37500 Chinon, France
properties.description: An off-dry blend of Grolleau and Gamay, it's crisp and attractively fruity. Strawberries dominate this fresh and aromatic wine. It's a great rosé to drink now.

properties.title: Adega Cooperativa Ponte de Barca 2013 Las Lilas White (Vinho Verde)
properties.address: Av. Fernão Magalhães, Lugar de Agrelos, 4980-601 Pte. da Barca, Portugal
properties.description: A richly-styled style of Vinho Verde, one that's well integrated, fresh and fruity. Baked apple and crisp lemon go well with the sweeter aftertaste to create a light and bright wine.

properties.title: Bougrier 2013 Château du Jaunay Sur Lie  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
properties.address: 9 Rte des Moulins, 41140 Saint-Romain-sur-Cher, France
properties.description: Fresh and fruity with a strong lemon flavor, this is full, crisp and totally bone-dry. It does have some weight and a lemon zest sharpness as well as a ripe texture from aging on the lees. Drink now.

properties.title: Caves du Val de France 2013 Jovly Sauvignon Blanc (Touraine)
properties.address: 73 Rue du Petit Coteau, 37210 Vouvray, France
properties.description: Tight and herbaceous, this bright and fruity wine offers grapefruit, very fresh acidity and lemon zest flavors. It's all about fruit with no complexity, just pleasure.

properties.title: Chai de Bordes 2013  Bordeaux Blanc
properties.address: 31 bis Rue Barillet Deschamps, 33300 Bordeaux, France
properties.description: A bright, light and fruity wine that's already delicious to drink. With lemon and green apple fruit, it also has acidity that cuts through the aftertaste.

properties.title: Château Borie de Noaillan 2013  Bordeaux Blanc
properties.address: Château La Forêt, 24500 Saint-Julien-Innocence-Eulalie, France
properties.description: This herbaceous, classically fruity wine is given a push by a touch of spice. It's bright, light, and fresh, with a green aftertaste. It's ready to drink.

properties.title: Trivento 2013 Amado Sur Chardonnay-Pinot Grigio-Viognier White (Mendoza)
properties.address: RP60 & Jerónimo Ruiz, M5517, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: This is Chardonnay with small amounts of Pinot Grigio and Viognier. The nose is nutty, oily and low on fruit. In the mouth, it's racy and citrusy in character. Flavors of orange, papaya and passion fruit are basic, while the finish is fresh and juicy, with tart flavors.

properties.title: Valentin Bianchi 2013 Elsa Bianchi Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: Ruta 143 y calle Valentín San Rafael Mendoza AR, Bianchi, M5600 BCJ, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Dusty plum, prune and leafy notes appear on a plump but somewhat flat nose. This is jammy and chunky in feel, with flavors of stewed berry fruits and herbal hints. Syrupy notes and a fig character add weight to an oaky finish.

properties.title: DFJ Vinhos 2013 Storks Landing Rosé (Lisboa)
properties.address: 2070-681 Vila Chã de Ourique, Portugal
properties.description: This blend of Shiraz and Castelão is in a soft and ripe rosé style. There is just a touch of tannin from the Shiraz to give weight. The aftertaste is lightly sweet.

properties.title: Garfield Estates 2012 V° Viognier (Grand Valley)
properties.address: 3572 G Rd, Palisade, CO 81526, USA
properties.description: Notes of cider, sweat and Chinese five spice give this wine an intriguing edge. Medium-full in weight, it has soft lines, plenty of flesh and a succulent finish.

properties.title: Musset-Roullier 2013 L'Esquisse  (Cabernet d'Anjou)
properties.address: Le Pélican, 49620 Mauges-sur-Loire, France
properties.description: This is a medium sweet rosé, fresh while having a riper core character. It's a fruity, lightly spicy and caramel flavored, with acidity and sweetness coming through strongly to finish.

properties.title: Rutherford Ranch 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1680 Silverado Trail S, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Flowery in aroma, this dry, balanced wine offers ripe flavors of melon and a touch of barrel.The finishis fleshy but abbreviated.

properties.title: Santa Julia 2013 Made with Organic Grapes Chardonnay (Mendoza)
properties.address: km 7,5, RP33, M5531 Maipú, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Waxy, floral white-fruit aromas are tropical in style. This feels citrusy, with some pulpiness to the texture. Tangerine, orange and nectarine flavors finish tangy and citric, with one-dimensional juiciness.

properties.title: Terras de Alter 2013 Fado Rosé (Alentejano)
properties.address: Zona Industrial Da Lt. 22/28, 263, 7460 Fronteira, Portugal
properties.description: Rich and caramel flavored, this is a rounded, sweet strawberry wine. It has plenty of fresh acidity to cut through the ripe texture, but it's not for an apéritif, more for food.

properties.title: The Williamsburg Winery 2012 A Midsummer Night's White (Virginia)
properties.address: 5800 Wessex Hundred, Williamsburg, VA 23185, USA
properties.description: Glitzy notes of lychee, pink flower and yellow plum skin mingle on the luscious, pliable palate. A blend of Traminette, Vidal Blanc and Viognier, this is full bodied and a touch sweet, with exaggerated flavors that cling to the finish.

properties.title: Pillsbury 2011 Chardonnay (Cochise County)
properties.address: 6450 S Bennett Pl, Willcox, AZ 85643, USA
properties.description: Broad tropical fruit and nut aromas gain more focus on the medium- to full-bodied palate. The wine feels lush and plump, but solid acidity gives it some buoyancy.

properties.title: Isabelle et Pierre Clément 2012 Châtenay  (Menetou-Salon)
properties.address: 1 Domaine de Châtenoy, 18510 Menetou-Salon, France
properties.description: This is a ripe while intensely herbaceous wine. It's steely and crisp, but spoiled by the intrusion of sulfur that hasn't gone away. If the sulfur blows off, this is a potentially attractive and fruity wine finished off with lemon zest.

properties.title: Jean Maréchal 2013 Le Roi des Pierres  (Sancerre)
properties.address: 20 Grande Rue, 71640 Mercurey, France
properties.description: While this wine is herbaceous, the attractive aspect lies in its lemon and orange zest flavors that are full and bright. It's crisp while deliciously fruity, ready to drink.

properties.title: Michel Torino 2013 Coleccion Cabernet Sauvignon (Calchaquí Valley)
properties.address: RN40 km 4343, A4427 Cafayate, Salta, Argentina
properties.description: Roasted, earthy aromas of herbs and tomato play off red-berry scents. This wine is full in body and feel, with earthy, baked flavors of red plum and red currant. Acidity rises up on the finish, which otherwise shows vanilla oak and raw tannins.

properties.title: Carlson Creek 2010 Chardonnay (Arizona)
properties.address: 4142 N Marshall Way, Scottsdale, AZ 85251, USA
properties.description: A mix of peach and lychee aromas give an exotic edge. Full in body and fleshy, this is endowed with concentrated flavors and tense acids.

properties.title: Cave des Producteurs de Vouvray 2012 Les Lys  (Vouvray)
properties.address: 38 Rue de la Vall. Coquette, 37210 Vouvray, France
properties.description: This is a fruity but dry wine, with a telltale hint of honey to bring out the Chenin Blanc character. It has an attractive line in almonds, along with crisp acidity and a tangy texture. Drink now.

properties.title: Ventosa 2011 Pinot Gris (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 3440 NY-96A, Geneva, NY 14456, USA
properties.description: A wisp of smoke mingles with blossom, apple and pear flavors in this lively, fresh Pinot Gris. It's quite tart with acidity, but pleasantly fruity with a subtle hint of minerality on the finish.

properties.title: William Cole 2013 Albamar Sauvignon Blanc (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.description: Grassy, straw-like aromas offer bits of lime and orange. This is light, juicy and tangy. Flavors of lime, tart apple, grapefruit and kiwi finish with stony minerality and lasting lemon-lime notes.

properties.title: Willm 2012 Cuvée Famille Willm Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 12526 SW Bank Rd, Vashon, WA 98070, USA
properties.description: This medium-sweet wine is hugely spicy and rich. It has lychee, tropical fruit and vanilla flavors, yielding a wine that is a meal on its own. Drink now.

properties.title: Accadia 2012 Conscio  (Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico Superiore)
properties.address: Contrada Ammorto, 19, Località Castellaro, 60048 Serra San Quirico AN, Italy
properties.description: Here's a wine that opens with aromas of tropical fruit and a hint of butterscotch. The one dimensional palate offers restrained peach, citrus and apple, along with a drying note of bitter almond on the finish.

properties.title: Cantina Ma.Ri.Ca. 2012 Tregaso  (Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico)
properties.address: Via Acquasanta, 7, 60030 Belvedere Ostrense AN, Italy
properties.description: This charming wine opens with an alluring floral fragrance of Spanish broom and hawthorne. The palate delivers flavors of juicy peach and lemon zest, with a savory salinity that recalls the seaside. Pair this with pasta topped with clam sauce.

properties.title: Cave de Kientzheim-Kaysersberg 2011 Anne de K Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 29 Grand-Rue, 68240 Kaysersberg, France
properties.description: This is a ripe and spicy wine that is full of almond and tropical fruit flavors. It has a sense of richness and texture, along with a kick of pepper. The acidity is a touch light here, but there's just enough to keep it fresh.

properties.title: Centanni Giacomo 2012  Offida Pecorino
properties.address: 25200 Arnold Dr, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.description: Here's a pert Pecorino, with bright citrus and tropical fruit sensations of lemon, tangerine and pineapple. A subtle note of flinty mineral on the close jazzes this up a bit, but overall this is a simple and enjoyable wine to enjoy with everyday fare.

properties.title: un4seen 2012 Moscato (Clarksburg)
properties.description: Floral with notes of jasmine, this Clarksburg Moscato shows the appellation can do more than just Chenin Blanc. It's balanced on the palate with flavors of pear, peach and lime that meld sweetly.

properties.title: Lawer 2012 Lawer Family Betsy's Vineyard Viognier (Knights Valley)
properties.address: 1255 Lincoln Ave, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.description: This Viognier shows off the variety's characteristic tropical fruit, honeysuckle and apricot flavors, with an oaky finish and a trace of honey. There's a bit of overripeness on this lush, soft wine, but the finish is dry.

properties.title: Le Caniette 2012 Lucrezia Passerina (Marche)
properties.address: Contrada Canali, 23, 63038 Ripatransone AP, Italy
properties.description: Made entirely from Central Itay's native Passerina grape, this has apple and pineapple flavors accented by hints of dried herbs and delicate mineral. Crisp acidity leaves the palate refreshed.

properties.title: Marchetti 2012  Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico
properties.address: 3091 Mayfield Rd # 310, Cleveland, OH 44118, USA
properties.description: Here's a bright and enjoyable wine that opens with aromas of yellow flowers and a hint of tropical fruit. The palate offers one dimensional apple and peach flavors, with crisp acidity. Simple yet well made and refreshing.

properties.title: Mas de la Dame 2012 La Stèle White (Les Baux de Provence)
properties.address: Route départementale 5, 13520 Les Baux-de-Provence, France
properties.description: This citrus flavored wine is fruity and crisp with bright acidity and just a hint of herbal character. The wine is light, bright and ready to drink.

properties.title: Rodney Strong 2015 Estate Vineyards Charlotte's Home Sauvignon Blanc (Northern Sonoma)
properties.address: 11455 Old Redwood Hwy, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: A strong whiff of oak opens this wine before blowing off to reveal complementary aromas and flavors of mango, peach and melon accented by fresh-cut grass and honeysuckle. Mostly stainless-steel fermented, with just 10% of the wine given time in barrel, it remains crisp and clean, with just the right amount of texture and body.

properties.title: Sparkman 2015 Birdie Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14300 NE 145th St #102, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: After starting out a touch reduced, this wine opens to reveal aromas of wet rock, high-toned white flowers, lime and green apple. The palate is broad and dry, with generous citrus flavors that linger.

properties.title: Andrew Januik 2013 Lady Hawk Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.description: A new addition to the lineup, this wine brings aromas of dusty earth, cherry, herb and spice. The cherry flavors show poise and presence, winning on subtlety and balance rather than brawn.

properties.title: As Laxas 2015 Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.address: As Laxas 16 Arbo, 36430 Arbo, Pontevedra, Spain
properties.description: Stony lime aromas are lightly floral and appealing. This feels smooth and slightly round despite showing firm acidity. Nectarine and melon flavors end with lasting minerality and a stone-fruit character. As per usual, As Laxas doesn't disappoint.

properties.title: Cadaretta 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 315 E Main St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
