properties.description: Locked up garden herb and cherry aromas are followed by bountiful dark fruit flavors. It possesses a lovely sense of balance and appeal, with chewy tannins backing it all up.

properties.title: Domaine Charles Frey 2013 Quintessence Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.description: A rich blend of dried pear, baked vanilla and shortbread on the nose suggests the richness of this evolving Pinot Gris. Dried pear and apple give more aromatic nuance to this spicy, vanilla-scented white that has an oily and rich palate despite being just off dry. This will shine with food.

properties.title: McIntyre Vineyards 2014 Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 31901 Sanchez Rd, Soledad, CA 93960, USA
properties.description: Creamy aromas of vanilla yogurt, custard, apple pie and cinnamon show on the nose of this wine from a longtime family of grape growers. The palate is crisp with pear juice, rounded with marzipan flavors and touched with light honeysuckle flowers.

properties.title: Paul Blanck 2013 Patergarten Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 29 Grand-Rue, 68240 Kaysersberg, France
properties.description: Developed, creamy notes of pear have an aromatic edge of banana bread. The palate is equally creamy and rich with notions of vanilla, baked frangipani pear and vanilla spice, but lemony freshness at the core provides balance, direction and freshness. Flavors linger long.

properties.title: Priest Ranch 2014 Estate Grown Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Aged entirely in stainless steel, this slightly tropical, very pretty wine is inviting on the nose and palate. Pure, crisp and focused, it shows softly crafted layers of lemon and vanilla that provide a lushness on the finish.

properties.title: Sixto 2013 Roza Hills Chardonnay (Washington)
properties.address: 1136 S Albro Pl, Seattle, WA 98108, USA
properties.description: This wine was whole-cluster pressed and puncheon fermented, with native malolactic fermentation. It's intriguing, with aromas of corn on the cob, lees, almond butter and chamomile that are followed by a dense flavorful palate. The balance is exquisite.

properties.title: Josmeyer 2014 Les Pierrets Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: Dégustation uniquement sur RDV, 76 Rue Clemenceau, 68920 Wintzenheim, France
properties.description: Warm and aromatic hints of ripe Bosc pear pervade the aromatics of this wine. The palate has a rounded, ripe feel but remains beautifully slender, expressing more of that pear fruit now highlighted by citrus freshness. It's a very balanced, dry wine with a clean finish.

properties.title: Kingston Family 2015 Cariblanco Sauvignon Blanc (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: Hijuela El Maitén S/N, Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.description: One of Chile's go-to producers of Sauvignon Blanc has bottled a winner. This deals classic aromas of citrus, nettle and sea brine. The palate is slightly oily and creamy, but lively with acidity. Flavors of persimmon, melon and ocean brine finish slightly salty, with a fresh-meets-oily feel.

properties.title: Nuiton-Beaunoy 2010  Hautes Cotes de Beaune
properties.address: 97 Rte de Pommard, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: This is a light wine with tropical fruit flavors. The acidity and notes of almond and white fruit add to its rounded, ready-to-drink feel.

properties.title: Debonné 2009 Reserve Lot 907 Riesling (Grand River Valley)
properties.description: While the aromas of white strawberry, passion fruit preserves and citrus are soft spoken, they increase in intensity on the palate. Relatively low in alcohol, with sweetness and bright acidity, this should pair well with exotic, slightly spicy fare, like curried chicken with mango chutney.

properties.title: Rose 'N' Blum 2011 Pink Moscato (California)
properties.address: 10 Clay St, Oakland, CA 94607, USA
properties.description: This rides the Moscato craze with a wine that could be sweet enough to classify as a dessert sipper, but let's call it off-dry. It has jammy raspberry and apricot flavors, with a hint of orange zest. Best of all is the acidity, which is so clean and balancing.

properties.title: Standing Stone 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 9934 NY-414, Hector, NY 14841, USA
properties.description: Flavors of ripe plums and cherries dusted with graham cracker crumbs and purple flowers are pleasant on this delicately structured Cabernet. It's straightfoward on the palate, made in a lean, crisp style, with a fresh layer of green leaves and stems that linger.

properties.title: Volteo 2011 Verdejo-Sauvignon Blanc (Vino de la Tierra de Castilla y León)
properties.description: Clean, minerally and smells of tarragon, fresh bell pepper and lemony citrus. Feels lively, with pink grapefruit, passion fruit, lime and generic sweetness for flavors. A lip-smacking wine that's varietally accurate. 60% Verdejo and 40% SB.

properties.title: Ackerman 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Big, tough and totally dry, this has blackberry and currant flavors. It was grown in the southerly Coombsville area, showing good acidity. It's already throwing some sediment, but all bets are off for whether or not it ages.

properties.title: Veramar 2010 Viognier (Virginia)
properties.description: Aromas of toasted macadamia, Fuji apple and apricot preserves are bold and well delineated. This tastes off-dry, but its acids are lively enough to keep the midpalate from feeling sticky. Warm and sappy on the finish, it bears vivid, lingering notes of toasted nut and bruised apple. Try pairing this with roast chicken and a not-too-sweet apricot chutney.

properties.title: Bouchard Père & Fils 2010 La Vignée  (Bourgogne)
properties.address: 892 Bd du Saguenay E, Chicoutimi, QC G7H 1L4, Canada
properties.description: Ripe, soft and round, this is an accessible wine, with easy yellow-fruit flavors that lend a sweetly juicy character. The acidity just cuts through the warm feel to give the finish some lift.

properties.title: Château de Maligny 2010  Chablis
properties.address: 2 Grande Rue Maligny, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: Soft and rounded, this is touched by a note of vanilla that adds extra openness. With its apple and pear flavors, this is an attractive, fruity wine; it's very forward, but it shows a note of Chablis steel in the background.

properties.title: Domaine Jean Monnier et Fils 2010 Clos du Cromin  (Meursault)
properties.address: 20 Rue du 11 Novembre, 21190 Meursault, France
properties.description: This has herb and wood aromas, leading to a palate that's structured, with a yeasty, toasty flavor and a green, herbal character. It is quite tight, and does need to age for at least two years.

properties.title: Groth 2010 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.description: This is too oaky, with vanilla, buttered toast and butterscotch notes dominating the underlying pineapple and guava flavors.

properties.title: Hogue 2009 Reserve Chardonnay (Yakima Valley)
properties.description: Just 183 cases were made of this wine, which has firm stone fruits and a more-than-generous amount of toast and butter. If you like your Chardonnays on the extra oaky side, this is for you.

properties.title: 16X20 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 4155 Dry Creek Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: This is a proper Cabernet, showing some rich flavors of black currants and dark chocolate, wrapped into sturdy tannins. Ready to drink now.

properties.title: Adelaida 2010 The Glenrose Vineyard Viognier (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 5805 Adelaida Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: This veers toward the sweet side of Viognier, with pineapple, apricot, orange and honeysuckle flavors. The sweetness is balanced by firm acidity.

properties.title: Johanneshof Reinisch 2011 Auslese Rotgipfler (Thermenregion)
properties.description: Brown sugar and dark treacle flavors dominate this rich, sweet wine. With its opulent texture, this is for sipping. Screwcap.

properties.title: Kuleto Estate 2008 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Although there's a lot of ripe blackberry jam, black currant and chocolate flavors, it's a little on the simple side. Ready to drink now.

properties.title: Les Maîtres Vignerons de Saint-Louis 2011 Estandon Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.description: This is a smooth wine, with strawberry fruits and a creamy texture. The wine feels just off dry, making it accessible, warm and ripe. Screwcap.

properties.title: Pitars 2011 Braida Santa Cecilia Pinot Grigio (Friuli Grave)
properties.description: This food-friendly Pinot Grigio offers aromas of melon, pear, apricot and citrus. On the palate it's easy and creamy.

properties.title: Dürnberg 2011 Blanc de Noir Select Rosé (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Neuer W. 284, 2162 Falkenstein bei Poysdorf, Austria
properties.description: Made from Zweigelt, this has a soft feel along with lively acidity. Its raspberry flavor is paired with a note of orange peel while the wine finishes with a touch of spice. Scewcap.

properties.title: Dürnberg 2011 L & T Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Neuer W. 284, 2162 Falkenstein bei Poysdorf, Austria
properties.description: This wine has a crisp character, tangy with apples and laced with citrus fruits. It's totally ready to drink. Screwcap.

properties.title: Höpler 2011 Grüner Veltliner (Burgenland)
properties.address: Heideweg 1, 7091 Breitenbrunn, Austria
properties.description: This has fresh citrus and dried apricot flavors, with Grüner's typical peppery edge. For drinking now. Screwcap.

properties.title: Argiolas 2011 Costamolino  (Vermentino di Sardegna)
properties.address: Via Roma, 28/30, 09040 Serdiana CA, Italy
properties.description: Delicate tones of stone fruit, lime, talc power and honeydew melon mark the bouquet. It's crisp on the palate, with a touch of wild salvia on the finish.

properties.title: Biltmore Estate 2010 Reserve Chardonnay (North Carolina)
properties.description: There are enticing hints of berries and cream on the bouquet. On the palate, a floral note mingles with apple, lemon and just a dash of vanilla spice. This is full bodied and substantial in structure.

properties.title: Spier 2011 Chenin Blanc (Stellenbosch)
properties.address: R310 Baden Powell Dr, Stellenbosch, 7603, South Africa
properties.description: A great value wine that's ready to drink now. This vibrant and aromatic selection boasts scents of orange blossom, white peach and fresh honeydew. The palate is fresh and lively with a crisp and mouthwatering finish.

properties.title: Van Loveren 2011 Chenin No. 5 Chenin Blanc (Robertson)
properties.description: A refreshing and approachable wine, with forward notes of green plum, plantain, Granny Smith apple and lime on the nose and palate. There's a slight roundness to the midpalate, but a vibrant twang lifts the finish.

properties.title: D'Arenberg 2008 The Coppermine Road Cabernet Sauvignon (McLaren Vale)
properties.description: There's a slightly scorched character to this wine that I had a tough time getting past. There's solid plummy fruit, but also recurring hints of freshly sawn lumber and burnt coffee. It's full bodied, with plenty of astringent tannins, so it might age past this current stage, and it's possible this rating could look stingy in a few years.

properties.title: Domaine Courtois 2010 La Source Red (Côtes du Rhône)
properties.description: This blend of 80% Grenache and 20% Syrah doesn't have the most effusive red-cherry fruit, but instead shows an appealing earthy, savory side. Pepper, clove and some dusty earth elements impart complexity above its price point. Drink now.

properties.title: Barrel Oak 2009 Reserve Chardonnay (Virginia)
properties.address: 3623 Grove Ln, Delaplane, VA 20144, USA
properties.description: Scents of roasted nuts and apples gain levity on the palate with flavors of lemons and delicate white flowers. Richly textured, this has a slightly-viscous but refreshingly-fruity profile.

properties.title: Oraison 2009 Red (Côtes du Rhône)
properties.description: This blend of 80% Grenache, 10% Syrah and 10% Mourvèdre is plump and charming, filled with cherry fruit and just a hint of spice. It's clean and correct, a fine option for everyday drinking.

properties.title: Pardas 2010 Rupestris White (Penedès)
properties.description: A bit oily on the bouquet, this has slightly acrid notes of burnt hay and matchstick, with notes of apple and nectarine. It feels full and not edgy, with good acidity and limited flavors of baked apple and peach. A standard Penedès wine made from 80% Xarello, with Malvasia and Macabeo.

properties.title: Thierry-Weber 2011 Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
properties.description: This is a simple, fruity wine—great for quaffing as a summer apéritif. It is attractively crisp, fresh, and it's laced with grapefruit, apple and pepper flavors. Screwcap.

properties.title: Paladin 2011 Pralis White (Delle Venezie)
properties.address: Via Postumia, 12, 30020 Annone Veneto VE, Italy
properties.description: An easy blend of Pinot Bianco, Tai and Manzoni Bianco, this is a fresh, crisp white wine with aromas of white flower, sambuca and citrus.

properties.title: Truro 2009 Unoaked Chardonnay (Southeastern New England)
properties.description: Unabashedly tropical on the nose and palate with gobs of ripe mango, guava and peach, this cheerful Chardonnay is fresh and juicy, with lemon-lime acidity and a surprisingly-elegant minerality on the finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Domaine de la Sauveuse 2011 Cuvée Carolle Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: 170 Lyle Snowden Rd, Lyle, WA 98635, USA
properties.description: This is rich and soft, with sweet red fruits and some acidity. It's full-bodied and should fair well with food.

properties.title: B Vintners 2015 Fire Heath Chardonnay (Walker Bay)
properties.description: This is a solid and well-made Chardonnay, with notes of yellow apple, melon and fresh hay on the nose and mouth. There's a subtle astringency to the fruit flavors on the medium-weight palate, with bright acidity that carries through to the clean and refreshing finish. Drink now–2019.

properties.title: HandCraft 2014 Artisan Collection Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
properties.address: 309 N American Rd unit 11&12, Cheyenne, WY 82007, USA
properties.description: This admittedly oaky wine makes an attractive package of cedary, savory aromas and rich fruit flavors. It's playful on the nose, with rosemary and forest floor aromas, and almost-sweet Bing cherry flavors on the full-bodied and smooth palate.

properties.title: Ironstone 2013 Reserve Kramer Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon (Sierra Foothills)
properties.description: Mint and sage hints in this wine's aroma give way to powerful oak and dark fruit flavors on the palate. A wealth of fine-grained tannin gives it plenty of grip, its fresh-cut oak flavors expanding with each sip, dominating the finish.

properties.title: J Vineyards & Winery 2015 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 11447 Old Redwood Hwy, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Honeyed, caramelized oak aromas provide a seductive entry and echo the wine's dark golden color. Baked apple, apple skin and spicy nutmeg notes add to its weighted loveliness.

properties.title: Cantina Produttori San Michele Appiano 2015 Chardonnay (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Via Circonvallazione, 17-19, 39057 Appiano sulla strada del vino BZ, Italy
properties.description: This opens with aromas of mature yellow apple, citrus and acacia honey. The savory medium-bodied palate delivers juicy grapefruit, white peach and a hint of vanilla alongside bright acidity.

properties.title: Collis 2015 Scaligeri Decanto  (Soave)
properties.address: Cascina Sesto Pergola, San Martino In Strada, Lo 26817, 26817 San Martino in strada LO, Italy
properties.description: Aromas of grilled herb, mature orchard fruit and citrus lead the nose while the palate offers Bartlett pear and nectarine zest. Notes of white almond and a hint of mineral signal the close.

properties.title: Corte Moschina 2015 Evaos  (Soave)
properties.address: Via Moschina, 1, 37030 Roncà VR, Italy
properties.description: Here's a creamy white that delivers aromas and flavors of white peach, pear and white almond. A mineral note and fresh acidity lift the finish.

properties.title: DeMorgenzon 2015 DMZ Sauvignon Blanc (Western Cape)
properties.description: There's a natural herbal beauty to this wine, with pleasant notes of green pepper, fynbos, thyme, laurel, fennel bulb and lemongrass that dance around the green plum and white melon-rind fruit. The medium-weight body is balanced by lime-flavored acidity and a bitter pithy accent on the close. Drink now.

properties.title: Dona Maria-Júlio Bastos 2015 Viognier (Alentejano)
properties.description: This shows the subtlest hints of the apricot character so often found in Viognier. That gives richness to contrast its crisp acidity and apple and pear flavors. The finish is long and perfumed. Drink now.

properties.title: Edna Valley Vineyard 2015 Chardonnay (Central Coast)
properties.address: 2585 Biddle Ranch Rd, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.description: For being one of the more widely available Chardonnays around, this vintage performs strongly against more expensive wines. Pineapple, vanilla and light caramel aromas lead the nose, while vibrant acidity kicks off the palate. Pear, Gala apple and pineapple flavors make it a reliable weeknight sipper.

properties.title: Falchini 2015 Vigna a Solatio  (Vernaccia di San Gimignano)
properties.description: Always a terrific value, this refreshing white has aromas of fragrant white flower, mint and orchard fruit. The straightforward palate offers crunchy Granny Smith apple, a hint of orange zest and a crisp clean finish.

properties.title: Franchetto 2015 La Capelina  (Soave)
properties.description: This savory white opens with aromas of exotic fruit, apricot, hay and a whiff of wild flower that follow through to the palate along with grapefruit and a vegetal note. A mineral accent lifts the finish.

properties.title: Clos Pegase 2013 Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1060 Dunaweal Ln, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.description: This wine consists of all five red Bordeaux varieties plus 5% Syrah. Tart, soft and juicy with black and red cherry fruit, it's direct in its delivery of dried herb and licorice—flavors that complement the robust ripeness and density.

properties.title: Von Schleinitz 2015 KonSECCO Riesling Sparkling (Mosel)
properties.description: Savory, caramelized toast and nut tones accentuate zippy apple and lemon flavors in this flirty, Prosecco-style Riesling. Ripe and forward, it's softer and easier in its approach than traditional Riesling Sekt. Enjoy through 2020.

properties.title: Pontin del Roza 2000 Chenin Blanc (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 35502 N Hinzerling Rd, Prosser, WA 99350, USA
properties.description: A nice bottle of wine, bone-dry and fragrant, with pleasing, simple flavors.

properties.title: Rutherford Hill 2000 26th Anniversary Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 200 Rutherford Hill Rd, Rutherford, CA 94573, USA
properties.description: Hits all the right notes, from the rich, sweet tropical fruit to the butter and toast accents, but like the third violin in the symphony, lacks that extra flair to really stand out. The oak is well proportioned, and some zesty lime notes that should make it reasonably versatile with food grace the finish. —J.C.

properties.title: Thunder Mountain 1999 Ciardella Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Cruz Mountains)
properties.address: 932 Hilltop Dr, Spring Grove, PA 17362, USA
properties.description: Tight and sulky right now, showing little more than earth and minerals on the nose. Later, it opens up to reveal apple and pear fruit along with some oily flavors. Finishes with citrus and green apple. Hang out the “Do Not Disturb” sign; this crisp, flavorful Chard could use another year or two of cellaring.

properties.title: Hyatt 2000 Reserve Chardonnay (Yakima Valley)
properties.description: The reserve is not particularly oaky; rather it puts the emphasis on straightforward, well-rendered green apple fruit flavors, augmented with some balanced flavors of licorice and vanilla.

properties.title: Joseph Phelps 2000 Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.description: This is a good wine that's weakened by a lack of harmony. The fruit veers toward mangoes and breadfruit. The acids are fine. A gentle overlay of oak and pronounced lees add textural complexity. Yet the parts don't come together smoothly; it feels jagged in the mouth. —S.H.

properties.title: Kunde 2000 Chardonnay (Sonoma Valley)
properties.description: Another sweet, oaky Chardonnay joins the ever-growing line. Not that it's an indifferent wine. This family produces nothing but impeccably tailored wines, and this one is among the best of class at this price point. —S.H.

properties.title: Andretti 2000 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Here's a complex wine with bold flavors of lemongrass and peaches that are rich and honeyed, and yet it's tart and crisp enough to be your dry white wine of the evening. Combines the best of both worlds: round, sweet fruit and dry acidity that makes your mouth water, even as it's savoring the flavor. —S.H.

properties.title: Arunda 2000 Chardonnay (South Eastern Australia)
properties.description: What's nice about this wine is the acidity: It burns; it sparkles; it makes your mouth water and prepares it for yummy food. It's not all about fruit, oak and lees—a meal in itself. The flavors are of apples and peaches dusted with pepper and cinnamon. —S.H.

properties.title: Raymond 2000 Reserve Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.description: It's all about extract in this kick-in-the-pants Chard. Assaults the palate with oversized fruit and the sting of peppery spice. Words like bright, electric and bold come to mind. It's also sweet and oaky. —S.H.

properties.title: Ventana 1999 Reserve Chardonnay (Arroyo Seco)
properties.address: 38740 Los Coches Rd, Soledad, CA 93960, USA
properties.description: Barrel fermentation, malolactic fermentation and lees aging add buttery, creamy, spicy complexities to this clean, steely wine. The underlying fruity flavors are not intense and veer toward leaner citrus and green apple flavors. It's a focused wine, not overblown. —S.H.

properties.title: Peirano 1999 Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
properties.description: It's rustic, but there's something balanced and enjoyable in this wine. Combines blackberry and olive notes with some green, stalky flavors that add interest. It's absolutely dry, not just in the official sense, but in the mouth, with a dusting of tannins. Best Buy.

properties.title: Peirano 1999 Sauvignon Blanc (Lodi)
properties.description: Just what the doctor ordered in a likeable, affordable white wine. Packs plenty of ripe spearmint and lemon flavors with enough acidity to make it bright and clean. A tiny amount of sugar will satisfy your sweet tooth without compromising the wine's basic dryness. Best Buy.

properties.title: Kiona 2000 Dry White Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 44612 N Sunset Rd, Benton City, WA 99320, USA
properties.description: Scents of lemon wax and a slightly spritzy mouthfeel are followed by somewhat surprisingly sweet fruit for a wine labeled dry. The flavors favor orange juice and orange candy. If you like a fairly heavy, fruit-forward style, this is just right.

properties.title: Gallo of Sonoma 1999 Laguna Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: Seems somewhat crisper and less weighty than prior vintages, with the custardy mouthfeel buttressed by lemony acids. You'll also find apples, sweet plums and the obligatory toast and vanilla. —J.C.

properties.title: Gordon Brothers 2000 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: A sweet nose sends up plenty of toasty oak scents; the fruit is straightforward, middle-of-the-road Chardonnay, with flavors of fresh cut apples. Fairly soft, it finishes with vanilla and more oak.

properties.title: Xavier Monnot 2006 Les Folatières Premier Cru  (Puligny-Montrachet)
properties.description: A beautifully shaped wine that exudes richness balanced with lively fresh fruits. There is a tautness and minerality that adds complexity to the pineapple and spice flavors. The wine opens well in the mouth, ripeness and full fruit flavors melding easily. Delicious.

properties.title: Chanson Père et Fils 2005 Clos Saint-Jean Premier Cru  (Chassagne-Montrachet)
properties.description: Ripe and soft, here is a Chanson white that hasn't been overwhelmed by wood. Instead, the delicious yellow and white stone fruits come through, with a creamy edge reminiscent of buttered English muffins, finishing on a high note of juicy, thirst-quenching acidity.

properties.title: La Chablisienne 2006 Vaulorent Premier Cru  (Chablis)
properties.address: 8 Bd Pasteur, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: A premier cru that could almost be grand cru in quality terms, this is a big, ripe wine, the powerful yellow and green plum flavors spiced with some wood aging. There's a great, full-bodied explosion of fruit in the mouth, but the mineral edge of the wine suggests aging potential, perhaps even more  ageable than the 2005 vintage.

properties.title: Lionheart 2007 Saralee's Vineyard The Angel's Share Marsanne-Roussanne White (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 8500 Dry Creek Rd, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.description: A distinctive wine. The first impression is of acidic dryness, which stimulates the palate. Then the flavors kick in, and they're opulent in peaches, pineapples, golden apricots, honeysuckle flowers, vanilla custard and cinnamon.

properties.title: Sheridan Vineyard 2004 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Yakima Valley)
properties.description: This is 100% new oak (primarily Taransaud, 32 months), and it's a marvelous example of the grape, the vineyard and the strengths of Washington fruit. The Shafer Hillside Select is the inspiration for the extended barrel aging and the focus on round, sweet tannins. This is a tight wine, with a lovely purity of fruit that captures the cassis, the black cherry, the subtle herbal character of the Cabernet grape. This is from the oldest block in the vineyard—now eight -year-old vines.

properties.title: Silverado 2005 SOLO Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
properties.description: Here's a complex, layered wine that impresses for sheer power. It floods the mouth with ripe flavors of black currants, blackberries, black cherries, dark chocolate, anise and cedar that finish deep and long. Delicious and dry, but quite closed now in tannins, and needs time. Best after 2009, at least.

properties.title: Simonnet-Febvre 2006 Montée de Tonnerre Premier Cru  (Chablis)
properties.description: New wood and yellow fruit aromas give an exotic spice- and caramel-flavored wine. The acidity is rounded, sweet, delicious, lifted by intense new wood flavors. This is a rich Chardonnay, well tempered by final crispness.

properties.title: Stuhlmuller Vineyards 2007 Estate Chardonnay (Alexander Valley)
properties.description: The best Chardonnays from this warm Sonoma County valley show tropical fruit flavors and are quite decadent, and this is one of the best. With crisp acidity, it brims with pineapple crème brûlée, papaya and vanilla custard. Drink this opulent wine with rich fare, such as scallops, crab and lobster.

properties.title: JR Wine 2005 Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
properties.description: Quite a good young Cab, deeply flavored in red and black currants, plums, chocolate and oak. Has a weight, density and balance that feel important and authoritative. Not an ager, but epitomizes a delicious Napa Cab to drink now.

properties.title: Domaine Christian Moreau Père et Fils 2006 Cuvée Guy Moreau Vaillon Premier Cru  (Chablis)
properties.winery: Domaine Christian Moreau Père et Fils
properties.description: Made from 70-year-old vines planted by Christian Moreau's father, Guy, this wine shows extra concentration, certainly, but also the pure pleasure of ripe, delicious Chardonnay. It's initially tight, but the rich green fruits and toast soon come forward to give an impressively big wine, and one worth aging.

properties.title: Gainey 2007 Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.description: A beautiful Chardonnay, solidly in the Gainey style of balance and integrity, but also showing the cool climate terroir of its origins as well as the excellence of the vintage. The result is this crisp, richly oaked but balanced young wine. It brims with tropical fruits and spices.

properties.title: Buena Vista 2006 Ramal Vineyard Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.description: Serious white wine. Dense and full-bodied, it's incredibly lush in tropical fruit and apricot flavors. Entirely dry, it shows a honey-sweet layer that's crisp and well-balanced.

properties.title: Byron 2006 Nielson Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.description: A beautiful wine, crisp and elegant, filled with varietal complexity. Oak-inspired butterscotch and vanilla custard accent ripe fruit flavors of grilled pineapples and ripe kiwi, with a long, spicy finish. Beautiful now and for a year or two.

properties.title: Valchiarò 2006 Picolit (Colli Orientali del Friuli)
properties.address: Via dei Laghi, 4, 33040 Togliano UD, Italy
properties.description: Luminous and bright, this sophisticated dessert wine from northeast Italy offers abundant and generous tones of peach, honey and maple syrup. The wine is extremely lively and cheerful and ends with a zesty touch of acidity.

properties.title: Olivier Leflaive 2006 Vaudésir Grand Cru  (Chablis)
properties.address: 10 Pl. du Monument, 21190 Puligny-Montrachet, France
properties.description: A tight, vivid wine that expresses pure Chardonnay with a steely eye. The wine is flinty, the green fruits and apple skin texture dominant. There is some wood, but the lightest touch. The finish shows some crisp, lemony acidity.

properties.title: Indomita 2009 Zardoz Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Ruta 68, Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.description: A nice follow-up to the excellent '08 Zardoz, this is earthy and roasted smelling, full of cola and berry notes on the nose. It feels round and smooth, with a mild tannic bite and baked flavors of blackberry, cassis and chocolate. It's layered feeling on the finish, with a bit of syrupy residue.

properties.title: Alexandria Nicole 2009 Alderdale Destiny Ridge Vineyards Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 158422 W, Sonova Rd, Prosser, WA 99350, USA
properties.description: Beautifully structured, this fruit-laden Cabernet shows a rich core of sweet blackberry, cherry and cassis notes that are dappled with pretty baking spices. The tannins are smooth and supple; the finish is clean and inviting.

properties.title: Dowsett Family 2011 Celilo Vineyard Gewürztraminer (Columbia Gorge (WA))
properties.address: 315 E Cessna Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: The cool 2011 vintage hit the Columbia Gorge especially hard, but winemaker Chris Dowsett has crafted an expressive, wonderfully fragrant old-vine Gewürztraminer. This is tart and saline, with notes of lemon, lime and grapefruit rind and flesh that combine to form a delicate, lingering, snappy and bracing style.

properties.title: Firestone 2010 Riesling (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 5017 Zaca Station Rd, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.description: Firestone continues to produce good, affordable Rieslings, and this 2010 is one of their best yet. Like the 2009, it's off-dry, with a honey richness to the lemon, peach, white flower and mineral flavors that are brilliantly offset by crisp acidity and refreshingly low alcohol.

properties.title: Kenwood 2009 Jack London Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
properties.description: A very good Cabernet for drinking now. It's dry and pretty tannic, with blackberry, cherry and tobacco flavors that finish spicy and seemingly sweet. It earns extra points for its chewy deliciousness.

properties.title: Michel Redde et Fils 2010 Les Tuilières  (Sancerre)
properties.address: 58150 Saint-Andelain, France
properties.description: While this is certainly crisp, it also has a rich, creamy undertow giving the green plum and herb flavors some warmth and ripeness. It's ready to drink, but could age a year or two.

properties.title: Paumanok 2005 Tuthills Lane Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.address: 1074 Main Rd, Aquebogue, NY 11931, USA
properties.description: Crisp, elegant black-plum and cassis flavors are framed with notes of fresh herb, dried lavender, cedar and tobacco on this single-vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon. Generous proportions of new French-oak add abundant vanilla and sweet-spice tones to the nose and palate. Pleasurable now, but grippy tannins and a firm structure could evolve well over the next 3–5 years.

properties.title: Paumanok 2010 Semi Dry Riesling (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.description: It's rare to grow Riesling on Long Island, but this is chock full of ripe peaches and apricots highlighted by a shower of Meyer lemon acidity and fragrant white blossoms. Sprightly on the palate, yet concentrated in flavor, it lingers long with a hint of saline and crushed-stone minerality.

properties.title: Echeverria 2009 Founder's Selection Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
properties.description: This is slightly exotic in terms of herb and spice aromas and a note of coconutty oak. It feels blocky and tannic, but forward, with flavors of baked berry, cinnamon and chocolate. The finish is creamy feeling, oaky and spicy. Drink now–2014.

properties.title: El Huique 2009 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: 3130000, Carretera del vino km 37 Viu Manent, Santa Cruz, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: Black cherry and violet aromas control what amounts to a compact, straightforward bouquet. It feels flush and ripe, with friendly tannins and a range of dark fruit flavors that lead to a warm finish with molasses-like richness. Very nice Cabernet to drink now through 2014.

properties.title: Seven Hills 2009 Klipsun Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
properties.description: In 2009, this vineyard's yields were reduced, and production of this wine was cut to just 75 cases. It is compact and astringent to such a degree that even 24 hours of breathing time does little to make it budge. Flavors of cassis, white pepper and a hint of herb poke out from a bed of tannins. It's just too soon to tell where this is going.

properties.title: Skouras 2011 Georges Skouras Moschofilero (Peloponnese)
properties.description: A soft lemon note mingles with touches of spice, sea salt and ripe white fruit on the nose of this snappy but sophisticated Moschofilero. Clean, fresh and spicy white-fruit flavors and a pert finish give this wine poise, but there's still enough fruit to add dimension. It's versatile with food, too.

properties.title: Vignoble Brisebarre 2009 Sec  (Vouvray)
properties.description: This is a perfumed wine, moving easily between crisp, dry acidity and a more rounded almond and pear flavor. There are flavors of spice and freshly baked bread, with warm acidity on the finish.

properties.title: Anthony Nappa 2010 Luminous Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.description: Winemaker Anthony Nappa sources grapes from Finger Lakes notable Sheldrake Point to make this beautifully textured off-dry Riesling. It's fragrant and fresh, with hints of waxy lemon skins, tangerines and white blossoms, and the palate is rich, with lush stone-fruit and a deliciously astringent tea-leaf finish.

properties.title: Bernardus 2010 Sierra Mar Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 5 W Carmel Valley Rd, Carmel Valley, CA 93924, USA
properties.description: Sweet, smoky oak and ultraripe flavors of tropical fruits mark this Chardonnay. It's strong and obvious in its appeal, but bright acidity and a stony minerality ground it, and the finish is thoroughly dry.

properties.title: Ispiri 2009 Pine Mountain-Cloverdale Peak Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 7779 Afton Rd, Woodbury, MN 55125, USA
properties.description: Ripe and flashy, this Cabernet is a bit rustic now. The vineyard is quite high up in the Mayacamas Mountains, and the flavors show that intense, mountain concentration of blackberries and cherries. Without history to refer to, it's hard to predict this wine's future, but you might consider cellaring it for 6–8 years to see what happens.

properties.title: Château la Louvière 2012  Pessac-Léognan
properties.address: 149 Av. de Cadaujac, 33850 Léognan, France
properties.description: Pure Sauvignon, this is a tropical fruit flavored wine. It's bright and fruity while also showing a dense texture of grapefruit and steely minerality. The combination makes for an intense wine that's likely to need time, so drink from 2017.

properties.title: Domaine Vacheron 2012 Chambrates  (Sancerre)
properties.address: 1 Rue du Puits Poulton, 18300 Sancerre, France
properties.description: This opulent, ripe wine comes from a single vineyard. It has a rich texture, with dense yellow and apple fruits that are allied to a more citrus, gooseberry and lemon character. It rolls around the mouth with a smooth, satisfying aftertaste.

properties.title: Testarossa 2012 Fogstone Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 300 College Ave, Los Gatos, CA 95030, USA
properties.description: With a nose approaching butterscotch but expertly cut with acidity and cinnamon spice, this is the best Testarossa single-vineyard Chardonnay of 2012. On the palate, there are lovely flavors of salted caramel and yellow peach, and the wine manages to be simultaneously spicy, sharp and smooth. The finish lingers extra long.

properties.title: Château de France 2012  Pessac-Léognan
properties.address: 98 Av. de Mont de Marsan, 33850 Léognan, France
properties.description: Rich and full-bodied, it's full of tropical fruits that dominate the ripe texture. Hints of wood are there as well as the natural crisp acidity of Sauvignon Blanc. It needs time to develop and bring out all its ripe flavors. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Domaine Vacheron 2011 Le Paradis  (Sancerre)
properties.description: Showing its powerful chalky terroir, this single-vineyard wine has intense herbaceous and steely characters. They go with the ripe, open fruitiness that brings in citrus, crisp apple and quince flavors. It's ready to drink.

properties.title: Château Bélingard 2014 Bélingard Blanc White (Bergerac Sec)
properties.address: Château Belingard, 24240 Pomport, France
properties.description: This blend of Sauvignon Blanc, Sémillon and Muscadelle is fruity and lightly perfumed. It has a herbal character as well, along with bright acidity and a chalk and mineral texture. It is ready to drink, although it will be better from late 2016.

properties.title: Piattelli 2012 Premium Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Luján de Cuyo)
properties.description: Raspberry and cherry aromas are mild while not stirring much excitement. This feels a bit raw and tannic, but it's got enough body to hold up. Berry and plum flavors finish with hints of spice and chocolate.

properties.title: Max Ferd. Richter 2014 Mülheimer Sonnenlay Kabinett Feinherb Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Hauptstraße 85, 54486 Mülheim (Mosel), Germany
properties.description: A whiff of spice amidst freshly pressed apples and pears gives this bright, easy going Kabinett an autumnal feel. A swirl of honey enriches the midpalate, finishing with lemon-tea sweetness. Begin drinking now.

properties.title: Nora 2014 Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.address: Bruñeiras 7, 36440 Bruñeiras, Pontevedra, Spain
properties.description: A positive bouquet of melon, white flowers and honey leads to a ripped acidic palate that generates tangy, almost sharp flavors of orange and gooseberry. A citrusy angular finish turns pithy and bitter as it dissipates. Drink now.

properties.title: José Maria da Fonseca 2014 Colecção Privada Verdelho (Península de Setúbal)
properties.address: R. José Augusto Coelho 12a, 2925-538 Azeitão, Portugal
properties.description: This is a gentle, perfumed wine that is ripe and deliciously fruity. It does have a more herbal, green side as well as a tangy texture but the main impression is of a wine that is soft and ready to drink.

properties.title: La Val 2014 Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.description: Dusty, clammy, white fruit aromas are generic. This is pulpy in feel with a vague focus. Leesy, pithy citrus flavors are standard and short on personality, while this finishes adequately with a mild citric lift.

properties.title: Heritance 2014 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Kiwi, peach and pineapple mark this blend of 93% Sauvignon Blanc and 7% Sémillon, providing a tropical character and personality. Medium in body and weight, it finishes moderately influenced by oak and a touch of vanilla cream.

properties.title: HPSepicurean 2013 Rosé (Mosel)
properties.address: 432 Maple St #4, Ramona, CA 92065, USA
properties.description: Flirty and floral, this sunny off-dry Pinot Noir rosé (blended with a touch of Dornfelder) offers forward fruitiness in an elegant frame. With a kiss of strawberry and cherry flavors, it's an accessible, yet satisfying quaffer.

properties.title: Kaiken 2015 Terroir Series Torrontés (Salta)
properties.address: Roque Sáenz Peña 5516, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: This is typical, textbook Torrontés with tropical aromas of lime and orange peel. Citrusy acidity creates a refreshing palate feel, while tangerine, lime and lychee flavors conclude in a cleansing, non-oily fashion.

properties.title: Zuccardi 2013 Serie A Cabernet Sauvignon (Valle de Uco)
properties.description: Wiry plum and raspberry aromas are jumpy and a touch candied. This feels bulky and grapy, with an obtuse body. Salty lightly herbal plum and berry flavors end with a touch of heat along with herbal leftovers.

properties.title: Von Schleinitz 2012 HD Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: Stony and mineral on the nose, this brut-style sparkling Riesling revitalizes the palate with a fine persistent perlage. Flavors of tart green apple, lemon and pear are zesty and spry. It's a straightforward but four-square sparkler at a value price.

properties.title: Inception 2013 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 19239 US-27, Clermont, FL 34715, USA
properties.description: A dense vanilla-bean character coats a nose of seared white peach and toasted nuts. The palate features thick, ripe fruits, preserved lemon, a touch of walnut and a rocky grip.

properties.title: Lucky Neko 2014 Pinot Grigio (Rheinhessen)
properties.description: Whimsically feline packaging aside, this fruity and forward Pinot Grigio does a good job balancing bright luscious stone fruit against refreshing lemon-lime acidity. It's an easygoing, widely appealing dry white at a bargain price. Drink now.

properties.title: Mathern 2014 Gutsriesling Dry Riesling (Nahe)
properties.address: Winzerstraße 5, 55585 Niederhausen, Germany
properties.description: Touches of autumn leaves and dried herbs lend a savory feel to this dry and tightly composed Riesling. Bracing acidity and savory apple and pear flavors mark the palate.

properties.title: McManis 2014 Viognier (River Junction)
properties.description: Fresh cantaloupe aromas, mouth-filling pear and peach flavors and a generous texture make this an extroverted wine that could make a great pairing with salty cheeses. It is full bodied, very smooth-textured and long on the finish, where honey and vanilla flavors echo.

properties.title: Adega Mãe 2014 Dory White (Lisboa)
properties.address: Estrada Municipal 554, 2565-841, Portugal
properties.description: A beautifully crisp wine produced by consultant Anselmo Mendes, this is as fresh as possible, bright with acidity and herbal hints. It's light and very bright, finishing with citrus and orange zest flavors.

properties.title: Encanto 2014 Godello (Bierzo)
properties.description: Aromas of lemon, green apple and wet stone make up the nose on this quaffable Godello that's solid on the palate, with some pithiness. Flavors of melon, apple and green banana finish with notes of lees, citrus pith and bitterness.

properties.title: Mauro Sebaste 2010  Roero Arneis
properties.address: Via Garibaldi, 222 bis, 12051 Gallo CN, Italy
properties.description: Linear and precise, this bright Roero Arneis would pair with pasta, vegetables or seafood. The wine offers clean aromas of white peach, honey and walnut skin.

properties.title: Mulderbosch 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon Rosé (Coastal Region)
properties.description: Vibrant and lively with forward notes of fresh red berries and pink florals along with a touch of watermelon rind and soft sandalwood. Juicy and clean in the mouth with a crisp, mouthwatering finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Navarro 2009 Late Harvest Sweet Gewürztraminer (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 5601 CA-128, Philo, CA 95466, USA
properties.description: With 8.1% residual sugar, this is a sweet wine. Honey flavors dominate, with underlying notes of apricots, tangerines and golden mangoes. It could be more concentrated and intense, but the sweetness is attractive. Drink now.

properties.title: Nuna 2011 Reserve Torrontés (Salta)
properties.address: 8043 Main St, Middletown, VA 22645, USA
properties.description: Oily and almondy on the nose, but also layered and stacked. Feels lively, jumpy and pumped full of acidity, then tastes of classic lychee and green melon. Full and driving, with citrusy zest to the tail end.

properties.title: Paul Cluver 2009 Riesling (Elgin)
properties.address: Paul Cluver Estate Wines, N2, Kromco Turn off, De Rust Estate, Grabouw, 7160, South Africa
properties.description: This easy and straightforward white boasts pleasant notes of fresh apple and lemon-lime citrus throughout. The palate is lush but braced with medium acidity that lingers into the close. Enjoy it now.

properties.title: Peter Zemmer 2007 Cortinie Bianco White (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)
properties.description: Cortinie Bianco opens with impressive intensity and lasting aromas of peach cobbler, vanilla cream and preserved peaches. It follows with a smooth, dense texture in the mouth.

properties.title: Robertson Winery 2011 Sauvignon Blanc (Robertson)
properties.address: 54 Voortrekker Ave, Robertson, 6705, South Africa
properties.description: A soft but pretty wine, with notes of yellow florals, orange supremes, sweet grass and a touch of peony. It's balanced and lifted with a good acidic cut to the palate, leading through to a mouthwatering finish laced with white strawberry flavors.

properties.title: Rued 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.description: Shows the briary, scoury mouthfeel that so often characterizes Dry Creek Valley red wines, as opposed to the smooth lushness of neighboring Napa Valley. The flavors are just fine, of wild blackberries, cherries and cola. Drink over the next six years.

properties.title: Salvano 2009  Roero Arneis
properties.description: Fresh, clean and crisp on the palate, this easy white wine from Piedmont would pair with seafood appetizers, crab cakes or fried calamari. The bouquet shows passion fruit and citrus but the finish is sharp and zesty.

properties.title: Salvatore Principe 2010 In The Groove Chardonnay (California)
properties.address: 18425 Highland Valley Rd, Ramona, CA 92065, USA
properties.description: For the price, this Chardonnay will do nicely, tasting of very ripe mango and Nilla wafer, an all-around crisp, medium-bodied white with good balance between fruit, and acidity and light alcohol. Will pair deliciously with crab.

properties.title: Talamonti 2009 Trabocchetto Pecorino (Colline Pescaresi)
properties.description: Pecorino is the white wine of the moment for those who love the rustic tastes of Italy's vast patrimony of indigenous grapes. This expression shows loads of peach, lemon and Golden Delicious apple.

properties.title: Collavini 2010 Villa Canlungo Black Label Pinot Grigio (Collio)
properties.address: Via della Ribolla Gialla, 2, 33040, 33040 Corno di Rosazzo UD, Italy
properties.description: There's a nice, creamy quality to this luminous Pinot Grigio that adds dimension and staying power to what is otherwise an informal, food-friendly white wine. Pair it with spicy Thai or Indian food.

properties.title: Comelli 2010 Sauvignon (Colli Orientali del Friuli)
properties.description: The wonderful thing about Sauvignon from Friuli (in northeast Italy) is that environmental factors like soil, temperature and geography, give the variety more heft and density than you might find elsewhere. This expression shows the grape's characteristic aromas with a touch of smooth creaminess on the finish.

properties.title: Cueva de las Manos 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: Santa Cruz Province, Argentina
properties.description: A foxy-smelling, juicy, jammy Cabernet with wild berry and sweet oak aromas setting up a forward-feeling palate with plum, berry, sweet oak and resiny flavors. Presents itself as balanced and above average but doesn't go beyond that.

properties.title: Decoy 2010 Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
properties.description: A very nice Chardonnay that will satisfy almost everybody who's a fan of the variety. It's dry, brisk in acidity and clean, with a creamy texture housing rich pineapple, tangerine, vanilla and buttered toast flavors.

properties.title: Ermacora 2010 Friulano (Colli Orientali del Friuli)
properties.address: Via Solzaredo, 9, 33040 Ipplis UD, Italy
properties.description: Ermacora's wines consistently show a smooth, silky quality. You'll recognize that house style here too thanks to this Friulano's creamy texture and pretty aromas of peach cobbler and pear.

properties.title: Frog's Leap 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Shows lots of rich blackberry and cherry sour candy flavors, with a smoky coating of oak, and smooth, easy-to-drink tannins that make this Cabernet ready to open now.

properties.title: Abbazia di Novacella 2010 Müller-Thurgau (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Via Abbazia, 1, 39040 Novacella BZ, Italy
properties.description: Aromatic, rich, creamy and intense, this beautiful Italian cool-climate Müller-Thurgau would pair with spicy Thai or Vietnamese dishes. The wine is beautifully linear and clean overall.

properties.title: Bibi Graetz 2010 Testamatta Cicala del Giglio Ansonica (Toscana)
properties.address: Piazza Mino da Fiesole, 37, 50014 Fiesole FI, Italy
properties.description: This expression of Ansonica from coastal Tuscany (from cult winery Testamatta) shows impressive smoothness and silkiness with flavors of citrus, stone fruit, melon and white almond. Pair this wine with baked fish.

properties.title: Cantina Cincinnato 2010 Castore White (Lazio)
properties.address: Via Cori Cisterna, 23, 04010 Cori LT, Italy
properties.description: This white wine from Lazio (the region of capital city Rome) is made with 100% Bellone a little-known indigenous grape found sporadically in central Italy. It shows bright, fruity characteristics of stone fruit, melon and citrus zest with a creamy texture in the mouth.

properties.title: Cantina Produttori San Michele Appiano 2010 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Via Circonvallazione, 17-19, 39057 Appiano sulla strada del vino BZ, Italy
properties.description: This pretty Pinot Grigio would pair with or cream of shrimp risotto. There's a dry mineral note of brimstone and granite beyond more obvious tones of peach and citrus.

properties.title: Valle Reale 2009 Vigneto Vigne Nuove  (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo Cerasuolo)
properties.description: A bright, saturated rosé with a pink raspberry color and bright berry aromas, this Cerasuolo from central Italy will pair with shellfish or white meat. The wine finishes with a crisp, easy close.

properties.title: Wine by Joe 2010 Pinot Gris (Oregon)
properties.address: 239 SE 5th St, Dundee, OR 97115, USA
properties.description: Much like this producer's Pinot Blanc, this wine offers apple and pear fruit, with just a little more flesh and a hint of cinnamon.

properties.title: Gérard Bertrand 2010 Réserve Spéciale Chardonnay (Pays d'Oc)
properties.description: A touch of sweet spice jazzes up the nose, giving lift to the lightly baked apple and yellow peach characteristics. The round, medium-bodied palate has lively acidity and a sweet orange-oil flavored finish.

properties.title: Lemelson 2010 Tikka's Run Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
properties.description: Clean, crisply defined green apple and pear fruit flavors anchor this high-acid Pinot Gris. A fine choice with cream-based sauces or seafood that needs something to cut through the flavor. More bottle age could round it out.

properties.title: Meli 2010 Riesling (Central Valley)
properties.description: A heavy dose of petrol is the aromatic greeting, and it comes with hints of rubber, latex and waxy white fruits. Feels tangy and fresh due to blazing acidity, while it tastes both of tropical fruits and diesel. Long and chiseled on the finish.

properties.title: Page Mill Winery 2010 Sauvignon Blanc (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 1960 S Livermore Ave, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.description: Creamy with ripe apricot and peach fuzz flavors, this Sauvignon Blanc has a wet stone quality to it as well, with an oak presence and lightly sweet finish.

properties.title: Producteurs Plaimont 2011 Colombelle L'Original Blanc White (Côtes de Gascogne)
properties.address: 59 Av. des Mousquetaires, 32100 Condom, France
properties.description: A blend of Colombard and Ugni Blanc, this is crisp and lively. It has a wonderfully fruity tang, and is packed with flavors of citrus fruit and green apple juice. Screwcap.

properties.title: Producteurs Plaimont 2011 Colombelle L'Original Rosé (Côtes de Gascogne)
properties.address: 59 Av. des Mousquetaires, 32100 Condom, France
properties.description: A deliciously fruity rosé, brimming with smiling red-berry flavors and enhanced by a lime-like tang. It is just what a light summer rosé should be. Screwcap.

properties.title: Tyler Florence 2009 Blend #5 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: This is a soft, somewhat one-dimensional Cab. It has jammy flavors of blackberries and cherries, with the vanilla and toast of oak barrel aging. Drink now.

properties.title: Calcu 2011 Reserva Rosé (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Los Militares 4777, Las Condes, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: Light pink to the eye, then fresh and vital on the nose, with a touch of stalkiness. Refreshing, lip-smacking acidity drives the palate, pushing tangy, basic citrus flavors.

properties.title: Summerland 2013 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
properties.description: Quite light in color, this is a lighter style of Chardonnay, kicking off with crispy green apple aromas mixed with a bit of barrel smoke. Lime and apple lead the lean palate, which shines with granite minerality.

properties.title: Summerland 2013 Happy Canyon Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 2330 Lillie Ave, Summerland, CA 93067, USA
properties.description: Widely accessible and hedonistic aromas of cherry pie with a tinge of wild mint lead the nose on this young but ready county blend. The palate is framed with oak influence and the associated tannins, as well as plum and ripe cherry fruit. It's unusual that this 2013 is on the market after 10 months in barrel.

properties.title: Swiftwater Cellars 2013 No. 9 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 301 Rope Rider Dr, Cle Elum, WA 98922, USA
properties.description: Quince, starfruit and white melon share the spotlight here, with acidity and sugar in balance, yielding a slightly off-dry wine. Forward and fresh, it brings in highlights of lemon tea as it sails across the palate, and could do nicely for a lunch of cold whitefish or trout.

properties.title: Bonneau 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
properties.description: A 100% Cabernet Sauvignon that offers cherry, plum and earthy spice, the tannins soft and supple. This is a wine to enjoy now, aged close to two years in French oak, 20% of it new.

properties.title: Hunnicutt 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Calistoga)
properties.description: The winery makes a line of Cabernet Sauvignon from various AVAs of the Napa Valley, highlighting each on the label. From warmer Calistoga, this mouthCab is brambly black fruit-forward with layers of coffee and mocha.

properties.title: Lieb 2013 Bridge Lane Chardonnay (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.address: 13050 Oregon Rd, Cutchogue, NY 11935, USA
properties.description: Honeydew and mango notes lend tropical flair to apple and pear flavors in this fruit-forward, easy drinking Chardonnay. Dry and medium bodied in style, it's balanced by a stream of zesty lime acidity and a touch of saline mineral on the finish.

properties.title: Milbrandt 2013 The Estates Viognier (Wahluke Slope)
properties.description: An aromatic wine with notes of creamsicle and orange blossom. It's medium bodied with well delineated stone fruit flavors and a lick of tart acidity that seems surprising for the variety and vintage.

properties.title: Domaine Charles Baur 2012 Cuvée Charles Riesling (Alsace)
properties.description: This balanced wine is crisp, taut and mineral. It tastes very dry, packed with acidity and perfumed apple and lemon flavors. It's quite ready to drink, but will be better from 2016.

properties.title: Domaine Jean Sipp 2012 Vieilles Vignes Riesling (Alsace)
properties.description: With good concentration, this still-young Riesling has potential. It's aromatic, with hedgerow aromas, summer fruits and bright acidity. There is a juicy background along with a more textured character that is ready for that aging. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Dunstan 2013 Durell Vineyard Rosé (Sonoma Coast)
properties.description: The only rosé made from Durell Vineyard, this one employs 100% Pinot Noir for a subtle, light, dry wine that's refreshing in strawberry and peach. Having spent six months in neutral French oak, it's structured and midweight, just right for the table.

properties.title: First Press 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 316 N San Fernando Blvd, Burbank, CA 91502, USA
properties.description: Offering great value white, this is 90% Sauvignon Blanc with 10% Sémillon. It's bright and intensely flavored, first with pineapple followed by a flash of grapefruit and layering of vanilla. A crowd pleaser and food-friendly quaff.

properties.title: Santa Alicia 2012 Gran Reserva de Los Andes Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Circunvalación Máximo Valdés 4135, Pirque, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: Red berry and herbal aromas are firm and focused on the nose. A snappy palate deals savory and fruity flavors of red berry, olive and mint. Firm tannins and driving acidity push the finish a bit further.

properties.title: Sparkman 2013 Pearl Sauvignon Blanc (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14300 NE 145th St #102, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: An unusual version of Pearl, this includes 9% Grenache Blanc and 5% Roussanne in the blend. Though it's labeled Sauvignon Blanc, those other grapes seem to command center stage, and the wine might as well be thought of as a creative white blend rather than a single variety. Pungent and herbal, it has well-knit and balanced green and yellow fruit flavors, with notes of caraway seed and grass.

properties.title: J. Rochioli 2011 Sweetwater Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 6192 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: The Sweetwater block is the highest on the Rochioli estate, stretching into the hills. The wine is very concentrated in green apples, spicy Asian pears and insanely ripe summer peaches. It's quite oaky, with strong buttered toast notes, yet the oak is balanced with the fruit. A classy, flashy wine that drinks well now, and should develop in the bottle over the next 4–6 years.

properties.title: Domaine de la Mordorée 2010 La Reine des Bois Red (Châteauneuf-du-Pape)
properties.address: 250 Chem. des Oliviers, 30126 Tavel, France
properties.description: The Delorme family's luxury cuvée is aged in a fair bit of small oak, which imparts a plush texture and cedary overtones to the wine. It's full-bodied and powerful, loaded with dark cherry fruit and baking spices that linger on the finish. Drink now–2020 or so.

properties.title: Domaine Isabel Ferrando 2010 Colombis Red (Châteauneuf-du-Pape)
properties.description: Despite being aged in used barrels, this does show some oaky notes, but they're well balanced by bushels of black cherry fruit. It's lush, creamy and harmonious, with a long finish and up to 10 years of longevity.

properties.title: Domaine Luc et Lise Pavelot 2011  Corton-Charlemagne
properties.address: 6 Rue du Paulant, 21420 Pernand-Vergelesses, France
properties.description: A powerful wine, still closed. It has great potential with delicious acidity at the same time as depth of flavor complexity. This is a wine for the long-term, so give it at least seven years.

properties.title: Château de la Font du Loup 2010 Le Puy Rolland Red (Châteauneuf-du-Pape)
properties.winery: Château de la Font du Loup
properties.description: This 100% Grenache cuvée displays charming and complex aromas of garrigue and ripe cherries and raspberries. It's lush and creamy in texture despite being vinified and aged in concrete. It's a touch warm on the finish, but delicious nonetheless. Drink now–2020.

properties.title: Communication Block 2010 Lampyridae Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Mount Veeder)
properties.description: Serious cellar Cabernet here. It's eruptive with jammy, blackberries, cherries and black currants, with a delicious edge of dark chocolate. The new oak adds spicy, pungent notes of buttered toast and caramel. Yet it's also very tannic. So balanced and finessed, this Cab should have no trouble negotiating the next 10-plus years. Maybe longer. Much longer.

properties.title: Gustave Lorentz 2010 Réserve Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.description: Soft and attractively spicy, this has flavors of fresh apple, exotic mango and kiwi. Along with this fruitiness is a perfumed character that rounds out the finish. Screwcap.

properties.title: Mission Estate 2010 Chardonnay (Hawke's Bay)
properties.address: 198 Church Road, Poraiti, Napier 4112, New Zealand
properties.description: It's nice to see this historic winery finally being represented in the United States. This offers scents of toasted grain, smoke, citrus and just a hint of butter before it hits the palate with ample weight and a slightly creamy texture. A bit woody and smoky, but nice in that style. Drink now.

properties.title: Andriano 2011 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Wehrburgstraße, 5, 39010 Andrian, Autonome Provinz Bozen - Südtirol, Italy
properties.description: An ideal Italian whites to pair with spaghetti alle vongole or fried fish. The bouquet is redolent of almond paste, stone fruit and citrus. There's a very well-defined streak of sassy spice on the crisp finish.

properties.title: Antica 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: This is dry and rich in blackberry jam flavors. Right now it's fierce in tannins and acidity, making it tough and resistant in feeling. Give it several hours in a decanter before serving, or else hold it for 4-5 years.

properties.title: Cave de Beblenheim 2010 Baron de Hoen Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 14 Rue de Hoen, 68980 Beblenheim, France
properties.description: Full and fruity, this is already a delicious wine. A note of tangy citrus enlivens the apple and pear flavors. This has weight and an intense texture, with warm acidity and a touch of spice on the finish.

properties.title: Willm 2009 Kirchberg de Barr Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
properties.description: This is already mature. It has weight and demonstrates a delicious balance between a ripe white-fruit flavor and fresh acidity, with a fine note of tangy citrus. Ready to drink.

properties.title: L. Tramier & Fils 2010  Pouilly-Fuissé
properties.address: 14 Rue de Chamerose, 71640 Mercurey, France
properties.description: Flavors of apples, pears and lemons compose this ripe, friendly wine. It has nutmeg and wood flavors along with a warm and rounded character. Drink now.

properties.title: Malibràn 2010 5 Grammi Brut  (Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)
properties.address: Via Barca II°, 63, 31058 Susegana TV, Italy
properties.description: A unique fruit aroma is highlighted with notes  of almond, yellow rose and cracked white pepper. The mouthfeel is creamy and soft thanks to the frothy mousse.

properties.title: Malibràn 2011 Millesimato Dry  (Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)
properties.address: Via Barca II°, 63, 31058 Susegana TV, Italy
properties.description: This has very nice aromatic intensity, boasting layers of peach blossom, jasmine and honey. Sweet peach tones appear on the close and are enhanced by the wine's creamy texture.

properties.title: Mount Veeder 2007 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Tough and gritty in tannins, this Cabernet is still raw. There's a flattering core of ripe blackberry and black currant fruits, but the wine doesn't show the approachability of other 2007 Cabernets. Give it another five years in the cellar, but no guarantees that the fruit will outlast the tannins.

properties.title: Perlage 2010 Col di Manza Millesimato Rive di Ogliano Extra Dry  (Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)
properties.address: Via Cal del Muner, 16, 31010 Farra di Soligo TV, Italy
properties.description: Col di Manza has it all: It's a vineyard-designate, vintage-dated Prosecco Superiore made with organically and biodynamically farmed fruit. It's a mouthful, with soft effervescence and fruit intensity.

properties.title: Coelho 2011 Estate Renovação Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 111 5th St, Amity, OR 97101, USA
properties.description: Aromas of green apple, melon, pear and a hint of Meyer lemon introduce this tart and flavorful Pinot Gris. It's lightly spiced, fruity and compact.

properties.title: Col Vetoraz Spumanti 2011 Brut  (Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)
properties.address: Str. delle Treziese, 1, 31049 Valdobbiadene TV, Italy
properties.description: A polished and very tonic effort, with a sharp personality and bright aromas of lemon, white flower, flint and crushed white pepper. It's crisp and balanced overall.

properties.title: Holly's Hill 2010 Estate Roussanne (El Dorado)
properties.description: Florally pungent, with sweet peach and apricot notes, this smells great. It's richly textured and balanced.

properties.title: Roux Père et Fils 2010  Pouilly-Fuissé
properties.address: 42 Rue des Lavières, 21190 Saint-Aubin, France
properties.description: On the ripe, tropical side of Pouilly, this is a full wine, laden with attractive notes of wood, juicy yellow fruit and bitter orange zest. It is warm, rich and ready to drink later this year.

properties.title: Terrazas de Los Andes 2011 Reserva Torrontés (Salta)
properties.description: A consistent Torrontés, with tropical and exotic aromas of green melon, lychee and bath oil. It feels round despite sporting nice acids, while flavors of green apple, lychee, melon and cardamom work well in front of a long, sweet, pithy finish.

properties.title: Conti Formentini 2010 Pinot Grigio (Collio)
properties.address: Via Oslavia, 5, 34070 San Floriano del Collio GO, Italy
properties.description: This opens with sweet fruit tones of honeydew, ripe peach and apricot. The full, generous mouthfeel is quite loveable.

properties.title: Turnbull 2008 Fortuna Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
properties.description: Scores high on the deliciousness factor, with waves of blackberries, blueberries, currants, dark chocolate and smoky oak. A little on the soft side, which might limit ageability, but it sure is opulent.

properties.title: Lujon 2009 Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
properties.description: Absorbingly complex with racy, textural, mineral-driven flavors, this excellent wine features fleshy apple and pear fruit, crisply defined and extended. The low alcohol—just a tad over 13%—keeps the acids front and center; the wine is immaculately fresh, with just a touch (0.7%) of residual sugar.

properties.title: Williams Selyem 2009 Drake Estate Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 7227 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: A big, rich, flashy Chardonnay that's designed to impress, and does. Almost too much of a good thing, with massive lemondrop candy, pineapple, lime and kiwi fruit flavors, as well as firm minerality and lots of toasty oak. Drink now with opulent fare, such as shellfish.

properties.title: Joh. Jos. Prüm 2009 Wehlener Sonnenuhr Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: Are the '09 auslesen from Manfred Prüm just in a dull phase? This wine still impresses for its scents of crushed stone and latent power, but the peach, melon and citrus notes fall a little short of expectations for this venerated estate. Give it 10 years or more to come around.

properties.title: Stuhlmuller Vineyards 2008 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
properties.description: Stuhlmuller's regular 2008 Cabernet, released a year ago, was quite good. This one's even better. It has all the hallmarks of a superior Cabernet, with rich, delicious blackberry, cherry, licorice, Dr. Pepper cola and oak flavors, framed into soft, intricate tannins. With a pleasant minerality, it should age well through 2016, gradually losing fruit.

properties.title: Bodega Catena Zapata 2009 White Stones Adrianna Vineyard Chardonnay (Mendoza)
properties.description: Without doubt the most full and complete Chardonnay from Argentina that this critic has tried. It smells lush and toasty, with elegant apple and pear aromas. The mouthfeel is rich and balanced, while flavors of baked apple, vanilla cream and woodspice are endearing. Long and flavorful on the finish, and not overoaked. A serious Chardonnay to drink now.

properties.title: Bründlmayer 2010 Alte Reben Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.description: Old vines give an extra concentration in this intensely spice- and green plum-flavored wine. With its considerable freshness it should age well, its rounded character likely to develop. For now, enjoy its beautiful purity of fruit.

properties.title: Corvalle 2010 Weka Ranch Vineyard Chardonnay (Oak Knoll District)
properties.description: Quite an interesting Chardonnay, in an era when so many are too sweet and extracted. There's plenty of orange and apricot fruit flavor, but also a brilliant streak of minerality, like a lick of cold steel, and the overall taste is dry. Really easy to like, with lots of complexity to warrant repeated sipping.

properties.title: Inception 2010 Viognier (Santa Barbara County)
properties.description: Shows the flashy, voluptuous nature of California Viognier, offering delicious waves of mango, pear, honeysuckle, vanilla cream and mineral flavors. Surprisingly, there's no oak, although the wine was aged on the lees. With brisk acidity, this is a fine Viognier for drinking now with Asian fare.

properties.title: Anthonij Rupert 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (Coastal Region)
properties.description: A stunning Cab that's a little bit of an easy-pleaser with an assertive oaky streak througout. Hints of cigar tobacco, fresh coffee grinds and whole vanilla bean infuse the dark, jammy berry fruit flavors. The mouth is round and lush, but firm tannins and a crushed velvet texture provide structure and linger well into the spiced chocolate close.

properties.title: Broman 2006 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 945 Deer Park Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Tart now, with lots of acidity cutting across the blackberry and mineral flavors. As rich as it is, there's a taut elegance that makes the wine tense. Clearly too young, it should develop fine bottle complexity over this decade.

properties.title: Caymus 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: A flashy, opulent Cabernet. You could even call it sexy. It's so soft and luxurious in blackberry, blueberry and cassis flavors. Absolutely delicious by any standard, yet the dry structure maintains elegant balance. Drink soon for youthful drama. Hard to believe production was nearly 72,000 cases.

properties.title: Domaine Rotier 2008 Renaissance Doux Loin de l'Oeil (Gaillac Doux)
properties.address: Petit Nareye, 2833 route de Lagrave, 81600 Cadalen, France
properties.description: The Loin de l'Oeil is the local white grape of Gaillac and is very happy to produce sweet botrytized wines. This is rich, full of botrytis flavors along with fig, sultana and apricot. Age the wine for 2–3 years, but it is ready to drink now.

properties.title: Elena Walch 2008 Castel Ringberg Riserva Chardonnay (Alto Adige)
properties.description: This gorgeous Riserva Chardonnay shows modern oak touches of vanilla and toasted almond backed by apricot, honeysuckle and creamy lemon mousse. It's a thick, structured white wine with a creamy finish that would pair with chicken, shellfish or pork.

properties.title: Frisk 2015 Prickly Riesling (Alpine Valleys)
properties.description: Prickly refers to the wine's texture, which is definitely lightly frizzante (spritzy). That helps boost the wine's aromas, making it perfumed and floral, even Muscat-like. It's light in body and slightly off dry, with notes of apricot, apple blossom and gingery spice. Drink now.

properties.title: Calcu 2016 Reserva Especial Rosé (Colchagua Valley)
properties.description: Raspberry, bubble gum and rhubarb aromas get this pink-tinted rosé off to a solid start. Juicy and smooth on the palate, this tastes of citrus fruits, pineapple and red plum. Bright acidity ensures that this is lasting and fresh on the finish.

properties.title: Capolino Perlingieri 2015 Vento Greco (Sannio)
properties.description: This opens with subtle aromas evoking yellow pear, Mediterranean brush and a rather unusual whiff suggesting warm hay. The linear rather lean palate shows mature apricot, citrus and a hint of bitter almond alongside bright acidity and a tangy saline note.

properties.title: Columbia Crest 2015 Reserve Chenin Blanc (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.description: Light aromas of white peach and flowers are followed by elegantly styled, off-dry stone-fruit flavors. It provides intrigue but doesn't entirely deliver.

properties.title: Concha y Toro 2015 Marques de Casa Concha Chardonnay (Limarí Valley)
properties.address: Av. Virginia Subercaseaux 210, Pirque, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: On the nose, this Chardonnay smells mostly of oak, with apple and melon notes in the background. Salty oaky flavors mask the wine's fruit, which falls into the stone-fruit category. A barrel-dominated finish with nectarine notes is resiny and salty.

properties.title: Contini 2015 Elibaria  (Vermentino di Gallura)
properties.address: Via Genova, 48, 09072 Cabras OR, Italy
properties.description: Aromas of tropical fruit, yellow apple and fragrant wild flower lead into a straightforward palate offering dried apricot, citrus, bitter almond and a confectionery note. Fresh acidity brightens the finish.

properties.title: Fiuza 2016 3 Castas White (Tejo)
properties.description: The three grape varieties (castas) are Arinto, Chardonnay and the rare Vital. The result is a light, bright wine dominated by rich acidity, an easy, open texture and just the right amount of crispness at the end. Drink now.

properties.title: Guidi 1929 2015  Vernaccia di San Gimignano
properties.description: Here's an enjoyable white that has light aromas of orchard fruit and citrus. The ripe palate reflects the nose, doling out yellow apple and tangerine alongside a note of bitter almond.

properties.title: Kenwood 2015 Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 9592 Sonoma Hwy, Kenwood, CA 95452, USA
properties.description: Rounded and likable, this is a bang-up deal for a wine of fine quality, textured, light and fruity in stone fruit and pineapple.

properties.title: La Mormoraia 2014 Riserva  (Vernaccia di San Gimignano)
properties.address: Località S. Andrea, 53037 San Gimignano SI, Italy
properties.description: Aromas of white spring flower, oak-driven vanilla and a whiff of white stone fruit lead the nose. The oak sensations follow through the somewhat lean palate, along with pear and a confectionery note. It closes on a note of bitter almond.

properties.title: Maddalena 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.description: The nose on this bottling is fairly light, with tangy blackberry and graphite aromas most prominent. The palate is framed by a chalky tannins and a strong acidity, with more blackberry juice flavors and the slightest touch of tobacco.

properties.title: Mercer 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.description: Barrel aromas are in the lead, with notes of toast, café au lait, vanilla and caramel. The palate is full of cherry and barrel flavors, backed by lightly gritty tannins. Vanilla notes persist on the finish.

properties.title: Morini 2015 Sette Note Secco Albana (Romagna)
properties.address: 301 Water St SE, Washington, DC 20003, USA
properties.description: This offers subdued aromas suggesting pear, acacia, sage and hazelnut that carry onto the ripe palate along with yellow peach. Bitter almond marks the finish.

properties.title: Nicolas Potel 2013 La Pucelle Premier Cru  (Rully)
properties.description: The fruitiness in this tight wine is still developing, hiding for now behind a bitter, toasty character. That should soften as the wine fills out—from 2018.

properties.title: Palagetto 2013 Riserva  (Vernaccia di San Gimignano)
properties.address: Via Racciano, 10, 53037 San Gimignano SI, Italy
properties.description: Aromas of toast, French oak, pressed yellow flower and white stone fruit lead the way. The rather lean palate offers yellow apple skin, bitter almond, saline and a honey note.

properties.title: Santa Rita 2016 120 Reserva Especial Chardonnay (Central Valley)
properties.description: No, this is not a misprint. This $6 Chardonnay is a quaffer's dream. Aromas of apple and pear are clean and pleasant. On the palate, this feels round and balanced. Slightly salty apple flavors are steady on the finish.

properties.title: Philippe Viallet 2015 Apremont Vieilles Vignes Jacquère (Savoie)
properties.description: This wine is crisp, tight and mineral while also full of lively apple and citrus fruit. It offers concentration from old vines and a fresh, forward character that demands instant drinking.

properties.title: Poet's Leap 2015 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14450 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
