Bright lemon freshness makes the fruit flavors even more vivid. The balance between fruit and freshness gives this tension and makes it very moreish. The finish is clean and orange scented.

properties.title: Domaine Serene 2015 Evenstad Reserve Chardonnay (Dundee Hills)
properties.description: This is a rich, heavy wine, a Chardonnay on steroids. It's packed with ripe and lush tree fruits, and those flavors are matched with generous barrel toast. Though it feels a bit thick on the palate, it has enough acidity to avoid being flabby and is terrifically delicious. Drink now through 2021.

properties.title: Domaine Specht 2015 Mandelberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
properties.description: Friendly, fresh ripe apples beckon on the nose. The pure and fruit-driven palate follows suit, presenting flavors of juicy, ripe apples. A smidgen of residual sugar boosts these delicious fruit flavors and turns up the volume on ease and joy but Riesling's vibrant freshness counters this masterfully so the finish is just off dry. This is lovely, bouncy and full of joy. Drink 2017–2022.

properties.title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2013 Indian Wells Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: This lightly aromatic wine offers notes of butterscotch, peach and toasty spices. It's lighter in style with a creamy feel to the stone and tropical fruit flavors.

properties.title: Damiani 2013 Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 4704 NY-414, Burdett, NY 14818, USA
properties.description: While creamy and voluminous, this full-bodied Chardonnay boasts fresh green plum and apple flavors brightened by sunny lemon acidity. Streaks of vanilla, toast and spice are bold yet well integrated. It finishes moderately long with notes of dried herbs.

properties.title: Edetària 2013 Via Edetana White (Terra Alta)
properties.address: TV-7231, 3, 43780 Gandesa, Tarragona, Spain
properties.description: Waxy, dusty aromas of stone fruits and honey are typical of Garnatxa Blanca, although this contains 30% Viognier as well. A citrusy, direct palate with cutting acidity sets up lemon, tangerine and green-apple flavors. Only on the finish does this taste mildly yeasty and slightly buttery.

properties.title: Ferllen 2011 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: 2325 Lincoln Ave, Miami, FL 33133, USA
properties.description: Smoky aromas of bacon and rubber blend with cherry and plum scents to form a good bouquet. This has a fair, fresh mouthfeel with tannic grip. Leafy flavors of plum and red currant are accented by spicy, dry, woody notes, while the finish is lightly green and oaky, with lasting spice.

properties.title: Rutini 2011 Encuentro Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: Km 10.5, RP89, Tupungato, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: A fairly oaky bouquet with overt wood grain, vanilla and creamy aromas includes cherry and plum scents. A mostly fresh, choppy palate is a bit rough, while currant and spiced-plum flavors end with woody, medicinal accents. Overall this works well.

properties.title: Longevity 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 2271 S Vasco Rd b, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.description: This combines fruity and savory aromas, with a rich but tannic texture and full body. Aroma recall black olive and cedar, while flavors focus on the fruit components. Everything is in place for an enjoyable, well-structured dinner wine.

properties.title: Markham 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2812 St Helena Hwy North, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Muted at first, this wine slowly opens, revealing a suggestion of oak, generous tropical fruit and honeydew melon. Medium to fuller-bodied in style, it holds back before going over the edge, maintaining a nice structure through the finish.

properties.title: Onesta 2013 Bokisch Vineyard Viognier (Lodi)
properties.description: This crisp, tangy and refreshing wine has lemon and green-apple aromas, bright citrus flavors, medium body and a lean texture, due mostly to the generous acidity. Raw oysters on the half shell, garlic shrimp and goat-cheese toasts come to mind as good pairings.

properties.title: Pine Ridge 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
properties.description: Made up of 82% Cabernet Sauvignon, 15% Malbec and 3% Petit Verdot, this is a still-tight expression of raspberry and cassis that veers into graphite and cedar, earthy on the back palate. Shining in Rutherford's classic dustiness, this wine can develop further in the bottle and in the glass, so let it open.

properties.title: Refugio Ranch 2012 Viognier (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.description: The Gleason family and winemaker Ryan Deovlet deliver a tropically inclined wine, with warm aromas of ripe melons, candied apples, pineapple and cherimoya. The flavors are also round, with Golden Delicious apples, Meyer lemon, apricot and a touch of marzipan poking out from behind a fresh citrusy veil.

properties.title: Amizetta 2012 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1099 Greenfield Rd #9625, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: This 100% varietal wine is dark and foreboding in brambly blackberry and dense, smooth layers of textured oak and vanilla. Beyond full bodied, it holds on to enough acidity to make it complex and age-worthy, finishing in a splash of toffee and caramel.

properties.title: Grans-Fassian 2013 Mineralschiefer Trocken Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Römerstraße 28, 54340 Leiwen, Germany
properties.description: The mineralschiefer designation attests to the intensely slatey, mineral sheen that juxtaposes ripe yellow peach and tangerine flavors in this bristling dry Riesling. Kissed by honeysuckle, it's effortlessly elegant, yet deeply satisfying sip after sip.

properties.title: Ibarra 2012 La Presa Vineyard Roussanne (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.description: A light hay color, this wine from Andres Ibarra and Caren Rideau offers a delicate butternut squash cream-sauce element on the nose, along with white rocks and pineapple sherbet. There's lots of pep on the balanced palate, with soda, lime pith and sour orange peel, plus a touch of nuts and a vanilla on the finish.

properties.title: Lange 2014 Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
properties.description: More than a slight hint of blush color (suggesting extra skin contact) leads into this broad, spicy, flavorful wine. Highlights of ginger, cinnamon and sweet baking spices adorn rich, mouthcoating pear fruit. It offers an enjoyable, drink-now style.

properties.title: Pala 2014 Chiaro di Stelle Rosato (Isola dei Nuraghi)
properties.description: Refreshing and delicious, this blend of Sardinian grapes—40% Monica, 30% Cannonau and 30% Carignano—opens with aromas of rose, wild berry and a whiff of Mediterranean scrub. The vibrant palate offers juicy red cherry, raspberry and a hint of baking spice alongside bright acidity. A saline note backs up the finish.

properties.title: Leonard Kreusch 2014 Estate Bottled Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Martinerfeld 61, 54294 Trier, Germany
properties.description: This perfumed, blossomy wine balances rich, ripe yellow cherry and tangerine sweetness against a straight-edged frame of acidity. It's forward and easy, but delicately nuanced, kissed by hints of almond and spice. The finish is moderately long and lip-smacking. Drink now.

properties.title: Lincourt 2013 Steel Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.description: This stainless-steel take shows lime juice, golden apples and white pepper on the lean but ever-so-slightly warm nose. The palate is driven by a citrusy bitterness, showing tangerine peels and more squeezed lime throughout.

properties.title: Buehler 2007 Papa's Knoll Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: A really wonderful Cabernet, clearly grown well and well made. It has that plush, rich feeling you want in a Cabernet Sauvignon, with deliciously ripe blackberry, black currant, cassis and dark chocolate flavors. Terrific now, and should age for 4–6 years, if not longer.

properties.title: Pascal Bouchard 2007 Les Clos Grand Cru  (Chablis)
properties.description: A super-rich wine, packed with peach and green plum fruits, layers of wood and an intense concentration. An impressive wine that shows weight and richness as well as style.

properties.title: Testarossa 2009 Sierra Madre Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.description: There's lots of sweet, smoky oak on this Chardonnay, with caramel and buttered toast flavors, but the underlying fruit is so massive, it easily handles that weight. Explodes in ripe pineapple and peach jam flavors, balanced with crisp acidity, like a squirt of lime. A really good wine for drinking now with serious fare.

properties.title: Cimarossa 2007 Riva di Ponente Cabernet Sauvignon (Howell Mountain)
properties.description: One for the cellar. It's dry and locked down in hard tannins, the kind that sting your gums. Even so, they can't quite mask the torrents of blackberry and currant fruit. It's strong, intense and dazzling. Lay this young wine down until at least 2015.

properties.title: Maison Jessiaume 2008  Corton-Charlemagne
properties.description: An appropriately rich wine, full, toasty and dense. The fruit is beautifully balanced with ripe acidity, just a touch of spice, citrus and an opulent, full-bodied character. It will certainly age, but is already very drinkable.

properties.title: Joseph Drouhin 2008 Domaine Drouhin-Vaudon Sécher Premier Cru  (Chablis)
properties.description: On the south bank of the River Serein, Sécher is one of the lesser known Premier Crus. This is a cool, crisp wine, emphasizing both green fruits and an underlying buttery touch. Beautifully integrated acidity frames the wine.

properties.title: Kendall-Jackson 2008 Vintner's Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma-Napa)
properties.address: 5007 Fulton Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95403, USA
properties.description: A wonderfully good wine, especially at this price. Easily the best K-J Vintner's Reserve ever. Inky black, full-bodied and dry, it houses rich, complex blackberry, plum and smoky oak flavors, wrapped into finely ground, firm tannins. Run, don't walk, to find this affordable beauty.

properties.title: Arrowood 2007 Monte Rosso Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
properties.description: Dryness and tannins mark this Cabernet, giving it some austerity and astringency. But lurking deep below the surface is a vast underground landscape of blackberry fruit, cassis, plums, olives, herbs and oak. Fascinating and intricate and a little heady, but undrinkable now due to immaturity. Needs 5–6 years to show its stuff.

properties.title: Hanzell 2008 Chardonnay (Sonoma Valley)
properties.description: Lots of fresh, zingy acidity in this dry, young Chardonnay, and the steely minerality gives it a tang of cold metal. There are tantalizing hints of ripe citrus fruit and apricots. Give it 4–5 years in the cellar to come around.

properties.title: Tulpen 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.description: Pure Cabernet sourced from a trio of Walla Walla vineyards, and finished at 14.9% alcohol. Supple and spicy, this displays a firm core of tart fruit, annotated with lead pencil, graphite and charcoal. Though it seems almost deceptively light alongside the Tulpen Merlot, this compact and layered wine is built to age over a decade or more.

properties.title: Arrowood 2007 Reserve Speciale Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
properties.address: 14347 CA-12, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.description: Dark as a moonless midnight, dry as dust, with hard-edged tannins, this Cabernet is almost undrinkable now in its extreme youth. It shows a massive core of blackberries, currants, dark baker's chocolate and smoky oak, and the balance of acidity makes it clean and bright. All indications are of a cellarworthy wine. Drink 2014 and beyond.

properties.title: Quivira 2012 Rosé (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 4900 W Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: The cold, uneven vintage gives this rosé a green, New Zealand Sauvignon Blanc-style gooseberry aroma and flavor that makes it odd. There are some good watermelon and strawberry flavors, but it tastes unripe.

properties.title: Sagelands 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: Hailing from the cool 2010 vintage, the notes of coffee, olive and cherry here are light and sweet, backed by dry, chalky tannins.

properties.title: San Pedro 2012 Epica Sauvignon Blanc (Central Valley)
properties.description: Gritty match-stick aromas come with grapefruit and citrus scents. This is lifted and entirely regular for Chilean Sauvignon Blanc. Flavors of lemon, lime and grapefruit are soft and mealy for such a young wine, while bitterness enters the frame on the finish.

properties.title: Anakena 2011 Ona Special Reserve Riesling-Chardonnay-Viognier White (Leyda Valley)
properties.description: This unusual blend of Riesling, Chardonnay and Viognier is toasty but also stalky smelling, with modest fruit aromas. The palate is plump and simple feeling, with chunky weight and salty flavors of roast corn and bland citrus. Oak and saline define the finish.

properties.title: Hager Matthias 2011 Sauvignon Blanc (Niederösterreich)
properties.description: A curiously earthy wine with ripe fruits but also a sense of bitterness. Notes of gooseberries and undergrowth finish with an off-dry character at the end. Screwcap.

properties.title: Château Los Boldos 2012 Cuvée Tradition Chardonnay (Rapel Valley)
properties.address: Camino Los Boldos s/n, Requinoa, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: Light in color, light in aromas, light in flavor... that pretty much describes this decent but rudimentary Chardonnay. Airy pear aromas lead to a monotone, fresh palate with generic flavors of peach, melon and citrus. A pithy bitterness rises up on the modest finish.

properties.title: La Clarine Farm 2012 Nr. 2 White (Sierra Foothills)
properties.description: Hmm. A blend of 50% Sémillon from Amador County and 50% Viognier from El Dorado County that gives off much beyond a slight taste of Asian pear. Cloudy, it is also sharp and herbal.

properties.title: 10Span 2012 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
properties.description: Pretty standard Chardonnay, with a creamy texture and oaky tropical fruit flavors. Not bad for the price, if you're in a Chard mood.

properties.title: Concha y Toro 2011 Casillero del Diablo Reserva Chardonnay (Limarí Valley)
properties.description: This is a round, creamy, soft Chardonnay with resiny aromas. A strange, forced oak flavor dominates the flavor profile, which includes spice more than fruit. On the finish, oak and resin are about all you get.

properties.title: Quivira 2012 Fig Tree Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 4900 W Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Unripe green notes of leaves detract from this wine's enjoyment. It's crisp in acidity, with some pure Meyer lemon, lime and fig flavors, but that vegetal note is bothersome.

properties.title: Dolin 2014 Bien Nacido Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 501 Parducci Rd, Ukiah, CA 95482, USA
properties.description: This Malibu winery's bottling from the historic Bien Nacido vineyard is lush with lemon curd, buttered croissant and brown spice aromas. The palate is both plush and vibrant, its apple cream and poached pear favors enlivened with sea salt, lemon rind and slate accents. It's complex and awesome.

properties.title: Domdechant Werner 2015 Hochheim Domdechaney Erste Lage Trocken Riesling (Rheingau)
properties.description: There's so much body and ripeness in this bold, dry-style Riesling, it's admittedly blousy, but irresistibly so. Voluptuous and alcoholic on the palate, it shows intensely concentrated peach and cantaloupe flavors, as well as a sensual, almost oily, mineral richness. It may not age for decades but offers plenty of hedonistic enjoyment through 2021.

properties.title: Dr. H. Thanisch (Erben Müller-Burggraef) 2015 Bernkasteler Lay Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: Pristine orange blossom and tangerine hints turn riper and richer on the palate in this delicately honeyed Riesling. It's lively and deft in mouthfeel, with sweet yellow cherry and peach flavors that dart on the midpalate. A sun-filled yet gorgeously balanced wine, it's calibrated by scintillating acidity and a mineral sheen on the finish.

properties.title: Fritz Haag 2015 Brauneberger Juffer Trocken GG Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Dusemonder Str. 44, 54472 Brauneberg, Germany
properties.description: A whiff of smoked nuts lends savory complexity to bright tangerine, pineapple and white floral aromas in this gorgeously steel-toned wine. Dry and minera, yet silken in texture, it hits the palate with staccato notes of crunchy stone fruit, lemon and lime. It's bracing and brisk now but should meld beautifully over the next decade.

properties.title: Chalk Hill 2014 Wright Creek Chardonnay (Chalk Hill)
properties.description: From an estate vineyard planted partially to the Robert Young clone, this full-bodied wine opens with doughy biscuit and oak aromas, building towards richer notes of apple and honey. Dark in color despite its youth, it shows high-toned stony notes of minerality on the palate.

properties.title: Cantina Produttori San Michele Appiano 2015 Schulthauser Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)
properties.description: Crisp and delicious, this elegant wine delivers aromas and flavors of green apple, crushed stone, ripe pear and a hint of pastry cream. Bright acidity lifts the creamy flavors while a tangerine note gives it a clean mouthwatering finish.

properties.title: Cuda Ridge Wines 2013 Reserve Collection Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 2400 Arroyo Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.description: Fascinating earthy, spicy aromas and flavors give an extra dimension to this full-bodied and richly textured wine. New leather, cardamom, and cumin scents infuse the aroma, while ripe but not sweet black currant, dark cherry and clove flavors flood the palate. It's rich enough to enjoy now but will be best after 2019.

properties.title: Domdechant Werner 2015 Hochheimer Kabinett Riesling (Rheingau)
properties.description: A shower of crushed minerals lends transparency to this fleshy dry Riesling. It's bold in body and alcohol, heaving lusciously with ripe tangerine, peach and nectarine flavors, but zesty acidity adds levity. The finish is warm and smoky but long and languorous.

properties.title: Jean-Luc and Paul Aegerter 2015  Pernand-Vergelesses
properties.description: This comes from an underrated appellation, in the shadow of the Corton-Charlemagne vineyard. It's touched lightly by wood aging, showing ripe yellow fruit and a cool streak of minerality. Still young, it's developing well and will be ready to drink from 2018.

properties.title: Lang & Reed 2015 Chenin Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: Lang, Jackson, KS 66801, USA
properties.description: Silky and voluptuous, this is a compelling example of the rare variety being able to shine in the Napa Valley when put in the right hands. From a small vintage (only the second for this wine), it shines in peach, green apple and honey flavors, chased by crisp acidity.

properties.title: Okapi 2013 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 4193 Big Ranch Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Big, rich and rewarding, this wine opens with a bouquet of honeysuckle and apple blossom. It offers high acidity and robust oak in equal, complementary measure, as melon, apple and caramel flavors weigh in the smoothly textured palate.

properties.title: ONX 2014 Crux Red (Templeton Gap District)
properties.description: Dark purple fruit is upstaged by the strong umami character on the nose of this blend of 41% Syrah, 32% Mourvèdre and 27% Grenache, reminiscent of soy, shiitake mushroom and beef jerky. There is a rustic and gamy quality to the dark berry-laced palate, with meat, leather and spice qualities, lifted by a touch of licorice.

properties.title: Psagot 2014 Peak Red
properties.description: Aromas of blackberry, strawberry and chocolate open for flavors of blackberry, Red Delicious apple peel, aniseed and vanilla. This wine is harmonious on the palate with understated tannins and breakthrough notes of summer peach on the finish.

properties.title: Recanati 2015 Cabernet Sauvignon (Upper Galilee)
properties.address: פארק תעשיות עמק חפר, Gesher HaEts 16, עמק חפר, Israel
properties.description: Red-violet in the glass, this wine has a nose of black cherry, cocoa and freshly ground coffee. It is soft on entry, but velvety tannins and flavors of blackberry, vanilla, espresso bean and a soft hint of cocoa powder render it a more sophisticated quaff than first sip would suggest.

properties.title: Château Haut-Bergey 2009 Barrel sample  (Pessac-Léognan)
properties.address: 69 Cr Gambetta, 33850 Léognan, France
properties.description: 89-91 Barrel sample. A definite burnt character on the nose, but the fruit has proper richness, the wood perhaps showing too much high toast. The freshness should be kept and not lost in the wood.

properties.title: Le Nardian 2009 Barrel sample  (Bordeaux Blanc)
properties.description: 89-91 Barrel sample. Very fresh. With just a light touch of wood spice, and a great burst of citrus, grapefruit, a little lychee from Muscadelle.

properties.title: Château Bouscaut 2009 Barrel sample  (Pessac-Léognan)
properties.description: 89-91 Barrel sample. A full-bodied wine that lacks some definition. It has fatness, weight, but the freshness is not all there.

properties.title: Château Bastor-Lamontagne 2009 Barrel sample  (Sauternes)
properties.description: 88-90 Barrel sample. Very apply wine, with light botrytis character, some spice and very fresh fruit. It is bright and almost crisp.

properties.title: Zocker 2011 Paragon Vineyard Grüner Veltliner (Edna Valley)
properties.description: This tastes sweeter than the very fine 2009 and 2010, but that may be because the fruit is so powerfully intense and pure. It has flavors of ripe tangerines, limes, peaches and apples, made racy by its acidity. No oak has been applied, so the wine tastes fresh.

properties.title: Oakville East 2009 Exposure Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
properties.description: This is hard to appreciate now because the fruit is so primary and upfront—like a heaping spoon of black raspberry jam—and also because the tannins are thick and tough. There's something almost rustic about it. On the other hand, six years or more in the cellar could reward. Made from Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc, with a splash of Petit Verdot.

properties.title: Standing Stone 2010 Vidal Ice Vidal Blanc (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 9934 NY-414, Hector, NY 14841, USA
properties.description: Intensely aromatic with notes of orange blossom, honeysuckle and candied orange peel, this balances ripe tropical fruit and creamy butterscotch flavors with a shower of lemonade acidity. Made using grapes that were frozen post-harvest.

properties.title: La Chablisienne 2010 Les Vénérables  (Chablis)
properties.address: 8 Bd Pasteur, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: While the wine seems at first rich, it then shows a tautly acidic character that gives a refreshing character to the roundness. That steely acidity is what defines the tight, crisp finish.

properties.title: Francine et Olivier Savary 2010  Chablis
properties.description: This is a rich mouthful of a wine, with ripe notes of red apple and green plum. Behind the fruit, there is a soft vanilla edge that adds depth of flavor. It's concentrated and ready to age for 2–3 years.

properties.title: Glenora 2011 Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.description: Fragrant yellow and purple flowers on the nose and palate of this medium-sweet Riesling add a subtle perfume to all of the ripe, luscious white-peach and nectarine flavors. Hints of wet stone and lime-like acidity lend a crisp, tonic tone to the midpalate, extending onto the long, lingering finish.

properties.title: Blue Plate 2011 Dry Chenin Blanc (Clarksburg)
properties.address: 3565 Sawmill Rd, Caddo, OK 74729, USA
properties.description: This bottling is even better than the 2010: drier, crisper and more elegant, without a trace of sweetness. It's balanced, with a long finish that should pair well with any kind of spiced food.

properties.title: Domaine Vrignaud 2010 Les Champréaux  (Chablis)
properties.description: A rich, yet finely structured wine, this is full of acidity and bright green and yellow fruits. It's delicious, mouth-filling and refreshing, touched by notes of wood and citrus, with a smooth, toasty finish.

properties.title: Lone Birch 2011 Pinot Gris (Yakima Valley)
properties.description: With balance and grip, this lightly effervescent wine rolls from a pretty pear flavor into a light tropical fruit note. It's hard to beat at this price.

properties.title: Undurraga 2008 Sibaris Reserva Especial Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Cam. a Melipilla 34, Talagante, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: A little murky and muddled on the nose, this has an earthy-berry aroma, with a hint of floral-based perfume. It offers acidity and solidity on the palate, which is backed by standard black-fruit flavors, with undertones of vanilla and raw oak. Very good, but it's a bit oaky.

properties.title: Viña Requingua 2010 Toro de Piedra Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Av. El Cerro 056, Providencia, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: Solid blackberry, cassis and cola aromas are an invitation to enjoy this straightforward, well-made Cabernet that's lively and bouncy, with berry and black currant flavors that match the bouquet. Short on complexity but long on fruit.

properties.title: Hug 2009 el Pape Red (Central Coast)
properties.description: This Rhône-style blend of Grenache, Mourvèdre and Syrah has plenty of cherry and mocha deliciousness. It seems a bit sweet on the finish, so drink it with compatible foods, like bacon.

properties.title: Clos La Chance 2011 Estate Sauvignon Blanc (Central Coast)
properties.description: There's lots of spicy richness in this slightly sweet Sauvignon Blanc. With zesty acidity, its flavors veer toward pineapples, limes, melons and vanilla. This should be versatile with all kinds of foods.

properties.title: Conway 2009 Bien Nacido Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 2724 White Mountain Hwy, North Conway, NH 03860, USA
properties.description: This is very rich, ripe and oaky, but a little over the top, with strong flavors of buttered toast, caramel, orange jam and spice. An outgoing wine crafted in the popular style.

properties.title: Eagle Eye 2007 Alpha Wolf Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: The flavors of this Cabernet are enormously rich. Blackberry and blueberry jam, black currant, dark chocolate and cassis come in waves. Few wines on earth are this ripe. The issue is balance and complexity, both of which could be stronger. Drink over the next few years.

properties.title: Franciscan 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
properties.description: This shows classic Oakville tannins, acidity and rich blackberry and cassis flavors, with a nice, spicy finish. But, it doesn't show the flashy concentration or the ageworthiness of the region's best Cabernets. Give it a decanting and drink up.

properties.title: 75 Wine Co. 2011 Sauvignon Blanc (North Coast)
properties.description: Made in the New Zealand-style, this savory Sauvignon Blanc has bright acidity highlighting racy flavors of citrus, green melon and lemongrass.

properties.title: VML 2011 Rosé of Pinot Noir Rosé (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: This is a strongly flavored blush, packing a punch of raspberry, fig, sweet tea and rose flavors. It's dry and very crisp in acidity. Give it a chill and enjoy with salted, smoked meats, or a nice fish stew.

properties.title: Mony 2009 Reserve Dry Red Cabernet Sauvignon (Samson)
properties.description: This medium-weight selection offers concentrated aromas and flavors of black currant and blackberry laced with accents of pepper and earthy spice. There's a bit of bite to the moderate tannins, while hints of tobacco leaf and cocoa nib spice up the finish.

properties.title: Pascal Jolivet 2010 Attitude Sauvignon Blanc (Val de Loire)
properties.description: More fragrant than herbaceous, this is a rounded, creamy wine. It has creamed pear, apricot and ripe lime flavors to go with the smooth texture and finish.

properties.title: Saintsbury 2009 Brown Ranch Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.address: 1500 Los Carneros Ave #9742, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.description: This shows the dried herb character that often characterizes Napa Chardonnay, giving the pineapple and orange flavors an earthiness. It's very dry and crisp in acidity, but it ultimately trades opulence for elegance. Drink now.

properties.title: Schug 2010 Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.description: Rich in tropical fruit, apricot and pear flavors, with a buttery, creamy texture, this is a satisfying Chardonnay made in the popular style. Brisk acidity makes it clean and balanced.

properties.title: Domaine du Claouset 2015 Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
properties.description: There is a strongly caramel element to this wine. A tannic edge gives structure, though its fruit is less obvious.

properties.title: Mossback 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Chalk Hill)
properties.description: A generic red wine with 13% Petit Verdot and 10% Merlot, there's a thread of rich, ripe red fruit at the heart of this wine, which is medium bodied if not on the lean side, finishing simply. French, Hungarian and American oak did the aging.

properties.title: Oak Farm 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
properties.description: This oaky wine smells like baking spices and tastes almost sweet. It has jammy fruit flavors, warm vanilla and cinnamon accents, a soft texture and vanilla echoes on the finish.

properties.title: Limited by Cambridge Cellars 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
properties.description: Fairly light in the glass, juicy aromas of fruit punch, red cherry and licorice show on the nose of this wine. The palate offers pomegranate fruit and fennel, proving quite fruit punchy all around.

properties.title: Apaltagua 2015 Reserva Rosé (Maule Valley)
properties.description: Super light in color, with aromas of grape skins, nectarine and briny seashell, this rosé from Carmenère feels highly citric and shearing. Sour-leaning flavors of tangerine and lemon finish with tang and enamel-peeling acidity.

properties.title: Byington 2014 Ventana Vineyards Sauvignon Blanc (Monterey County)
properties.description: Extremely grassy on the nose, this also shows lime juice and a skunky cannabis character that starts to blow off with time. The texture is racy on the palate, but the grassy component proves rather sour and one-dimensional.

properties.title: Ravoire et Fils 2015 Domaine des Bellugues Rosé (Mediterranée)
properties.description: Named after the lightning bugs (bellugues means spark) that lived in the nearby woods, this wine is all fresh fruit and soft texture. There is a hint of caramel to go with the bright acidity and red currant fruits. The wine is a great apéritif style.

properties.title: 3 Badge Beverage 2014 Gehricke Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: This wine reminds one of salty apple pie, with big, drying oak and a whiff of potpourri. Given nine months in 25% new French oak, it holds on to that toasty taste through the finish, with a sprinkling of bitter lemon.

properties.title: Bota Box 2015 Moscato (California)
properties.description: Light aromas turn to vivid floral and fruity flavors in this semisweet and light-bodied wine. It's low in acidity and should taste quite nice with wedding cake, seriously.

properties.title: Case Bianche 2015 Barone Beneventano del Bosco White (Sicilia)
properties.description: This blend of Inzolia and Chardonnay has subdued aromas of orchard fruit and nut. The simple palate offers lime and citrus zest alongside brisk acidity.

properties.title: Château Toutigeac 2015 Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
properties.description: This wine is tightly textured, firm and with a strongly tannic element. It will be better with food.

properties.title: Chloe 2014 Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 3480 W Marginal Way SW, Seattle, WA 98106, USA
properties.description: Aged in both French and American oak, this is a tropical and oaky expression of the grape, round and slightly sweetened atop a silkiness of smooth butter.

properties.title: Jean-Luc and Paul Aegerter 2014 Les Enfants Terribles Chardonnay (Pays d'Oc)
properties.address: 49 Rue Henri Challand, 21700 Nuits-Saint-Georges, France
properties.description: Soft and fruity, this is a rounded, simple wine. It has apple and light spice and a gentle texture that is already approachable. Juicy and fresh, not a wine for aging, it is ready to drink now.

properties.title: Tololo 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Curicó Valley)
properties.address: 2 Commerce Dr # 3, Moorestown, NJ 08057, USA
properties.description: Stalky, gritty aromas don't stir much optimism. This feels dry, hard and tannic, while salty, herbal, horsey red-berry flavors finish with some moderate heft and a clampy feel.

properties.title: La Croix du Pin 2012 Cuvée Prestige Medium Sweet Muscat (Pays d'Oc)
properties.description: Pleasant aromas of stone fruit, candied orange peel and white gummy bear waft from the glass and carry through to the round, fruity palate. Ample acidity keep the mouthfeel fresh and the finish clean. Drink up.

properties.title: Nica 2012 Chardonnay (California)
properties.description: Rich flavors like vanilla and fig combine with a creamy texture and sweet finish to make a cream puff of a wine. The texture is soft and acidity quite low.

properties.title: Producta Vignobles 2015 Cabane aux Oiseaux Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
properties.address: 13 Av. de la Résistance, 33310 Lormont, France
properties.description: The caramel character of this wine is less attractive than its background of red fruits. The two sides need to come into balance for it to work completely, so wait until late 2016.

properties.title: Les Hauts de Lagarde 2015 Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
properties.description: Lightly salmon-pink in color, this wine is ripe, caramel-flavored and full of red-berry fruits. A zesty orange edge gives the freshness this otherwise full, ripe wine needs.

properties.title: Nuna 2011 Reserve Torrontés (Salta)
properties.address: 8043 Main St, Middletown, VA 22645, USA
properties.description: Oily and almondy on the nose, but also layered and stacked. Feels lively, jumpy and pumped full of acidity, then tastes of classic lychee and green melon. Full and driving, with citrusy zest to the tail end.

properties.title: Paul Cluver 2009 Riesling (Elgin)
properties.address: Paul Cluver Estate Wines, N2, Kromco Turn off, De Rust Estate, Grabouw, 7160, South Africa
properties.description: This easy and straightforward white boasts pleasant notes of fresh apple and lemon-lime citrus throughout. The palate is lush but braced with medium acidity that lingers into the close. Enjoy it now.

properties.title: Peter Zemmer 2007 Cortinie Bianco White (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)
properties.description: Cortinie Bianco opens with impressive intensity and lasting aromas of peach cobbler, vanilla cream and preserved peaches. It follows with a smooth, dense texture in the mouth.

properties.title: Primosic 2008 Gmajne Sauvignon (Collio)
properties.address: Località Madonnina di Oslavia, 3, 34170 Oslavia GO, Italy
properties.description: This light and refreshing Sauvignon from northeast Italy opens with jasmine and floral aromas backed by citrus and stone fruit. Pair this wine with a fresh seafood salad or tuna sushi rolls.

properties.title: Valentino Butussi 2010 Sauvignon (Colli Orientali del Friuli)
properties.description: Fresh, zesty and clean, this luminous Sauvignon would pair with light, vegetable-based foods or appetizers. The wine's simple flavors include citrus, kiwi, fresh pineapple and green apple.

properties.title: Chateau Molyneaux 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
properties.description: A minty, light-bodied Cab with plenty of layered texture and flavors of plum.

properties.title: Cobblestone 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (Atlas Peak)
properties.address: 1500 Cotner Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90025, USA
properties.description: Cobblestone's regular Cabernet is very consistent from year to year, a good wine but not a great one. This 2007 is superfruity, with a blast of blackberries, cola and currants. Drink now–2015.

properties.title: Cobblestone 2009 Chardonnay (Arroyo Seco)
properties.description: A little pricey for the quality, but still, this is a super-drinkable Chardonnay. It's semi-sweet and brisk in acidity, with a cut of minerality supporting ripe orange, pineapple, vanilla and buttered toast flavors.

properties.title: Coelho 2010 Estate Renovação Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
properties.description: All stainless steel barrel-fermented, this is already a rich gold color and showing soft, quickly maturing apple fruit flavors. The finish carries a hint of toast, and the wine makes a graceful, soft landing. Drink up.

properties.title: Comelli 2010 Amplius Pinot Grigio (Colli Orientali del Friuli)
properties.address: Largo Armando Diaz, 8, 33045 Nimis UD, Italy
properties.description: Friuli in northeast Italy has the unique soils and climatic conditions for full bodied and sophisticated white wines. This Pinot Grigio offers the easy, approachable qualities we associate with the grape with that added dimension or creaminess that is so characteristic of the region.

properties.title: Corvalle 2010 Rutherford Runway Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Rutherford)
properties.address: 804 NW Buchanan Ave, Corvallis, OR 97330, USA
properties.description: There's a grassiness to this Sauvignon Blanc that suggests the cool vintage that yielded it. At the same time, the lemon and lime flavors make it rich. With no oak, the fruit stars, brightened with crisp, clean acidity. The finish is a little too sweet, which detracts from the score.

properties.title: De Stefani 2010 Tai Tocai (Veneto)
properties.description: Tai (made with 100% Tocai grapes) is a lively white wine with fragrant aromas of yellow rose, honeysuckle and passion fruit. A thick, creamy mouthfeel is loaded tight with rich honey flavors.

properties.title: Eberle 2009 Vineyard Selection Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3810 CA-46, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: A good, everyday wine showing how well Paso Robles ripens Cabernet. It's filled with savory blackberry and cherry flavors that go down nice and easy, leading to a spicy finish. Drink now–2014.

properties.title: Fairvalley 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Stellenbosch)
properties.description: A touch of vanilla and sweet oak graces the brambly black berry aromas and flavors in this wine. Medium weight and round in the mouth with fine tannins and a lively finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Farnese 2010 Casale Vecchio Pecorino (Terre di Chieti)
properties.description: There's an easy, informal quality to this white wine that makes it appropriate to pair with roast chicken or baked fish. The Pecorino grape can often be heavy and buttery, but this expression is surprisingly fresh and zesty instead.

properties.title: François Lurton 2010 Fumées Blanches Réserve Sauvignon Blanc (Côtes de Gascogne)
properties.address: Domaine de poumeyrade, 33870 Vayres, France
properties.description: From selected vineyards, this is a rich, tropical fruit-flavored wine. It has peach and ripe plum fruits laced with citrus. Smooth and fruity. Drink now.

properties.title: Gigante 2009 Chardonnay (Colli Orientali del Friuli)
properties.description: Gigante offers a not-so-giant expression of Chardonnay with nicely measured aromas of stone or passion fruit, pineapple and white almond. The wine is aged in both wood and stainless steel to achieve more length and density on the finish.

properties.title: Guerra Albano 2009 Sauvignon (Colli Orientali del Friuli)
properties.description: Fresh and tangy with aromas of white flower and tomato leaf, this lively Sauvignon would pair with fried calamari or spicy shrimp cocktail. The mouthfeel is streamlined and tight.

properties.title: Vettori 2009 Manzoni Bianco Manzoni (Colli Trevigiani)
properties.address: Via Borgo America, 26, 31020 San Pietro di Feletto TV, Italy
properties.description: Incrocio Manzoni 6.0.13 is a grape variety created by Italian professor Luigi Manzoni in the 1930s and represents a cross between Pinot Bianco and Riesling. This expression shows light, fragrant touches of white flower and stone fruit with medium density on the finish.

properties.title: Albino Armani 2009 Colle Ara Pinot Grigio (Valdadige)
properties.description: Colle Ara opens with a light copper color that reflects the natural hue of the grape skins of Pinot Grigio. The aromas include white almond, grapefruit and peach cobbler and the mouthfeel is fresh but creamy at the same time.

properties.title: Broglia 2009 La Meirana  (Gavi)
properties.description: One of the best qualities of Gavi is that tight, mineral note of talc powder or crushed stone that holds it all together. La Meirana is exemplary in this regard making this crisp wine perfect for fresh spring asparagus or a local Piedmont speciality such as sformati, a blended vegetable flan.

properties.title: Concha y Toro 2005 Don Melchor Cabernet Sauvignon (Puente Alto)
properties.address: Av. Virginia Subercaseaux 210, Pirque, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: This comes across as the best Don Melchor that Concha y Toro has produced, and at $69 it should be. It's very ripe, with oak sitting atop pure cassis and plum aromas. The palate is sweet, juicy and packed with dynamite blackberry and black plum flavors. Dark, chocolaty and long on the finish, with ripe tannins. Drink now or hold for five years.

properties.title: Williams Selyem 2006 Heintz Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: With a generous bite of acidity, this fine Chardonnay is extremely flavorful. Traditionally one of the winery's top Chards, it's explosive in pineapple, Asian pear, crème brûlée and roasted marshmallow flavors. Finishes in a swirl of creamy, buttery spices.

properties.title: Von Strasser 2005 Post Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
properties.description: Von Strasser has a good track record with this wine, and the '05 is right up there with the best, but be forewarned. It's very tannic. But then, it is from Diamond Mountain. Give it a good 4 years, at least, to throw some sediment and let the rich blackberry and black currant flavors emerge. Should hold well for 15 years.

properties.title: Von Strasser 2005 Rainin Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
properties.description: Very hard in tannins, with a real lockdown astringency in the mouth, this is one for the cellar, and it's a slam dunk that age will reward it. Drily balanced and elegantly constructed, it brims with rich blackberry and black currant flavors, with a fine coating of spicy oak. Best 2012–2018.

properties.title: Talbott 2005 Sleepy Hollow Vineyard Chardonnay (Monterey County)
properties.address: East Side of Lincoln St., between 5th &, 6th Ave, Carmel-By-The-Sea, CA 93921, USA
properties.description: This cold-climate vineyard is source to some of the most powerful Chardonnays in California. The '05 shows the massive tropical mango, guava, nectarine, apricot and pineapple flavors the vineyard effortlessly delivers. Almost over the top, it's saved by very crisp acidity.

properties.title: Concha y Toro 2005 Terrunyo Block: Las Terrazas Cabernet Sauvignon (Pirque)
properties.address: Av. Virginia Subercaseaux 210, Pirque, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: A little rubbery and tough on first sniff, but this pedigreed Chilean Cab settles with airing and soon shows exciting, fully ripe raspberry, cassis and blackberry flavors. The mouthfeel is perfectly cushioned yet intense, and the finish is ripe, smooth and composed. Ready to go now but should hold steady for another three years.

properties.title: Longoria 2006 Cuvée Diana Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 415 E Chestnut Ave, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.description: This is the winery's best Chardonnay blend. It comes mainly from Sanford & Benedict Vineyard, and shows the fine structure associated with the appellation. Juicy acidity firms up the oak-inspired Meyer lemon, crushed pineapple and tangy mineral flavors. Should soften and become more complex over the next six years.

properties.title: Merryvale 2005 Starmont Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1000 Main St, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Merryvale's '05 is very rich and balanced, and shows fine Napa Cabernet character in the intense focus of cassis, enriched with new French oak. It's not an ager, but showcases very high Napa quality for immediate drinking.

properties.title: Vine Cliff 2006 Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.description: This is a terrific wine, extremely powerful in fruity flavors. It impresses for its sheer volume. Waves of apricots, nectarines, pears, green apples, butterscotch, buttered toast and smoky, vanilla-tinged oak surf the palate, carried along on a wave of crisp acidity.

properties.title: Williams Selyem 2006 Saralee's Vineyard Cluster Select Late Harvest Gewürztraminer (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: With residual sugar of 22.4%, this dessert wine has fantastically sweet flavors of apricot jam, tangerine marmalade, gingersnap cookie, vanilla and crème brûlée, balanced with crisp acidity. The alcohol is a refreshingly low 9.8%.

properties.title: Pessagno 2006 Griva Vineyard Late Harvest Sauvignon Blanc (Arroyo Seco)
properties.description: This is a half-bottle of Sauvignon Blanc grown in the Arroyo Seco, one of the best sources in California for crisp white wines. With residual sugar of 18.4%, it's very sweet, but it's not a sugar bomb. You'll find complex flavors of pineapples, apicots, vanilla custard, honey and crème brûlée, backed up with firm acidity that makes the wine finish clean.

properties.title: Sherwood House Vineyards 2010 Chardonnay (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.description: Sweet scents of apple, tropical fruit and sweet butter are layered amid nuances of smoke and toasted oak on this full-bodied, savory Chardonnay. While smoky and dark in profile on the palate, it's maintains crisp apple and lemon flavors through the finish.

properties.title: Terraprima 2010 Massís del Garraf White (Penedès)
properties.description: Ripe but basic on the nose, this has dusty apple and sweet, minerally notes that are not sugary. It feels a little blowsy, but there's ample acidic cut to frame the dry, flavors of melon, green banana and apple. This has a simple finish. A blend of 80% Xarello and 20% Riesling.

properties.title: Domaine de Givaudan 2009 Léa Red (Côtes du Rhône)
properties.address: 6750 NE Breyman Orchards Rd, Dayton, OR 97114, USA
properties.description: This wine is light in body for a Côtes du Rhône, elegant and spicy, with silky tannins and hints of cracked pepper on the finish. Enjoy this blend of 70% Grenache and 30% Syrah over the next few years.

properties.title: Fleur Du Cap 2011 Bergkelder Selection Chenin Blanc (Western Cape)
properties.description: Although only 10% of this wine was aged in oak, you can definitely pick up on some of the woody accents—like vanilla and faint toast—that spice up core of green apple flesh and melon rind. Medium bodied and balanced, a sweet spice accent lingers nicely through the finish.

properties.title: 3000 BC 2009 Chenin Blanc (Stellenbosch)
properties.description: Pear, apple and lime lead on the nose of this wine, with a secondary glimmer of flint. Rich but not overdone, the palate is fresh, with ripe fruit flavors and lively acidity. A peach pit accent unfolds on the finish; drink now.

properties.title: Windsor Sonoma 2010 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 10810 Hillview Rd, Windsor, CA 95492, USA
properties.description: This has orange, pineapple and green apple flavors that are accented by oaky caramel. Balanced with crisp, citrusy acidity, this should pair well with rich shellfish fare. Drink now.

properties.title: Winery of Good Hope 2011 Bush Vine Chenin Blanc (Stellenbosch)
properties.address: Rust en Vrede Farm, Off R44, Opposite Eikendal Estate, Stellenbosch, 7600, South Africa
properties.description: This wine shows good balance between the lively acidity and ripe notes of red apple flesh, pear and orange oil. The round mouthfeel of ripe fruit flavors are lifted on the finish by a tangy, green plum and lime zest accent. Drink now.

properties.title: Zull 2011 Lust & Laune Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
properties.description: In the light style of value Austrian white wine, this is full of crisp, fresh flavors of apple and grapefruit, with just a touch of pepper. Drink now. Screwcap.

properties.title: Markus Huber 2011 Hugo Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Weinriedenweg 13, 3134 Reichersdorf, Austria
properties.description: This is crisp, clean and light. It is fruity with green apple flavor, and it has a tight texture. The finish is floral and aromatic. Screwcap.

properties.title: Josef Weger 2010 Lagrein Rosato Rosé (Alto Adige)
properties.address: 17, Trentino, Jesuheimstraße, 39057 Cornaiano BZ, Italy
properties.description: Pressed from Lagrein grapes native to northern Italy, this bright rosé offers an easy, crisp finish with tones of wild berries, peach and pink grapefruit.

properties.title: Cartlidge & Browne 2010 Chardonnay (North Coast)
properties.description: Flavors of creamy vanilla pudding, buttered toast and pineapple jam mark this slightly sweet Chardonnay. A crisp streak of acidity provides much needed balance to the richness.

properties.title: Château de Brigue 2010 Signature Red (Côtes de Provence)
properties.description: This is herbal, with some flavors of green bell pepper and wild spice. The wine is light bodied and fruity, with attractive, juicy black-currant flavors and a perfumed aftertaste.

properties.title: Château Montaud 2011 Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: 348 Rte des Maures, 83390 Pierrefeu-du-Var, France
properties.description: A wine with a light texture and character, this is very fresh and crisp. It has flavors of white berries, pears and red plums, with lemon zest acidity.

properties.title: Johanneshof Reinisch 2011 Auslese Rotgipfler (Thermenregion)
properties.description: Brown sugar and dark treacle flavors dominate this rich, sweet wine. With its opulent texture, this is for sipping. Screwcap.

properties.title: Kuleto Estate 2008 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Although there's a lot of ripe blackberry jam, black currant and chocolate flavors, it's a little on the simple side. Ready to drink now.

properties.title: Les Maîtres Vignerons de Saint-Louis 2011 Estandon Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: 3300 Samuel Shepard Dr, St. Louis, MO 63103, USA
properties.description: This is a smooth wine, with strawberry fruits and a creamy texture. The wine feels just off dry, making it accessible, warm and ripe. Screwcap.

properties.title: Van Loveren 2011 Chenin No. 5 Chenin Blanc (Robertson)
properties.description: A refreshing and approachable wine, with forward notes of green plum, plantain, Granny Smith apple and lime on the nose and palate. There's a slight roundness to the midpalate, but a vibrant twang lifts the finish.

properties.title: Argiolas 2011 Costamolino  (Vermentino di Sardegna)
properties.description: Delicate tones of stone fruit, lime, talc power and honeydew melon mark the bouquet. It's crisp on the palate, with a touch of wild salvia on the finish.

properties.title: Höpler 2011 Grüner Veltliner (Burgenland)
properties.description: This has fresh citrus and dried apricot flavors, with Grüner's typical peppery edge. For drinking now. Screwcap.

properties.title: Winzer Krems 2011 Ried Sandgrube Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
properties.description: This is a light wine, with a white fruit flavor and a taut, mineral character. It is all fruit with layer upon layer of pear and crisp acidity. Drink over the year as it's not meant for aging. Screwcap.

properties.title: De Sante 2008 L'Atelier White (Napa Valley)
properties.description: De Sante has struggled with Sauvignon Blanc over the years, and while this blend, with 40% Sémillon, contains some good citrus flavor, it's aggressive in drily sour green pyrazines.

properties.title: Finca Sophenia 2009 Altosur Sauvignon Blanc (Tupungato)
properties.description: Lime and green melon aromas are a bit less than clean and pure, and the palate serves up a pile of jalapeño and bell pepper, with some lime in the background. Short on the finish, and kind of dilute.

properties.title: Spann Vineyards 2007 Chardonnay-Viognier (North Coast)
properties.address: 8910 Sonoma Hwy, Kenwood, CA 95452, USA
properties.description: Ultraripe in pineapple, tropical fruit and oaky vanilla flavors, this white blend is almost as sweet as a dessert wine. It's fortunately balance with mouthwatering acidity.

properties.title: Cascata 2008 The Professors' Classic Dry Gewürztraminer (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 3651 NY-14, Watkins Glen, NY 14891, USA
properties.description: Vibrant and youthful, this wine greets the taster with fresh, clean scents of honey, fall flowers and roses. It's medium-bodied and crisp, with a final peach note that fades a bit too quickly. Try with Thai curry. No improvement with age; drink before 2011.

properties.title: Vino dei Fratelli 2008 Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)
properties.address: 1595 Arbor Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: This Pinot Grigio from northern Italy offers an easy aromatic lineup of mature melon, chopped herbs and spring flowers. It's thick and slightly sweet in the mouth with a heavy, fat feel on the close.

properties.title: Haras 2008 Estate Chardonnay (Maipo Valley)
properties.description: Stemmy, stalky aromas cloud over dilute fruit notes, while the palate is on the acidic side, which causes citrus and pithy peach flavors. More pith on the finish, with a hint of banana. Just o.k., with limited character.

properties.title: Andeluna 2007 Chardonnay (Tupungato)
properties.address: Km 11, RP89, M5561 Tupungato, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Sort of nutty and oily on the nose, without a whole lot of fruit to speak of. Overoaked for what it is, with a resiny mouthfeel and finish. Too much oak, vanilla and cream for a wine of modest quality.

properties.title: Septima 2009 Chardonnay (Agrelo)
properties.address: Ruta Internacional n 7 km 1061, M5509 Agrelo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Light in color, with stalky aromas that don't feature much fruit. The palate is gentle and bland, with distant orange and tropical fruit. Wheaty and flat on the finish, with an overall canned fruit quality.

properties.title: Canyon Wind 2005 Cabernet Sauvignon (Grand Valley)
properties.description: Initially a bit funky, this wine opened up to offer pretty cassis and fresh blackberry fruit couched in a bed of medium acid and soft tannins. Mushroom and plum tones on the finish hang around for just a bit. Drink up.

properties.title: Twin Islands 2010 Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.description: Leafy and nettle-like upfront, but deepening a bit on the palate to show nectarine, grapefruit and tomatillo notes. The only quibble with this medium-bodied white from the winemaker at Nautilus is that it seems almost a little sweet on the finish (the stated residual sugar level is 3 g/L). Drink now.

properties.title: C&B; 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Tastes as rich and sweet as a dessert pastry, with sweet vanilla oak, raspberry and cherry pie filling and cinnamon spice flavors. Somewhat one-dimensional, but tasty and smooth. Drink now.

properties.title: Domaine Foivos 2003 Stalactite  (Muscat of Kefallonian)
properties.description: This Muscat offers luscious honey, lemon and tropical fruit on the nose, with viscous waves of lemon, pineapple and warming spice on the palate. Not overly complex but certainly appealing. Pair with creamy cheeses and fruit.

properties.title: El Roy 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
properties.description: Soft and ripe, made for drinking now for the polished berry-cherry, tobacco, sweet oak and spice flavors. For the price, there's a lot of upscale character.

properties.title: Freeman 2009 Ryo-Fu Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 1300 Montgomery Rd, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.description: Similar to the 2006 vintage, this '09 is rather sweet and candied in new oaky vanilla, buttered toast, honey and caramel flavors. Underneath is plenty of ripe citrus and tropical fruit. The sweetness detracts from what otherwise is a fine, crisp, minerally wine.

properties.title: Noceto 2010 Pinot Grigio (Clarksburg)
properties.address: 11011 Shenandoah Rd, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.description: With an intensity of almond paste and charcuterie at first sniff, this nice Pinot Grigio from the Sangiovese specialists at Vino Noceto is light in color but rich in mouthfeel, with a flowery, apricot flavor. Its finish is smooth and a smidge sweet.

properties.title: Feudo Principi di Butera 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sicilia)
properties.address: Feudo Principi di Butera, Contrada Deliella, 93011 Butera CL, Italy
properties.description: True to the variety, this expression of Cabernet Sauvignon offers rich layers of dark fruit, prune, chocolate, spice and dried rosemary. The palate is tight, structured and fresh.

properties.title: Foris 2011 Pinot Blanc (Rogue Valley)
properties.address: 654 Kendall Rd, Cave Junction, OR 97523, USA
properties.description: Aromatic and bracing, this is a fruity mix of lime, nectarine and pink grapefruit. Foris wines are notable for their freshness, purity of fruit and overall immaculate winemaking.

properties.title: Tenuta Sarno 1860 2011 Sarno 1860  (Fiano di Avellino)
properties.description: Huge floral intensity opens the bouquet of this Fiano di Avellino, with notes of honeysuckle, rose and jasmine that are followed by accents of citrus, pear and a touch of rubber. The finish is creamy and soft.

properties.title: Bell 2011 Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
properties.description: The same Bell as the well-known Napa Valley winery, Bell extends its reach into Oregon to make this lip-smackingly good Pinot Gris. Gooseberry, melon, kiwi and grapefruit flavors swirl across the tongue, leaving a clean, fresh and very fruity wake. The moderate alcohol is an added bonus.

properties.title: Château Laulerie 2010 Comtesse de Ségur  (Montravel)
properties.description: This is herbaceous, but it also has a ripe yellow-fruit character. It is fresh and crisp, with a great depth of flavor. Its bright acidity and tight-textured finish make this a food wine.

properties.title: Château Thénac 2011 Fleur du Périgord White (Bergerac Sec)
properties.description: The intense herbaceous aroma is softened on the palate by the wine's lemon-curd flavor and smooth texture. Rich with intense fruitiness, this has notes of black currant and pink grapefruit, with bright acidity on the finish.

properties.title: Château Tour des Gendres 2010 Moulin des Dames White (Bergerac Sec)
properties.address: 24240 Ribagnac, France
properties.description: This wine is named after a windmill on the Conti family property. It is rich, with a spicy new-wood flavor. While it has plenty of structure, the acidity is subdued.

properties.title: J. Scott Cellars 2011 Chardonnay (Rogue Valley)
properties.description: Sweet graham cracker abounds, wrapped around a tart, lightly spicy note of apple. It's an interesting combination, a bit unusual, but it works.

properties.title: Martin Ray 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Cruz Mountains)
properties.description: This dry, full-bodied wine has lots of rich, exuberant blackberry and black currant flavors accented by smoky oak. It's a little heavy, and not likely to age, so decant it for a few hours before service.

properties.title: Martin Ray 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: This manages to combine instant drinkability with Napa complexity, resulting in a really nice wine. Although it's not an ager, it rises to the occasion with sweetly ripe raspberries, cherries and blackberries, plush, polished tannins and a lovely coating of smoky oak.

properties.title: Valle dell'Acate 2010 Bidis White (Sicilia)
properties.description: Aged in oak, this blend of Chardonnay and Insolia offers bold aromas of white rose, honey and stone fruit, with a soft, round palate. The creamy finish would pair well with a crab cake or a spicy Thai mango salad.

properties.title: Georges Vigouroux 2011 Château Baron White (Gaillac)
properties.address: Route de Toulouse CS20159 Cahors Cedex 9, 46003 Cahors, France
properties.description: A crisp and fruity blend of the herbaceous Sauvignon Blanc and the creamy Loin de l'Oeil, this has apple and grapefruit flavors. It has a bright feel, with a hint of mineral on the finish.

properties.title: Misiones de Rengo 2011 Gran Reserva Cuvée Chardonnay (Leyda Valley)
properties.address: 299, - Morán 207, Rengo, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: Peach, apple and pear aromas are smooth and easy to like. The mouthfeel is juicy and fresh, which Leyda Valley is known for, while the flavors of citrus, apple and nectarine come with acid-driven snap. As a whole, this is more fruity and focused than oaky and heavy.

properties.title: Tres Sabores 2006 Perspective Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
properties.address: 1620 S Whitehall Ln, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Kind of clunky now. Bigtime tannins make it astringent, and the fruit flavors, of blackberries and sour cherry candy coated with oak, feel ripely heavy on the palate. Yet it's a clean wine, and could surprise down the road. Try after 2012.

properties.title: Kris 2008 Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)
properties.address: 6450 S Bennett Pl, Willcox, AZ 85643, USA
properties.description: This is a highly recommendable Pinot Grigio for those looking for a fun and personable companion to seafood and light vegetable dishes. Aromas here include citrus, pear and aromatic green apple. The wine is clean, crisp and zippy on the close.

properties.title: Lagarde 2008 Altas Cumbres Cabernet Sauvignon (Luján de Cuyo)
properties.description: Starts with a nice mix of peppery, live-fruit aromatics along with earth. Has good weight and balance, while the flavors of plum, raspberry and black cherry are mellow and touched up by hints of spice, vanilla and herbs. Shows good character and composition.

properties.title: Raymond Burr 2006 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 8339 W Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Very dry and earthy, with tobacco, herb and blackberry flavors. Could be richer, but the structure is impeccable, and the wine is elegant. Ready now.

properties.title: M by Martellotto 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 100 Los Padres Way UNIT 7, Buellton, CA 93427, USA
properties.description: A bit heavy now, with lots of unintegrated parts. The new oak sticks out from the tannins, and the blackberry, blueberry and cherry fruit is all primary and jammy. If you drink now, decant, but this 100% Cab should be better after 2010.

properties.title: Buena Vista 2007 Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.address: 18000 Old Winery Rd, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.description: Buena Vista has a good reputation for this bottling, and the great '07 vintage has resulted in another fine Chardonnay, at a good price. Racy in acidity, the wine shows mineral-infused citrus fruit, apple and honeysuckle notes that finish with a touch of off-dry sweetness.

properties.title: Domaine du Chalet Pouilly 2008  Saint-Véran
properties.address: Rue des Gerbeaux, 71960 Solutré-Pouilly, France
properties.description: A young wine, with crisp apple and grapefruit salad freshness. It is bright, glowing with vibrant fruit and a light touch of toast.

properties.title: Gård 2006 Lawrence Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: Light strawberry, raspberry and Bing cherry fruit, medium weight, straight-ahead, nicely ripened. The tannins are soft and the balance works just fine.

properties.title: Arrowood 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
properties.description: A classic, boldly full-bodied offering of the variety from vineyards in Sonoma Valley, Knights Valley and Alexander Valley, this wine is defined by blackberry, cassis and mocha, its mouthfeel velvety and luxurious. The finish is lengthy and accented in sage.

properties.title: Bejot Vins et Terroirs 2015 Charles Thomas Rosé (Côtes de Provence Sainte-Victoire)
properties.description: With bright fruit and intense acidity, this is a crisp, perfumed rosé. Clean, fresh lines of red and citrus fruits are cut by the tight, mineral texture. It is both delicious wine and refreshing.

properties.title: Beringer 2014 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.description: This is a generous and ripe version of the variety, reflective of warmer Napa Valley sites, and a wine that's completely delicious in its abundance of apple and caramel.

properties.title: Château d'Esclans 2015 Rock Angel Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.description: Time to rock with this new, lightly oaked cuvée from Esclans, a fresh, bright, full wine with forward fruit. Despite its alcohol, the wine has a light touch with a hint of pepper and rounded red fruits making it ideal for food. The wine will be best to drink from late 2016.

properties.title: Château Trians 2015 Rosé (Coteaux Varois en Provence)
properties.address: Chemin de Trians sur, D68, 83136 Néoules, France
properties.description: Organic grapes grown north of the Mediterranean port city of Toulon have produced a ripe wine with an intense burst of red-currant fruits given extra dimension by perfumed wild-strawberry flavors. The wine's richness means it will be better with food than as an apéritif.

properties.title: Château Vannières 2015 Rosé (Bandol)
properties.description: This ripe, earthy wine with spice delivers a lightly tannic character. Rich, it's made to go with food, full of red-berry fruits and acidity. The aftertaste has a tangy, peppery edge.

properties.title: Conarium 2013 Clos Pepe VIneyard Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 1591 E Chestnut Ave, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.description: A touch of smoke, fresh garden herbs fried in butter and savory roasted chicken show on the nose of this intriguing bottling, which also offers struck match, flint and noticeable oak. The palate is lush with roasted lemon slices, almond oil and cashew butter, leveled by a citrus pith that keeps the texture tight and intriguing.

properties.title: Figgins 2015 Riesling (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 2900 Melrose St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: Appealing aromas of whole lime, flowers and apricot lead to bone-dry but generous stone fruit flavors with plenty of hang time on the finish. It brings a lot of finesse.

properties.title: Folie à Deux 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
properties.description: This is a succulent and structured wine that's priced fairly and a crowd-pleaser to boot, a blend of grenadine, raspberry and currant that's soft and smooth on the palate with a restrained use of oak.

properties.title: Gini 2014  Soave Classico
properties.description: Vibrant and savory, this polished white offers scents of perfumed white flower and ripe orchard fruit. The tangy palate doles out Granny Smith apple, white peach and juicy tangerine. Crisp acidity provides balance while a mineral note energizes the clean finish.

properties.title: Leth 2015 Felser Weinberge Riesling (Wagram)
properties.address: Kirchengasse 6, 3481 Fels am Wagram, Austria
properties.description: Lemon zest tempered by juicy, crunchy apple is the central theme here. This is fresh Riesling not from rock but from deeper loess soils: its usual verve is slightly more cushioned here and will make the most charming, soft intro for those learning to love Riesling. Purity and poise are a given and the aromatics will round even more with every month in bottle.

properties.title: Macari 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.description: Fresh apple, lemon and crushed mineral tones are demure on the nose but gain power and concentration on the palate of this bold, richly textured Chardonnay. Denser and more muscular in mouthfeel than its regular-label bottling, it's accented by just a whiff of spice and vanilla cream. Drink now through 2023.

properties.title: Fabre en Provence 2015 Château de l'Aumerade Cuvée Marie-Christine Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: Rte de Puget Ville, 83390 Pierrefeu-du-Var, France
properties.description: From a 1,350-acre family estate divided among five chateaus, this crisp wine is packed with red fruits cut with citrus acidity. Refreshing and mineral textured, it will make a fine apéritif.

properties.title: Maison Saint Aix 2015 Aix Rosé (Coteaux d'Aix-en-Provence)
properties.description: Rich and lightly structured, this wine is shot through with bright acidity that offers a crisp, tight aftertaste. The red fruits flourish happily at the end.

properties.title: Martin Lane Winery 2011 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Sierra Foothills)
properties.address: 5437 Lakeshore Rd, Kelowna, BC V1W 4S5, Canada
properties.description: Estate-grown and aged patiently for 30 months in American oak, this is a beautifully-balanced, medium-bodied wine. It has the kind of grip on the palate that's great with rich foods and a very agreeable cherry-berry fruit flavor. The tannin component is firm and the acidity is lively, so each sip cleans the mouth for another bite of food.

properties.title: Michele Chiarlo 2014 Nivole  (Moscato d'Asti)
properties.description: Intense aromas of mature stone fruit, apricot, honeysuckle and jasmine almost jump out of the glass. The vibrant, lightly foaming palate doles out juicy yellow peach, fresh apricot and a hint of sage alongside crisp acidity.

properties.title: Midsummer Cellars 2013 Katz Family Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
properties.description: Shy on the nose, this wine evolves into a subtle suggestion of smoky barbecue—its tight tannin structure holding on for dear life against a subversive note of red currant and cedar. Full-bodied and quite robust, it provides a dry, tacky finish.

properties.title: Nielson by Byron 2014 Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.description: Honey, butter, yellow pear, pineapple and vanilla cream show on the supple and soft palate of this bottling—one of the new appellation blends branded under the Nielson name. Sea salt and caramel apple show on the palate, which is underlied and bound by a rain-on-slate minerality, and finishes on an apple custard note.

properties.title: Les Galets de Sauveterre 2012 Red (Côtes du Rhône)
properties.description: Drink this maturing wine over the next year or two. Leather, chocolate and cherry notes mingle easily, the texture is smooth and the finish is silky.

properties.title: Melrose 2013 Chardonnay (Umpqua Valley)
properties.address: 885 Melqua Rd, Roseburg, OR 97471, USA
properties.description: Fruit flavors of pineapple and lemon are pushed forward, followed by a pleasing touch of light butter. The wine was barrel fermented in half new, half used oak. It's a fine spring/summer quaffer.

properties.title: Quinta do Crasto 2011 Crasto Branco White (Douro)
properties.description: A freshly textured wine that has a bite of spice to contrast with its tangy lemon acidity. It's fresh, fruity and ready to drink now.

properties.title: Siltstone 2014 Guadalupe Vineyard Pinot Gris (Oregon)
properties.description: Classic varietal aromas of pear flesh and skin open into just slightly underripe fruit flavors. The wine is balanced and adds tart apple to the pear fruit.

properties.title: Table No. 7 2012 Winemaker's Chardonnay (Lodi)
properties.description: A vivid gold color and spice-rack aromas like nutmeg and cardamom add a different twist to this medium-bodied and rather rich-textured wine. Those are probably characteristics from aging with oak, and they enhance the clean, fresh fruit flavors in a good way.

properties.title: Alta Maria 2013 Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 2933 Grand Ave, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.description: Very fresh and refreshing aromas of honeysuckle blossoms, seared apple, lemongrass and kiwi hit the nose on this wine by James Ontiveros. The palate shows a bit of ripe apple flesh, but trends more toward sour citrus rinds. It's a very clean, crisp wine.

properties.title: Apolloni 2014 Estate Pinot Grigio (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 14135 NW Timmerman Rd, Forest Grove, OR 97116, USA
properties.description: This is made in a style that will work well with foods looking for sharp acids, especially shellfish. Lemon rind, light citrus and peppery highlights are wrapped in searing acidity.

properties.title: Fetzer 2013 Shaly Loam Gewurztraminer (Monterey County)
properties.description: A rainy cement minerality on the nose of this sweet wine manages to cut through the sugared oranges, honeysuckle and ripe, tropical white fleshed fruit, from peach to cherimoya. The palate is full of honeyed apples, white peach and pineapple, but the decent acidity and chalky element stops it short of treacly.

properties.title: Hearst Ranch 2013 Glacier Ridge Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.description: Ripe aromas of apple flesh and apple blossoms trend toward guava on the nose of this wine from the legendary California family. There is a chalk-driven energy on the palate, though ripe fruits are prominent, with more apples and guava as well as steamed peaches.

properties.title: Mas des Bressades 2013 Cuvée Tradition Rosé (Costières de Nîmes)
properties.address: Rte de Bellegarde, 30129 Manduel, France
properties.description: Mas des Bressades is one of the standard-bearers of Costières de Nîmes, and this rosé is a perennial favorite. Red berries and cherries lead the way, wrapped around a core of citrus acidity. It's light to medium in body, with a pleasantly silky feel to the finish.

properties.title: Château d'Or et de Gueules 2013 Les Cimels Rosé (Costières de Nîmes)
properties.description: This plump, medium-bodied rosé offers hints of peach and melon fruit, then finishes long and citrusy. It's very pale salmon in color, with an attractive coppery tint.

properties.title: Francis Coppola 2011 Diamond Collection Pinot Grigio (California)
properties.description: Sugary sweet and simple, like an apricot, orange and mango fruit juice drink. The alcohol lends body and warmth.

properties.title: Francis Coppola 2011 Diamond Collection Sauvignon Blanc (California)
properties.address: 300 Via Archimedes, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.description: This is likeable for its acidity and savory citrus flavors, which work together to get the tastebuds watering. There's a strong note of sour gooseberry, with a touch of honey in the finish.

properties.title: Francis Coppola 2011 Sofia Rosé (Monterey County)
properties.address: 300 Via Archimedes, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.description: Made from Syrah and Grenache, this is a big, powerful blush wine, with jammy strawberry and raspberry flavors. It's sweet on the finish, almost a dessert wine. If this is your style, it's for you.

properties.title: Morrison Lane 2010 Viognier (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 201 W Main St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: Tank fermented, then aged in neutral French oak, this has a tawny cast to it and a soft, slightly woody flavor. The lemony flavor finishes with a mildly bitter fruit-skin note.

properties.title: Recanati 2011 Yasmin White (Shomron)
properties.description: Always a good value, Recanati's Yasmin line is an easy-pleasing selection. Inviting aromas of freshly sliced peach, lychee and rose water lead seamlessly into flavors of green melon and lime on the palate. The finish is short, but clean and refreshing. Mevushal.

properties.title: Spiropoulos 2010 Made with Organic Grapes Moschofilero (Mantinia)
properties.description: Soft aromas of lemon blossom, flower and citrus lead into appealing flavors of citrus, sea salt and spice. It's not an overly complex white but does not need to be. Enjoy this with grilled seafood, vegetables and fruit.

properties.title: Augey 2010  Bordeaux Blanc
properties.description: This is a wine that brings out a soft, tropical character allied to a citrus and a herbaceous element. It's open, attractive and soft, and it's ready to drink.

properties.title: Dynamite Vineyards 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Hills Lake County)
properties.address: 1700 Moon Mountain Rd, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.description: A very dry Cabernet, with upfront tannins, this has highlights of soft plum, blackberry, cedar and chocolate. It's missing plushness and backbone, finishing a bit thin.

properties.title: Louis and David Luneau 2010 Château des Cléons Sur Lie  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
properties.address: 333 Hudson St suite 505, New York, NY 10013, USA
properties.description: A minerally and creamy wine, this has a green apple character that's shot through with acidity. It has a soft, fresh finish with bright citrus flavors.

properties.title: Kirkland Signature 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 14030 NE 145th St, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: Fruity in blackberry and cherry flavors, this is easy to drink, with a good acid-tannin balance.

properties.title: Lake Chelan 2010 Sweet Riesling (Lake Chelan)
properties.description: Not really sweet, and not entirely Riesling (the blend includes 13% Gewürztraminer and 10% Pinot Gris), this off-dry wine tastes like fresh squeezed apple juice, lightly sweetened.

properties.title: Gunsight Rock 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.description: Tart Montmorency cherry meshes with a cedary cigar-box note on the nose of this wine. The palate is fruit-driven with ripe cherries and blueberries, lifted slightly by anise and bay-leaf spices.

properties.title: Lucky Star 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
properties.address: 10 4th St Suite 208, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.description: Nicely balanced and not too powerful, this is an excellent dinner-time wine. It delivers measured elements of fruit and tobacco, light oak, smooth texture and good, light tannins.

properties.title: McManis 2015 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
properties.description: Showy oak aromas meet good fruit and spice flavors in this lively tasting but smooth-textured and medium-bodied wine. Pepper and nutmeg notes accent the black cherry and blackberry.
