properties.title: Millbrook 2015 Unoaked Chardonnay (New York)
properties.address: 26 Wing Rd, Millbrook, NY 12545, USA
properties.description: Zesty orange rind and apple notes take center stage in this unoaked Chardonnay, unadorned by trimmings of wood or spice. Full bodied and ripe, its easygoing style is approachable. Soft acidity marks a plush, slightly clingy finish. Drink now through 2019.

properties.title: Mussel Bay 2015 Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.description: This is a ripe, plump style of Sauvignon Blanc, delivering ripe fig and melon aromas and flavors. It's not the crispest version you'll ever find, but makes up for that in its generosity of flavor. Drink now.

properties.title: Napeequa 2015 Davey Outrageous ¡Chica! White Wine Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 300 S Quetilquasoon Rd Suite 3, Manson, WA 98831, USA
properties.description: The aromas offer bright notes of ripe peach, flowers and jasmine. It drinks medium sweet, with abundant stone-fruit and floral flavors.

properties.title: Nora 2015 Peitán Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.address: Bruñeiras 7, 36440 Bruñeiras, Pontevedra, Spain
properties.description: Typical Albariño aromas of white peach, white pepper and citrus fruits are about average. Bright citric acidity makes this racy, while salty tangerine, apricot and nectarine flavors end with pithy grit.

properties.title: Jones of Washington 2015 Riesling (Ancient Lakes)
properties.description: This wine is still settling into the bottle, with light spritzy scents of honeysuckle, pear and ripe peach. The off-dry stone-fruit flavors exhibit well-balanced acidity that carries through the finish. The concentration comes off as somewhat light but what's there is good.

properties.title: Jones of Washington 2015 Sauvignon Blanc (Ancient Lakes)
properties.description: The aromas of herb, kiwi and pink grapefruit are light and subtle. The tart flavors show more generosity, though the concentration doesn't quite seem all there.

properties.title: Rutini 2016 Trumpeter Torrontés (Mendoza)
properties.description: Peach-pit and stone-fruit aromas are dry and a touch bitter. Because this is so young, it's juicy and minerally in its current state, with citric acidity in the driver's seat. Nectarine and tangerine flavors finish fresh but simple.

properties.title: TerraNoble 2016 Reserva Terroir El Algarrobo Sauvignon Blanc (Casablanca Valley)
properties.description: A note of grass blends with tropical aromas centered on passion fruit. Tangy, tight and citric, this offers flavors of green apple, tangerine, lemon and passion fruit. A light streak of green works its way onto the finish.

properties.title: Domaine Petroni 2015 White (Corse)
properties.description: This is a crisp blend, fresh with citrus and ripe with apples. Hints of the warmth of the region show with the concentration that lies in the background. The wine is ready to drink.

properties.title: Dominio de Tares 2015 La Sonrisa de Tares Godello (Bierzo)
properties.address: Calle Los Barredos, 4, 24318 San Román de Bembibre, León, Spain
properties.description: A basic but clean stone-fruit nose opens this tight-feeling citrusy Godello from Bierzo. A briny mix of white-fruit and citrus flavors is tangy, salty and minerally on the finish.

properties.title: Fabre Montmayou 2016 Rosé (Mendoza)
properties.description: While this opens with sharp citric aromas, there's no denying that it's fresh up front. Linear, pinchy and high in acid, this rosé of Malbec tastes of nectarine and citrus fruits. A slightly round oily finish holds onto snappy fresh flavors.

properties.title: Domaine du Grand Montmirail 2010 Cuvée Vieilles Vignes  (Gigondas)
properties.description: Dried thyme and bay leaves impart a welcome herbal element to this wine's dark fruit. Hints of espresso, roasted meat and black olive help flesh out this slightly firm, linear blend of 80% Grenache, 15% Syrah and 5% Mourvèdre. With its crisp, dusty finish and admirable concentration, it look capable of aging through 2020.

properties.title: Les Vins de Vienne 2009 Les Archevêques  (Condrieu)
properties.address: 1 Zone d'Activités, Jassoux, 42410 Chavanay, France
properties.description: Honeyed but otherwise not overly aromatic, this full-bodied, corpulent Condrieu still provides enjoyable drinking. The weighty notes of honeyed citrus linger on the finish, but drink up over the next six months or so.

properties.title: Testarossa 2012 Rincon Vineyard Chardonnay (Arroyo Grande Valley)
properties.address: 300 College Ave, Los Gatos, CA 95030, USA
properties.description: Salted peach, vanilla-smeared French toast and a hint of guava make for a very powerful aromatic impression on this wine from the Arroyo Grande appellation at the southern end of San Luis Obispo County. Those scents don't exactly translate to the palate, though, where the wine it a bit leaner than promised, with apple pie flavors the most dominant.

properties.title: Tranche 2011 Celilo Vineyard Chardonnay (Columbia Gorge (WA))
properties.address: 705 Berney Dr, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: An aromatically arresting wine with a complex medley of corn silk, cream and an assortment of spices. It's on the lighter side, elegant in its styling, with tart lemony acidity that runs from head to tail and a lingering finish.

properties.title: Uvaggio 2013 Zelo Bianco White (Napa-Carneros)
properties.description: This intriguing combination of Pinot Grigio (70%) holds smaller traces of Traminer and Moscato Giallo. The nose is powerfully led by the Moscato, so floral and spicy in jasmine and briny seaside that it almost suggests Vermentino. Textured and light, it offers strong flavors of pear and a long, crisp finish.

properties.title: La Soufrandière 2012 Clos de Grand Père  (Mâcon-Vinzelles)
properties.description: A lightly smoky aroma shows the wood aging of this wine. It is toasty, with a mineral touch, and the ripe yellow fruits are developing well. Smooth and potentially rich, this needs a few more months to show at its best. Drink from 2015.

properties.title: Maisonry 2013 Hudson Vineyard Sans Chêne Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Fermented entirely in stainless steel, this is a floral and fruity wine from a great Carneros vineyard. Offering sharp acidity and rounded flavors of honey and apple, it begs to be enjoyed with food along the lines of foie gras and fresh oysters.

properties.title: Samson 2012 Riesling (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 1861 Van Dyk Rd, Everson, WA 98247, USA
properties.description: Although slightly off dry, it retains excellent tension and minerality. Pear, peach and pineapple fruit flavors combine in an elegant and long-lasting wine.

properties.title: Simonnet-Febvre 2011 Montée de Tonnerre Premier Cru  (Chablis)
properties.description: Elegant and full of fruit, it has just the right steely edge. It offers richness as well, with lemon and pear fruits showing strongly. Acidity gives a bright aftertaste to this wine that will age well. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Tabor 2012 Mt. Tabor Chardonnay (Galilee)
properties.description: The nose of this wine recalls chilled fruit salad, with aromas of melon, pineapple and Delicious apple. Engaging flavors of pineapple, passion fruit, vanilla and clove fill the softly textured mouth and persist into the cooling finish.

properties.title: Tolosa 2012 No Oak Chardonnay (Central Coast)
properties.description: Though quite pale in color due to no barrel aging, there is a nicely rounded candy nose of bright green apple and vanilla, alongside some sharper spice. On the palate, more green apple dominates, along with lemon-lime, slight guava and an acidity that causes the wine to dance across the tongue.

properties.title: Sawtooth 2015 Estate Grown Riesling
properties.address: 19348 Lowell Rd Building C, Caldwell, ID 83607, USA
properties.description: Bright aromas of honeysuckle, honey and ripe peach lead to medium-sweet fruit flavors. The concentration isn't all there but there's still much to enjoy.

properties.title: Kim Crawford 2016 Pinot Gris (Marlborough)
properties.description: This wine starts with typical Pinot Gris aromas of apple, pear and ginger, then picks up some citrusy flavors on the palate before ending on a note of orange zest. It's medium in weight, with a dry, silky feel as it glides across the palate.

properties.title: Leyda 2015 Single Vineyard Kadún Sauvignon Gris (Leyda Valley)
properties.description: Initial aromas of canned peas and green fruits are classic Leyda. This Sauvignon Gris is intense on the palate, with a sense of green grape skins to the mouthfeel. Potent, racy flavors are herbaceous, while bell pepper is a key flavor on the finish.

properties.title: Chime 2015 Chardonnay (California)
properties.description: Full bodied and rich in texture, this wine has ample toast and vanilla aromas, ripe pear and honey flavors, and low acidity. That adds up to a flavorful, almost sweet wine that is soft and syrupy.

properties.title: Glenora 2015 Pinot Blanc (Finger Lakes)
properties.description: A rich backdrop of cream and toast bolsters this delicate apple-scented wine. While light in body and concentration, its lingering silkiness is pleasant and comforting. Drink now through 2019.

properties.title: Casas del Bosque 2015 Reserva Sauvignon Blanc (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: Hijuelas Nº 2 Ex Fundo - Sta Rosa, Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.description: Pungent pyrazine-heavy aromas of bell pepper and asparagus are typical for this winery. A chunky palate is oily in feel, while vegetal-leaning, green flavors of pickled citrus fruits end with a salty note.

properties.title: Mt. Beautiful 2014 Pinot Gris
properties.description: This is a reasonably rich, concentrated example of Pinot Gris, but one that seems a bit repressed aromatically. It hints rather than suggests at fig, pear and melon, before ending on a weighty note.

properties.title: Ravoire et Fils 2014 Domaine De Yves Red (Ventoux)
properties.description: A blend of Syrah, Grenache and Carignan, this medium- to full-bodied red features bright aromas of cherry, herb, chocolate and espresso, but turns dry and dusty-textured on the finish. Drink now.

properties.title: H to H 2014 Homage to Heritage Red (Côtes du Rhône)
properties.address: 14343 Liberty St, Montgomery, TX 77356, USA
properties.description: This crisp, lively red shows off the herbal notes of Provence—what the French call garrigue—and tart cherry fruit. It's less ripe than many Côtes du Rhône wines, but bright and mouthwatering. Drink now–2020.

properties.title: Junta 2015 Momentos Reserve Sauvignon Blanc (Curicó Valley)
properties.description: Clean pear and apple aromas come in front of a citrusy palate with just enough shearing acidity to keep things balanced. Ringing, lasting lime and orange flavors are slightly briny, while this finishes solid and zesty.

properties.title: Terre di Talamo 2015 Vento Teso Viognier (Toscana)
properties.description: The nose is rather shy while the round palate offers suggestions of yellow stone fruit and a candied citrus note. It closes on a hint of bitter almond.

properties.title: 240 Days 2015 Rosé (Finger Lakes)
properties.description: Subtle notes of bramble, smoke and raspberry entice on the nose of this dry rosé. While delicate in concentration, its supple silken mouthfeel and yielding acidity are approachable and comforting. The finish is bright and clean. Drink now.

properties.title: Boomtown 2015 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 200 Main St # B, Downieville, CA 95936, USA
properties.description: This wine brings aromas and flavors of pear along with light tropical accents. The concentration dips toward the finish.

properties.title: Château Rieussec 2006 Barrel sample  (Sauternes)
properties.address: Rieussec, 33210 Fargues, France
properties.description: 92—94 Barrel sample. A fat, full wine, this is rich, intense, concentrated. Great layers of botrytis and apricot flavors give it attraction and power.—R.V.

properties.title: Stonestreet 2005 Christopher's Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
properties.description: Not ready for drinking now. Shows youthfully aggressive tannins and forward flavors of blackberries, currants, herbs and unintegrated new oak, making it the least satisfactory of Stonestreet's impressive new releases if you're looking for something now. Seems like it will make a very fine bottle after 2011 or so.

properties.title: Weinrieder 2007 Alte Reben Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: u. Ortsstraße 44, 2170 Poysdorf, Austria
properties.description: The concentration here is enormous, from low-yielding old vines. The wine has the characteristic pepper edge, but the creamy character, the ripe lychees and green plums, are all more dominant. At the end, a distinct spiciness shows through. Age ideally for 3–4 years.

properties.title: Gloria Ferrer 2006 Brut Rosé Sparkling (Sonoma County)
properties.description: The first duty of a blush bubbly is to be delicious and elegant, and this one is, despite the full-bodied flavors from a majority of Pinot Noir. The wine is dry and complex, with flavors of raspberries, cherries, limes, buttery vanilla, yeast and smoky oak. Really good, and will develop through 2013.

properties.title: Titus 2006 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Titus's regular '06 Cab is a wonderful wine. Their Reserve is even better, showing a more dramatic structure of smooth, complex tannins and a more intense, fruity profile. Offers lavish waves of blackberries, black currants, cassis, smoky oak and minerals, with notes of chocolate and cappuccino. Delicious now and through 2013.

properties.title: Château Clos Haut-Peyraguey 2008 Barrel sample  (Sauternes)
properties.description: 92-94 Barrel sample. Like many of the Sauternes in 2008, this is dominated by huge, concentrated botrytis. The fruits are dried, with orange peel coming through as a final, fresh lift.

properties.title: Château de Myrat 2008 Barrel sample  (Barsac)
properties.description: 92-94 Barrel sample. With its gold color, this announces richness. The texture is rich, a wine that rounds in the mouth, giving sweetness, tropical flavors and big, ripe fruit. Only to finish, does the acidity arrive.

properties.title: Château Filhot 2008 Barrel sample  (Sauternes)
properties.description: 92-94 Barrel sample. An impressive wine. It shows just the right balance of dry botrytis and sweet fruit, bringing a firm structure as well as ripe bitter orange marmalade flavors.

properties.title: Château Suau 2008 Barrel sample  (Barsac)
properties.description: 92-94 Barrel sample. With its big, almost dry core of botrytis, this is going to be an intense wine - many years from now. For the present, the acidity gives it some freshness, while it remains concentrated.

properties.title: Château Lamothe Guignard 2006 Barrel sample  (Sauternes)
properties.description: 92—94 Barrel sample. There is big, and serious botrytis here. With its powerful structure, its dry botrytis, here's a wine that will certainly need aging. Very powerful, intense.

properties.title: Waterbrook 2013 Mélange White Varietal Blend White (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 10518 US-12, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: Seven different varieties make up this blend with Riesling (34%), Chardonnay (18%), Gewürztraminer (16%) and Viognier (13%) taking the lead. Aromas of flowers, mandarin orange and citrus are followed by moderately sweet stone-fruit flavors that providing easy drinking pleasure.

properties.title: Galatea Effect 2013 Conoscenti Rosé (California)
properties.address: 25 E Napa St Suite E, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.description: Not a simple refreshment, this has a deep pink color tinged with copper. In aroma and flavor it's almost as substantive as a red wine. It has plummy, rich and slightly earthy aromas, a smooth mouthfeel, and soft cherry and spice flavors.

properties.title: Nadler 2014 Grüner Veltliner (Carnuntum)
properties.address: In der Kellergasse 31 gegenüber von, Hauptstraße 88, 2464 Arbesthal, Austria
properties.description: The nose here is not quite as clean-cut as it could be, while the palate shows a little more focus. Crisp and zesty, if a little short.

properties.title: Oyster Bay 2014 Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.address: Wairau Valley 7271, New Zealand
properties.description: At this scale (170,000 cases imported), the quality is remarkable. Leafy notes accent pink grapefruit aromas and flavors, coming together in a harmonious, easy-drinking finish.

properties.title: Hosmer 2013 Pinot Noir Brut Rosé Sparkling (Cayuga Lake)
properties.address: 7020 NY-89, Ovid, NY 14521, USA
properties.description: Spine-tingling acidity shines a spotlight on crisp sour cherry and cranberry flavors in this bristling Pinot Noir sparkling. Dry and a bit stark in style.

properties.title: Les Hauts de Lagarde 2014  Bordeaux Blanc
properties.address: La Cave du Château de Lagarde" sur la RD 54 direction Digne, Route de Montferrat, 83830 Figanières, France
properties.description: This crisp, lemon-flavored wine has a ripe, full character. It is rich with apples, apricots and delicious acidity at the end.

properties.title: Maison Bouey 2014 Le Rosé Gourmand de Maison Blanche Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
properties.description: This is a soft and ripe wine. Red fruits and caramel flavors add weight to the wine and a rich character, without forgetting the crisp, fresh acidity in the aftertaste.

properties.title: Bota Box 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
properties.description: This full-bodied wine has an earthy, smoky aroma, an abundance of fresh grapy flavors and a soft but supportive texture. The aroma is pretty strong, and then the otherwise-generous fruit characteristics take over.

properties.title: Buried Cane 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: Aromatic for Cabernet, this wine possesses notes of black currant, green pepper, blackberry and herbs. It drinks slightly off dry, offering lighter flavors with a tangy feel and chalky tannins.

properties.title: Château Au Grand Paris 2014  Bordeaux Blanc
properties.description: This fragrant, spicy wine is soft and rounded. It is still developing to give a wine that will be warm and full. It misses something of the essential fruitiness.

properties.title: Château Grand Jean 2014  Entre-Deux-Mers
properties.description: Fruity and juicy, this is an attractive blend of Sémillon and Sauvignon Blanc, giving a tight, mineral-driven wine. With its pink grapefruit and crisp green apple fruits, it is young and can age, although not for long. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Château la France 2014 Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
properties.address: 1 Rte de Fossés Longues, 33750 Beychac-et-Caillau, France
properties.description: Pale orange-pink in color, this is fruity and light. It coveys a bright, fresh character that is both refreshing and very crisp. Drink now.

properties.title: Château Vircoulon 2014  Bordeaux Blanc
properties.address: 11 au conte, 33330 Saint-Hippolyte, France
properties.description: This delicious, fruity wine is full of acidity and crisp fruit. Light, bright and dominated by green and citrus fruits, it is ready to drink now.

properties.title: Dark Horse 2013 Chardonnay (California)
properties.address: 70665 B Line, Grand Bend, ON N0M 1T0, Canada
properties.description: This well-made wine in a rich style smells like ripe pears and melted butter, and tastes soft and almost sweet, resembling pear and peach juice. The texture is smooth and soft and the body is medium, so it's easy to enjoy.

properties.title: Goose Ridge 2014 Estate Bottled Pinot Gris (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: In this straightforward quaffer, aromas of pear, melon and apple lead to off-dry fruit flavors with a full feel. The flavor concentration is light but it still provides easy drinking enjoyment.

properties.title: Les Vignerons de la Méditerranée 2008 Réserve St. Martin Sauvignon Blanc (Vin de Pays d'Oc)
properties.address: 12 Rue du Rec de Veyret, 11100 Narbonne, France
properties.description: Crisp and fresh with lively flavors of apple slices, clementine supremes, nectarine and a touch of honeysuckle. Lighter weight with good balance and a clean finish. The 2009 should be available, so drink up the '08 now.

properties.title: Piandibugnano 2008 Cuccallegro White (Montecucco)
properties.address: Localita' Pian Di Bugnano, Seggiano, GR 58038, 58038 Seggiano GR, Italy
properties.description: There are distant floral notes here, but in general this blend of Trebbiano and Vermentino from Grosseto, Tuscany seems initially closed. Perfumed aromas of jasmine and honeysuckle do burst through from time to time and the wine is crisp and snappy on the close.

properties.title: Porta 2008 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Aconcagua Valley)
properties.description: A bit foxy and jumpy at first, and then familiar aromas of berry and plum settle in. The palate is jammy and tannic, while flavors of berries and currants seem roasted. Tobacco and olive notes are present on the chewy, weighty, textured finish.

properties.title: Raphael 2008 Grand Cru Chardonnay (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.description: A medium bouquet of apple, lemon and a touch of fresh young peach. The oak is there but not overpowering. The palate is well structured with good acidity and a medium weight followed by a lengthy finish.

properties.title: Albert Bichot 2008 Domaine Long-Depaquit  (Chablis)
properties.address: 6 Bd Jacques Copeau, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: The wine has aromas of pears. There is plenty of fruit here, but the freshness is missing, giving a southern, warm feel.

properties.title: Bocelli 2007 Le Franette White (Toscana)
properties.address: 1250 Hylan Blvd, Staten Island, NY 10305, USA
properties.description: This spicy white wine offers incredibly intense aromas of candied fruit, chopped herbs and thick honey. The wine is fragrant and highly aromatic with a thick, creamy mouthfeel.

properties.title: Casa Larga 2007 American Oak Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
properties.description: Barrel fermented and aged in American oak for 15 months, this is a big and powerfully oaky Chard with dominating notes of butter, wood-infused stone fruit and apple pie along with a hint of grapefruit oil in the mouth. The finish is toasty  with a lingering vanilla bean note.

properties.title: Concha y Toro 2008 Casillero del Diablo Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
properties.address: Av. Virginia Subercaseaux 210, Pirque, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: For a huge-volume wine, it's what we'd expect. Controlled oak results in aromas of coffee, vanilla, marshmallow and resin in addition to cassis and cherry, while the palate offers generic fruit flavors as well as vanilla and herbal notes. A bit puckery and scratchy, but keep in mind that annual production tops 1.3 million cases.

properties.title: Cave de Ribeauvillé 2007 Prestige Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 2 Rte de Colmar, 68150 Ribeauvillé, France
properties.description: A very flowery interpretation with gardenia, freesia and carnations on the nose that carry over to the palate where they merge with fresh orange peel. There's only moderate intensity and complexity here, but the exceptionally pretty nose and the crisp, linear finish make for a nice overall package. Serve with flounder. Should be drunk up in a year or two.

properties.title: Macari 2007 Reserve Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.description: With 12 months in French oak, the Reserve Barrel Fermented Chardonnay is a rounder, more spice-infused Chard than Macari's regular Estate Bottled offering. As big as it is, the nose is somewhat muted with soft notes of pear and yellow flowers and the palate shows more as a result of the oak (spice, toast) than the fruit.

properties.title: Murphy-Goode 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
properties.address: 241 Healdsburg Ave, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: A good, everyday Cabernet marked by attractive blackberry, cherry, currant and oak flavors. It's dry and the tannins are rich and supple.

properties.title: Santa Rita 2008 120 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
properties.address: 2923 Grand Ave, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.description: This value-priced wine struts like it comes from a better neighborhood. The nose is clean and is centered on berry fruit, while the palate is medium in size, with creamy, sweet berry flavors. Mildly medicinal and candied, but good overall.

properties.title: Chapel Hill 2008 Unwooded Chardonnay (South Australia)
properties.address: Chapel Hill Rd &, Chaffeys Rd, McLaren Vale SA 5171, Australia
properties.description: Redolent with melon and pineapple, this medium-bodied unoaked Chardonnay is simple, fruity and clean, with a tart, citrusy finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Dutch Bill Creek 2008 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 641 Limerick Ln, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Tries for Burgundian richness, but ends up rather common, although it will satisfy fans of buttery, oaky Chardonnays. Shows ripe flavors of pineapple jam, apricot purée and buttered popcorn.

properties.title: Giordano 2008 Primitivo Rosato Rosé (Puglia)
properties.address: Via Guido Cane, 47/Bis/50, 12055 Diano D'alba CN, Italy
properties.description: Here's a pale and luminous rosé from Southern Italy with a pinkish-peach color and delicate aromas of stone fruit, wild berries, white cherries and a touch of chopped mint or basil. The wine is tart but also slightly sweet in the mouth and there's a touch of bitter almond on the close.

properties.title: Kawarau Estate 2007 Reserve Chardonnay (Central Otago)
properties.description: Something of a letdown after the top-rank showing of the 2006, the 2007 is marked by a slightly sour, lactic character, which accentuates the wine's sweet-corn fruit. The mouthfeel is creamy and soft, maybe a little too soft—so drink it over the next few months.

properties.title: Contadi Castaldi 2011 Satén Chardonnay (Franciacorta)
properties.description: Aromas of bread crust, dried chamomile and mature orchard fruit come together on this. The palate offers ripe yellow-apple skin, vanilla and toasted oak alongside a vigorous perlage. The somewhat brief finish closes on a note of bitter almond.

properties.title: 786 Wines 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
properties.address: 43-299 US Grape Rd, Sunnyside, WA 98944, USA
properties.description: A cranberry-cherry flavor permeates this light-bodied, crisp and fruity wine. The aromas are as bright as the flavors, and it's also lively in texture.

properties.title: Bodegas Cerrosol 2015 Palma Real Verdejo (Rueda)
properties.address: 39050 De Portola Rd, Temecula, CA 92592, USA
properties.description: Snappy aromas are suggestive of wild green herbs. A juicy, high-acid palate tastes a bit green like the nose suggests, with white-pepper notes. Green salad-like notes are maintained across the finish.

properties.title: Global Wines 2015 Cabriz Colheita Seleccionada Branco White (Dão)
properties.address: 3430-144 Carregal do Sal, Portugal
properties.description: A light, bright wine that has a touch of toast and lively yellow fruits. With a touch of pepper and perfume, the wine is fragrant and ready to drink.

properties.title: Château Barbé 2015  Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.address: Château de Barbe, 33710 Villeneuve, France
properties.description: This is a crisp and herbal wine that is both fruity and finely textured. With layers of acidity and green fruit flavors, it is bright, fresh and ready to drink.

properties.title: Château Jeanguillon 2015  Entre-Deux-Mers
properties.description: This is a lively crisp wine with a creamy texture and a perfumed character. It is ripe and full with just enough acidity to give freshness.

properties.title: Santa Alicia 2008 Gran Reserva de Los Andes Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
properties.description: Cassis, olive and a hint of nail polish make for a solid, Chilean-style nose. The palate has a firm, juicy feel and nice flavors of raspberry and plum followed by secondary notes of woodspice and vanilla. Peppery and a little resiny on the finish.

properties.title: Skouras 2009 Cuvée Larsinos Viognier (Peloponnese)
properties.address: Argous - Sternas Rd (10th Km), Malandreni, Argos 212 00, Greece
properties.description: This Viognier is a combination of peach and honeyed spice on the nose and palate. Refreshing but with a round, fragrant curve, the wine has a velvety texture and finishes with a spin of peach and tropical fruit.

properties.title: Talamonti 2010  Cerasuolo d'Abruzzo
properties.address: Contrada Palazzo, Loreto Aprutino, PE 65014, 65014 Loreto Aprutino PE, Italy
properties.description: This pomegranate-pink Cerasuolo from central Italy opens with spicy aromas of chopped herb, cassis and raspberry and ends with cooling acidity on the close. The mouthfeel shows balanced density and smoothness.

properties.title: Gerovassiliou 2009 Sauvignon Blanc (Epanomi)
properties.address: ktima Gerovassiliou, Επανομή 575 00, Greece
properties.description: This fumé has a zesty character, with aromas of tropical fruit and flowers and fresh, fun flavors of peach, citrus and pineapple. The oak offers spice for added character, and clean acidity makes it a great find for fresh, summer meals.

properties.title: Del Rio 2009 Pinot Gris (Rogue Valley)
properties.address: 52 N River Rd, Gold Hill, OR 97525, USA
properties.description: Crisp and palate-cleansing, this southern Oregon Pinot Gris shows a nice mix of green berries, tree fruit and even some unripe banana. Good concentration and length, with a finish that invites the next sip immediately.

properties.title: Laird 2009 Cold Creek Pinot Grigio (Los Carneros)
properties.description: This Pinot Grigio is crisply acidic and dry, with exotic flavors of yellow apricots, tangerines and spicy golden mangoes. It shows toasty, caramelized notes. Refreshing now as a cocktail sipper.

properties.title: Librandi 2009 Critone White (Val di Neto)
properties.description: Chardonnay and Sauvignon grapes are blended to produce this fragrant white wine from Calabria, southern Italy. The Chardonnay component adds structure and creamy density, while the Sauvignon offers fresh floral aromas.

properties.title: Mockingbird 2007 Red Label Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: A controversial wine, tasted twice. It's soft and tannic, with candied cherry-berry, mocha and sweet oak flavors. Seems at once dull and powerful. Hard to know where it's going, but the benefit of the doubt suggests 4–5 years in the cellar.

properties.title: MAN Vintners 2010 Sauvignon Blanc (Western Cape)
properties.description: Light and easy-drinking with fresh notes of lemon citrus, watercress and a touch of wild field grass. Clean acidity and herbal flavors carry through the palate to the crisp finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Lomas del Valle 2010 Sauvignon Blanc (Casablanca Valley)
properties.description: Opens with aromas of lettuce, underripe peach and mineral water. The palate is healthy and crisp, with lemony acids and fresh flavors of green fruits and lettuce leaf. Clean but lightly bitter.

properties.title: Martín Berdugo 2016 Verdejo (Rueda)
properties.description: Floral aromas mixed with citrus notes are appealing. This wine feels round but solidified by bright core acidity. Ripe flavors include pineapple, mango and peach. On the finish, lime and tropical notes are good but short.

properties.title: McCall 2014 Reserve North Ridge Vineyard Chardonnay (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.description: Spice, vanilla and oak abound in this barrel-aged Chardonnay, but it's a neatly balanced wine with crisp-tart apple and pear flavors. Brisk acidity off sets a palate that's rich and substantial in texture.

properties.title: Nine Hats 2016 The Benches Vineyard Pinot Gris (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 3861 1st Ave S, Seattle, WA 98134, USA
properties.description: This wine's red and yellow apple and melon aromas lead to broad, fleshy fruit flavors. It's direct and delivers a lot of appeal.

properties.title: Palacio de Bornos 2016 Verdejo (Rueda)
properties.description: This Verdejo is pungent and angular on the nose, with pyrazinic aromas of green citrus, sweat and cactus that are common to the variety and Rueda. An oily, grabby palate is cut by firm acidity, while flavors of tangerine, nopal and bell pepper finish short despite lively acidity.

properties.title: Pascal Rollet 2015 Aux Bouthières  (Pouilly-Fuissé)
properties.description: A smooth and creamy wine, this is packed with tropical fruits and spice. Acidity gives the wine its lift, bringing a crisp edge to the full-bodied character. Drink now.

properties.title: Rabble 2015 Mossfire Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.description: Fresh boysenberry aromas are lifted by dried dill, black pepper and black olive on the spice-driven nose of this bottling. Tangy plum and underrripe berry flavors pop on the tense palate, where anise, oregano and marjoram round out the experience.

properties.title: Clif Family 2015 Gewürztraminer (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 709 Main St, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: This light-tasting wine is a soft and easy sipper. A touch less bold than the last two vintages, it still has plenty of fresh fruits like apple and peach in the flavors, light to medium body and mild acidity.

properties.title: Clos des Rocs 2015 En Chantone  (Pouilly-Loché)
properties.description: Full of warm fruit and light spice, this generous wine is rich with yellow fruits balanced by bright acidity and vanilla. The rounded texture and ripe fruit mean the wine is very ready to drink.

properties.title: Comartin 2016 Adelaide's Rosé (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.description: Candied strawberry fruit and a touch of lemon peel make for a fairly mellow nose on this bottling, named after winemaker Adam Comartin's daughter. There is a sizzle of acidity, a grippy texture and clean lines of sour cherry flavor on the palate, which holds its tension deep into the finish.

properties.title: Domaine Guillemot-Michel 2015 Quintaine  (Viré-Clessé)
properties.description: This ripe, full-bodied wine is made from biodynamically grown grapes. Although rich, it has enough acidity to keeps it crisp and fruity. The wine is balanced and delicious, ready to drink now.

properties.title: Domaine Pascal et Mireille Renaud 2016 Vers Cras  (Pouilly-Fuissé)
properties.address: POUILLY BAS, Imp. du Tonnelier, 71960 Solutré-Pouilly, France
properties.description: This wine is tight and flinty. Crisp lemon and apple flavors are textured with a steely character that needs time to broaden out. Drink this mineral wine from 2019.

properties.title: Domaine Perraud 2015  Saint-Véran
properties.description: A mineral-driven wine, this is tangy-zesty, with a tight texture. Great fruit shines through the crispness. Balanced, ripe and with some potential, the wine will be ready from late 2018.

properties.title: Domaines Devillard 2015 Château de Chamirey  (Mercurey)
properties.description: This blend from several vineyards is a soft, rounded wine. It has a good balance between acidity and ripe white and yellow fruits, shot through with acidity. A touch of toast adds spice to the mix. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: Don Olegario 2016 Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.description: Apple and vanilla-cookie aromas are mild. The slightly chunky mouthfeel suggests grape skins. Skins-driven flavors of lime and grapefruit finish with an oily texture and a taste of citrus peel.

properties.title: Glenora 2016 Bubbly Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.description: This delicately carbonated Riesling sparkler offers all of the grape's characteristic aromatic exuberance. It's blossomy and plump in notes of sweet peach, apple and lemon, yet bristling and spry. An easy going, light-bodied sip for everyday enjoyment.

properties.title: Glenora 2016 Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 5435 NY-14, Dundee, NY 14837, USA
properties.description: Whiffs of smoky crushed slate lend some mineral depth to this light-bodied, medium-sweet Riesling. It's a deftly balanced wine offering zippy tangerine, lemon and lime tinged by a reverberating streak of honey.

properties.title: Michael Mondavi Family Estate 2012 Emblem Oso Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Bittersweet at first, with sizable tannins, this Cab also contains 13.8% Petit Verdot. Red and black berries give it a juicy palate atop dusty, chalky tannins and a richness of leather and clove on the finish.

properties.title: Moniker 2013 Chardonnay (Mendocino County)
properties.address: 501 Parducci Rd, Ukiah, CA 95482, USA
properties.description: A beautiful and lightly spicy nutmeg character lights up this full-bodied wine from the first sniff to the lingering finish. The texture feels very rich, the pear-tart flavors are generous and the spiciness is intriguing. Hints of tannin and tartness firm up the mouthfeel nicely.

properties.title: Provenance Vineyards 2012 Barrel Select Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
properties.address: 1350 Acacia Dr, Oakville, CA 94562, USA
properties.description: A juiciness of cherry and vanilla spark the opening of this wine, a celebration of the vintage, appellation and in this case, fruit-forwardness of the variety. With a backbone of oak and cedar, it has smooth tannins and medium weight, finishing in mocha chocolate. Drink now through 2022.

properties.title: Raymond 2012 District Collection Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
properties.description: Sweetened tannins highlight a depth of chocolate and blackberry in this 100% varietal wine made in small amounts. Soft and juicy, it crafts a balance of richness and density around elegant spicy clove and cinnamon.

properties.title: Spring Mountain Vineyard 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: This grippy Cab exhibits the power of the 10% Petit Verdot in the blend, softened by 6% Merlot and 5% Cabernet Franc. Cassis and raspberry provide a fruity core around lush, tight tannins and a black pepper-seasoned finish. Full bodied, it remains elegant in the glass.

properties.title: Testarossa 2013 Lone Oak Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.description: Warm vanilla notes are laid across ripe nectarine, apple skin and a twist of lemon rind on this single-vineyard study by the Los Gatos-based winery. Pencil lead kicks off the palate, which then opens into poached apples and lemon oil, laid across a sizzling acidity that lasts long.

properties.title: Castello di Amorosa 2012 Morisoli-Borges Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
properties.address: 4045 St Helena Hwy, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.description: From decades' old vines in the heart of the appellation, this wine conveys dusty milk chocolate and baked plum. It's 100% varietal, aged almost two years in 60-gallon French oak barrels. Softly layered, and full bodied, it's approachable now, linear in its acidity.

properties.title: Diamond Creek 2012 Fortieth Anniversary Gravelly Meadow Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
properties.address: 1500 Diamond Mountain Rd, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.description: Leather saddle and chocolate overlay a juicy midpalate of cassis, blackberry and dried herb that's soft and supple on the palate. Tightly wound, time in the bottle should do wonders to tame the tight oak and tannin, and temper the powerful finish. Cellar through 2022.

properties.title: Dr. H. Thanisch (Erben Müller-Burggraef) 2014 Bernkasteler Badstube Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Junkerland 14, 54470 Bernkastel-Kues, Germany
properties.description: Whiffs of turmeric and saffron lend exotic flair to this bracing lemon-lime Riesling. Off-dry in style, it's refreshing and quaffable, yet remarkably complex if you'll give it the time and attention it deserves. Drink now through 2020.

properties.title: Domaine Céline et Frédéric Gueguen 2013 Vaucoupin Premier Cru  (Chablis)
properties.address: 5 Bis Rue Jules Rathier, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: On the right bank of the Serein river, Vaucoupin gives rich wines, showing its sunny exposition. This bottling is ripe, full in the mouth and intense with fragrant white fruits, vanilla and youthful acidity. With freshness still to the fore, it will age and will be better from 2017.

properties.title: Domaine Vincent Carême 2013 Le Peu Morier  (Vouvray)
properties.address: 1 Rue du Haut Clos, 37210 Vernou-sur-Brenne, France
properties.description: Made from old vines and vinified in oak, this beautifully rich, very dry wine has both rounded apricots and quince plus a touch of toast. It is still young, fresh and needs to age. Drink from 2017 and the tense, youthful minerality will disappear and become richer and full.

properties.title: Michael Mondavi Family Estate 2011 Animo Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: From the producer's monumental Atlas Peak vineyard, this is a tightly wound, solidly constructed mountain Cab, blended with a handful of Petit Verdot. Tobacco, black tea and a sliver of coconut intermingle around a medium-bodied whole that will benefit from cellaring, through 2021.

properties.title: Gustafson Family 2013 Heritage Tree Vineyard Estate Riesling (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.description: Light bodied and highly aromatic in petrol, waxy apple and pear, this vineyard-designate is crisp and floral, with buoyant acidity. It lists the residual sugar at 9 g/L but tastes more dry than sweet, finishing with a touch of cream.

properties.title: Keller 2008 La Cruz Vineyard Pinot Gris (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 5875 Lakeville Hwy, Petaluma, CA 94954, USA
properties.description: A really lovely Pinot Gris, filled with pineapple, tangerine, apple, wildflower and mineral flavors brightened with crisp acidity, and with a dry finish. The grapes come from the cool, foggy Petaluma Gap region.

properties.title: Château Couhins 2008  Pessac-Léognan
properties.address: Chem. de la Gravette, 33140 Villenave-d'Ornon, France
properties.description: Very herbaceous, dominated by Sauvignon Blanc, this wine is powered by green fruits, citrus and layers of wood. Ripe, crisp, with a tangy finish.

properties.title: Conceito Vinhos 2009 Conceito Branco White (Douro)
properties.address: Quinta Da Veiga, Cedovim, Guarda, 5155-020 Vila Nova de Foz Côa, Portugal
properties.description: Smooth, creamy wine, its fruit layered with toast and piquant spices. The yellow fruit flavors are contrasted with acidity from a pink grapefruit freshness. It should be aged for another year.

properties.title: Villa Maria 2009 Cellar Selection Riesling (Marlborough)
properties.description: Despite more than 8 g/L of residual sugar, this comes across as dry in style, with austere notes of crushed stone and lime zest balanced by riper hints of apple and pear. It should drink well over at least the next several years.

properties.title: Vinum 2009 Chenin/Vio Chenin Blanc-Viognier (California)
properties.description: Brilliantly dry and acidic, an Old World-style wine whose price shouldn't mislead you. This is a serious food wine, dry and minerally, with lemon and lime flavors. The score would be higher if not for a very slight vegetal note.

properties.title: Château Olivier 2008  Pessac-Léognan
properties.description: A soft, ripe wine, its fruit rounded by an oily Sémillon texture. There is weight here, wih spice, wood and a creamy aftertaste. For medium-term aging.

properties.title: Kirkland Signature 2011 Series Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
properties.description: This is a good price for a Cabernet this rich and satisfying. It's dry, tannic and opulent in blackberries, black currants and mocha, with a complex note of green olives. It's fully ready to drink now.

properties.title: Analemma 2012 Atavus Vineyard Gewürztraminer (Columbia Gorge (WA))
properties.description: More aromatically restrained than its Oak Ridge Vineyard counterpart, the Atavus Vineyard wine brings notes of rose petal, herbs, lees and spice. The palate is textured with tremendous energy and tension to the fruit and savory flavors as they dance and tussle toward a long, graceful finish.

properties.title: Bryter 2010 Inspired Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2940 floral st, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: A solid effort, dry, tannic and rich in fruit. It's succulent in blackberries, black currants, crême de cassis, dark chocolate and plums, with an overlay of toasty oak. It shows the modern, fruit-forward Napa style.

properties.title: Del Dotto 2011 Family Reserve Cinghiale Vineyard Chardonnay (Fort Ross-Seaview)
properties.description: The triple digit price is not a typo. This Chard is rich, ripe, high in alcohol and oaky, in the manner of the most opulent California Chardonnays. It holds concentrated tropical fruit, honey, butterscotch, toasty oak and cream flavors. With good acidity, it is ready to drink now.

properties.title: Duckhorn 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Hard tannins make this wine difficult to approach now, as they usually do for young Duckhorn Cabs. But it's quite a success for the chilly 2010 vintage, showing lush blackberry and cherry fruits and fine acidity. As tough as the tannins are, they're well structured, a strong suggestion that the wine, which includes Merlot, should have an easy time aging.  Start drinking it in 2016.

properties.title: Dutton Estate 2012 Kyndall's Reserve Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: Lots of oak and lees on this Chardonnay, but is never feels overworked. The acidity is brisk, and fruit flavors are rich in apricots, mangoes, tangerines and pears. Don't drink this delicious wine too cold, as it picks up nuances in the glass.

properties.title: Fess Parker 2012 Lazy F Ranch Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.description: Give this Chard a year in the cellar to let the oak integrate with everything else. Right now, it shows a woody sappiness that dominates. Under that is a fine wine, dry, acidic and ripe in pears, Meyer lemons, green apples and golden mangoes.

properties.title: Hermann J. Wiemer 2010 Noble Select Josef Vineyard Riesling (Seneca Lake)
properties.address: 3962 NY-14, Dundee, NY 14837, USA
properties.description: Saffron and honey notes are earthy and dusty in profile, but add striking complexity to a palate that's concentrated with peach and orange flavors. Strong acidity cuts through layers of luscious honey and fruit, before finishing on a pleasantly floral note.

properties.title: R&A; Pfaffl 2012 Hommage Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Weinviertel)
properties.description: Restrained notes of woodsmoke play around hints of ripe yellow pear. The palate boasts a backbone of acidity plus that famous varietal phenolic grip. Made for the long run, the wine will turn out rich and layered. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Rôtie Cellars 2011 Southern Blend Red (Washington)
properties.description: This is 66% Grenache, 23% Mourvèdre, and 6% each Syrah and Cinsault. The accent is on fruit, blending perfect mechanics (the balance, tension and texture) with taut raspberry, peppery pomegranate and brambly marionberry fruit.

properties.title: Weixelbaum 2012 Ried Wechselberg Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.description: Although the wine is tightly wound, it's ready to spring into full-fruited apricot action. Mineral tautness runs through this rich, concentrated and seriously-minded white. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Hermann Moser 2012 Der Löss Reserve Gelbling Grüner Veltliner (Kremstal)
properties.address: Bahnstraße 36, 3495 Rohrendorf bei Krems, Austria
properties.description: Barely there but intriguing notes of pears draw you in first. The soft body promises refreshment and rounded pleasure, with just enough phenolic texture and a hint of salty minerality.

properties.title: Summerer 2007 Grüne Lady Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.description: Fresh, light, and deliciously refreshing, this summertime Grüner Veltliner is full of light, playful acidity and green currant fruits. It's crisp, easy to drink. Glass stopper.

properties.title: Matanzas Creek 2006 Chardonnay (Sonoma Valley)
properties.description: Ripe, soft and creamy smooth, this Chard has polished flavors of pineapple jam, vanilla, pears, apple butter, honey and cinnamon.

properties.title: Ghost Pines 2006 Chardonnay (Sonoma-Napa-Monterey)
properties.address: 254 Saint Helena Hwy S, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: The wine, a three-county blend, shows some creamy, oaky notes and good varietal flavors of pineapples, apples and pears.

properties.title: Wente 2006 Morning Fog Chardonnay (Livermore Valley)
properties.description: Entirely barrel-fermented in older barrels, this wine nevertheless shows plenty of buttered toast aromas to go with its tropical fruit. It's broad in the mouth, medium-bodied and turns citrusy on the finish.

properties.title: Bennett Family 2006 The Reserve Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: Showing true cool-climate character, this Chard brims with tropical fruit, pear, honeysuckle and smoky oaky-vanilla flavors, with a gentle scour of acids. Pretty good price for a wine this rich.

properties.title: Cà Vittoria 2007 Millesimato Dry  (Prosecco di Conegliano e Valdobbiadene)
properties.description: This is a sweet, floral bubbly with mature notes of pear and peach and chewy sweetness. It has a soft, creamy texture and would pair well with salty and sweet foods alike.

properties.title: Haggipavlu 2006 Moschofilero (Mantinia)
properties.address: 19501 144th Ave NE C400, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: Round, pretty floral aromas lead into fresh, clean and spicy flavors on the palate. A hint of opulent sweetness is cut by spice and dryness. An appealing everyday wine at a go-to price.

properties.title: Dougos 2006 Roditis - Assyrtiko White (Thessalikos)
properties.description: This flirty white is a perfect beach or patio wine, with its clean floral aromas and flavors and pronounced acidity. Balanced body and a pretty finish give it extra elegance.

properties.title: The Seven Brothers 2001 Sauvignon Blanc (Clear Lake)
properties.description: Melon, citrus and herb notes are well balanced in this pleasing, refreshing, light wine. Bright and fresh to the end, it's perfect for summer quaffing.

properties.title: Vie di Romans 2001 Dessimis Pinot Grigio (Friuli Isonzo)
properties.address: Loc. Vie di Romans, 1, 34070 Mariano del Friuli GO, Italy
properties.description: The name of the wine is an old word used to measure fields, and reflects the Gallo (no connection with the California winery) family's use of traditional ideas and techniques at Vie de Romans. This wine has full, ripe fruit, soft and with layers of attractive wood and vanilla flavors.

properties.title: Villa Russiz 2001 Sauvignon de la Tour Sauvignon Blanc (Collio)
properties.description: If you enjoy a really pungent, intensely grassy Sauvignon, then you'll love this wine, but for many consumers it will be too much. The descriptor “cat pee” may sound unkind, but it's apropos in this case, balanced by passion fruit and a long, lemony finish.

properties.title: Villa Russiz 2001 Tocai (Collio)
properties.address: Via Russiz, 4, 34070 Capriva del Friuli GO, Italy
properties.description: Slightly musky apple and pear aromas segue into purer flavors suggestive of apples, grapefruits and minerals. Grapefruit pith makes a brief appearance on the long finish.

properties.title: Montes 2000 Alpha Cabernet Sauvignon (Curicó Valley)
properties.description: Big and ripe, with cola, root beer and berry aromas along with rich oak. The palate is a high-wire act of bright red fruit combined with thick milk chocolate and malt. The tannins and acidity allow the wine to be aggressive, maybe too much so given that the fruit is somewhat tart and prickly.

properties.title: Castellarin 2001 Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)
properties.description: A slight spritz brightens the mouthfeel of this lemony wine. Aromas are a bit musky, but flavors of peach and lemon are correct, and the finish is harmoniously tart; mouth-watering and with a hint of almond. Best Buy.

properties.title: Bertani 2002  Soave Classico Superiore
properties.description: A soft, almond-flavored wine that has fresh, green and ripe fruit. The blend, with small amounts of Chardonnay and Trebbiano, gives a feeling of fullness and roundness and is already ready for drinking.

properties.title: Masi 2002 Classico  (Soave)
properties.description: An easy, full-flavored wine, with crisp, clean fruit, flavors of almonds and a touch of soft,ripeness.

properties.title: Morandé 2002 Vitisterra Grand Reserve Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
properties.description: Fairly forward, with aromas of lemon curd and the insides of many oak barrels. In the mouth are the full allotment of pear, apple and lemon flavors, while the finish sits down and dries out rather nicely. Tasty and refreshing, with just enough heft.

properties.title: Murphy-Goode 2001 Fumé Blanc (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 241 Healdsburg Ave, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: A perky little white wine, dry as dust, with lemon and lime flavors that are boosted by bright acidity. Spreads over the palate with a tart pepperiness, an ideal food wine. It's also a good value.

properties.title: San Pedro 2001 Castillo de Molina Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Lontué Valley)
properties.address: Av Vitacura 2670, Las Condes, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: A bit of complexity dances across the bouquet: there's rubber, wood, anisette and mute red fruit; there's also some minty green aromas, too. The palate is properly round and buttery, with ample red-fruit flavors, while the finish is smooth and mostly satisfying. This is a basic Cabernet, but a good one.

properties.title: Elena Walch 2002 Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Andreas Hofer Str., 1, 39040 Tramin an der Weinstraße., Autonome Provinz Bozen - Südtirol, Italy
properties.description: Ripe, fresh and crisp, this wine has layers of apples and cream, a sense of structure and full-bodied, lively fruit. This is a great apéritif wine.

properties.title: Concha y Toro 2001 Xplorador Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: Av. Virginia Subercaseaux 210, Pirque, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: Everything about this mass-market Chard works. The nose has some pleasant nectarine and apricot aromas, while the mouth is racy and lively, and loaded with mango, pear and honeydew flavors. The finish is fruity, if a tad sweet. Nevertheless it's fresh and clean, and it leaves a good lasting impression. Anyone who likes a sweeter-styled white will fancy this. Best Buy.

properties.title: Elena Walch 2002 Castel Ringberg Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)
properties.description: A light, crisp style that hints at spice but shows delicious fresh fruit. The acidity shows through, giving a vibrant character to the fruit.

properties.title: Merk 2001 Pinot Bianco (Friuli Aquileia)
properties.description: This is an oversized Pinot Bianco, fat and fleshy, oozing with peaches, pears and dried spices. Yet there's a tingle of acidity holding it together, preventing the wine from busting out of its seams.

properties.title: La Palma 2002 Estate Bottled Sauvignon Blanc (Cachapoal Valley)
properties.address: 4029 Hagen Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Simple, open and ready to drink. The nose is floral, with hints of fresh pear. The flavor profile turns to citrus in the form of orange and pineapple, and then comes a full-force but fairly collected finish.   Best Buy.

properties.title: Albino Armani 2001 Pinot Grigio (Veneto)
properties.address: Località Camporal, 37020 Marano di Valpolicella VR, Italy
properties.description: Herbal and citrusy, this is a cleanly made Pinot Grigio that offers a modicum of complexity. Pear and citrus flavors mingle with notes of bitter herbs. Finishes with a hint of bitter grapefruit pith but also lingering apple notes.

properties.title: Quinta da Aveleda 2001 Trajadura (Vinho Verde)
properties.description: A whiff of peach or apricot gives this Vinho Verde a little extra interest beyond its green apple and citrus flavors. Crisp and refreshing, with a tart, chalky finish.

properties.title: Esperto 2001 Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)
properties.description: A rather hard, minerally wine, without the approachability of so many Pinot Grigios, but showing a more stony and focused side to this grape's personality. The flavors are clean and crisp; lime and barely ripe nectarines provide tartness and vivacity.

properties.title: Tiefenbrunner 2002 Kirchleiten Sauvignon Blanc (Alto Adige)
properties.description: This wine from the Tiefenbrunner estate at Castel Turmhof is a lively, crisp, fresh style of wine, with flavors of green peppers and mint, and good acidity.

properties.title: Volpe Pasini 2002 Zuc de Volpe Ribolla Gialla (Colli Orientali del Friuli)
properties.address: Via Cividale, 16, 33040 Torreano UD, Italy
properties.description: The rare local Friulan grape Ribolla Gialla is planted only in 240 acres in the whole region. This typical example is soft, with a clean, light acidity, white currant flavors and a racy, crisp aftertaste.

properties.title: La Vis 2000 Maso Roncador Müller-Thurgau (Trentino)
properties.address: Via del Carmine, 7, 38015 Lavis TN, Italy
properties.description: Smells of honey and lychee fruit, but without the bold exuberance of Gewürztraminer. Pear flavors the midpalate, then turns citrusy on the finish.

properties.title: Imagery 2000 Artist Collection White Burgundy White (California)
properties.address: 14335 Sonoma Hwy, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.description: Explosively fruity, with big, bold flavors of peaches, pears, apples, tropical fruits, you name it. Drinks firmly dry, although oak brings a wood-sap sweetness. Lees aging was significant and adds a sour cream note. A blend of Chardonnay and Pinot Blanc.

properties.title: Calama 2002 Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: Sitio 5-B, Sector D, Calama, Antofagasta, Chile
properties.description: A mild aromatic note of corn goes alongside basic pineapple, pear and green apple on the nose. The flavors of melon, apple and pear are standard and delivered in conformed, pedestrian style. And the finish has some girth and substance. Very ordinary but successful in achieving its assumed mass-appeal goals. –M.S.

properties.title: Wagner 2008 Semi Dry Gewürztraminer (Finger Lakes)
properties.description: On the nose, this is a bit unique, offering unusual scents of pineapple, baked apple and white florals. Just slightly off-dry with loads of sweet, fresh apple flavors and a brisk, lemony acidity, the finish ends on an elegant jasmine tea note.

properties.title: Las Valles 2009 Macabeo-Chardonnay (Cariñena)
properties.description: Tropical on the nose, with lychee fruit and tangerine aromas. The palate is easygoing and fairly thorough, while the flavor profile suggest Argentine Torrontés as it deals lychee, powdered sugar and papaya. Clean, light, quaffable and that's about it.

properties.title: oops 2009 Sauvignon Blanc (Central Valley)
properties.description: This wine varies in quality and perception based on when in its lifespan you taste it. Now, toward the end of the line, it's tropical and hanging in there, with green apple, citrus and other typical SB aromas and flavors. Even with 15% Carmenère in the blend for kicks, it's standard and workmanlike.

properties.title: Oxford Landing 2008 GSM Grenache-Shiraz-Mourvèdre Red (South Australia)
properties.description: This blend of 45% Grenache, 28% Shiraz and 27% Mourvèdre does show a trace of heat in its finish, but is otherwise a pleasant, medium-bodied sipper at a realistic price. Tart, slightly minty cherries feature undercurrents of chocolate and coffee, turning crisp and lemony on the finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Tarara 2008 Charval White Table Wine White (Virginia)
properties.description: Apples and pears dominate the nose and palate of this blend of Chardonnay, Sauvignon Blanc and Pinot Gris. Full bodied and fermented in stainless steel, this slightly off-dry wine is rich in texture, but stays fresh with a vibrant lemon-lime acidity.

properties.title: Barrel Oak 2008 Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (Virginia)
properties.description: Hints of freshly pressed apples and pears in a darkly toasted oak barrel come through. Deft use of new French oak results in a full-bodied wine with a lush, buttered toast richness that highlights sweet apple and lemon flavors. The finish is clean and lemony with a slight saline touch.

properties.title: Concha y Toro 2009 Xplorador Chardonnay (Central Valley)
properties.address: Av. Virginia Subercaseaux 210, Pirque, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: Quiet on the bouquet except for a dusting of oak and banana. The palate is heavy and wide, if a bit flabby, and the flavors of melon and mango run sweet, much like fruit punch. Soft and sweet on the finish as well, and overall it's good but generic. Not many Chards in the price range will fare better.

properties.title: Fox Run 2008 Gewürztraminer (Finger Lakes)
properties.description: Heady white florals and tropical fruit perfume this charming Gewürztraminer. Full bodied and luscious with lots of fresh, white grapefruit juice and a mild, limeade acidity, the midpalate might feel a bit sluggish, but a pleasant grapefruit pith and white tea astringency kicks in on the finish.

properties.title: Wagner 2008 Dry Gewürztraminer (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 9322 St Rt 414 Winery, Lodi, NY 14860, USA
properties.description: Although subdued both aromatically and on the palate, this refreshing, dry Gewürztraminer smells sweetly of waxy white florals and lemons with a hint of bruised apples. There's not a lot of concentration of flavor, but its fresh apple and lemon flavors are clean and brisk, ending with a pleasant grapefruit pith finish.

properties.title: William Cole 2010 Albamar Sauvignon Blanc (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.description: Sweaty and sharp on the nose, with punchy, oily, green aromas. The palate is wet and basic in feel, with nettle, grapefruit and passionfruit flavors. Good in terms of core qualities but not all that intense or layered. A basic wine for general consumption.

properties.title: Wolf Blass 2009 Yellow Label Chardonnay (South Australia)
properties.description: Known more for its red wines, Wolf Blass nevertheless makes a creditable Chardonnay for $12. hints of vanilla and toasted almond mark the nose, while the fruit flavors veer toward citrus and stay there, turning lemony on the finish.

properties.title: Peter Lehmann 2009 Chardonnay (Barossa)
properties.description: Lean and crisp in style, this is citrusy through and through. Although a bit one-dimensional, it's clean and refreshing, with a pleasantly affordable price tag.

properties.title: Paul Dolan 2011 Sauvignon Blanc (Potter Valley)
properties.description: This is a crisp, medium-bodied wine, with pleasant aromas of apricot, lemon and pineapple. A smidgen of almond nuttiness marks the finish.

properties.title: Planeta 2011 Alastro Grecanico (Sicilia)
properties.description: Alastro is a floral expression of Grecanico that offers bright tones of honey, jasmine, rose and almond blossom. This wine would make for a great predinner drink by the glass.

properties.title: Pratsch 2011 Sämling 88 Leicht & Fruchtig Scheurebe (Niederösterreich)
properties.description: Sämling and Scheurebe are two names for the same grape, a cross between Riesling and Sylvaner. With rich apricot fruit, this has a Viognier quality, but with crisper acidity. It is pure, fruity and fragrant, with just a touch of mineral-like texture on the finish.

properties.title: Principi di Spadafora 2011 Don Pietro White (Sicilia)
properties.description: This blend of Catarratto, Grillo and Inzolia shows Sicilian personality, with bright lemon, almond and sea breeze aromas. The palate's freshness and lightness would pair well with grilled fish or shrimp.

properties.title: Santa Helena 2011 Selección del Directorio Gran Reserva Cool Coastal Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: 100 Pratt Ave, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: This crisp, acidic Sauvignon Blanc leans green with pea and canned bean aromas, but it offers enough green apple and citrus character for enjoyment. The palate is zesty and lemony, with flavors that include green veggies, herbs, limes and tangerines. The finish is mildly green and citrusy.

properties.title: Schug 2011 Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.description: While this Chardonnay was aged in only 17% new French oak barrels, the oak really dominates, bearing aromas and flavors of buttered toast and butterscotch. Underneath that veneer is a tart wine with fine flavors of pineapples, oranges and pears, plus beautiful acidity and a clean, minerally finish.

properties.title: Baglio del Cristo di Campobello 2011 C'D'C' White (Sicilia)
properties.description: Chardonnay, Grillo, Insolia and Catarratto are blended in equal measure to provide a fresh yet complex wine. It bears a drying mineral tone, backed by notes of citrus, sweet peach and pear. A soft touch of fruity sweetness gives it roundness and depth.

properties.title: Cameron Hughes 2010 Lot 350 Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.description: Made in a ripe, appealing style, this has rich flavors of pineapple jam, tropical fruit, vanilla and buttered toast, brightened by crisp acidity.

properties.title: Capolino Perlingieri 2011 Vento Greco (Sannio)
properties.description: Loads of honey and yellow rose aromas open the bouquet. There's a touch of sweetness that recalls candied fruit and honeydew.

properties.title: Chehalem 2011 Ridgecrest Vineyards Sext Riesling (Ribbon Ridge)
properties.description: At 6% residual sugar and just 7% alcohol, you might expect this to be dessert-like. But the delicate spritz and grapefruit-like acidity keeps it in the apéritif range, with Moscato-like orange-candy flavors and a juicy, fruity mouthfeel.

properties.title: Chehalem 2011 Ridgecrest Vineyards Wind Ridge Block Riesling (Ribbon Ridge)
properties.description: Tart and tightly focused, this single-block expression is pure green-apple fruit and acid.

properties.title: Concha y Toro 2011 Gran Reserva Serie Riberas Ribera del Rapel Chardonnay (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Av. Virginia Subercaseaux 210, Pirque, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: This is waxy smelling, with a coastal vegetal note that conveys cool-climate grapes. The palate is short and clipped in feel, with a waxy, mealy note to the wine's core melon and peach flavors. It's chunky on the finish and is a touch mealy in taste.

properties.title: Domäne Wachau 2011 Terrassen Federspiel Grüner Veltliner (Wachau)
properties.address: Dürnstein 107, 3601 Dürnstein, Austria
properties.description: The lightest of Wachau wine styles, this has a lilting, waltz-like feel. This is ready to drink, with a crisp apple flavor and a pepper touch.

properties.title: Arnaldo Caprai 2011 Grecante Grechetto (Colli Martani)
properties.description: What a wonderful wine to pair with spaghetti alle vongole or calamari fritti. Made from Grechetto grapes and aged only in stainless steel, this is fresh, youthful, tangy and crisp, with aromas of citrus, kiwi, honeydew and peach.

properties.title: Fattoria Lavacchio 2010 Pachàr White (Toscana)
properties.description: Pachàr is a blend of organically farmed Chardonnay, Viognier and Sauvignon that offers bright aromas of citrus, peach, pineapple and blanched almond. Pair this pretty wine with rice-stuffed zucchini or tomatoes.

properties.title: Monteverro 2011 Il Nostro Vermentino (Toscana)
properties.description: Very crisp, clean and polished, this is an easy white wine to enjoy with friends and grilled fish. It's redolent of cut grass, citrus, peach and white almond.

properties.title: Pascual Toso 2009 Alta Reserve Barrancas Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: RP14 81, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: This smells familiar and solid, with blackberry, licorice and dark cherry aromas. It feels medium bodied for a high-end Argentine Cabernet, with healthy acidity and probing tannins. The flavors of blackberry and raspberry finish crisp and slightly citric.

properties.title: André Brunel 2009 Red (Châteauneuf-du-Pape)
properties.address: 6 Chem. du Bois de la ville, 84230 Châteauneuf-du-Pape, France
properties.description: Despite some tough tannins on the finish, this is an intriguingly complex wine that may prove even better than this rating suggests. It starts with a garrigue note and a hint of tapenade, then adds bright cherry fruit and plenty of dusty tannins. Drink 2014–2020.

properties.title: Vinum 2012 Chenin Blanc-Viognier (Clarksburg)
properties.description: Crisp and refreshing, this blend of 85% Chenin Blanc and 15% Viognier is high in acidity with a creamy midpalate. Guava is most notable flavor, followed by kiwi and honey. Oysters would be a good call.

properties.title: Eleven 2012 Elephant Mountain Vineyard Roussanne (Yakima Valley)
properties.description: Whole-cluster pressed, with 20% Marsanne in the blend, this displays fresh fruit flavors of apple and pear, with a bit of somewhat dilute green banana. There's a slightly waxy aspect to the mouthfeel; overall this is a simple, pleasant, clean but generic white wine.

properties.title: Hannah Nicole Vineyards 2012 Sauvignon Blanc (Contra Costa County)
properties.description: With a touch of apricot fuzz and fresh-cut grass, the wine is high in acidity and clean, bright and layered.

properties.title: One Woman 2010 Estate Reserve Chardonnay (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.description: Crème caramel and spice aromas are exotically appealing on this bright, full-bodied Chardonnay. Dry in style with zesty acidity and fresh apple flavor, the palate is a bit more subtle than the nose, but makes this a straightforward drinker.

properties.title: Black Stallion 2012 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.description: The winery has a track record for producing Chardonnays that are very appealing, though not particularly complex. This wine is rich in tropical fruits, pears and peaches, with buttered toast and vanilla notes, wrapped into a buttery, creamy texture.

properties.title: Mercer Canyons 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: This serviceable red blend includes smaller amounts of Merlot and Syrah, with tart red fruits and drying tannins. It dries out the mouth with a chalky sensation, suggesting it would be best enjoyed with red meat.

properties.title: Michael Pozzan 2012 Annabella Special Selection Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1205 Randolph St, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.description: New oak dominates this Chardonnay, giving it strong flavors of buttered toast and butterscotch. The acidity is pronounced, and there are ripe mango and pear flavors, but it remains a simple wine.

properties.title: Pacific Rim 2012 Wallula Vineyard Biodynamic Riesling (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.description: Starting off quite reductive, it opens to reveal notes of lime leaf, mineral and freshly peeled tangerine. The palate drinks dry but doesn't have the acid to entirely stand it up.

properties.title: Patterson 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: A scent and flavor of vitamin pill pervades this attenuated wine. The fruit hovers around flavors of rhubarb and pomegranate, and the overall impression is that the wine needs more time to pull itself together.

properties.title: Sculpterra 2012 Estate Viognier (Paso Robles)
properties.description: Spicy, slightly sweet foods will pair well with this easy-drinking Viognier. Its flavors range from mangoes and oranges to honey, vanilla bean and cinnamon. Chinese and Thai fare will be ideal.

properties.title: Silver Thread 2012 Doyle East Seneca Vineyard Riesling (Seneca Lake)
properties.description: Whiffs of smoke and dust add a savory tone to delicate flavors of apple and honeydew rind on this dry, zesty wine. It's medium bodied on the palate with refreshing lemon-lime acidity.

properties.title: Summerwood 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.description: This Cab, ripe as it is in cherries, black currants and dark chocolate, nonetheless is too soft in structure. It has a melted mouthfeel. The finish suggests caramelized wood. Drink up.

properties.title: Testarossa 2012 Dahlia Dijon Clones Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.description: Ripe, jammy orange, lime, apricot and mango fruit flavors join with buttered toast and vanilla flavors to make for an opulent, yet simple, Chardonnay. Brisk acidity provides balance.

properties.title: Mercer Canyons 2012 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 46 Sonova Rd, Prosser, WA 99350, USA
properties.description: This was 40% barrel-fermented, and carries a whiff of oak in the aroma. Apple scents and flavors follow. It's fresh, forward and fruity, with simple, straightforward flavors.

properties.title: Raimat 2012 Castell de Raimat Albariño (Costers del Segre)
properties.description: Melon and white-fruit aromas are more generic than specific. This has a lively, fresh mouthfeel, along with flavors of nectarine, melon and persimmon. A lasting finish has a racy feel but offers nothing more in terms of flavors or complexity.

properties.title: Mi Sueño 2008 Chardonnay (Los Carneros)
properties.description: Flamboyantly rich and manipulated Chardonnay, with buttered popcorn, tropical fruit and caramaelized toast flavors. Feels a little heavy-handed, but lots of Chard lovers will like it.

properties.title: Clean Slate 2009 Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: Plump, sweet and creamy in texture, with apple and citrus flavors that offer simple, straightforward pleasure. Good quality, impressive for the 50,000 cases produced.

properties.title: Lionel Osmin & Cie 2009 Villa Beaurivage White (Vin de France)
properties.address: 9 Rue Ada Byron, 64000 Pau, France
properties.description: A blend of typical Gascon grapes gives a lemon and citrus wine, very fresh, tangy. There is plenty of acidity and an attractive lightness. Screwcap.

properties.title: Somerston 2009 Highflyer Grenache Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 3450 Sage Canyon Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: A good, everyday sipper, soft and gentle, with appealing flavors of pineapples, oranges, pears, cream and buttered toast. Could show greater structure and acidity.

properties.title: Bargetto 2008 Gewürztraminer (Monterey County)
properties.address: 3535 N Main St, Soquel, CA 95073, USA
properties.description: A clean everyday Gewürztraminer, showing the variety's spicy flavors, with hints of pineapples and candied ginger. Tastes off-dry and crisp in acidity.

properties.title: Bota Box 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
properties.description: If more Americans are drinking wine from a box, it's because of values like this 3L, the equivalent of four regular bottles. The wine is dry, smooth and flavorful, and the blackberries, herbs and spices are pleasant.

properties.title: flipflop 2010 Moscato (California)
properties.description: This is a dessert wine because it's frankly sweet in honey, sugared pineapple tart and lemon pie filling flavors. With crisp acidity, it's a nice sipper, clean and delicious. It's the best sweet Moscato at this price in California.

properties.title: Domaine des Baumard 2006 La Calèche Chenin Blanc-Chardonnay (Vin de Pays du Jardin de la France)
properties.address: 8 Rue de l'Abbaye, 49190 Rochefort-sur-Loire, France
properties.description: With its few years' aging, the wine exhibits a Chenin Blanc nutty quality backed by the greater weight of Chardonnay. Full-bodied, ready to drink. Screwcap.

properties.title: Ken Forrester 2009 Chenin Blanc (Stellenbosch)
properties.description: Soft red apple, hard peach, green fig and underripe banana peel all marry with an underlying yellow floral note. Light and easy in the mouth with a short but clean finish.

properties.title: Bush Bike 2005 Unoaked Chardonnay (Western Australia)
properties.description: Smells and tastes slightly sour, with simple flavors of pineapple and citrus that finish with a tart edge.

properties.title: Casa Nuestra 2007 Home Vineyard Dry Rosado Rosé (Napa Valley)
properties.description: St. Helena is the source of this blend of Merlot and Cabernet Franc. Entirely unoaked, it's a dry, crisp, rustic wine, and full-bodied for a rosé, with heavy flavors of cherry pie filling.

properties.title: Red Earth 2007 Chardonnay (Adelaide Plains)
properties.description: Despite plenty of weight in the mouth, this wine's simple apple and lime flavors are surprisingly crisp, turning nearly sour-lemony on the finish. Imported by Walca International.

properties.title: Valsanzo 2005 Viña Sanzo Verdejo (Rueda)
properties.address: C. Manuel Azaña, 9, 47014 Valladolid, Spain
properties.description: Yellow in color, with floral, citrusy aromas. Not a whole lot of definition to the palate; it's wet but dilute, with unrefined, nonproprietary citrus flavors.

properties.title: Tamayo Family 2006 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 11670 Byron Hwy, Brentwood, CA 94513, USA
properties.description: Has some Viognier and Sémillon for added richness, but there's still a pretty powerful blast of raw, green gooseberry that's less than ripe. There are also tiers of figs, melons and vanilla.

properties.title: Donati 2006 Pinot Grigio (Paicines)
properties.description: They left a lot of sweetness in this steel-fermented Pinot Grigio, so if you like that sugary edge, this one's for you. The flavors are of vibrantly ripe tangerines, pineapples and fresh green apples.

properties.title: Señorío de Sarria 2004 Viñedo No. 9 Cabernet Sauvignon (Navarra)
properties.description: Hard and mossy, and not bearing much resemblance to Cabernet as we know it. This wine has thickness and a creamy definition, but also lean fruit flavors that hint at raspberry and cranberry.

properties.title: Finca Antigua 2006 Blanco Viura (La Mancha)
properties.description: Zingy and sort of floral on the nose, but fairly pickled, less than pure fruit mars the flavor profile. White wine from La Mancha has never been a Spanish strong suit, and while this wine isn't cloying, sharp or dead on arrival, it doesn't add up to much.

properties.title: Hayman & Hill 2005 Reserve Selection Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 29100 Northwestern Hwy #410, Southfield, MI 48034, USA
properties.description: A little rough around the edges, with some green tannins and minty, herbal flavors. You get some candied cherries and currants, but the wine is pretty rustic.

properties.title: Keenan 2006 Chardonnay (Spring Mountain District)
properties.description: From the fine Spring Mountain appellation, this has sweet-and-sour flavors of apricots, pineapples and brown sugar.
