properties.title: Conn Creek 2004 Conn Creek Estate Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
properties.description: A brittle, peppery and ultimately disappointing wine, this 100% varietal lacks the smoothness and cherry-herb complexities you expect from a fine Rutherford Cab. Finishes sharp and dry.

properties.title: Gundlach Bundschu 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
properties.description: Soft and earthy, with dried herb and blackberry flavors tinged with smoky oak, this is a gentle Cabernet for drinking now. It has enough fanciness to partner with a nice steak or an upscale beef taco.

properties.title: Orion Wine 2010 Rocca del Dragone Falanghina (Campania)
properties.description: This fragrant Falanghina shows bright aromas of white flower, jasmine and honeysuckle. Very subtle tones of banana and pineapple fill in the back and give the wine momentum and depth on the finish.

properties.title: Spann Vineyards 2010 Betsy's Backacher White (California)
properties.description: On its own, this is dry and earthy, with a taste of Middle Eastern hummus, apricots and oranges. It's certainly offbeat, but it can certainly be paired with food. How about hummus with teriyaki salmon?

properties.title: Hyland 2011 Riesling (McMinnville)
properties.description: There seems to be a bit of residual sugar in this wine, just enough to offset the searing acidity. Some nice flower notes highlight the aromas, with flavors of tart peach and citrus filling in the rest.

properties.title: Iron Horse 2008 Wedding Cuvée Sparkling (Green Valley)
properties.description: Mainly Pinot Noir, with just 15% Chardonnay, this full-bodied bubbly has notes of seemingly sweet raspberries. The mouthfeel is slightly coarse. Still, it shows plenty of elegance, and if you're toasting the wedding couple, it's just fine.

properties.title: Acrobat 2011 Pinot Gris (Oregon)
properties.description: This runs to the tart, lemony style of Pinot Gris, common in cool vintages. Citrus and gooseberry flavors are balanced against refreshing minerality, and the acidity is neither harsh nor simply sour.

properties.title: Apaltagua 2010 Signature Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Millahue de s/n - Apalta, Santa Cruz, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: This wine's crusty, minerally aromas of black fruit are lightly toasted and earthy. On the palate, it feels tannic and high in acidity, with roasted, earthy flavors of plum and raspberry. Concentrated and grabby on the finish, it has a touch of lemony oak and astringency.

properties.title: Beni di Batasiolo 2011 Bosc Dla Rei  (Moscato d'Asti)
properties.address: Via Annunziata, 87, 12064 La Morra CN, Italy
properties.description: This is a popular and reliable wine to pair with desserts or to drink alone. It offers foamy mousse with peach and honey on the finish.

properties.title: Vistamar 2010 Sepia Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Rosario Nte 615, Las Condes, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: The bouquet is dense, smoky and rubbery, with powerful meat and berry notes. It shows vitality as well as mild choppiness on the palate, with tobacco, lemon, balsamic vinegar and black fruit flavors. Mildly herbal, it is somewhat creamy and good overall on the finish.

properties.title: Mount Eden Vineyards 2010 Wolff Vineyard Chardonnay (Edna Valley)
properties.address: 22020 Mt Eden Rd, Saratoga, CA 95070, USA
properties.description: A well-balanced Chardonnay, this has flavors of tropical fruit, apricot and lemon candy, brightened by that famous Edna Valley acidity. This would make for a great apéritif.

properties.title: Piggy Bank 2011 Sauvignon Blanc (Elqui Valley)
properties.address: 1325 De Baca Rd SE, Deming, NM 88030, USA
properties.description: This opens with an oily note that's soon replaced by generic white peach and apple scents. It feels plump, with chunky flavors of citrus, kiwi and lime, and it's mild yet fairly long on the tail end.

properties.title: Quinta das Bandeiras 2011 Passagem Branco White (Douro)
properties.address: R. Portela 34, 3430-364 Oliveira do Conde, Portugal
properties.description: Full and fat, this has an oily, ripe fruit texture—a sign of its warmth and richness. It's a food style of wine, with apricot and pear flavors that are round and generous. Drink now.

properties.title: Ravines 2013 Dry Pinot Rosé (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 400 Barracks Rd, Geneva, NY 14456, USA
properties.description: Fresh raspberry and cherry aromas are bright and fresh on this dry, dusty-pink rosé. It's crisp with acidity and juicy with tart, red-fruit flavor, but there's an earthy, savory tone that lingers throughout.

properties.title: Sebastiani 2012 Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 389 4th St E, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.description: There's lemon curd and apple in this straightforward, light Chardonnay. Cradled in oak and vanilla, it is mid-weight in both texture and body, and a good value for the price.

properties.title: Standing Stone 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 9934 NY-414, Hector, NY 14841, USA
properties.description: The tawny rim of this ruby-red Cabernet Sauvignon hints towards signs of early evolution. It's maturity is more evident on the palate with somewhat demure flavors of dark cherry, cedar and herb accented by touches of autumn leaf, soil and mushroom. Drink up now.

properties.title: Waterstone 2012 Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.address: 55-1B, Enterprise Ct, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Concentrated in pleasing pear and stone fruit, the toasty oak and oily richness of this wine detracts from the fruit. It comes into its own with some air, the texture showing more acidity and balance.

properties.title: Louis Latour 2012 En Paradis  (Pouilly-Vinzelles)
properties.address: 18 Rue des Tonneliers, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: Very soft and dull, it offers white fruits and some acidity. Drink now.

properties.title: Luna Beberide 2013 Godello (Bierzo)
properties.address: LE-713, 24540 Cacabelos, León, Spain
properties.description: Floral, dusty aromas are encouraging, but this is overly citric and aggressive on the palate. Lemon, underripe stone fruit and minerally flavors turn tart and pithy on the finish.

properties.title: Sebastiani 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 389 4th St E, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.description: Aged in stainless steel, this faint SB is herb-y and slightly grassy. Sweetness on the midpalate sticks around before the quick finish.

properties.title: Serra da Estrela 2012 Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.description: Wheaty, flat aromas are indicators that this is losing its luster. The palate is chunky, with melon, mango and canned peach flavors. Best to wait for a newer vintage.

properties.title: Heron Hill 2012 Reserve Gewürztraminer (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 9301 Co Rd 76, Hammondsport, NY 14840, USA
properties.description: Pollen and dusty mineral tones lend earthiness to melon and lychee aromas on this off-dry Gewürztraminer. Medium bodied in style, it balances tart tangerine acidity with a round, rich mouthfeel.

properties.title: Bridlewood 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3010 Roblar Ave, Santa Ynez, CA 93460, USA
properties.description: Dusty aromas comprise the dull nose on this bottling. Once sipped, there isn't a lot of distinct flavor, save for some blackberry notes. It will work for a backyard barbecue of ribs and saucy chicken.

properties.title: Four Degrees of Riesling 2012 1st Degree Medium Dry Riesling (Seneca Lake)
properties.address: 846 NY-14, Penn Yan, NY 14527, USA
properties.description: This off-dry Riesling boasts pretty fresh apple and floral notes on the palate, but persisting notes of dried herbs and spring ramps distract. Sprightly on the palate with delicate lemon acidity.

properties.title: Shalestone 2013 Beyond Rosé (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 9681 NY-414, Lodi, NY 14860, USA
properties.description: Ruby in color yet delicate in extract, this blend of Zweigelt and Lemberger is a concession between a red and rosé wine. On the palate, bright red-berry flavors are layered in unusual tones of caramel and spice. The label suggests it can be served both chilled and at room temperature.

properties.title: Twin Arches 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
properties.address: 6635 Cavitt Stallman Rd, Granite Bay, CA 95746, USA
properties.description: An easy-drinking, weekday type of red wine that is smooth and light in texture and body, and modestly flavored with notes of plum and dried herbs.

properties.title: Manuel Seguin 2012  Viré-Clessé
properties.address: 2 Rue de l'Arquebuse, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: The wine is candied and sherbet-flavored. Acidity gives some freshness, but it feels artificial and light.

properties.title: Silver Spoon 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
properties.address: 25378 US-80, Grand Saline, TX 75140, USA
properties.description: A soft, simple style of Cabernet with mild cherry and strawberry flavors, light tannins, smooth texture and light- to medium-body. The flavors fade quickly on the finish.

properties.title: Stony Lonesome 2012 Estate Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 8111 E 450 N, Columbus, IN 47203, USA
properties.description: Dusty mineral tones and pressed apple aromas lend a savoriness to this dry, full-bodied Grüner Veltliner. The palate boasts a fresher fruit profile, with bright apple and lemon flavors that wrap up briskly on the finish.

properties.title: Baron Knyphausen 2015 Roter Riesling (Rheingau)
properties.address: Draiser Hof, Erbacher Str. 26, 65346 Eltville am Rhein, Germany
properties.description: One of the few examples of wine made from roter, or red, Riesling, this slightly salmon-hued bottling showcases the variety's characteristically berried perfume. It's taut with acidity yet satisfyingly full in body, offering generous layers of sour-plum, berry and red-apple flavors. The finish is tinged by a lingering hint of caramel.

properties.title: Reata 2015 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 310 Houston St, Fort Worth, TX 76102, USA
properties.description: This wine delivers a full-figured spectrum of flavor and texture, including apple, pear and honeyed caramel notes. Supportive oak plays nicely in the background as the finish winds down softly.

properties.title: Ribafreixo 2016 Connections Chenin Blanc (Portuguese Table Wine)
properties.address: 7960 Vidigueira, Portugal
properties.description: Well, who thought Chenin Blanc would end up in the Alentejo? Obviously not the guardian of the wine rules, which is why this classified as a mere table wine. However, the grape, perfumed and ripe in this warm climate, still weaves its magic to give a very fine wine with tropical fruit, a touch of honey and fine crisp acidity at the end. Drink this wine from late 2017.

properties.title: Rodney Strong 2013 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 11455 Old Redwood Hwy, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Soft and packed with oak spice, this 100% varietal wine from a selection of sites shows rich blackberry and tobacco flavors. It has power, an approachable structure and a rich, layered, long-lasting finish.

properties.title: Saint K 2016 Luna Matta Vineyard Grenache Blanc (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 6320 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: This bottling offers key lime, golden apple, preserved lemon and honeysuckle touches on the nose, proving quite delicate despite its yellow, oxidative-seeming color in the glass. Buoyant acidity kicks off the palate, which is smooth with candied lemon peel and yellow peach flavors.

properties.title: Selva Capuzza 2016 San Vigilio  (Lugana)
properties.address: Località Selva Capuzza, 25015 Desenzano del Garda BS, Italy
properties.description: Heady aromas of white spring flower, white stone fruit and crushed herb take center stage on this fragrant white. On the succulent palate, notes of white almond and thyme underscore white peach, lemon drop and yellow apple alongside fresh acidity. A savory mineral note suggesting saline graces the lingering finish.

properties.title: SJ Montigny 2015 Kreuznacher Kauzenberg Auslese Riesling (Nahe)
properties.address: In den zehn Morgen 41, 55559 Bretzenheim, Germany
properties.description: Sun-baked earth and smoke tones lend savory complexities throughout this vibrant auslese. The palate is unctuously ripe, full of fleshy, sweet peach and apricot flavors, but it's keenly balanced with racy acidity and those earthy, dusty mineral tones.

properties.title: Skinner 2015 Smithereens White (El Dorado)
properties.address: 8054 Fairplay Rd, Somerset, CA 95684, USA
properties.description: Bosc pear, tart apple and vanilla bean elements make this a fascinating dry wine. Although the aromas are inviting, the first sip tastes austere. But as it opens, the palate and gains more concentration and complexity, proving sophisticated, layered and nuanced.

properties.title: Sleeping Giant 2014 Buena Tierra Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 6206 Canyon View Rd, Summerland, BC V0H 1Z7, Canada
properties.description: With its inviting apple blossom aromas, this wine is fleshy and bright, showing balance and complexity from start to lengthy finish. Lemongrass, nutmeg and wild vanilla flavors tease in the background.

properties.title: Tenuta Roveglia 2016 Wighel  (Lugana)
properties.address: località Roveglia, 1, 25010 Pozzolengo BS, Italy
properties.description: Scents of citrus blossom, honeysuckle and white stone fruit delicately lead the way on this vibrant white. The bright refreshing palate offers Bartlett pear, creamy white peach and a hint of tangerine.

properties.title: Tessier Winery 2016 Catie's Corner Viognier (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 3575 Slusser Rd, Windsor, CA 95492, USA
properties.description: This golden hay-colored wine opens in a complex floral arrangement of honeysuckle and apple blossom before unleashing a weave of apricot and lychee fruit. The acidity is tart and high-toned.

properties.title: Willm 2016 Cuvée Emile Willm Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 12526 SW Bank Rd, Vashon, WA 98070, USA
properties.description: The nose has rich hints of dried lemon peel while the palate shows fresh lemon zest. The flavors on the slender but concentrated body are pure and very fresh. This is just dry and totally focuses on lemon flesh and zest. Wonderfully fresh and enlivening.

properties.title: Y Rousseau 2016 Old Vine Colombard (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: Waxy pear flavors ride a lush texture of supportive acidity in this rare white from dry-farmed vines planted more than four decades ago. Food-friendly and light on its feet, it's the perfect picnic wine, ready for charcuterie and cheese.

properties.title: Adega Mãe 2013 Terroir Branco White (Lisboa)
properties.address: Estrada Municipal 554, 2565-841, Portugal
properties.description: This is a ripe wood-aged wine that has a smooth rich texture. It is rounded with dominant toastiness as well as perfumed fruit. The wine has a cool edge that comes from the influence of the Atlantic while bringing out a ripe apple and apricot character. Drink this wine now.

properties.title: Ancilla 2016 1909  (Lugana)
properties.address: Via Cadellora, 10, 37062 Dossobuono VR, Italy
properties.description: Aromas of beeswax, orchard fruit and a whiff of hazelnut lift out of the glass. Made without added sulfites, the bright round palate delivers mature yellow apple, white peach, lemon zest and a hint of white almond alongside fresh acidity. Its understated character will definitely appeal to lovers of reserved elegant whites.

properties.title: André Kientzler 2015 Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 30 Rue des Romains, 68630 Bennwihr, France
properties.description: Sun ripened mirabelle notes entice the nose and continue on the palate, where they are joined by an earthy edge as well as a pervasive lemon freshness. This is slender and fresh, dry and very energetic. The finish is lip-smacking and moreish.

properties.title: Arrowood 2014 Sonoma Estates Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 14347 CA-12, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.description: From various sites across appellations, this well-made red offers soft, smooth tannins and full-bodied ripeness, the flavors defined by cherry, vanilla, oak and clove. It's ready for steak.

properties.title: Castelvecchio 2015 Sauvignon
properties.address: Via Certaldese, 30, 50026 San Casciano in Val di pesa FI, Italy
properties.description: Grapefruit, crushed tomato vine, exotic fruit and aromatic herb are some of the aromas you'll find on this fragrant white. The elegant medium-bodied palate delivers green melon, citrus and white peach alongside a vibrant saline note that energizes the finish.

properties.title: Château Lestruelle 2016  Bordeaux Blanc
properties.address: 1 Rue de Lamena, 33340 Saint-Yzans-de-Médoc, France
properties.description: Still very young, this is a Maison Bouey wine with good potential. It offers hints of the ripe yellow fruits and richness that will come as it develops. The touch of perfumed spice means it is also a wine to savor as an apéritif.

properties.title: Domaine François Schmitt 2014 Pfingstberg Grand Cru Paradis Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 19 Rue de Soultzmatt, 68500 Orschwihr, France
properties.description: Lemon notes are subdued by earth on the nose but they shine on a rather textured, palate that needs some air to open up. There is concentration at the core and generous freshness that lights up everything. Subtle but totally worthwhile with a clean lemon finish.

properties.title: Domaine Martin 2014 Les Trois Versants Vieilles Vignes Sur Lie  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
properties.address: 6 Rue de la Garnière, 44690 Saint-Fiacre-sur-Maine, France
properties.description: The wine is rich and concentrated for a Muscadet. With intense fruits and acidity, it is deliciously fruity and crisp. There is a tangy texture that gives the wine zest and minerality. The aftertaste is so fresh and zingy.

properties.title: Dr. Hermann 2014 H Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Auf d. Geig 3, 54492 Erden, Germany
properties.description: Swirls of penetrating peach and honey flavors pack a mighty punch in this dazzling, sunny sip. Off dry in style, it's an easy going yet elegant wine accented by saffron, blossoms and reverberating tangerine acidity. Drink now through 2017.

properties.title: Tolosa 2013 1772 Chardonnay (Edna Valley)
properties.address: 4910 Edna Rd, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.description: Salt, chalk and grapefruit-pith aromas make for a judiciously restrained approach on the nose of this wine, which comes from heritage clones. The palate is mineral-driven with white rock flavors as well as green apple and lime-pith notes.

properties.title: Agustí Torelló 2007 Kripta Gran Reserva Brut Nature Sparkling (Cava)
properties.address: La Serra, s/n, 08770, Barcelona, Spain
properties.description: Bread, apple cider and yeasty complexity grace the nose on this Brut Nature. A smooth palate is now mature, ready and doesn't scrape or scour. Dry stone-fruit flavors blend with apple notes in front of a bready, toasty finish that has seltzer-like crispness. Drink through 2020.

properties.title: A to Z 2014 Chardonnay (Oregon)
properties.address: 30835 OR-99W, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.description: A superb value, this drinks way above its price. Buttery apple fruit is bedecked with cinnamon and buttressed with refreshing mineral-drenched acids. A nice hint of toast avoids any suggestion of clumsiness or artificiality.

properties.title: Bright Angel WInes 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: Brezová 20, 937 01 Želiezovce, Slovakia
properties.description: Built around a core of acidity, this wine conveys a preponderance of cedar and sage, seemingly influenced by a softer variety like Merlot, of which it has 12%. Plum and black currant provide the fruit component, before a sizably tannic finish.

properties.title: Mr. Riggs 2013 Generation Series Mrs. Viognier (Adelaide)
properties.address: 169 Douglas Gully Rd, McLaren Flat SA 5171, Australia
properties.description: This is less opulent and full bodied than most Australian Viogniers, but it still delivers an attractive blend of white peaches, citrus and baking spices. It's crisp and bright enough on the finish to handle a wide range of seafood dishes. Drink now.

properties.title: Vasse Felix 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Margaret River)
properties.address: 4357 Caves Rd, Wilyabrup WA 6280, Australia
properties.description: This crisp, medium-bodied wine showcases Cabernet's hallmark cassis fruit. Sure, there are hints of cranberry, raspberry and cherry, but black currant defines this wine, running from start to finish. Dusty tannins swirl gently on the palate, combining with tart acidity to offer just the right amount of structure. Drink now–2025.

properties.title: Jean-Marc Bernhard 2013 Furstentum Grand Cru Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 21 Grand Rue, 68230 Katzenthal, France
properties.description: Faintly spiced, ripe apple and pear notes on the nose are mellowed by gentle, barely-there sweetness on the palate. This is rounded and pliable, but without an ounce of fat. A balanced, gently spiced wine with deep but slender richness that finishes dry.

properties.title: Chateau Grand Traverse 2013 Dry Riesling (Old Mission Peninsula)
properties.address: 12239 Center Rd, Traverse City, MI 49686, USA
properties.description: Established in the early 70s by Ed O'Keefe Jr., this Michigan winery remains in the family to this day and maintains the founding father's focus on producing wines from 100% vinifera grapes in a region where hybrids might be the easier option. Perseverance pays off in this delightfully balanced dry Riesling that seamlessly blends juicy peach, pineapple rind and a vein of talc-dusted citrus. Texturally round and soft, with a peach-fuzz feel, this is a veritable steal for the price.

properties.title: Domaine Charles Frey 2012 Frankstein Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
properties.description: Mellow, rounded and ripe notes of fresh and baked apples promise a rich wine. The palate is more sprightly and lends plenty of gingery, peppery spice to all the abundant apple fruit. This is wired and lively, dry but very fruity and unusually spicy with a fine backbone of bright, lemony freshness. Drink soon.

properties.title: Domaine Gresser 2014 Wiebelsberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 2 Rue de l'École, 67140 Andlau, France
properties.description: Rich perfumes reach the nose: quince and baked apple give a seductive tone. The palate strikes with the same richness but is dry. There is concentration and earthy power against a backdrop of freshness and fruity charm.

properties.title: Domaines Schlumberger 2011 Cuvée Christine Vendanges Tardives Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 100 rue Theodore Deck, Siège social :, 3 Rue des Cr Populaires, 68500 Guebwiller, France
properties.description: With time, fresh rose petals merge into heady Turkish delight notes on the nose. This is full-on Gewurztraminer with all the bells and whistles: utterly decadent rose water and honeysuckle notes are submerged in rich, indulgent sweetness. This is perfumed and full-on: a super-charged varietal expression with rich, powdery layers of rose, honey and caramel.

properties.title: Dr. Hermann 2014 Ürziger Würzgarten Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Auf d. Geig 3, 54492 Erden, Germany
properties.description: Whiffs of spice and slate lend complexity to plump, sunny peach and yellow plum flavors in this off-dry Riesling. It's fruity, approachable and easy, yet elegantly balanced.

properties.title: Dr. Loosen 2014 Dr. L Dry Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: 20501 Tranquility Ln, Oregon City, OR 97045, USA
properties.description: Juicy streaks of grapefruit and pineapple in this spry, dry Riesling are cut by laser-focused acidity and rocky edges of slate. It's approachable and fresh yet abundantly elegant. Drink now through 2018.

properties.title: Edi Keber 2014 White (Collio)
properties.description: A blend of 70% Friulano, 15% Ribolla Gialla and 15% Malvasia, this is perfumed with scents suggesting yellow flower, apple, citrus fruit and hazelnut. The vibrant palate is loaded with verve and finesse, offering peach, Golden Delicious apple, sage, fennel and a hint of candied tangerine zest. A note of bitter almond closes the tangy finish.

properties.title: Palmer 1999 Gewürztraminer (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.address: 5120 Sound Ave, Riverhead, NY 11901, USA
properties.description: Very floral aromatics mark this distinctive effort; it's positively overflowing with rose petals. Turns more musky and spicy in the mouth, before fading away a little abruptly.

properties.title: Martha Clara 1999 Chardonnay (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.address: 6025 Sound Ave, Riverhead, NY 11901, USA
properties.description: Toast aromas accent ripe pears and golden-delicious apples in this soft, easy-to-like Chard that only lacks a bit of depth. A slightly bitter note on the finish should become less noticeable over the next few months.

properties.title: Bedell 1998 Gewürztraminer (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.address: 36225 Main Rd, Cutchogue, NY 11935, USA
properties.description: Boasts slightly oily rose and lychee scents that leave no doubt as to what grape variety you are smelling. This is a big-boned wine with a healthy alcohol level, but one wishes for more persistence on the finish.

properties.title: Corey Creek 1998 Rosé (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.address: 45470 Main Rd, Southold, NY 11971, USA
properties.description: Peach and faint berry flavors in a light, crisp rosé with just a hint of residual sugar. A versatile picnic wine that's a cheerful copper hue to boot.

properties.title: Palmer 1998 Estate Pinot Blanc (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.address: 5120 Sound Ave, Riverhead, NY 11901, USA
properties.description: Ripe melons and pears dance a delicate duet on the palate—softly and gently shifting ever so slightly from honeydew to Bosc and back, before turning lean and citrusy on the finish.

properties.title: Macari 1998 Estate Bottled Chardonnay (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.address: 150 Bergen Ave, Mattituck, NY 11952, USA
properties.description: There's some light toast and vanilla flavors layered over modest Bosc-pear fruit, but a lack of intensity holds this wine back despite a generous mouthfeel and ample structure.

properties.title: Paumanok 2000 Semi Dry Riesling (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.address: 1074 Main Rd, Aquebogue, NY 11931, USA
properties.description: Starts off with aromas of apple blossoms and ultraripe pears. The pear notes carry through on the palate, where they're joined by a touch of anise. This slightly sweet bottling pales in comparison to Paumanok's Dry Riesling, but offers a well-made, soft alternative.

properties.title: Channing Perrine 1998 Oregon Road Riesling (Long Island)
properties.address: 1927 Scuttle Hole Rd, Bridgehampton, NY 11932, USA
properties.description: Modest green-apple fruit is married to earthy grapefruit and lime flavors in this effort by Channing Daughters winemaker Larry Perrine.

properties.title: Cascina Bretta Rossa 2009 Cuvée Leonora Sparkling (Alta Langa)
properties.address: STRADA PER LA, Strada Colma, 14, 15070 Tagliolo Monferrato AL, Italy
properties.description: A blend of 70% Pinot Nero and 30% Chardonnay, this has aromas of ripe orchard fruit, citrus and a whiff of pastry dough. The bright palate delivers golden apple and toasted almond alongside small persistent bubbles and fresh acidity.

properties.title: Castoro Cellars 2015 Oakenshield Vineyard Falanghina (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 1315 N Bethel Rd, Templeton, CA 93465, USA
properties.description: Golden-yellow in color, this bottling of a rarely planted grape from Italy's Campania region shows soft chamomile and sliced yellow apples on the pleasant nose. Squeezed lemon, light mandarin juice and a touch of walnut oil show on the sip, where the acid rises late and lasts long.

properties.title: Centovigne 2015 Miranda Erbaluce
properties.address: Frazione Castellengo, 29, 13836 Cossato BI, Italy
properties.description: Made with 100% native grape Erbaluce, this offers delicate aromas and flavors of ripe pear, green apple and citrus. A salty mineral note closes the crisp, clean finish.

properties.title: Day Owl 2016 Rosé (California)
properties.description: Showing fresh watermelon and canteloupe flavors, this light-bodied, dry wine is crisp in texture, with enough concentration to be mouth-filling. It's made frm 80% Barbera and 20% red Rhône varieties.

properties.title: Domaine Cazes 2016 Les Clos De Paulilles Collioure Rosé (Collioure)
properties.address: Le Cazes, 11240 Alaigne, France
properties.description: Made from 40% Syrah, 30% Grenache, 20% Mourvèdre and 10% Carignan, this Roussillon rosé opens with elegant notes of green pepper and savory herbs that frame the tight red cherry and underripe melon fruits. Medium in weight and a touch plush in feel, red cherry and berry tones dominate the palate, but finish bright and with a slightly bitter, fruit skin-like edge on the close.

properties.title: Shannon Ridge 2015 High Elevation Collection Cabernet Sauvignon (Lake County)
properties.address: 13888 Point Lakeview Rd, Lower Lake, CA 95457, USA
properties.description: This attractive, smooth-textured wine offers plenty of almost-sweet fruit flavors like black cherry and prune dusted with cinnamon and cedar for complexity. The tannins are abundant but soft, so there is little astringency, and the wine is easy to sip and enjoy.

properties.title: Skoff 2016 Eichberger Sauvignon Blanc (Südsteiermark)
properties.address: Eckberg 16, 8462 Gamlitz, Austria
properties.description: The merest touch of passion fruit streaks the lemony, fresh nose. Although the palate seems a little dilute, it is light, fresh and finishes on a lingering lemon note.

properties.title: Spicy Vines 2015 Joie de Vivre Chardonnay (Los Carneros)
properties.address: 441 Healdsburg Ave, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Dark in color and slightly reduced, this wine offers a waxy texture of apple, apricot and vanilla, medium in build with approachable richness and roundness. Smooth, it's a pleasant quaffer.

properties.title: Tempus Cellars 2013 Dionysus Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 760 C St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: This wine all comes from Block 18 at this esteemed vineyard. The aromas bring a medley of herbs along with graphite, licorice and black cherry. The palate is medium bodied, but pulls up a bit short on the finish.

properties.title: Terras Gauda 2014 La Mar White (Rías Baixas)
properties.address: Estrada Tui-A Guarda, km 55, 36760 O Rosal, Pontevedra, Spain
properties.description: This chunky, funky blend is led by the local Caiño Blanco grape, with Loureiro and Albariño in the mix. Lanolin is a more prominent aroma than any particular fruit, and this wine feels round but mature. Peach and dried melon flavors finish with little drive. Drink immediately.

properties.title: Jayson 2014 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 850 Bordeaux Way Suite 7, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Fleshy, full bodied and concentrated, this holds rich flavors of wild vanilla, pear and peach. Needing time to unravel, it shows its oak and power without regret.

properties.title: La Crema 2015 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 3575 Slusser Rd, Windsor, CA 95492, USA
properties.description: Perfumed jasmine and orange blossom open this wine aromatically before a roundly rich palate of caramel oak and baked apple spiked in nutmeg evolve in the glass.

properties.title: Les Vignerons de Florensac 2016 Rosé été Rosé (Côtes de Thau)
properties.description: This starts off shy, but with time allows aromas of delicate peach, cherry and orange blossom to come through in the bouquet. Pleasant ripe-fruit flavors unfold on the clean, well-balanced palate, with lingering notes of peach pit and orange peel on the finish.

properties.title: Beau Joubert 2010 Oak Lane Chenin Blanc-Sauvignon Blanc (Stellenbosch)
properties.address: 216 St Francis St, Mobile, AL 36602, USA
properties.description: With 2,000 cases imported, here's a value white composed of 80% Chenin Blanc and 20% Sauvignon Blanc. Green apple flesh and orange rind are lifted by notes of crushed yellow flowers, while green plum flavors flesh out the medium-weight mouth. Drink now.

properties.title: Highland Springs 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (OR))
properties.address: 3355 Imlac Rd, Woodbury, GA 30293, USA
properties.description: Light and fruity, with simple cherry fruit making this a good wine to chill and sip on a hot summer day. There is a streak of stemmy tannins in the astringent finish.

properties.title: Kunde 2010 Magnolia Lane Sauvignon Blanc (Sonoma Valley)
properties.address: 9825 Sonoma Hwy, Kenwood, CA 95452, USA
properties.description: The vineyard needs a warm vintage to fully ripen, which 2010 definitely wasn't. The wine is acidic and green, with an ammonia edge to the pineapples, mangoes and limes.

properties.title: Miradou 2010 Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: Laclède, 47310 Laplume, France
properties.description: Very light in flavor and texture, the wine has hints of strawberry flavors with acidity and a crisp, clean character.

properties.title: Sheldon 2009 La Naris White (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 3360 Coffey Ln, Santa Rosa, CA 95403, USA
properties.description: Simple and sweet, with sugared tangerine and vanilla flavors, enriched with caramelized oak. The blend is mostly Viognier, with Roussanne and Marsanne.

properties.title: Alma del Sur 2009 Colección Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: Calle Hidalgo S/N Junto a escalinatas de la Misión de, Centro, 23880 Loreto, B.C.S., Mexico
properties.description: Fiery and clipped on the nose, but then it settles onto red fruits and candy notes. The palate shows good grip and a proper but basic feel, with generic red berry and currant flavors. Solid on the finish; good in a common way.

properties.title: Andrieux & Fils 2010 Cuvée Victoria Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: 5th St West & Andrieux St, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.description: This wine is  refreshing, its red fruit juice laced with acidity and a touch of herbs. Easy and light to drink.

properties.title: Brander 2010 Sauvignon Blanc (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 2401 N Refugio Rd, Santa Ynez, CA 93460, USA
properties.description: A little on the sweet side, with lemonade and pineapple juice flavors that are sugared. Crisp acidity fortunately provides a clean finish to this slightly oaked Sauvignon Blanc.

properties.title: Quinta da Cortezia 2010 Vinha Conchas White (Lisboa)
properties.address: R. do Casal 6, 2580 Aldeia Gavinha, Portugal
properties.description: A light, bright, deliciously lemony wine, with an attractive aromatic lift. Fruity, ready to drink now.

properties.title: Pascal Jolivet 2014 Indigène  (Pouilly-Fumé)
properties.address: Rte de Chavignol, 18300 Sancerre, France
properties.description: A blend of wines from different vineyards in Pouilly, this powerful wine is concentrated, with tight minerality that demands further aging. Rich and packed with apples and green plums, it is a beautiful wine that will age well. Drink from 2018 at the earliest.

properties.title: Olivier Leflaive 2014 Clos Saint-Marc Premier Cru  (Chassagne-Montrachet)
properties.address: 10 Pl. du Monument, 21190 Puligny-Montrachet, France
properties.description: This is a rich textured wine from the center of this Premier Cru. It has structure and concentration as well as generous white stone fruits. Densely packed with acidity, toast and a fine, creamy texture, the wine is likely to age well. It is produced from biodynamically grown grapes (as are all the Olivier Leflaive family Grand and Premier Crus). Drink from 2020.

properties.title: Olivier Leflaive 2014 Les Folatières Premier Cru  (Puligny-Montrachet)
properties.address: 10 Pl. du Monument, 21190 Puligny-Montrachet, France
properties.description: This is a domaine wine, coming from one of the vineyards owned by Olivier Leflaive and worked biodynamically. It is a very fine wine from probably the most well-known premier cru in the village. With its rich acidity and white fruits, it is generous as well as crisply textured. The toast from the wood aging adds its juicy character to this impressive wine. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: Roche de Bellene 2014  Corton-Charlemagne
properties.address: 39 Rue du Faubourg Saint-Nicolas, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: From old vines, as are most of the wines from this producer, this is a dense and powerful wine. New wood aging has given the wine a strongly toasty character balanced with creamy apple and yellow fruits. The wine is concentrated and obviously needs to age. Drink from 2022.

properties.title: Sextant 2013 Passage Red (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 2324 CA-46, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Rich and complex in the modern Paso style, this blend of 59% Syrah, 21% Mourvèdre, 16% Petite Sirah and 4% Grenache pairs baked plum and blackberry with white pepper, sarsaparilla, coffee candy and cola on the nose. The flavors are deftly integrated, with touches of espresso, black cassis, black cherry and milk chocolate. Zesty and fun, it's also well structured.

properties.title: Bernardus 2014 Sierra Mar Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 5 W Carmel Valley Rd, Carmel Valley, CA 93924, USA
properties.description: This winery expertly differentiates its single-vineyard bottlings, here exploring the warmer, riper side of the grape, but with style and grace. Aromas of vanilla, sea-salt caramel, macadamia nut and hazelnut lead into a palate where lightly buttered yellow apples meet with jasmine tea, honeysuckle and a light touch of marzipan.

properties.title: Castello di Amorosa 2010 Il Passito Sauvignon Blanc-Semillon (North Coast)
properties.address: 4045 St Helena Hwy, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.description: Made from Sémillon and Sauvignon Blanc, this wine is luxurious and sweet, while maintaining great balance to keep from being too unctuous. It has a brilliant deep-gold color, generous aromas like toasted peanuts and marmalade, and flavors that are honeyed and floral. It feels nicely viscous, coating the sides of the mouth and helping the flavors linger for long moments on the finish.

properties.title: Robert Mondavi 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
properties.address: 7801 St Helena Hwy, Oakville, CA 94562, USA
properties.description: Dry, smooth and distinguished. Shows Mondavi's ability to get the grapes ripe in blackberries and currants, yet the fruit pulls back at the last moment, letting earthy, herbal notes take over, providing complexity and endless pleasure. The tannins are pure Oakville—sweet, soft and supple. Drink this elegant, balanced wine over the next six years.

properties.title: Notre Vin 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon (Howell Mountain)
properties.address: 11010 Estate Ln, Windsor, CA 95492, USA
properties.description: A huge wine, almost old-fashioned in its tannins. They're so strong, they freeze the palate with astringency, like a shot of Novacaine. It's also very dry, despite sweetly ripe blackberry essence, licorice and dark chocolate. All indications are that this is an ageworthy wine. Should begin to throw sediment and mellow in seven or eight years, and could go the distance to 2020 and beyond.

properties.title: Raymond 2008 Generations Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1584 St Helena Hwy: MAIN ENTRANCE 849 Zinfandel Ln: TRUCK ENTRANCE, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: So rich and ripe in fruit, you almost don't notice that it's also a complicated and layered wine in structure. Blackberry marmalade, cassis and cocoa flavors are balanced despite hefty alcohol. An extraordinarily delicious wine, but it's meant to be enjoyed in its youth. Drink up by 2016.

properties.title: Frazier 2008 Memento Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: A vastly concentrated Cabernet. Frazier seems to have taken their basic Cabernet, which is an excellent wine, and intensified everything about it. With explosive blackberry, cassis, blueberry, dark chocolate and oak flavors, it's almost too much of a good thing. Your best bet is to cellar it, but that's chancy. The alcohol is very high, and we do not know how these modern Cabernets will ride out the years.

properties.title: Round Pond 2008 Reserve Bovet Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
properties.address: 875 Rutherford Rd, Rutherford, CA 94573, USA
properties.description: Extraordinarily ripe and sweet in blackberries, cassis and figs, with a lovely perfume of violets and cedar, this soft, lush Cabernet, which was blended with some Petit Verdot, is so decadent now, you can hardly resist it. But it's pretty tannic, with good acidity, and has the structure to ride out the next eight years.

properties.title: Raymond 2008 District Collection Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
properties.address: 1584 St Helena Hwy: MAIN ENTRANCE 849 Zinfandel Ln: TRUCK ENTRANCE, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: A superb wine, showing real Oakville character. It's bone dry, rich and complex in tannin structure, with wonderfully ripe blackberry and cassis flavors. Yet there's a minerality that anchors the wine, and the finish is long, smooth and spicy. Just delicious now, and should hold over the next six years.

properties.title: Domaine Serene 2009 Côte Sud Vineyard Chardonnay (Dundee Hills)
properties.address: 6555 NE Hilltop Ln, Dayton, OR 97114, USA
properties.description: Immaculately clean and fresh, this enters the mouth with a pleasing lightness, displaying a mix of stone fruits and a streak of vanilla wafer running right through its core. It opens in the glass, adding muscle and depth, ultimately developing into a complex and persistent wine that simply refuses to quit.

properties.title: Alvaro Castro 2009 Quinta da Pellada Branco White (Dão)
properties.address: Quinta Da Pellada -Adega, Pinhanços, Guarda, 6270, Portugal
properties.description: From a field blend of old vines, this is a beautifully ripe, rounded, wood-aged wine that still preserves an internal structure. With its stone-fruit and mineral character, it is both fruity and textured. It's a wine for aging over 4–5 years.

properties.title: Stevens 2013 StevensDivio Viognier (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 18520 142nd Ave NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: As usual, this was sourced entirely from a small block in the Dineen vineyard. Fragrant with a mélange of lemony aromas, the flavors carry the same theme—lemon gelato, lemon pie, limoncello, all buoyed with perfect acidity. It's a vivid, clean, long-lasting wine.

properties.title: Andrew Will 2011 May's Discovery Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 12526 SW Bank Rd, Vashon, WA 98070, USA
properties.description: 100% varietal, this wine displays an intriguing profile of savory herbs, nori, barrel spices and graphite with dark fruit lurking beneath the surface and a citrus twist. There's minimal excess alcoholic fat. It's all flavor, with lively acids, a supple, polished feel and good depth and intensity—especially impressive considering the youth of this site (2005 plantings).

properties.title: Barrage Cellars 2011 Nuclear Blonde Chardonnay (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 19501 144th Ave NE Suite E-800, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: The Conner Lee Vineyard supplies the fruit—it's the source of some of Washington's finest Chardonnays. Barrel fermented, it's super concentrated and displays a dense mix of fruit and barrel flavors, apples and peaches, toasted almonds and buttered toast. Good length and that extra yum factor make this a top pick.

properties.title: Broman 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 945 Deer Park Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: This late-release has benefited from its time in bottle. Juicy and beguiling in red raspberry and black cherry fruit, it has a back layering of spicy cardamom and a sphere of acidity. Buoyant and memorable, it finishes with more spice and savory leather.

properties.title: Hafner Kosher 2002 Trockenbeerenauslese Barrique Chardonnay (Burgenland)
properties.address: Halbturnerstraße 17, 7123 Mönchhof, Austria
properties.description: The headiness of roasted hazelnuts, Bourbon vanilla and blossom honey have an immense seductive power. The palate follows up with precision, concentration and long length. This oak-aged TBA is a mature, full package that will easily charm anyone—now or in years to come.

properties.title: Hafner Kosher 2010 Icewine Gewürztraminer (Burgenland)
properties.address: Halbturnerstraße 17, 7123 Mönchhof, Austria
properties.description: The rich scent of dark honey is immediately cut by the heady lift of something that recalls the Mediterranean—juniper, conifers and crushed citrus leaves. The palate is a celebration of candied citrus—orange, lemon and grapefruit. Rich and deliciously tart at the same time.

properties.title: Pride Mountain 2012 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 3000 Summit Trail, Santa Rosa, CA 95404, USA
properties.description: Aged in 25% new French oak, the rest of it neutral, this age-worthy Chardonnay shows refreshing restraint, though it retains plenty of fruit. The aromas tend toward faint caramel and a complex web of acidity and brightness accompanies notes of apple and pear, a long finish capping things off.

properties.title: Walt 2012 Dutton Ranch Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 380 1st St W, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.description: This is an elegant, heady Chardonnay beaming in floral jasmine aromas, honey and oak. Bright on the palate, it offers lively acidity and an abundance of pineapple and mango, tropical in all the right ways.

properties.title: Greywacke 2010 Wild Sauvignon Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.address: 47 Kennedys Road, Hawkesbury 7272, New Zealand
properties.description: A relative bargain in the scheme of barrel-fermented Sauvignon Blanc, Kevin Judd's version boasts toasty, nutty notes upfront, followed by creamy citrus and stone-fruit aromas and flavors. It's a top example of the richness and potential age-worthiness that oak can bring to carefully selected lots of Sauvignon Blanc.

properties.title: I Campi 2015 Campo Vulcano  (Soave Classico)
properties.address: 10229 Sharp Rd, Mt Horeb, WI 53572, USA
properties.description: White spring flower, beeswax and orchard fruit aromas take center stage while the round, ripe palate evokes yellow apple, candied lemon drop and a hint of fennel seed. A saline-like mineral note energizes the finish.

properties.title: J. Portugal Ramos 2016 Loureiro (Vinho Verde)
properties.address: Adega Vila Santa, Estrada Nacional 4, 7100-149 Estremoz, Portugal
properties.description: This is a classic dry Vinho Verde. It has delicious fruit and crisp acidity giving lemon flavors, a lively texture and a refreshing aftertaste. Drink this wine now.

properties.title: Chamisal Vineyards 2015 Stainless Chardonnay (Central Coast)
properties.address: 7525 Orcutt Rd, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.description: Sweet apple blossom scents combine with a botanical element on the nose of this bottling, which also offers a grassy note. The crisp palate offers lemongrass at first, opening into riper pear flesh flavor and finishing with a touch of salt and candied lime tang.

properties.title: Chateau de l'Oiselinière 2015 Sur Lie  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
properties.description: This soft and fruity wine has open white fruit and citrus flavors. It is light and crisp with just the right amount of acidity. Coming from a warm year, it is richer than in other vintages, smoother and riper. Drink now.

properties.title: Château Los Boldos 2015 Grande Réserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Cachapoal Valley)
properties.address: Camino Los Boldos s/n, Requinoa, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: Lightly herbal berry fruit aromas are nothing you haven't seen before. In the mouth, this Cabernet is choppy and showing bold acidity. Flavors of plum and currant are racy and a touch spicy, while this is scouring on the finish.

properties.title: Domaine G. Metz 2016 Vieilles Vignes Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 40 Rte du Vin, 67140 Itterswiller, France
properties.description: While there is ample pear fruit on nose and palate, bitter pith notes seem to be dominant. Alcoholic heat is palpable on the midpalate. The finish is dry and returns to the fruity pear notes.

properties.title: Domaine G. Metz 2016 Vieilles Vignes Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 40 Rte du Vin, 67140 Itterswiller, France
properties.description: The nose is subdued but has a floral aspect. The palate, while fresh, slender and dry, seems to have a bitter element that gets in the way of the clean citrus notes. There is some concentration and a zesty lemony finish.

properties.title: Errazuriz 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (Aconcagua Costa)
properties.address: E-639 18, Panquehue, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.description: Briny grassy aromas are barely ripe and smell of match stick. This feels citric and more or less normal for a coastal SB. Pithy flavors of grapefruit skins blend with passion fruit in front of a juicy finish that tastes of white grapefruit and green herbs.

properties.title: Lapostolle 2015 Grand Selection Chardonnay (Rapel Valley)
properties.address: I-90 KM36, Santa Cruz, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: Plump, buttery aromas of apple and peach suggest popcorn. Typical of a Lapostolle Chardonnay, this feels a bit chunky and oily. Flavors of pineapple are slightly syrupy and oaky, while this tastes of honey, butter, stone fruits and mango on the finish.

properties.title: Lauren Ashton Cellars 2015 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14545 148th Ave NE #211, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: The aromas seem a bit disjointed on first pour, with notes of custard, citrus, mineral and spice. The palate is medium bodied, bringing some interest but not entirely pulling it all together.

properties.title: Les Hauts de Lagarde 2016 Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
properties.address: La Cave du Château de Lagarde" sur la RD 54 direction Digne, Route de Montferrat, 83830 Figanières, France
properties.description: Ripe and fruity, this is a pale pink-colored wine from Raymond family organic vineyards. In the winery, the wine is full of red berry flavors and with a crisp final texture. Refreshing and lively, it's ready to drink now.

properties.title: Love & Hope 2016 Rosé (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 106 Airport Dr, Nowata, OK 74048, USA
properties.description: This collaboration from winemaker Austin Hope and Texas chef Tim Love starts with a crowd-pleasing—albeit sweet—nose, full of cherry sorbet and berry candy scents. The palate brings decent structure and offers plummy flavors.

properties.title: Marco Felluga 2014 Molamatta White (Collio)
properties.address: 959 W Fairbanks Ave, Winter Park, FL 32789, USA
properties.description: A blend of 40% barrel fermented Pinot Bianco, 40% Friulano and 20%, Ribolla Gialla fermented in steel, this opens with aromas suggesting dried exotic fruit, coconut and oak-driven spice. The aromas carry over to the rather lean palate alongside a confectionery note and firm acidity. A walnut taste gives it a bitter finish.

properties.title: Olivini 2010 Diccianove Marzo Pas Dosé Metodo Classico  (Lugana)
properties.address: Località Demesse Vecchie, 2 25015, 25015 Desenzano del Garda BS, Italy
properties.description: Elegant and finely structured, this creamy, fragrant white opens with heady scents of jasmine, honeysuckle and white stone fruit. The smooth, delicious palate delivers green melon, white peach, cantaloupe, grapefruit and orange zest while a saline note lifts the lingering finish.

properties.title: Pedroncelli 2016 East Side Vineyards Sauvignon Blanc (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 1220 Canyon Rd, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.description: This steely, flinty, medium-bodied wine has spent no time in oak, allowing it to express its peach and pineapple fruit with purity and abundance.

properties.title: Quinta da Lixa 2016 Escolha White (Vinho Verde)
properties.address: Av. Dr. Machado de Matos, 4615 Vila Cova de Lixa, Portugal
properties.description: This is a classic crisp apple-driven and fruity wine. With delicious acidity and a lively aftertaste, the wine is tangy and zesty and a great summer drink.

properties.title: Rivera 2016 Pungirosa Bombino Nero Rosato (Castel del Monte)
properties.description: This opens with aromas of woodland berry and spring blossom. Bright and refreshing, the palate doles out wild raspberry and juicy strawberry alongside fresh acidity.

properties.title: Sun Garden 2015 Riesling (Nahe)
properties.address: Dakota Sun Gardens, 955 73rd Ave NE, Carrington, ND 58421, USA
properties.description: Fruity and fresh, this easygoing semidry Riesling offers heaps of sweet peach and citrus flavors. It's not complex, but is crisply balanced with a clean, refreshing finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Anne Amie 2011 Pinot Blanc (Chehalem Mountains)
properties.address: 6580 NE Mineral Springs Rd, Carlton, OR 97111, USA
properties.description: This is tart to the point of being outright sour, with flavors of lemon, green banana, and a hint of cracker. Overall the wine just does not come together. Two bottles tasted.

properties.title: Indian Creek 2011 Viognier
properties.address: 1000 N McDermott Rd, Kuna, ID 83634, USA
properties.description: This lightly aromatic offering of Viognier that doesn't appear entirely ripe, with notes of lemon curd and herbs. It's medium bodied, with a bitter streak that runs from head to tail.

properties.title: Vinicola Serena 2012 Ville D'Arfanta Brut Millesimato  (Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)
properties.description: There's a soapy, fragrant quality to this brut sparkling wine that is backed by slightly muddled aromas of simple citrus and peach. It's perfect for very informal drinking occasions.

properties.title: Brochelle Vineyards 2011 Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.description: An awkward Chardonnay. It's strong in apricot flavors, suggesting some overripeness, while the vanilla and butterscotch give it a candied, fruit juice sweetness. Drink up.

properties.title: Vetrère 2011 Cré Fiano (Salento)
properties.address: sp Monte Iasi Montemesola km 16, 74123 Taranto TA, Italy
properties.description: This pure expression of the Fiano Minutolo variety opens with candied aromas of peach syrup and butterscotch. Honey and sweet fruit flavors fill the palate.

properties.title: Vinum Cellars 2011 Chenin Blanc-Viognier (Clarksburg)
properties.address: 499 Devlin Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: A blend of 85% Chenin Blanc and 15% Viognier, this white is part sweet and part sour, with honey and peach coming through a murky cloud of wood. Still, enjoy it with Asian food slathered in spice or as the first sip on a hot day.

properties.title: Adega Mayor 2011 Monte Mayor Rosé (Alentejano)
properties.address: Herdade das Argamassas, 7370-171 Campo Maior, Portugal
properties.description: Bright and fruity, this dayglo pink wine is dominated by acidity, though the strawberry flavors offer a riper core. It's for drinking this summer.

properties.title: CK Mondavi 2011 Wildcreek Canyon Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
properties.address: 7801 St Helena Hwy, Oakville, CA 94562, USA
properties.description: This is a reliable Cabernet, and the price makes it especially attractive. Gets the job done with full-bodied flavors of blackberries and sweet, toasty oak.

properties.title: Acronym 2011 Great White (California)
properties.address: 500 Redwood Blvd, Novato, CA 94947, USA
properties.description: The main thing to know about this blend of undisclosed varieties is that it's not dry. It will appeal to consumers who like their white wines fruity and sugary, yet it's not really sweet enough to enjoy as a dessert sipper.

properties.title: Annefield Vineyards 2011 Rosé (Virginia)
properties.address: 3200 Sunny Side Rd, Saxe, VA 23967, USA
properties.description: Medium-intense aromas of lingonberry, cherry and legume mark the nose. As the wine progresses across the palate, the acidity subjugates the fruit, and the palate turns tart.

properties.title: Paul Jaboulet Aîné 2010 Domaine Mule Blanche White (Crozes-Hermitage)
properties.description: This blend of Marsanne and Roussanne comes across as something of a hybrid between Hermitage and Burgundy. It has grilled peach, citrus and smoke notes, ample weight and a long, hazelnut-tinged finish. Drink it over the next 6–8 years.

properties.title: Penfolds 2008 Bin 407 Cabernet Sauvignon (South Australia)
properties.description: In so-called Penfolds years, when the stars align for the company, smart money is on the Bin series of wines like this Bin 407 Cabernet. It comes close to the luxury Bin 707 Cabernet in terms of quality, but at a much lower price, boasting ample body and velvety tannins. Hints of cedar, mint and mocha accent concentrated cassis and plum flavors. Drink now–2018.

properties.title: Wittmann 2010 Westhofen Morstein GG Trocken Riesling (Rheinhessen)
properties.address: Mainzer Str. 19, 67593 Westhofen, Germany
properties.description: Ripe on the attack, with flavors of fleshy, yellow stone fruit and marmalade, this voluptuous yet dry Riesling is balanced, with layers of crushed stone and slate-driven minerality. Tart, citrusy acidity sends a sunny shockwave to your senses.

properties.title: Clarendon Hills 2008 Hickinbotham Cabernet Sauvignon (Clarendon)
properties.address: 11500 Burris Ln, Potter Valley, CA 95469, USA
properties.description: Clarendon Hills is best known for its Syrah and Grenache, but it is no slouch when it comes to McLaren Vale Cabernet. The 2008 Hickinbotham is full bodied and velvety in texture, with ample notes of cocoa and crisp cassis. Hints of mint and other herbal shadings give it varietal character and welcome complexity. Drink it over the next 10–12 years.

properties.title: Rochioli 2011 Estate Grown Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 6192 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: This isn't a long-term ager, but do give it about a year in the bottle to let all of its parts meld together. Right now, it's tight and oaky. It features intense, bright pineapple, green apple and orange flavors, with sweet barrel influences and a tenuous streak of acidity.

properties.title: Kühling-Gillot 2009 Nierstein Pettenthal GG Trocken Riesling (Rheinhessen)
properties.address: Ölmühlstraße 25, 55294 Bodenheim, Germany
properties.description: Steely and smoky, this luscious, full-bodied wine has a gorgeous mineral tone. The palate is dry, yet decadently fruity and floral, with loads of dainty blossoms and yellow cherries. A rich, nuanced, impeccably balanced wine.

properties.title: Maximin Grünhäuser 2010 Abtsberg Auslese 72 Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Maximin Grünhaus 1, 54318 Mertesdorf, Germany
properties.description: While initially quite lush on the palate, with undulating notes of honey, lanolin and hibiscus nectar, there's an invigorating briskness on the midpalate from the sweet-tart citrus and stone fruit flavors. It's bright with acidity and delicate lacings of sugar, spice and black tea.

properties.title: Novelty Hill 2011 Stillwater Creek Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14710 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: Crystal clear, loaded with enticing aromas and flavors of lemon zest, orange, tangerine and spice, this is a juicy, delicious and complete wine. Tangy and tart, it is almost impossible not to drain the glass quickly in order to refill it.

properties.title: Dr. H. Thanisch (Erben Müller-Burggraef) 2010 Berncasteler Doctor Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Junkerland 14, 54470 Bernkastel-Kues, Germany
properties.description: Notes of marmalade, spice, wax and lanolin intertwine gorgeously on the nose and palate of this penetrating, complex Riesling. Tasting unabashedly sweet and honeyed, this features a note of bitter orange rind and intense tangerine-like acidity, making it mouthwatering and sippable.

properties.title: Dr. Heidemanns-Bergweiler 2010 Bernkasteler Badstube Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Gestade 15, 54470 Bernkastel-Kues, Germany
properties.description: Whiffs of petrol, brine and fennel extend from the nose to the palate, adding a minerally sheen and a savory tone to the ripe peach and nectarine flavors. Lacy and crisp on the palate, it's mouth-smackingly good and easy to keep sipping.

properties.title: Ciavolich Giuseppe 2009 Pecorino (Colline Pescaresi)
properties.address: 8345 Green Valley Rd, Templeton, CA 93465, USA
properties.description: Giuseppe Ciavolich presents a wonderful expression of Pecorino with a dark golden color and intense aromas of apricot and ripe melon. It has a soft, creamy quality and touches of caramel and butterscotch.

properties.title: Citation 2008 Citation W3 Chardonnay (Oregon)
properties.address: 13100 Montebello Rd, Cupertino, CA 95014, USA
properties.description: From a mix of Walla Walla and Willamette fruit (hence W3,), this limited-production wine is firmly rooted in a base of apples and acid. Grace notes of spice and butter (from barrel fermentation and aging in French oak) give it added body and length, and it glides into a finish of cinnamon toast and apple butter.

properties.title: Courtney Benham 2010 Reserve Chardonnay (Edna Valley)
properties.description: Brilliantly ripe pineapple, tangerine and lemon fruit flavors mark this savory young Chardonnay. It shows the citrusy acidity of the cool-climate Edna Valley, with a long, spicy finish. Clean and mouthwatering, it offers a lot for the price.

properties.title: La Roncaia 2009 Friulano (Colli Orientali del Friuli)
properties.address: Via G. Verdi, 26, 33045 Cergneu Inferiore UD, Italy
properties.description: Friulano grapes see a touch of air-drying to increase their overall intensity and concentration. The results are fantastic and this white wine from northeast Italy does show beautiful apricot, honey and almond-like nuances.

properties.title: Lis Neris 2009 Jurosa Chardonnay (Friuli Isonzo)
properties.address: Via Gavinana, 5, 34070 San Lorenzo Isontino GO, Italy
properties.description: Chardonnay Jurosa delivers a smooth, creamy mouthfeel that would stand up to shellfish or white meat. Aromas include stone fruit, vanilla bean, melon and a playful touch of exotic spice.

properties.title: Nottingham Cellars 2009 Wisner Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 2245 S Vasco Rd unit c, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.description: The tannins on this vineyard designate, where two clones of Cab are grown (337 and 191) are still dry and thick and the wine is well made, with an herbal, baked bread and rich red fruit quality and barrels of smoky oak on the finish.

properties.title: Radford Dale 2009 Chardonnay (Stellenbosch)
properties.address: R44, Farm Rust en Vrede no 1322, Opposite Eikendal, Stellenbosch, Cape Town, 7600, South Africa
properties.description: Hints of flint and softly charred cedar grace the ripe peach and pear fruit core of this balanced Chard. The mouth is round and lush, with a good cut to keep things clean and lifted on the wood-spice-infused finish. Should pair nicely with wood-plank grilled salmon.

properties.title: Sbragia 2009 Home Ranch Chardonnay (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.description: Exceeds in ripe flavors of tropical fruits, tangerine and kiwi fruits, with an elaborate coating of sweet, caramelized oak. Brisk acidity brings a vitality to balance the richness. A flamboyant wine made in a popularly appealing style.

properties.title: Trailhead 2010 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.description: A very nice Sauvignon Blanc, and a good followup to the equally fine 2009, at a fair price. It straddles the line between dry and a little sweet, with brisk acidity boosting citrus, sweet hay, vanilla and white pepper flavors.

properties.title: Valentin Bianchi 2007 Particular Cabernet Sauvignon
properties.address: Ruta 143 y calle Valentín San Rafael Mendoza AR, Bianchi, M5600 BCJ, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Piercing oak deals aromas of lemon and graphite, and there's serious berry fruit, herbal scents and sous-bois to go with that. Lively and showing good maturity and acidity, with flavors of black fruits, vanilla, chocolate, toast and tobacco. Good on the finish, with everything coming full circle.

properties.title: Château de Jurque 2009 Tendresse  (Jurançon)
properties.address: 330 Rte de la Chapelle de Rousse, 64290 Gan, France
properties.description: A wine that balances considerable sweetness against the most exhilarating freshness. It has honey, yellow fruits, orange peel alongside touches of greener plums and herbs. A great aperitif wine.

properties.title: Château Tour des Gendres 2009 Moulin des Dames White (Bergerac Sec)
properties.address: 24240 Ribagnac, France
properties.description: So rich that it is almost sweet. The yellow fruits give considerable ripeness to this intense, spicy wine. With its smooth, oily texture and its layers of wood, it is almost too much.

properties.title: Marchiori & Barraud 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Perdriel)
properties.address: 21800 Marter Rd, St Clair Shores, MI 48080, USA
properties.description: Concentrated and ripe smelling, with prune, blackberry, coconut and other soft, dense aromas that succeed in drawing you in. Feels jammy and chubby, with meaty tannins and sweet flavors of prune, raisin, cassis and chocolate. Not overly complex; drink now through 2013.

properties.title: Martin Ray 2009 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Mountain)
properties.address: 2191 Laguna Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.description: Dry and tannic in youth, this Cabernet shows a cool-climate influence in the earthiness and minerality that frame the black currant and oak flavors. It's a good wine, with a good structure. Give it a few hours of decanting and drink soon.

properties.title: Melsheimer 2010 Trocken Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Wolfer Weg 11, 56841 Traben-Trarbach, Germany
properties.description: This trocken (dry) Riesling comes across as slightly rounded, almost plump, in texture, yet retains strong acids. Poached pear, damp moss and citrus notes come together in a pleasingly harmonious fashion, finishing clean and crisp.

properties.title: Middle Ridge 2008 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Temecula Valley)
properties.address: 54301 N Circle Dr, Idyllwild-Pine Cove, CA 92549, USA
properties.description: A lush, rich Cab from Temecula Valley, which smells nicely of cassis and cranberry with a splash of rose water. Mellow and balanced, the wine's tannins are well-integrated here with an appropriate oak finish.

properties.title: Louis Roederer 2006 Brut Nature  (Champagne)
properties.address: 4501 CA-128, Philo, CA 95466, USA
properties.description: Certainly dry, this Champagne is also ripe and structured, balancing the extreme dryness and acidity. It is a complex wine that has the ability to age in the bottle. The minimalist label, designed by Philip Starck, is a perfect pairing with the no-frills wine inside the bottle.

properties.title: Mount Veeder 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: Mt Veeder, California 94558, USA
properties.description: Made in large-enough quantities to be widely available, as well as at a rare price point for the appellation, this is a bit of a find. Juicy in red-fruit tones yet supported by drying tannins, this is pleasurably perplexing, with a hint of mint on the nose. Full bodied, it finishes with tobacco and fig. Cellar through 2020.

properties.title: Amici 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
properties.description: From the heart of Oakville, this 100% varietal wine is luxurious, silky and velvety on the palate, a masterful study of texture. Lengthy and balanced, despite its powerful fruit, it suggests dark plum and cassis, with just a tiny note of cherry, the tannins refined and chalky. Cellar through 2022.

properties.title: Black Cordon 2012 Reserve Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 4155 Dry Creek Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Round and lush, this offers soft layers of vanilla, French toast and tarte Tatin. Expansive on the palate, it maintains acidity and a freshness that keeps it inviting in the glass, concocting appealing aromas of lemon chiffon.

properties.title: Stephen Ross 2013 Bien Nacido Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.description: The veteran San Luis Obispo-based winemaker heads south to the historic vineyard to produce this wine. A wildly dynamic nose suggests unripe lemon skin, pencil lead, oak and smoky wisps of a beach campfire. The woody, cedar element—though not really oaky—provides an intriguing palate of pencil shavings, green pear skins and lime pith.

properties.title: Amici 2012 Morisoli Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
properties.address: 3130 Old Lawley Toll Rd, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.description: A whiff of yeasty baked bread opens the bouquet of this 100% varietal wine that's plenty juicy and drinkable right now. Plum surrounds integrated tannins and a powerful midpalate, suggesting an ability to age. The finish is all about mocha. Cellar through 2022.

properties.title: Chimney Rock 2012 Tomahawk Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
properties.description: From an estate-grown, valley-floor vineyard on the southern edges of the winery property, this wine is complex and nuanced in berry pie and a satchel of dried herb. Sizable tannins—which show promise to be tamed with time—form the integrated structure, supporting a lengthy, mocha-chocolate finish. Cellar through 2020.

properties.title: Ferrari 2008 Perlé Chardonnay (Trento)
properties.address: Via del Ponte, 15, 38123 Trento TN, Italy
properties.description: Pressed yellow flowers, citrus zest, walnut and bread crust aromas lead the way on this elegantly structured wine. The foaming, velvety palate doles out ripe yellow apple, lemon drop, toast and a light note of crystallized ginger framed in vibrant acidity and an ultrafine perlage. An energizing mineral note closes the finish.

properties.title: Cakebread 2012 Benchland Select Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 8300 St Helena Hwy, Rutherford, CA 94573, USA
properties.description: Aged in barrel for close to two years, this 100% varietal wine from a classic Napa Valley producer delivers a compelling mix of blackberry pie and chocolate. The flavors form around soft, silky, well-integrated oak and fine-grained tannins. Rich and robust, it discloses an elegance that suggests further cellaring, through 2022.

properties.title: Perlage 2014 Col di Manza Extra Dry  (Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)
properties.address: Via Cal del Muner, 16, 31010 Farra di Soligo TV, Italy
properties.description: Made following the principles of biodynamic agriculture, this bright, savory sparkler offers aromas of white peach, green apple and chopped herbs. The palate doles out ripe Bartlett pear, lime, ginger and sage alongside zesty acidity and a foaming mousse. A note of candied nectarine closes the finish. This would be perfect for toasts or as an aperitivo.

properties.title: A. D. Coutelas 2006 Vintage Brut  (Champagne)
properties.address: 557 Av. du Général Leclerc, 51530 Dizy, France
properties.description: An equal blend of Pinot Noir and Chardonnay, this is a crisper than other Champagnes in the Coutelas range. It is also still young with its bright green and citrus fruits and tense texture. Lively and fresh, it should be aged and not drunk before 2017.

properties.title: J. M. Gobillard et Fils 2010 Cuvée Prestige Rosé Brut  (Champagne)
properties.address: 38 Rue de l'Église, 51160 Hautvillers, France
properties.description: Still young and fruity, this wine is totally integrated, harmoniously blending the red fruits with a tight texture and fresh acidity. Although it is drinkable now, it will benefit from bottle age, so best drink from 2017.

properties.title: Deep Sea 2009 Viognier (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 217 Stearns Wharf, Santa Barbara, CA 93101, USA
properties.description: This is a soft, heavy Viognier. Despite some rich flavors of citrus and tropical fruits, it has a vegetal edge, and finishes jammy sweet.

properties.title: Kenwood 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
properties.description: A pleasant Cabernet, soft and fruity, with pretty blackberry, cherry and cola flavors, and a kiss of sweet oak.

properties.title: Argento 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: Juan de la Cruz Videla S/N Cruz de Piedra, Maipú, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Leathery and pinched on the nose, with rubber, olive and berry aromas. The palate runs hard and snappy due to high acidity and spiky tannins, while the flavor profile deals herbal notes, olive and dark plum. Fades fast on the finish, leaving a salty residue.

properties.title: Bodega Norton 2008 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: km 23, RP15, M5509 Perdriel, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Grapey and foxy, with green, minty aromas and a hollow center. The palate is bulky, heavy and tannic, while the flavors are strained and grapey. Sweet and incomplete; grapey but not in harmony.

properties.title: Don Manuel Villafañe 2007 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: Ruta 60 S/N, Paraíso, Maipú, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Raspberry, plum and cherry aromas become more thin, cheesy and leathery with time. The palate is hard and narrow, with sheer flavors of generic raspberry and plum. Clacky and rough feeling on the finish.

properties.title: Bodega Carmine Granata 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: ATB, Alberti 570, M5507 Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Candied, dark and murky on the nose, then narrow, clampy and tannic in the mouth. Flavors are herbal, while the fruit content is sweet blackberry and black plum. Short and hollow on the finish, which leaves a grapey residue.

properties.title: Calcareous 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3430 Peachy Canyon Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Soft and sugary sweet, with spicy black raspberry and chocolate flavors, this is a clean, simple wine to drink with barbecue.

properties.title: Domiciano de Barrancas 2009 Cosecha Nocturna Chardonnay (Mendoza)
properties.address: Maipú, Mendoza Province, Argentina
properties.description: Oily and blowsy smelling, with almondy aromas and a pinch of citrus. The palate is heavy and chunky, with sweet, overripe flavors of pineapple and peach. Sweet and stalky on the finish.

properties.title: Molnar Family 2009 Poseidon's Vineyard Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.description: A simple, sweet wine, with fruit juice flavors of pineapple, peaches, apples and honey.

properties.title: Rutz 2009 Sonoma Cuvee Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 24691 Dutcher Creek Rd, Cloverdale, CA 95425, USA
properties.description: Pretty threadbare in fruit, with watery pineapple flavors covered with lots of toasty, sweetly caramelized oak. Will satisfy Chardonnay fans who like this sweet style.

properties.title: Familia Schroeder 2010 Schroeder Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Patagonia)
properties.description: Stemmy and lightly green on the nose, with raspberry and plum filling in the blanks. The palate is a bit hollow and empty, with herbal plum and berry flavors. Not bad but it does shows stemminess and raspy qualities.

properties.title: Obrigado 2013 DAC Encruzado (Dão)
properties.address: 56 Harrison St #405, New Rochelle, NY 10801, USA
properties.description: The Dão's very own Encruzado is the backbone of this beautiful fresh wine. Made by top winemaker Alvaro Castro, the wine is rich, full of pears, apricots and pears with a touch of nutmeg. It needs another year to age. Drink from early 2016.

properties.title: Pieropan 2013  Soave Classico
properties.address: Via Giulio Camuzzoni, 3, 37038 Soave VR, Italy
properties.description: Fragrances recall honeysuckle, jasmine and citrus zest. The juicy palate offers creamy green apple, Bartlett pear and nectarine alongside zesty acidity. A note of white almond signals the close.

properties.title: Quintas de Melgaço 2014 QM Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)
properties.address: Ferreiros de Cima, 4960-010, Portugal
properties.description: From the northern Portuguese heartland of Alvarinho, this beautifully ripe and rich wine is packed with intense perfumes of white peach and green apple. Fresh fruit and crisp acidity give a lively, tangy aftertaste. Drink from late 2015.

properties.title: Selva Capuzza 2013 Selva  (Lugana)
properties.address: Località Selva Capuzza, 25015 Desenzano del Garda BS, Italy
properties.description: Delicate aromas of pressed white flower, tree fruit, citrus and slate lead the nose on this elegant, structured white. The vibrant palate offers juicy yellow peach, Granny Smith apple, nectarine skin and bitter almond alongside crisp acidity. The lingering finish has a mineral accent.

properties.title: Suavia 2012 Massifitti Trebbiano (Veronese)
properties.address: Via Centro, 14, 37038 Fittà VR, Italy
properties.description: Made entirely with Trebbiano di Soave, this vibrant white offers enticing aromas of white flower and citrus blossom. The linear palate delivers juicy yellow peach, pear, kiwi and mineral alongside firm acidity.

properties.title: Suavia 2013 Monte Carbonare  (Soave Classico)
properties.address: Via Centro, 14, 37038 Fittà VR, Italy
properties.description: Delicate aromas suggest stone fruit, flint and Mediterranean herb. The luminous palate delivers white peach, Bartlett pear, crisp apple, almond and an energizing mineral vein.

properties.title: Zenato 2012 Brut Metodo Classico  (Lugana)
properties.address: Strada San Benedetto, 8, 37019 Peschiera del Garda VR, Italy
properties.description: Crisp, clean and bone-dry, this refreshing sparkler conveys delicate aromas of honeysuckle and ripe orchard fruit. The vibrant palate delivers tart green apple, mature pear and zesty citrus accompanied by an elegant perlage and tangy acidity.

properties.title: Gadais Père et Fils 2012 Les Perrières Monopole  (Muscadet)
properties.address: Rue des Perrières, 44690 Saint-Fiacre-sur-Maine, France
properties.description: Wood-fermented Muscadet is rare and this limited edition from 40-year-old vines is certainly unusual. The toast and spice have taken away the natural fruitiness of the Melon grape while adding a richer texture and a ripe, full-bodied ageworthy feel. Drink from 2017.
