properties.title: Gadais Père et Fils 2012 Vieilles Vignes Sur Lie  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
properties.address: Rue des Perrières, 44690 Saint-Fiacre-sur-Maine, France
properties.description: This ripe, fresh wine packs a punch of fruit. It's well structured and lightly mineral at the back. Swathes of apple, citrus and pink grapefruit occupy the foreground of this impressive wine that is ready for drinking.

properties.title: J. Scott Cellars 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Oregon)
properties.address: 520 Commercial St unit g, Eugene, OR 97402, USA
properties.description: The winery does well with this grape, though each new vintage brings some sort of a twist or turn as far as grape sourcing, blend and overall style are concerned. Pungent with fusel oil and grass, it's not for the faint of palate. Full and flavorful on the palate, it combines sweet grasses with tree fruits, citrus and rind, showing excellent concentration and length, and finishing with a hint of ginger cookie.

properties.title: Lancaster 2011 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 15001 Chalk Hill Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: A majority of estate-grown Cabernet Sauvignon is joined by Merlot and smaller amounts of Malbec, Petit Verdot and Cabernet Franc. They make for a balanced, herbal wine, dressed in peppercorn, black currant and blackberry adornments. Elegant in dry tannins and a hint of cedar, it can withstand time in the cellar; hold through 2026.

properties.title: Maximin Grünhäuser 2013 Herrenberg Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Maximin Grünhaus 1, 54318 Mertesdorf, Germany
properties.description: Dusty mineral and savory herb complexities are layered amidst honeyed swathes of sweet grapefruit. This wine is ethereally light on the palate, but richly concentrated, finishing long with a dusting of sugar cookies and hazelnut.

properties.title: Pieropan 2012 La Rocca  (Soave Classico)
properties.address: Via Giulio Camuzzoni, 3, 37038 Soave VR, Italy
properties.description: Perhaps the most iconic bottling in Soave, this opens with aromas of candied fruit, pressed chamomile flower, savory herb and a whiff of oak-driven spice. The firm palate offers lemon drop, nectarine skin, yellow peach, toasted hazelnut and energizing mineral. It has nice depth and is well balanced, with tangy acidity. Drink through 2020.

properties.title: Maison Nicolas Perrin 2014  Condrieu
properties.address: 29 Côte des Chapeliers, 26000 Valence, France
properties.description: This wine is pretty retrained on the nose for Condrieu, but still offers aromas of spring blossoms and white pepper. Fruit takes hold on the palate, suggesting apricot, peach and pineapple. Those flavors continue through the finish, which is silky in texture but only medium in length.

properties.title: Dr. Konstantin Frank 2015 Dry Rosé (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 9749 Middle Rd, Hammondsport, NY 14840, USA
properties.description: Intensely fruity notes of red currant and raspberry abound on this fragrant full-bodied rosé. It's boldly concentrated on the palate as well, bursting of fresh berry and plum flavors. Primary and juicy in style, yet elegant and penetrating, it's an excellent rosé for year-round consumption—if you can still find a bottle.

properties.title: Cafaggio 2011 Basilica del Cortaccio Cabernet Sauvignon (Toscana)
properties.address: Strada Comunale di S. Martino in Cecione, 5, 50022 Greve in Chianti FI, Italy
properties.description: Made entirely with Cabernet Sauvignon, this opens with delicate aromas of cassis, tobacco and cedar. The robust palate delivers mature plum, clove and espresso alongside chewy tannins. Drink through 2020.

properties.title: Carpineto 2011 Farnito Cabernet Sauvignon (Toscana)
properties.address: SP 16 Chianti-Valdarno, 50022 Greve FI, Italy
properties.description: Made entirely with Cabernet Sauvignon, this opens with aromas of toasted oak, scorched earth, underbrush and a balsamic whiff of eucalyptus. The dense palate offers blackberry jam, licorice, cured meat and a confectionery note alongside chewy, close-grained tannins. It's a bit shy on freshness, so drink sooner rather than later.

properties.title: Winzer Krems 2015 Kremser Wachtberg Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Kremstal)
properties.address: Stadtgraben 11, 3500 Krems an der Donau, Austria
properties.description: The nose gives little away but the palate comes in with the fruity pleasant ease of ripe pear and gentle citrus freshness. This is rounded and ripe, fresh and bouncy, with a clean-cut finish.

properties.title: Wolff 2014 Riesling (Central Coast)
properties.address: 6238 Orcutt Rd, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.description: Tight and minerally aromas of grapefruit pith, crushed white rocks, lemon zest and the slightest hint of petrol make for a tense and fresh nose on this bottling. That textural tension shows brightly on the palate, along with nicely rounded flavors of melon and mango, leveled by a touch of tonic water.

properties.title: Wood Family Vineyards 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 2407 Research Dr, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.description: Full bodied and with good, gripping tannins to make the texture appetizing, this wine is very dry and nicely complex. Moderate cranberry and dark chocolate flavors are accented by hints of sage and black olive—classic Cabernet traits.

properties.title: Marchesi de' Frescobaldi 2015 Alìe Rosé (Toscana)
properties.address: Via Aretina, 120, 50065 Sieci FI, Italy
properties.description: Here's a fun rosé that opens with aromas of spring flower, wild red berry and a whiff of crushed stone. Made with Syrah and Vermentino, the bright palate doles out juicy red cherry, yellow peach and a hint of white pepper. It finishes fresh and clean.

properties.title: Marchesi de' Frescobaldi 2015 Gorgona White (Costa Toscana)
properties.address: Via Aretina, 120, 50065 Sieci FI, Italy
properties.description: Made in collaboration between Frescobaldi and prisoners of the Gorgona penal colony, this offers delicate aromas of ripe orchard fruit, white flower and a whiff of Mediterranean scrub. The round palate offers dried apricot and citrus before a savory finish.

properties.title: Schug 2012 Estate Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.address: Schug Carneros Estate Winery, 602 Bonneau Rd, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.description: 100% barrel fermented in 50% new French oak, this wine is dominated by flavors of buttered toast, vanilla and butterscotch. Underneath all the oak is a wine that's quite brisk with acidity and a delicious pineapple-jam flavor.

properties.title: Snoqualmie 2012 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 660 Frontier Rd, Prosser, WA 99350, USA
properties.description: The winery identifies this as organically grown, and it commands a higher price than the nonorganic Snoqualmie offerings. It's fresh, clean and simple, with crisp, apple fruit and well balanced acidity.

properties.title: Ciù Ciù 2012 Evoè Passerina (Marche)
properties.address: Contrada Ciafone, 106, 63073 Offida AP, Italy
properties.description: This opens with attractive floral sensations reminiscent of white spring flowers. Pear, apple and pineapple flavors are all present, along with a bare hint of mineral. There's no complexity here but it's fresh and lively.

properties.title: Colonnara 2012 Lyricus  (Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico)
properties.address: Via Mandriole, 6, 60034 Cupramontana AN, Italy
properties.description: This bright and easy-drinking wine opens with delicate floral aromas of acacia and Spanish broom. The linear palate offers notes of lemon zest and peach alongside racy acidity that leaves a refreshing finish. Simple but well-made.

properties.title: Domaine Allimant-Laugner 2011 Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 10 Grand Rue, 67600 Orschwiller, France
properties.description: This is a surprisingly dry wine that's all spice and lychee flavors without any hint of sweetness (not indicated on the label unfortunately). It has a light texture with notes of pepper and rosewater, along with some acidity on the finish.

properties.title: Domaine Allimant-Laugner 2011 Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 10 Grand Rue, 67600 Orschwiller, France
properties.description: Despite its recent vintage, this is a wine that is already tasting mature. The palate is layered with secondary flavors touched with floral perfume, intense acidity and a dry aftertaste. It's not for aging, so enjoy now.

properties.title: Domaine Charles Baur 2011 Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 29 Grand-Rue, 68420 Eguisheim, France
properties.description: Medium sweet in style, this is spicy, fragrant wine with honeyed lychee and pear flavors. It's warm and rich with nicely lifted acidity on the finish.

properties.title: Dopff & Irion 2012 Cuvée René Dopff Pinot Blanc (Alsace)
properties.address: 2 Av. Jacques Preiss, 68340 Riquewihr, France
properties.description: This is typical Pinot Blanc—its warm, fruity and soft with just a touch of spice. The wine has an attractive line of acidity from its pear flavors, making it balanced and ready to drink.

properties.title: Anakena 2013 Enco Reserve Sauvignon Blanc (Leyda Valley)
properties.address: Requínoa, Requinoa, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: This is a bit vegetal on the nose, where nectarine aromas compete with greener notes of canned beans and asparagus. In the mouth, this is oily in feel, while flavors of green fruits trend toward herbaceous. A minerally finish with citrus flavors and herbal leftovers is what you'd expect.

properties.title: Belisario 2010 Riserva  (Verdicchio di Matelica)
properties.address: Via A. Merloni, 12, 62024 Matelica MC, Italy
properties.description: Even though only 20% of this Riserva is aged in barriques, this internationally-styled Verdicchio shows dominant oak, vanilla and butterscotch sensations that overwhelm the more subtle floral and citrus characteristics.

properties.title: Bott Frères 2011 Tradition Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 13 Av. du Général de Gaulle, 68150 Ribeauvillé, France
properties.description: Very spicy on the nose, this sweet wine is ripe, full bodied and fruity. It has a floral character that gives complexity as well as a delicious, refreshing aftertaste. Drink now.

properties.title: De Angelis 2012  Offida Pecorino
properties.address: Via Marziale, 14, 80067 Sorrento NA, Italy
properties.description: This opens with delicate floral and citrus aromas, while the palate offers lemon drop and juicy yellow-apple flavors alongside crisp acidity. Pair this with linguine topped with clam sauce. Terroir Society, Potomac Selections.

properties.title: Domaine d'Eole 2011 Red (Coteaux d'Aix-en-Provence)
properties.address: 396 Chemin des Pilons, par D 24 Route de Mouriès, 13810 Eygalières, France
properties.description: Touched by wood, this is a warm wine with soft plum flavors and light tannins. It could age well for 4–5 years, but is ready to drink now.

properties.title: Domaine François Schmitt 2012 Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 19 Rue de Soultzmatt, 68500 Orschwihr, France
properties.description: This is a delicate, aromatic wine that's light as a feather. It has crisp citrus flavors along with notes of apricot and berries, along with a pure line in acidity. The aftertaste is pure refreshment.

properties.title: Domodimonti 2012 Licoste  (Offida Pecorino)
properties.address: Contrada Menocchia, 212/a, 63062 Montefiore dell'Aso AP, Italy
properties.description: A hint of butterscotch mingles with apple, banana, tangerine and lemon sensations. The brisk acidity would lift hearty accompanying fare; pair this with fish stews or pastas topped with creamy clam sauce.

properties.title: Dopff & Irion 2012 Cuvée René Dopff Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 2 Av. Jacques Preiss, 68340 Riquewihr, France
properties.description: This is a gently spicy wine with notes of ginger and cinnamon as well as ripe tropical fruits. It is not a complex wine, but very approachable even at this stage and touched with some acidity on the finish.

properties.title: Enotria 2012 Moscato (Mendocino County)
properties.address: 116 W 23rd St, New York, NY 10011, USA
properties.description: With 100 g/L residual sugar, this is a pleasantly sweet Moscato, with opening aromas of rose water and jasmine that delve into sweet peach and apple on the palate. Light and soft, it will satisfy as an accompaniment to strong cheeses or salumi.

properties.title: Bodegas y Viñedos Tábula 2011 Damana Verdejo (Rueda)
properties.address: Carretera de Valbuena, Km. 2, 47359 Olivares de Duero, Valladolid, Spain
properties.description: Salinic, oceanic aromas come with touches of green herbs and lime. The palate is crisp and focused with apple, lime, kiwi and melony flavors that set up a green-tinged, persistent finish that's minerally and citrusy to the final drop.

properties.title: Elyse 2009 C'est Si Bon-Naggiar Vineyard Red (Sierra Foothills)
properties.address: 2100 Hoffman Ln, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: This is a mountain-grown Rhône-inspired blend of Grenache, Mourvèdre, Syrah, Cinsault, Counoise and Viognier that Napa-based Elyse produces every year. The 2009 is indeed very good—savory with dark cherry and raspberry tones, and appropriately layered in leather, tar and earth. It's a versatile wine that will pair with a range of poultry and pasta, too.

properties.title: Handley 2011 Estate Vineyard Chardonnay (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 3151 CA-128, Philo, CA 95466, USA
properties.description: An extreme wine from an extremely cool site in an extremely cool vintage, Handley's estate Chardonnay is intriguingly tart, crisp and low in alcohol, yet textured and unique. Sip it on its own or pair with buttery shellfish or goat cheese on crackers.

properties.title: Le Nardian 2010  Bordeaux Blanc
properties.address: 2950 32nd Ave SW, Tumwater, WA 98512, USA
properties.description: A creamy, wood-aged white that simultaneously emphasizes crisp Sauvignon Blanc fruit and minerality. Hints of pineapple and lemon go with a tight texture. A rich yet fresh wine that could age for a few years but can also be enjoyed now.

properties.title: Meander 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1770 Dean York Ln, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Tough in tannins, but rich in black currant flavor, this 100% Cab has some elegant features in its purity of structure and dryness. Let it air in the glass for 30 minutes or so before drinking.

properties.title: Nottingham Cellars 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 2245 S Vasco Rd unit c, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.description: Rich in savory herbs and raspberry liqueur, Nottingham's Livermore Valley Cab is sourced from several regional vineyards. Blended with Petit Verdot, Merlot and Malbec, and aged in French oak, this is an easy drinking wine with deceptive complexity and just the right amount of depth and weight.

properties.title: Rancho Sisquoc 2010 Flood Family Vineyards Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 6600 Foxen Canyon Rd, Santa Maria, CA 93454, USA
properties.description: Great price for a Chardonnay this good. This displays a creamy, buttery framework, with vanilla, lime, peach and mango flavors, highlighted by zesty acidity.

properties.title: Sagebrush Annie's 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 4211 CA-33, Maricopa, CA 93252, USA
properties.description: This is a very dry, tannic Cabernet. It has blackberry and blueberry fruit that's obscured by some scoury astringency. Drink now, or give it a couple more years to come around.

properties.title: Va Piano 2010 Brunos Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1793 J B George Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: Though it's 85% Cabernet Sauvignon, this includes small amounts of four other Bordeaux grape varieties. Aged in 30% new French oak, it's nicely detailed with dried herb, baking chocolate and a dash of cinnamon. Black cherry fruit anchors the core, and the impression is of an Old World style, with well-integrated herb and earth flavors.

properties.title: Vigliano 2010 L'Erta Chardonnay (Toscana)
properties.address: Via per Chiavazza, 30, 13856 Vigliano Biellese BI, Italy
properties.description: L'Erta is a Tuscan expression of Chardonnay that opens with a bright, golden color and spicy aromas of candied fruit, citrus, apricot, pear, honey and a touch of spicy saffron. The wine sports a bold, saturated style.

properties.title: Bouchard Aîné et Fils 2015  Savigny-lès-Beaune
properties.address: 4 Bd Maréchal Foch, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: This wine is tangy and zesty, with a strong mineral texture that partners with the perfumed acidity, lively fruitiness and citrus flavors. It is likely to age well because of its tight texture. Drink from 2020.

properties.title: Concha y Toro 2016 Marques de Casa Concha Chardonnay (Limarí Valley)
properties.address: Av. Virginia Subercaseaux 210, Pirque, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: Oaky aromas of bacon and ham blend with vanilla on the nose of this plump, melony wine. Flavors of resiny oak, Animal Cracker cookies and melon turn overtly spicy on the finish that includes a hint of clove.

properties.title: Domaine Françoise André 2015 Sous Frétille Premier Cru  (Pernand-Vergelesses)
properties.address: 7 Rem Saint-Jean, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: Wood aromas provide a toasty character that dominates the fruit. It will take time for the apple and pear fruit flavors to show. Drink from 2020.

properties.title: Fjord 2016 Albariño (Hudson River Region)
properties.address: 251 Ridge Rd, Milton, NY 12547, USA
properties.description: Bold gooseberry, honeydew and citrus flavors abound on this squeaky-fresh and fruity Albariño. It's plump in body but dry and zesty in style. This is a forward, easy-guzzling wine that highlights fresh fruit but finishes with a whisper of sea-salt minerality.

properties.title: Montserrat Canals Torres 2014 Eunoia Vintage Reserva Brut Nature Sparkling (Cava)
properties.address: Carrer del Claverol, 2, 08620 Sant Vicenç dels Horts, Barcelona, Spain
properties.description: Kiwi and lemon-lime aromas lead to a tight, stony palate. White-fruit flavors are more savory and briny than pure, while this evaporates and finishes with elegance. For a fresh style of cava, this brut nature rings true.

properties.title: Municipal Winemakers 2016 Pale Pink Rosé (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 22 Anacapa St, Santa Barbara, CA 93101, USA
properties.description: Pale pink in color, this primarily Grenache- and Cinsault-based rosé (which also has five other grapes involved) shows light watermelon, orange rind and crushed chalk on the nose. There is buoyant citrusy energy to the sip, which goes down incredibly easy.

properties.title: Pacific Rim 2015 Solstice Vineyard Riesling (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 8111 Keene Rd, West Richland, WA 99353, USA
properties.description: Vibrant diesel, orange rind, white flower and dried apricot aromas lead to dry stone fruit flavors in this wine. It shows a pleasant balance and persists through the finish.

properties.title: Pacific Rim 2016 Sweet Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 8111 Keene Rd, West Richland, WA 99353, USA
properties.description: This wine leaves no doubt about the variety, with its freshly peeled orange and jasmine notes. The palate is sweet yet not cloying, with impeccable balance. For those looking for a well-priced sweet wine, look no further.

properties.title: Remelluri 2013 Blanco White (Rioja)
properties.address: Carretera Rivas de Tereso, s/n, 01330 Labastida, Araba, Spain
properties.description: A mature nose of cornbread and oxidized fruits suggests a wine older than this. A white blend, it features a multitude of grapes led by Viura. On the palate, acidity is the key ingredient, while a mix of oxidized apple, melon and corn flavors runs long on the finish. Drink through 2022.

properties.title: Rideau 2016 Viognier (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 1562 Alamo Pintado Rd, Solvang, CA 93463, USA
properties.description: Very light in the glass, this bottling shows peach, melon, apple and key lime pith, which cuts through the riper elements. A simmering acidity is ever present on the sip, hewing the tropical guava flavors and providing a refreshing tension.

properties.title: Sheldrake Point 2015 Estate Bottled Gewürztraminer (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 7448 County Rd 153, Ovid, NY 14521, USA
properties.description: Spicy tangerine peels perfume this intense, full-bodied Gewürztraminer. It's richly textured, almost creamy, in mouthfeel but balanced brightly in acidity. Hints of fennel and pollen pepper a pleasantly phenolic finish.

properties.title: Stag's Leap Wine Cellars 2014 Artemis Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 5766 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: This well-made full-bodied wine exudes a juicy core of red currant, cranberry and vanilla as a persistence of tannin provides power and wooded support. Oak and cedar play nicely together and add a wealth of savory concentration.

properties.title: West Cape Howe 2011 Unwooded Chardonnay (Western Australia)
properties.address: 14923 Muir Hwy, Mount Barker WA 6324, Australia
properties.description: Like so many unwooded Chardonnays, this is a medium-bodied, pleasantly fruit-forward wine that's clean, simple and direct. Tangerine scents lead into flavors of mixed citrus and a crisp finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Steininger 2011 Sekt Riesling (Österreichischer Sekt)
properties.address: Walterstraße 2, 3550 Langenlois, Austria
properties.description: With some attractive perfume, this is a crisp sparkling wine that's brightly fruity and touched with spice and lemon acidity. It has a pepper edge and a tangy mouthfeel, and finishes on a bold, citrusy note.

properties.title: Thierry-Weber 2012 Grüner Veltliner (Austria)
properties.address: Melkerstraße 1, 3495 Rohrendorf bei Krems, Austria
properties.description: One of the popular liter bottles of Grüner Veltliner, this is bright, fruity and laced with red apples. It has lively acidity and a light texture, making it very drinkable and bright.

properties.title: Seghesio 2012 Arneis (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 700 Grove St, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: A tasty little sipper, built along Pinot Grigio lines. It's light-bodied and tart in acidity, with ripe pineapple, orange, vanilla and honey flavors. Great for picnics, the beach or as an appetizer with savory munchies.

properties.title: J. Rickards 2012 Sémillon (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 24505 Chianti Rd, Cloverdale, CA 95425, USA
properties.description: With a smooth, soft mouthfeel, this wine has flavors of cashews, lanolin, citrus fruits and white flowers. It's dry, but there's a honeyed taste through the finish. It's a little heavy in oak. Try as an exotic alternative to Chardonnay or Sauvignon Blanc.

properties.title: Graf Hardegg 2012 Veltlinsky Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Seefeld 1, 2062 Seefeld, Austria
properties.description: Veltlinsky is among the very first of the fruity Grüners that swept through our wine shops. It is as crisp and green as the grape should be, with apples and pepper laced together in a bright, light harmony. Screwcap.

properties.title: Casa Viva 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Rapel Valley)
properties.address: Unnamed Road, Puente Alto, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: Initial gaseous, rubbery aromas subside with time in the glass. This remains minty and herbal on the nose, while olive, eucalyptus and red-fruit flavors carry the palate to a firm, solid-feeling, minty and lightly green finish.

properties.title: Chilensis 2012 Reserva Estate Bottled Sauvignon Blanc (Maule Valley)
properties.address: Av Vitacura 4380, Vitacura, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: Despite showing neutrality on the bouquet, you will find modest salinic, citrusy aromas. The palate feels round and good, with flavors of orange and briny lime. A fleshy feeling, citrusy tasting finish is nice even if it isn't overly zesty. Drink now.

properties.title: Domaine de l'Herré 2012 Chardonnay (Côtes de Gascogne)
properties.address: A, Herré, 32370 Manciet, France
properties.description: A light, fragrant Chardonnay, this wine feels cool and soft. There are attractive plum and greengage flavors, as well as a gentle touch of acidity. This is pure fruitiness, with no wood aging.

properties.title: Lapostolle 2011 Casa Grand Selection Cabernet Sauvignon (Rapel Valley)
properties.address: I-90 KM36, Santa Cruz, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: Heavy, baked aromas of black plum, berry and rubber are dense and chunky. This is big, grabby and tannic in feel, with grapey flavors of blackberry and earthy tobacco. A minty, round, soft finish is plump and grabby.

properties.title: Vistamar 2011 Sepia Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Rosario Nte 615, Las Condes, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: This Cabernet opens with a light whiff of green leafiness, then cola, berry and rhubarb notes appear. The mouthfeel is lively and crisp, with a shot of acidity in the midpalate sticking out. Slightly tart flavors of berry and cassis are spicy and herbal, while the finish is quick.

properties.title: Artadi 2015 Garnacha by Artazu Rosé (Navarra)
properties.address: Carretera de Logroño, s/n, 01300 Guardia, Álava, Spain
properties.description: Aromas of yeast, grape skins and dust are less than compelling but not offputting. This is a high-acid, shearing type of rosé, tasting citrusy and a bit sour. A mild orange flavor is found on a crisp, racy finish.

properties.title: Barrel Racer 2013 Fiano (California)
properties.address: 3272 Industry Rd, Rootstown, OH 44272, USA
properties.description: At first whiff this wine smells burnt, but that fades to show a buttered popcorn, nutty aroma. A walnut-like astringency accompanies the otherwise smooth and viscous texture.

properties.title: Bodegas Paniza 2015 Garnacha Rosé (Cariñena)
properties.address: Carretera Valencia, Km 53, 50480 Paniza, Zaragoza, Spain
properties.description: Lightly briny aromas of citrus set up a tight, grabby palate. This wine is a touch sour and pithy, with cantaloupe notes. A pithy, tangy finish is dry and basic.

properties.title: Albino Armani 2011 Cle Brut Metodo Classico Sparkling (Trento)
properties.address: Località Camporal, 37020 Marano di Valpolicella VR, Italy
properties.description: Made with Chardonnay and Pinot Nero, this has a shy nose but eventually reveals medicinal herb and toasted bread crust. The rather lean, bitter palate offers walnut, yellow apple skin and a hint suggestive of adhesive bandage alongside firm acidity and sharp, brisk bubbles.

properties.title: Naggiar 2015 Estate Grown, Produced and Bottled Viognier (Sierra Foothills)
properties.address: 18261 Rosemary Ln, Grass Valley, CA 95949, USA
properties.description: Earthy, savory, seaside flavors dominate the mild fruit component of this rich-feeling but light-tasting wine.

properties.title: Peri Bigogno 2012 Talento Brut Rosé Sparkling (Vino Spumante)
properties.address: Via Giuseppe Garibaldi, 64, 25014 Castenedolo BS, Italy
properties.description: Medicinal herb and lime lead the nose and carry over to the lean palate along with bitter walnut and yellow apple skin. It's dominated by brisk acidity.

properties.title: Kuleto Estate 2013 Estate Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2470 Sage Canyon Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: From 100% estate-grown fruit, this lemony wine is tart on the palate while also offering a strong taste of cinnamon, akin to Red Hots. That heat lingers atop a medium-bodied experience imprinted in toasted oak.

properties.title: Batán de Salas 2015 Chardonnay (Somontano)
properties.address: Pol. Ind. Valle del Cinca, 22300 Barbastro, Huesca, Spain
properties.description: Aromas of apple juice and melon are pleasant. This wine shows adequate balance. Peach and melon flavors finish with creamy weight and a mild note of pyrazines.

properties.title: Turkovich 2015 Roussanne (Yolo County)
properties.address: 304 Railroad Ave, Winters, CA 95694, USA
properties.description: A strong peppery, charred element dominates the aromas and the flavors of this full-bodied wine. The color is a brownish gold, aromas come on really strong and the flavors turn astringent.

properties.title: Cuvaison 2013 Estate Grown Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.address: 1221 Duhig Rd, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.description: Crisp, yet fuller bodied, with a creamy voluptuousness to the mouthfeel, this wine offers a taste of lemon pith and peach, accented by a floral bouquet of orange blossom. Measured acidity keeps it ebullient in the glass, ending in a hit of Tahitian vanilla.

properties.title: Gorman 2014 Big Sissy Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 9206 200th St SE a4, Snohomish, WA 98296, USA
properties.description: Fermented and aged in new French oak, this wine shows pleasing pear and apple aromas along with toast and baking spices. The medium-bodied flavors show refinement, depth and balance.

properties.title: Joseph Cattin 2014 Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 35 Rue Roger Frémeaux, 68420 Vœgtlinshoffen, France
properties.description: Clean, taut green apple and zesty lemon are the chief markers of this slender, dry wine. It holds lots of refreshment and has a racy core. Have this on its own when in need of refreshment, or have it with food when there is light, subtle fare.

properties.title: Kuentz-Bas 2014 Tradition Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 14 Route des Vins, 68420 Husseren-les-Châteaux, France
properties.description: Zestiness amid the rounded apricot and rose-petal flavors marks this out, while a pleasant, ever-so-slightly bitter phenolic edge gives just a little bite. The aromatics are subtly expressed and the real action happens on the textured palate.

properties.title: Caliterra 2013 Tributo Single Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Palmilla, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: Briary, herbal berry aromas are dry, earthy, foresty and show a note of olive. This Cab is full of life on the palate, with energy and good overall balance. Spicy flavors of baked plum, olive, herbs and tobacco finish long, with amplified oak. Drink now through 2018.

properties.title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2014 Cold Creek Vineyard Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14111 NE 145th St, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: Honeysuckle, mineral, honey and botrytis aromas lead the way. This drinks off dry with exceptionally well-balanced acidity that carries through the lingering finish.

properties.title: Claar 2013 Ice Wine White Bluffs Vineyards Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1081 Glenwood Rd, Pasco, WA 99301, USA
properties.description: Pear and white flower aromas are light, while the palate is full of sweet brown sugar and honey flavors that persist on the finish. It's sweet, but well balanced, with ample acidity and a clean finish.

properties.title: Columbia Crest 2013 Grand Estates Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 178810 WA-221, Paterson, WA 99345, USA
properties.description: Cocoa, plum and vanilla aromas are followed by creamy-feeling blue-fruit flavors that display a mixture of fruit and barrel. The barrel influence is heavy, but it's delicious all the same.

properties.title: Columbia Crest 2013 Reserve Estate Grown Chardonnay (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 178810 WA-221, Paterson, WA 99345, USA
properties.description: This wine was aged 15 months sur lee in all-new French oak. The barrel aromas and flavors are in the lead, with notes of vanilla, butterscotch and spice followed by pear. It's creamy in feel but with an elegant styling.

properties.title: Raymond 2012 Generations Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1584 St Helena Hwy: MAIN ENTRANCE 849 Zinfandel Ln: TRUCK ENTRANCE, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: A blend of 97% Cabernet Sauvignon and 8% Petit Verdot, this wine speaks to power, offering juicy, velvety texture around brawny components of leather, coffee and black plum. Concentrated and intense, it needs time to open in the glass before pairing with thick cuts of meat.

properties.title: Rodney Strong 2014 Charlotte's Home Estate Vineyards Sauvignon Blanc (Northern Sonoma)
properties.address: 11455 Old Redwood Hwy, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Pineapple appears first on the nose and palate, followed by high-toned acidity and a back-up of lemon and lime. Medium bodied, the wine remains light and crisp throughout, finishing in a swirl of lemon zest and grapefruit pith.

properties.title: Sarah's Vineyard 2013 Cote de Madonne Blanc White (Santa Clara Valley)
properties.address: 1204 W Steels Corners Rd, Cuyahoga Falls, OH 44223, USA
properties.description: This blend of Roussanne, Viognier, Marsanne and Grenache Blanc has a serious line of minerality apparent on the nose as well as pear blossom, pineapple-guava skin and a dairy tang. The palate clings to Meyer lemon pith and Greek yogurt flavors.

properties.title: Wente 2013 Louis Mel Sauvignon Blanc (San Francisco Bay-Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 5565 Tesla Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.description: Flinty, mineral-like aromas and flavors lend a complex personality to this compelling, medium-bodied wine. The palate is crisp, dry and citrus-driven, inviting another sip and begging for some fresh-shucked oysters.

properties.title: Luretta 2011 I Nani e le Ballerine Sauvignon (Colli Piacentini)
properties.address: Castello di Momeliano, 29010 Gazzola PC, Italy
properties.description: Made with organically-farmed fruit, here's a warm climate Sauvignon (its name translates as “the dwarfs and the ballerinas”) that shows heavy aromas of honeysuckle, exotic fruit, candied apricot and lemon curd. There's a waxy texture in the mouth followed by more yellow-fruit flavors.

properties.title: Matchbook 2011 Old Head Chardonnay (Dunnigan Hills)
properties.address: 12300 County Rd 92B, Zamora, CA 95698, USA
properties.description: A great value Chardonnay, full of big green apple flavor, that's well-made and not overly complicated. With some texture and just enough heft, have it mid-week with lemony chicken.

properties.title: Mayacamas 2011 Sauvignon Blanc (Mount Veeder)
properties.address: 1155 Lokoya Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Tastes like the grapes really struggled to get ripe in this chilly vintage. The wine is bone dry and tantalizing in acidity, with green flavors of chlorophyll and gooseberry that just manage to veer into Meyer lemons. Difficult on its own, but gains a few  points for elegance and a clean, steely minerality.

properties.title: Vitiano 2012 Rosato (Umbria)
properties.address: 36101 Glen Oaks Rd D, Temecula, CA 92592, USA
properties.description: Here's a beautifully colored rosato made from a blend of Merlot, Cabernet, Sangiovese and Aleatico. The bouquet is bright and deeply floral with rose and honeysuckle backed by forest fruit and wild strawberry. The wine shows depth in the mouth with a touch of soft fruitiness on the finish.

properties.title: V&N; Cellars 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (Cariñena)
properties.address: Eight Street Shopping Center, 1205 W 8th St, Coffeyville, KS 67337, USA
properties.description: Leathery, stalky berry aromas are a bit rustic, and so is the feel. But the flavors on this Cabernet from Cariñena are satisfying and forward, suggesting stewed plum, baked berry and sun-drenched warmth. This is almost cooked but it pulls back. At six years of age it is what it is; drink now.

properties.title: Nittnaus Hans und Christine 2012 Obere Wies Sauvignon Blanc (Burgenland)
properties.address: Untere Hauptstraße 49, 7122 Gols, Austria
properties.description: Ripe, tropical fruit Sauvignon Blanc from vines close to the Neusiedlersee lake. The wine has peach and pineapple flavors that are counterbalance by a more herbal, grassy back taste. Because it is so young, it does need a few more months in bottle. Screwcap.

properties.title: Serra da Estrela 2011 Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.address: Sítio Moinhos da Serra, 1 Estrada Gouveia-Nabais, 6290-411 São Paio, Portugal
properties.description: Peach and melon aromas are holding onto their freshness, while the palate shows a soft side and modest acidity. Tropical flavors of mango, melon and pineapple finish with nectarine notes and a touch of bitter peach pit. Drink as soon as possible.

properties.title: Six Sigma Ranch 2009 Else's Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Lake County)
properties.address: 13372 Spruce Grove Rd, Lower Lake, CA 95457, USA
properties.description: This is an austere, leathery Cabernet with smooth tannins that will take time to move beyond its more earthy, herbal components and share its blackberry fruit. Pair with a steak in the meantime, preferably in a blackberry reduction sauce, which might coax out more of the wine's flavor.

properties.title: Stag's Leap Wine Cellars 2011 KARIA Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 5766 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: This big-production wine from Stag's Leap hits all the popular Chardonnay buttons. It's soft and sweet, with orange and pineapple jam, buttercream, vanilla and toast flavors, brightened by crisp acidity. The grapes come from the cooler, southern parts of the valley.

properties.title: Casas del Bosque 2011 Reserva Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: Hijuelas Nº 2 Ex Fundo - Sta Rosa, Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.description: While this Chardonnay is tropical and sweet as a whole, it's also an honest reflection of Casablanca. Aromas of honeyed apple, toast and peach are friendly, while the palate feels round and resiny, with solid core acidity. Apple, sweet melon, honey and toast flavors precede a finish where oak rises up and vies with residual tropical notes.

properties.title: Château de Calavon 2009 La Réserve Red (Coteaux d'Aix-en-Provence)
properties.address: 12 Av. de Badonviller, 13410 Lambesc, France
properties.description: Spicy, minty, wood-aged wine that shows more wood than fruit. It does have a rich character from black plum and berry flavors so the wine will become better integrated. So wait for 2–3 years.

properties.title: Château la Mascaronne 2009 La Mascaronne Red (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: RN 7 La Mascarone, 83340 Le Luc, France
properties.description: Rich and dense, this is a ripe, wood-aged wine, now showing maturity. It has weight, red berry fruits and a firmer structure of tannins. It is ready to drink, but could age another year.

properties.title: Château Larroque 2012  Bordeaux Blanc
properties.address: A Larroque, 32390 Sainte-Christie, France
properties.description: Rounded wine, showing ripe tropical flavors as well as a more citrus character. The wine is full, attractively textured with a buttery edge. Spice and green herbs come through to finish. Screwcap.

properties.title: Château Thuerry 2012 Le Château Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: Chemin Thuerry, 83690 Villecroze, France
properties.description: Light and fruity, with a touch of pepper and spice, this is a immediately attractive, red-fruited wine. It has enough crisp freshness as well as richness to go with food. The aftertaste emphasizes both spice and fruit.

properties.title: Concha y Toro 2011 Terrunyo Costa Los Boldos Vineyard Block 6 Riesling (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: Av. Virginia Subercaseaux 210, Pirque, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: This first-time Riesling from CyT delivers petrol/diesel aromas along with mild apple and peach scents on what amounts to a true, varietal nose. The palate has a punch-like, juicy feel that's fresh but light, while tropical flavors of lychee and mango end juicy but with weight.

properties.title: Von Schleinitz 2013 Weissenberg Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Kirchstraße 15-17, 56330 Kobern-Gondorf, Germany
properties.description: Dusty mineral and wet stones lend savory accents to freshly pressed apple and pear flavors in this lively off-dry Riesling. Lemony acidity feels punchy and spry on the palate, leading a refreshingly crisp finish. Drink now through 2017.

properties.title: Yalumba 2013 The Y Series Cabernet Sauvignon (South Australia)
properties.address: 40 Eden Valley Rd, Angaston SA 5353, Australia
properties.description: This isn't the biggest, baddest Cabernet. Instead, it's more of a charmer—lithe and crisp. Cherries and dried herbs on the nose add hints of earth and pepper on the palate, then finish with a gentle wash of dusty tannins. Drink now–2018.

properties.title: Bowers Harbor 2014 Block II & Langley Riesling (Old Mission Peninsula)
properties.address: 2896 Bowers Harbor Rd, Traverse City, MI 49686, USA
properties.description: While the nose is focused on delicate lemon, apple and talc aromas, the juicy palate brings peach and crunchy red apple-skin flavors. Off dry in style, with vibrant acidity, this is a well-balanced offering from this northern Michigan producer.

properties.title: Caldaro 2014 Vial Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Kellereistraße, 12, 39052 Kaltern, Autonome Provinz Bozen - Südtirol, Italy
properties.description: Crushed rock, orchard fruit and a dash of oak emerge on this linear white. On the palate, crisp acidity supports Anjou pear, yellow apple and almond while a mineral note backs up the finish.

properties.title: Caminhos Cruzados 2014 Titular Encruzado (Dão)
properties.address: R. de Carvalhal 50, 3520-011 Nelas, Portugal
properties.description: The Dão's great white grape has produced a deliciously perfumed wine. It is fresh with pink grapefruit and crisp apples that are filled out with spice and toast from the wood aging. It is tight and mineral in texture and will benefit from a few more months before drinking. Wait until late 2016.

properties.title: Cantina Valle Isarco 2014 Aristos Kerner (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Loc, Leitach Coste, 50, 39043 Chiusa BZ, Italy
properties.description: Strong scents of yellow stone fruit, grapefruit and a touch of light baking spice open on the nose. The full-bodied palate shows apricot, yellow peach, mineral and a hint of nutmeg alongside lively acidity that leaves a tangy finish.

properties.title: Castello di Buttrio 2011 Torre Butria Riserva White (Friuli Colli Orientali)
properties.address: Via del Pozzo, 5, 33042 Buttrio UD, Italy
properties.description: Made with Friulano, Chardonnay and Sauvignon, this offers scents of wildflower, beeswax and ripe orchard fruit. The structured palate offers bitter almond, yellow apple skin, acacia honey and mineral. It still has fresh acidity but drink soon to capture the remaining fruit richness.

properties.title: Comelli 2014 Friulano (Friuli Colli Orientali)
properties.address: Largo Armando Diaz, 8, 33045 Nimis UD, Italy
properties.description: Delicate scents of white spring flower and orchard fruit waft out of the glass. The bright, round palate offers Bosc pear and white peach while a pleasant note of bitter almond rounds off the finish.

properties.title: David Frost 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Western Cape)
properties.description: This is a solid, jammy red that offers forward notes of black plum, cherry and berry. The medium-weight mouthfeel is direct and attractive, as the juicy black-fruit flavors are complemented by moderate tannins and balanced alcohol. A well-done and immediately accessible selection to enjoy now.

properties.title: Del Rio 2014 Estate Grown Viognier (Rogue Valley)
properties.address: 52 N River Rd, Gold Hill, OR 97525, USA
properties.description: Full and fruity, this has the ripeness to feel fleshy and lush, with a pleasant mix of pear, apple and peach flavors. Light touches of brioche and cinnamon add interest to the finish.

properties.title: Gradis'ciutta 2014 Pinot Grigio (Collio)
properties.address: Località Giasbana, 32/A, 34070 San Floriano del Collio GO, Italy
properties.description: Fresh and balanced, this offers aromas of Spanish Broom, pear and a whiff of flint. The elegant, linear palate delivers crisp apple, nectarine zest and a mineral note alongside bracing acidity.

properties.title: Karl Kaspar 2014 Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: 393 W Warner Rd Ste. 109, Chandler, AZ 85225, USA
properties.description: Lemon and white grapefruit flavors shine brightly in this off-dry Riesling quaffer. It's fresh and fruity but balanced vibrantly by zesty lime acidity. Drink now.

properties.title: Adega Mãe 2014 White (Lisboa)
properties.address: Estrada Municipal 554, 2565-841, Portugal
properties.description: Found more often (although still rarely) in the Douro, the Viosinho is distinguished by its high acidity. In the coastal climate of Lisboa, that steely character is still there. It should calm down a little over the next few months and fill out with the apple fruit flavors that are just hints at present. Drink from late 2016.

properties.title: Alessio Komjanc 2014 Friulano (Collio)
properties.address: Località Giasbana, 35, 34070 San Floriano del Collio GO, Italy
properties.description: Yellow wildflower, white stone fruit and crushed rock aromas lead the nose while the lively palate offers mineral, almond and yellow apple. It's vibrant, with bright acidity.

properties.title: Alois Lageder 2014 Lehen Sauvignon (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Grafengasse, 9, 39040 Margreid an der Weinstraße, Autonome Provinz Bozen - Südtirol, Italy
properties.description: The nose isn't overly expressive but eventually reveals suggestions of tropical fruit, chopped herb and a whiff of stone. The straightforward, slender palate offers grapefruit, a hint of peach and mineral accompanied by crisp acidity.

properties.title: Alois Lageder 2014 Müller-Thurgau (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)
properties.address: Grafengasse, 9, 39040 Margreid an der Weinstraße, Autonome Provinz Bozen - Südtirol, Italy
properties.description: Light and vibrant, this opens with aromas of fragrant spring flower, stone fruit and a suggestion of nutmeg. The palate offers white peach, apple and a hint of almond alongside crisp acidity.

properties.title: Borgo Conventi 2014 Sauvignon (Collio)
properties.address: Via Contessa Beretta, 19, 34072 Farra D'isonzo GO, Italy
properties.description: Aromas of hay, tomato leaf and medicinal herb lead the nose and follow over to the racy palate together with grapefruit, lemon drop and mineral. It's linear, with bracing acidity.

properties.title: Bürgermeister Willi Schweinhardt 2014 Rothenberg Riesling (Nahe)
properties.address: Heddesheimer Str. 1, 55450 Langenlonsheim, Germany
properties.description: While the nose is a bit subdued, suggesting bruised apple and herb notes, the palate of this spry, off-dry Riesling is fresh, fruity and elegant. Crisp white peach and grapefruit flavors are lively and tart, finishing with a refreshing green herb note. Drink now through 2018.

properties.title: Merotto 2014 Colbello Extra Dry  (Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)
properties.address: Via Scandolera, 21, 31010 Farra di Soligo TV, Italy
properties.description: Delicate aromas of spring flowers and white stone fruit lead the nose. The palate offers crisp green apple, yellow pear and creamy white peach alongside refreshing acidity and a foaming mousse.

properties.title: Real Companhia Velha 2014 Quinta de Cidrô Chardonnay (Duriense)
properties.address: 4431-952, R. Azevedo Magalhães 314, 4431-952 Vila Nova de Gaia, Portugal
properties.description: This oak-fermented wine may have little connection to the Douro, but it is a full, ripe and tropical-fruit flavored. The toast is only perceptible in the smooth creaminess of the texture while acidity and a crisp lemon edge give the wine an attractive final lift. Drink from late 2016.

properties.title: Anier 2014 Vendimia Seleccionada Verdejo (Rueda)
properties.description: Pungent aromas of nettle, grapefruit and green herbs are true to Rueda and Verdejo. This feels tight and minerally, almost to the point of seeming raw. Nettle, lime and scallion flavors are tangy, citric and lightly pickled on the finish.

properties.title: Bellenda 2014 Miraval  (Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)
properties.address: Via G. Giardino, 90, 31029 Vittorio Veneto TV, Italy
properties.description: This offers subdued aromas of white spring flowers, citrus and orchard fruit. The bright, creamy palate offers tart green apple and lime alongside vibrant acidity and a soft, frothy mousse.

properties.title: Bishop's Peak 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: Bishop Peak, San Luis Obispo, CA 93405, USA
properties.description: This wine, made as the second label under the very reliable Talley Vineyards, is a solid purchase, offering black currant and herb-crusted roast pork aromas on the savory nose. It's juicy while smoky once sipped, with nice herbal touches that last deep into the finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Chassenay d'Arce 2005 Blanc de Blancs Millésimé Brut Chardonnay (Champagne)
properties.address: 11 Rue du Pressoir, 10110 Ville-sur-Arce, France
properties.description: A soft style of Blanc de Blancs, rounded as much as crisp, this is an attractively ripe and fruity wine. Apple and grapefruit flavors are filled out with perfumed acidity and a lively, fresh aftertaste. Drink now.

properties.title: Château de Chatelard 2014 Cuvée Secret de  (Beaujolais Blanc)
properties.address: 307 Le Châtelard, 69220 Lancié, France
properties.description: This is a fragrant, ripe wine that while delicious to drink now really does need a few months aging. Fruity with apples, lime and green-plum flavors it also has a fine texture that gives structure and will allow the potential richness to develop. Drink from late 2016.

properties.title: DeMorgenzon 2014 DMZ Sauvignon Blanc (Western Cape)
properties.address: Stellenbosch Kloof Rd, Stellenbosch, 7599, South Africa
properties.description: This is an easy, clean and direct Sauvy, with fresh notes of lime, tart gooseberry and green plum on the nose and mouth. The palate is lively and bright, finishing mouthwatering and refreshing. Drink now.

properties.title: Do Ferreiro 2013 Rebisaca Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.address: 192 Grand St, New York, NY 10013, USA
properties.description: Slightly oily, mature aromas of apple and peach break up quickly. This single-vineyard Albariño feels lean and narrow. Citrusy flavors of tangerine and grapefruit finish racy and zesty. Drink now.

properties.title: Domaine du Clos du Fief 2014 Fleur de  (Beaujolais-Villages)
properties.address: Rue du gamay, 69840 Juliénas, France
properties.description: Grown in the far north of Beaujolais, almost in Burgundy's Mâcon region, this full and ripe Chardonnay is full of spice and toast as well as rich yellow fruits. It is still young, with intense citrus flavors, so wait to drink until 2016.

properties.title: Espaço Rural 2013 Dornas Branco White (Alentejano)
properties.address: 1000 Ranch Rd 1623, Stonewall, TX 78671, USA
properties.description: This is a delicious wine full of ripe fruit tones. It is richly textured while keeping plenty of freshness from the Antão Vaz that dominates the blend. It has a firm mineral background that gives structure. The finish brings a zippy orange zest note.

properties.title: Cass 2005 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 7350 Linne Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Cass has been focusing on Bordeaux reds in Paso Robles; their Cab Franc has been very good, and this Cabernet Sauvignon is better. It shows its warm origins in very ripe fruit flavors of blackberries, currants and chocolate, but the structure is enlivened with fine acidity and rich, dusty tannins. Delicious and dry, it shows an elegance that makes it irresistible.

properties.title: Twisted Oak 2006 %@#$! White (Sierra Foothills)
properties.address: 4280 Red Hill Rd, Vallecito, CA 95251, USA
properties.description: The honeyed aroma of this Rhône blend of Marsanne, Roussanne, Rolle and Viognier makes it immediately attractive, but then the flavors kick in, and it turns into a roller coaster ride. Apricot jam, peaches, pears, pineapples, butter-sautéed plaintain, vanilla custard, star anise, lemon crème brûlée, the list goes on and on. The finish is fully dry and the alcohol is refreshingly low. Drink now.

properties.title: Marega 2003 Holbar Bianco White (Friuli)
properties.address: Località Marega, 4, 37022 Fumane VR, Italy
properties.description: Here's an intense, slightly oxidized, 80-20 blend of Riesling and Chard that is redolent of apple, pear, pine nut, resin and maple syrup. The wine has loads of personality and complexity and is very unique in a non-commercial way. The word Holbar refers to the acacia wood casks used to age the wine.

properties.title: Clos Saint-Joseph 2004 Villars-sur-Var Red (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: 168 Le Savel, 06710 Villars-sur-Var, France
properties.description: This is an unusually elegant wine for Provence, from a tiny, isolated vineyard in the maritime Alps. It's a blend of Grenache, Syrah and Mourvèdre, that's gently extracted, crimson in color and filled with intricate, delicate fragrances and flavors, ranging from violets and a hint of iodine to red cherries and maybe even a touch of apricot. Drink now and over the next few years.

properties.title: Domaine Sorin 2007 Terra Amata Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: 1617 Rte de la Cadière, 83270 Saint-Cyr-sur-Mer, France
properties.description: More complex and richly textured than most Provençal rosés, this wine is a treat, from its mineral-laden, smoky aromas to its ripe cherry-berry flavors and layered finish. Drink now, although it has enough stuffing to suggest it might last longer than just a single summer.

properties.title: Elyse 2005 Naggiar Vineyard C'est si Bon Red (Sierra Foothills)
properties.address: 2100 Hoffman Ln, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Napa-based Elyse is better known for their Cabernet Sauvignon, but they have reached into Nevada County, in the Sierra Foothills, for this lovely Rhône-style blend. It's soft in acidity and the tannins are melted, as you might expect from a warm-to-hot region. But the flavors are plush in jammy cherries, black raspberries, chocolate and crushed black pepper.

properties.title: Bernardus 2006 Chardonnay (Monterey County)
properties.address: 5 W Carmel Valley Rd, Carmel Valley, CA 93924, USA
properties.description: Dry and flinty, with flavors of grilled pineapples, peaches, pears and roasted hazelnuts, this wine has a stony, minerally taste. Santa Lucia Highlands and Arroyo Seco fruit are well represented in this stylish wine.

properties.title: Casa de Santar 2006 Reserva White (Dão)
properties.address: 3520-127 Santar, Portugal
properties.description: Ripe, soft wine that has good dense fruit flavors as well as richness. There is some new wood, but the wine remains elusive, perhaps still young. On the palate, the wood spice is still dominant, with only the acidity hinting at the fruit.

properties.title: Waters 2005 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 52015 Seven Hills Rd, Milton-Freewater, OR 97862, USA
properties.description: This is 100% Cabernet Sauvignon, sourced mostly from Pepper Bridge and Spofford Station. It has steely aromatics, showing rock and tight, tart red currant flavors. In the Waters style this is another elegant wine, that conceals its discreet pleasures in its layered aromas and mixed fruit and rock flavors.

properties.title: Rideau 2014 Estate Rosé (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 1562 Alamo Pintado Rd, Solvang, CA 93463, USA
properties.description: Lightly mauve in color, this rosé blend of 51% Syrah, 21% Grenache and 28% Mourvèdre shows ripe watermelon, bubblegum and strawberry on the juicy nose. The palate is quite restrained for such a ripe nose and deep color, but ripe plums emerge alongside graphite minerality and a pithy grip.

properties.title: Robert Young 2012 Chardonnay (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 5102 Red Winery Rd, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.description: Crisp apple and lemon mark this wine, from a legend of Alexander Valley and California Chardonnay. Oaky caramel and toast dominate on the midpalate, before a significant amount of fennel comes into play on the finish.

properties.title: Santa Ema 2013 Amplus Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Izaga 1096, Isla de Maipo, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: Plum and raspberry aromas are herbal and slightly grassy. On the tongue, wiry acidity feels citric. Flavors of red plum, spiced cherry, tomato and herbs ride a road of choppy acidity and rough tannins to a bold finish. Drink through 2020.

properties.title: Sextant 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 2324 CA-46, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Concentrated strawberry and plum blossom aromas are boosted with iron and a touch of oak smoke on the nose of this bottling by winemaker Steve Martell. The palate shows ripe red currant, woody elderberry brush and a shred of asphalt.

properties.title: Stephen Vincent 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (North Coast)
properties.address: 7 4th St #59, Petaluma, CA 94952, USA
properties.description: The aromas of this full-bodied, dry and sophisticated wine show black olive, light smoke and oak. The palate brings flavors of dark cherries and a touch of dark chocolate, with firm tannins offering a pleasing texture.

properties.title: Valle Hermoso 2013 Elegido Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: E-639 18, Panquehue, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.description: Direct, woody aromas of cherry, raspberry and minerally crispness set up a medium-bodied palate housing round tannins. Ripe, loamy flavors of mixed berries exhibit a touch of raisin, which carries over to a peppery, blackened finish.

properties.title: Willm 2014 Réserve Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 12526 SW Bank Rd, Vashon, WA 98070, USA
properties.description: Notes of candied mandarins steal their way into this fresh, fruity and blossom-scented wine—think apricot, tangerine and jasmine. The charm is easy here, and all is held on the fruity, perfumed side. This is playful, fruit-driven fun.

properties.title: Nardello 2013 Vigna Turbian  (Soave Classico)
properties.address: Via IV Novembre, 56, 37032 Monteforte d'Alpone VR, Italy
properties.description: Aromas of acacia flower, fresh stone fruit and nut all come together in the glass. The juicy palate offers up white peach, green apple and a citrus note while crisp acidity provides support. Mineral and white almond notes delineate the finish.

properties.title: Seifried 2014 Riesling (Nelson)
properties.address: 168 Redwood Road, Appleby 7081, New Zealand
properties.description: Seyfried always seems to do well with aromatic varieties, perhaps because of the family's Germanic roots. This Riesling includes a hint of honey on the nose, plus melon and pear fruit and a lingering hint of gingery spice on the finish.

properties.title: Black Stallion 2013 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 4089 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: An opening of toasty caramel gives this wine a full-bodied weightiness and inviting richness on the nose and palate, offering a roundness of vanilla and peach along the way. Full and ripe, it finishes in a lift of balanced acidity.

properties.title: Château de Lancyre 2013 Domaine de Lancyre Val de Monteferrand Roussanne (Saint Guilhem le Désert)
properties.address: Castle Lancyre Wines in Pic Saint Loup, Ham. de Lancyre, 34270 Valflaunès, France
properties.description: Ripe scents of pineapple, peach, lychee and melon are laced with hints of honey and orange oil. The palate is lush and mouthfilling, with rich stone- and tropical-fruit flavors that transition into a subtle spice note on the close. Drink now.

properties.title: Nickel & Nickel 2013 State Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon (Yountville)
properties.address: 212 S Main St Suite 100, Fort Worth, TX 76104, USA
properties.description: From one of the cooler sites sourced by the producer, this wine is remarkably rich and foreboding, sultry in chalky tannin and lingering blueberry and blackberry notes. Deeply satisfying and complex, it's structured and firm, with a sizable presence of toasty oak and a jolt of dark-roast coffee at the end.

properties.title: Dr. Loosen 2014 Wehlener Sonnenuhr Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: A crush of mineral notes on the nose lend earthy dimension to this buoyantly ripe, fruity auslese. Layers of sweet mango, pineapple and guava abound on the palate, off set by a spine tingling spray of lime. It's decadent yet balanced, with a long, irresistibly clingy finish. Ready to drink now but it will shine for decades to come.

properties.title: Robert Oatley 2011 The Pennant Hand Selected Limited Release Chardonnay (Margaret River)
properties.address: 3/100 Pacific Hwy, St Leonards NSW 2065, Australia
properties.description: Nearing maturity, this is a full-bodied, rich Chardonnay despite weighing in at only 12.5% abv. Scents of custard-meringue pie become more pungent and savory with air, adding hints of roasted mushrooms, smoke and maybe even some bacon fat. The flavors are savory yet the fruit remains, culminating in a long, ripe-citrus finish.

properties.title: Karl Schaefer 2014 Unsteiner Herrenberg GG Dry Riesling (Pfalz)
properties.description: A pleasantly savory touch of earth and nut on the nose lends complexity to this lusciously citrusy dry wine. Fresh white grapefruit, lemon and lime flavors are penetrating on the palate, glazed by a luminous sheen of crushed minerals and cutting acidity. Light bodied yet rippling in texture, it's a deeply satisfying Riesling to enjoy now through at least 2030.

properties.title: Jarvis 2014 Estate Grown Cave Fermented Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2970 Monticello Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: From estate grapes aged nine months in 100% new French oak, this features toasted wood that speaks in hushed undertones beneath a wealth of tangy stone fruit, baked pear and pineapple. Enjoyable now, it has a voluptuous richness on the midpalate that meets more nuanced acidity as it washes down.

properties.title: Domaine Serene 2014 Côte Sud Vineyard Chardonnay (Dundee Hills)
properties.address: 6555 NE Hilltop Ln, Dayton, OR 97114, USA
properties.description: This Dijon clone fruit, barrel fermented and aged on the lees, delivers a wine of exceptional concentration and intensity. Deeply fruity, with a lush mix of apple, pear and peach, it also brings flashy barrel flavors and impressive length. The persistent, tightly wound finish bodes well for further aging. Drink now through 2028.

properties.title: Davies 2013 Winfield Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Calistoga)
properties.address: 1210 Grayson Ave, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Winfield is up-valley in Calistoga, on the lower slopes of Mount St. Helena, where volcanic soils rule. Rich and grippy, this beautiful wine is savory and elegantly bold, a mix of black pepper, leather saddle and blackberry compote, its concentration complemented by streaks of acidity and lurking freshness. It should do well in the cellar for the patient who can painfully wait.

properties.title: Reichsgraf von Kesselstatt 2015 Braunberger Juffer-Sonnenuhr Spätlese Grosse Lage Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: Tart lime and gooseberry aromas turn plush and plump on the palate of this lip-smackingly ripe spätlese. Apricot and yellow peach flavors penetrate deeply, catapulted by shards of lemon-lime acidity. It's breathlessly light in body, yet lingers long, leaving airy kisses of blossom and fresh herb in its wake. Irresistible already but should improve through 2025.

properties.title: Johannishof 2015 Johannisberger Klaus Spätlese Riesling (Rheingau)
properties.address: Grund 63, 65366 Geisenheim, Germany
properties.description: Light as a feather yet bold in fruit, this sprightly spätlese packs a punch of sweet, ripe apricot, peach and even raspberry flavors. Spine tingling grapefruit acidity lends vitality, guiding a breathlessly perfumed, floral finish. It's a thrilling, irresistible wine.

properties.title: Walt 2014 Bob's Ranch Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 380 1st St W, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.description: Bob's is the producer's estate vineyard, acquired in 2014, a foggy site near the Petaluma Gap. Here, it allows for fleshy flavors of pear, brioche and honey, offering ripeness within a classic structure of minerality. Intense in tension and body, it has a dark color and a lingering tease of honeycomb.

properties.title: EnRoute 2014 Brumaire Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 1350 Acacia Dr, Oakville, CA 94562, USA
properties.description: From a selection of vineyards influenced heavily by fog, this wine shines in fleshy, expansive stone fruit and brightly integrated flavors of apple and pear. With a focused, velvety and juicy texture, it retains plenty of balance against a backdrop of elegant richness.

properties.title: Galerie 2015 Equitem Sauvignon Blanc (Knights Valley)
properties.address: 12557 Steiner Rd, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.description: A mineral-driven white, this is waxy and lemony on the palate. Light bodied, crisp and vibrant, it doesn't hold back on complexity, weaving a lengthy story of perfumed near-perfection.

properties.title: Brecon Estate 2014 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 7450 Vineyard Dr, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Dark blackberry, blueberry and blackcurrant fruits make for a ripe but extremely enticing nose on this bottling, lifted by aromas of vanilla, cola, clove and anise. The palate is delicious and rich with black cherry, but a zesty, bright acidity and chalky tannins contribute depth and length, with a touch of dill.

properties.title: Senses 2013 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
properties.description: This dry wine has a nice sense of reserve along with subtle lemony, earthy and milky flavors that linger on the finish. The texture has a nip of acidity and the body is light to medium.

properties.title: Siegel 2013 Crucero Collection Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: I-352 1360, Palmilla, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: Black cherry and cassis aromas include notes of tree bark, rooty spices and animal hide. This feels juicy and alert, while toasty black-fruit flavors are mild. Blackened, peppery notes are unchecked on the energetic finish.

properties.title: Soléna 2010 Klipsun Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 17096 NE Woodland Loop Rd, Yamhill, OR 97148, USA
properties.description: Coming from the cool 2010 vintage, this wine seems a bit overwrought, with aromas of stewed herbs and cherry. The flavors are full bodied, backed by chewy tannins.

properties.title: Wise Villa 2012 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Sierra Foothills)
properties.address: 4200 Wise Rd, Lincoln, CA 95648, USA
properties.description: Bright, crisp red cherry and blackberry flavors drive a refreshing, fruity personality. Touches of nutmeg and vanilla show through, but this is not an oaky wine by any means. It will please a crowd and pair well with a wide variety of foods.

properties.title: Union de Vignerons de l'Île de Beauté 2014 Domaine Petroni Rosé (Corse)
properties.winery: Union de Vignerons de l'Île de Beauté
properties.address: 21 Padulone, 20270 Aléria, France
properties.description: This attractive and fruity wine blends Niellucciu with Sciacerellu, both local Corsican grapes. The freshness is right there, crisp and hinting at red currant flavors and bright acidity. Drink now.

properties.title: Vigilance 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Hills Lake County)
properties.address: 13888 Point Lakeview Rd, Lower Lake, CA 95457, USA
properties.description: Light, spicy aromas like vanilla and nutmeg and ripe, full blackberry and cherry flavors come with a soft texture and almost sweet balance. This has lots of flavor with medium body and without drying tannins and acidity. The winemaker blended in 10% Syrah and 5% Petite Sirah.

properties.title: Château des Séraphin 2014 Red (Côtes du Rhône)
properties.address: 271 Chem. de la Rayalette, 30390 Domazan, France
properties.description: An easy-drinking Côtes du Rhône, this isn't particularly intense but is harmonious from start to finish. Hints of garrigue accent black cherry and plum fruit, while the texture is silky.

properties.title: Château Les Bertrands 2014 Cuvée Prestige  (Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux)
properties.address: 7 Les Bertrands-Nord, 33860 Reignac, France
properties.description: This 100% Sauvignon Blanc with six months in French oak is fresh with attractive fruitiness and light acidity. It has spice, a touch of toast and full yellow fruits. The aftertaste brings in a more citrus character that lets the wine finish with freshness. Drink now. Laurent Dubois is the family's ninth generation at this northern Gironde property.

properties.title: Château les Charmes Godard 2014  Francs Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.address: 1025 York Rd, St. Davids, ON L0S 1P0, Canada
properties.description: This is a tight, mineral-driven wine with fresh acidity and a crisp character. Sémillon dominated, it conveys green fruits, bright acidity and a lively, tangy aftertaste. The wine is refreshing, fruity and ready to drink. Nicolas Thienpont and his brothers bought this 16-acre property in 1988.

properties.title: Corley 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 4242 Big Ranch Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: From a notoriously tough vintage for the region, this wine shows gravel, turned earth, black olive, char and a bit of blackberry ripeness. It's lean on the palate, with flavors of tobacco, rustic elderberry and charred meats, exhibiting tannins that still need some chilling out.

properties.title: Ribafreixo 2016 Pato Frio Antão Vaz (Alentejo)
properties.address: 7960 Vidigueira, Portugal
properties.description: This lively, fruity wine has soft apple flavors and refreshing acidity. A zesty backdrop to the fruitiness gives a light texture. The wine, which comes from one of the cooler regions of Alentejo, is ready to drink.

properties.title: Saget la Perrière 2015 Domaine de la Perrière  (Sancerre)
properties.address: Rue de Charenton, 58150 Pouilly-sur-Loire, France
properties.description: Although this producer is based in Pouilly-sur-Loire, across the Loire, it also has vines in Sancerre. This attractive crisp wine has herbal hints and bright apple and citrus fruit. Drink now.

properties.title: Stemmari 2015 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sicilia)
properties.address: 2321 US-22 West, Union, NJ 07083, USA
properties.description: This 100% Cabernet Sauvignon smells of cassis, underbrush and vanilla. It's easygoing and made to be enjoyed young, its black currant, licorice and cinnamon flavors smoothed with round tannins.

properties.title: Verum 2016 Chardonnay (Alto Valle del Río Negro)
properties.description: Apple aromas set up a chunky palate that tastes of lightly oxidized apple and peach. It finishes solid but basic.

properties.title: Becker 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Texas)
properties.address: 307 US-87, Fredericksburg, TX 78624, USA
properties.description: Aromas and flavors of blackberry, pomegranate, leather and cedar are warmed by baking spice and bitter chocolate on the palate. The tannins are firm and lend plenty of structure. Cedar and tobacco prevail on the finish, with a touch of warmth.

properties.title: Nicolas Millet 2016 Champ Secret Rosé (Sancerre)
properties.address: 68 Rue Saint-Vincent, 18300 Bue, France
properties.description: There is a caramel edge to this ripe wine with its strawberry fruits. It has spice and flavors of vanilla along with the crisp aftertaste of acidity. Drink this Pinot Noir-based wine now.

properties.title: Quinta da Lapa 2016 Selection Branco White (Tejo)
properties.address: Rua 25 de Abril, 2065-360 Manique do Intendente, Portugal
properties.description: This soft and smooth wine offers a creamy texture over youthful acidity. The blend contains Trincadeira das Pratas as well as Fernão Pires and Arinto, giving a crisp, tangy character that will mellow into a softer character in a few months. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Rombauer 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 3522 Silverado Trail N, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: The winery's first wine under screw cap, and only the third vintage of this variety, this has a steely nose and a thick floral layering of sweet peach and vanilla, offering a richness on the midpalate that persists through the finish.

properties.title: Santos & Seixo 2016 Santos da Casa Branco White (Douro)
properties.address: 3333 S Pinnacle Hills Pkwy, Rogers, AR 72758, USA
properties.description: This unoaked, fruity wine is crisp, full of green fruits and lively acidity. It is light and bright, with a touch of Douro minerality to lift the texture. Drink now.

properties.title: Twisted Paso 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3430 Peachy Canyon Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: This deeply colored wine shows plum, blueberry and black currant on the nose, with turned earth and pencil shavings providing depth. It's a bit thin on the sip, despite the chalky, somewhat clunky tannins, and the acidity is quite bright, delivering flavors of dark fruit and herbs.

properties.title: Wines & Winemakers 2016 Monte de Baía Rosé (Península de Setúbal)
properties.address: 701 W 11th St, Coffeyville, KS 67337, USA
properties.description: A crisp, caramel- and red-fruit-flavored blend of Castelão, Touriga Nacional and Syrah, this is ready to drink. Produced at Casa Ermelinda Freitas winery, it has a salty edge from the nearby ocean, finishing with plenty of acidity.

properties.title: Koonara 2016 Emily May Pinot Noir Rosé
properties.address: 44 Church St, Penola SA 5277, Australia
properties.description: This wine combines notes of melon and candied apple with hints of pepper and ginger. Despite its modest alcohol level, it seems weighty, and even a bit sweet, then finishes on a mouthwatering, spicy note.

properties.title: Leonard Kreusch 2016 Weinkellerei Kabinett White (Rheinhessen)
properties.address: Martinerfeld 61, 54294 Trier, Germany
properties.description: Intensely peachy from nose to finish, this sprightly semisweet sip offers loads of juicy fruity enjoyment. It's easy going and slightly candied on the palate but finishes crisply.

properties.title: Antis 2016 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: 11000 Shenandoah Rd, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.description: Earthy aromas of stewed plum and burnt leaves come in front of a drawing, raw palate with fresh acidity. Roasted, savory plum and berry flavors are fairly standard. This wine is dense but still lively on the finish.

properties.title: Herdade do Rocim 2016 Alvarinho (Alentejano)
properties.address: Estrada Nacional 387, 7940-909 Cuba, Portugal
properties.description: When planted south of its home in the northern Vinho Verde region, Alvarinho reveals a softer side. The acidity in this wine is balanced by the warm yellow fruits and open texture. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Messias 2013 Grande Cuvée Brut Millésime Sparkling (Bairrada)
properties.address: Av. Comendador Messias Baptista 56, 3050-361 Mealhada, Portugal
properties.description: Crisp and fruity, this is a bright sparkling wine from a region which specializes in this style. The Bical and Baga grapes allow the wine to sing with perfumed apples and citrus fruits. Chardonnay adds a fuller side. Drink now.

properties.title: Mounts 2014 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 3901 Wine Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: This is a seductive wine, concentrated and full bodied and entirely big. Black cherry, chocolate and blackberry jam ride the palate with authority, as soft tannins wrap around the bold flavor.

properties.title: Patrice Moreux 2015  Sancerre
properties.description: Based in the Pouilly-Fumé area, but with vines in Sancerre, this producer has made a rich wine with a line of steely acidity. The spice and touch of vanilla are balanced by the crisp lemon and gooseberry fruitiness. The wine is ready to drink.

properties.title: Kingman 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Grand Valley)
properties.address: 800 E 64th Ave, Denver, CO 80229, USA
properties.description: Cedar and cigar box are most prominent on the nose, followed by hints of blackberry and currant. The palate boasts cigar box, leather and raw oak with more currant and pomegranate offering levity. Medium tannins lend structure and carry through to the cedar flecked finish.

properties.title: Poças 2016 Poças Reserva Branco White (Douro)
properties.address: R. Visc. das Devesas 168, 4401-901 Vila Nova de Gaia, Portugal
properties.description: A ripe, mineral and richly fruity wine, this is crisp while also having a creamy texture. It is a blend of four of the Douro white grapes, rich and finished with acidity. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Quanta Terra 2014 Terra a Terra Reserva Branco White (Douro)
properties.address: R. da Casa do Douro, 5070-262, Portugal
properties.description: Partially aged in oak, this wine is crisp, juicy and bright with citrus and acidity. Apples and pears come through strongly in this attractive wine that is ready to drink.

properties.title: Quinta da Alorna 2016 Vinho Branco White (Tejo)
properties.address: 2080-187 Almeirim, Portugal
properties.description: This blend of Fernão Pires, Arinto, Sauvignon Blanc and, unusually, Marsanne is ripe, with a deliciously perfumed character. Acidity and bright fruit give crispness that contrasts with the rich texture. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Rodney Strong 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Knights Valley)
properties.address: 11455 Old Redwood Hwy, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: With 7% Malbec, this hearty red is tightly wound in youthful tannins and a smoky cloud of complex flavor. Leathery and earthy, it traffics in plum, blackberry and chocolate, intertwining the rich ripe fruit into a harmonious whole that pleases the palate.

properties.title: Rui Roboredo Madeira 2016 Beyra Branco White (Beira Interior)
properties.address: Parque Industrial do Lameirão, Lote 12, 5130 São João da Pesqueira, Portugal
properties.description: This soft wine is a blend of two local white grapes: Síria and Fonte Cal. Intense acidity and a cool-climate feel from the high- altitude vineyards make this crisp, with grapefruit and lemon flavors. Drink now.

properties.title: Saint Clair 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.address: 30-32 Liverpool Street, Blenheim 7240, New Zealand
