properties.description: This well-made regional blend shows aromas of struck flint, sage notes accent white grapefruit aromas. The flavors follow in a similar vein, picking up hints of red currant and wet stone on the mouthwatering finish. Drink now.

properties.title: St. Christopher 2015 Piesporter Michelsberg Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: Ebulliently fruity and forward, this light-bodied Auslese offers up loads of sweet melon, peach and even berry flavors. It's juicy and crisp, finishing on delicately bristling tannins.

properties.title: The Williamsburg Winery 2015 Petite Fleur White (Virginia)
properties.address: 5800 Wessex Hundred, Williamsburg, VA 23185, USA
properties.description: Lovely aromas of marmalade, orange blossom, peach, honeysuckle and cantaloupe waft from the glass. These notes translate onto the palate, which is viscous and mouthcoating, yet balanced by a lifted acidity that preserves a lingering finish.

properties.title: Bodega Renacer 2014 Punto Final Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: Brandsen 1863, M5509 Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Minty, roasted berry aromas open this well-built Cabernet that's packed with plum, raspberry and wood-spice flavors. There's nothing complicated about this lively, oaky wine that runs long on the finish.

properties.title: Wakefield 2008 Chardonnay (South Australia)
properties.address: 8297 Diagonal 1500 Road, Stuart, OK 74570, USA
properties.description: Wakefield is a reliable producer of Clare Valley wines, and the Chard is no exception. Toasted nuts mingle easily alongside grilled pineapple and peach notes, and the almost plush texture of this wine gives it another dimension. Contains 4% Viognier. Drink now.

properties.title: Nodland 2008 Bebop Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 11616 E Montgomery Dr #69, Spokane Valley, WA 99206, USA
properties.description: This easy-drinking Riesling finishes dry, but still it's relatively soft, with green apple fruit and some spicy skin phenolics. Good balance and gentle persistence through a clean finish.

properties.title: Autonom 2007 Red (California)
properties.description: Rich, soft and fruity, this Syrah, Grenache and Mourvèdre blend is delightful to drink now. It's totally dry, with interesting berry, cherry, smoked meat, black pepper and sandalwood flavors that are deep and long-lasting.

properties.title: Hogue 2009 Pinot Grigio (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: Another fine effort in a continuing series of outstanding PGs from Hogue. This is tart and stylish, loaded with citrus and bracingly acidic. Flavors meld lemon, lime, lemon verbena, orange peel and a slice of pear.

properties.title: Wente 2007 Charles Wetmore Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 5565 Tesla Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.description: Wente continues to impress with fine wines at fair price points, and this 2007 is a case in point, a high-end offering at a still reasonable price. A rich, red Cabernet Sauvignon, with Petite Verdot and Petite Sirah in here, too, it delivers intense flavors of dark, ripe plums and brown sugar, a very agreeable Cabernet that will pair well with rich red meats.

properties.title: Sepp Moser 2008 Breiter Rain Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Kremstal)
properties.address: 3495 Rohrendorf bei Krems, Austria
properties.description: Ripe, rounded, creamy wine, with sweet spice, but still with a reservoir of the freshest acidity. Green apple fruits add crispness, while the wine finishes in a golden afterglow. Screwcap.

properties.title: Novelty Hill 2007 Stillwater Creek Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14710 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: Here is another outstanding Sauvignon Blanc from Novelty Hill—ripe and juicy, showing citrus, mango and pear, laced with cinnamon highlights. Winemaker Mike Januik manages to get the most from these young vines, crafting white wines that are both rich and elegant, retain varietal character, and seduce you with hedonistic detail.

properties.title: Quady 2007 Essensia Orange Muscat (California)
properties.address: 13181 Rd 24, Madera, CA 93637, USA
properties.description: Very sweet, this dessert wine has potent flavors of tangerines, apricots, honey, butterscotch and vanilla. Crisp acidity provides clean balance. Delicious and heady.

properties.title: Dutton-Goldfield 2007 Dutton Ranch-Rued Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 3100 Gravenstein Hwy N, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.description: Marked by dryness and crisp acidity, this Chardonnay has intricate flavors of pineapples, Meyer lemons, Asian pears and sweet, smoky oak, with a fine minerality. Classic and complex, it should develop in the bottle for up to six years.

properties.title: The Grade 2005 Winfield Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1236 Lincoln Ave, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.description: Made in the modern style, this Cab is soft and creamy in the mouth, and fantastically rich. It oozes ripe, crushed blackberries, black currants and dark unsweetened chocolate, with the sweetness coming from natural fruit and caramelized oak. The tannins are as soft and complex as they come.

properties.title: Moletto 2001 Selecti Cabernet Sauvignon (Veneto Orientale)
properties.address: Via del Moletto, 19, 31045 Motta di Livenza TV, Italy
properties.description: This top-end Cabernet from the dynamic Moletto estate delivers impressive intensity and extremely attractive notes of black fruit, toasted spice and black stone. The nose is slightly sweet smelling and the mouthfeel is modern, penetrating, plush and velvety.

properties.title: Whitman Cellars 2008 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 12346 US-290, Fredericksburg, TX 78624, USA
properties.description: This is the first Riesling from Whitman, and it's a beauty. Lovely, inviting aromas mix roses and rocks, leading into fresh, layered, complex fruit flavors of pear, apple, white peach and orange. It's got plenty of acid so the residual sugar is almost undetectable, but the alcohol stays at a Germanic 12.5%. This is so good it makes you wish that winemaker Steve Lessard had been doing Riesling all along.

properties.title: Suacci Carciere Wines 2007 Heintz Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: Comes down on the opposite side of the spectrum from the opulent 2006, a bone-dry, acidic young Chardonnay marked more by minerals than fruit. With citrus, papaya and floral notes and a tang of cold steel, it has a leesy yeastiness that adds complex interest. Compelling, and possibly ageworthy.

properties.title: Bedarra 2007 Reserve Chardonnay (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.description: Strikes an interesting balance between richness and austerity. Will fascinate true connoisseurs for its mineral-laden suggestions of dried lemons and kaffir limes, and the way sweet oak elaborates them. Crisp acidity provides the final balance of mouthwatering tartness. A true Chablis-style Chardonnay, at a fair price.

properties.title: Achaia Clauss 2015 Demestica Semi Dry Rosé (Achaia)
properties.address: Petroto 262 23, Greece
properties.description: This light-bodied wine offers a fruity nose of cherry and raspberry and fresh flavors of strawberry, cherry and a touch of herbs. Balanced but with assertive style, the wine is perfect for spicy cuisine or burgers.

properties.title: Aigner 2016 Sandgrube Grüner Veltliner (Kremstal)
properties.address: Wr. Str. 131, 3500 Krems an der Donau, Austria
properties.description: The nose is shy but a deeper sniff reveals ripe notes of green pear. These also appear on the compact and slender palate, accented by a bright lemon freshness. It's refreshing, clean and bright, and the finish leaves you wanting more.

properties.title: Alma de Cattleya 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 607 Martin Ave Suite 111, Rohnert Park, CA 94928, USA
properties.description: Crisp pear skins, kaffir lime, dewy oregano and underripe honeydew show on the nose of this sprightly bottling. The palate reveals a straightforward, slightly restrained Sauv Blanc, with grass, lime, sliced pear, chilled cherimoya and jasmine flavors.

properties.title: Baily 2013 Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (Temecula Valley)
properties.description: One of Temecula's pioneering vintners, Phil Baily takes his balanced wines seriously. This bottling shows lots of damp earth, black olive, concentrated mulberry, dried herbs and cardamom on the nose. Stewed black-cherry fruit meshes with Indian spice and well-integrated tannins on the palate that is built for aging.

properties.title: Braida di Giacomo Bologna 2015 Vigna Senza Nome  (Moscato d'Asti)
properties.address: Strada Provinciale N. 27, 14030 Rocchetta Tanaro AT, Italy
properties.description: Aromas of yellow stone fruit and chopped Mediterranean herb lead the nose on this fragrant sparkler. The frothy palate doles out juicy yellow peach, mature apricot, thyme and a hint of candied tangerine zest alongside fresh acidity.

properties.title: Château Clos Haut-Peyraguey 2013 Symphonie de Haut-Peyraguey  (Sauternes)
properties.address: 1 Haut Peyraguey, 33210 Bommes, France
properties.description: This is the second wine of Clos Haut-Peyraguey. It comes from a fine Sauternes vintage with a great balance between acidity and rich sweetness. With botrytis, plenty of sweetness, bitter marmalade and apricot fruit and delicious acidity, the wine is almost ready to drink. Just wait until the end of 2017.

properties.title: Château la Genestière 2014 Red (Lirac)
properties.description: A traditional blend of Grenache, Syrah and Mourvèdre, this is a silky, medium-bodied wine. Cinnamon and cedar shadings frame bright cherry fruit and linger through the elegant finish. Drink now–2019.

properties.title: Cosa Obra 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 1607 Mission Dr #112, Solvang, CA 93463, USA
properties.description: Lively acidity wraps itself around fresh notions of grapefruit, gooseberry and peach in this fuller, richer style of white. French oak played a part in both fermentation and aging, adding a luxurious undercurrent of texture and complexity.

properties.title: Devium 2015 French Creek Vineyard Red (Yakima Valley)
properties.description: The inaugural release from this winery from Sleight of Hand Cellars' production winemaker Keith Johnson is a blend of Mourvèdre (90%), Syrah (8%) and Grenache Blanc. Stylistically somewhat unique for Washington, it brings brooding aromas of sauvage, herb, smoked meat and white pepper, along with a bit of reduction. The fruit flavors are pure and bring an appealing sense of texture. Give it time to open up and pair it with food to see it at its best.

properties.title: Domaine Chantepierre 2016  Tavel
properties.description: This taut, intense wine is a bit angular compared to many Tavels, but pull out a bottle around Thanksgiving, and it should be singing. Cherry and citrus flavors collide on the palate, but should merge into a seamless whole with a bit of bottle age.

properties.title: Domaine de Mourchon 2014 Tradition Red
properties.description: From a somewhat maligned vintage, this is a commendable effort. It's not as textural as the wine can be in better years, but it shows enough richness to easily carry the attractive leather, mocha and spice flavors. Drink now–2025.

properties.title: Prieler 2016 Sinner Chardonnay (Burgenland)
properties.description: The grounded, earthy roundness of oak is immediately apparent on the nose, adding floral notes of hay and fresh field mushroom. On the pliable palate, aromatic, pale apple notes play with a touch of citrus and evocative hayflower notes. The body is light, with crisp freshness and a little midpalate texture. It finishes clean and bright.

properties.title: Ramey 2014 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
properties.description: This wine is made from two exceptionally cool coastal sites: Platt, a single-vineyard in its own right; and Martinelli Charles Ranch Vineyard. The wine follows suit, allowing for a concentrated take on golden apple and stony minerality, the nose crisp and focused in salty, floral notes.

properties.title: Rasa 2014 Plus One Kiona Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
properties.description: Although it's 100% varietal and comes from one of the state's oldest Cabernet vineyards, this wine is somewhat blue-fruited for the variety, with notes of plum and mountain blueberry along with herb, graphite, espresso and spice. The palate shows more of the same, bringing a sense of restraint and polish along with lightly grainy tannins that need some time to stretch their legs. It doesn't scream Cabernet but it still brings plenty of appeal. Best after 2022.

properties.title: Steininger 2016 Riesling (Kamptal)
properties.description: Red apple and grapefruit zest are softly evoked on the nose. That same juicy combination plays on the light-bodied, dry palate. A zesty texture adds interest and crunch. The finish is clean and very refreshing.

properties.title: Stevens 2014 StevensXY Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Yakima Valley)
properties.description: The aromas are bright, with notes of savory herb, orange peel, cranberry and spice. The flavors are higher in acidity, tart and puckering, with orange-peel flavors lingering on the finish. The tannins seem a little crunchy right now but should soften with some additional time in the bottle. It's a stylistically unique wine for the state. Put it on the dinner table to see it at its best.

properties.title: Stewart Cellars 2016 Rosé (Sonoma Mountain)
properties.address: 6752 Washington St, Yountville, CA 94599, USA
properties.description: Dark in color and meaty, this stainless-steel-fermented wine is made from Pinot Gris grapes from the Rocky Hill Vineyard and Pinot Noir grapes from Gold Rock Vineyard. Together, they offer a crisp interpretation of strawberry, watermelon and peach, finishing light and bright.

properties.title: Andrew Murray 2013 Esperance Curtis Vineyard Red (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.description: The man who makes a million Syrahs dives into a blend of 60% Grenache, 25% Mourvèdre and 15% Syrah on this bottling, which offers composting lilac, black pepper, fresh boysenberry, dried herb and a tarry quality on the nose. There's a strong blackberry-balsamic reduction flavor once sipped, as well as beef char, elderberry and more tar.

properties.title: Argyros 2014 Assyrtiko (Santorini)
properties.description: Pineapple and lime peel start the nose of this layered Assyrtiko. On the palate, it unfolds with a combination of lemon peel, grapefruit and sea salt. This wine can age for several years but is good to drink now; pair with lamb, fresh fish or Asian cuisine.

properties.title: Domaine Rieflé-Landmann 2014 L'Aplomb White (Alsace)
properties.address: 7 Rue du Drotfeld, 68250 Pfaffenheim, France
properties.description: Subtle hints of ripe, winter-stored apple on the nose lead to an equally apple-dominated palate that shows soft pepper spice. A wonderful midpalate texture and baked-apple richness are countered by lemon freshness. This is very appetizing and cries out for soft cheeses.

properties.title: Domaine Terre de Mistral 2015 Pauline Rosé (Mediterranée)
properties.address: Chemin du Pavillon, Route de Peynier, 13790 Rousset, France
properties.description: On the basis that anything goes with rosé, this wine is 100-percent Sangiovese, known locally as Niellucciu. The acidity that is typical of the grape is very present as are red cherry and tight fruit flavors. It is so crisp and lively, bouncing from the glass and leaving a beautiful array of red fruits at the end.

properties.title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2015  Fiano di Avellino
properties.address: Località Cerza Grossa, 83050 Sorbo Serpico AV, Italy
properties.description: Aromas of pear, Spanish broom, flint and Mediterranean herb emerge in the glass. The juicy, medium-bodied palate offers ripe apple, peach and lime alongside fresh acidity and a mineral vein. A hazelnut note marks the close.

properties.title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2015  Greco di Tufo
properties.address: Località Cerza Grossa, 83050 Sorbo Serpico AV, Italy
properties.description: Heady aromas of citrus and orchard fruit almost jump out of the glass. The savory, medium-bodied palate tastes of ripe pear, mature apple and creamy peach interspersed with energizing mineral notes. Fresh acidity brightens the creamy flavors.

properties.title: Baglio del Cristo di Campobello 2015 Adenzia White (Sicilia)
properties.address: Contrada Favarotta Strada Statale 123 Km. 19, 92023 Campobello di Licata AG, Italy
properties.description: Enticing scents of spring flower, beeswax and orchard fruit come together in the glass. The elegant, linear palate shows juicy lemon, nectarine, hazelnut and a saline note framed in firm acidity. It closes crisp and clean.

properties.title: Beaucanon 2013 Longwood Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: While Cabernet Sauvignon dominant, all five red Bordeaux varieties are represented here. Dark in color, a combination of black pepper and black-fruit syrup meets earthy and dry tannins. This structured wine needs time. Cellar through 2020.

properties.title: Biondi 2014 Chianta Bianco  (Etna)
properties.description: Scents of Spanish broom, pineapple, orchard fruit and a saline note meld together in the glass. The focused palate offers mature apple, peach, botanical herb and mineral alongside firm acidity.

properties.title: Boatique 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Hills Lake County)
properties.address: 8255 Red Hills Rd, Kelseyville, CA 95451, USA
properties.description: Seductive, spicy oak in the aromas and flavors puts a great spin on this medium-bodied, velvety smooth wine from a promising new winery in Northern California. Some ripe black-cherry and cranberry flavors chime in as well, supporting the toasted baguette, cedar and nutmeg nuances and layering seamlessly.

properties.title: Château de Lancyre 2015 Le Rosé (Coteaux du Languedoc Pic Saint Loup)
properties.address: Castle Lancyre Wines in Pic Saint Loup, Ham. de Lancyre, 34270 Valflaunès, France
properties.description: Attractive fruity tones of red currant, raspberry and strawberry hull dance in the bouquet of this pretty rosé, graced by garrigue accents of lavender and rosemary. Flavors of red berry skin and peach pit unfold on the medium-weight palate, framed by soft tannins and a delicate spice note that lingers on the close.

properties.title: Château de Lavernette 2014 Maison du Villard  (Pouilly-Fuissé)
properties.description: Crisp and young, this wine, from 50-year-old vines, is tangy and strongly mineral in texture. It is full of fresh fruit that reflects the of organic and biodynamic farming. The green fruits will fill out as it ages. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Hahn 2014 SLH Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.description: Key lime and fresh cut Gala apples meet with the spiciness of lemongrass on the nose of this bottling from Nicky Hahn and winemaker Paul Clifton. The palate shows a pithy texture, with honeydew melon, Asian pear and lemon cake.

properties.title: Herzog 2012 Special Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Smooth, medium-bodied layers of pomegranate, red currant and a refreshing sense of citrus make for a light, food friendly companion, especially with the wine's satisfying bite of acidity and lengthy finish.

properties.title: J Vineyards & Winery 2014 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: This is a creamy, thick and food friendly white with highlights of honey and green apple and a lingering decadence of ginger, just hinting at anise. Medium-bodied, it represents the vintage and the appellation well, at a price that's nice.

properties.title: Josmeyer 2014 H Vieilles Vignes Pinot Auxerrois (Alsace)
properties.description: Lovely notes of Reineclaude plums play on the nose. The palate is soft but also has echoes of pebble and stone. Fluid and fresh, the wine even shows overtones of white blossom on the palate. It's a lovely, lasting and authentic expression of Alsace.

properties.title: King Estate 2014 Paradox Pinot Gris (Oregon)
properties.address: 80854 Territorial Hwy, Eugene, OR 97405, USA
properties.description: The King Estate name is intentionally printed upside down on the label, emphasizing the paradoxical nature of the wine, which has been barrel aged. As when oak is applied to Pinot Gris, it mutes the varietal nuances of the grape. So along with tart apple and pear fruit, you'll find a softer palate, with vanilla and buttered nuts in the aftertaste.

properties.title: Bell 2013 Longtable Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Mount Veeder)
properties.address: 6200 Washington St, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Soft and round, this 100% varietal wine made from two clones is juicy and fresh in acidity, a sense of restraint allowing it to sconvey more than just fruit. Cassis, black pepper, cedar and a slight streak of menthol combine nicely on the palate, intertwining on the lengthy finish.

properties.title: Cloudy Bay 2013 Te Koko Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.address: 230 Jacksons Road, Rapaura 7273, New Zealand
properties.description: The most recent release of Te Koko seems tamer, more controlled than some previous vintages. It's Graves-like in style, offering up toast, vanilla and passion fruit notes, ample weight and a fine, silky finish that goes on for minutes. It embodies elegance and precision in place of wildness and raw power.

properties.title: Les Vignes des Prêcheurs 2015  Tavel
properties.description: Full-bodied for a rosé (as Tavel should be), this wine boasts plenty of cherry-berry fruit, but also appealing, complex notes of fresh thyme, ground clove and aniseed. Drink this blend of 60% Grenache, 20% Cinsault, 10% Syrah and 10% Clairette (a white grape variety) over the rest of 2017.

properties.title: Netzl 2015 Bärnreiser Weissburgunder (Carnuntum)
properties.description: The nose is a very inviting and attractive mix of bright blossom honey and ripe lemon peel: the palate follows with rounded richness that is streamlined by lovely unobtrusive freshness. It's a generous but harmoniously balanced wine and certainly a very good take on the much underrated Pinot Blanc grape.

properties.title: Rainer Wess 2015 Pfaffenberg Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
properties.description: Ripe, almost candied notions of stone fruit appear. They are so concentrated they have an almost fruit-jelly intensity. There also is a note of earth that flows from the nose onto the generous fleshy palate. The finish is clean on this wine, which holds all the fruit of a ripe and generous year.

properties.title: Greenwood Ridge 2006 Pinot Gris (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 5501 CA-128, Philo, CA 95466, USA
properties.description: There's lots of fresh, green, crunchy fruit and berry flavor in this dry young wine. In this cool vintage, the wine shows zesty flavors of gooseberries, spiced melons and limes, with a touch of feline essence.

properties.title: Vidussi 2006 Sauvignon (Collio)
properties.address: Località Spessa, 18, 34070 Capriva del Friuli GO, Italy
properties.description: There's a lot a personality here thanks to perky aromas of lemon zest, chopped herbs, fresh sage, yellow pepper and cheerful crisp flavors. This is textbook Sauvignon—easy Italian style—with an emphasis on smoothness.

properties.title: La Vis 2005 Dipinti Sauvignon (Trentino)
properties.address: Via del Carmine, 7, 38015 Lavis TN, Italy
properties.description: La Vis's Dipinti series has preformed well thanks to attractive pricing. This expression of Sauvignon offers evident herbal characteristics, as well as mineral ones. Think chopped sage and basil and drying white stone.

properties.title: Santa Margherita 2006 Pinot Grigio (Valdadige)
properties.description: If any one single estate turned America on to Pinot Grigio, Santa Margherita did. The reason for the outstanding success of this wine is its clean simplicity. This is a no-fuss wine that invites casual drinking situations and a global range of pairing possibilities, from pizza to Thai spicy beef. Fresh aromas include citrus, passion fruit and white stone.

properties.title: Septima 2006 Chardonnay (Mendoza)
properties.address: Ruta Internacional n 7 km 1061, M5509 Agrelo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Value-level Chardonnay has never really been Argentina's strong suit, but this fuller-bodied version is pretty good. It starts with citrus, orange peel and some dusty scents, which are backed by melon, apple and citrus flavors. It finishes with some pithy bitterness but overall it's nice for Mendoza Chardonnay.

properties.title: The Crossings 2006 Unoaked Chardonnay (Marlborough)
properties.address: Awatere Valley Road, Seddon 7274, New Zealand
properties.description: Like most unoaked Chardonnays, this is a bit simply fruity, but it's also clean and fresh. Apple, melon and citrus flavors are easily carried by its medium body and mouthwatering finish.

properties.title: Bodegas Escorihuela 2006 Cruz Alta Reserve Chardonnay (Mendoza)
properties.address: Belgrano 1188, M5501 Godoy Cruz, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Pineapple and apple aromas are fairly attractive and fresh, as is the light, wet and zippy palate, which shows mostly citrus and apple flavors. The finish is mild and clean, and overall the wine delivers clarity and a dominant citrus profile.

properties.title: Mario Schiopetto 2004 Tocai Friulano (Collio)
properties.address: Via Palazzo Arcivescovile, 1, 34070 Capriva del Friuli GO, Italy
properties.description: Although you might encounter some initial sulfur, this wine later portrays yellow rose, peach, almond, cut grass and honey. It doesn't have huge flavor intensity but just enough to keep your attention.

properties.title: Mer Soleil 2005 Chardonnay (Central Coast)
properties.address: 1290 River Rd, Salinas, CA 93908, USA
properties.description: Mer Soleil Chards seem to get bigger, riper and oakier every year. Of course, this is the winery's style, and when it works, the results can be fabulously rich, but this caramelized wine seems a little top-heavy.

properties.title: Columbia Crest 2005 Grand Estates Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 178810 WA-221, Paterson, WA 99345, USA
properties.description: Big, bold, and buttery, with plenty of oaky micro-popcorn flavors. Don't look for subtlety, but you get plenty of flavor.

properties.title: La Crema 2006 Pinot Gris (Carneros)
properties.address: 3575 Slusser Rd, Windsor, CA 95492, USA
properties.description: Brief aging in oak and sur lies aging has given this a much needed creamy richness. Without that, it would be just a crisply acidic, fresh wine, with citrus, apple, peach and honeysuckle flavors. With it, it's elevated. Excessively sweet on the finish.

properties.title: Sagelands 2004 Four Corners Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 45 E Main St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: Price rise. With broad flavors of berry and chocolate, this is pleasant and undistinguished. This does not have the weight or varietal presence of the winery's Merlot.

properties.title: Masottina 2005 Vigneto ai Palazzi Chardonnay (Piave)
properties.address: Via Custoza, 2, 31015 Conegliano TV, Italy
properties.description: This is a simple, friendly wine with a pretty dusty, mineral quality that frames fresher aromas of pear, peach and golden apple. It's a bit toned down in terms of flavors intensity but does end on a playful spicy note.

properties.title: Zaca Mesa 2004 Z Three Red Wine Red (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.description: A southern Rhône blend of Syrah, Mourvèdre and Grenache, this wine is stylish and elegant, with a smooth, silky texture. But it's just a little too sugary sweet to earn a higher score, with the blackberry and cherry fruit having a jellied, candied edge.

properties.title: Trisaetum 2010 Estates Reserve Riesling (Ribbon Ridge)
properties.description: A two-barrel selection consisting of the favorite sweeter barrel from each of the two estate vineyards. Intense, bright and focused, with candied lemon/lime fruit flavors. The power and concentration of the wine is remarkable.

properties.title: Talley 2009 Rosemary's Vineyard Chardonnay (Arroyo Grande Valley)
properties.description: A brilliant Chardonnay, bone dry and crisp in acidity. Almost lean in citrus and mineral flavors, but on further inspection shows complex layers of toast, honeysuckle, peach and stone, with a deft touch of new oak. Feels weighty and important, and finishes wonderfully dry.

properties.title: Wallis Family Estate 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
properties.description: Rich, elaborate and layered. If this Cab were a fabric, it would be suede. Shows the tannins and minerals of Diamond Mountain, with potent flavors of blackberries, cherries, currants, cola, anise and sweet smoky oak. The finish is wonderfully dry, firm and long. Should develop for at least eight years.

properties.title: Franz Hirtzberger 2010 Honivogl Smaragd Grüner Veltliner (Wachau)
properties.address: Kremserstraße 8, 3620 Spitz, Austria
properties.description: Gorgeously ripe fruit, full of pear, green plum and exotic spices. The wine is rich, with its smooth, rounded texture that is pierced with mouthwatering acidity and laced with steeliness. This is a wine with considerable aging potential.

properties.title: Franz Hirtzberger 2010 Rotes Tor Smaragd Grüner Veltliner (Wachau)
properties.description: Intensely mineral wine, with an austere edge of acidity and texture. It has a pure quality, its apple flavors shining through the outer shell. With its firm character, it will age many years.

properties.title: Hall 2008 Kathryn Hall Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: This is a best of barrels blend from Hall's various vineyards, including the famous Sacrashe. The wine itself is lovely. It has a firm structure thanks to dusty tannins and a dry minerality, while bright acidity makes the cherry, blackberry, blueberry, cassis and dark chocolate fruit sing. Drink now and through 2014.

properties.title: E. Guigal 2008 La Doriane  (Condrieu)
properties.address: 7865 W Sahara Ave #104, Las Vegas, NV 89117, USA
properties.description: Guigal's luxury cuvée from Condrieu is a great success in 2008, marrying richness and power with hints of honeysuckle, toasted nuts and apricot. It's full bodied, creamy in texture and tremendously long on the finish. Drink now–2016, and possibly beyond.

properties.title: Bonaccorsi 2008 Melville Vineyard Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.description: This complex Chardonnay shows lots of smoky-sweet oak, with notes of buttered toast that are perfectly integrated with flavors of Asian pear, tropical fruits and spices. There's a wonderfully pure minerality that, together with brisk acidity, gives the wine a bracing quality.

properties.title: Michael Pozzan 2012 Dante Reserve Pinot Grigio (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 1205 Randolph St, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.description: Tastes sweet, with citrus, white flower and green pea notes.

properties.title: Green Truck 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendocino County)
properties.address: 3015 Hartland Ln, Markham, VA 22643, USA
properties.description: With a twist of mushroomy earth upon opening, this inexpensive Cabernet is strong, hearty and a bit thin on the finish—fine but not a standout.

properties.title: Trinitas 2011 Apprentice Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 850 Bordeaux Way #1, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Tastes tired and flabby, with sweet oak and alcohol flavors and not much else going on.

properties.title: Edna Valley Vineyard 2011 Paragon Chardonnay (Central Coast)
properties.address: 2585 Biddle Ranch Rd, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.description: A Chardonnay with sweet, simple flavors of white sugar and pineapples. Tart acidity gives it the taste of a sweet-and-sour sauce for Chinese food.

properties.title: San Huberto 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Argentina)
properties.description: This rusty, light-bodied Cab may be from the current vintage but it looks, smells and tastes like something left over from the past. The bouquet is raw, leathery and leafy, with few pleasantries. A dilute palate with dry, leathery cherry flavors is fresh and light, but strained.

properties.title: Quara 2012 Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (Cafayate)
properties.description: This is herbal, burnt and stalky smelling, then raw and herbal tasting, with weedy notes and a scratchy finish.

properties.title: Gorman 2009 The Bully Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 9206 200th St SE a4, Snohomish, WA 98296, USA
properties.description: The 2009 Bully includes 10% Petit Verdot. It's seamless and complete, a firm, muscular, dark, smoky/earthy Cab with substantial tannins. The deeply powerful black fruits have a vivid presence and a slightly roasted character. This is a big bruiser, but beautifully proportioned.

properties.title: Doubleback 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 3853 Powerline Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: This is a heavy-duty Cabernet, big in every way, with rich black cherry and cassis fruit, and dense, dark tannins. The long, slightly grainy finish reinforces the impression of raw power, yet the wine retains perfect proportion and is nicely differentiated from the other 2010s crafted by winemaker Chris Figgins.

properties.title: Philip Shaw 2006 No. 11 Chardonnay (Orange)
properties.address: 100 Shiralee Rd, Orange NSW 2800, Australia
properties.description: A bit unyielding on the nose, then the palate shows rather tight and citrusy flavors. Yet there's ample weight on the palate and a long, fresh finish tinged with hard peaches and pineapple. This seemingly contradictory wine just needs some time to develop; try after 2009.

properties.title: Rosenhof 2004 Trockenbeerenauslese Chardonnay (Burgenland)
properties.description: There's no question about the huge richness of this wine—it is there from the initial aroma. It is smooth, totally voluptuous, immediately appealing. The flavors are of the sweetest runny honey, matched with acidity to emphasize the ripe peach and dried apricot flavors.

properties.title: Sparkman 2007 Lumière Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14300 NE 145th St #102, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: This is minimal intervention winemaking, using native yeast, then put through 100% malolactic and given weekly batinage (lees stirring) in 50% new barrels. The grapes are from Stillwater Creek, delivering ripe, tangy flavors of lime, pineapple, apple, pear and nectarine; all with a firm acid underpinning.

properties.title: Kunde 2007 Viognier (Sonoma Valley)
properties.address: 9825 Sonoma Hwy, Kenwood, CA 95452, USA
properties.description: Kunde's been on a consistent roll for years in crafting rich, balanced Viogniers. Their 2007 is crisp and ripe, offering a blast of tropical fruit, honeysuckle, vanilla and spice flavors that finish impressively long. Nice with fusion fare, or for something different, Tex-Mex.

properties.title: Villa Maria 2007 Taylors Pass Single Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.description: The Taylors Pass Vineyard continues to shine brightly for both Sauvignon Blanc and Pinot Noir. This Sauvignon features intense tropical fruit with just a touch of green. It's round and mouthfilling, with a long, lime-and-mineral finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Villa Russiz 2007 Sauvignon de la Tour Sauvignon (Collio)
properties.address: Via Russiz, 4, 34070 Capriva del Friuli GO, Italy
properties.description: This standout expression of the excellent Sauvignon de la Tour offers brilliant luminosity and pristine aromas of passion fruit, kiwi and Thai basil. The most extraordinary quality here is the purity and intensity of the wine's beautiful bouquet.

properties.title: Yeringberg 2005 Chardonnay (Yarra Valley)
properties.address: 810 Maroondah Hwy, Coldstream VIC 3770, Australia
properties.description: Wines like this are why Yarra Valley has achieved a certain reputation for Chardonnay. It starts off with wonderfully complex aromas of spring flowers, honey, ripe peaches and citrus fruits, then crams honeyed hints of truffle and oranges into a full-bodied but dry expression of the grape.Finishes elegantly, with a dusting of dried spices.

properties.title: Hafner 2006 Cuvée Eiswein White (Burgenland)
properties.description: Harvested in January 2007, this has the true purity and freshness of icewine. There is lightness and delicacy as the ripe apricot sweetness is pierced with floating acidity. There is a sweet, but fresh and clean finish.

properties.title: Hafner 2007 Essencia Trockenbeerenauslese Scheurebe (Burgenland)
properties.address: Halbturnerstraße 17, 7123 Mönchhof, Austria
properties.description: Hafner has a particular success with this Scheurebe sweet wine. Rich, with apricot flavors, the acidity brings out a delicious freshness. Honey dances around the liquid syrup texture, the botrytis giving the proper dry core.

properties.title: Bergevin Lane 2007 Viognier (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 70 N Colville St #106, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: Lemon oil and candle wax add interesting nuances to the citrusy, barrel-fermented fruit. There was no malolactic fermentation; it's bone dry and the acids are all natural and smooth. Delicate hints of toast and honeyed almonds bring still more depth and flavor interest to the juicy citrusfruit.

properties.title: Domaine Serres Mazard 2004 Élevé en Fûts de Chêne Red (Corbières)
properties.description: A terrific example of Corbières terroir at an unbeatable price. The wine, a traditional Rhône-style blend of Syrah, Grenache and Carignan, is so loaded with aromas and flavors of the surrounding garrigue you might think that they threw in a bouquet garni during maturation. Sage, rosemary,menthol, thyme and bay leaves all abound while rich, dark fruit and oak aging (Élevé en Fûts de Chêne means aged in oak barrels) provides support and structure. Silky texture, approachable tannins and a long finish bring it all together.

properties.title: Dr. Wagner 2006 Saarburger Rausch Auslese Goldkap Riesling (Mosel-Saar-Ruwer)
properties.description: For being a goldkap, this is not especially lush or botrytized. Instead, it features a fine balance of acidity, which enlivens the green apple and citrus flavors and gives them extra poignancy. This is crisply balanced and mouthwatering on the finish.

properties.title: Maddalena 2012 Chardonnay (Monterey)
properties.description: Building on the almost century of Riboli family winemaking, this wine shows honeysuckle, cracked caramel brittle and seared lemons on the approachable, familiar nose. Good tension marks the palate, with lemon butter and ripe Golden Delicious apple warmth cut by a pithy sharpness.

properties.title: My Essential 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
properties.description: Plum flesh, grapeseed and black-peppercorn aromas introduce this leaner, less-extracted style of wine. The palate shows deep cherry and plum juice with lots of peppery spice and decent tannic structure, and will probably intensify with a bit of patience.

properties.title: Inman Family 2013 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 3900 Piner Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.description: This faint, elusive wine takes lightness and low alcohol to pronounced levels, offering intense lemon and Asian pear around a tight core of acidity. From the Pratt Vineyard, it spent time aging in both new air-dried Vosges oak barrels and small stainless steel.

properties.title: Kagan 2011 Split Rock Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
properties.description: Soft and creamy, this full-bodied wine is a mix of apple, pear and mango around swirls of vanilla. Round and smooth, it finishes in a burst of fresh-squeezed citrus.

properties.title: Valdellövo 2014 Zero Nove  (Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)
properties.description: Alluring scents of wisteria, acacia and white peach float out of the glass. The lively palate doles out crisp green apple, unripe pear and lime zest accompanied by racy acidity and a foaming mousse.

properties.title: Von Strasser 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
properties.address: 965 Silverado Trail N, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.description: The winery's blend of all six of its single-vineyard designates, this contains smaller amounts of Malbec, Petit Verdot, Merlot and Cab Franc in support of the Cab Sauvignon. Dried herbal components pique the aroma, followed by spicy cinnamon and black pepper seasonings on the palate. Black licorice marks the finish.

properties.title: Zardetto 2014 Tre Venti Rive di Ogliano Brut  (Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)
properties.address: Via Martiri delle Foibe, 18, 31015 Conegliano TV, Italy
properties.description: Delicate aromas of orchard fruit, grapefruit and a whiff of chopped herbs float from the glass. The racy, refreshing palate offers citrus zest, green apple and a hint of pear alongside racy acidity and an intense, persistent perlage.

properties.title: Quinta da Alorna 2014 Portal da Aguia White (Tejo)
properties.description: This wine is attractive, ripe and finely perfumed. With the spicy Moscatel flavors in the blend, it brings yellow fruit tones balanced by lively acidity. There is a great tangy character which yields a lifted, smooth aftertaste. Drink now.

properties.title: Winter's Hill 2014 Reserve Pinot Gris (Dundee Hills)
properties.description: Like the companion reserve Pinot Blanc, this first-ever effort was barrel fermented and aged a few months in French oak. Scents and flavors of brioche wrap around smooth yellow fruits, leading into a layered, textured finish.

properties.title: Fess Parker 2014 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 6200 Foxen Canyon Rd, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.description: This wine's light and refreshing nose cuts between orange-blossom ripeness, lime-juice sharpness, chalky minerality and a touch of milk fat. There is good energy on the palate, powered by tart green apple rinds and citrus zest.

properties.title: Pewsey Vale 2010 The Contours Museum Reserve Riesling (Eden Valley)
properties.address: Eden Valley SA 5235, Australia
properties.description: This release is always among my favorite Aussie Rieslings. Not only is the quality consistent, the price for a nearing-maturity wine makes it a winning value. It is smoky and toasty on the nose, showing off those developed aromas to good effect against a background of bergamot-tinged fruit. The round patina of age is balanced by great acid drive and a long, mouthwatering finish. Drink now–2020.

properties.title: Reichsgraf von Kesselstatt 2015 Scharzhofberger Spätlese Grosse Lage Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: Savory whiffs of lemongrass and tilled earth turn surprisingly floral and fruity on the palate of this complex yet quaffable spätlese. Sweet, sun-kissed tangerine and peach flavors are unctuous and satisfying, off set by zesty lime acidity. The finish is long, peppered by notes of pollen, herb and fennel.

properties.title: Kay Brothers 2012 Cuthbert Amery Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (McLaren Vale)
properties.description: This wine starts off with an appetizing, savory, grilled-meat element on the nose, then showcases flavors of dark chocolate, mocha and plum. It's hefty on the palate, with a velvety texture and long, rich finish. Drink now–2027.

properties.title: Tyrrell's 2010 HVD Semillon (Hunter Valley)
properties.address: 1838 Broke Rd, Pokolbin NSW 2320, Australia
properties.description: From a single vineyard planted in 1908, this Semillon is just entering its window of drinkability, where it should remain for at least another 10 years. Scents of fresh lime juice and grilled toast lead the way, backed by flavors of limes and mandarin oranges. It's medium in body, plump yet tightly focused, with a lengthy finish full of toast and citrus zest.

properties.title: Dr. Loosen 2014 Ürziger Würzgarten Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: 20501 Tranquility Ln, Oregon City, OR 97045, USA
properties.description: Dusty floral perfume juxtaposes struck flint and slate on the nose of this deft, dainty auslese. Pristine tangerine and apricot flavors are ripe but crisp, highlighted by a bristling stream of acidity. Exotic spice and dusty pollen notes reverberate warmly on the finish. Ready to drink now but structured enough to continue to improve through at least 2030.

properties.title: Betz Family 2014 Besoleil Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 13244 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE, Redmond, WA 98052, USA
properties.description: This wine is a blend of Grenache (33%), Counoise (24%), Syrah (20%), Cinsault (17%) and Mourvèdre. Expressive fruit-laden aromas of red plum, raspberry, blue fruit and herb are followed by plump, pure fruit flavors, with the mouthfeel only adding the appeal. It's a gorgeous interpretation of these varieties.

properties.title: Buena Vista 2013 Chateau Buena Vista Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: A new offering from the Sonoma-based producer meant to recall the estate's original founding in the Napa Valley, this wine sources from across that appellation and impresses right away in its succulent and soft approach to the variety. With a backbone of cassis and vanilla, it's expansive and lengthy, velvety in texture and very satisfying.

properties.title: Rex Hill 2014 Seven Soils Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
properties.description: Sophisticated, complex winemaking is on display here. Perfectly ripe yellow and green fruits are entwined with leesy, textural, mineral-drenched acids. There are gentle touches of citrus rind and a finishing pat of butter. All in all, an exceptional wine for the price.

properties.title: Rôtie Cellars 2014 Southern Blend Red (Washington)
properties.description: Grenache (70%) takes the lead on this blend followed by Mourvèdre (25%) and Syrah. The aromas draw you into the glass with notes of high-toned lightly green herbs, rose hips and raspberries. The ripe red-fruit flavors display a dazzling sense of purity, drinking like a bowl of fresh fruit, with a sprinkling of herbs and spices mixed in. The balance and texture are impressive.

properties.title: Sextant 2013 El Pomar Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (El Pomar District)
properties.description: Deep-dark chocolate, concentrated boysenberry, black pepper and purple flowers make for an inviting and lavish nose on this bottling, one of the top in each vintage from this winery. Silky, soft yet firm tannins frame the sip, where flavors of black cherry, boysenberry and black raspberry are woven through leather and dried meats.

properties.title: Walt 2014 Sangiacomo Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 380 1st St W, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.description: This vineyard-designate opens in inviting, perfumed aromatics of apple blossom and honeysuckle. On the palate it reveals substantial depth and breadth, the oak characteristic quite caramelized. Meaty in lemon zest and meringue, it provides a weight of body that's nicely balanced against stony minerality and traces of nutmeg.

properties.title: Château Lamothe 2010 Barrel sample  (Sauternes)
properties.address: Château Lamothe, 33710 Lansac, France
properties.description: 87-89 Lacking richness, the wine has acidity, some sweetness, but misses definition and density.

properties.title: Château Ferrande 2010 Barrel sample  (Graves)
properties.address: Château, Ferrande, 33640 Castres-Gironde, France
properties.description: 87-89 Soft wine, its acidity light. Pineapple and green apple flavors, with hints of wood.

properties.title: Château Filhot 2010 Barrel sample  (Sauternes)
properties.description: 87-89 The wine tastes light, with a hard edged mineral character, the richness still a distance away.

properties.title: Château Suau 2010 Barrel sample  (Barsac)
properties.address: 600 Suau, 33550 Capian, France
properties.description: 87-89 A wine that is all structure, with very little fruit. It has a hard, metallic edge.

properties.title: Venge 2008 Family Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
properties.address: 4708 Silverado Trail N, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.description: An absolute joy and triumph. Just superb, showcasing the best of Oakville. Perfect tannins, as pure as velvet and sweet, and perfect oak, too, with beautifully applied char and wood spice. That the oak is 100% new is in keeping with the wine's volumetrics. The wine's flavors are a profound, heady expression of blackberries, blueberries, cassis and dark, barely sweetened chocolate. Just spectacular, a real achievement by any world class standard. Production was a scant 275 cases.

properties.title: Wines & Winemakers 2016 Toucas Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)
properties.description: Pure Alvarinho from the north of the Vinho Verde region makes this a smooth, ripe wine. It is perfumed, stylish and with a good balance between acidity and refreshing green and white fruitiness. Drink the wine now.

properties.title: Acrobat 2016 Pinot Gris (Oregon)
properties.address: 6 Petaluma Blvd N a1, Petaluma, CA 94952, USA
properties.description: This wine knocks the flavors out of the park again this vintage, with spicy grapefruit and pine needle notes leading the charge. Think more cool fruit—lime flesh and skin—than tropical flavors. Add vivid acidity, impeccable balance and a refreshing, wet stone finish, and this is a must-have, everyday, goes-with-anything white.

properties.title: Amalie Robert 2016 Pinot in Pink Rosé (Willamette Valley)
properties.description: This lovely rosé brings a complex mix of citrus, strawberry and melon flavors, etched with vivid acidity. It's poised, balanced and clean in style—a great example of how a seemingly simple wine can surprise with unexpected depth.

properties.title: August Kesseler 2015 Pinot Noir Saignée Rosé (Rheingau)
properties.address: Lorcher Str. 16, 65385 Rüdesheim am Rhein, Germany
properties.description: While bright and fresh with fruit, this robust structured rosé offers enough substance to thrive beyond a summer season. Dry and sprightly, it offers crisp raspberry and cherry flavors nuanced by complexities of garrigue and earth. A pleasant bite of tannins elongates the finish.

properties.title: Joseph Mellot 2014 La Grande Châtelaine  (Sancerre)
properties.description: The short oak aging has broadened this already ripe wine. The touch of toast is balanced by the yellow fruits and rich acidity. It is full, concentrated, mineral textured and ready to drink.

properties.title: Joseph Mellot 2016 Domaine des Emois  (Sancerre)
properties.description: The wine comes from a 14-acre estate owned by the producer. Its fruitiness and texture are both important elements in the wine at this young stage. They give a tightly textured wine that is still bright, crisp with lemon fruit and crispened with considerable acidity. Let the wine soften and drink from 2018.

properties.title: Kriselle 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (Rogue Valley)
properties.description: This effusive, expressive wine offers deep citrus, lemon drop, grapefruit and peach flavors. The fruit is further boosted with a powdered sugar note. Delicious already, it should drink well over the next three or four years.

properties.title: Matheus 2016 Piesporter Goldtröpfchen Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: Buoyant primary aromas of sunny peach and tangerine are juxtaposed against deep reverberating slate and flint in this gorgeously balanced Kabinett. It's lusciously textured but spine-tingling with acidity. The finish is long, lingering on warm spice tones. Drink now through 2020.

properties.title: Nautilus 2015 The Paper Nautilus Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.description: Fermented in a seasoned 3,000-liter oak vat, this doesn't show overt wood flavors, instead revealing hints of ramps and sweat accenting passion fruit. Medium bodied, it offers fascinating textural interplay between creaminess from lees contact and vibrant acidity. Drink now.

properties.title: Casal da Coelheira 2016 Reserva Branco White (Tejo)
properties.address: N118 1331, 2205-681 Tramagal, Portugal
properties.description: This is a successful blend of Chardonnay and Arinto that blends a creamy texture with crisp fruit flavors. Wood aged, the wine has a toasty edge that fills out the fruit and gives spice to the citrus and apple flavors. The wine is still young; give it until late 2018.

properties.title: David Hill 2016 Estate Gewürztraminer (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 46350 NW David Hill Rd, Forest Grove, OR 97116, USA
properties.description: Produced from vines a half century old, this is fermented completely dry yet retains a distinct floral/talc character. Although Alsatian in style it, exudes a bit of extra fruit flesh, as one would expect of Oregon. It's a lovely wine, with rose petal scents and light peach flavors.

properties.title: Domaine Laporte 2015 La Comtesse  (Sancerre)
properties.address: 62 Av. de Fontenay, 18300 Saint-Satur, France
properties.description: Hugely rich and in a seriously heavy bottle, this is a statement wine. Its texture is there, surrounded by superripe fruit and touches of pepper from the alcohol. This almost tropical-fruit wine needs to age a little longer, so drink from 2018.

properties.title: Ghost Hill 2015 Spirit of Pinot Noir Rosé
properties.description: The word scrumptious applies here. This rich and complex rosé from Eric Hamacher is a mix of saignée juice and Pinot Noir blanc that wasn't quite blanc enough—a happy accident, since it's packed with raspberry confit and plum jam flavors, with a hint of cranberry sauce. Coming up on two years past fermentation, it's a wine to drink now.

properties.title: Herdade do Rocim 2015 Vale da Mata White (Lisboa)
properties.address: Estrada Nacional 387, 7940-909 Cuba, Portugal
properties.description: The crisp Vital grape, local to the Lisboa region, is obvious in this light and bright wine. It has a wonderful tangy character, with delicious acidity. Full of citrus and green plums, it offers a bright aftertaste. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Rain Dance 2016 Nicholas Vineyard Estate Rosé (Chehalem Mountains)
properties.address: 3004 NE Zimri Dr, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.description: A big improvement from the previous vintage, this pretty, salmon-hued wine is packed with subtle but flavorful fruit. Tart citrus and strawberry notes underscored with crisp, clean acidity make it refreshing and a real winner.

properties.title: Hanna 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: With ammonia, green pea, gooseberry and pink grapefruit flavors, it defines a grapy, dry, acidic style. Tasted in January, the wine was still a little bubbly from the fermentation process.

properties.title: Mil Piedras 2013 Viognier (Vista Flores)
properties.address: 6425 Mira Cielo, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.description: Light, clean, fresh aromas of tropical fruits and lychee resemble those of a Torrontés. The palate is light and mild, while flavors of melon, lychee and citrus pith are forward but don't come with a lot of backing or complexity.

properties.title: Santa Julia 2013 [+] Torrontés (Mendoza)
properties.description: Light, airy aromas of tropical fruits and kaffir lime are modest. In the mouth, the wine is tight and chalky. Flavors of lime, lychee and green apple finish firm, with nice acidity and a slight oily character.

properties.title: The Calling 2010 Jewell Vineyard Dutton Ranch Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 1402 S 9th St, Ashland, NE 68003, USA
properties.description: New French oak sticks out on this Chardonnay, making the co-stars buttered toast and caramel. Underneath the wine is dry and brisk in acidity, with lime and mango fruit flavors.

properties.title: Keuka Spring 2012 Humphreys Vineyard Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 243 Route 54, East Lake Rd, Penn Yan, NY 14527, USA
properties.description: A bit smoky and savory in style, this slightly off-dry wine balances earthy mineral tones with flavors of pressed pear and apple. Sprightly acidity gives it a refreshing, easy-drinking quality.

properties.title: Mauro Sebaste 2012 Centobricchi Viognier (Langhe)
properties.description: This 100% Viognier from Piedmont reveals fragrances of white flowers, oak and aromatic herbs. The palate is dominated by oak accompanied by notes of sage, thyme, citrus and fennel. It lacks fruit richness. Saranty Imports, Pleasure Elite.

properties.title: Paso a Paso 2012 Made with Organic Grapes White (La Mancha)
properties.address: 1220 Park St, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Apple and stone-fruit aromas are basic, mild and good. This is creamy in the mouth, with green-apple acidity providing edge and cut. Flavors of apple, green herbs and nectarine finish smooth.

properties.title: Ca' Momi 2012 Reserve Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2515 Napa Valley Corporate Dr, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: The wine offers a fantastic array of butterscotch, orange, pineapple, peach and vanilla bean flavors, brightened with vital acidity. But as rich as the wine tastes, it lacks a certain distinction.

properties.title: Château Ollieux Romanis 2008 Cuvée Alice Red (Corbières)
properties.description: Juicy red plum and bright berries fill the palate, while accents of savory herbs and wild animal add depth to the nose. Balanced and approachable with a satiny structure and a medium-length finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Oveja Negra 2011 Reserva Sauvignon Blanc-Carmenère White (Maule Valley)
properties.address: Av. Diego Portales 2372, Arica, Arica y Parinacota, Chile
properties.description: Mild and appealing on the nose, with just enough citrus to convince you that it's Sauvignon Blanc. Solid and not at all spritzy or wild feeling, with gooseberry, lime and passion fruit flavors. Finishes pithy but true, with lasting citrus and green herb notes.

properties.title: Quinta do Pinto 2008 Branco Reserva White (Lisboa)
properties.description: Warm, rich wine with tropical flavors of mango, peach and with a ripe feel. It has weight, although the fruit does hint at crispness. There is a toast and nuts character that broadens out the interest.

properties.title: Real Companhia Velha 2007 Grandjó Late Harvest Sémillon (Douro)
properties.address: 4431-952, R. Azevedo Magalhães 314, 4431-952 Vila Nova de Gaia, Portugal
properties.description: There isn't much Sémillon in Portugal, but what there is can be easily affected by botrytis. This one has intense sweetness, balanced by dryness and lemon acidity. Ready to drink.

properties.title: Hecht & Bannier 2008 Red (Minervois)
properties.description: A lifting menthol streak infuses the ripe red plum and berry aromas and flavors of this wine, with a nice minerality lingering underneath it all. Balanced with medium acidity and moderate but fine tannins, the wine's finish shows a cinnamon and nutmeg spice accent appears after swallow. Very drinkable now.

properties.title: Wakefield 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Clare Valley)
properties.address: 8297 Diagonal 1500 Road, Stuart, OK 74570, USA
properties.description: Wakefield was founded as a Cabernet producer, so it's no surprise that the 2009 is a very good drop. The cassis fruit carries a slightly herbal tinge, with hints of coffee and vanilla helping to frame the fruit. It's lush and velvety in texture, making it drinkable now and over the next several years.

properties.title: Château Malavieille 2007 Rouge Permien Red (Coteaux du Languedoc)
properties.address: Malavielle, 34800 Mérifons, France
properties.description: This organic blend of 60% Carignan, 20% Grenache and 20% Syrah offers a good amount of herbal aromas alongside notes of ripe dark cherry and berry fruit. Rich and tasty flavors of blueberry, boysenberry and raspberry unfold in the medium-weight mouth, while accents of pepper and anise remain through the close.

properties.title: Bjornstad 2007 Ritchie Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 3635 Bethel Heights Rd NW, Salem, OR 97304, USA
properties.description: Dramatically rich and ripe, a bells and whistles Chardonnay made in the white Burgundy style. It's flamboyant in pineapple, nectarine, guava and oak- and lees-influenced buttered toast, cream and vanilla crème brûlée, but it's also very acidic and dry, which provides balance and elegance. Fine now and for 3 or 4 years.

properties.title: Bjornstad 2007 Porter-Bass Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
properties.description: Chardonnay doesn't get much richer or riper than this. Explodes with grilled pineapple, lemondrop, smoky meringue, buttered toast and cinnamon spice flavors, brightened and boosted by crisp, citrusy cool-climate acidity. Racy and clean and complex, it should develop bottle nuance over the next four years.

properties.title: Ehret 2006 Hillside Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Knights Valley)
properties.address: 422 Healdsburg Ave, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: This 100% Cab shows all the hallmarks of an ageable wine. But it's beautiful now for the complexity of the tannins and the elegant integration of blackberry and black currant fruit with oak. A dramatic, impressive wine that shows you don't have to spend a lot of money for a terrific California Cab. Now–2012.

properties.title: The Williamsburg Winery 2011 John Adlum Limited Chardonnay (Virginia)
properties.description: White currant and orchard fruit tones lead onto the silky, open-textured palate. It finishes with a welcome minerally tang.

properties.title: Red Newt Cellars 2012 Gewürztraminer (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 3675 Tichenor Rd, Hector, NY 14841, USA
properties.description: With slightly subdued aromas of spiced apples and lemon, this Gewürztraminer introduces itself a bit unusually. The round, full-bodied palate reveals more characteristic lychee and floral tones offset by soft lemony acidity. It concludes with a hint of alcoholic warmth.

properties.title: Schug 2012 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: Schug Carneros Estate Winery, 602 Bonneau Rd, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.description: It conveys lots of ripe, forward citrus, pear and green apple flavors. Oak plays only a supporting role, with crisp acidity and creamy lees co-starring with the fruit.

properties.title: Spadafora 2012 Grillo (Terre Siciliane)
properties.address: Zona Industriale, 18, 87050 Mangone CS, Italy
properties.description: Light and crisp, this steely wine offers sensations of white flowers, zesty citrus, white peach and slate. It's simple but well made with fresh acidity that gives it a clean, bright finish.

properties.title: Tussock Jumper 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.description: This medium-bodied wine shows almost tobacco-like scents to go along with tropical fruit on the nose. It's leafy and green, with modest passion-fruit flavors and a moderately long finish.

properties.title: Latah Creek 2012 Hyatt Vineyards Muscat Canelli (Rattlesnake Hills)
properties.description: A fragrant wine with notes of perfume, lychee and orange peel. It's medium sweet (40g/L residual sugar) with a floral lift.

properties.title: Matua 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.description: This vintage of Matua's Sauvignon Blanc seems more tropical and fruity than other years, offering ripe guava, passion fruit and pineapple aromas and flavors. It's round and easy to drink, finishing on a bit of a sweet-and-sour note. Drink now.

properties.title: Olabisi 2011 Ceja Vineyard Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.description: The oak overpowers the limes and mangoes. Despite mouthwatering acidity, the wine is dominated by butterscotch and buttered cinnamon toast.

properties.title: Ravoire et Fils 2013 Domaine Fontanyl Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.description: Light and fresh in its skittle bottle, this is rosé for the beach and picnic. Red currant fruitiness has been softened with a caramel flavor.

properties.title: Acre Twenty-one 2012 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: Straight down the fairway with notes of freshly scooped cantaloupe and pear slices. It's textured in feel showing little obvious oak influence, finishing a bit short.

properties.title: Raphael 2012 Chardeaux White (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.address: 39390 NY-25, Peconic, NY 11958, USA
properties.description: This cheeky blend of Chardonnay and Bordeaux-inspired Sauvignon Blanc is delicately framed. Fresh and fruity, it discloses apple and lemon notes accented with hints of smoke and savory nuts.

properties.title: Domaine Ferret 2012 Les Perrières  (Pouilly-Fuissé)
properties.description: With attractive wood aromas, this is rich and bright, with touches of butteriness. It has weight and plenty of ripe fruit. The acidity at the end is fresh and crisp.

properties.title: Joseph Faiveley 2011 Fourchaume Premier Cru  (Chablis)
properties.description: A soft wine with attractive fruitiness and lemon and lime flavors. Fresh and rounded, it shows its northern French origins with the tight acidity at the end.

properties.title: Lamoreaux Landing 2010 Estate Bottled Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 9224 NY-414, Lodi, NY 14860, USA
properties.description: Fresh, crisp apple and pear are touched with delicate swathes of cream and oyster shell on this elegant, impeccably balanced Chardonnay. The palate is brisk with lemon and lime acidity, but builds in richness and texture on the finish. A remarkable value at $13.

properties.title: Bret Brothers 2012 Climat La Martine  (Mâcon-Uchizy)
properties.description: Wood flavors initially dominate this wine. Then the more fruity character shows through to give a toast and citrus character, rounded while tightly textured. The wine has some aging potential, although it could be drunk now.

properties.title: Cantine Olivella 2012 Katà Catalanesca (Catalanesca del Monte Somma)
properties.address: Via S. Giovanni Bosco, 84047 Capaccio SA, Italy
properties.description: Made from Catalanesca, a rare grape from Campania, this vibrant wine opens with delicate aromas of white flower, beeswax and white tree fruit. The easy-drinking but savory palate offers juicy pear, apple and a hint of hazelnut on the finish. Vinity Wine, Panebianco.

properties.title: Château du Trignon 2009  Gigondas
properties.description: This is a supple, medium- to full-bodied red for drinking over the next few years. The plummy flavors are a bit earthy, dark and indistinct, but pleasant enough, and the wine's silky finish features a bright burst of red fruit.

properties.title: Domaine Faiveley 2011 Clos Rochette  (Mercurey)
properties.address: 8 Rue du Tribourg, 21700 Nuits-Saint-Georges, France
properties.description: The chalky soil yields a crisp, textured wine with yellow fruits to round it out. There is a steely edge and just a touch of wood, while the aftertaste is packed with acidity.

properties.title: Dr. Konstantin Frank 2012 Grüner Veltliner (Finger Lakes)
properties.description: Lavishly floral with notes of orange blossom and lemon candy, Konstantin Frank's Grüner Veltliner is another standout for the region. Dry and medium-bodied in style, the palate bursts with crisp white peach and nectarine against a backdrop of lime zest and mineral tones.

properties.title: Fidelitas 2010 Champoux Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 14467 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: The oak (83% new French and American) seems a bit overweighted for the fruit that's in the bottle on this 100% varietal wine. The notes of vanilla, cocoa and woodspice get out in front of herb and cherry flavors that seem slightly stewed.

properties.title: Freixenet 2009 Vintage Reserva Sparkling (Cava)
properties.address: Carrer de Joan Sala, 2, 08770 Sant Sadurní d'Anoia, Barcelona, Spain
properties.description: This is a serious Cava for the money. It's mildly briny and dusty up front, with peach and apple notes filling out the nose. The palate is elegant and smooth enough, while apple and melon flavors are naturally spicy and ripe given the warm conditions of the '09 vintage. The long, nectarine-flavored finish will win you over.

properties.title: Gård 2011 Lawrence Vineyards Vaucluse Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 43 E Main St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: In this pungent wine, Syrah is co-fermented with a touch of Viognier, then blended with 33% Grenache. Interesting scents of diesel, soil and stem wrap into the tight red berry fruit. It rounds into a rather soft, easy-drinking red that should be consumed through 2017.

properties.title: Martin Ray 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2191 Laguna Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.description: This manages to combine instant drinkability with Napa complexity, resulting in a really nice wine. Although it's not an ager, it rises to the occasion with sweetly ripe raspberries, cherries and blackberries, plush, polished tannins and a lovely coating of smoky oak.

properties.title: Misiones de Rengo 2011 Gran Reserva Cuvée Chardonnay (Leyda Valley)
properties.address: 299, - Morán 207, Rengo, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: Peach, apple and pear aromas are smooth and easy to like. The mouthfeel is juicy and fresh, which Leyda Valley is known for, while the flavors of citrus, apple and nectarine come with acid-driven snap. As a whole, this is more fruity and focused than oaky and heavy.

properties.title: Pepi 2011 Sauvignon Blanc (California)
properties.address: 1420 3rd St, Pepin, WI 54759, USA
properties.description: Pepi is doing a great job lately making inexpensive white wines, and with this Sauvignon Blanc, the winery really knocks it out of the park. This is bone dry, mouthwateringly tart in acidity and complex, offering flavors of green grass, gooseberry, lime, vanilla and white pepper. It should be relatively easy to find thanks to its production of 10,000 cases.

properties.title: Chehalem 2011 Grüner Veltliner (Ribbon Ridge)
properties.description: A spot-on Oregon Grüner, this is dry and spicy. It's clean as a whistle, with flavors of celery, lemon and sour peach.

properties.title: Domaine du Moulin 2010 Blanc Sec Vieilles Vignes White (Gaillac)
properties.description: A blend of Sauvignon Blanc and Loin de l'Oeil, this is ripe, fruity and perfumed. It has an attractive floral character, with flavors of toast and hedgerow. It's ready to drink, but it could age.

properties.title: Duca di Salaparuta 2011 Kados Risignolo Grillo (Sicilia)
properties.description: A pure expression of Grillo, this offers clean fruit, with pristine aromas of citrus, honey and white peach. The finish is crisp and streamlined.

properties.title: Erath 2011 Pinot Gris (Oregon)
properties.address: 1439 NW Marshall St, Portland, OR 97209, USA
properties.description: Lovely notes of fresh-cut pear, pear skin and a bit of melon highlight this nicely defined wine. It's a showcase for an emerging style of Pinot Gris, which Oregon has made its own.

properties.title: Georges Vigouroux 2011 Château Baron White (Gaillac)
properties.description: A crisp and fruity blend of the herbaceous Sauvignon Blanc and the creamy Loin de l'Oeil, this has apple and grapefruit flavors. It has a bright feel, with a hint of mineral on the finish.

properties.title: Valle dell'Acate 2010 Bidis White (Sicilia)
properties.address: Contrada Bidini, 97011 Acate RG, Italy
properties.description: Aged in oak, this blend of Chardonnay and Insolia offers bold aromas of white rose, honey and stone fruit, with a soft, round palate. The creamy finish would pair well with a crab cake or a spicy Thai mango salad.

properties.title: Anam Cara 2011 Nicholas Estate Chardonnay (Chehalem Mountains)
properties.description: This is the first Chardonnay release from Anam Cara, estate grown from young vines, and softened by secondary fermentation. The flavors suggest almond and butter, light citrus, a whiff of toast and a taste of cracker. It's smooth, with a lemony finish.

properties.title: Bouchaine 2010 Bouche d'Or Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.address: 1075 Buchli Station Rd, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.description: One of the few dessert wines in California made from Chardonnay in California, this is very sweet, with a ton of residual sugar and a dominating apricot-honey note.

properties.title: Cambria 2011 Suaviter Grecanico (Sicilia)
properties.address: 5475 Chardonnay Ln, Santa Maria, CA 93454, USA
properties.description: A tight, compact expression of Grecanico, this exudes aromas of yellow rose, citrus, vanilla and exotic fruit. The pretty floral component would pair with poached salmon or trout.

properties.title: Caruso & Minini 2011 Timpune Grillo (Sicilia)
properties.address: 631 Brawley School Rd # 405, Mooresville, NC 28117, USA
properties.description: Assembled and balanced, this shows bright aromas of citrus and exotic fruit, set against fresh acidity. It's an easy-drinking option for seafood or salad.

properties.title: Clos du Bois 2009 Sonoma Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 19410 Geyserville Ave #9603, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.description: One of the most pleasurable Clos du Bois Cabernets in years, this is easy to enjoy now for its flavors of cherries, currants, tobacco, spices and smoky oak.

properties.title: Pratsch 2011 Lange Ried Riesling (Niederösterreich)
properties.description: A perfumed, fruity wine, Lange Ried, or “Long Vineyard,” is a textured and lightly minerally Riesling, with a concentrated white-fruit flavor and a crisp finish.

properties.title: Reynoso 2009 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
properties.description: This polished young wine shows the softness and slight herbaceousness that mark many Alexander Valley Cabernets. With ripe blackberry, cherry pie, red currant and mocha flavors, it's a fine wine to drink now and over the next 4–5 years.

properties.title: Merriam 2013 Bacigalupi Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: Soy and honey swirl around notes of tight-grained oak, with a touch of vanilla-caramel sweetness on the rich, toasty finish. Full flavors of baked pineapple and papaya abound on the palate and through the close.

properties.title: Noble Vines 2014 446 Chardonnay (San Bernabe)
properties.description: Brisk aromas of apple, squeezed lemon, pear flesh and a steely minerality show on the nose of this widely available wine. The palate offers candied apple, seared pear slice and a tangerine-pith grip.

properties.title: Portal del Priorat 2014 Gotes Grenache Blanc (Priorat)
properties.description: Apple and pear aromas are dusty and leesy. This varietal white Grenache feels linear, with no up or down to the mouthfeel. Flavors of citrus fruits and mango finish lean, crisp and minerally, with lemony acidity.

properties.title: Robert Hall 2014 Viognier (Paso Robles)
properties.description: A fairly action-packed nose combines yellow grapefruit, lemon blossoms, nectarine flesh and yellow melon with slate and a shred of bubblegum on the finish. The palate starts quite tight with pear rinds, and then gets riper with shaved apples, bubblegum and tropical elements.

properties.title: Twisted Cedar 2012 Chardonnay (Lodi)
properties.description: Subtle green-apple aromas and rich, ripe pear flavors make a pretty convincing argument for this full-bodied but soft-textured wine.

properties.title: Ironstone 2012 Reserve Viognier (Sierra Foothills)
properties.description: This is an assertive wine with an herbal personality. Aromas resemble citrus and fresh herbs, the flavors are citrusy and savory, and the mouthfeel is rather generous.

properties.title: Kirkland Signature 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa County)
properties.address: 14030 NE 145th St, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: This value-minded wine is made in large quantities and maintains a classic edge of red berry and cedar, grippy on the palate, but able to open up in the glass. It'll serve well as a midweek house wine or staple for larger gatherings.

properties.title: Domaine Laporte 2014 Le Grand Argentier  (Menetou-Salon)
properties.address: 62 Av. de Fontenay, 18300 Saint-Satur, France
properties.description: Herbal aromas give this young wine its freshness, with bright acidity and crisp texture. Green fruits are laced with a touch of minerality and freshness. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Domaine Reverdy-Ducroux 2014 Beau Roy  (Sancerre)
properties.description: The entry-level wine from this domaine is light and soft, offering attractively perfumed apple fruits and balanced acidity. The wine is refreshing, fruity and ready to drink.

properties.title: Virginia Dare 2014 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: Named in honor of North Carolina's first commercial winery and a woman born in the 1500s in the Lost Colony of Roanoke, this white is floral in kumquat and toffee, a mix of rich and robust that's tropical in personality. Tangy acidity closes out the finish, revealing the toasty oak it inhabited for a year.

properties.title: Waterbrook 2014 Pinot Gris (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: The wilted flower and candied fruit aromas are light. The palate has a broad, textured feel, with a touch of sugar on the finish.

properties.title: Waterbrook 2014 Sauvignon Blanc (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 10518 US-12, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: Aromas of gooseberry are out in front of kiwi and pineapple. The flavors are fleshy in feel, sweetened by a touch of sugar.

properties.title: Balverne 2013 Estate Grown Reserve Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: Honeyed in apple, pear and mango, this is a tightly wound, full-bodied wine, voluptuous and quite ripe in style.

properties.title: Bodegas Núñez 2014 Andión Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.description: Round, creamy apple aromas open things up. This is melony and soft in feel, with flavors of cider, lemon and lychee. A tropical-leaning finish is solid but suggestive of a wine in decline. Drink immediately.

properties.title: Domaine Matthias et Emile Roblin 2014 Origine  (Sancerre)
properties.address: Maimbray, 18300 Sury-en-Vaux, France
properties.description: This entry-level white from the Roblins is fresh, crisp and fruity. The light texture is dominated by acidity and the bright apple and pink-grapefruit flavors. Drink now.

properties.title: Domaine Siret-Courtaud 2014  Quincy
properties.description: From a 24-acre vineyard with vines aged from five to 65 years, this is an attractively fruity wine. Ripe apple flavors gain even greater liveliness from the twist of citrus zest. It is ready to drink with all its freshness.

properties.title: McGregor 2011 Rkatsiteli-Sereksiya White (Finger Lakes)
properties.description: This is a highly unusual, quirky blend of the Georgian Rkatsiteli and Moldovan Sereksiya grapes. Tonic and crisp, it offers robust peach and apple flavors on the attack, but fades a bit quickly on the midpalate. Straightforward but refreshing.
