properties.title: Vincent 2010 JJ Bourgogne Blanc  (Bourgogne)
properties.address: 2370 N Refugio Rd, Santa Ynez, CA 93460, USA
properties.description: This is fruity, with an apple flavor that's lifted by a lemon zest edge. It's warm with a rich, minerally tautness; a caramel note comes through on the finish.

properties.title: Georges Duboeuf 2010 Domaine de la Batie  (Saint-Véran)
properties.description: Soft, smooth and buttery, this is full of ripe tropical fruits and bright, citrusy acidity. Ready to drink.

properties.title: Haute Cabrière 2010 Chardonnay-Pinot Noir White (Franschhoek)
properties.description: Made from 70% Chardonnay and 30% Pinot Noir, this is clean yet nuanced, with subtle suggestions of strawberry hull and freshly picked herbs to the white peach and Key lime core. Medium weight, with a mouthwatering finish; drink now.

properties.title: Hogue 2011 Pinot Grigio (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: This is a lean, tart, high-acid vintage for Washington State white wines. Hogue's reliable Pinot Grigio is herbaceous and clean, fresh and tangy.

properties.title: Siesta Wines 2011 Tahuan Chardonnay (Mendoza)
properties.description: The hazy aromas of honeyed white fruits are a touch gaseous. It feels plump and nice, with soft, almost flat melon flavors. It tastes similar on the finish, showing little evolution from the palate.

properties.title: Alpha Omega 2009 Beckstoffer To Kalon Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
properties.address: 1155 Mee Ln, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: This wine's overripeness shows up in the form of a bitter, dry, raisin taste, with heat from the alcohol. It has a solid core of blackberry fruit and beautiful tannins, but it won't age.

properties.title: Domaine Hubert Lamy 2010 Les Chataigniées  (Bourgogne)
properties.description: This is laden with wood, spiced with a toast note that dominates this otherwise crisp, nervy wine. The acidity is refreshing; the citrus note creates a lively streak of freshness. This needs a few months for the wood infuence to soften.

properties.title: Domaine Jean-Claude Courtault 2010  Chablis
properties.address: 1 Rte de Montfort, 89800 Lignorelles, France
properties.description: Initially, this tastes of only crisp acidity, but the fruitier flavors of lemon and red apple come through slowly, giving weight to this lively, bright wine. The minerally, edgy texture is prominent on the finish.

properties.title: El Pensador 2011 Verdejo (Vino de la Tierra de Castilla y León)
properties.address: C. Marqués de Vadillo, 2, 10600 Plasencia, Cáceres, Spain
properties.description: Fresh, crisp and minerally on the nose, this has green apple and melon aromas. It feels fresh, juicy, light and refreshing, with high-toned white-fruit flavors as well as notes of grapefruit, herb and lime. Clean on the finish.

properties.title: Woodward Canyon 2012 Erratic Red (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.description: The second vintage of this wine produced, this blend of Mourvèdre (53%), Syrah (33%) and Grenache shows aromas of red and black fruit along with barrel spices. Still drinking young, it's filled with blackberry flavors that show good texture and richness. The wood seems a bit out front, giving a lightly grainy feel and dominating the notes on the finish.

properties.title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2013 Indian Wells Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: This lightly aromatic wine offers notes of butterscotch, peach and toasty spices. It's lighter in style with a creamy feel to the stone and tropical fruit flavors.

properties.title: Damiani 2013 Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 4704 NY-414, Burdett, NY 14818, USA
properties.description: While creamy and voluminous, this full-bodied Chardonnay boasts fresh green plum and apple flavors brightened by sunny lemon acidity. Streaks of vanilla, toast and spice are bold yet well integrated. It finishes moderately long with notes of dried herbs.

properties.title: Edetària 2013 Via Edetana White (Terra Alta)
properties.address: TV-7231, 3, 43780 Gandesa, Tarragona, Spain
properties.description: Waxy, dusty aromas of stone fruits and honey are typical of Garnatxa Blanca, although this contains 30% Viognier as well. A citrusy, direct palate with cutting acidity sets up lemon, tangerine and green-apple flavors. Only on the finish does this taste mildly yeasty and slightly buttery.

properties.title: Ferllen 2011 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.description: Smoky aromas of bacon and rubber blend with cherry and plum scents to form a good bouquet. This has a fair, fresh mouthfeel with tannic grip. Leafy flavors of plum and red currant are accented by spicy, dry, woody notes, while the finish is lightly green and oaky, with lasting spice.

properties.title: Gård 2013 Grand Klasse Riesling Lawrence Vineyards Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: This aromatic wine offers notes of lime, peach, white flowers and creamsicle. It's off dry with the neutral-oak aging providing a broad, creamy feel along with tart fruit flavors that linger.

properties.title: Goose Watch 2013 Gewürztraminer-Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.description: Perfume and spice mark this intensely fruity, blossomy blend. Intense grapefruit and lemon flavors are invigorating and racy on the palate, accented by a lingering mineral finish.

properties.title: Rutini 2011 Encuentro Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: Km 10.5, RP89, Tupungato, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: A fairly oaky bouquet with overt wood grain, vanilla and creamy aromas includes cherry and plum scents. A mostly fresh, choppy palate is a bit rough, while currant and spiced-plum flavors end with woody, medicinal accents. Overall this works well.

properties.title: Kennedy Shah 2012 Reserve DuBrul Vineyard Riesling (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 839 13th St, Hammonton, NJ 08037, USA
properties.description: This aromatic wine suggests green apple, tangerine and flowers. It drinks dry with stone fruit and citrus flavors that have a fleshy feel.

properties.title: Mark Ryan 2013 Viognier (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14475 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: Coming from a blend of Ciel du Cheval, Red Willow and Olsen vineyards, this appealing wine brings notes of pear, lemon twist and mineral. It's restrained in feel with notes of stone fruit and barrel spices.

properties.title: Murphy-Goode 2013 Single Deck Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 241 Healdsburg Ave, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Ethereal and light, this is an understated Chardonnay for the producer, who offers several variations on the grape this vintage, this one sourced from an Eastside Road estate vineyard. Beeswax, tropical papaya and pear are the highlights, with a finish dusted in vanilla.

properties.title: Page Mill Winery 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
properties.description: Bright, fresh fruit and dried herb aromas combine with lively but concentrated and tannic fruit flavors in this big but well-behaved wine. The texture balances lavishness with a bit of astringency in an attractive and appetizing way.

properties.title: Pascal Bouchard 2011 Le Classique  (Chablis)
properties.description: This is an attractive light and fruity wine. It has fresh fruit flavors, with notes of crisp citrus and green apple. A touch of vanilla and a smooth texture surface as it opens up.

properties.title: Pierre André 2010 Réserve  (Bourgogne)
properties.address: 30 Fbg Saint-Georges, 84350 Courthézon, France
properties.description: Soft and rounded, this has an attractive fresh-fruit character. It's warm with a yellow fruit flavor; a crisp touch of grapefruit tempers the richness.

properties.title: Six Prong 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.description: With scents that are high toned and slightly green, this sharp and leafy Cabernet includes smaller percentages of Malbec, Petit Verdot and Merlot that are sourced from the Alder Ridge Vineyard. Compact flavors of cassis, smoke and earth combine to form its core.

properties.title: Storks' Tower 2011 Sauvignon Blanc-Verdejo (Vino de la Tierra de Castilla y León)
properties.description: Crisp and likable, this smells stony and snappy, with spring pea, passion fruit and citrus aromas. It feels well cut, with green bean, grass and citrus flavors. While it hints at being vegetal, it maintains a consistent white-fruit and citrus profile.

properties.title: Airfield Estates 2011 Unoaked Chardonnay (Yakima Valley)
properties.description: Sharp and spicy, this is a high-acid, stainless-steel-fermented wine, with a green berry note and a hint of melon.

properties.title: Bodega Catena Zapata 2011 High Mountain Vines Chardonnay (Mendoza)
properties.address: Cobos S/N, M5509 Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: The waxy, dusty aromas of apple are calm and regular. It feels a bit flat, with oaky flavors of apple, melon, vanilla and resin. The finish feels resiny too, but overall it's good in a regular, popular style.

properties.title: Chalk Hill 2010 North Slope Pinot Gris (Chalk Hill)
properties.address: 10300 Chalk Hill Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: There's plenty of ripe, sweet pineapple, orange and lime flavors in this wine, which is brightened by crisp acidity. It tastes a little on the sweet side, but feels sophisticated.

properties.title: Domaine du Chardonnay 2010  Chablis
properties.address: Moulins du, Le Pâtis, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: This shows more texture than fruit, but it has weight and richness that will come forward in the next two years. Its clean apple fruit is likely to be the dominant factor.

properties.title: Domaine Laroche 2011 Saint-Martin  (Chablis)
properties.description: This is crisp and attractively citrusy, with a touch of caramel. It's bright and fruity, with apple and lemon flavors that are well integrated with the piercingly refreshing acidity. Screwcap.

properties.title: Verderol 2011 Spring in a Bottle Verdejo (Rueda)
properties.description: This feels mildly citric, with limited portions of lemon, apple and peach making up the flavor profile. Mild on the finish.

properties.title: Rose 'N' Blum 2011 Pinot Grigio (California)
properties.address: 10 Clay St, Oakland, CA 94607, USA
properties.description: This tastes a little sweet, in the Rosenblum style, with apricot, orange and pear flavors. But it's nicely crisp in acidity, which gives it a clean finish. Delightful now as a cocktail sipper.

properties.title: V. Sattui 2011 Riesling (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 1111 White Ln, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: There's lots of sweetness in this polished wine, with pretty orange, peach, vanilla and honeysuckle flavors. It would benefit from greater acidity, though, as it's a bit soft.

properties.title: Langtry 2012 Tephra Ridge Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Lake County)
properties.address: 21000 Butts Canyon Rd, Middletown, CA 95461, USA
properties.description: Aromas like cedar and mint are attractive and tempting. Concentrated black-cherry flavors fill out a broad mouthfeel and lingering finish. A fine-grained layer of tannins adds structure, keeping everything balanced.

properties.title: Kaleidos 2015 Grenache Blanc (Paso Robles)
properties.description: Very light in the glass, this wine by Steve Martell strikes a singular stone-fruit note at first, then slides into pluot, Gala apple and fresh, margarita-like lime tones. Specks of focused acidity rule the palate, where a poached-pear warmth shows on the midpalate yet the edges are sharpened by bergamot and Mexican lime zest. The finish tingles the tongue nicely.

properties.title: Landmark 2014 Hilliard Bruce Vineyard Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.description: Dried apples, a touch of lime zest, fresh chamomile and a ripe nectarine-flesh element show on the nose of this bottling. The palate plays to the citrus side of the grape, with underripe tangerine and tangy lime forming laser-sharp focus across minerally chalky touches.

properties.title: Leverage 2014 Acceleration Red (Paso Robles)
properties.description: Fresh hibiscus, black plum and smashed olallieberry meet with vibrant florality and wide range of dark spice on the nose of this blend of 70% Grenache and 30% Syrah. A pepper-laced structure releases flavors of black cherry, cola and a touch of charcoal on the well-hewn palate.

properties.title: Lucas & Lewellen 2013 Valley View Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: Lucas, TX, USA
properties.description: This distinctive bottling offers aromas of tobacco, wet coffee grounds, roasted pasilla chili, charcoal and charred beef that seem curious at first but quickly grow interesting. The palate shows much of the same, recalling a chile-flecked dark-chocolate brownie served atop a black cherry-blackberry reduction sauce.

properties.title: Maloney 2013 Single Vineyard Scotteney Flats Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 2602 Templeton Rd, Templeton, CA 93465, USA
properties.description: This is the second vintage in this series from former Ste. Michelle winemaker Joshua Maloney. The aromas are brooding, with notes of blue and black fruit while the flavors are ripe and full, showing intensity along with a firm lick of tannins that need some time to settle in. Best after 2020.

properties.title: Olivier Leflaive 2014  Chassagne-Montrachet
properties.description: This is a blend of several parcels throughout the appellation including some Premier Crus. It has the power of the appellation along with the elegant Leflaive house style. That makes for a fine structured wine with great acidity, apple and pineapple fruit and a strongly mineral aftertaste. Drink starting from 2019.

properties.title: Once and It's Gone 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 10216 US-259, Broken Bow, OK 74728, USA
properties.description: This affordable wine impresses in smoky, charred oak and a full, robust profile that it embraces completely. Leather, blackberry and black pepper combine on the palate for power and a lengthy, lasting impression on the finish.

properties.title: Rideau 2014 Sierra Madre Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.description: A light lemon-curd component decorates the tangy yogurt and fresh lily aromas on the nose of this bottling from a historic vineyard. It is very grippy on the palate, where the intriguing texture carries flavors of orange rind, tangerine pith, lime zest and a touch of pan-roasted pine nuts.

properties.title: Four Sisters Ranch 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 2995 Pleasant Rd, San Miguel, CA 93451, USA
properties.description: Smoke, red cherry and crushed black rocks combine for the intriguing nose of this bottling that includes 14% Malbec. It's juicy on the palate but put together very well, with ripe red cherry serving as the backbone to roasted meat, black licorice, dill and molasses flavors.

properties.title: Henri Bourgeois 2015 En Travertin  (Pouilly-Fumé)
properties.address: 3535 Guerneville Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.description: The small village of Saint-Andelain is at the heart of Sauvignon Blanc in Pouilly Fumé. This wine is ripe with melon and peach flavors cut with intense acidity. It is well textured, full bodied and should be held until well into 2017.

properties.title: Jorge Ordóñez & Co. 2014 Selección Especial Moscatel (Málaga)
properties.address: 222 E Ridge Rd, McAllen, TX 78503, USA
properties.description: Orange peel and pine are the main aromas on a slightly oily nose. This feels full and balanced, with flavors of mango, banana and lychee. There isn't a lot of complexity to a citrusy finish, but this still ranks as an excellent sweet Moscatel.

properties.title: Finca Decero 2013 Remolinos Vineyard Agrelo Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.description: Mellow earthy aromas of mossy black fruits, vanilla and licorice feed into a smooth palate with moderate depth and layering. Blackened flavors of coffee and dark chocolate accent black-fruit and mushroom notes, while this finishes with prune, pepper and toasty flavors along with a glassy feel. Drink through 2019.

properties.title: Girard 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1077 Dunaweal Ln, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.description: This full-bodied, value-conscious wine offers a wealth of red currant, berry and tightly woven tannin. It shows both structure and a cooler-climate imprint of dried herb, cedar and sage.

properties.title: Dutton-Goldfield 2013 Dutton Ranch Walker Hill Vineyard Chardonnay (Green Valley)
properties.address: 3100 Gravenstein Hwy N, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.description: Decadently rich in caramel and vanilla on the nose, this vineyard-designate evolves into more delicate floral elements, with a depth of spicy oak and baked apple and pear. Throughout the medium body and medium acidity is a freshness of lemon and lime, with a slight twist of tangerine.

properties.title: Upchurch 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
properties.description: The aromas of herbs, dark fruit and graphite are brooding and wound up on first pour. The palate is highly structured with plentiful black-fruit flavors that show exquisite balance and a finish that carries into the distance. Its best days are far in front of it. Enjoy after 2018.

properties.title: MacRostie 2013 Dutton Ranch Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: This is a hearty wine from a famous place, farmed by esteemed, long-time growers. Apple and pear skin show up first, with a baked quality to the fruit that never gets jammy. The wine stays light and bright despite its full-bodied nature. Toasty lemon and fig compote finishes things off.

properties.title: Joseph Swan Vineyards 2014 Catie's Corner Viognier (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 2916 Laguna Rd, Forestville, CA 95436, USA
properties.description: This is an exceptionally well-crafted version of the variety from a tremendous site for the grape. Whole-cluster pressed and fermented in stainless steel, it retains fresh acidity that gives it lively tension on the palate, a foundation for briny lemon zest and classic floral notes.

properties.title: Conn Creek 2014 Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.address: 8711 Silverado Trail, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: A streak of confectionary nougat and lemony acidity combine for a smooth, well-integrated wine, full bodied in style, that's lip-smacking in apple-cider juiciness on the finish.

properties.title: Damien et Romain Bouchard 2013 Vaillons Premier Cru  (Chablis)
properties.address: 225 Westminster St, Providence, RI 02903, USA
properties.description: Vaillons is on the left bank of Serein river across from the slope of Grand Cru vineyards. This wine, made from organically grown grapes, is ripe while also having a tense, steely texture that will allow it to develop for several years. Apple and pink-grapefruit flavors are lifted by nervy acidity. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Domaine du Vieux Lazaret 2012 White (Châteauneuf-du-Pape)
properties.description: Subtle smoky notes add complexity to this ripe, full-bodied wine (the Roussanne component is aged in barrel). Combine that with Grenache Blanc, Clairette and Bourboulenc and the results come together in a whirl of honey, pineapple and citrus that is long, crisp and mouthwatering on the finish. Drink now–2020.

properties.title: Domaine Sangouard-Guyot 2014 Quintessence  (Pouilly-Fuissé)
properties.description: Quintessence is a good name for this wine that has the minerality and the structure that are the soul of the appellation. In addition it offers apricot and pear fruitiness and intense acidity. This wine is so drinkable now, although it will be much better from 2018.

properties.title: Starmont 2010 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Dry and crisp in acidity, with citrus flavors, but fundamentally unripe. It has a strong streak of green chlorophyll, mint and ammonia that could charitably be described as gooseberry.

properties.title: Wines & Winemakers 2010 Azul Portugal Rosé (Setubal)
properties.address: 701 W 11th St, Coffeyville, KS 67337, USA
properties.description: Caramel and strawberry aromas lead to a ripe, while still, crisp crushed red berry wine. Good acidity, a light just off-dry texture.

properties.title: Dewitt 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
properties.description: One-dimensional and silky, with candied cherry and raspberry flavors that finish a little sweet.

properties.title: Lagosta 2010 Vinho Rosé (Vinho Verde)
properties.address: 901 E Cayuga St, Philadelphia, PA 19124, USA
properties.description: Sweet rosé from the Vinho Verde region, this has some fresh raspberry and a light prickle to make it just that extra bit refreshing.

properties.title: Cupcake 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
properties.address: 8300 St Helena Hwy, Rutherford, CA 94573, USA
properties.description: Not much going on in this dry wine. It's thin in fruit, making the acidity stick out with a sharp cut.

properties.title: Domaine Chêne 2007  Mâcon-Villages
properties.address: 1712 Industrial Way, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.description: A wine that is absolutely mature, showing almonds and secondary flavors:  green herbs, yeast and toast rather than fruit.

properties.title: Finca Vides 2009 Torcidas Chardonnay (Mendoza)
properties.address: Pueyrredón 2222, Chacras de Coria, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: A little hard on the nose, with burnt undertones. The palate is hollow in the middle and the wine collapses on itself. As for flavors, look for mildly toasted and creamy white fruits and vanilla.

properties.title: Hope Estate 2009 Verdelho (Hunter Valley)
properties.description: This starts off slightly rubbery, but comes around quickly enough to display ample white grapefruit and pith notes. It's a bit tight and austere from start to finish; probably at its best with seafood.

properties.title: Trivento 2009 Golden Reserve Chardonnay (Mendoza)
properties.address: RP60 & Jerónimo Ruiz, M5517, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: A lot of oak. The nose is honeyed and heavy, with too much toast and butter. In the mouth, it's got kicking acids but the flavors are sweet, oaky and veer toward banana. Resiny on the finish; underwhelming for the price.

properties.title: Yangarra Estate Vineyard 2009 Roussanne (McLaren Vale)
properties.address: 809 McLaren Flat Rd, Kangarilla SA 5157, Australia
properties.description: This is a nutty, almondy rendition of Roussanne, almost to the extent of veiling the remaining pineapple-tinged fruit. It's broad in the mouth and soft in texture, with a trace of warmth on the finish.

properties.title: Caves du Val de France 2009 Jovly  (Vouvray)
properties.description: What would convince a producer to call a wine Jovly seems to be a mystery. That said, the wine is fresh, rounded with plenty of orange juice acidity, honey and a soft finish. Screwcap.

properties.title: Verum 2010 Chardonnay (Patagonia)
properties.description: Generic melon and peach aromas precede a slightly forced and sweet palate with melony flavors and some tail-end bitterness. The finish is creamy and shows vanilla as well as peach and toast notes. Very basic Chardonnay given the price.

properties.title: Joseph Drouhin 2009 Laforet  (Bourgogne)
properties.address: 7 Rue d'Enfer, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: Soft Chardonnay, with pear and walnut flavors, light acidity and rounded buttery flavors. There is an attractive final richness.

properties.title: Les Vignerons de la Méditerranée 2009 Réserve St. Martin Cabernet Sauvignon (Vin de Pays d'Oc)
properties.description: Here's a simple but enjoyable Cab with notes of black plum, violet and cassis. Medium weight with soft tannins and a solid finish.

properties.title: Sauvion 2010 Loire Valley  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
properties.address: Château du Cleray, 44330 Vallet, France
properties.description: Lightweight fresh fruit flavors, mostly grapefruit and clean freshness. The wine is attractively fruity in style.

properties.title: Maddalena 2013 Riesling (Monterey)
properties.address: Los Angeles, CA 90033, USA
properties.description: This slightly sweet but utterly fresh bottling shows lime zest, honey dust, ripe red apples, lemon candy and spicy jasmine on the nose. There is nearly effervescent acidity on the palate, with strong night-jasmine notes, orange blossom and lemon verbena spicing up the apple-driven fruit core.

properties.title: Ponzi 2015 Pinot Noir Rosé (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 19500 SW Mountain Home Rd, Sherwood, OR 97140, USA
properties.description: Fresh and forward flavors mix rhubarb, ripe strawberries and sweet Bing cherries. This vibrant wine finishes with a refreshing snap of acidity, making it a pleasure to drink.

properties.title: Quinta de Chocapalha 2014 Arinto (Lisboa)
properties.description: The Arinto is a local grape as far as Lisboa is concerned, and this wine seems right at home here. Made from old vines, it is fresh, tangy and destined to be drunk young with locally-caught Atlantic Ocean fish. The wine has a pure, clean, perfumed aftertaste. Drink now.

properties.title: Quintas de Melgaço 2015 QM Terra Antiga White (Vinho Verde)
properties.address: Ferreiros de Cima, 4960-010, Portugal
properties.description: This wine is all about fruit. It is dry and so fresh and crisp with apple and green pear flavors. There is a light prickle there that adds a dancing lightness to this refreshing wine.

properties.title: Refugio Ranch 2014 Viognier (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 2990 Grand Ave, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.description: An intriguing waxy character shows strongly on the nose of this bottling, with ripe lime and green-apple aromas as well. The flavors are light and delicate, with a touch of pomelo that grows with patience into more tropical yet still restrained papaya and bubblegum elements.

properties.title: Heron 2014 Chardonnay (Mendocino)
properties.address: 2269 Chestnut St, San Francisco, CA 94123, USA
properties.description: Citrus and green apple flavors give this dry and nicely tangy wine a versatile, tasty character that turns richer with each sip. It has excellent balance between crisp fruit and a generous texture.

properties.title: JAQK Cellars 2013 High Roller Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
properties.description: Steely lemon and low oak star in this unfussy wine, which remains light bodied in spirit despite a rich finish of marshmallow and vanilla.

properties.title: Karl Schaefer 2014 Dry Grauburgunder (Pfalz)
properties.address: Weinstraße S 30, 67098 Bad Dürkheim, Germany
properties.description: Whiffs of brioche and biscuit mingle with pressed apple and pear in this sprightly dry Grauburgunder, or Pinot Gris. It's delicate in fruit concentration but its zesty, nimble style is refreshing. Drink now through 2018.

properties.title: Saddleback 2014 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 7802 Money Rd, Oakville, CA 94562, USA
properties.description: Lean and rich at the same time, this wine offers a brightness of citrus and pear at the entry. The midpalate becomes heavier in oak and ripe in tropical flavor.

properties.title: Snowden 2013 The Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Super-dark in color, this extracted wine offers a reductive note on the nose, followed by a rustic tinge of hay and brick. Intensely flavored and oaked, it finishes unexpectedly herbal and dry.

properties.title: Ventisquero 2013 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Apalta, Santa Cruz, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: Chunky, herbal berry and plum aromas are the introduction. A tight, grabby, tannic palate delivers herbal plum and berry flavors backed by scratchy tannins. Overall, this is a good and fair rendition of Chilean Cabernet.

properties.title: Viluko 2014 Estate Sauvignon Blanc (Sonoma County)
properties.description: This is a full-bodied, unctuous white with a wealth of wood influence. It tempers in the glass into a mix of melon, stone fruit and vanilla.

properties.title: Concha y Toro 2014 Casillero del Diablo Reserva Privada Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
properties.description: Piercing aromas of red-berry fruits and red-apple skins are a touch rough but improve with airing. This feels fresh, medium in size, and tastes of herbal plum and cherry prior to a lightly herbal finish.

properties.title: Domdechant Werner 2012 Hochheimer Domdechaney Spätlese Riesling (Rheingau)
properties.description: Green floral notes and juicy, ripe white peaches perfume this complex medium-sweet Riesling. It's ethereal on the palate but penetrating with stone fruit flavors and a sunny, bright tangerine acidity. Finishes with a lingering slick of wet-stone minerality.

properties.title: Errazuriz 2011 Viñedo Chadwick Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
properties.description: Confident, smoky aromas of black fruits, quality oak and minerality set up a round, dense, smooth palate that's as elegant as things get in Chile. True Cabernet Sauvignon flavors are spicy, lightly herbal and suggest licorice, cassis and blackberry. On the finish, warm oak, menthol and medicinal flavors call for another few years in bottle. Best from 2016–2023.

properties.title: Gérard Bertrand 2011 Le Viala Red (Minervois La Liviniere)
properties.address: Dom. de l'Hospitalet, 11100 Narbonne, France
properties.description: This is a dense, flavorful and powerfully structured wine, brimming with notes of black cherry, plum, currant, baking spice, black pepper, crushed violet and bittersweet chocolate. It's full and chewy on the palate, with a firm structure and gripping tannins. Hints of licorice root, mocha and toasted sweet spice unfold on the finish. It's delicious now, but it should hold well through 2020.

properties.title: The Eyrie Vineyards 2012 Estate Chardonnay (Dundee Hills)
properties.description: Savory and deep, it carries lovely details of earth and herb, balanced against flavors of lightly spiced apples. As with all the Eyrie wines from this outstanding vintage, it's unique, compelling and utterly original.

properties.title: Bischöfliche Weingüter Trier 2012 Scharzhofberger Spätlese Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Gervasiusstraße 1, 54290 Trier, Germany
properties.description: Exotically floral and spicy, this delivers an intoxicating blend of exuberance and elegance. While delicately framed, the palate is rich, ripe and juicy, with sweet yellow-cherry and apricot flavors, and a slick of wax and honey. It's brisk and nervy, yet finishes remarkably long, with a swathe of green herbal tones.

properties.title: Joseph Mellot 2012 La Grande Cuvée des Edvins  (Pouilly-Fumé)
properties.description: The top Pouilly Fumé from Joseph Mellot is a complex wine with rich, rounded fruits touched by wood aging. Yellow fruits dominate, given a further lift by apple acidity and a smoky flavor. Delicious now, it's a powerful wine that could age further, so keep until 2015.

properties.title: King Estate 2012 Pfeiffer Vineyards Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
properties.description: Floral scents greet you at first, a beguiling mix of clover and apple blossom. Pineapple, tangerine and nectarine fruit flavors follow, big and full, finishing with an interesting whiff of almond.

properties.title: La Follette 2011 Manchester Ridge Vineyard Chardonnay (Mendocino Ridge)
properties.address: 409A Healdsburg Ave, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Greg La Follette shows his mastery with this Chardonnay from cool Manchester Ridge. Dark gold in color, this ethereal wine is punctuated by pretty floral and citrus tones on the nose. On the palate, expect a suggestive core of lemon, guava and lingering minerality, especially through a finish that's flush with acidity.

properties.title: August Kesseler 2011 Cuvée Max Qualitätswein Trocken Spätburgunder (Rheingau)
properties.address: Lorcher Str. 16, 65385 Rüdesheim am Rhein, Germany
properties.description: This is a standout amongst an increasing number of German Pinot Noir now available stateside. While youthful still with aromas of fresh black cherries and berries, it's layered with shades of bramble, herb and granite, suggesting a long evolution that's still ahead. Elegantly structured with cranberry acidity and fine, penetrating tannins, it's a balanced wine that's sexy and seductive.

properties.title: August Kesseler 2012 Rüdesheim Berg Schlossberg Qualitätswein Grosses Gewächs Trocken Riesling (Rheingau)
properties.description: Hints of pine and forest floor lend a cool, alpine feel to elegant white peach and blossom notes in this dry-style Riesling. The palate is ripe, rich and dense with stone fruit flavor, yet balanced with bracing lime acidity and fresh, green herb notes that linger brightly on the finish.

properties.title: Spann Vineyards 2012 Yin-Yang Chardonnay-Viognier (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 8910 Sonoma Hwy, Kenwood, CA 95452, USA
properties.description: An equal partnership between Chardonnay and Viognier, this wine is brisk and slightly austere, the nose floral in geranium and the fruit profile of apple, pear and pineapple light and subtle.

properties.title: P.J. Valckenberg 2013 Undone Dry Riesling (Rheinhessen)
properties.address: Am Bogen 18, 67593 Westhofen, Germany
properties.description: Zesty lemon and lime aromas mingle with tart white peach and apple on this dry, medium-bodied wine. It's stark and mineral on the palate, with nervous acidity that reverberates through the finish.

properties.title: Barton & Guestier 2013 Passeport  (Bordeaux Blanc)
properties.address: 6161 S Yale Ave, Tulsa, OK 74136, USA
properties.description: The blend of Sauvignon Blanc and Sémillon has produced an attractive, fruity wine that's young and fresh. Light and bright, with delicious final acidity, its structure suggests it could age; drink from the end of 2015.

properties.title: Blümel 2013 Michelsberg Riesling (Rheinhessen)
properties.address: Friedrich-Ebert-Straße 58, 67574 Osthofen, Germany
properties.description: Subtle aromas of lemon, lime and crushed stone intensify through the palate of this dry, strikingly acidic Riesling. The mouthfeel is lean and lithe, finishing savory, on a dusty pollen note.

properties.title: Courtney Benham 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2191 Laguna Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.description: Grippy and surrounded in a thick, leathery texture and aroma, it holds bright cranberry tones underneath the thickness, making this a palatable Cabernet.

properties.title: Dr. H. Thanisch (Erben Müller-Burggraef) 2013 Bernkastel Feinherb Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Junkerland 14, 54470 Bernkastel-Kues, Germany
properties.description: Honeysuckle perfume shines light on this lean, strikingly brisk wine. Almost dry in style, it's tart and tight, yet refreshingly quaffable through the finish.

properties.title: flipflop 2012 Chardonnay (California)
properties.description: Herbal and appley aromas lead to soft apple and melon flavors in this lively wine. With another sip, a creamy texture and richness come out that add an extra dimension of interest to this inexpensive wine that's hardly a flop.

properties.title: Weingut Georg Albrecht Schneider 2013 Vom Rotliegenden Red Soil Trocken Riesling (Rheinhessen)
properties.description: Spine-tingling lime and lemon notes dominate this light-footed dry Riesling. Refreshingly mineral on the palate, it finishes brisk and clean.

properties.title: Workman Ayer 2013 Ipso Facto Viognier (Central Coast)
properties.description: A rich and perfumed honeysuckle character picks up bubblegum on the sweet-leaning nose. It slips toward flatness on the palate, with smoked peach and more bubblegum saying short hellos.

properties.title: Produttori Vini Manduria 2016 AKA Primitivo Rosato (Salento)
properties.address: Via Fabio Massimo, 19, 74024 Manduria TA, Italy
properties.description: This has intense aromas of chopped sage, mint and Mediterranean scrub. The herbaceous notes carry over to the fresh juicy palate along with Marasca cherry, raspberry and just a whisper of peppercorn.

properties.title: Ribafreixo 2014 Pato Frio Grand Escolha Antão Vaz (Alentejano)
properties.description: After aging in bottle, this wood-aged wine has smoothed out to produce a rich wine with balanced fruit, acidity and toastiness. The wine does have plenty of spice from the wood, but it also has layers of citrus and pear-fruit flavors. Drink this wine now.

properties.title: Seven Angels 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
properties.description: This nose of this wine shy at first, before blackberry paste, hibiscus and cola aromas arise. It's medium-bodied on the palate, with bright blueberry, marjoram and black pepper flavors, bound together by prominent acidity.

properties.title: Tenuta di Angoris 2015 Pinot Grigio (Collio)
properties.address: Località Angoris, 7, 34071 Cormons GO, Italy
properties.description: Ripe and juicy, this offers aromas of pressed spring flower and yellow stone fruit. On the bright palate, a note of candied nectarine zest accents ripe yellow apple and dried apricot.

properties.title: Joseph Cattin 2016 Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 35 Rue Roger Frémeaux, 68420 Vœgtlinshoffen, France
properties.description: A slightly earthy note colors the apple and lemon aromas on the nose. The palate shows lots of freshness and has a tart, light and dry body. The finish is lemony and fresh. Drink while aromas are expressive.

properties.title: Leyda 2015 Lot 5 Chardonnay (Leyda Valley)
properties.address: Leyda, San Antonio, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.description: Aromas of starched sheets and lanolin show a hint of apple. This feels rather lean and similar to soda: there isn't much body to it. Tropical melony flavors are oaky, and the finish turns downright woody and sweet like canned pineapple.

properties.title: Acquiesce 2015 Viognier (Lodi)
properties.address: 22353 N Tretheway Rd, Acampo, CA 95220, USA
properties.description: A relatively light-tasting wine from a sometimes heavy grape variety, this shows a mix of savory and fruit flavors, including cucumber, celery and white pepper. It tastes dry and almost austere, which is appealing in the right pairing, such as with goat cheese on toast.

properties.title: Beronia 2016 Verdejo (Rueda)
properties.description: This standard Verdejo is light on acidity, which is reflective of a hot year. Its citrus and green herb notes are fresh and prickly while its melon and thyme flavors lose intensity on the slightly bitter finish.

properties.title: Boeger 2016 Primitivo Rosé (El Dorado)
properties.address: 1709 Carson Rd, Placerville, CA 95667, USA
properties.description: As if its electric pink color wasn't enough to attract attention, this medium-bodied wine has effusive candied fruit aromas and just-picked red fruit flavors. Flavor intensity and good acidity give it a lot of personality.

properties.title: Bridlewood 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3010 Roblar Ave, Santa Ynez, CA 93460, USA
properties.description: Deep black plum aromas are enhanced by soy and crushed graphite on the nose of this bottling. It lands on the palate softly, with tangy plum and turned loam flavors, its tannins sticky and persistent.

properties.title: Torres 2013 Milmanda Chardonnay (Conca de Barberà)
properties.address: Carrer de Miquel Torres i Carbó, 6, 08720 Vilafranca del Penedès, Barcelona, Spain
properties.description: On the nose, this aging Chardonnay brings corn to mind. Its palate is neither exciting nor flawed, with melon and stone fruit flavors that are yeasty and short, finishing on a bready and slightly oxidized note. Not a great value for its price.

properties.title: J. Portugal Ramos 2016 Pouca Roupa Branco White (Alentejano)
properties.address: Adega Vila Santa, Estrada Nacional 4, 7100-149 Estremoz, Portugal
properties.description: This open, perfumed and fruity wine is crisp and bright. It also has a warm, apricot and ripe pear fruitiness that balances the citrus acidity. It's attractive now and ready to drink.

properties.title: Antler Hill 2014 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 225 Winery Rd, Asheville, NC 28803, USA
properties.description: A wine of moderate build and mouth-coating concentration, this shows a dusty plume of tannin and plum and soy flavors.

properties.title: Balduzzi 2016 Reserva Sauvignon Blanc (Maule Valley)
properties.description: Snappy grapefruit and tangerine aromas are clean and crisp. That also describes the palate on this Maule Valley SB. Fairly intense flavors of lemon-lime and grapefruit cruise across a racy, unbroken finish.

properties.title: Ca' Rugate 2015 Monte Alto  (Soave Classico)
properties.address: Via Pergola, 36, 37030 Montecchia di Crosara VR, Italy
properties.description: Aromas of toast, oak and yellow flower lead the nose. Aged in large casks and barriques, the linear, if somewhat lean, palate offers golden apple and lemon zest alongside tangy acidity.

properties.title: Château Buisson-Redon 2016  Bordeaux Blanc
properties.address: 130 Howell St, Dallas, TX 75207, USA
properties.description: This refreshing wine from the Seze family of Fronsac is light, crisp and packed with fruit. Crisp with citrus flavors it is ready to drink now.

properties.title: Château de l'Aubrade 2016 Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
properties.description: Balanced acidity and fruit give this Lobre wine its immediate attraction. It has a bright character, the fruit and the acidity in harmony. Drink this ripe wine now.

properties.title: Château du Moulin 2015  Entre-Deux-Mers
properties.address: 4 Les Thorins, 71570 Romanèche-Thorins, France
properties.description: A crisp blend of Sémillon, Sauvignon Blanc and Muscadelle, this is a ripe wine, showing the warmth of this vintage. It is lightly perfumed with apricot and red-apple flavors. The aftertaste is all about tangy fruit. Drink now.

properties.title: Château le Grand Verdus 2016  Bordeaux Blanc
properties.address: Grand Verdus, 33670 Sadirac, France
properties.description: This concentrated, herbal wine has a good balance between the great fruit and the tangy, zesty texture. With its fruity character and spicy aftertaste, it's already a pleasure to drink.

properties.title: Château Mont-Pérat 2016  Bordeaux Blanc
properties.description: Crisp and fruity, this wine is full of apple and citrus flavors. It also features a touch of wood and spice, with a creamy aftertaste from the light wood aging. Drink now.

properties.title: Château Petit Moulin 2016 Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
properties.address: 4 Les Thorins, 71570 Romanèche-Thorins, France
properties.description: This is a tight, mineral-textured wine. Crisp fruit keeps it bright, but the texture adds a more serious, structured note. Wait until late 2017 for it to come completely together.

properties.title: Coquelicot 2016 Riesling
properties.description: A sweet smell of honeysuckle and grapefruit candy permeates the nose of this bottling, along with cut honeydew melon and apple blossom. Sugary mandarin juice is the primary flavor on the palate, but it's properly offset by acidity a chalky texture.

properties.title: Matetic 2010 EQ Chardonnay (San Antonio)
properties.address: Fundo el Rosario, Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.description: Toasty and mellow on the nose, with aromas of baked apple and papaya. It feels good, with lively acidity that boosts the wine's core texture. Meanwhile, flavors of toasted apple and quince get richness from vanilla and oak accents. Long, viscous and baked on the finish.

properties.title: Mi Sueño 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Soft, rich and smooth, this has upfront flavors of blackberry jam, black currants, black licorice and dark chocolate, with a hint of raisin on the finish. Drink it over the next few years for maximum freshness.

properties.title: Montemaggiore 2011 3 Divas White (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: Via delle Cave, 3, 61030 Montemaggiore Al Metauro PU, Italy
properties.description: A Russian River interpretation of a Rhône blend, this is made from Viognier, Marsanne and Roussanne. It's dry and marked by zesty acidity and just a hint of oak. The pineapple, lime, pear, peach and white pepper flavors are rich. This is a genuinely food-friendly wine.

properties.title: Morgan 2011 Sauvignon Blanc (Monterey)
properties.address: 204 Crossroads Blvd, Carmel-By-The-Sea, CA 93923, USA
properties.description: This is a real New Zealand-style Sauvignon Blanc. It's dry and tart, with rich gooseberry, lime, green apple, Asian pear, vanilla and white pepper flavors. A touch of oak brings a pleasant, buttery toastiness. The grapes come from the cool Arroyo Seco AVA and the warm San Lucas AVA, a brilliant blending decision that makes this wine especially balanced.

properties.title: Navarro 2011 Table Wine Chardonnay (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 5601 CA-128, Philo, CA 95466, USA
properties.description: This Anderson Valley Chardonnay is creamy with a caramel-lemon imprint, yet  textured and vibrant with bright acidity. A bite of lime marks the finish.

properties.title: Terre del Principe 2009 Ambruco Pallagrello (Terre del Volturno)
properties.address: Via Municipio, 4, 81010 Castel Campagnano CE, Italy
properties.description: This has bright aromas of maraschino, tobacco, bitter chocolate, prune and dusty mineral. There's a tightness to the mouthfeel that is reinforced by acidity and long-lasting berry flavors.

properties.title: Chehalem 2011 Three Vineyard Riesling (Willamette Valley)
properties.description: Using grapes from all three estate vineyards, this slightly sweet (2.5% residual sugar) Riesling is textural and complex. Flavors of fruit skin and rind dominate, notably grapefruit and peach pit.

properties.title: Feudi della Medusa 2009 Alba Nora Chardonnay (Isola dei Nuraghi)
properties.address: Via S. Michele, 36, 09010 Pula CA, Italy
properties.description: A unique expression of Chardonnay, this has oxidized aromas of butterscotch and candied fruit, backed by apricot, cinnamon and nutmeg tones. Creamy and rich, this wine has a zesty and bright finish.

properties.title: Adelsheim 2011 Bryan Creek Vineyard Pinot Blanc (Chehalem Mountains)
properties.description: Adelsheim does a superlative job keeping stylistic consistency. This high acid, lemony Pinot Blanc has a fine mineral underpinning and a fresh, clean attack.

properties.title: Anam Cara 2011 Nicholas Estate Riesling (Chehalem Mountains)
properties.address: 306 N Main St, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.description: The alcohol is just 9.1%, with residual sugar of 3.6%, yet the wine does not taste that sweet. This is a wine that snaps back and forth from tart and tangy to fruity and sweet, with a juicy kick to the finish. It maintains good concentration and acidity throughout.

properties.title: Barboursville Vineyards 2007 Malvaxia Passito White (Virginia)
properties.address: 17655 Winery Rd, Barboursville, VA 22923, USA
properties.description: To make this luscious wine, Muscat Ottonel and the hybrid Vidal Blanc are air dried on open racks, causing the grapes to raisin, concentrating their sugars. The result is a decadent wine with expressive aromas of apricot purée, tea and baking spice, plus a drizzle of caramel. It feels opulent and weighty, with a wash of zesty acidity and a zing of tangerine on the finish.

properties.title: Chateau Mourgues du Gres 2010 Les Galets Rosés Rosé (Costières de Nîmes)
properties.address: 1055 chemin des Mourgues du Grès, 30300 Beaucaire, France
properties.description: This enchanting rosé starts off slightly flinty and citrusy on the nose, but follows up on the palate with waves of creamy concentration and ripe berry fruit balanced by a bright, refreshing finish.

properties.title: Château Pesquié 2009 Quintessence Red (Ventoux)
properties.description: Pesquié's red Quintessence is a blend of 80% Syrah and 20% Grenache, aged in oak barrels. The result features plenty of spices, like clove, nutmeg and cinnamon, but also lush cassis and raspberry fruit and a velvety texture. Drink now–2016.

properties.title: Colutta 2007 Picolit (Colli Orientali del Friuli)
properties.address: Via Orsaria, 32, 33044 Manzano UD, Italy
properties.description: Packaged in a long, elegant bottle with a wax seal, this precious Picolit dessert wine offers aromas of stone fruit, apricot, dried mint, orange zest and ginger. It shows pretty complexity and a smooth, creamy mouthfeel.

properties.title: DaMa 2010 Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 123 E Main St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: A switch of vineyard sources—to Sagemoor and Conner Lee—has led to the best Chardonnay yet from DaMa. Rich, full and fleshy, this is a riot of stone fruits. In the mouth it's smooth and luscious, with a pleasing, textural finish.

properties.title: Nittnaus Anita und Hans 2010 Chardonnay-Pinot Blanc (Leithaberg)
properties.address: Untere Hauptstraße 49, 7122 Gols, Austria
properties.description: Chardonnay and Pinot Blanc is a blend once found in Burgundy, but rarely today. Here in Austrian Burgenland, it gives a very rounded style of wine, although with a terroir-marked mineral edge. Baked apples and creamed pear are laced with pink grapefruit.

properties.title: Oberon 2010 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 23568 Arnold Dr, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.description: With a touch of green grass and gooseberry, this refreshing Sauvignon Blanc features richer flavors of pineapples, lemons, limes, honeysuckle and vanilla. It's a streamlined, elegant wine, at a very good price.

properties.title: Pont de Chevalier 2009 Chardonnay (Knights Valley)
properties.address: 26328 Locust Grove Rd, Creola, OH 45622, USA
properties.description: A fine followup to the 2008, this Chardonnay, from a high valley between Sonoma County and Napa Valley, combines rich tropical fruit with good acidity and an earthiness that grounds it. Feels complex in the mouth, taking the California style and wrestling it to elegance.

properties.title: MacRostie 2009 Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 4605 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Made from various vineyards scattered around this huge appellation, MacRostie's '09 Chardonnay offers brilliantly etched fruit brightened by crisp, coastal acidity. Strikes a nice balance between ripe pears and sweet, vanilla-scented oak.

properties.title: Carneros Highway 2010 Nueva Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.description: You get lots of bang for your buck with this Chardonnay. It's flashy in pineapples, oranges and peaches, with plenty of sweet, buttered toast and vanilla from oak. Yet there's fine, crisp acidity for balance, and even a touch of Carneros minerality.

properties.title: Domaine du Tix 2009 Doña Maria Red (Ventoux)
properties.address: Colline Notre Dame des Anges 209 Chemin du Col Blanc, 84570 Mormoiron, France
properties.description: This Grenache-dominated cuvée starts off with beautiful lifted aromas of clove, allspice and cherries. On the palate, it's rich, full-bodied and savory, with plentiful tannins that balance out the ripe cherry fruit. Ambitious, and pulls it off. Drink 2012–2016.

properties.title: Stift Göttweig 2012 Silberbichl Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
properties.description: Seductive notes of fragrant, red-cheeked peaches come together with notes of honeysuckle. The palate displays the same beguiling aromatics and is slender but deep. Concentration and finesse spell a great future.

properties.title: Allram 2012 Heiligenstein Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
properties.address: Herrengasse 3, 3491 Straß im Straßertale, Austria
properties.description: A pure and spicy lift of bergamot promises refreshment while the palate whirls with peach, mandarin and blood orange. All are backed by a steely, mineral poise that cuts through the palate like a comet, shimmering with purity, deliciousness and length.

properties.title: Fess Parker 2012 Ashley's Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.description: This brilliant wine is dry and tart in acidity, minerally, and supremely refined in Meyer lemons, pears, limes and tart apples. It's not one of those fat Chardonnays that melts in the mouth, but instead has firm texture and elegant complexity. It makes a beautiful accompaniment to grilled salmon, crab cakes, or a simple but glorious roasted chicken. Don't drink it too cold.

properties.title: Lagler 2012 Steinborz Smaragd Grüner Veltliner (Wachau)
properties.address: Am Hinterweg 17, 3620 Spitz, Austria
properties.description: Perfumed green pears, overlaid with the floral charm of summer blossom, characterize this concentrated yet lithe wine. Nonetheless, it is based on a firm core that suggests the ancient rocks where the vines grew. Little by little, a miso-like saltiness also reveals itself.

properties.title: Laurel Glen 2010 The Laureate Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Mountain)
properties.address: 13750 Arnold Dr Suite #9, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.description: This is a new, low-production designation, a selected barrel reserve, from Laurel Glen's new owners. The wine shows an exuberance resulting from the influence of consulting winemaker David Ramey. Massive blackberry, cassis and dark chocolate flavors, wrapped into Sonoma Mountain's strong tannins, make the wine an ideal cellar candidate. Drink 2018 and beyond.

properties.title: Tegernseerhof 2012 Steinertal Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
properties.address: Unterloiben 12, 3601 Dürnstein, Austria
properties.description: Tightly closed like a fist, the only intimation of flavor is the seam of lemon-zest acidity. Purity and precision are stony straightjackets that this wine will never escape, but its aromatic development will yield ample pleasure for the patient. Drink as of 2017.

properties.title: Eichinger 2012 Gaisberg Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.address: Langenloiser Str. 365, 3491 Straß im Straßertale, Austria
properties.description: Lifted, lemony freshness mixes with lime zest on the nose. Underneath some pungent arugula also dances on the palate, where pepperiness and fresh acidity guarantee pleasure with this concentrated but toned white.

properties.title: Salomon-Undhof 2012 Steiner Kögl Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
properties.address: Undstraße 10, 3500 Krems an der Donau, Austria
properties.description: Tight but gently touched with ripe apple, lime and grapefruit, this wine is refreshing now, although it is still too closed to show its fuller fruits. This will flesh out with time but the wine will always be among the slender, invigorating Rieslings with a precise touch of minerality.

properties.title: Schloss Gobelsburg 2012 Heiligenstein Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
properties.address: Schloss Str. 16, 3550, Austria
properties.description: Tight and slender on the palate, it has green and yellow citrus flavors in the foreground. Lime and grapefruit peel appear first, followed by stirrings of pink grapefruit flesh. It all adds up to a wine that offers concentration and depth plus exquisite purity.

properties.title: Jurtschitsch 2012 Heiligenstein Reserve Riesling (Kamptal)
properties.description: What to remark on first: those hints of mellow, luscious ripeness of plum, peach and apple, or that zesty, breezy lemon acidity? Together they make a complete and contrasting picture that focuses on full fruit expression and slender but concentrated linearity.

properties.title: Allram 2012 Gaisberg Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.description: Pear, arugula, white pepper and apricots take turns in dazzling nose and palate. A serious, concentrated and mineral vein of power also courses through this sleek wine, which holds even more future promise.

properties.title: Airlie 2004 Gewürztraminer (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 15305 Dunn Forest Rd, Monmouth, OR 97361, USA
properties.description: It's a little late to be releasing an '04, but this may actually be all the better for the extra bottle age. Richly scented with rose petal soap, chewing gum and lychee, it delivers concentrated, oily flavors with a sharply floral streak. It's bone dry and highly extracted, and tips the scale at 14.4% alcohol.

properties.title: Viñedos Organicos Emiliana 2007 Natura Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: RUTA 68 Y RUTA F-870 Casablanca, Valparaíso, Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.description: This is a fulfilling unoaked, organic wine from Chile's cool Casablanca Valley. This quaffable Chard focuses on pure citrus, grapefruit and peach flavors. There's a touch of natural sweetness but with no oak there's no butter, fat or flab. Breaks the mold and opens the door to a whole other style of Chardonnay.

properties.title: Girardet 2006 Pinot Gris (Umpqua Valley)
properties.address: 895 Reston Rd, Roseburg, OR 97471, USA
properties.description: Girardet farms its vineyards organically, does not irrigate, and ferments this wine in stainless steel. The result is a solidly made Pinot Gris, offering lush scents and tastes of ripe pear. Good texture and balance keep it from feeling one dimensional; puts the fruit front and center.

properties.title: Groot Constantia 2003 Cabernet Sauvignon (Constantia)
properties.description: From a producer of famed whites comes a beautiful Cabernet with an elegant, poised character. Mint, clove and deep berry on the nose are followed on the palate, where balanced tannins and spice offer serious flavor. The overall character is rich but softer, making it a lovely food wine.

properties.title: Sineann 2006 Medici Vineyard Riesling (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 8400 Champoeg Rd NE, St Paul, OR 97137, USA
properties.description: This is done in a style that walks the line between Kabinett and Spatlese; it's just 11% alcohol but the fruit sweetness is largely hidden behind the tangy natural acids. It's got the mixed fruit flavors of peach, apricot, citrus and even a hint of tropical, along with the edgy definition of citrus peel that gives it a crisp finish.

properties.title: Eola Hills 2005 La Creole Reserve Chardonnay (Oregon)
properties.description: The reserve Chardonnay from Eola Hills gets an extra year in bottle, and it has a more elegant, vertical structure, with the fruit framed in toasty oak flavors and some tarragon spice. It's persistent as well; the flavors seem to gather strength in the midpalate and continue through a strong and moderately complex finish.

properties.title: Concha y Toro 2005 Amelia Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: Av. Virginia Subercaseaux 210, Pirque, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: Sort of heavy, with touches of baked corn and hay. But it also has nice baked apple flavors and pretty good oak. On the finish, there's vanilla, almond, citrus and apple, and then very late comes hazelnut and even more vanilla. Drink now; it's not going to last much longer.

properties.title: Farnese 2006 Opis Chardonnay (Terre di Chieti)
properties.description: This is a fine example of a sun-drenched Chardonnay from central Italy that boasts a saturated, golden color and savory exotic fruit, vanilla, butter and natural rubber. It's viscous with streaks of glycerin that slowly make their way down the side of the glass and offers a creamy, sweet, sensation in the mouth.

properties.title: Huntington 2006 Sauvignon Blanc (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 6808 US-24, Huntington, IN 46750, USA
properties.description: The grapes are mainly from Dry Creek, with a little Russian River fruit as well, and there's no oak, so it's a really pure expression of Sonoma Sauvignon Blanc. It's dry and briskly clean, with intriguingly complex citrus, apricot, wildflower, fig, white pepper, vanilla and honey flavors. What a nice cocktail wine.

properties.title: Château Bianca 2006 Gewürztraminer (Willamette Valley)
properties.description: Spicy and dry, this is done to a wickedly tart finish; the flavors are set up beautifully to accompany food. The floral and rose petal scents of the grape are nicely rendered but not overwhelming, and the 1% RS residual sugar is almost invisible given the juicy fruit and acids.

properties.title: The White Knight 2006 Viognier (Clarksburg)
properties.description: I like this wine a lot, even though it doesn't have Viognier's typical exotic richness. Bone dry, with mouth-tingling acidity and low alcohol, it shows citrus, coconut macaroon, apricot and spice flavors that finish with real complexity. The cool vintage definitely was kind to this inland, Delta appellation.

properties.title: Washington Hills 2011 Riesling (Washington)
properties.address: 212 N 3rd Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: Light and lovely, this has just under 2% residual sugar, but it tastes drier than that. Arresting scents of jasmine tea and honeysuckle give it an enticing floral character. It glides into a soft palate dappled with accents of flowers, oils and incense. Includes small amounts of Chardonnay and Gewürztraminer.

properties.title: Beaucanon 2009 Longwood Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1006 Monticello Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: A charming young Cabernet, this is rich in blackberry, currant and anise flavors that are complex and interesting. It's a very dry wine, but the fruit is so polished, it seems almost sweet. This is delicious now, although it's pretty tannic and could develop bottle complexity over the next 6–8 years.

properties.title: Viña Requingua 2007 Potro de Piedra Family Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon-Cabernet Franc (Curicó Valley)
properties.description: A classic Chilean Cabernet Sauvignon with aromas of lemon peel, olive and leafy fruit. It shows major structure, tannic framework and dry, herbal flavors of cassis and cherry. Long, fruity, toasty and just slightly rustic. Drink now–2012.

properties.title: William Church 2011 Viognier (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: William Church has outdone itself with this new Viognier, a mix of fruit from Conner Lee and Gamache Vineyards. A leesy, yeasty, textural underpinning complements the tangy lemon, lime, grapefruit and tangerine flavors. It's superfresh and delicious.

properties.title: Channing Daughters 2010 Sylvanus White (The Hamptons, Long Island)
properties.description: A true field blend of Muscat, Pinot Grigio and Pinot Bianco, the Sylvanus is a profoundly aromatic, yet remarkably composed white wine. It's exuberant on the nose with lush flowers, tropical fruit and a whiff of exotic spice. The palate is dry, but lusciously concentrated with notes of orange peel and waxy flower that finish with a touch of saline and oyster shell.

properties.title: Domaine Landrat-Guyollot 2010 La Rambarde  (Pouilly-Fumé)
properties.address: 16 rue du Mont Beauvois, 58150 Saint-Andelain, France
properties.description: Moving toward the more tropical fruit spectrum of Sauvignon Blanc, this is round, with apricot and pineapple flavors. There is a fine streak of citrusy acidity that lifts the ripe fruit.

properties.title: Domaine Laporte 2010 Le Rochoy  (Sancerre)
properties.address: 62 Av. de Fontenay, 18300 Saint-Satur, France
properties.description: This is very aromatic, with minerality vying with fruit and tense acidity. This complex wine has an austere side, both rich and structured that will soften in a couple of years.

properties.title: Domaine Laporte 2010 Les Duchesses  (Pouilly-Fumé)
properties.address: 62 Av. de Fontenay, 18300 Saint-Satur, France
properties.description: Moving toward the floral side of Sauvignon Blanc, this fruity, rounded wine has ripe acidity, a tangy citrus flavor and a full-bodied feel. It's set to age over several years.

properties.title: Dutton-Goldfield 2011 Dutton Ranch-Green Valley Vineyard Gewürztraminer (Green Valley)
properties.description: This is technically dry, but rich in sweet flavor—like a gingerbread cookie. There's also a lot of tangerine and pear fruit. The acidity is just fine, giving the richness a bracing quality. Try pairing this with a lightly sugared fruit tart, although it should also go with a vast range of foods, especially Asian fare.

properties.title: Firestone 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.description: Except for being just a bit linear, this is a really good Cabernet for the price. It offers rich blackberry, black currant liqueur, anise and cedar flavors that are wrapped into firm tannins. The balance is really impressive. It's throwing some sediment already, so decant it.

properties.title: Bernardus 2010 Rosella's Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 5 W Carmel Valley Rd, Carmel Valley, CA 93924, USA
properties.description: This shows the rich, ripe, opulent fruit that always accompanies the Chardonnays of this vineyard. Spicy, tart pineapples, oranges and mangoes are the flavors, with a jacket of sweet, smoky oak. The acidity is bright, giving it balance. Drink now.

properties.title: Binyamina 2009 Reserve Late Harvest Cluster Select Gewürztraminer (Galilee)
properties.address: Ha-Yekev St 2, Binyamina-Giv'at Ada, Israel
properties.description: This is a stunning, well-balanced late-harvest selection that's sure to be a welcome addition to any dessert course. Notes of ginger and sweet baking spice lift the baked-apple, peach and apricot-preserve fruit core. A kiss of honeyed sweetness and a soft, candied orange-peel flavor lingers on the close. Ample acidity keeps the palate fresh and lifted.

properties.title: Carmel 2009 Appellation Cabernet Sauvignon (Galilee)
properties.address: Derech HaYekev 2, Zihron Ya'akov, Israel
properties.description: Violet, blackberry, cassis and blueberry aromas immediately waft from the glass. Rich and ripe, the palate boasts more of the same concentrated fruit in a lush, creamy, crushed-velvet-like texture. Notes of charred espresso bean, vanilla pod and licorice root all unfold on the long finish. Balanced, delicious and affordable.

properties.title: Bishop's Peak 2010 Sauvignon Blanc (Edna Valley)
properties.address: Bishop Peak, San Luis Obispo, CA 93405, USA
properties.description: This 100% Sauvignon Blanc has only neutral oak on it, which provides some softening to the briskly acidic flavors of grapefruits and limes. It's a savory wine, mouthwateringly dry.

properties.title: Cantina Produttori San Michele Appiano 2010 Anger Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Via Circonvallazione, 17-19, 39057 Appiano sulla strada del vino BZ, Italy
properties.description: Fermented in both wood and stainless steel, this rich Pinot Grigio offers creamy aromas of lemon mousse, melon and stone fruit. Slight accents of vanilla and almond appear on the rich close.

properties.title: Carmel Road 2010 Chardonnay (Monterey)
properties.description: The underlying wine, before the winemaker put it into oak barrels, was delicious in tangerine and pineapple fruit, brightened with brilliantly crisp acidity and a fine, steely minerality. The oak, which is modest, adds a richer coating of buttered toast. A great price for a Chardonnay this drinkable.

properties.title: Estate Constantin Gofas 2010 Mythic River Sauvignon-Roditis White (Corinth)
properties.address: Nemea 205 00, Greece
properties.description: This Sauvignon Blanc and Roditis blend shows how successful the combination of indigenous and international varieties can be. Enticing aromas of peach, melon and a touch of apple are followed by a vibrant balance of flavors—fresh flowers, summer fruits and spice. Minerality keeps the wine dancing on the palate. Great on its own or paired with fish, salads, cheeses.

properties.title: Firesteed 2009 Pinot Gris (Oregon)
properties.address: 8380 NE Worden Hill Rd, Dundee, OR 97115, USA
properties.description: Soft and slightly buttery, this smooth-drinking Pinot Gris deftly mixes spiced pear fruit with a pat of butter and a whiff of resin. It's at a perfect point of drinkability right now.

properties.title: Villa Huesgen 2010 Nine Generation Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: An d. Mosel 46, 56841 Traben-Trarbach, Germany
properties.description: Fairly dry in style, with apple and pear flavors that are ripe without being sweet, and brought home by steely acids and tart citrus fruit. Drink this medium-bodied Riesling over the next year or two.

properties.title: Lis Neris 2008 Jurosa Chardonnay (Friuli Isonzo)
properties.address: Via Gavinana, 5, 34070 San Lorenzo Isontino GO, Italy
properties.description: Jurosa is a beautifully rich and creamy expression of Chardonnay that shows the yellow flower and drying mineral characteristics that are unique to the Friuli winemaking area in northeast Italy. Pair this wine with vegetable or fish risotto.

properties.title: Lis Neris 2009 Gris Pinot Grigio (Friuli Isonzo)
properties.address: Via Gavinana, 5, 34070 San Lorenzo Isontino GO, Italy
properties.description: Gris Pinot Grigio Gris offers a sultry, sophisticated side to what is normally perceived as an easy-drinking white wine variety. This wine opens with aromas of peach, pineapple, white almond and honey. It follows to the mouth with a rich, creamy texture.

properties.title: Nals Margreid 2010 Punggl Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Heiligenberger Weg, 2, 39010 Nals, Autonome Provinz Bozen - Südtirol, Italy
properties.description: Pinot Grigio Punggl opens with rich, creamy density and lovely aromas of peach, lemon zest and cantaloupe melon. That dense texture in the mouth is what sets this wine apart from the rest.

properties.title: Prinz von Hessen 2006 Johannisberger Klaus Auslese Riesling (Rheingau)
properties.address: Grund 1, 65366 Geisenheim, Germany
properties.description: Thick and rich but not overly sweet, with an almost burnt edge to the caramelized sweet corn notes. Comes across as a bit chunky and lacking length, but still a nice drop.

properties.title: Hartenberg 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (Stellenbosch)
properties.address: Bottelary Road Koelenhof, Stellenbosch, 7605, South Africa
properties.description: This wine strikes a superb balance between herbaceous, green notes and ripe black fruit, all graced with a kiss of sweet vanilla. Rich blackberry and cassis flavors flood the palate, but then transition to sweet smoke and oak flavors on the finish.

properties.title: G7 2015 The 7th Generation Estate Bottled Sauvignon Blanc (Central Valley)
properties.description: Aromas of papaya and melon are hit with a slight sulfuric note. This feels plump, with mild citric acidity. Flavors of grapefruit, lime and grass are green and bright, but turn pithy on the finish.

properties.title: Château Saint-Sernin 2014 Varua Maohi Domaine de Saint-Sernin Chardonnay (Côtes du Lot)
properties.address: LES LANDES, 46140 Parnac, France
properties.description: The wine with a Polynesian family history is full of tropical fruit flavors, includig mango and pineapple, and only light acidity. It's a curious wine, slightly oxidized, grassy and super-ripe at the same time. Drink now.

properties.title: Borsao 2014 Rosé (Campo de Borja)
properties.description: Dusty, sweaty, soapy aromas offer little to no fruit. Flat and chunky on the palate, this rosé of Garnacha tastes like nectarine along with the bitter pit. A melony, peppery tasting finish feels hollow.

properties.title: Copper Belt 2014 Rancher's White (Oregon)
properties.address: 1937 Main St, Baker City, OR 97814, USA
properties.description: The blend is 70% Pinot Blanc, with Riesling and Pinot Noir splitting the rest. The winery calls it a “red-style white” and it has some tawny color from five days fermenting on the skins. But it's simply odd, flat and lifeless, with dusty generic fruit.

properties.title: Vinovalie 2014 Tarani Cabernet Sauvignon
properties.description: This is a stalky wine, with black currant fruits and a soft texture. It is full of acidity and light fruitiness that will make it attractive if drunk lightly chilled. Drink now.

properties.title: Agate Ridge 2012 Viognier (Southern Oregon)
properties.address: 1098 Nick Young Rd, Eagle Point, OR 97524, USA
properties.description: Barrel fermented and ripened to exceptionally high alcohol, this dark, soapy wine is over the top in flavor. Not a trace of varietal character is left, just barrel and burn, plus intense perfume that dominates the nose. Drink up; it's already going over the hill.

properties.title: Casal da Coelheira 2015 Rosé (Tejo)
properties.address: N118 1331, 2205-681 Tramagal, Portugal
properties.description: A bright, candy pink colored blend of Touriga Nacional and Syrah, this has plenty of acidity although its weight and ripe fruit give the wine a heavy feel. It is ready to drink.

properties.title: G7 2015 The 7th Generation Chardonnay (Central Valley)
properties.description: Scents of tropical of mango and banana are offset by a hint of citrus. Creamy and soft on the palate, this tastes of lime and green herbs. A banana flavor carries the finish.

properties.title: Matrix 2013 Matrix Estate Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 3291 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: This is a ripe, tropical and quite flabby wine, huge in body, oak and fruit.

properties.title: François Lurton 2014 Hacienda Araucano Clos de Lolol White (Lolol Valley)
properties.address: Km 29 Ruta - l.72, Lolol, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: For this critic, this blend of Sauvignon Blanc and Chardonnay isn't working. For starters, it's severely oaked, such that the palate feels creamy, sticky and heavy. Flavors of oak resin and mushy melon end flat, sticky and cloying.

properties.title: Vinovalie 2014 Tarani Sauvignon Blanc
properties.address: Caunezil, 46140 Parnac, France
properties.description: This is a soft and rather rustic wine. It has herbal and citrus flavors that are fresh edged by a barnyard character. Drink now.

properties.title: Havens 2014 Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1004 Clinton St, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.description: A simple, diluted and somewhat intensely ripe white, this is youthful, still tense and one-dimensional.

properties.title: Txomín Etxaníz 2014 Rosé (Getariako Txakolina)
properties.address: Eitzaga Auz., 13, 20808 Getaria, Gipuzkoa, Spain
properties.description: Even the very best Txakoli won't appeal to everyone, and this rosé is far from the best. Fruitless aromas of arugula and vinaigrette set up a sour palate with arrow-sharp acidity. Piercing, tart citrus flavors end with scour and sizzle.

properties.title: Sierra Starr 2014 Solstice Sauvignon Blanc (Nevada County)
properties.address: 124 W Main St, Grass Valley, CA 95945, USA
properties.description: The wine has generic fruit-cocktail aromas and lively citrus flavors braced with tangy acidity. An earthy, herbal component kicks in on subsequent sips and the balance stays quite dry.

properties.title: Caves Velhas 2015 Lagosta Rosé (Vinho Verde)
properties.description: With its light prickle, this off-dry wine has a candied flavor, a tangy texture and a crisp, light aftertaste. Drink now.

properties.title: Caves Velhas 2015 Lagosta White (Vinho Verde)
properties.address: 4431-952, R. Azevedo Magalhães 314, 4431-952 Vila Nova de Gaia, Portugal
properties.description: This is as light as Vinho Verde can be. Off dry, fresh, clean and crisp with sweet apple juice, the wine is ready to drink.

properties.title: Couleur d'Aquitaine 2014 L'Oie de Périgord Sauvignon Blanc (Périgord)
properties.description: From the hills of the Dordogne region, this is a fruity wine. It has a rustic, barnyard edge to it that spoils what is otherwise a fresh, crisp wine. Drink now.

properties.title: Chocolate Box 2012 Red (California)
properties.address: 18807 158th St, Basehor, KS 66007, USA
properties.description: This Syrah-based blend is marked by bone-dry, unsweetened baker's chocolate and blackberry flavors. It's a simple, tannic wine to drink with simple fare, such as burgers.

properties.title: Russian Ridge 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Cruz Mountains)
properties.address: 919 Washington St, San Carlos, CA 94070, USA
properties.description: With hard, cutting tannins and watery fruit, this Cab is notable for astringency and acidity. There's very little going on, except it is dry.

properties.title: Vinhas Altas 2013 White (Vinho Verde)
properties.address: 2825 Adelaida Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Almost colourless, it tastes like sugar water with some acidity thrown in. Gently fruity, the sweetness comes along with flavors of green grapes.

properties.title: Polkura 2012 Aylin Sauvignon Blanc (Leyda Valley)
properties.address: Marchigüe, Marchihue, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: Bell pepper and cactus aromas announce greenness. It's also dilute in texture, with cucumber and arugula flavors. Not only is this high on pyrazines, it's past its prime.

properties.title: Alta Delta 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Curicó Valley)
properties.address: 6585 Stewart Rd, Lakeland, TN 38002, USA
properties.description: Earthy, foresty, green aromas precede a round palate with stemmy flavors matched by a burnt, lightly bitter aftertaste.

properties.title: Wines & Winemakers 2013 Dona Helena Colheita Rosé (Península de Setúbal)
properties.address: 701 W 11th St, Coffeyville, KS 67337, USA
properties.description: Although this rosé smells of wild strawberries, the aroma is better than the palate, which tastes chemical with a bitter almond aftertaste. Serve very cold.

properties.title: Casal da Coelheira 2012 Rosé (Tejo)
properties.address: N118 1331, 2205-681 Tramagal, Portugal
properties.description: A wine that lacks balance. Its strawberry fruits are shot through with shocking acidity and then sweetened, none of the elements hanging together. Drink seriously chilled.

properties.title: Little Rascal's 2012 Pinot Grigio (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 9944 Co Ln 218, Webb City, MO 64870, USA
properties.description: This already tastes old and oxidized, almost like a fino sherry. It's not exactly undrinkable, but is not a good value.

properties.title: Little Rascal's 2012 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.description: While it's dry and acidic, it has a coarseness that's unforgiving.

properties.title: Peltier 2012 Hybrid Chardonnay (Lodi)
properties.address: 22150 N Kennefick Rd, Acampo, CA 95220, USA
properties.description: Full-bodied in apple and pineapple aromas at first, this Chardonnay with 5% Viognier blended in veers into marshmallow sweetness with a fatty finish.

properties.title: Caraccioli 2010 Limited Production Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 7393 Dolores St, Carmel-By-The-Sea, CA 93923, USA
properties.description: Green, vegetal flavors mar this wine. While it's nicely dry and crisp in acidity, and offers modest green apple and mango flavors, the unripeness is hard to like.

properties.title: Masterpiece 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 2297 FM2931, Aubrey, TX 76227, USA
properties.description: Nearly undrinkable for its arch-acidity that's almost still fermenting. The flavors are thin, with barely ripe blackberries and oak-like smokiness.

properties.title: Jack Creek 2011 Kruse Vineyards Chardonnay (Central Coast)
