properties.description: Tasted in early February, this Chardonnay had some secondary fermentation in the bottle, giving it a bubbly feeling. This major flaw may disappear in time.

properties.title: Trefethen 2008 HaLo Cabernet Sauvignon (Oak Knoll District)
properties.description: Trefethen has been on a roll the last few years, producing some of Napa's most spectacular Cabernets. This bottling, which contains minor quantities of Petit Verdot and Merlot, spent 28 months in new French oak barrels. The fruit is incredibly ripe and intense, with flavors of black currants and chocolate-covered cherries. As hard as the tannins are, they must have been even more aggressive two or three years ago, so kudos to Trefethen for holding the bottle back for five years. This beauty is just now beginning its long journey. Drink now–2020.

properties.title: C.H. Berres 2011 Ürziger Würzgarten Beerenauslese Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: Scents of honey and marmalade are accented with lemongrass and ginger on this exquisitely composed beerenauslese. It's lusciously rich, with flavors of peach preserves and mango, but accented with hints of warm, exotic spice and a streak of lemony acidity that reverberates on the finish.

properties.title: F X Pichler 2012 Loibner Steinertal Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
properties.description: This is a rich and complex wine that shows spiced pear and a tense structure. It is very aromatic and fresh while also rich and concentrated. A powerful statement of the fruit and minerality of the Wachau and definitely for long-term aging. Don't drink before 2016.

properties.title: Joh. Jos. Prüm 2011 Graacher Himmelreich Auslese GoldKap Riesling (Mosel)
properties.description: So lusciously ripe, with notes of mango and guava, this is an explosion of sweet fruit, honey and flowers. Searing citrus acidity cuts through the palate, highlighting layers of crushed stone and tea leaf that add complexity. It's so exquisitely delicate, but lingers endlessly on the finish.

properties.title: Château Lafaurie-Peyraguey 2010  Sauternes
properties.description: Dense and opulent, this is a fine, ripe wine. There is great weight here, along with flavors of nutmeg and white peach. Acidity and a firm, youthful texture all promise aging. Drink this wine from 2017.

properties.title: Williams Selyem 2011 Drake Estate Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 7227 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: This small-production Chardonnay (only 272 cases) is exceptionally rich and ripe, as Williams Selyem Chardonnays consistently are. Intense flavors of tropical fruit and pear pie (with a smoky, buttery crust) make for a powerful palate. The acidity is mouthwatering. This is the ideal wine for cracked crab and a sourdough baguette with butter.

properties.title: Gritsch Mauritiushof 2012 1000-Eimerberg Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
properties.description: The Burg mountain above Spitz is the site of the steep and stony 1000-Eimerberg vineyard. This rich wine contrasts ripe stone fruits with a tight acidity and crisp freshness. It gives a wonderful tension that will be resolved with aging. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Dr. Nägler 2011 Rüdesheimer Berg Schlossberg Trockenbeerenauslese Riesling (Rheingau)
properties.address: Friedrichstraße 22, 65385 Rüdesheim am Rhein, Germany
properties.description: Billowing with scents of marmalade, wildflower honey and raspberry preserves, this is an intoxicatingly perfumed TBA, but the palate doesn't disappoint either. Rich and creamy with undulating streaks of peach preserve and tangerine, it lingers on and on, with its tea and honey-kissed finish.

properties.title: Leeuwin Estate 2010 Art Series Chardonnay (Margaret River)
properties.address: Stevens Rd, Margaret River WA 6285, Australia
properties.description: Having earned its reputation as one of Australia's finest Chardonnays, the challenge is then to maintain that level of quality. The 2010 Art Series certainly does that. Enticing aromas of woodsmoke, peach and pink grapefruit give way to intense flavors of citrus and stone fruit on the palate. It's full bodied, yet with great focus and length, ending crisply despite the wine's inherent richness. Drink now–2020, perhaps longer.

properties.title: Prinz Salm 2011 Johannisberg Wallhausen Erste Lage Trockenbeerenauslese Riesling (Nahe)
properties.address: Schlossstraße 3, 55595 Wallhausen, Germany
properties.description: Aromas of mango and candied-orange rind lend a heady tropical feel to this concentrated TBA full of peach and marmalade flavors. Unctuous with sweet nectar, yet exquisitely dainty on the palate, it quivers with tangerine acidity and a finish that's laced with saffron and honey.

properties.title: Bründlmayer 2012 Lamm Erste Lage Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.address: Zwettler Str. 23, 3550 Langenlois, Austria
properties.description: This is a powerful wine that's very richly textured and with a structure that promises aging. It has weight and superripe peach and apricot flavors. There is a fine cut of acidity to give both freshness and aging potential. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Château Coutet 2010  Barsac
properties.description: This is a very spicy wine with weight, great depth of flavor and concentration. Fine acidity cuts through the core, balancing sweetness and adding freshness to flavors of wild thyme-honey and orange marmalade. Drink the wine from 2017.

properties.title: F X Pichler 2012 Loibner Loibenberg Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
properties.address: Oberloiben 57, 3601 Dürnstein, Austria
properties.description: This is a wine that is so young. It is aromatic, fruity and still settling together in its potential concentration and structure. Look forward to a wine that has pear fruits, a tight, mineral character, and structure. Look forward to an impressive and serious future. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Domaine Maby 2014 Prima Donna  (Tavel)
properties.description: This complex rosé effortlessly combines hints of flowers, dried spices, garrigue and red berries. It's full-bodied yet paradoxically weightless, buoyed by a long finish of crushed stone and fresh lime juice. Drink it over the next few years.

properties.title: Recanati 2013 Special Reserve White (Galilee)
properties.address: פארק תעשיות עמק חפר, Gesher HaEts 16, עמק חפר, Israel
properties.description: Aromas of melon and barley lead to flavors of white peach, almond blossom and jasmine in this Rhône-style blend. A touch creamy with full mouthfeel, this wine is a delight through the bright finish, which offers a glimpse of pink grapefruit.

properties.title: Stadlmann 2014 Anninger Zierfandler (Thermenregion)
properties.address: Wr. Str. 41, 2514 Traiskirchen, Austria
properties.description: Very faint peach notes break through the lemony freshness of this slender, golden wine. The usually richer, more sumptuous nature of Zierfandler shines through on the textured palate and in the glimpses of generous oiliness that flank the edges of the central citrus focus. This is lovely now but will reward cellaring. The finish is poised and clean-cut, lemony and long.

properties.title: Tement 2014 Grassnitzberg Sauvignon Blanc (Südsteiermark)
properties.address: Zieregg 13, 8461 Zieregg, Austria
properties.description: A riper, more mature and rounded aspect characterizes this Sauvignon Blanc. Creaminess and texture align themselves with the fresh acidity. There are smoky, flinty notes in the background and the fruit notes remain in the fresh citrus spectrum. They linger beautifully on the finish. A balanced, grown-up wine destined for the table.

properties.title: Upchurch 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 32901 Vineyard View PR NE, Benton City, WA 99320, USA
properties.description: Aromas of coffee, graphite, herb, barrel spice and black fruit lead to a power-packed palate full of dark fruit and earth flavors supported by chewy tannins. It's a classic Red Mountain style, not shy but delivering the goods with a long life ahead of it.

properties.title: Veuve Doussot 2011 Cuvée Ernestine Millésime Brut  (Champagne)
properties.address: 1 Rue de Chatet, 10360 Noé-les-Mallets, France
properties.description: Still young, this is a ripe fruit-driven wine. It suggests green apple slices as well as warmer yellow fruits that give richness. It should be aged to bring out greater texture and character. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Weixelbaum 2014 Wechselberg Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.address: Burgstiege 71, 3610, Austria
properties.description: Concentrated grapefruit zest and lemon peel with undertones of peppery herbs on a very concentrated, sleek palate. The pepperiness and zest reverberates for an immensely refreshing quaff. There is poise, concentration and a long, clean finish.

properties.title: Bernhard Ott 2014 Der Ott Grüner Veltliner (Wagram)
properties.address: Neufang 36, 3483, Austria
properties.description: The heady savory note on the nose unites yeast and tarragon, celery and pepper, grapefruit and lemon; fragrance of hay and earth are hinted at, too. The palate continues this wonderful interplay and makes you thirsty for more. This manages to be rounded in a very slender, cool vintage but has the added verve of such years. A great joy to drink.

properties.title: Bründlmayer 2014 Berg Vogelsang Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.description: A savory note of yeast swings along the green pear and grapefruit peel notes on this totally brisk and refreshing Grüner. Yes, the customary texture and spice are there but this is, as a sign of its vintage, totally streamlined and refreshing, with taut acidity reverberating in every corner. For those who like superfresh wines.

properties.title: Josef Ehmoser 2014 Vom Gelben Löss Riesling (Wagram)
properties.address: Tiefenthal 9, 3701 Tiefenthal, Austria
properties.description: Crunchy, tart but ripe apples abound on the nose and even more on the palate. This is reminiscent of a red-cheeked Cox's Orange Pippin apple and offers the same thrill and contrast between ripe fruit and crispness. This is dangerously animating and racy. It will make conversation sparkle. Finishes with a lasting apple tang.

properties.title: Fluteau 2008 Cuvée Symbiose Brut  (Champagne)
properties.address: 5 Rue de la Nation, 10250 Gyé-sur-Seine, France
properties.description: This impressive Champagne is rich while tight and mineral-textured. Creamy and ripe, it balances the weight of Pinot Noir with the elegance of Chardonnay. The producer's location in the relatively warm Aube region gives its wines extra fullness. This one is just now ready to drink.

properties.title: Foxen 7200 2014 Grassini Family Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Happy Canyon of Santa Barbara)
properties.description: This bottling from one of the showcase vineyards in this eastern region of the Santa Ynez Valley shows a very cohesive and well-integrated nose, combining dried red and purple flowers with licorice, dill, nettle and boysenberry. The palate's solid and persistent acidity frames flavors of plump black plum and mocha.

properties.title: Galvan 2013 Saffron Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Mount Veeder)
properties.address: 499 Edison Ct, Fairfield, CA 94534, USA
properties.description: Racy acidity is the key to this wine's explosive succulence and impressive structure and likability, a study in detailed winemaking. Full-bodied, it hides its weight, highlighted in wild strawberry, currant and leathery black pepper.

properties.title: Sojourn 2015 Sangiacomo Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 141 E Napa St, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.description: Salty on the palate, this medium-bodied wine is focused in tension and nervy freshness, with a generosity of complex fruit. Lime, pear and fig ride a cool-climate wave of orange peel that lifts the underlying density and concentration at work in this vintage.

properties.title: Testarossa 2015 Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 300 College Ave, Los Gatos, CA 95030, USA
properties.description: A stellar wine, this appellation blend rivals some of the Los Gatos-based winery's single vineyard expressions. Exotic dried apples, vanilla cream and popcorn pop on the nose, while there palate's extreme acidity and explosiveness freshness demands immediate enjoyment. Butter-seared apples, grapefruit pith and a touch of flint round out the flavors.

properties.title: Testarossa 2015 Soberanes Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 300 College Ave, Los Gatos, CA 95030, USA
properties.description: Very broad but also complete and elegant aromas show on this bottling, including Asian pear, yellow apple, Meyer lemon, wet stone and a touch of browned butter. The mouthfeel is very tense though not overly sharp in acidity, with lemon and key lime citrus. That tension holds deep into the sip.

properties.title: Vine Cliff 2013 Private Stock 16 Rows Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
properties.description: Intensely earthy and dense, this is a rustic undertaking, tannic and bittersweet, with a powerful savory side, defined by black tar, tobacco and smoked meat. The finish takes a different turn, a true partnership between vanilla and chocolate.

properties.title: 18401 Cellars 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.description: This is 100% varietal, coming from the esteemed Seven Hills Vineyard. The wine offers nuanced aromas of cherry meats and an herbal top note. The cranberry and cherry flavors are elegant, soft and sumptuous, showing a compelling styling and an impeccable sense of balance that carries all the way through the finish. Cabernet has seldom seemed so pretty.

properties.title: Covington 2012 Ma Belle Olsen Vineyard Red (Yakima Valley)
properties.description: This wine is 80% Grenache, with the balance equal parts Cinsault and Syrah. It brings very pretty perfumed aromas of dried flowers, herb, plum, olive and earth. The flavors show crystalline purity, completely captivating, with orange peel notes on the finish. It's as much about feel as flavor.

properties.title: Deutz 2012 Brut Rosé  (Champagne)
properties.address: 16 Rue Jeanson, 51160 Aÿ-Champagne, France
properties.description: This most recent release of vintage rosé from Deutz boasts fine acidity and crisp young fruit, marking it as a wine to age. Bright and lively with a sophisticated edge of acidity and red currant fruit, it should be cellared until 2019.

properties.title: Fulcrum 2015 Durell Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 25 E Napa St suite D, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.description: There's a salty, gravelly stone character to this medium-bodied wine that largely defines it, marking the grapes original home in the vineyard's Sand Hill block, planted entirely to one Dijon clone. Caramel apple meets a complement of crisper green apple, finding balance and grace in the glass.

properties.title: Phelps Creek 2014 Lynette Chardonnay (Columbia Gorge (OR))
properties.address: 1850 Country Club Rd, Hood River, OR 97031, USA
properties.description: Sleek and distinctive, this is loaded with snappy flavors of lime, green melon and wet stone. The fermentation in French oak (20% new) brings a lick of butterscotch to the finish.

properties.title: Château l'Avocat 2010  Graves
properties.address: 16234 Marquis Rd, Orange, VA 22960, USA
properties.description: The high proportion of Sémillon in the blend gives the wine an extra richness. That rounds out the more herbaceous character and brings in ripe peach and kiwi flavors. It's already a lively, drinkable wine, but should only improve over another few months.

properties.title: Château Prieuré Borde-Rouge 2008 Rubellis Red (Corbières)
properties.description: Wild aromas abound on the nose of this wine, but are balanced with expressive garrigue (primarily rosemary and thyme) and ripe red cherry, bramble and blueberry notes. The medium-weight mouth shows great richness and concentration of flavors, all framed by silky tannins and moderate acidity.

properties.title: Most Wanted Winery 2009 Indindoli Family Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 732 N Yosemite Ave, Oakdale, CA 95361, USA
properties.description: Very rich aromatically in golden Santa Rosa plum, raisins and lemon chiffon, this new producer's Chardonnay has a touch of caramel popcorn and is delicately dense with a nice lift on the finish.

properties.title: Owen Roe 2008 Red Willow Vineyard 1973 Block Cabernet Sauvignon (Yakima Valley)
properties.description: A mix of pie cherry, raisin and prune fruit flavors, this is deep, ripe and yet still quite tart, with plenty of acidity. It penetrates the palate with consistent flavors, a fruit pastry impression wrapped in dark chocolate. The only question—how will it age, with fruit already this far along the aging curve?

properties.title: StoneCap 2010 Estate Grown Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: Riesling is the star of an excellent lineup of Best Buys from StoneCap. Estate-grown, fragrant and complex, it sends up aromas of lemon oil, orange peel, fresh-brewed tea, pastry and powdered sugar. Mildly sweet, fruity and delicate, it surprises with exceptional length. A very fine effort from new StoneCap winemaker Kendall Mix.

properties.title: G. Moulinier 2010 Rosé (Saint-Chinian)
properties.address: 170 Lyle Snowden Rd, Lyle, WA 98635, USA
properties.description: This fresh Saint-Chinian rosé exhibits a beautiful, earthy, floral core, as notes of peony and baby's breath take center stage against a soft white strawberry and peach backdrop. Medium weight with good, lifting acidity and a clean, refreshing finish.

properties.title: Terras de Alter 2015 Terra d'Alter Aragonez-Touriga Nacional Rosé (Alentejano)
properties.address: Zona Industrial Da Lt. 22/28, 263, 7460 Fronteira, Portugal
properties.description: A crisp, fruity wine, bright with red-cherry fruit and a touch of pepper. The acidity and the lively texture give this wine a refreshing character. Drink now.

properties.title: Fiuza 2015 Arinto (Tejo)
properties.address: Largo Gen. Guerra nº2, 2080-184 Almeirim, Portugal
properties.description: This is an attractively fruity wine with its ripe apple and crisp pear flavors. Lined with acidity and refreshing, it is a clean, lightly herbaceous wine. Drink now.

properties.title: Global Wines 2015 Cal Monte da Cal White (Alentejano)
properties.address: 3430-144 Carregal do Sal, Portugal
properties.description: This ripe perfumed wine has yellow fruits and soft melon flavors. It comes from the cooler north of the Alentejo, preserving crispness at the end with attractive acidity. Drink now.

properties.title: Château de Blaignac 2015 Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
properties.address: 1 Château de Lavison O, 33190 Loubens, France
properties.description: Fresh and fragrant, this is a lively, bright and tangy wine. With crisp acidity and raspberry fruit that is twisted with orange peel it is ready to drink.

properties.title: Chehalem 2014 Wind Ridge Block Riesling (Ribbon Ridge)
properties.description: Oddly, among a nice selection of Chehalem Rieslings, this seems disjointed, with sour flavors and other components that don't quite knit together. Finished with a screwcap closure, there's no bad cork to point the finger at. Maybe more bottle age will help to pull it together.

properties.title: Gaierhof 2011 Siris Brut Metodo Classico Chardonnay (Trento)
properties.address: Via IV Novembre, 51, 38030 Rovere' della Luna TN, Italy
properties.description: Aromas of yellow apple, toast and walnut lead the nose and carry over to the simple palate along with notes of dried bread crumbs. Vigorous bubbles provide a somewhat abrasive texture.

properties.title: Quinta da Lagoalva de Cima 2015 Espirito Lagoalva Sauvignon-Arinto White (Tejo)
properties.address: Quinta Lagoalva De Cima, 2090-222 Alpiarça, Portugal
properties.description: Tightly herbal and packed with green fruits, this is a full and ripe wine. It is still very young with its initial fruit flavors still intact. It will calm down over the next few months and be better to drink from 2017.

properties.title: Santos & Seixo 2015 Rotas de Portugal Branco White (Alentejano)
properties.address: 3333 S Pinnacle Hills Pkwy, Rogers, AR 72758, USA
properties.description: A blend that is dominated by Arinto, this is crisp and lemon flavored with hints of riper yellow fruits. It has a lively, bright aftertaste. Drink now.

properties.title: Domaine Fouassier 2010 Les Romains  (Sancerre)
properties.description: The Romans made it to Sancerre, hence the name of this wine. The flavors are rich, with a mineral edge to the notes of green fruits, plums and greengages and a serious citrus core. With its structure, the wine needs to age for 2–3 years.

properties.title: Iron Horse 2010 Unoaked Chardonnay (Green Valley)
properties.description: You won't miss the presence of oak in this Chardonnay. It's brilliantly forward, ripe and savory, with orange, mango and lime flavors. Natural acidity and a creamy, leesy richness bring extra layers of appeal, and the finish is thoroughly dry.

properties.title: Pascal Jolivet 2010 Le Chêne Marchand  (Sancerre)
properties.description: The steep south-facing Chêne Marchand vineyard provides fruit for this very concentrated and impressive wine. Its weight doesn't come from richness, but rather a powerful structure that underpins a mineral tang and intense freshness.

properties.title: Iron Horse 2010 Native Yeast Chardonnay (Green Valley)
properties.address: 9786 Ross Station Rd, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.description: This is a clean, elegant and complex wine, brisk in acidity and dry in citrus and tropical fruit flavors.

properties.title: J. Lohr 2009 Carol's Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
properties.address: 6169 Airport Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: Good results almost always occur when J. Lohr, most of whose red wines come from Paso Robles, uses Cabernet Sauvignon from this Napa Valley vineyard. The 2009 is the best effort yet: It's very rich in black currant flavor, yet it is perfectly balanced, with fine acidity and smooth tannins. Drink this lovely wine now and over the next six years.

properties.title: Kokomo 2011 Pauline's Vineyard Grenache Rosé (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.description: This is what rosé should be: pale in color, dry, delicate and tart in acidity, with subtle but complex herb, tea, orange zest and spice flavors. It represents a significant milestone in California rosés.

properties.title: Dutton-Goldfield 2011 Chileno Valley Vineyard Riesling (Marin County)
properties.description: The chilly 2011 vintage was kind to Dutton-Goldfield's whites, including this racy, clean offering. This is bone dry and modest in alcohol, with bracing acidity. Orange zest, peach and lemon flavors are marked with a distinctive petrol note.

properties.title: Janzen 2009 Cloudy's Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 255 Grant St, Chambersburg, PA 17201, USA
properties.description: Ripe blackberry jam, mocha, crème de cassis and spicy, toasty oak flavors combine to make this Cabernet a real blast of enjoyment. It's soft enough to drink now, yet has a lovely texture, with tannins that are sweet and refined.

properties.title: Kokomo 2010 Peters Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 4791 Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: This shows a fine balance of citrus and tropical fruit richness with a firm minerality, and the oak is pleasantly in the background. A touch of lees character gives it a Champagne-like doughiness.

properties.title: Saintsbury 2010 Unfiltered Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.description: There's a bit of oak here, but not too much, giving a smoky, buttered toast richness to the orange, lime and pineapple fruit. It's a rich, flashy Chardonnay, with crisp acidity and a clean, spicy finish.

properties.title: Sterling 2009 Platinum Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1111 W Dunaweal Ln, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.description: This is soft, ripe and delicious, in the cult style, with heady blackberry jam, chocolate and sweet, caramelized oak flavors. It's thoroughly dry and really easy to like, with a certain dramatic impact. Drink soon.

properties.title: Stefano Antonucci 2015 Le Vaglie  (Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico)
properties.address: Borgo Mazzini, 35, 60010 Barbara AN, Italy
properties.description: This opens with aromas that suggest orchard fruit and citrus. The zesty, straightforward palate offers white peach, nectarine and green apple alongside bright acidity.

properties.title: La Monacesca 2014  Verdicchio di Matelica
properties.description: Delicate aromas suggesting chamomile flower and acacia honey carry over to the linear but somewhat lean palate along with hints of citrus and yellow apple. Racy acidity provides the backbone while a bitter almond note marks the finish.

properties.title: Lamoreaux Landing 2014 Unoaked Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 9224 NY-414, Lodi, NY 14860, USA
properties.description: Crisp starfruit and citrus notes shine brightly throughout this refreshingly spry white. It's delicate in concentration but irresistibly quaffable, marked by a spray of salinity on the finish.

properties.title: Lenz Moser 2015 Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
properties.description: Fresh, friendly green pear notes glide all the way from nose to palate and make for easy, inviting summer drinking. The clean finish smacks of lemon. Drink soon.

properties.title: Les Vignobles Gueissard 2015 Cuvée G White (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: 405 Trav. des Grenadières, 83330 Le Beausset, France
properties.description: A blend with mainly Rolle and some Clairette, this is light, bright and crisp. Floral aromas lead to sliced apple and lime juice flavors that offer lively acidity and a tangy, zesty aftertaste. The wine is ready to drink.

properties.title: Marchetti 2014 Tenuta del Cavaliere  (Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico Superiore)
properties.address: 3091 Mayfield Rd # 310, Cleveland, OH 44118, USA
properties.description: This opens with subdued aromas that recall yellow flower, toasted nut and a whiff of citrus. The rather lean but quenching palate offers lemon zest, white almond and a hint of mineral alongside zesty acidity.

properties.title: McManis 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
properties.description: This wine has a strong layer of spicy oak from the first sniff through the lingering finish. Deep, ripe black cherry and blackberry flavors fill in the palate, and the full body of moderate tannins creates a mouthfeel that's plush.

properties.title: Meinklang 2015 Grüner Veltliner (Burgenland)
properties.address: Hauptstraße 86, 7152 Pamhagen, Austria
properties.description: There are just a few hints of pepper on this crisp, pear-scented dry white. This is made for a party with its light-bodied, easy-drinking style.

properties.title: Morgan 2014 Cotes du Crow's Red (Monterey)
properties.description: One of the Central Coast's best deals each vintage, this blend of 53% Grenache and 47% Syrah shows candied cherries, cinnamon, scarlet red roses, slate and earthy clay notes on the nose. The palate also shows some clay as well as dense boysenberry fruit and touches of lavender and pepper.

properties.title: Peter Cellars 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
properties.description: An older vintage, this is a soft and malleable wine dusty in tannin and oak, with light-bodied flavors and aromas of blackberry, cherry and chocolate.

properties.title: Sea Pearl 2015 Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.description: This relatively simple but satisfying wine hits all the basic Sauvignon Blanc notes: Melon, fig, citrus and grassy herbs. It's medium-bodied and boasts a decently long finish, too. Drink now.

properties.title: Shaw 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Finger Lakes)
properties.description: Notes of spring blossom and fresh herbs perfume the nose of this Sauvignon Blanc. The palate is markedly riper, almost ruddy with fleshy yellow peach flavors. Aged one year on the lees, it shows a uniquely textured, mouth-coating feel that lingers on the finish.

properties.title: Suavia 2014  Soave Classico
properties.address: Via Centro, 14, 37038 Fittà VR, Italy
properties.description: Light and vibrant, this opens with delicate scents recalling white flower, orchard fruit and a whiff of almond. The slender palate offers Bartlett pear and citrusy notes alongside racy acidity.

properties.title: Tablelands 2015 Sauvignon Blanc (Martinborough)
properties.address: Grant St, Benicia, CA 94510, USA
properties.description: This wine leans toward the vegetal side of Sauvignon Blanc, without ever crossing over into objectionable. In fact, it shows attractive notes of struck flint and snow pea, accompanied by hints of citrus and tomato stalk. It's fresh, clean and would be perfect with a ceviche starter.

properties.title: Agricola Pace 2015  Roero
properties.address: 17840 TX-110 N, Garden Valley, TX 75771, USA
properties.description: Floral aromas reminiscent of citrus blossom, tuberose and black locust flower lift out of the glass. The bright, straightforward palate offers Bosc pear, lemon drop and toasted hazelnut alongside soft but fresh enough acidity.

properties.title: Hoopes 2014 Genny's Vineyard Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.description: Weighty but polished, this wine is full bodied, moderately flavorful and very smooth in texture. It has mild pear, butter and vanilla accents, subtle acidity and a plush mouthfeel.

properties.title: Belisario 2015 Terre di Val Bona  (Verdicchio di Matelica)
properties.description: Here's a vibrant, easygoing white wine that offers flavors of citrus, apple and a hint of bitter almond. Bright acidity gives it a crisp finish. It's straightforward but well made and refreshing.

properties.title: Santa Carolina 2015 Reserva Sauvignon Blanc (Leyda Valley)
properties.address: Til Til 2228, Macul, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: Aromas of passion fruit, grapefruit, lime and bell pepper are textbook for the region. This feels fresh as a whistle, with pyrazine-led bell pepper, green bean and lime flavors. Additional notes of bell pepper, with hints of white pepper drive the finish on this crisp, refreshing Sauvignon Blanc.

properties.title: Santa Ema 2013 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
properties.description: Black-fruit aromas of cassis and boysenberry are not overdone nor overoaked. Thie palate feels somewhat spiky and acidic, with a tartaric bite. A flavor profile comprised of salty berry fruits finishes briny and herbal, with good weight and balance.

properties.title: Stinson 2014 Sauvignon Blanc (Monticello)
properties.address: 4744 Sugar Hollow Rd, Crozet, VA 22932, USA
properties.description: Grapefruit spray and gooseberry aromas jump from the glass initially, with an herbal tomato-leaf tone lingering behind. Lemon-lime acidity cuts through the medium-bodied palate of underripe peach and tropical fruit, leading to a talc-dusted finish. This is zesty, lively and perfectly enjoyable as an apéritif or paired alongside tangy cheese.

properties.title: Sunset Hills 2013 Reserve Chardonnay (Virginia)
properties.address: 38295 Fremont Overlook Ln, Purcellville, VA 20132, USA
properties.description: Gooseberry and hop aromas are atypical for a Chardonnay, yet they surprisingly meld well with vanilla biscuit and peach tones. The medium-bodied palate brings lemon curd and brûléed peach flavors that carry to a vanilla-cream finish. Snappy acidity—presumably from the addition of 7% Petit Manseng—keeps the palate lively and in check.

properties.title: Arché 2012 Roussanne (Texas High Plains)
properties.address: 228 Wagner Rd, St Jo, TX 76265, USA
properties.description: Pollen, candle wax, citrus cream and blanched almonds mark the nose of this single variety white. The rich, broad palate carries notes of charred pineapple and toasted meringue, balanced by a lively river of citrus. This is a perfect white to enjoy when there's a slight chill in the air.

properties.title: Airfield Estates 2014 Sauvignon Blanc (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 14450 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE #109, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: This wine's aromas of melon and citrus don't seem entirely varietal. Still, it brings plenty of appeal with zippy, elegant flavors that linger.

properties.title: Line 39 2014 Pinot Grigio (California)
properties.description: This wine tastes appley, fresh and crisp, beginning with bright floral aromas, then offering vibrant Pippin apple and citrus flavors. The body is light and the texture smooth but nicely tangy.

properties.title: Highland Cellars 2012 Oughterson Family Estates Gewurztraminer (Seneca Lake)
properties.description: Slightly earthy aromas blow off with aeration to reveal a delightfully balanced wine full of juicy, concentrated peach, lychee and rose water flavors. While intensely floral and a touch sweet on the palate, sunny acidity lends a brisk, easy drinking feel. Drink now.

properties.title: Judd's Hill 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2332 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: A tart, tight expression that is mostly varietal, with additions of Cabernet Franc and Merlot, this wine was given 30 months in French oak. Soft, integrated tannins wrap around a strong sense of tangy cranberry, finishing lean.

properties.title: Lake Chalice 2014 Pinot Gris (Marlborough)
properties.address: Vintage Lane, Renwick 7273, New Zealand
properties.description: This medium-bodied wine offers some of Pinot Gris' peppery spice, just enough to enliven the pear and citrus fruit elements. Hints of wet stone add complexity to the aromas, while the spice lingers on the finish.

properties.title: Coomber Family Ranch 2012 Private Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
properties.description: This wine has an undeniable barbecue smokiness and curious suggestion of charcuterie, making for a savory, meaty opening. Juicy in blackberry and dark chocolate, it's cradled generously in oak, which marks the wine's palate, particularly on the finish.

properties.title: Château Sainte Roseline 2014 Cuvée Lampe de Méduse White (Côtes de Provence)
properties.description: A crisp and fruity wine, this is fresh, full of lemon and grapefruit flavors with a warmer layer of ripe pear. It's aromatic, refreshing and full of life. The acidity gives the whole wine a lift.

properties.title: Millbrook 2014 Lollipop Hill Estate Bottled Tocai Friulano (Hudson River Region)
properties.address: 26 Wing Rd, Millbrook, NY 12545, USA
properties.description: Tropical fruit and floral notes abound on this intensely perfumed white. Aged six months in neutral oak, it maintains all it's fruity, forward charms along with a backbone of acidity that's pert and mouthwatering. It's blossomy bouquet might be a bit overwhelming for some.

properties.title: Millbrook 2014 Unoaked Chardonnay (New York)
properties.address: 26 Wing Rd, Millbrook, NY 12545, USA
properties.description: Succulent, sun-ripened mango and citrus flavors drench the palate in this fruity, unoaked Chardonnay. It's straightforward in style, but concentrated and punchy. Enjoy now for it's fresh, youthful exuberance.

properties.title: Whitehall Lane 2005 Leonardini Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
properties.address: 1563 St Helena Hwy, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Made for the long haul, this 100% Cab was fermented in 100% new French oak. Right now, it's a hard, tannic wine, with little to relieve the astringency. The dominant flavors are of primary fruit black currants and sweet, charred wood. The score reflects the current drinkability, but it's a wine that could improve dramatically over the years.

properties.title: Selene 2007 Hyde Vineyards Sauvignon Blanc (Carneros)
properties.address: PO Box 3131, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Rich and creamy, with opulent pineapple and peppery spice flavors finished with a savory edge of lemongrass. High acidity works in the wine's favor, making it mouthwatering.

properties.title: Dos Victorias 2006 José Pariente Fermentado en Barrica Verdejo (Rueda)
properties.description: Peach, melon and apple aromas are more or less what's left on the nose, and the palate also indicates a fine wine in decline. Nobody will tell you that Verdejo has the stuff for long aging, but Pariente remains a wine of refinement and complexity. So catch it now for the last of its melon, green-fruit and pear flavors, which are backed by a lasting but soft finish.

properties.title: Sobon Estate 2012 Sauvignon Blanc (California)
properties.description: A value-priced Sauvignon Blanc from Sobon, which also makes Shenandoah Vineyards wines in the Shenandoah Valley of California, within the greater Sierra Foothills. This white opens with floral aromatics followed by wet stone, apple and lemon, all in a subtle, lightly rendered way.

properties.title: 3 Horse Ranch Vineyards 2012 Vivacious Reserve Viognier-Roussane White
properties.address: 5900 Pearl Rd, Eagle, ID 83616, USA
properties.description: An aromatic blend of Viognier and Roussanne, with overripe pear, lavender and spice. Aged three months in French oak, the palate is full bodied and unctuous, with a bitter note on the finish.

properties.title: Bacalhôa Wines of Portugal 2012 JP Azeitão Rosé (Península de Setúbal)
properties.description: This fruity, perfumed wine (the Moscatel Roxo in the blend sees to that), is ripe and full bodied, with some light sweetness giving a soft, gentle aftertaste. Screwcap.

properties.title: Casa de Campo 2012 Torrontés (Mendoza)
properties.address: 1501 S Tamiami Trail #501, Venice, FL 34285, USA
properties.description: The bouquet on this is so neutral there's almost nothing to describe. This is zesty and tangy in the mouth, with pithy orange, lemon and green apple flavors. A crisp finish with citrus zest leaves a clean final impression.

properties.title: Cecilia Beretta 2011 Brognoligo  (Soave Classico)
properties.address: 125 Sockanosset Cross Rd, Cranston, RI 02920, USA
properties.description: Yes, this wine treads deep on the side of informality with a lean, watery mouthfeel and subtle aromas of peach and pear. But there's also just enough territorial identity of Mediterranean herb and dried sage to make it interesting. The price is just right too.

properties.title: Colter's Creek 2011 Colter's Creek Estate Riesling (Idaho)
properties.address: 20154 Colter Creek Ln, Juliaetta, ID 83535, USA
properties.description: The aromas seem a bit muddled, with notes of jasmine and pear occasionally poking through and the alcohol showing itself. It's medium sweet (2.7% residual sugar) finishing a touch bitter.

properties.title: Conselve 2011 Tramontana Pinot Grigio (Veneto)
properties.address: Via Padova, 68, 35026 Conselve PD, Italy
properties.description: Tramontana refers to northern winds that wash across Italy. With those winds as inspiration, this easy Pinot Grigio opens with a lean, watery mouthfeel and crisp endnotes of melon and lemon.

properties.title: Quinta do Portal 2012 Colheita Rosé (Douro)
properties.address: Quinta do Portal, 5060, Portugal
properties.description: This rosé is almost as rich as a red wine, the difference being a fresher, red-fruit character. It has vanilla flavors, a dry texture and a touch of pepper.

properties.title: River Road 2011 Mills Family Vineyard Chardonnay (Green Valley)
properties.description: Tastes manipulated, with oak, honey and buttercream flavors dominating the underlying apples and peaches.

properties.title: Shenandoah 2012 Sauvignon Blanc (California)
properties.address: 3659 S Ox Rd, Edinburg, VA 22824, USA
properties.description: A low-priced white with a smoky quality and rounded textures of pear and coconut. Twist the cap off on this one for patio and pool parties or to enjoy with a platter of raw oysters.

properties.title: Venturini Baldini 2012 Malvasia (Emilia)
properties.description: Fragrant Malvasia tones of honey and white jasmine open the bouquet of this easy-going sparkling wine. The bubbling is light and delicate and the wine ends on a sweet note of Golden Delicious apple.

properties.title: Vina Robles 2012 Roseum Huerhuero Rosé (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3700 Mill Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: As soon as you unscrew the top on this 100% Syrah blush wine, the aromas of raspberries and strawberries release into the air, like incense. Those fruits follow through in the taste, turning jammy, heavy and sweet. The alcohol is a heady 14.9% by volume.

properties.title: La Mancina 2012 Pignoletto (Colli Bolognesi)
properties.description: Pignoletto is a little-known grape variety that is rarely produced as a mono-varietal expression. It's even rarer to see it in a sparkling, or frizzante, version like this: Sweet floral aromas are backed by bright peach nectar.

properties.title: Marcato 2011 I Prandi  (Soave)
properties.description: Very clean, compact and fresh, here is a Soave to pair with take-away Chinese food. The wine is acidic and light with subtle aromas of peach, citrus and white flower.

properties.title: Château de Saint-Martin 2014 Cuvée Grande Réserve Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: Rte des Arcs, 83460 Taradeau, France
properties.description: This is a pale-colored wine, very fruity and crisp with an impressively refreshing quality. A touch of pepper gives interest to this dry, easy-drinking wine.

properties.title: Château Montaud 2014 Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: 348 Rte des Maures, 83390 Pierrefeu-du-Var, France
properties.description: Light and fresh, this is a crisp and tangy wine. Attractive acidity dominates and gives life to the bright red fruits. A slice of lemon brings a tangy dimension to this juicy, fragrant wine.

properties.title: Cloudlift Cellars 2012 Halcyon Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 312 S Lucile St, Seattle, WA 98108, USA
properties.description: Aromas of toast, burnt coffee, mocha, vanilla, herbs and cherry take the lead on this wine. The milk chocolate and cherry flavors are elegant yet rich in style, with the oak at times seeming a little overweighted.

properties.title: Cold Water Creek 2013 Chardonnay (North Coast)
properties.description: This smells and tastes rich and abundant, yet it is not overtly fruity or full bodied. The nuances are more like fig and toasted almond with a subtle buttery note. A slight brassy effect in the golden color seems to agree with the mature, complex flavor components.

properties.title: Conn Creek 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 8711 Silverado Trail, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Light, lean and lemony, this stainless-steel fermented and resultantly steely wine delivers plenty of enjoyment. Layered and nicely textured, it finishes creamy in wild vanilla.

properties.title: Domaine Vrignaud 2013 Les Champréaux  (Chablis)
properties.address: 10 Rue de Beauvoir, 89800 Fontenay-près-Chablis, France
properties.description: This single-parcel wine gives fresh youthful acidity and bright white and citrus fruitiness. It's chalky textured, steely in its character and crisp and nervy at the end. Drink from late 2015

properties.title: Domaines Pierre Chavin 2014 Pierre & Paul Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.description: Organically grown grapes give this wine a pure and fruity character that makes it instantly attractive. It is crisp, laced with lemon and lively, juicy red fruits. The aftertaste is dry and full of flavor.

properties.title: Ferro Family Wines 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Temecula Valley)
properties.address: 2240 Prestwick Rd, Lake Oswego, OR 97034, USA
properties.description: Very fruit-forward aromas of green apple, kiwi, passion fruit and even chopped scallion are pleasantly pungent on this wine by Dr. Enrique Ferro. Nectarine flesh mixes it up with white flowers on the palate, all held together by bright acidity. It taste good, but is rather powerful, reminiscent of the grassier New Zealand style.

properties.title: Friedeman 2013 Dichotomy Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 180 Morris St, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.description: This is a rocking price for the quality of the wine, a small-production crafting of well-grown grapes in a great year. Light on the oak imprint, it shines instead in sweet and sour stone fruit, most vibrantly apricot, with a soft and layered silkiness to the texture.

properties.title: Château Cavalier 2014 Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: 1265 Chem. de Marafiance, 83550 Vidauban, France
properties.description: This fresh, crisp, textured wine has pepper as well as red fruit flavors. There's a touch of spice, ripe strawberries and delicious final acidity.

properties.title: Château de Brigue 2014 Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.description: Crisp, light and fruity, this wine is attractively balanced between its acidity and a light touch of vanilla. In the background, fragrant red fruits give a juicy aftertaste to this delicious wine.

properties.title: R&A; Pfaffl 2014 Austrian Pepper Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: 2505 E Pine St, Tulsa, OK 74110, USA
properties.description: Savory yeast notes take center stage, with touches of citrus and pear firmly in the background. This light-bodied, fresh white will pair well with equally light fare like fresh salads. The spice lingers beautifully.

properties.title: Ravoire et Fils 2014 Domaine Fredavelle Rosé (Coteaux d'Aix-en-Provence)
properties.description: This is a very aromatic wine, full of rose-petal aromas. A palate of ripe strawberries, soft acidity and a rich texture finishes on a high note of tangy lemon and raspberries.

properties.title: San Quirico 2014  Vernaccia di San Gimignano
properties.address: Loc. Santa Maria, 95, 53027 Vignoni Alto, San Quirico d'Orcia SI, Italy
properties.description: Fragrant and luminous, this vibrant wine opens with aromas of stone fruit and freshly chopped mint. The linear palate offers citrus zest, aromatic herb and bitter almond while mouthwatering acidity provides balance. It boasts a clean, crisp finish.

properties.title: Shannon Ridge 2013 Single Vineyard Collection Chardonnay (Red Hills Lake County)
properties.description: This has a bright, light-gold color, substantial aromas and flavors of oak and baking spices. The texture is smooth, with a sense of softness in the balance, and the wine leans toward richness rather than crispness. Impressions like hazelnut, vanilla, sweet pear and nutmeg provide a mouthful of flavor.

properties.title: Höpler 2014 Pinot Blanc (Burgenland)
properties.address: Heideweg 1, 7091 Breitenbrunn, Austria
properties.description: The smells of wet pebbles and very faint apple fruit characterize this slender, refreshing and easygoing Pinot Blanc. On the palate there is even more yellow and green apple flavor. Drink soon while the fruit is fresh and appetizing.

properties.title: Jarvis 2010 Estate Grown Cave Fermented Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.description: An older vintage that's been given more time in bottle before release, this 100% Cabernet Sauvignon is herbal, awash in dried thyme and a hint of cedar. Among its firm and jagged tannins is a taste of leathery milk chocolate and crème de cassis.

properties.title: Tramier et Fils 2014  Pouilly-Fuissé
properties.address: 14 Rue de Chamerose, 71640 Mercurey, France
properties.description: Ripe yellow fruits shine through this attractive wine. It has a fresh, crisp side with lemon acidity that nicely balances the warm, rounded texture. It delivers a crisp, more mineral aftertaste. Drink now.

properties.title: Yalumba 2014 The Y Series Sauvignon Blanc (South Australia)
properties.address: 40 Eden Valley Rd, Angaston SA 5353, Australia
properties.description: Hints of pungent boxwood mark the nose of this lean, narrowly constructed wine. The flavors are grassier, “rounded out” by tart citrus and green tomato notes. Drink now.

properties.title: Domaine de l'Echelette 2015  Mâcon-Cruzille
properties.address: Lieu-dit L'Echelette, 71700 La Chapelle-Sous-Brancion, France
properties.description: This wine has a creamy, smooth character. Lightly buttery and with some ripe pear flavors, it is soft, refreshing and ready to drink.

properties.title: Domaine des Valanges 2014  Pouilly-Fuissé
properties.description: This wine is tight with the lightest hints of riper fruit in the future. It has spice, toast flavors and suggestions of yellow fruit. Wait to drink this wine until 2017.

properties.title: Brennan 2015 Reserve Newburg Vineyard Viognier (Texas)
properties.description: Succinct and to-the-point, this Viognier is bight in pineapple, citron and peach on the nose and palate. There's a decent weight and texture, however the flavors don't carry too long. Drink now.

properties.title: Bulletin Place 2015 Pinot Grigio (South Eastern Australia)
properties.address: 6 Bulletin Pl, Sydney NSW 2000, Australia
properties.description: Nicely rendered, with varietally correct aromas of pear, citrus and almond skin. There's a bit of texture to this wine's medium-bodied palate before it eases into a clean, mouthwatering finish.

properties.title: Casca Wines 2015 Winemaker Selection White (Lisboa)
properties.description: This is an attractive, soft and ripe wine. It has just enough acidity to give this blend that has 40% Chardonnay a crisp aftertaste. The wine with its melon and pear flavors is ready to drink.

properties.title: Chakana 2014 Estate Selection Chardonnay (Mendoza)
properties.description: Light, lemony aromas work for the most part. This feels full, even creamy. Flavors of papaya, melon and apple finish with a note of pineapple. The longer this sits, the more soft and tropical it becomes.

properties.title: Domaine de la Denante 2014  Saint-Véran
properties.address: 641 Les Maillettes, 71960 Davayé, France
properties.description: Ripe and smooth, this rich wine has enough fruitiness and acidity to give a crisper edge, although it is more about a warm, spicy character. Drink now.

properties.title: Domaine Olivier Merlin 2014  Saint-Véran
properties.address: 106 Chem. du Lavoir, 71960 La Roche-Vineuse, France
properties.description: This is a bright, spicy wine full of citrus flavors, with attractive toast and acidity. It's lively, with a tangy backbone that gives a really crisp aftertaste.

properties.title: Evans & Tate 2015 Breathing Space Pinot Grigio (Australia)
properties.address: Evans, CO, USA
properties.description: This medium-bodied wine doesn't show much of the variety's mouthfeel, but does show clean, dry flavors of melon and citrus. Enjoy it now through the end of 2016.

properties.title: Anko 2015 Torrontés (Salta)
properties.address: Camino a Hualinchay Km 7, A4141 Tolombón, Cafayate, Salta, Argentina
properties.description: Powdery, soapy aromas are exotic but not fully convincing. Fresh but nothing more than wet and basic on the palate, this shows briny flavors of orange rind through the finish.

properties.title: Aveleda 2015 Casal Garcia White (Vinho Verde)
properties.description: This is classic, off-dry Vinho Verde. With its light prickle, crisp fruit that has a tangy lime and lemon character that comes through the candy flavor, it is a refreshing, light wine.

properties.title: Hoyt Family Vineyards 2013 Pinot Grigio (California)
properties.address: 1322 Park St, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: This bottling's extreme grapefruit pithiness meets with rainy cement and a touch of rubber on the nose. The flavors are quite reductive, with tar and sour crab apple touches.

properties.title: Jacques Capsouto 2014 Cotes de Galilee Village Cuvee Eva Blanc White (Galilee)
properties.description: Made from Grenache Blanc, Roussanne, Clairette and Marsanne, this wine has a soft nose of white peach and lemon zest. It is slightly stiff on the palate, with flavors of white peach, fennel bulb, apricot and rye. The finish is marked by a slight touch of menthol followed by a burst of tangerine flavor.

properties.title: Adega Mãe 2015 Pinta Negra Branco White (Lisboa)
properties.address: Estrada Municipal 554, 2565-841, Portugal
properties.description: A blend of Arinto and Fernão Pires, this is light and crisply refreshing. There are some yellow fruit flavors that contrast with the lime acidity. It is ready to drink now.

properties.title: Tasca d'Almerita 2010 Almerita Brut Chardonnay (Contea di Sclafani)
properties.address: Contrada Regaleali, 90020 Sclafani Bagni PA, Italy
properties.description: Made with 100% Chardonnay, this Sicilian sparkler opens with yeasty aromas of toasted bread crust and whiffs of fragrant flowers. The vibrant palate delivers citrus and yellow apple alongside a polished mousse.

properties.title: Chandon 2007 Late Disgorged Vintage Brut Sparkling (Yountville)
properties.address: 1 California Dr, Yountville, CA 94599, USA
properties.description: From 75% Pinot Noir and 25% Chardonnay, the tirage on this sparkling brut took place in 2008, the late-disgorgement in October 2013. The time in bottle has given it a honey-baked edge, sensibly dry, with highlights of baked apple and dried apricot.

properties.title: Dr. Heidemanns-Bergweiler 2013 Graacher Himmelreich Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Gestade 15, 54470 Bernkastel-Kues, Germany
properties.description: The nose of this off-dry Riesling is savory with scents of pressed apple and pear melding with smoked nuts and earth. The palate, by contrast, is ripe and rich with summer peaches. It's an interesting juxtaposition of profiles, and brisk acidity keeps it refreshing and quaffable.

properties.title: Dr. Loosen 2012 Erdener Treppchen Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: 20501 Tranquility Ln, Oregon City, OR 97045, USA
properties.description: Hints of nuts and pressed apple lend a savory tone to the nose of this off-dry Riesling, but the palate is fresh and fruity with crisp peach and apricot flavors. Tingly lemon-lime acidity jolts the palate towards a long, mineral-kissed finish.

properties.title: Abad Dom Bueno 2013 Godello (Bierzo)
properties.address: Carratera nacional 6, km 396, 24549 Carracedelo, León, Spain
properties.description: This comes across a bit dilute on the nose, with aromas of green melon and underripe banana. The palate shows good weight, balance and a lightly oily texture. Minerally flavors of nectarine and peach finish solid, with lasting acidity providing support.

properties.title: Domaine Jean Monnier et Fils 2012 Mersault-Charmes Premier Cru  (Meursault)
properties.address: 20 Rue du 11 Novembre, 21190 Meursault, France
properties.description: Wood and ripe fruitiness are the hallmarks of this open, rounded wine.Attractive apple and citrus flavors give a lemon zest character. At the end, the acidity comes in strongly.

properties.title: Gary Farrell 2001 Redwood Ranch Sauvignon Blanc (Sonoma County)
properties.description: If you like yours big and burly, then this might be the right wine for you. Applesauce and lemon meringue pie aromas lead the way toward a palate full of lemon, pineapple, tangerine and vanilla. The finish is stony and leaves a custard-like impression. It's clearly from the barrel-fermented school, but for some that may be fine. For others, however, it will feel overoaked and ponderous on the tongue.

properties.title: Ledson 2000 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 7335 CA-12, Kenwood, CA 95409, USA
properties.description: Soft, almost mute apple and pear aromas are accented by bell pepper and some lima beans. It's a typical bouquet for Napa SB, which is followed by the flavors of white grapefruit, a little citrus pith and some vanilla. Throughout there's a hint of spicy green veggies, mostly bell pepper and jalapeños. Overall, it offers good balance, just not enough fruit to override the green character.

properties.title: La Diacceta 2000 Vernaccia (San Gimignano)
properties.address: 17840 TX-110 N, Garden Valley, TX 75771, USA
properties.description: The bouquet of white peach and wet stones is fresh as can be. There's a rich texture to the palate, with flavors of cinnamon and spice accenting ripe pear. Finishes long and fairly full with some banana flavor.

properties.title: Lacheteau 2000 Sancerre  (Sancerre)
properties.description: Cleaner than the producer's Pouilly-Fumé, with gooseberry and popping citrus aromas, this wine is still a bit lean. But it does offer nice grapefruit and green apple flavors atop a very tight structure. All in all, it's crisp and easy to drink, which is what a basic Sancerre should be.

properties.title: Lynskeys Wairau Peaks 2001 Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.description: The rather mute nose fights to offer up some anise, white pepper and melon, but it's a deep dig to find it. Green apple, pineapple and some orange rind define the flavors, while the weight of the wine seems heavy due to lower than ideal acidity. Then again, such weight might be welcomed by the Chardonnay-drinking crowd.

properties.title: St. Michael-Eppan 2000 Sanct Valentin Sauvignon Blanc (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Via Circonvallazione, 17-19, 39057 Appiano sulla strada del vino BZ, Italy
properties.description: Sharp aromas of citrus mix with the odd note of petrol. Lime and apple-skin flavors fade into an acid-driven, orange-flavored finish that's also musky and quite long. While not initially appealing, this wine opens up with airing to reveal some hidden qualities.

properties.title: Stag's Leap Wine Cellars 2000 Rancho Chimiles Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Starts off with mineral, lemon and anise aromas that develop on the palate into dried spices, ground flint and lime. It's light in body, yet finishes strong, with clean citrus flavors and a lasting sensation of powdery talc.

properties.title: Stonestreet 1999 Upper Barn Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 7111 CA-128, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: In line with this winery's penchant for oak, this fast-aging wine is buttery and heavily toasted. As a result, snappy apple or citrus fruit is harder to find than many might want it to be. Nevertheless, there's some bold lemon and creamy vanilla on the thick, mouthfilling palate. And for that, it earns points.

properties.title: King Estate 1998 Reserve Chardonnay (Oregon)
properties.address: 80854 Territorial Hwy, Eugene, OR 97405, USA
properties.description: Smells oaky, with smoky vanilla and sweet, charred notes riding high over flamboyant tropical fruit aromas, including guavas and breadfruit. This is a big wine, but the pieces aren't all in place. It's like a symphony orchestra playing different tunes. Give it a few months to knit together.

properties.title: Bergström 2000 Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 8115 NE Worden Hill Rd, Dundee, OR 97115, USA
properties.description: If you're not sure what Pinot Gris/Grigio is like and want a good starter version, try this one. It's sweet like applesauce but dry like lemons, a seemingly impossible feat until you taste it. Plus, it's creamy from barrel fermentation, so it feels lush.

properties.title: Iron Horse 1999 T Bar T Cuvée R Sauvignon Blanc (Alexander Valley)
properties.description: This 14.5% bruiser contains 20% Viognier, which adds a tropical fruit character to the nose and palate. The mouthfeel is soft, with flavors heavy on banana and melon. Woody characteristics such as nuttiness, particularly almonds, also pop up. To its detriment, the oak and fruit seem to be fighting each other more than complementing one another.

properties.title: Girardet 2001 Estate Riesling (Umpqua Valley)
properties.description: A lot of shale in the soils adds interest to this elegant, light, fairly soft wine. Off-dry and balanced, it represents good value. Flavors of apples, pears and blossoms lead; a soft finish with a hint of caramel wraps it up.

properties.title: Domaine A. Cailbourdin 2000 Le Cris  (Pouilly-Fumé)
properties.address: 35 Rte nationale, 58150 Tracy-sur-Loire, France
properties.description: This wine is so typical of the area. It's defined by a stony, dry nose, citrus and tropical fruit flavors, a lean, tight finish and mouth-cleaning acids. It's hardly the deepest, most complex wine you'll find, but not all good wines have to be complicated.

properties.title: Nga Waka 2001 Sauvignon Blanc (Martinborough)
properties.description: Hay, mint and grass add a green touch to the nose, which also features nectarine. Citrus, but nothing really defined, dominates the flavor profile. More citrus and zippy acids run wild on the finish. It doesn't offer any one thing for you to hang your hat on.

properties.title: Louis Latour 2000  Meursault
properties.description: It's plump and juicy, yet not devoid of structure, blending Asian pear and citrus aromas and flavors with nectarine skin and bitter almond. There's a softness to the finish that causes it to lose a little definition but helps it go down easy.

properties.title: Thornbury 2001 Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.address: 118 Montgomerie Road, Māngere, Auckland 2022, New Zealand
properties.description: The nose is grassy and full of grapefruit. In a word, it's a sharp bouquet. The mouth offers more of that grassiness and touches of green apple and lemon zest. The finish is smooth enough, and it fades off the palate nicely. A touch of spritz keeps things lively.

properties.title: Quivira 1999 Fig Tree Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.description: This wine has a dairy note to the nose; i.e., cheese, custard and yogurt. Lemony flavors are accented by dried baking spices, while the back palate is a touch chalky, offering some good and welcome grip. Overall, the wine seems a bit heavy. If it were pushing amps, it would be a high-power machine.

properties.title: Valley View 2000 Anna Maria Chardonnay (Oregon)
properties.address: 1000 Upper Applegate Rd, Jacksonville, OR 97530, USA
properties.description: Lots of ripe apple and tropical fruits, lots of butterscotch and caramel flavors, but not too heavy. Good balance, good acids, a very appealing, forward style which isn't too oaky or heavy for food.

properties.title: Château de Fuissé 2010 Le Clos  (Pouilly-Fuissé)
properties.address: 419 Rue du Plan, 71960 Fuissé, France
properties.description: One of a range of single-vineyard wines from Château de Fuissé, this is powerful and complex. It's intense, with white fruit flavors that are laced with concentrated, wood-influenced notes. It has an opulent, generous feel, while remaining structured.

properties.title: La Chablisienne 2009 Les Preuses Grand Cru  (Chablis)
properties.address: 8 Bd Pasteur, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: From this rich vintage comes this delicious, open wine. Flavors of tropical fruit and peach create an opulent and generous feel, with notes from having aged in wood offering complexity. It's concentrated and ageworthy, worth keeping for 4–5 years and more.

properties.title: Domaine Vincent Girardin 2010 Les Pucelles Premier Cru  (Puligny-Montrachet)
properties.description: Wood and ripe fruit flavors drive this explosively fruity wine. Its richness is balanced by the acidity from green apple and lime fruits. Spice from the wood aging adds piquancy, leads to a final burst of textured minerality.

properties.title: Gramercy 2009 L'idiot du Village Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 635 N 13th Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: This is modeled on southern Rhône blends—a fairly straightforward mix of 85% Syrah and 15% Grenache. Grainy and smoky, with a slight charred aspect, this focused effort displays deep pomegranate fruit, soaked in soy, balsamic and other umami notes.

properties.title: Conn Creek 2008 Collins Holystone Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
properties.description: Made from 100% Cabernet grown on the valley floor north of St. Helena, this shows ripe, velvety flavors of blackberry jam, cassis and dark chocolate, wrapped into firm but soft tannins, with a pleasing warmth from the alcohol. Drink over the next four years.

properties.title: Domaine Jean-Paul et Benoît Droin 2010 Montmains Premier Cru  (Chablis)
properties.address: 14 Av. Jean Jaurès, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: This shows a hint of mineral along with tropical fruit. This is a seductive combination that shows richness and a taut, nervy character. Age for at least six years.

properties.title: Efeste 2009 Big Papa Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: This is pure Cabernet that was sourced from four vineyards, with vines averaging 31 years. True noninterventionist winemaking is in play to make this chewy, tight and dark effort.This is grainy and dense, with notes of cassis, coffee and cacao. A thread of smoke and a touch of gravel contribute further to the concentrated finish.

properties.title: Efeste 2011 Evergreen Vineyard Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 19730 144th Ave NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: Marvelous details of tea, honeysuckle and lemon mark the entry of this exceptional Riesling. It's vivid and textural, with terrific acidity, backbone and length—cellar worthy for sure.

properties.title: Henri de Villamont 2009  Corton-Charlemagne
properties.address: 3 Rue Dr Guyot, 21420 Savigny-lès-Beaune, France
properties.description: This is grandiose, with ripe apricot and peach flavors—even a note of mango—that are allied to the wood notes. As a contrast, there is fine acidity and elegance, with a lemon zest edge that gives structure to this full, superripe, powerful effort.

properties.title: Pascal Bouchard 2009 Les Clos Grand Cru  (Chablis)
properties.address: 3 Rue du Pressoir, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: Using grapes sourced from 50-year-old vines, this is a powerful expression of rich Chardonnay. It has great depth of flavor, with concentrated, intense and ripe yellow and white fruits, spiced from having aged in the wood. Allow to age for over five years.

properties.title: Chanson Père et Fils 2010 Les Chenevottes Premier Cru  (Chassagne-Montrachet)
properties.address: 10 rue Paul Chanson, 10 Rue Collège, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: This is crisp, with citrus and red apple fruits that are heightened by the taut structure. Nervy acidity adds to the tense feel while judicious layers of wood warm the finish. For long-term aging.

properties.title: Domaine Jean-Paul et Benoît Droin 2010 Fourchaume Premier Cru  (Chablis)
properties.address: 14 Av. Jean Jaurès, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: A wonderfully balanced wine, this shows a vanilla note that harmonizes with its ripe tropical fruit and a distinct touch of minerality. Wood aging shows through on the finish.

properties.title: Cave de Lugny 2008 Les Beluses  (Mâcon-Chardonnay)
properties.address: 995 Rue des Charmes, 71260 Lugny, France
properties.description: Broad and ripe, this is textured with some citric character, its acidity cutting through the green plum flavors. The aftertaste is freshly mouth watering.

properties.title: Chanson Père et Fils 2007  Meursault
properties.address: 10 rue Paul Chanson, 10 Rue Collège, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: A wine with just the right Meursault opulence already the dominant character. The wine is fat, ripe, not losing sight of acidity or freshness, combining yellow fruits with a crisp, citrus final streak.

properties.title: Conti Formentini 2009 Pinot Grigio (Collio)
properties.address: Via Oslavia, 5, 34070 San Floriano del Collio GO, Italy
properties.description: Here is a nicely executed Pinot Grigio with a slightly bigger, more succulent style than your standard Pinot Grigio. Mature fruit aromas of peach, honey and melon make for a nice balance against the wine's natural freshness.

properties.title: Decoy 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1000 Lodi Ln, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: This is a strongly flavored Cabernet. It has upfront blackberry and red cherry jam flavors, with some sweet spicy notes from French oak barrels. It's not a wine you want to age, but is smooth and flattering now.

properties.title: Louis Latour 2008  Chassagne-Montrachet
properties.address: 18 Rue des Tonneliers, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: This is soft, full of ripe white fruit flavors. The wine is broad, showing some freshness along with the forward richness. It is likely to age relatively quickly.

properties.title: Masi 2009 Masianco White (Delle Venezie)
properties.address: Via Monteleone, 26, Sant'Ambrogio di Valpolicella, 37015 Verona VR, Italy
properties.description: Pinot Grigio and Verduzzo are blended to shape a fresh and luminous white wine that would pair with seafood or light chicken dishes. The wine is clean and sharp on the palate with zesty acidity on the close.

properties.title: Monteviejo 2008 Lindaflor Chardonnay (Mendoza)
properties.address: Clodomiro Silva, M5665BPA Vista Flores, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: The question is how much oak can you handle? If you like a heavily toasted, resiny type of full-bodied Chardonnay, add two or three points. If you absolutely hate that style, then subtract a few points. For those of us in between, look for resiny, toasty, heavy aromas on top of a thick, chewy palate full of baked apple and tons of wood spice. One-dimensional but well made.

properties.title: Niedermayr Josef 2009 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Jesuheimstraße, 15, 39057 Eppan an der Weinstraße, Autonome Provinz Bozen - Südtirol, Italy
properties.description: Bright aromas of Granny Smith apple, green fruit, melon and honey emerge from the nose of this fragrant expression of Pinot Grigio. It is creamy and textured in the mouth with a touch of smooth almond paste on the close.

properties.title: Plozner 2009 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Grave)
properties.address: Via delle Prese, n° 17, 33097 Barbeano PN, Italy
properties.description: A drying mineral tone slices through the center of this luminous Pinot Grigio and adds a pretty edge to aromas of peach, citrus and pear. It also wins points in the mouth thanks to its tonic, fresh fruit flavors.

properties.title: RouteStock 2009 Route 121 Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.address: Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.description: The apricot and pear flavors are obviously very ripe, but they're balanced by brisk acidity, and a certain stong minerality you often find in Carneros Chardonnays. Oak plays its part. A bit obvious, but for the price, there's plenty of opulence.

properties.title: Tolloy 2009 Pinot Grigio (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)
properties.address: 5 W 19th St #4, New York, NY 10011, USA
properties.description: Tolloy brings us a bright and luminous Pinot Grigio with a very attractive price tag. You'll recognize aromas of citrus, peach, passion fruit and kiwi and the wine would pair with tuna or curry chicken salad.

properties.title: Attems 2009 Cupra Ramato Pinot Grigio (Venezia Giulia)
properties.address: 43 E Ohio St, Chicago, IL 60611, USA
properties.description: This fun “ramato” or copper-colored Pinot Grigio (the color is a result of longer contact with the skins of the grape during winemaking) offers aromas of pink grapefruit, stone fruit and mineral.

properties.title: Adelsheim 2012 Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 16800 NE Calkins Ln, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.description: Light and lively, this is a bright, tangy, fruit-driven effort, with little or no evident barrel flavor. Apples and white peaches hold down the center, with a crisp, fresh finish.

properties.title: Amici 2010 Olema Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 3130 Old Lawley Toll Rd, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.description: This is a second wine from Amici Cellars. It's rich and forward with cherry, blackberry, licorice and mocha flavors that taste fruity-sweet, but finish dry. Elegantly constructed, it's a polished wine to drink now.

properties.title: Baker & Brain 2012 Paragon Vineyard Grüner Veltliner (Edna Valley)
properties.address: Baker, KS, USA
properties.description: This is a brilliant wine that showcases Edna Valley's ability to produce some of the purest white-wine flavors in California. If there's any oak, it's not apparent at all. What you get are crisp, clean flavors of citrus and tropical fruits, peaches, vanilla, white pepper and herbs.

properties.title: Bell 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 6200 Washington St, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: This is a very good Napa Cabernet, stylishly dry and smooth in tannins. It's rich in blackberries, cherries and sweet new oak, with earthier hints of dried sage and tobacco. Drink now–2016.

properties.title: Casa da Passarella 2012 Somontes Colheita Branco White (Dão)
properties.address: R. Santo Amaro 3, 6290-093 Gouveia, Portugal
properties.description: With great fragrance and just a touch of spiciness, this is full-bodied ripe wine. Along with the more exotic flavors, it has intense apple and nectarine fruit, and a bright, tight texture. Drink now, or age for a year.

properties.title: Château Magnol 2012 Les Charmes de Magnol  (Bordeaux Blanc)
properties.address: 87 Rue du Dehez, 33290 Blanquefort, France
properties.description: A well-balanced wine that both shows an herbaceous character and a ripe, full flavor that brings in yellow fruits and green plums. It has a well-judged hint of spice from wood aging to give extra richness. Drink from 2013.

properties.title: Curtis 2012 Chardonnay (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 5249 Foxen Canyon Rd, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.description: A touch of French oak brings a honeyed, vanilla smokiness to this wine, but the star really is the fruit. It's rich and forward with pineapples, peaches and mangoes, and made brilliant by crisp acidity. This is a good price for a Chardonnnay of this quality.

properties.title: Domaine Jean Monnier et Fils 2011 Mersault-Charmes Premier Cru  (Meursault)
properties.address: 20 Rue du 11 Novembre, 21190 Meursault, France
properties.description: A heavily wood-aged wine, this wine has smoky, burnt-toast aromas. At the moment, ripe yellow-fruit flavors are submerged beneath this onslaught of wood, but it should integrate better, so give it until 2016.

properties.title: Falua 2009 Conde de Vimioso Extra Bruto Sparkling (Tejo)
properties.address: Zona Industrial Lote 56, 2080-221 Almeirim, Portugal
properties.description: A blend of Chardonnay and Touriga Nacional, this is a ripe, mature wine that shows a great balance between acidity and rich flavors of almond and toast. It has weight but still hints at freshness. This is a food sparkling wine.

properties.title: Fratelli Berlucchi 2009 Brut Vintage Sparkling (Franciacorta)
properties.address: Via Broletto, 2, 25040 Corte Franca BS, Italy
properties.description: This brut offers notes of citrus, stone fruit and Mediterranean herbs. It's fresh and linear, with an elegant perlage. The quenching finish closes on a note of bitter walnut.

properties.title: Karl Josef 2011 Piesporter Michelsberg Spätlese Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Waldstraße 5, 56862 Pünderich, Germany
properties.description: Steely mineral notes accent luscious white grapefruit and yellow nectarine flavors on the nose of this delicate, yet lushly textured spätlese. It's softly sweet, with hints of honey and peach nectar, but bristling with acidity. A surprising bargain buy from Karl Josef.

properties.title: Bougrier 2012 Château du Jaunay Sur Lie  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
properties.address: 9 Rte des Moulins, 41140 Saint-Romain-sur-Cher, France
properties.description: A ripe and fruity wine, the lemon flavors are complemented by rich melon and orange zest. It's a wine that has a dense texture, with the acidity well integrated into the fruitiness.

properties.title: Cameron Hughes 2011 Lot 385 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 205 Concourse Blvd, Santa Rosa, CA 95403, USA
properties.description: Here's a nice Cabernet with some extra features of elegance. It's not for the cellar, but shows polished blackberry, currant and mocha flavors, wrapped into pretty strong, dry tannins. Give it an hour in the decanter and drink now.

properties.title: Cantina Tollo 2010 C'Incanta  (Trebbiano d'Abruzzo)
properties.address: Via G. Garibaldi, 68, 66010 Tollo CH, Italy
properties.description: This Trebbiano is fermented in concrete tanks with no selected yeasts. The nose isn't very expressive but the palate shows restrained notes of golden apple, lemon drop and flint. This is already evolved and starting to fade so enjoy soon.

properties.title: Castello di Luzzano 2012 Malvasia Frizzante Sfacciata Malvasia di Candia (Colli Piacentini)
properties.address: 27040 Rovescala, Province of Pavia, Italy
properties.description: Here's a delightful and frothy dessert wine made from the aromatic Malvasia di Candia grape that expresses sweet peach, grapefruit, ginger and sage flavors. It has a silky texture and a refreshing finish. Pair this with pastries or Sunday brunch.

properties.title: Chamisal Vineyards 2011 Estate Chardonnay (Edna Valley)
properties.address: 7525 Orcutt Rd, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.description: The oak is heavy-handed, giving the wine strong buttered toast and caramelized flavors despite rich pineapple and lemon fruit. The winery's Stainless Unoaked 2011 Chardonnay bottling is more balanced.

properties.title: Columbia Crest 2012 Reserve Late Harvest Viognier (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 178810 WA-221, Paterson, WA 99345, USA
properties.description: This is pure Viognier, finishing in a moderately sweet, dessert-friendly style. There is a candied sensation to the mouthfeel, and the fruit seems rather thin. Light flavors of orange pekoe carry into a gentle finish.

properties.title: Gadais Père et Fils 2012 Domaine de la Tourmaline Sur Lie  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
properties.description: This lemon- and pear-flavored wine has an attractive, fresh fruitiness, tight acidity and a very crisp feeling. It is light and bright.

properties.title: Garofalo 2012 Les Collines Vineyard Viognier (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 4760 W Lake Rd, Geneva, NY 14456, USA
properties.description: Scents and flavors of toasted grain introduce this pretty wine that boasts accents of citrus blossom. Hints of peach skin carry some bite in the back of the mouth. Serve chilled and drink soon.

properties.title: Laurence Féraud 2012 Pink Pégau Rosé (Vin de France)
properties.address: Av. Impériale, 84230 Châteauneuf-du-Pape, France
properties.description: This pale pink rosé is 100% Cinsault--an oddity in the Rhône, where so many wines are blended. It's only moderately weighty and rather crisp, with tart, citrusy notes and hints of underripe stone fruit, giving it a straightforward, linear appeal.

properties.title: Merriam 2009 Windacre Vineyard Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 11650 Los Amigos Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: This straightforward wine isn't particularly Cabernet-like, but it is good and sound. With furry tannins, it has a distinct sweetness of raisins and blackberry jam, as well as lots of brambly Zinny spices. Drink up.
