properties.title: B.R. Cohn 2011 Silver Label Chardonnay (North Coast)
properties.address: 15000 Sonoma Hwy, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.description: Sourced from a host of vineyards, many of them in Sonoma County, this is an intensely dark, weighty Chardonnay with a taste of sour lemon and apple, rich in oak with a clean finish.

properties.title: Bodegas M 2011 Querida Albariño (Edna Valley)
properties.address: 6193 S River Rd W, Geneva, OH 44041, USA
properties.description: The combination of mouthwatering acidity, steely flavors of citrus fruits, apricots, white flowers and honey, and finesse make this slightly oaked Albariño super drinkable. With a trace of honey, it will be perfect with Vietnamese fare, smoky ham dishes, or fried chicken with potato salad.

properties.title: Cascade Ridge 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 703 US-2, Leavenworth, WA 98826, USA
properties.description: A distinctive, fruit forward wine with notes of blueberry and ash. It's fresh with tannins adding gruffness.

properties.title: Bodega Volcanes de Chile 2011 Summit 2900 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Rapel Valley)
properties.address: Av Vitacura 2939, Las Condes, XIII Metropolitana de Santiago, Chile
properties.description: Dry, spicy, leathery aromas are herbal but solid. This feels full and balanced but rudimentary, with cherry, cassis, chocolate and herbal flavors. A finish of dark-fruit flavors comes with overt oak notes, peppery spice and heat.

properties.title: Clendenen 2012 Mesa Verde Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 14256 Bacchus Landing Way, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: There's quite a bit of oak on this wine, in the way of smoky, ashy toast and dill notes. Lees aging adds richer winemaker complications of cream and sourdough. With lemon, lime, nectarine and peach flavors, it's dryishly sweet, soft and easy to drink now.

properties.title: Collier Falls 2010 Hillside Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 4791 Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Lots of rich, extracted cherry pie, chocolate and cassis flavors in this soft, oaky Cabernet. It's a little sweet and hot, but will drink well now with grilled steak.

properties.title: Wieninger 2014 Grüner Veltliner (Vienna)
properties.address: Stammersdorfer Str. 31, 1210 Wien, Austria
properties.description: While this Grüner does not give away too much on its rather closed nose, the savory hints of pepper, arugula, pear and thyme unite beautifully and insistingly on the midpalate. The wine gets full marks for refreshing, authentic typicity.

properties.title: HdV 2011 Hyde Vineyard Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.address: 588 Trancas St, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: The mighty partnership between the Hyde and de Villaine families shows maturity in this vineyard-designated wine, from the Hyde's well-respected site. Ripe golden pear delivers a richness to the palate that is offset by floral minerality and a pleasant texture of citrus and spice.

properties.title: Atalon 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.description: Tingling lemon and grapefruit pith make for a tantalizing experience in this white made from several vineyard sources throughout the Napa Valley. Saline and wet stone provide the minerality, with a searing seasoning of lemongrass. The wine finishes on a tart, herbal note that yearns to be matched with seafood.

properties.title: Bloomer Creek 2013 Tanzen Dame Auten Vineyard 2nd Clone 239 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 5301 NY-414, Hector, NY 14841, USA
properties.description: While intensely floral from nose to finish, this subtly nuanced Riesling has a more savory side as well, offsetting stark lemon, tangerine and lime flavors against wet stone and clay. It's ethereal and light on the palate, but finishes boldly with a lingering murmur of astringency.

properties.title: Boundary Breaks 2013 No. 239 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 1568 Porter Covert Rd, Lodi, NY 14860, USA
properties.description: While demure on the nose, this dry, seemingly diminutive Riesling builds in power and concentration on the palate. It's fairly low in alcohol, with an unassuming gradation of flavors ranging from lime to lemon and grapefruit, but its rippling textural expanse lends persistence and gravitas.

properties.title: Foxen 7200 2013 7200 Vogelzang Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Happy Canyon of Santa Barbara)
properties.address: 7200 Foxen Canyon Rd, Santa Maria, CA 93454, USA
properties.description: There's a subdued struck-match aromas on this wine by Billy Wathen and Dick Dore, with apple soda, seared pear and chalky minerality also apparent. There is powerful zing on the palate, like apple slices splashed with lemon juice, altogether clean, crisp and lively, with chalky grip arising on the finish.

properties.title: J Vineyards & Winery 2013 Bow Tie Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 11447 Old Redwood Hwy, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Another of the producer's estate-grown offerings, this vineyard-designate is bittersweet on the palate, rich and yet softly smooth in anise and waxy apple. Plenty of acidity buoys the experience, adding to the wine's ability to stay crisply refreshing on the finish.

properties.title: Merry Edwards 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 2959 Gravenstein Hwy N, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.description: The producer continues to impress with this variety, an increasingly popular wine for her loyal followers and beyond. Rich in crème brûlée and vanilla, it's layered and well-textured, a mix of pear and orange blossom with a tropical edge that finishes with a nice lift of minerality.

properties.title: L'Ecole No. 41 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 41 Lowden School Rd, Lowden, WA 99360, USA
properties.description: Hailing from 11 different vineyards located across the Columbia Valley, this appealing, 100% varietal wine provides aromas of toasty spices, dried herbs, cocoa and jammy dark fruit. The cranberry, coffee and blackberry flavors are sweet and focused, backed by chewy, lightly dry tannins that need time to soften.

properties.title: Loimer 2014 Lenz Riesling (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Haindorfer Vögerlweg 23, 3550 Langenlois, Austria
properties.description: Beautifully aromatic notes of Williams pear on the nose give way to a far more streamlined palate of zesty grapefruit. This is slender, zippy and totally refreshing with its lemony brightness.

properties.title: AuburnJames 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1001 Silverado Trail S, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: A big-boned wine with a juicy midpalate, this round, plush expression of the variety offers welcome layers of dark cherry, raspberry and plum nicely accentuated with clove and sage.

properties.title: Moniker 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendocino County)
properties.address: 501 Parducci Rd, Ukiah, CA 95482, USA
properties.description: Full bodied and well balanced, this wine has a broad, mouthfilling texture and enough concentration to carry its rich fruit notes into the finish. Cedar and black currant aromas meet black cherry and blackberry flavors, while a layer of fine-grained tannins frames the whole picture.

properties.title: Parxet 2012 Titiana Brut Rosé Sparkling (Cava)
properties.address: Avinyonet del Penedès, 08793, Barcelona, Spain
properties.description: Yeasty bready aromas are more smooth and leesy than fruity. This has a round palate that's full but not creamy due to firm acidity. Melon, peach and vanilla flavors finish yeasty and dry, with moderate complexity. This is made entirely from Pinot Noir.

properties.title: Peter Paul Wines 2014 Bacigalupi Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.description: Creamy butter and vanilla aromas suggest richness in this vineyard-designated wine, and its body and texture are equally full. Spicy oak and nutmeg flavors accent its dense, ripe apple and pear flavors, adorned in caramelized honey.

properties.title: R&A; Pfaffl 2016 Vom Haus Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: 2505 E Pine St, Tulsa, OK 74110, USA
properties.description: A lovely, yeasty savor clings to more characteristic pear notes on the nose of this wine. The palate repeats this interplay, with flashes of watercress-like green herb and fresh pear skin flavors. It's refreshing, savory and dry, with a light and spritzy body.

properties.title: Russiz Superiore 2012 Riserva Sauvignon (Collio)
properties.address: Via Russiz, 7, 34070 Capriva del Friuli GO, Italy
properties.description: Structured and alluring, this opens with yellow stone fruit, tomato vine and chopped herb aromas. The enveloping palate doles out juicy yellow peach, grapefruit and savory thyme notes while tangy acidity lends balance.

properties.title: Schloss Gobelsburg 2016 Cistercien Rosé (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Schloss Str. 16, 3550, Austria
properties.description: Loads of fruit show on the nose of this wine: green and red apple, strawberry and ample, zesty citrus. The palate is taut, fresh, dry and precise, shot through with appetizing fruity flavors. A wonderful, flavorsome rosé, with or without food.

properties.title: Stadlmann 2016 Badener Berg Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Wr. Str. 41, 2514 Traiskirchen, Austria
properties.description: There's a distinct herbal hint to the green pear notes on the nose of this wine. The light palate leads with white pepper, pear and lemon flavors, and the finish is clean and dry.

properties.title: Stift Göttweig 2016 Messwein Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Stadtgraben 11, 3500 Krems an der Donau, Austria
properties.description: Fresh citrus and pear notes govern the nose and palate of this light-bodied, zippy and refreshing wine. It's peppery and zesty at its core, with a lip-smacking and very invigorating finish.

properties.title: Neudorf 2014 Sauvignon Blanc (Nelson)
properties.description: Admirably concentrated and complex, this is a medium- to full-bodied wine. Passion fruit and snap pea notes combine with citrus zest on the nose, palate and long, mouthwatering finish.

properties.title: Astrolabe 2015 Province Pinot Gris (Marlborough)
properties.address: 197 Rapaura Road, Rapaura 7273, New Zealand
properties.description: A dry style with just enough acid to lend focus and length, this is a fine effort from Simon Waghorn, the owner-winemaker. Hints of baking spices and ginger lend nuance to the apple, pear, melon and citrus fruit.

properties.title: Box O'Birds 2014 Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.description: Mild notes of tomato leaf accent this wine's refreshing white-grapefruit aromas and flavors. It's medium in body and dry, finishing long and elegant. Drink now.

properties.title: Jermann 2015 Vinnae White (Venezia Giulia)
properties.description: Delicately scented, this offers yellow stone-fruit and citrus aromas. The bright, savory palate mirrors the nose, offering ripe yellow-peach, nectarine and golden apple flavors, while tangy acidity provides balance and freshness.

properties.title: Le Masciare 2015  Fiano di Avellino
properties.address: Contrada Barbassano s.n.c, 83052 Paternopoli AV, Italy
properties.description: This wine's yellow flower, Mediterranean brush and citrus aromas will grab your attention. On the full-bodied palate, a white almond note underscores ripe Bartlett pear, nectarine and candied lemon flavors while a mineral note energizes the finish.

properties.title: Loimer 2016 Lois Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.address: Haindorfer Vögerlweg 23, 3550 Langenlois, Austria
properties.description: This wine leads with the fruity scent of fresh Conference and yellow pear. Its slightly spritzy palate comes with some yeasty, herbal savoriness and finishes fresh and dry.

properties.title: Lundeen 2012 Extra Brut Blanc de Blancs Sparkling (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 614 E Main St, St. Charles, IL 60174, USA
properties.description: This traditional method  sparkler opens with a genteel toastiness on the nose and palate. Fresh and bright fruit flavors suggest apples dusted with cinnamon. It's vintage dated and sourced from a single vineyard. Beware when opening–the cork virtually exploded from the bottle as soon as the capsule was loosened!

properties.title: Hug 2010 Starr Ranch Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 2323 Tuley Rd #120, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.description: This has enormously high alcohol, but the fruit is curiously thin, with some unripeness. The amount of new oak doesn't seem to help.

properties.title: Franciscan 2011 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1178 Galleron Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: This shows green unripe notes that go beyond gooseberry. Still, it gets a pass for cleanness and dryness.

properties.title: Ugly Duckling 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
properties.address: 106 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10003, USA
properties.description: A big letdown after the 2009, this is a simple, rustic wine. It's dry and acidic, with thin berry, herb and spice flavors.

properties.title: Viña La Rosa 2011 La Palma Sauvignon Blanc (Cachapoal Valley)
properties.address: Ruta 66 112, Peumo, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: Basic citrus and apple aromas lead to a round palate that won't stay fresh for much longer. It tastes melony and green, with lettuce flavors and a flat finish.

properties.title: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi 2011 Pinot Grigio (California)
properties.address: 7801 St Helena Hwy, Oakville, CA 94562, USA
properties.description: A soft, simple wine, with apricot and orange flavors that are quite sweet. Unless you like this style, you'll find it cloying.

properties.title: Arauco 2011 Reserva Sauvignon Blanc (Central Valley)
properties.address: Golfo de Arauco, Coronel, Bío Bío, Chile
properties.description: This is nearly indistinguishable from Arauco's standard 82-point 2011 Sauvignon Blanc, smelling stalky, with zero pungency or varietal character. It shows lemony acids, but that's about all.

properties.title: Santa Ema 2011 Selected Terroir Sauvignon Blanc (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Izaga 1096, Isla de Maipo, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: Other than notes of white flowers and green herbs on the nose, this wine is all about canned peas and beans. The palate has texture and flesh, but the flavors are vegetal.

properties.title: Peju 2011 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 8466 St Helena Hwy, Rutherford, CA 94573, USA
properties.description: Peju's Sauvignon Blancs need warm vintages to succeed, and 2011 was anything but warm. The wine tastes unripe, with skunky aromas and flavors that make it difficult to like.

properties.title: Viña el Aromo 2011 Sauvignon Blanc (Maule Valley)
properties.address: Diecisiete Ote. 931, Talca, Maule, Chile
properties.description: This is oily and strained on the nose and fleshy in the mouth. It tastes herbal and quasi weedy, with a matchstick note on the finish.

properties.title: Cardinale 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 7600 St Helena Hwy, Oakville, CA 94562, USA
properties.description: Another fabulous Cardinale, better than the 2007 but short of the perfect 2006. This is so complete; it tastes like Cabernet on a cloud, light but ethereal, with ripe, polished blackberry and cherry flavors and touches of mocha, spice and cedar. The tannins are a wonder—soft and pliant—yet gorgeously complex. Drink now-2016, at least.

properties.title: Celani Family Vineyards 2008 Ardore Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2230 Big Ranch Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Young and succulent, this is fresh, with ripe flavors of blackberries, cassis, chocolate and herb, with a toasty overlay of oak. Powerful, but not overbearing, this shows an internal coherence that lifts it to a high level of elegant complexity. As good as it is, it will benefit from 8-12 years in a proper cellar.

properties.title: Laird 2009 Flat Rock Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 5055 Solano Ave, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: This is dry and brisk in acidity, with firm tannins and great structural integrity. At the same time, it's vast in blackberry and cherry-jam flavors, while the oak overlay is strong but perfectly matched with the wine's volume. Very fine, complex and elegant, this is a Cabernet to cellar for eight years; it could be one for the long haul.

properties.title: McGregor 2012 Reserve Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 5503 Dutch St, Dundee, NY 14837, USA
properties.description: Warm spice and oak tones accent fresh apples and lemons on this full-bodied Chardonnay. It's not subtle with a dense slick of caramel that extends along the midpalate, but a kick of lemon-lime acidity on the finish adds some levity.

properties.title: Nine Hats 2013 Pinot Gris (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 3861 1st Ave S, Seattle, WA 98134, USA
properties.description: Sourced entirely from the Benches vineyard, this screw-capped wine shows a lot of SO2 when first opened, so plan on decanting if at all possible. Once it clears up it's a leesy, fresh white wine with flavors of apples and pears, lightly dusted with cinnamon spice.

properties.title: Airfield Estates 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 14450 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE #109, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: The alcohol has dropped to just above 12% in this vintage, and the wine seems a tad underripe. Overtly grassy and pungent, it suggests with petrol, gooseberry and green banana. Drink it well-chilled.

properties.title: Ànima Negra 2013 Quíbia Falanis White (Vi de la Terra Mallorca)
properties.address: Carrer son Negre, 23, 07200 Felanitx, Illes Balears, Spain
properties.description: This funky white from the island of Mallorca is 50% Premsal and 50% Callet, and if you've never heard of those grapes you're not alone. The nose is a bit harsh and strange, while the palate is on the flat side. Flavors of ham, pithy citrus and nectarine finish jumbled. This is more of a unique oddity than great white wine.

properties.title: Bret Brothers 2012 Les Mûres  (Pouilly-Loché)
properties.address: 125 Rue aux Bourgeois, 71680 Vinzelles, France
properties.description: Showing its wood strongly, this toasty wine seems to have lost the fruit. Some attractive acidity at the end helps compensate. Drink now.

properties.title: Buddha Kat 2013 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 17020 Ruben Ln, Sandy, OR 97055, USA
properties.description: Spritzy, lively and quite dry, this mixes citrus rind phenolics with apple and pear fruit. It's simple, fruity and searingly tart.

properties.title: Castle Rock 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 75 Malaga Cove Plaza #7, Palos Verdes Estates, CA 90274, USA
properties.description: Light pepper, cassis and a hint of leather form the nose on this wine from a brand founded in 1994 specifically to deliver quality wines at affordable prices. The palate offers grilled meat and roasted root-vegetable flavors. Fairly gripping tannins mean that this wine could survive through 2017.

properties.title: Silver Thread 2012 Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 1401 Caywood Rd, Lodi, NY 14860, USA
properties.description: A wisp of smoke lends nuance to aromas of apple and white peach on this dry, refreshingly citric Chardonnay. The palate builds in bulk and body with concentrated flavors of savory apples layered in smoke and earth. Drink now.

properties.title: Simonnet-Febvre 2011  Bourgogne Vézelay
properties.address: 30 Rte de Saint-Bris, 89530 Chitry, France
properties.description: Fresh and fruity, this crisp wine comes from a region near Chablis. Good acidity, lively citrus and a cool feel all work well together.

properties.title: Clos des Rocs 2012 Clos des Rocs Monopole  (Pouilly-Loché)
properties.address: 64 Chem. de Colonge, 71000 Mâcon, France
properties.description: The wine is soft, fruity and ready to drink, with attractive fruitiness, soft acidity and a touch of wood. With a crisp aftertaste, it offers freshness as well.

properties.title: Collovray et Terrier 2012 Les Vignes de Joanny  (Mâcon-Davayé)
properties.address: La Cuette, 71960 Davayé, France
properties.description: A tight, mineral-driven wine, it has both great fruit and acidity. It is tangy, pushing forward crisp lemon and apple skin flavors and a touch of peach. Drink now.

properties.title: Domaine Pouillon 2013 Jewett Creek Vineyards Gewürztraminer (Columbia Gorge (WA))
properties.address: 170 Lyle Snowden Rd, Lyle, WA 98635, USA
properties.description: This wine is 100% varietal and fermented and aged in stainless steel. It starts out quite reductive before opening to reveal perfumed notes of rose petal, lychee and spice. The palate is off dry (16g/L residual sugar), broad and oily in feel.

properties.title: Edna Valley Vineyard 2012 Fleur de Edna Chardonnay (Edna Valley)
properties.address: 2585 Biddle Ranch Rd, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.description: A deeply golden Chardonnay from E & J Gallo's Edna Valley brand, this wine starts with a tightly wound nose, faintly offering tart apple, lemon rind and a slight herbal character. An elegant but brief flavor of perfumed pear washes away quickly without much finish.

properties.title: Foppiano 2012 Estate Bottled Sauvignon Blanc (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 12707 Old Redwood Hwy, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Here is a steely, bright Sauvignon Blanc that's rounded in citrus, melon and herbal flavors, finishing clean and with ample acidic lift.

properties.title: Hedonismo 2012 Blanco White (Vino de la Tierra de Castilla)
properties.address: Domicilio Conocido s/n, 22785 Valle de Guadalupe, B.C., Mexico
properties.description: Mild, innocuous aromas of white fruits are pleasant but undefined. This feels round and benefits from acidic lift, while flavors of orange and nectarine finish in a friendly manner. This is mostly Viura with some Verdejo and Sauvignon Blanc.

properties.title: Wagner 2012 Select Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 9322 St Rt 414 Winery, Lodi, NY 14860, USA
properties.description: Fleshy and ripe with flavors of sweet yellow peach touched with honey, this is an easy going medium-sweet Riesling. There's a touch of savory smoke and spice that persists from nose to finish, but overall, it's bright and sunny with lingering lemon acidity.

properties.title: Yalumba 2014 Made with Organic Grapes Viognier (South Australia)
properties.address: 40 Eden Valley Rd, Angaston SA 5353, Australia
properties.description: On top of being made from organically grown grapes, this wine is vegan friendly. Of course, that means nothing unless the wine is good. Thankfully, this wine is excellent. Apricot, honey and ginger notes mingle easily on the palate. Drink this full-bodied, slightly open-knit wine over through 2017.

properties.title: Herdade do Esporão 2014 Esporão Private Selection White White (Alentejano)
properties.address: 9CJR+7GW, 7200, Portugal
properties.description: It's rare to find a Sémillon in Portugal, let along the Alentejo. And yet the wine works beautifully. Wood aging has given it sophistication while the natural creamy texture of the grape is enhanced by the ripe yellow fruits that are lightly lifted by a herbal, citrus aftertaste. This wine could well age, so drink now or, better, keep until 2017.

properties.title: Jean-Baptiste Adam 2013 Wineck-Schlossberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
properties.description: Pure notes of tart but ripe, red apple shine on nose and palate. They pervade this fresh, clean and dry wine with immense, appetizing juiciness. There is concentration and joy at the heart, backed by focussed, taut acidity that brightens everything. The lemon zest on the finish is impressive and long.

properties.title: Cave de Ribeauvillé 2011 Altenberg de Bergheim Grand Cru Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 2 Rte de Colmar, 68150 Ribeauvillé, France
properties.description: Honeysuckle spice wraps itself around luscious, ripe, sweet peach fruit. The sweet palate reinforces this aromatic duo. This is fluid and round, indulgent and rich, but inflected with charming orange peel freshness.

properties.title: Domaine Barmès-Buecher 2011 Steingrubler Grand Cru Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.description: Faint rose petal notes still perfume the peachy fruit. The palate is rich, medium sweet and honeyed, as though peach and citrus were soaked in honey. This is fresh and rich, rounded and poised, tipping the scales just a little bit more on the rich side. The spice on the finish is reminiscent of honeysuckle.

properties.title: Domaine Fernand Engel 2013 Gloeckelberg Grand Cru Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 1 Rte du Vin, 68590 Rorschwihr, France
properties.description: The bitter-sweet edge of dark fir honey engulfs nose and palate which nonetheless has a core of bright, ripe, juicy and slightly sweet pear. The sweetness sings with that bitter tinge. This is rich but fresh and balanced and leaves with an off-dry aftertaste of more honey.

properties.title: Domaine Laporte 2014 La Comtesse  (Sancerre)
properties.address: 62 Av. de Fontenay, 18300 Saint-Satur, France
properties.description: Produced from vines located between Chavignol and Sancerre, this comes from pure chalk soil. It is crisp while having a warmer, more rounded character. It's full of apple and pineapple as well as citrus fruits which are added to the young, tight mineral texture. Aromatic and ripe, the wine should age a year or two and will be better from 2017.

properties.title: Domaine Vincent Carême 2013 L'Ancestrale Brut  (Vouvray)
properties.address: 1 Rue du Haut Clos, 37210 Vernou-sur-Brenne, France
properties.description: With a nutty flavor fresh apples and pears and a touch of honey, this is a delicious wine. It is full of ripe fruit that has not lost its crisp, cool character. The wine has a mineral edge that gives it a fine tang as well as a tight texture. It's fresh although there are indications of bottle age which means it is ready to drink.

properties.title: Dr. Bürklin-Wolf 2014 Wachenheimer Böhling P.C. Dry Riesling (Pfalz)
properties.address: Ringstraße 4, 67157 Wachenheim an der Weinstraße, Germany
properties.description: Minerality takes center stage in this light-footed but penetrating dry Riesling. While the fruit profile is zesty and green—suggesting tart, under-ripe lime, tangerines and melon rinds—the palate is gilded by slick layers of candlewax and petrol, lending a dense, voluminous mouthfeel. It's an elegant, stately wine to drink now through 2023.

properties.title: Dr. Loosen 2014 Bernkasteler Lay Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: 20501 Tranquility Ln, Oregon City, OR 97045, USA
properties.description: More blossomy and mineral than ripe or ruddy, there's a demure elegance to this bristling off-dry Riesling. Crisp, almost crystalline flavors of tangerine and yellow peach accentuate and lengthen the palate. It's a deftly cutting wine to drink now through 2020.

properties.title: Cloudburst 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Margaret River)
properties.address: 282 Corporate Dr #2, Portsmouth, NH 03801, USA
properties.description: This tiny winery burst on the scene when its 2010 Cabernet scooped three trophies at the Margaret River Wine Show. This wine does show more weight and richness than the 2012, with a silky, satiny texture rarely found in young Cabernet Sauvignon and crisp, cassis-inflected fruit. Drink now–2030.

properties.title: Max Ferd. Richter 2008 Mülheimer Sonnenlay Brut Sekt Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Hauptstraße 85, 54486 Mülheim (Mosel), Germany
properties.description: Wide streaks of saffron, caramel and honey along with a deep mineral core hint to the maturity of this complex sparkling Riesling. Rich yellow cherry and peach flavors persist on the palate, buoyed by soft, delicate mousse and striking lemonade acidity.

properties.title: Quinta da Romeira 2013 Morgado de Santa Catherina Reserva Arinto (Bucelas)
properties.address: Quinta da Romeira de Cima, 2670-678 Bucelas, Portugal
properties.description: This pure Arinto from its home territory is fresh, fruity, citrus-driven and with apple and textured zesty orange flavors. The wine has structure, intense acidity and a tangy, mineral character that will allow it to mature a few more months. Drink now, but better from late 2016.

properties.title: Raccaro 2014 Friulano (Collio)
properties.description: Lovely scents of orchard fruit, citrus, almond blossom and a whiff of light baking spice emerge on this radiant wine. The lively, balanced palate delivers yellow apple, bitter almond, ginger and a note of tangerine zest. A salty note closes the finish.

properties.title: Radikon 2012 Slatnik White (Venezia Giulia)
properties.address: Località Tre Buchi, 4, 34170 Oslavia GO, Italy
properties.description: Made with 80% Chardonnay and 20% Friulano, this amber-colored wine boasts more fruit richness than many other wines from the orange wine movement. Loaded with ripe apricot, candied citrus zest, dried herbs and crushed stone, this is brightened by lively acidity on the palate. A perfect introduction to the genre; Drink now–2016.

properties.title: Rocca 2012 Collinetta Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Coombsville)
properties.address: 129 Devlin Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: A foundation of thick tannin and oak give size and weight to this full-bodied wine that offers waves of smoky leather, cedar, tar and black cherry on the nose and palate. More savory than fruity, it is a compelling expression of this relatively cooler appellation in the Napa Valley. Drink now through 2020.

properties.title: Rocca 2012 Grigsby Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Yountville)
properties.address: 129 Devlin Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: This wine opens in classically delicate characteristics of clove and cedar, as expressive as a forest floor. It then unveils a combination of red and black plum deftly sifted through soft layers of integrated oak and tannin.

properties.title: René Sparr 2011 Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.description: Rich wine showing all the spicy character that comes with Gewurztraminer. It is on the dry side while having some softness from its lychee perfumes. Fine as an apéritif or with pâté and Chinese food. Screwcap.

properties.title: Marko 2011 Kortezubi Urdaibai Hondarrabi Zuri (Bizkaiko Txakolina)
properties.address: 3209 Marquita Dr, Fort Worth, TX 76116, USA
properties.description: Despite being fairly young, this is a weighty wine with a gold color and waxy apple aromas. A blocky mouthfeel is oily and has enough acidity to stay lively. Flavors of chunky apple, peach and melon lead to a round, oily feeling finish.

properties.title: Eristavi Winery 2012 Vintner's Reserve Sauvignon Blanc (California)
properties.address: 1300 Potrero Ave, San Francisco, CA 94110, USA
properties.description: Made in a family winery based in San Francisco that sources fruit mainly from Lodi, this Sauvignon Blanc is rich with fig and Nilla Wafer notes, with a pretty, floral nose.

properties.title: Foris 2012 Pinot Gris (Rogue Valley)
properties.address: 654 Kendall Rd, Cave Junction, OR 97523, USA
properties.description: Coming from the warm, dry 2012 vintage, this is straight down the fairway with notes of apple, pear and herbs, with the alcohol providing some distraction on the finish.

properties.title: Lancaster 2012 Samantha's Sauvignon Blanc (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 15001 Chalk Hill Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Lavish barrel fermentation, aging in new French oak and sur lie stirring was intended to bring out a Bordeaux-style richness in this wine. But the chilly vintage intervened, yielding a wine with dominant green peppercorn aromas and flavors. Still, it's a subtle, elegant wine. Drink now.

properties.title: Graziano 2012 Sauvignon Blanc (Mendocino County)
properties.address: 13275 US-101 #3, Hopland, CA 95449, USA
properties.description: Greg Graziano blends 81% Sauvignon Blanc and 19% Pinot Grigio for a dynamite combination of tropical guava flavor, bracing acidity, and a pronounced hit of grapefruit on the finish.

properties.title: Hill Wine Company 2011 Black Dog Series Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 6512 Washington St, Yountville, CA 94599, USA
properties.description: Its brisk acidity and dry, tart lemon-and-lime flavors make this a nice wine to drink now. It has the herb and tobacco notes you often find in Napa Valley Chardonnay.

properties.title: DFJ Vinhos 2012 Coreto Branco White (Lisboa)
properties.address: 2070-681 Vila Chã de Ourique, Portugal
properties.description: Fragrant and fruity, this is a bright, crisp and clean wine that's totally ready to drink. Lively, with a cool feeling like the nearby ocean's breezes, it finishes with light acidity.

properties.title: Kon Tiki 2014 Sauvignon Blanc (Central Valley)
properties.address: 13860 Wellington Trace #21-22, Wellington, FL 33414, USA
properties.description: Leesy vanilla aromas are bland and don't amount to much. The palate follows suit, with additional briny melon flavors.

properties.title: Autoritas 2014 Gran Reserva Sauvignon Blanc (Leyda Valley)
properties.address: 5100 US Hwy 98 N, Lakeland, FL 33809, USA
properties.description: Powdery bath-soap aromas are odd on the nose. The mealy palate boasts flavors of bitter melon and papaya.

properties.title: Viña Casas Patronales 2013 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Maule Valley)
properties.address: Los Militares 5001, Las Condes, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: This is overtly rustic, roasted, leathery and strange on the nose. A wide but wayward palate seems sluggish, while rubbery black-fruit and burnt-wood flavors finish with murky berry tones.

properties.title: Terra Andina 2012 Bold Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
properties.description: Aromas of spiced tomato, clove and rubber gloves don't click or suggest much quality. A cloying, sugary palate with mucky berry flavors is less than stellar, as is a sticky finish that tastes like strawberry jam.

properties.title: La Crusset 2011 La Bella Fernanda Tempranillo Blanco (Rioja)
properties.address: Plaça del Pont Romà, 08770 Sant Sadurní d'Anoia, Barcelona, Spain
properties.description: Rough, stalky, yeasty aromas are all over the map. Lemony acidity renders this tight as a drum, while bitter, stalky flavors finish wheaty and bitter. This Tempranillo Blanco is barely worth a go; the pleasure factor is at base level.

properties.title: Schmitz 24 Brix 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Sierra Foothills)
properties.address: 17585 CA-49, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.description: This has a deeper-than-usual yellow-gold color, and slight aromas and flavors that are more earthy and nutty than fruity. It is difficult to find the varietal character. It's a basic, rather full-bodied and drinkable white wine.

properties.title: Acumen 2011 Chardonnay (Central Coast)
properties.address: 1315 1st St, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.description: Salted apples and white rocks are marred by metallic aromas. Rounded flavors of ripe lemon curds are also hit with metallic flavors throughout.

properties.title: Estampa 2014 Fina Reserva Ensamblaje Sauvignon Blanc-Chardonnay-Viognier White (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Ruta 90, Km.45 O'Higgins CL, Palmilla, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: Pickled, briny aromas lead to a palate defined only by pithy citrus fruit. This tastes mostly of bitter citrus, while the finish brings herbacious tones.

properties.title: Page Mill Winery 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 1960 S Livermore Ave, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.description: This smells and tastes quite buttery, which is unusual for the variety, and has a thick texture to go with it. Fruit aromas and flavors are pretty sparse, and the balance leans toward soft.

properties.title: Mapreco 2014 White (Vinho Verde)
properties.address: 129 W 27th St #9, New York, NY 10001, USA
properties.description: This is a light, fruity and off-dry wine. It has splashes of lemon and sweet citrus, with a crisp finish.

properties.title: Arrocal 2014 Rosa de Arrocal Rosé (Ribera del Duero)
properties.address: Calle Eras de, Plaza Sta. María, S/N, 09443 Gumiel del Mercado, Burgos, Spain
properties.description: Feral, feline, sweaty aromas precede an awkward palate with bitter flavors of weedy berry, citrus fruits and pyrazines. A scallion-like quality drives the finish on this strange, bitter rosé.

properties.title: Ektimo Vineyards 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Bennett Valley)
properties.address: 4950 Ross Rd, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.description: This wine has a rustic, unclean quality. At a high alcohol level it also tastes disjointed, all about heat without fruit.

properties.title: Rai 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Central Valley)
properties.address: 1467 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10027, USA
properties.description: This is fleshy and dilute up front, then heavy and globular in feel. Pickled melon and vegetal stone-fruit flavors finish weak.

properties.title: Ramey 2012 Ritchie Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 25 Healdsburg Ave, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: This wine is deliciously elegant yet decadently rich in all the right ways, from a prime, longtime vineyard source planted to vines over 40 years old. Honeyed apple comes to the fore amid lush, formidable layers of complexity and high-minded pursuit, never getting bogged down, the minerality perfectly pitched and the oak fully integrated.

properties.title: F X Pichler 2013 Dürnsteiner Liebenberg Smaragd Grüner Veltliner (Wachau)
properties.address: Oberloiben 57, 3601 Dürnstein, Austria
properties.description: A delightful citrus scent intrigues, suggesting yuzu or mandarin. The palate is richer and introduces notions of earth and that pithy, phenolic edge of serious Grüner Veltliner. The initial citrus on the nose returns with redoubled force on the streamlined, fresh and still tightly closed palate. Give this time to unwind, so that the fruit can fully express itself. The deliciously green- and orange-tinged finish promises everything. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Ramey 2012 Woolsey Road Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 25 Healdsburg Ave, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: This wine comes from a new vineyard source for the producer, who continues to astound with Chardonnay. The site rises to well-crafted heights in the winemaker's hands. Made in a small quantity, the wine offers zesty lemon intensity and concentrated acidity, the entire balanced experience rewarding in its bright complexity.

properties.title: Emmerich Knoll 2012 Ried Loibenberg Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Wachau)
properties.description: Lusciously ripe, almost honeyed, pear fruit emanates from the glass. Underneath that is grapefruit zest and pith and a herbal, stony, earthy edge. The palate is rich and curvaceous but completely toned by a pervasive, lemony acidity that lends drive and linearity. This is already approachable, which is not to say that it doesn't promise a lot of mileage: this will go on and unfold its facets of fruit. Immense charm almost plays over the fact that this is a very age-worthy wine, with a finish that's almost endless. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Emmerich Knoll 2013 Ried Loibenberg Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
properties.address: Unterloiben 132, 3601 Dürnstein, Austria
properties.description: This is so young, the yeast of the ferment still swings on the nose. Underneath that, tightly curled freshness suggests both candied lemon slices and lemon sorbet—but this needs time to unfurl its glory. Despite its slenderness, this wine has muscle and tone, structure and poise. The long finish is lip-smacking and moreish. Drink 2018–2025.

properties.title: Ramey 2012 Hyde Vineyard Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.address: 25 Healdsburg Ave, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: This longstanding collaboration between vintner and grower reflects years of mutual understanding and respect. The wine offers pretty orange blossom and lemon verbena aromas that wrap around a composed, well-integrated and mineral-laden body. Voluptuous, the wine is also well-balanced, finishing in bright acidity. It is deliciously good.

properties.title: Torres 1999 Milmanda Chardonnay (Conca de Barberà)
properties.address: Carrer de Miquel Torres i Carbó, 6, 08720 Vilafranca del Penedès, Barcelona, Spain
properties.description: Though handsomely balanced, this medium-weight Chardonnay shows only modest complexity, with apple, tropical fruit and mild toasty notes on the nose and palate. A slight caramel note gives a vaguely sweet cast to the basically dry fruit flavors. Has appeal and some length, but it's not the statement one would expect at the price. —M.M.

properties.title: Beringer 1999 Alluvium Blanc White (Knights Valley)
properties.address: 2000 Main St, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: This is a very fruity wine, one dominated by apple and peach and citrus flavors. Good acids make it bright, and it's impeccably clean and focused. Could use some more depth and layers. —S.H.

properties.title: Morgadío 2000 Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.address: 9075 Holman Rd NW, Seattle, WA 98117, USA
properties.description: Intensely perfumed, with green herbs, floral, even lychee hints on the nose. The palate shows herb and wet-stone flavors, but also a faint musty note. Very poised in feel, this is commendable for its excellent texture and balance.   Drink now. —M.M.

properties.title: Yalumba 2001 Y Series Riesling (South Australia)
properties.address: 40 Eden Valley Rd, Angaston SA 5353, Australia
properties.description: You expected fruity, flowery flavors? A little sweetness? Then go someplace else. This wine is one of the driest of the year, and offers no relief at all from alcohol and other winey compounds. If there's a single, solitary flavor, it's watered down lemon juice. But it might be pretty good with clams on the half shell. —S.H.

properties.title: Repolusk 2000 Welschriesling (Austria)
properties.address: 41, 8463 Glanz an der Weinstraße, Austria
properties.description: One of the drier wines I've had lately, it's pale in color and light in aromas, with a suggestion of lemon juice. Light in citrus flavors, with a big bite of acidity that makes it raspingly clean. —S.H.

properties.title: Beringer 2000 Founders' Estate Chardonnay (California)
properties.address: 2000 Main St, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: User-friendly Chard, all toasty-spicy apples, and peaches and cream. There's almond-skin bitterness in the aftertaste that sort of sets your teeth on edge, but food will take care of that. —S.H.

properties.title: Ventana 2000 Dry Chenin Blanc (Monterey)
properties.address: 38740 Los Coches Rd, Soledad, CA 93960, USA
properties.description: Drinks dry and bitter, with lemony, citrus flavors and an almond-skin tart finish. This is an austere, steely wine of integrity and fine structure. It's a nice palate cleanser, and stimulates the appetite. —S.H.

properties.title: SuLei 2011 Spring Creek Sauvignon Blanc (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1509 Beet Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: SuLei's Tanya Woodley ferments her Sauvignon Blanc in stainless steel, then ages it in a mix of neutral oak and stainless steel barrels. In this new vintage some residual sugar (just under 1%) remains, to soften the otherwise-searing acidity. It works well, crafting a fleshy wine loaded with citrus and honeydew. The finish lingers and has plenty of lift.

properties.title: Vinum Africa 2010 Chenin Blanc (Stellenbosch)
properties.description: Strong oak-driven aromas of toasted brioche, vanilla cream and sweet spice dominate the nose. The lush, creamy palate is filled with more of the same, but is supported by peach and mushy pear fruit flavors. A decadent choice that's a good match for salmon or rich seafood.

properties.title: Johanneshof Reinisch 2011 Rotgipfler (Thermenregion)
properties.address: Im Weingarten 1, 2523 Tattendorf, Austria
properties.description: The Rotgipfler is the local grape for the Thermenregion south of Vienna. This is a warm, spice- and pepper-scented wine that also offers a rich mouthfeel. Screwcap.

properties.title: Kessler-Haak 2010 Kessler-Haak Vineyard Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 1700 Gypsy Canyon Rd Dr, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.description: Very much like the fine 2009, the winery's new Chardonnay is bone dry and austere, like a Chablis. Highly minerally, with mouthwatering acidity, the fruit flavors veer toward Meyer lemons and limes.

properties.title: Château d'Esclans 2011 Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
properties.description: Full, soft and rounded, this shows flavors of ripe strawberry and red plum. The texture is smooth, with just a tang of minerality. Nutmeg and pepper complement the acidity on the finish.

properties.title: Hermann Moser 2011 Per Due Grüner Veltliner (Kremstal)
properties.address: Bahnstraße 36, 3495 Rohrendorf bei Krems, Austria
properties.description: With considerable depth of flavor, this is a rounded, smooth wine. Its green apple flavor is laced with notes of pink grapefruit, crisp pear and a touch of peppered kiwi. It's ready to drink but also worth aging for a few months. Screwcap.

properties.title: Paumanok 2010 Barrel Fermented Chardonnay (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.address: 1074 Main Rd, Aquebogue, NY 11931, USA
properties.description: Exuberant aromas of white blossoms and ripe stonefruit settle substantially in the glass, revealing a rich yet layered palate that marries sweet cream and butter notes with lemon pith, smoke and striking acidity. Full and opulent, but elegant and balanced. Drink now.

properties.title: Staglin 2009 Chardonnay (Rutherford)
properties.address: 1570 Bella Oaks Ln, Rutherford, CA 94573, USA
properties.description: Big, rich and oaky, this is packed with flavors of buttered toast, buttered popcorn, honey and tropical fruit flavors. It's a ripe, flashy wine, with broad appeal. Drink with opulent fare, like shellfish risotto or crab in drawn butter.

properties.title: Watermill 2010 Viognier (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 235 E Broadway Ave #1807, Milton-Freewater, OR 97862, USA
properties.description: Nicely done, still young and sharp, but carrying interesting scents of lemon and lime rind, orange liqueur, and peppery spice. Excellent acidity buoys it up through a satisfying finish, with just a slim suggestion of warmth. Should continue to improve with another two or three years in the bottle.

properties.title: Weixelbaum 2010 Alte Reben Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
properties.address: Burgstiege 71, 3610, Austria
properties.description: This is a very herbal wine, with a green medicinal edge that contrasts the rich yellow-fruit flavor. There is concentration, dense fruits and a soft, ripe finish. Screwcap.

properties.title: Sparkman 2009 Kingpin Cabernet Sauvignon (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 14300 NE 145th St #102, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: A whiff of leather introduces a wine with a strong savory character; the leather and earth flavors start to bury the sweet berry fruit, and the tannins take on a chalky texture.

properties.title: Spice Route 2010 Chenin Blanc (Swartland)
properties.address: Suid-Agter-Paarl Rd, Southern Paarl, Paarl, 7646, South Africa
properties.description: There's a strong herbal backbone to the core of this wine, surrounded by fleshy notes of melon and white peach. The earthy notes mix with a lime rind freshness on the palate, with a nice tropical fruit flavor that stays well into the close. Drink now.

properties.title: Domaine de Dionysos 2009 La Cigalette Grenache-Syrah-Mourvèdre-Carignan Cairanne Red (Côtes du Rhône Villages)
properties.address: 55 impasse de la cave, Les Farjons, 84100 Uchaux, France
properties.description: Made in a traditional style with no evident new oak, leathery, meaty notes balance dusty earth and sour plums on the nose, while the palate is full, round and richly textured. Finishes with dark, savory notes of coffee and black olives. Drink now–2017.

properties.title: Sharabella Wines 2008 Padre Amante Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
properties.description: Not sure what's going on here but both bottles of this Cab smelled of diesel gasoline, burnt rubber and corn nuts.

properties.title: Argana 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: San Rafael, Mendoza Province, Argentina
properties.description: A weird wine with a distinct and overriding clove character that's manifested on the nose, palate and finish. One-dimensional and strange, with way too much clove impact.

properties.title: Kracher 2008 Zwischen den Seen Nummer 9 Trockenbeerenauslese Welschriesling (Burgenland)
properties.address: Apetlonerstraße 37, 7142 Illmitz, Austria
properties.description: Opulent honey and lemon aromas waft from the glass in this superrich but so balanced wine. The acidity is an essential element, cutting through the sweet orange, honey and ginger flavors. A gorgeous wine.

properties.title: Kracher 2008 Zwischen den Seen Nummer 11 Trockenbeerenauslese Scheurebe (Burgenland)
properties.address: Apetlonerstraße 37, 7142 Illmitz, Austria
properties.description: A beautiful wine that is almost like nectar. It has extreme freshness, while the acidity is a wonderful contrast. Such concentrated orange flavors and a smooth texture while there is a great citrus edge.

properties.title: Shafer 2009 Red Shoulder Ranch Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.address: 6154 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Shafer consistently produces one of the biggest, fruitiest Chardonnays in California, and yet the wine remains balanced and interesting. The 2009 Red Shoulder Ranch is gigantic in pineapples, pears, mangoes, tangerines and honey, yet so minerally and crisp that somehow it finishes dry.

properties.title: Franz Hirtzberger 2010 Hochrain Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
properties.address: Kremserstraße 8, 3620 Spitz, Austria
properties.description: A beautifully perfumed wine is give shape by its great swathe of minerality, its intense acidity. The fruits range from citrus to white peach, a gallery of delicious flavor. Like any great Riesling, it needs years to mature.

properties.title: Nicolaysen Family Vineyards 2001 Late Harvest Alisos Vineyard Gewürztraminer (Santa Barbara County)
properties.description: At nearly 10 years of age, this beautiful Gewürz shows how well a good California dessert wine can age. It's still brisk in clean acidity, but is honeyed and sweet, with nearly 19% residual sugar. Shows rich, exotic pineapple, tangerine marmalade, gingerbread, apricot jam, buttered toast, crème brûlée, vanilla cream and spice flavors, leading to a long, deliriously delicious finish. A heady, flamboyantly sweet wine to drink now.

properties.title: Kracher 2008 Nouvelle Vague Nummer 8 Trockenbeerenauslese Chardonnay (Burgenland)
properties.address: Apetlonerstraße 37, 7142 Illmitz, Austria
properties.description: When it becomes a sweet wine, Chardonnay's natural richness shows immensely. This wine has orange and crystallized orange flavors along with intense concentration. A smooth texture is given just the right lift by acidity.

properties.title: Gardel 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: 7963 Melrose Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90046, USA
properties.description: Jammy, scratchy, oddly spiced aromas set up a drawing, cloying palate feel. Gummy strawberry and raspberry flavors finish short and briny, with a sweet, chocolaty note.

properties.title: Wine with Spirit 2012 Bastardô! Rosé (Lisboa)
properties.address: R. Nova da Trindade 8C, 1200-205 Lisboa, Portugal
properties.description: This soft, almost tasteless wine just hints at caramel and red fruits. It lacks character.

properties.title: Marco Zunino 2014 Rosé (Mendoza)
properties.address: San Rafael, Mendoza Province, Argentina
properties.description: Rusty in color and metallic in aromas, this does not smell fresh despite being young. A full, chunky palate is home to mealy peach and cantaloupe flavors, while the finish falls flat and tastes bitter.

properties.title: Luminis 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Luján de Cuyo)
properties.description: Rusty in color, this is gritty, murky and stewy on the nose. Stewy, mulchy, sweet berry flavors finish bitter and leafy.

properties.title: Viejo Isaias 2013 Malbec Rosé (Mendoza)
properties.address: calle terrada, Cjon. Morales 4300 y, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.description: Sawdust characterizes the nose of this strained rosé. The palate is heavy, resiny and low on acidity, while flavors of forced wood and cream are devoid of fruit.

properties.title: Pol Roger 2002 Cuvée Sir Winston Churchill Brut  (Champagne)
properties.address: 1 rue Winston Churchill, 51200 Épernay, France
properties.description: With its gold color and mature, toasty flavors, this is possibly the greatest Winston Churchill ever. It has weight and richness, with a dense, full and rich texture. It's in perfect balance, bringing together maturity and crisper apple and green plum fruit flavors that are cut with lemon. A mineral edge gives a nervy character that will allow this magnificent wine to age further.

properties.title: Bründlmayer 2013 Heiligenstein Reserve Lyra Riesling (Kamptal)
properties.address: Zwettler Str. 23, 3550 Langenlois, Austria
properties.description: Beautifully lifted, almost sublimated apple and citrus fruit combine to make a perfumed, appetizing nose. That pure apple theme continues on the concentrated palate that sings with purity to leave a satisfying and honest impression of completeness. Pure and simply very delicious.

properties.title: Franz Hirtzberger 2013 Singerriedl Smaragd Riesling (Wachau)
properties.address: Kremserstraße 8, 3620 Spitz, Austria
properties.description: A zesty nose promises refreshment and poise. The palate not only keeps this promise but tops it. Orange, mandarin and lemon frame riper peach and Mirabelle plum explode like a firework of fruit on the palate. This is fruit-framed, citrus-focused joy, combining immense concentration with immense elegance. There is a long and exciting life ahead of this.

properties.title: Deutz 2006 Amour de Deutz Brut Rosé  (Champagne)
properties.description: With its beautiful rose color and delicate flavors, this continues the elegant tradition of Amour de Deutz. It's one of the Champagne house's three prestige cuvées and the most refined. This crisp wine, with its soft acidity, ripe strawberry fruits and tang of citrus is ready to drink, although it will age in bottle for many years.

properties.title: Pichler-Krutzler 2013 Supperin Grüner Veltliner (Wachau)
properties.address: Oberloiben 16, 3601 Dürnstein, Austria
properties.description: Floral notes play above the aromatic woodruff and fig-leaf aromas which make this incredibly enticing. The palate is slender, tight and totally concentrated. This is nervy, high-octane stuff, for now boasting lemon and pink grapefruit, without a single ounce of fat—and yet this is not ungenerous.

properties.title: Hiedler 2013 Steinhaus Reserve Riesling (Kremstal)
properties.description: Both ripe red apple and crisp green Granny Smith play on the nose, however, they are laced with both honey and zesty citrus, creating thrill. This is wonderfully poised and invigorating. Totally streamlined and linear, it's a wine to enjoy now and for years to come.

properties.title: Domaine Pinson 2013 Les Clos Grand Cru  (Chablis)
properties.description: This wine brings out the structure inherent in this vineyard. Tensely textured with young fruits that have a touch of bitterness, the wine offers kiwi and green plum flavors given a more exotic character with some mango. It's a deeply structured wine that needs to age. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Joseph Drouhin 2013 Marquis de Laguiche Morgeot Premier Cru  (Chassagne-Montrachet)
properties.address: 7 Rue d'Enfer, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: Perfumed and floral, this is a wine with weight and richness. There is a lot of structure here, concentrated rich yellow and white fruits giving a textured and mineral wine. It comes from a property vinified by Drouhin for 70 years. The wine is for aging; drink from 2019.

properties.title: Ökonomierat Rebholz 2011 Trocken Spätburgunder (Pfalz)
properties.address: Weinstraße 54, 76833 Siebeldingen, Germany
properties.description: A stunner amidst an increasingly competitive set of German Pinot Noir, this lavishly berried, rich wine is full of nuance and complexity. Deep, ripe black-fruit flavors are accented by rose petals and game. Bristling acidity and taut, grippy tannins lend structure and depth. It drinks beautifully now, but is bound to improve through 2021 and beyond.

properties.title: William Fèvre 2013 Vaudésir Grand Cru  (Chablis)
properties.address: 10 Rue Jules Rathier, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: From vines on the sunny side of the vineyard, this wine is richly textured and structured, full of generous yellow and white fruits, spice and layers of wood aging. It has a honeyed character, typical of 2013, with a tight, taut, crisp acidity at the end. Drink this strongly structured wine from 2019.

properties.title: Bernhard Huber 2010 Bienenberg R Erste Lage GG Spätburgunder (Baden)
properties.address: Heimbacher Weg 19, 79364 Malterdingen, Germany
properties.description: Rose petal and violets persist throughout this complex, deeply nuanced Pinot Noir. The palate is richly berried, but swathed in a musky, earthy perfume that's intoxicating. Bristling acidity and fine, filigreed tannins round out a long finish. Stunning now, but likely to integrate its subtleties further through at least 2025.

properties.title: Domaine Christian Moreau Père et Fils 2013 Les Clos Grand Cru  (Chablis)
properties.winery: Domaine Christian Moreau Père et Fils
properties.description: This wine has a rich, fat, almost buttery character. Certainly the acidity is there, although it has a warm, summer feel. The structure typical of Les Clos is all there as well, giving concentration and density. At the end spice goes with the extreme freshness of the citrus aftertaste. Drink from 2020.

properties.title: Domaine Jean-Paul et Benoît Droin 2013 Grenouilles Grand Cru  (Chablis)
properties.address: 14 Av. Jean Jaurès, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: This rich, generous and soft wine has a ripe feel along with plenty of acidity. The freshness is cushioned by ripe yellow and pear fruit flavors. It has power as well as minerality, and a touch of toast comes through at the end. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Domaine Laroche 2012 La Réserve de l'Obédience Les Clos Grand Cru  (Chablis)
properties.address: 22 Rue Louis Bro, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: This wine, from the Les Clos Grand Cru vineyard, is a flagship for Laroche. It is richer than the producer's regular Les Clos offering, bringing roundness and a fullness to the mineral, textured character. It's open, ripe although it needs aging. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Domaine Jean-Paul et Benoît Droin 2013 Vaulorent Premier Cru  (Chablis)
properties.description: This is a very precise wine, steely and mineral. It has a smoky, flinty character that fits the image of an age-worthy Chablis. Under this texture lies the potential of delicious fruitiness, fresh and packed with sliced apple and quince flavors. Drink this wine from 2018.

properties.title: Domaine Pinson 2013 Fourchaume Premier Cru  (Chablis)
properties.address: 5 Quai Voltaire, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: From ripe fruits, in the Pinson style, this is a rich, generous and concentrated wine. There is great fruitiness from the ripe apricot and pear flavors, cut with acidity to give an edge of freshness. Spice and fragrant acidity mark the finish.

properties.title: Albert Bichot 2011 Domaine Long-Depaquit La Moutonne Grand Cru  (Chablis)
properties.address: 6 Bd Jacques Copeau, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: This 2011 is an aristocratic wine, with a mineral character that is now rounding out. Yellow and green fruits mingle with some tannins and a steely core. It will age for several years more, so drink from 2018.

properties.title: Sandhi 2013 Mt. Carmel Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 1501 E Chestnut Ave, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.description: Lime and apple blossoms, gray slate, wet chalk, a touch of struck match and an ever-so-slight lemon-butter element converge on a wondrous nose in this Rajat Parr-Sashi Moorman winner. Once sipped, the tight citrus hits first, but then come approachable white flowers, golden pears and a touch of ghee and vanilla on the back end.

properties.title: Joseph Drouhin 2013 Clos de la Garenne Premier Cru  (Puligny-Montrachet)
properties.address: 7 Rue d'Enfer, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: This offers toast and spice aromas, with opulent apricots and white peaches along with intense freshness from the acidity and linear structure. The wood aging just shows through in the roundness of the wine, while leaving room for a fresh, crisp, mineral aftertaste. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Joseph Drouhin 2013 Drouhin-Vaudon Les Clos Grand Cru  (Chablis)
properties.address: 7 Rue d'Enfer, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: A very mineral, flinty character comes through the powerful texture of this rich, dense wine. The ripest, almost honeyed fruit is cut by lime, lemon and orange peel. It is a complex wine for aging; drink from 2019.

properties.title: Domaine Laroche 2012 Les Blanchots Grand Cru  (Chablis)
properties.address: 22 Rue Louis Bro, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: This is a textured, steely wine with considerable acidity as much as fruit. Tight and with green apple and green plum characters, this structured wine has a salty, chalky texture. Tasting of the soil, it needs to age. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Louis Latour 2013  Bâtard-Montrachet
properties.address: 18 Rue des Tonneliers, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: This is a beautiful wine, full of ripe yellow fruits, steely acidity and a juicy character that comes from the apple and apricot fruit flavors. While there is a firm layer of toast from the wood aging, the wine is rich, tight and full of acidity. This structured wine needs many years, so drink from 2020.

properties.title: Sandhi 2013 Bentrock Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.description: This is one of the most expensive white wines on the Central Coast, and it's mighty good, with aromas of cheese rind, lime pith, slate and tiny bits of Marcona almond and oak smoke. It's laser-focused on the chalky, mineral-laden palate, with poached apples in the midpalate and lemon peels and tangerine rinds throughout.

properties.title: William Fèvre 2013 Valmur Grand Cru  (Chablis)
properties.address: 10 Rue Jules Rathier, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: This is the coolest and freshest of the Grand Cru vineyards. The wine is tight, steely with a nervy core of acidity that gives it a textured, structured character. It is full of energy, crisp, packed with apples and citrus and needing several years aging. Drink from 2020.

properties.title: Ziereisen 2010 Blauer Schulen Spätburgunder (Baden)
properties.address: Markgrafenstraße 17, 79588 Efringen-Kirchen, Germany
properties.description: Another stand out among a lineup of stunning German Pinot Noir, this sultry, sexy wine balances ripe, ruddy black cherry and berry flavors with a vivacious acidic edge. It's bristling and bright, finishing on a deep, mineral tone. Drinks beautifully now, but is structured enough to develop well through 2020 at least.

properties.title: Domaine Christian Moreau Père et Fils 2013 Valmur Grand Cru  (Chablis)
properties.winery: Domaine Christian Moreau Père et Fils
properties.address: 26 Av. d'Oberwesel, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: This apple-crisp wine has tight acidity and touches of wood rounded out by yellow fruits. It is ripe and very full, the nervy, mineral character contrasting with the richness that is now developing. It will age slowly, so don't drink before 2020.

properties.title: Domaine Laroche 2012 Les Bougerots Grand Cru  (Chablis)
properties.address: 22 Rue Louis Bro, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: The wine comes from a parcel within the Bougros Grand Cru. It is tight, still very young although with weight and ripe apricot flavors. The density of the wine marks it out, its flavors running right through the texture. It finishes with fragrant, intense acidity. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Albert Bichot 2012 Domaine Long-Depaquit La Moutonne Grand Cru  (Chablis)
properties.address: 6 Bd Jacques Copeau, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.description: While not in the official canon of Grand Crus, La Moutonne is definitely in grand cru territory, a parcel that is divided between Les Preuses and Vaudésir. The 2012 is very structured, dense and textured, with a strongly tannic character packed with minerality. Time will bring out its fruit and richness. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: Helfrich 2009 Steinklotz Grand Cru Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 102 Rue du Général de Gaulle, 67520 Marlenheim, France
properties.description: This is a honeyed, sweet wine (a fact not indicated on the label). Spice is surrounded by ripe fruits, apricot and lychee, with added pepper. Some citrus acidity comes through at the end. Drink now.

properties.title: Sparkling Pointe 2011 Brut  (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.address: 39750 County Rd 48, Southold, NY 11971, USA
properties.description: A hint of brioche lends autolytic character to fresh spring blossom and lemon notes on this elegant, bristling traditional-method sparkling. It's delicately effervescent and startlingly brisk, finishing on a soft, rolling foam that deliciously lingers.

properties.title: Blackjack 2012 Black Cap Reserve Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 2205 Alamo Pintado Rd, Solvang, CA 93463, USA
properties.description: The inviting scents of melting butter on hot dinner rolls and vanilla-lemon custard ensure a rich wine, and the palate delivers with caramelized apples, dominant oak and more vanilla on the finish. It is balanced out with mustardy tartness and lemon rind acidity.

properties.title: Canoe Ridge 2011 Estate Grown Block 2 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 45 E Main St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: A moderately aromatic wine with notes of melted butter, vanilla, plum, herbs and woodspice. The tannins are firm and tightly wound, needing some time to come together. Best after 2016.

properties.title: Château la Baronnerie 2012 Grand Vin  (Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux)
properties.address: 1 La Baronnerie, 33620 Cézac, France
properties.description: With wood aging, the Sauvignon Blanc has developed vanilla flavors that are currently smothering the fruit. Ginger dominates, along with black pepper, giving a wine that has a tangy texture just hinting at juicy white fruits. Age until 2016.

properties.title: Frank Cornelissen 2013 Susucaru Rosato (Vino da Tavola)
properties.address: Via Nazionale, 297, 95012 Solicchiata, Castiglione di Sicilia CT, Italy
properties.description: Made from both red and white native grapes, this offers an intense fragrance of white and red roses. The floral notes carry over to the palate along with crushed Morello cherry, raspberry jam and candied strawberry. Cracked white pepper and mineral add interest.

properties.title: Mercy 2012 Riverbed Chardonnay (Arroyo Seco)
properties.address: 40 W Carmel Valley Rd A, Carmel Valley, CA 93924, USA
properties.description: From this appellation's tremendously rocky soils come aromas of golden pear and buttered toast. The palate is dominated by racy tones of lemon peel and fresh-cut yellow flowers, but rounded out with a slight vanilla buttercream on the finish.

properties.title: Louis Max 2013 Les Plantenays  (Rully)
properties.address: 8 Rue de Chaux, 21700 Nuits-Saint-Georges, France
properties.description: This is a steely wine, tight with acidity and lemon fruits. It has a mineral, tangy texture that is still calming down, which suggests a young wine that needs time. Certainly the fruit is all there, if with a nervy character. Drink the wine from 2018.

properties.title: Dr. Heidemanns-Bergweiler 2014 Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Gestade 15, 54470 Bernkastel-Kues, Germany
properties.description: A whiff of fresh brioche against a backdrop of sunny grapefruit and plum flavors makes this forward fruity off-dry Riesling especially inviting. While lively and crisp, its juicy, quaffable style makes it an easy pleaser. Drink now.

properties.title: Folin Cellars 2014 Estate Viognier (Rogue Valley)
properties.address: 9200 Ramsey Rd, Gold Hill, OR 97525, USA
properties.description: This yellow-gold wine is packed with bright floral and citrus scents and flavors. It's a mouthful of lemon-drop goodness, with the rough edges smoothed by a percentage aged in neutral oak. The finish features light honey, with a slight burn.

properties.title: François Millet 2014 Domaine des Côtes Blanches  (Sancerre)
properties.address: 2 Rue de Venoize, 18300 Bue, France
properties.description: Still so young, this herbal, fruity wine is as crisp as possible. It is packed with lemon, grapefruit and tight acidity, needing to age. Drink this tense, steely wine from late 2016.

properties.title: C.H. Berres 2012 Berres Estate Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Würzgartenstraße 41, 54539 Ürzig, Germany
properties.description: Punchy and concentrated, this off-dry Riesling juxtaposes plush, peachy fruit against a backdrop of spine-tingling lemon acidity. Its uncomplicated forward style makes it quite quaffable.

properties.title: Château Bélingard 2013 Réserve White (Bergerac Sec)
properties.address: Château Belingard, 24240 Pomport, France
properties.description: The chalk subsoil of the Bélingard estate gives this wine its textured character. The wood aging smoothes out the crisp acidity of Sauvignon Blanc and Sémillon and adds a light layer of toast. It is still a young wine and will be better from late 2016 or even 2017.

properties.title: Dr. Pauly Bergweiler 2014 Bernkasteler alte Badstube am Doctorberg Spätlese Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Gestade 15, 54470 Bernkastel-Kues, Germany
properties.description: Jolts of honey, lemon and lime introduce this animated Spätlese. It's forward and approachable with sunny tangerine and peach flavors, but maintains a nervous tension of acidity. The finish is brisk and tight.

properties.title: Lobo 2012 Wulff Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Atlas Peak)
properties.address: 2275 Soda Canyon Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: From 100% estate-grown fruit, this 100% varietal wine is dusty and dark with elements of pencil shavings, cedar and cassis. With that herbal and earthy intensity giving it defined character, it remains medium bodied and textured on the palate, with a saltiness to the finish.

properties.title: Magnum Vinhos 2013 Tom de Baton Branco White (Douro)
properties.address: Quinta do Ribeiro Santo, 3430 Oliveira do Conde, Portugal
properties.description: From a high-altitude vineyard in the heart of the Douro, this is a fruity while well textured wine. With a strong mineral character that comes from the lees stirring during fermentation, it has both bright citrus fruits with acidity and a more tropical character. Drink now.

properties.title: Martin Ray 2014 Dutton Ranch George Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 2191 Laguna Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.description: This wine shows perfumed lychee on the nose, before weightier tones of melon, lemon and oak enter the picture, providing a richness of body and power. The oak and a sprinkling of nutmeg remain firm and focused on the finish.

properties.title: Pierre Gimonnet et Fils 2008 Cuvée Paradoxe Premier Cru  (Champagne)
properties.description: This is a blend from Aÿ on the Montagne de Reims and from the Côte des Blancs. It is intensely perfumed, with weight from Pinot Noir and crispness from Chardonnay. If it seems not quite integrated at this stage, it will hopefully come together over the next few years to reveal a ripe and rich wine. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Quinta do Pinto 2014 Antão Vaz (Lisboa)
properties.address: Quinta Do Anjo, 2580-081, Portugal
properties.description: This is a rich, very rich wine that is packed with tropical fruits, generous apricot and peach flavors and spice. It is full in the mouth, showing some pepper from the alcohol that spoils the otherwise fruity character. The aftertaste does introduce some freshness.

properties.title: Rutini 2014 Encuentro Chardonnay (Mendoza)
properties.description: This is nice and hints at greater things, but ultimately it's more modest and fluffy than substantive. Aromas of oak resin, baked apple and vanilla introduce a palate with mild acidity and not much structure. Vanilla, caramel, banana and honey- dew flavors finish soft.

properties.title: Bodegas Corellanas 2011 Viña Rubican Rosé (Navarra)
properties.address: Calle Sta. Bárbara, 29, 31591 Corella, Navarra, Spain
properties.description: This has already past its sell-by date. The color is tan and maderized, while the nose is soft and mushy, with raisiny aromas. Like the nose, this is flabby and past its prime in the mouth, with a bland, bitter finish.

properties.title: Dyer 2008 Dyer Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Mountain District)
properties.address: 1501 Diamond Mountain Rd, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.description: So rich, ripe and succulent, you can hardly keep from drinking it now. But don't. This is one for the cellar. The alcohol is a refreshingly balanced. The wine is already throwing some sediment, and more than four years of bottle age are mellowing the wine's edges, with the primary blackberry and cherry flavors developing secondary characteristics. Should begin to peak around 2016 and drink well for another decade.

properties.title: Gravner 2005 Amfora Ribolla Gialla (Venezia Giulia)
properties.address: Località Lenzuolo Bianco, 9, 34170 Oslavia, Gorizia GO, Italy
properties.description: Amfora's copper-ornage color is completely unique in the wide world of contemporary wine. There's a luminous brightness to the wine's appearance that defies its many years of age. Matured in clay amphorae, this pure expression of Ribolla Gialla delivers a softer approach than Gravner's Breg (a white blend) and amazingly intense aromas of resin, pine nut, caramel, graham cracker and candied fruit. Firm structure and determined flavors mark the long close. You can drink it now or hold 10 more years.

properties.title: Giaconda 2008 Chardonnay (Victoria)
properties.address: 30 McClay Rd, Everton Upper VIC 3678, Australia
properties.description: This wine eschews the current trends and sticks to its full-blown guns, remaining a broad, lush and creamy-textured wine, with open, inviting aromas of peach, cashew and pineapple. It's richly nutty and tropical at the same time, offering layers of complexity and depth to be enjoyed over the next several years.

properties.title: Carol Shelton 2009 Showket Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
properties.address: 3354-B, Coffey Ln, Santa Rosa, CA 95403, USA
properties.description: An absolutely delicious Cabernet, with ripe blackberry, black currant, milk chocolate and spicy oak flavors. Beyond the richness is a superb structure of gorgeously refined tannins and just enough acidity to give balance. So easy to drink, so elegant, you could drain the bottle tonight. But it will age effortlessly through 2018.

properties.title: Terra Valentine 2010 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Spring Mountain District)
properties.address: 4007 Spring Mountain Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Exceptionally ripe, concentrated mountain fruit as well as hard tannins characterize this fresh, young Cabernet. Through the tannic astringency, intense flavors of black currants, dark chocolate and the sweet sap of oak shine through. Needs time. Hold until 2016 and see how it's doing.

properties.title: V. Sattui 2009 Morisoli Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1111 White Ln, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: V. Sattui has quietly been producing outstanding Cabernets, and here's another. The vineyard is on the Rutherford bench, arguably the tenderloin of the appellation. Made from 100% Cabernet, the wine is sumptuously rich and soft in tannins, with sour red-cherry candy, licorice, bacon and pepper spice flavors. Will age well for at least 10 years.

properties.title: Cobblestone 2009 Cobblestone Vineyard Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Atlas Peak)
properties.address: 1500 Cotner Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90025, USA
properties.description: An impressive Cabernet, rich and dense in fruit and oak, with tremendous tannins that are at once hard and soft. It's already throwing some sediment, and the cherry and raspberry fruit comes through in a pure, sweetly feminine manner. Should continue to evolve in the bottle for at least 10 years.

properties.title: Gravner 2005 Anfora Breg White (Venezia Giulia)
properties.address: Località Lenzuolo Bianco, 9, 34170 Oslavia, Gorizia GO, Italy
properties.description: Gravner's Breg (Sauvignon, Chardonnay, Pinot Grigio and Riesling Italico) shows Sauternes-like aromas of honey, candied apricot, butterscotch, caramel and almond paste. The wine delivers a pretty orange color with copper highlights (it is famously aged in clay amphorae) with firm but velvety rich tannins. The finish is long and smooth and there's a very beautiful touch of drying mineral on the close. Hold five more years at least.

properties.title: Casal da Coelheira 2013 White (Tejo)
properties.address: N118 1331, 2205-681 Tramagal, Portugal
properties.description: An aromatic and fruity wine with bright lemon and apple flavors. Light and fresh, it needs to let its fruitiness calm down. Wait until the end of 2014.

properties.title: Cerro Prieto 2009 La Teresa Bloc Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 21700 Baja California, Mexico
properties.description: Chocolate milk, with a squeeze of cassis liqueur and the sweet vanillins of toasted oak, are the flavors. With the high alcohol, it's almost a dessert wine. Give it credit for a heady opulence.

properties.title: Corte Moschina 2012 Roncathe  (Soave)
properties.address: Via Moschina, 1, 37030 Roncà VR, Italy
properties.description: The closed nose gives away very little, just the barest whiffs of yellow flowers. The one-dimensional palate offers fleeting sensations of tart apple and hints of green melon and lemon zest.

properties.title: Jean-Luc Baldès 2013 Clos Triguedina Le Rosé du Clos Rosé (Vin de Pays du Comté Tolosan)
properties.address: Lieu-dit "Les poujols", 46700 Vire-sur-Lot, France
