properties.description: Because Cahors is an appellation only for red wine, this rosé from the Clos Triguedina vineyard is a more lowly Vin de Pays. It's fruity, showing Malbec acidity rather than tannins and some attractive berry fruits. Drink now.

properties.title: L. Tramier & Fils 2012  Mâcon-Villages
properties.description: Gold straw in color, this is a ripe and very soft wine. It revolves around red apple flavors that kept it warm and light. The wine should be drunk now.

properties.title: L. Tramier & Fils 2012 Tiserny  (Bourgogne)
properties.description: A fresh and fruity wine, it's full of light and attractive peach and apple flavors. The wine has fresh acidity and a soft texture that is opening well. Drink now.

properties.title: Loacker 2012 Atagis Gewürztraminer (Mitterberg)
properties.address: St. Justina Straße, 3, 39100 Bozen, Autonome Provinz Bozen - Südtirol, Italy
properties.description: This steely white offers up very little aromas. The palate delivers lip-pursing sour lemon alongside vibrant acidity, giving this a hard, lean quality.

properties.title: Castel Sallegg 2012 Pulvernai Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Unterwinkel, 15, 39052 Kaltern, Autonome Provinz Bozen - Südtirol, Italy
properties.description: This simple Pinot Grigio has aromas of pears and yellow spring flowers. The palate offers tart green apple and a hint of unripened yellow peach along with fresh acidity. Pair this with light pasta dishes or pizzas.

properties.title: Cave de Lugny 2012 Les Charmes  (Mâcon-Lugny)
properties.address: 995 Rue des Charmes, 71260 Lugny, France
properties.description: This is the freshest apple and citrus-driven wine. It has great fruitiness allied to acidity and a soft, creamy structure. Drink in 2014.

properties.title: Wines & Winemakers 2013 Dona Helena Colheita White (Península de Setúbal)
properties.address: 701 W 11th St, Coffeyville, KS 67337, USA
properties.description: This is a fine, simple wine for this summer. With acidity, fresh apple and pear flavors, it's attractive and aromatic.

properties.title: Château Lamothe-Vincent 2012  Bordeaux Blanc
properties.address: 3 Laurenceau, 33760 Montignac, France
properties.description: A soft, lightly tropical wine with attractive acidity and grapefruit as well as pineapple flavors. It is crisp, very fruity and ready to drink.

properties.title: Domaine D'en Ségur 2013 Le Rosé (Côtes du Tarn)
properties.address: Lieu Dit En Gourau, 81500 Lavaur, France
properties.description: Cabernet and Syrah are an unusual blend for a rosé, but this fresh and crisp wine works well. It has a vivid pink color followed by equally vivid red fruits and refreshing final acidity. Drink now.

properties.title: Domaine D'en Ségur 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Côtes du Tarn)
properties.address: Lieu Dit En Gourau, 81500 Lavaur, France
properties.description: This is a very fresh, very herbaceous wine. It's crisp with its pink grapefruit and lively acidity. Good with fish, but just as good as an apéritif.

properties.title: Moura Basto 2013 White (Tejo)
properties.address: 1 Winemaster Way # I, Lodi, CA 95240, USA
properties.description: This fruity, soft wine is ready to drink. With apple and pear flavors, just the right amount of crisp acidity and a bright aftertaste, it's made for this summer.

properties.title: The Boneyard 2013 Chardonnay (Monticello)
properties.address: 13648 Tarara Ln, Leesburg, VA 20176, USA
properties.description: Aromas of smoky peach, citrus blossom and crushed stone are enticing and inviting. The palate of this unoaked Chardonnay is restrained and green apple focused, with a refreshing lemon-lime vein running down the backbone.

properties.title: Coastline 2013 Chardonnay (Central Coast)
properties.address: 3800 Oceanic Dr Multipurpose, Oceanside, CA 92056, USA
properties.description: This is a solid showing, with aromas of toasted, buttered almond, honeyed pineapple, white peach flesh, apple and white flowers. It's light on the palate, with apple juice flavors, a touch of guava and nice chalkiness, making for a pleasant, drinkable wine.

properties.title: Cyatho 2013 Verdejo (Rueda)
properties.address: 36083 Summitville St, Temecula, CA 92592, USA
properties.description: Textbook Verdejo aromas of tangerine, passion fruit and grapefruit are simple and clean. A light, zesty, slightly spritzy palate frames flavors of grapefruit, lemon and orange pith. A mix of tropical and citrus notes drives a snappy but ordinary finish.

properties.title: Domaine Charles Frey 2010 Plaisir Perlant Millesimé Extra Brut Sparkling (Crémant d'Alsace)
properties.address: 1 Rue du Pinot Blanc, 67650 Dambach-la-ville, France
properties.description: Strong, attractive apple aromas also give the flavor profile of this fresh and fruity wine. It has a light tangy, zesty texture, fresh acidity and a bright, mineral aftertaste.

properties.title: Domaine Léon Boesch 2013 Le Coq Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 6 Rue Saint-Blaise, 68250 Westhalten, France
properties.description: This dry style of Pinot Gris brings out a strong acidity as well as ripe fruitiness. The wine is structured, tangy with surprising amounts of lemon as well as pear flavors. It is still too young and needs time. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Dr. Nägler 2013 Rüdesheimer Berg Rottland Kabinett Trocken Riesling (Rheingau)
properties.address: Friedrichstraße 22, 65385 Rüdesheim am Rhein, Germany
properties.description: There's nothing flashy about this dry, delicately framed Riesling. It's quietly elegant, focused on pristine lemon and lime flavors, along with bitter citrus pith on the finish.

properties.title: Peter Nicolay 2013 Blue Slate Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Gestade 15, 54470 Bernkastel-Kues, Germany
properties.description: Notes of turmeric and fennel lend spice to fresh apple and pear in this expressive wine. It's off dry in style with a refreshing, delicate mouthfeel.

properties.title: Peter Nicolay 2013 Ürziger Goldwingert Spätlese Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Gestade 15, 54470 Bernkastel-Kues, Germany
properties.description: Touches of caramel and apple cider offset intense lemon acidity in this medium-dry spätlese. It's refreshingly juicy, with a reverberating citrus-rind finish.

properties.title: Chatham 2012 Church Creek Steel Chardonnay (Virginia's Eastern Shore)
properties.address: 9232 Chatham Rd, Machipongo, VA 23405, USA
properties.description: Lemon curd and citrus blossom ride over underripe melon and apple on the nose. The creamy and full palate is a result of extended lees contact, while flavors of honeydew and lemon lead to a sea-spray finish. A perfect pairing for the Eastern Shore's local fare of raw oysters.

properties.title: Domaine Allimant-Laugner 2013 Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 10 Grand Rue, 67600 Orschwiller, France
properties.description: This crisp wine has plenty of acidity as well as fruit. It is young to taste, still showing its fresh side that should round out over the next few years. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Domaine Schoffit 2012 Tradition Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 68 Nonnenholz Weg, 68000 Colmar, France
properties.description: This big, ripe wine is opulent and smooth. With layers of rich lychee and mango fruit flavors, along with spiced pears, this is a delicious, ready-to-drink wine. It's generous to a fault, a great wine to drink with pâtés and spiced food.

properties.title: Dr. Pauly Bergweiler 2013 Dry Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Gestade 15, 54470 Bernkastel-Kues, Germany
properties.description: Bracing tones of lime and lemon accentuate the crush of mineral tones throughout this dry, revitalizing wine. Light bodied and spry, it's invigorating, rather than penetrating, but ideal as a palate-cleanser between heavy courses.

properties.title: Feudo di Santa Tresa 2013 Rina Ianca White (Terre Siciliane)
properties.address: Contrada Santa Teresa, 97019 Vittoria RG, Italy
properties.description: Made with organically grown grapes, this opens with aromas of white flower, citrus and tropical fruit. The juicy palate doles out nectarine, exotic fruit, dried apricot and a hint of vanilla alongside racy acidity.

properties.title: Firriato 2013 Cavanera Ripa di Scorciavacca Bianco  (Etna)
properties.address: Via Trapani, 4, 91027 Paceco TP, Italy
properties.description: This blend of Carricante and 20% Catarratto features aromas of dried chamomile flower, Spanish broom and acacia. The bright palate delivers citrus, raw pear, mineral and almond.

properties.title: Cupcake 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
properties.address: 8300 St Helena Hwy, Rutherford, CA 94573, USA
properties.description: Tastes like a cherry-berry fruit drink with lots of acidity, giving it a sweet-sour flavor. At least the alcohol is low.

properties.title: Cupcake 2008 Chardonnay (Central Coast)
properties.address: 8300 St Helena Hwy, Rutherford, CA 94573, USA
properties.description: As sweet as angel food cake, with sugary vanilla and pineapple flavors. If you like sweet Chardonnay, it's for you.

properties.title: Dobbin Lane Wines 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
properties.address: 4430 Vineyard View Ln, Hamptonville, NC 27020, USA
properties.description: Sweet and simple, with chocolate, blueberry jam and caramel flavors.

properties.title: Mission Trail 2007 Sauvignon Blanc (Monterey County)
properties.address: 2010 El Camino Real, Santa Clara, CA 95050, USA
properties.description: Simple and slightly sweet, like the juice from canned peaches, pineapples and apricots, but with more acidity.

properties.title: Eric Ross 2006 Bonino Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
properties.address: 14300 Arnold Dr, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.description: Too ripe, almost Porty, although it's bone dry. Shows flavors of currants, chocolate and raisins, with a bitterness throughout.

properties.title: Tin Barn 2008 Sauvignon Blanc (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 21692 8th St E Ste. 340, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.description: Really strong in gooseberry and feline spray aromas and flavors, with kinder notes of citrus fruits and vanilla. The wine is also slightly sweet.

properties.title: Hovey 2008 Duende Chardonnay (Calaveras County)
properties.address: 350 Main St A, Murphys, CA 95247, USA
properties.description: Sweet and simple, with candied orange, pear and pineapple flavors, wrapped into a syrupy-soft texture.

properties.title: Imagine Moore 2007 Joy Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 197 N Main St, Naples, NY 14512, USA
properties.description: An unusual nose of cinnamon, lychee and Christmas spice holds promise. Unfortunately, the palate is one-dimensional and lacking in flavor intensity, though some pleasant banana flavors peak through briefly before dropping in to a short finish.

properties.title: San Marcos Creek 2005 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 27118 N Broadway, Escondido, CA 92026, USA
properties.description: Too soft and Porty, with sweet blackberry jam and chocolate flavors. There's also a burn from high alcohol.

properties.title: Château les Bertrands 2015 Cuvée Tradition  (Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux)
properties.address: 7 Les Bertrands-Nord, 33860 Reignac, France
properties.description: There is a tantalizing hint of perfume in this 85% Sauvignon Blanc and 15% Muscadelle blend that makes the wine both ripe and textured. With a touch of pepper as well as crisp apple, the wine is rich and ready to drink.

properties.title: Archium 2015 Rosé (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 703 Jefferson St, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.description: This 100% Grenache pink wine kicks off with a fairly light nose that shyly presents steely aromas of lemon wedge. There is a firm structure to the sip, where pink grapefruit and other citrus elements ride a chalky structure. Texture is key here.

properties.title: Fratelli Berlucchi 2009 Casa delle Colonne Brut Riserva Sparkling (Franciacorta)
properties.address: Via Broletto, 2, 25040 Corte Franca BS, Italy
properties.description: This opens with aromas of bread crust, ripe orchard fruit and a citrusy note. The creamy palate offers baked yellow apple, vanilla and toasted hazelnut alongside a soft perlage.

properties.title: Fratelli Berlucchi 2012 Freccianera Saten Chardonnay (Franciacorta)
properties.address: Via Broletto, 2, 25040 Corte Franca BS, Italy
properties.description: Aromas of bread crust, pastry cream and toast come together in the glass. The creamy palate offers mature pear, yellow apple and toasted hazelnut alongside a soft mousse.

properties.title: Churchill's 2015 Churchill's Estates Branco White (Douro)
properties.address: 2649 Carpenter Canyon Rd, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.description: Grapes grown at high altitude give the cool feel to this crisp wine. A light touch of oak is revealed in the vanilla flavor that is finely integrated into the citrus and apple fruit. The wine is fruity, ready to drink young.

properties.title: Colinas do Douro 2014 Branco White (Douro)
properties.address: Covas do Douro, 5085-222, Portugal
properties.description: The wine is soft and ripe. With delicious yellow fruits, a soft texture and just enough lively acidity, it is rich and fruity. There is an attractive orange zing at the end.

properties.title: Terras de Alter 2015 Terra d'Alter Verdelho (Alentejano)
properties.address: Zona Industrial Da Lt. 22/28, 263, 7460 Fronteira, Portugal
properties.description: This is a full-bodied, ripe and perfumed wine. Rich melon and white peach are balanced with bright lemon and lime to give a warm, generous wine. The acidity keeps everything deliciously in place.

properties.title: Chehalem 2014 Corral Creek Vineyards Riesling (Chehalem Mountains)
properties.address: 31190 NE Veritas Ln, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.description: Just a touch of residual sugar (11 g/L) softens up the edges of this wine, which brings flavors of tart lemon, grapefruit pith and wet paper into play. Try it with prawns, shellfish or non-spicy noodle dishes.

properties.title: Chehalem 2015 INOX Unoaked Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 31190 NE Veritas Ln, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.description: Done entirely in stainless tanks, this fruity wine offers spring fresh flavors of citrus, pineapple and green melon. With barely perceptible residual sugar, the acids keep it lip-smacking and lively. There is just a hint of buttery caramel at the core.

properties.title: Chesebro 2015 Cedar Lane Sauvignon Blanc (Arroyo Seco)
properties.address: 19 E Carmel Valley Rd, Carmel Valley, CA 93924, USA
properties.description: A powerful sense of green powers this wine, starting on the nose with sharp grassy tones of rosemary, chives and pine needles. The palate is also extremely grassy, though balanced by a tart pluot character.

properties.title: Domaine Charles Frey 2014 Nature Extra Brut Sparkling (Crémant d'Alsace)
properties.address: 1 Rue du Pinot Blanc, 67650 Dambach-la-ville, France
properties.description: Something of both fresh and dried pink grapefruit zest plays about the nose. The very frothy palate adds some spice to that, as well as a pleasant hint of bitterness. All the fruit is accentuated by the frothing bursting bubbles. Drink soon, ideally as an animating apéritif. The zesty finish is very appetizing.

properties.title: Psagot 2012 Chardonnay (Judean Hills)
properties.address: فلسطين Sha’ar Binyamin industrial Zone
properties.description: A nose of lemon and petrol opens into flavors of lemon, pears, petrol and white flowers, with slightly overpowering toast notes. Tannins are a bit stiff for an otherwise bright white that has a slightly tart finish.

properties.title: Rectoral do Umia 2013 Abellio Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.address: Rua do Pan, nº 9 (Pol. Ind. Cabanelas), 36636 Ribadumia, Pontevedra, Spain
properties.description: Peach, melon and vanilla cookie aromas are mild, simple and a touch mealy. The mouthfeel on this basic Albariño is fleshy and plump, with adequate acidity. Sweet apple and tropical fruit flavors are lasting and stay the course.

properties.title: Rio Madre 2013 Graciano Rosé (Rioja)
properties.address: C. de la Construcción, 74, 46340 Requena, Valencia, Spain
properties.description: Cherry, raspberry and candied aromas announce a plump but bland palate with sweet, candied flavors of red fruits. These turn slightly harsh before finishing with good feel and controlled bitterness.

properties.title: Robert Karcher et Fils 2013 Harth Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 11 Rue de l'Ours, 68000 Colmar, France
properties.description: This soft, medium-dry wine has attractive spice and fresh yellow-fruit flavors. It is bright, feeling light with its poised acidity and crisp aftertaste.

properties.title: Sallier de la Tour 2013 Grillo (Sicilia)
properties.address: Viadotto Pernice, 90043 Camporeale PA, Italy
properties.description: This easygoing white conveys delicate aromas of white flower and citrus. The simple palate offers lemon drop and a hint of Mediterranean herb alongside zesty acidity.

properties.title: Bodegas Carballal 2013 Cepas Vellas Albariño (Rías Baixas)
properties.address: Ctra. de Carballal, km2, 32356 Petín, Ourense, Spain
properties.description: Vanilla, lees notes and wafer cookie aromas are not terribly fruity or upright. This is chunky on the palate, with an odd spritzy feel. Briny orange is the key flavor, along with an oily nuttiness.The finish is pithy and breaks up.

properties.title: Domaine Charles Frey 2013 Vieilles Vignes Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 1 Rue du Pinot Blanc, 67650 Dambach-la-ville, France
properties.description: Young and fruity, this is a soft, citrus and apple flavored wine. Attractive acidity is enhanced by the light minerality and tangy aftertaste. Drink now.

properties.title: Field Stone 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 223 S Main St, Rochester, MI 48307, USA
properties.description: Dry, sizable tannins embrace a core of dusty black plum and blackberry. Straightforward and not overly ambitions, it finishes with a pronounced taste of oak.

properties.title: Bodegas Ateca 2013 Honoro Vera Verdejo (Rueda)
properties.address: Av. San Blas, 41, 50200 Ateca, Zaragoza, Spain
properties.description: Pithy citrus, radiator dust and grassy aromas are basic. A simple, plump palate is showing signs of flattening, while leesy, creamy flavors of pear and melon finish similarly. Drink immediately.

properties.title: Cave de Hunawihr 2013 Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 48 Rte de Ribeauvillé, 68150 Hunawihr, France
properties.description: The dry character of this wine is emphasized by fresh acidity that cuts right through. The result is an apple-crisp wine that is pure fruitiness without much of the Pinot Gris richness.

properties.title: Pierre Sparr 2013 Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 14 Rue de Hoen, 68980 Beblenheim, France
properties.description: This is an attractive, ripe style of Pinot Gris. Off dry, it is aromatic, lightly spicy over crisper pear and yellow fruit flavors. It's ready to drink.

properties.title: Rieflé 2013 Bonheur Convivial Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 32 Rue de la Lauch, 68250 Pfaffenheim, France
properties.description: This is labeled as dry, which sums up this crisp and fruity wine. Delicious, refreshing acidity is gently spiced and layered with green apples and quince flavors. It's ready to drink.

properties.title: Sevtap 2013 Bosphorus Sauvignon Blanc (Happy Canyon of Santa Barbara)
properties.address: 23 E Canon Perdido St, Santa Barbara, CA 93101, USA
properties.description: The nose is a bit curious, with hard vanilla, smoked melon and grilled citrus. Smoke carries to the palate, with charred applewood most prominent, making for an atypical but somewhat enjoyable Sauv Blanc.

properties.title: Ulacia 2013 White (Getariako Txakolina)
properties.address: Calle San Prudencio Auzoa, 41 Ctra, 20808 Meaga, Gipuzkoa, Spain
properties.description: Stalky, flat scents vie for attention with brighter citrus aromas on a bland nose. This Txakoli feels round but not too lively. Flavors of lettuce, green bean, green apple and tangerine finish with a hint of lime.

properties.title: Willm 2013 Cuvée Emile Willm Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 12526 SW Bank Rd, Vashon, WA 98070, USA
properties.description: Veering towards sweet, this soft, generous wine is rich with attractive lychee and spice flavors. There's little hint of acidity although the buoyant feel of the wine compensates. It's ready to drink.

properties.title: Willm 2013 Réserve Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
properties.address: 12526 SW Bank Rd, Vashon, WA 98070, USA
properties.description: Totally hedonistic, this is a ripe, lychee and tropical fruit-flavored wine. It's spicy, laced with bergamot and cinnamon and immediately attractive. Drink now.

properties.title: Comartin 2013 Stone Row Zabala VIneyard Sauvignon Blanc (Arroyo Seco)
properties.address: 13875 S Gardner Rd #1, Olathe, KS 66061, USA
properties.description: Yellow pear skin, crushed pine needles and white rocks bolster traditional cat-pee aromas on this wine from the ancient river stone-laden Arroyo Seco appellation. Sharper grassy elements deftly integrate into the palate, with apple and pear flavors as well. Serve with vinaigrette-doused oysters.

properties.title: Domaine Maby 2013 La Fermade White (Lirac)
properties.address: 249 Rue Saint-Vincent, 30126 Tavel, France
properties.description: Perhaps it is the large Clairette component (52%), but this blend finishes with an attractive tingle of lime that brightens the whole experience. Honeyed melon and traces of raw almond give the impression of softness, yet the wine remains refreshing. The balance is 26% Grenache Blanc, 13% Viognier and 9% Picpoul. Drink it now and over the next six months.

properties.title: Domaine Rolet Père et Fils 2009 Chardonnay (Côtes du Jura)
properties.address: 11 Rue de l'Hôtel de ville, 39600 Arbois, France
properties.description: Very dry and steely, this offers crisp acidity plus butter and wood flavors that bring out citrus as well as white peach fruits. With five years aging, it is ready to drink.

properties.title: Gordon Estate 2011 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 671 Levey Rd, Pasco, WA 99301, USA
properties.description: Here's a solid effort from a challenging (cool) vintage. Good, clean red fruit is touched with accents of citrus, tobacco and mocha. It's all in good balance, with ripe tannins and clear varietal character.

properties.title: Grgich Hills 2011 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1829 St Helena Hwy, Rutherford, CA 94573, USA
properties.description: This is a classic Napa Valley floor Cabernet, enhanced with handfuls of Petit Verdot and Merlot. Dusty in red currant and herb, it offers mellowed tannins and a peppery underbelly.

properties.title: VML 2013 Gewürztraminer (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 5610 Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.description: Adorned by a beautiful label, this aromatic white is resplendent in lychee, pear and orange blossom as well as marked minerality. Dry, the finish is slightly spicy and entirely memorable.

properties.title: Alta Alella 2010 Mirgin Sparkling (Cava)
properties.address: Camí Baix de Tiana, s/n, 08328 Alella, Barcelona, Spain
properties.description: This mature brut nature is smoky and stalky/bitter on the nose. In the mouth, it's lean and acidic, with little body in support of citrus and gritty apple flavors. Bitterness and white-pepper notes rise up on the finish. For razor-sharp Cava, this fits the bill.

properties.title: Anthony Nappa 2013 Frizzante Sparkling (New York)
properties.address: 2885 Peconic Ln, Peconic, NY 11958, USA
properties.description: Frizzante is the perfect term to describe this nervy, invigorating sparkling wine made from an unusual blend of Pinot Noir, Riesling and Gewürztraminer. Exotically perfumed from nose to finish with touches of orange blossom and spice, it's a delicately pétillant wine with juicy peach and yellow-cherry flavors.

properties.title: Bedell 2013 Sparkling Rosé Sparkling (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.address: 36225 Main Rd, Cutchogue, NY 11935, USA
properties.description: Whiffs of exotic spice lend flair to berry and cherry aromas on this sparkling blend of Cabernet Franc, Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot. Exuberantly pétillant, it's fresh with cranberry  acidity and tart red-plum and cherry flavors.

properties.title: Twin Islands 2013 Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.description: This is a medium-bodied, slightly plump Sauvignon Blanc that hits the right herbal notes of snow pea and tomato leaf, then blends those with grapefruit and hints of stone fruit.

properties.title: Imagery 2013 Albariño (Sonoma Valley)
properties.address: 14335 Sonoma Hwy, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.description: Weighty and dry, Albariño is a rare sight in Sonoma. This one is well worth seeking, savory in nutty almond and a taste of grilled peach. Mouth quenching, it'll pair well with spicy Thai shrimp.

properties.title: Ironstone 2013 Obsession Symphony (California)
properties.address: Ironstone Vineyards, 1894 6 Mile Rd, Murphys, CA 95247, USA
properties.description: Honey is the key word to describe the nose and flavor of this extremely aromatic and just slightly sweet wine, which also offers notes of honeysuckle and honeydew. Winemakers often turn the grape Symphony (a cross of Muscat of Alexandria and Grenache Gris) into a sweet, dessert-style wine, but this shows how good it can be in a drier version.

properties.title: J. Bookwalter 2011 Foreshadow Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1695 Malibu PR NE, Richland, WA 99352, USA
properties.description: This is 85% Cabernet Sauvignon and 15% Syrah, with a core of blueberry and cocoa. It's super-smooth and quite easy to sip and enjoy. But apart from that, and the seductive coffee/mocha flavors that run rampant through the finish, it shows little of the depth and complexity that Washington Cabernet can display. Drink 2017–2019.

properties.title: Kontos 2013 Gossamer White (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: JONES BLDG, 10 N 2nd Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: Lively and full-bodied, the blend includes Chardonnay, Marsanne, Roussanne and Pinot Gris. Citrus fruits fill the mouth, with a streak of honey and appealing roundness. This is a great wine to just drink and enjoy, without too much contemplation.

properties.title: Sieur d'Arques 2009 Toques et Clochers Océanique Chardonnay (Limoux)
properties.address: Av. du Mauzac, 11300 Limoux, France
properties.description: A nice richness and light honey note permeate the bouquet, accenting the solid core of red apple skin, peach pit and dried vanilla bean. Medium weight, with a very attractive sweet spice and charred egg-bread accented finish.

properties.title: Ansgar Clüsserath 2010 Steinreich Trocken Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Spielesstraße 4, 54349 Trittenheim, Germany
properties.description: Perhaps because of its slow, natural fermentation in large casks and the resulting lees contact, this wine shows a bit of toasty, mealy character and a slightly creamy texture. It's a weighty Riesling (for the Mosel, anyway), with ripe notes of peach complementing citrus fruit and a dry, stony finish.

properties.title: Mount Veeder 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: Mt Veeder, California 94558, USA
properties.description: Soft and gentle in texture, this Cabernet is very rich and forward in blackberry and black-currant flavors, enriched with sweet oak. It's a flashy, opulent wine that's delicious for drinking now.

properties.title: Reichsgraf von Kesselstatt 2010 Scharzhofberger Spätlese Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: Schloß Marienlay, 54317 Morscheid, Germany
properties.description: There's a brooding quality to the smoky, diesel-fuel like aromas of this wine, but that's left in the rearview by ripe flavors of honey and baked apple once it's in the mouth. This wine is round and atypically soft for the vintage, but picks up some lively lime notes on the finish.

properties.title: Terre Rouge 2010 Enigma White (Sierra Foothills)
properties.address: 10801 Dickson Rd, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.description: Terre Rouge's yearly blend of Marsanne, Roussanne and Viognier is always a delightful wine with food. This vintage opens with a pleasant hit of pear followed by spring flowers and delves into creamy textures and layers of honeysuckle and orange rind in the midpalate.

properties.title: Viña Casablanca 2011 Nimbus Single Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.description: Light and fresh up front, with lychee, passion fruit and wet stone aromas. Feels good and balanced as if offers a nice mix of textured fruit and minerally acidity. Flavors of green melon, passion fruit, lime and green herbs come straight from central casting. Perfect for summer drinking.

properties.title: Cedarville Vineyard 2007 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (El Dorado)
properties.address: 6320 Marestail Rd, Fair Play, CA 95684, USA
properties.description: Cedarville takes a lot of pride in its Cab, and this definitely screams mightily of its mountain, granite-soiled origins, with a rich mouthfeel and rocky minerality. Fully fruity, though restrained, this Cab has plenty of leathery plushness in the midpalate ending with a finale of dense, dark chocolate.

properties.title: Château de Lancyre 2009 Vieilles Vignes Red (Coteaux du Languedoc Pic Saint Loup)
properties.address: Castle Lancyre Wines in Pic Saint Loup, Ham. de Lancyre, 34270 Valflaunès, France
properties.description: Dark and concentrated but simultaneously fresh and juicy, this blend of 65% Syrah and 35% Grenache offers heady notes of black cherry, plum and raspberry accented by hints of game and tree bark. The meaty, medium-weight palate offers a firm structure and a solid finish.

properties.title: Clos des Terrasses 2008 White (Bergerac Sec)
properties.address: Les Terrasses, 24240 Sigoulès-et-Flaugeac, France
properties.description: Full and wood-aged, this wine is smoothly textured. It's ripe and spicy, with apricot fruit and some minerality. Rich and worth aging for 2–3 years.

properties.title: JCB 2010 No. 81 Sonoma Collection Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 6505 Washington St, Yountville, CA 94599, USA
properties.description: Lots of zesty, mouthwatering acidity in this Chardonnay. The pineapple, crème brûlée, buttered toast and vanilla flavors are so rich that they require balance, which the zippy acidity provides. Maybe a touch too oaky, but that's a matter of personal preference.

properties.title: Quinta do Ameal 2010 Ameal S.H. White (Portuguese Table Wine)
properties.address: 4990-707, Portugal
properties.description: This is a rare dessert wine from the Vinho Verde region. It's packed with flavors of currant, lemon honey and orange peel. With its great sense of acidity, it is both sweet and deliciously refreshing.

properties.title: Laurel Glen 2014 Counterpoint Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Mountain)
properties.address: 13750 Arnold Dr Suite #9, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.description: Blended with 10% Merlot, this wine sources grapes both from its famous estate, as well as from nearby Pickberry and Murray vineyards. It delights in luxuriously bright acidity and a jammy explosion of blackberry, chocolate, clove and tobacco, the texture roundly approachable.

properties.title: Leonetti Cellar 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1278 Berney Dr, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: This wine is a blend of Seven Hills, Loess, Mill Creek Upland, Serra Pedace and Leonetti Old Block. Aromatically brooding at present, it shows intricate notes of barrel spice, thyme, coffee, cranberry, black tea and red and black fruit. The palate is tightly wound, with bright acid and lightly chewy tannins that need some time in the cellar to stretch their legs. Best from 2021 to 2030.

properties.title: Jérémie Huchet 2015 Clos les Montys 1914 Sur Lie  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
properties.address: La Chauvinière, 44690 Château-Thébaud, France
properties.description: Old vines, some dating from 1914, form the basis of this impressive wine. They give it concentration while the stone and sand soil brings even more richness. With its crisp acidity, lemon and grapefruit fruit, and creamy texture, the wine is refreshing and ready to drink.

properties.title: Kerloo 2014 Majestic Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 3911 1st Ave S, Seattle, WA 98134, USA
properties.description: This wine is a blend of 54% Grenache (Upland), 38% Mourvèdre (Boushey) and 8% Syrah (Blue Mountain). It shows pure aromas of green herbs, violets, raspberry, black pepper, orange peel and purple fruit. The flavors are pretty, plump and pure, putting a focus on texture, with fruit flavors stretching out on the finish and an orange-peel note running throughout.

properties.title: Mullineux 2014 Old Vines White (Swartland)
properties.address: Riebeeksrivier Rd, Roundstone, 7299, South Africa
properties.description: This Chenin Blanc-based blend, with 13% Clairette, 10% Viognier and 4% Sémillon, starts off with notes of fresh herbs and verbena, supported by notes of lightly toasted-apple skin, white peach and melon. There's a pleasant roundness to the body, though ample acidity and a lingering clove accent pick up the midpalate and carry through to the lingering finish. Drink now–2020.

properties.title: N. Kendall Wines 2013 Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 5007 Fulton Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95403, USA
properties.description: Laser-edged shards of lime and flint anchor this bright bristling dry Riesling. It's lean and lithe yet penetratingly ripe, offering loads of fresh lemon and quince flavors. The finish is perfumed, marked by notes of smoke and white blossom and a lingering lime pith astringency. Ready to drink now but should age well till 2025.

properties.title: Domaine Vincent Carême 2014 Le Peu Morier  (Vouvray)
properties.address: 1 Rue du Haut Clos, 37210 Vernou-sur-Brenne, France
properties.description: The 34-acre vineyard of Tania and Vincent Carême is run organically. This wine, from a parcel of old vines, is dry with signs of its wood aging attractively melding into the apple and spice fruits. With intense acidity and a tight texture, the wine is still fruity and young. It can be drunk now although it is worth waiting until 2022 for a more mature perspective.

properties.title: Fournier Père et Fils 2013 Grande Cuvée  (Sancerre)
properties.address: Rte de la Garenne, 18300 Verdigny, France
properties.description: Fournier's top Sancerre wine is released with just that extra bit of maturity, giving it extra depth and richness, and turning the initial fruitiness into something more serious. At three years old, the wine is ripe, still with plenty of fruit while also developing a smoky, flinty character. Drink now.

properties.title: Adams Bench 2013 Stillwater Creek Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 13590 NE Village Square Dr Suite 1040, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.description: Bright aromas of blackberry, cassis, pencil lead and black cherry are followed by full-bodied black-fruit flavors backed by a firm lick of chewy tannins. The finish lingers and the mouthfeel heightens the interest. Give the tannins some time to settle in. Best after 2020.

properties.title: Cayuse 2013 The Widowmaker En Chamberlain Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 17 E Main St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: Expressive aromas of funk, ember, moist soil, truffle, olive and high-toned dried herbs are followed by a freshly elegant and flavor-focused palate. The balance and length are exquisite.

properties.title: Tranche 2012 Estate Grown Blue Mountain Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 705 Berney Dr, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.description: Aromas of plum, cranberry, wood spice and herb are followed by concentrated red and black-fruit flavors. A silky mouthfeel and firm tannins only add to the enjoyment.

properties.title: Elena Walch 2009 Cashmere passito Gewürztraminer (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Andreas Hofer Str., 1, 39040 Tramin an der Weinstraße., Autonome Provinz Bozen - Südtirol, Italy
properties.description: Wow, it's hard to beat the aromatic intensity of this Passito Gewürztraminer from cool-climate Alto Adige in northern Italy. The huge bouquet is redolent of pressed yellow flower, jasmine, honey and candied fruit and Indian rose water.

properties.title: Lallier 2005 Grand Cru Brut  (Champagne)
properties.address: 4 Place Libération, 51160 Aÿ-Champagne, France
properties.description: While the style is soft, full of yellow fruit richness, the wine also show an excellent concentrated texture. The fresh fruit is integrated into this more complex style. The aftertaste shows some softness, but the wine can certainly age for several years.

properties.title: Monticello Vineyards 2008 Tietjen Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
properties.address: 1211 Waukeenah Hwy, Monticello, FL 32344, USA
properties.description: Impressively rich and ripe in fruit, offering waves of black cherries and chocolate. Feels soft and lush and luxurious in the mouth, with a sweet oak finish. Certainly dazzles with opulence, but the softness and sweetness makes you wonder about its ageability. So drink between now and 2013 for freshness.

properties.title: Pierre Gaillard 2008 Domaine Cottebrune Transhumance Red (Faugères)
properties.address: Lieu dit "Chez Favier 508 route de Bazin, 42520 Malleval, France
properties.description: Perhaps better known for his Côte-Rôties, Pierre Gaillard is obviously comfortable working with schist. Transhumance is an intense and complex wine, with assertive notes of kirsch, sweet smoke, wild game and garrigue accents of thyme, rosemary and violet. Rich and lush in the mouth, the texture is like crushed velvet and the finish evolves from a dark fruit blast to sweet vanilla bean and finally ending on a smoked cedar and spice note.

properties.title: Domaine du Chalet Pouilly 2009 Eléve en Fûts de Chêne  (Pouilly-Fuissé)
properties.address: Rue des Gerbeaux, 71960 Solutré-Pouilly, France
properties.description: Rich, creamy wood-aged wine that shows pear, apple and toast flavors ane even a hint of honey. Smooth and textured, it has fine final spice and acidity to add further interest.

properties.title: Pont de Chevalier 2009 Sauvignon Blanc (Knights Valley)
properties.address: 26328 Locust Grove Rd, Creola, OH 45622, USA
properties.description: Picture-perfect coastal California Sauvignon Blanc, dry and crisp in acidity, with mouthwatering flavors of citrus fruits, tart green apples and minerals. Really elegant, with a steely streamlined framework that makes it super versatile at the table.

properties.title: Hecht & Bannier 2008 Red (Faugères)
properties.address: 999 Boulevard de Maisonneuve O bureau 600, Montréal, QC H3A 3L4, Canada
properties.description: H&B;'s 2008 Faugères is rich and complex, with herbal garrigue aromas of lavender and laurel framed against the solid ripe dark berry and cherry fruit core. The mouth is brisk and lively, with vibrant acidity lifting the dark fruit flavors and carrying through to the chocolate- and espresso-flecked close. Good now, but hold for another two to five years for even greater enjoyment.

properties.title: Vincent Sauvestre 2009 Clos des Tessons  (Meursault)
properties.address: Rue du Serein, 89800 La Chapelle-Vaupelteigne, France
properties.description: A beautifully ripe and rounded wood-aged wine. It brings out all the opulence of Meursault while keeping a tight, textured element as counterpoint. The wood flavors are beginning to blend into the lychee and peach flavors, promising an even richer experience in a few months.

properties.title: Quadra 2006 Satèn Chardonnay (Franciacorta)
properties.address: 22860 James Monroe Hwy, Aldie, VA 20105, USA
properties.description: This Chardonnay-based Satèn sparkling wine opens with creamy aromas of vanilla, lemon custard, apricot and dried sage. The wine has a smooth, rich and persistent character thanks to the delicate quality of its perlage.

properties.title: Tres Vinicultores 2008 The Central Late Harvest Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 1774 E Cruger Rd, Washington, IL 61571, USA
properties.description: Quite good, but some vegetal flavors mar this dessert wine, which is very sweet, with 18% residual sugar. Such sweetness is usually enough to satisfy on its own, but despite the apricot, tangerine and vanilla flavors, a stubborn green streak lowers the score.

properties.title: Domaine Christian Moreau Père et Fils 2008  Chablis
properties.winery: Domaine Christian Moreau Père et Fils
properties.address: 26 Av. d'Oberwesel, 89800 Chablis, France
properties.description: Smoothly toasty wine, the wood element broadening the light apple fruit without overwhelming it. This attractive, basic Chablis has a fine, taut layer of acidity, grapefruit and apple juice crispness.

properties.title: Domaines Astruc 2009 dA Chardonnay (Vin de Pays d'Oc)
properties.address: Prat Iches, 11300 Malras, France
properties.description: Alive and dainty with soft orange blossom notes paired with fresh red apple slices and a touch of nuttiness. The mouth is more of the same, with a distinct peach pit flavor unfolding on the medium-length finish.

properties.title: Manookian 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon (Howell Mountain)
properties.description: Earns points for sheer size, a powerhouse of concentrated, intense blackberry and cassis flavors, liberally coated with oak. The tannins are big, thick and hard, and at this point, the wine is not showing much drinkability. Ageability might be compromised by some superripe, raisiny fruit notes. Tasted twice.

properties.title: Astoria 2007 Icóna Cabernet Sauvignon (Piave)
properties.address: 3619 30th Ave, Queens, NY 11103, USA
properties.description: Here's a simple, straightforward Cabernet Sauvignon from northern Italy with an attractively low price tag and lively aromas of cherry, chocolate and spice. It shows rich, dense texture as well.

properties.title: Domaine de Nizas 2007 Red (Coteaux du Languedoc)
properties.address: 1 Cr national, 34230 Usclas-d'Hérault, France
properties.description: Here's a fruit forward and very drinkable red blend of 60% Syrah, 35% Mourvèdre and 5% Grenache. Jammy red berry preserves, boysenberry and blueberry all present themselves in the fleshy mouth, with a fruitcake spice lingering through the close.

properties.title: François Lurton 2015 Hacienda Araucano Clos de Lolol White (Lolol Valley)
properties.address: Km 29 Ruta - l.72, Lolol, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.description: This yellow-tinted blend of Sauvignon Blanc and Chardonnay smells more like freshly waxed floorboards and wood resin than fruit. In the mouth, this is resiny and plump, with mild acidity. A weird set of woody, waxy flavors falls flat on the finish.

properties.title: Albamar 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: 2849 St Helena Hwy, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Briny aromas of sauerkraut fail to make much of an impression. This is dull in feel, with bitter, fruitless flavors. On the finish, bitterness remains. Drinkable but with few positives.

properties.title: Echeverria 2016 Reserva Sauvignon Blanc (Curicó Valley)
properties.address: 35°05'59.8"S 71°18'07. - Av. Eyzaguirre 3215, Puente Alto, Molina, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.description: With a strange pink color and powdery nondescript aromas, this is shapeless and lacking in structure. Weak bitter flavors are completely fruitless; overall this seems to be going nowhere good.

properties.title: Spottswoode 2013 Family Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (St. Helena)
properties.address: 1902 Madrona Ave, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: This remarkable wine from the famed family-farmed, organic estate impresses immediately in its depth of concentration and stately grace, imparting a wealth of rose-garden compost and wild truffle on the nose. Within the vibrant range of sensual flavor is salted caramel, black cherry and chocolate, alongside a twist of saddle and campfire coffee. Its grip of focused tannin suggests years of aging potential; enjoy best from 2023 to 2033.

properties.title: Macauley 2013 Beckstoffer To Kalon Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
properties.address: 1309 Main St Ste D, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Mocha, baked plum and black pepper play equal roles in this stunning, full-bodied beauty from the famous site, all within a tightly focused, integrated experience of seamless texture and structure. Richly concentrated and yet able to find a balance of acidity and freshness within its voluptuous nature, this wine impresses from end to end and will do well in the cellar; enjoy best from 2023 to 2025.

properties.title: Hall 2013 The Bishop Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 401 Saint Helena Highway. South, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: This is a blend of the best barrels of the vintage, in this year consisting of fruit primarily from Howell and Diamond mountains, with a touch of estate-grown Merlot. It offers astounding levels of richness and concentration alongside a nuanced approach to bold black fruit and spicy earth, its aromas of blackberry and clove peppered in wild violet. It impresses immediately but also pleads for more time in bottle; enjoy best 2020 through 2028.

properties.title: Hall 2013 Stags Leap District Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
properties.address: 401 Saint Helena Highway. South, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: This is a blockbuster of a wine, powerfully built grape by grape, with just a handful of Merlot. Cherry vanilla, leathery cedar and juicy plum combine around a lush, voluptuous mouthfeel of tension and tannin. Incredibly satisfying, it shows a length of spicy clove on the finish that appears to go on for days. This is a beauty too hard to sock away, though it should do well in the cellar another decade or two.

properties.title: Quinta do Pinto 2010 Vinhas do Lasso Branco White (Lisboa)
properties.address: Quinta Do Anjo, 2580-081, Portugal
properties.description: Apples, green plums and peaches go with lemon zest acidity in this soft, fruity white wine. It is ready for drinking, finishing with an attractive warm finish.

properties.title: Maurigi 2009 Bacca Bianca Tenuta di Budonetto White (Sicilia)
properties.address: Maurigi Budonetto Estate (The Maurigi wine estate in Sicily), 94015 Piazza Armerina EN, Italy
properties.description: Bacca Bianca from the vineyards of Tenuta di Budonetto, is a blend of Inzolia, Grecanico and Chardonnay. This wine is slightly muddled aromatically, but it does possess a fresh, zesty mouthfeel.

properties.title: Ross Andrew 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.description: A firm, youthful Cabernet, with cassis and blue plum fruit accented by dried herb, graphite and asphalt. As it sat in the glass, a distinct leathery aroma emerged and the fruit quickly faded.

properties.title: Tasca d'Almerita 2010 Regaleali Le Rose Rosé (Sicilia)
properties.address: Contrada Regaleali, 90020 Sclafani Bagni PA, Italy
properties.description: This is a terrific value wine (a rosé made from the indigenous grapes of Sicily) that opens with a bright pink color and fragrant tones of raspberry, white almond and rose petal.

properties.title: Albet I Noya 2010 Petit Albet Made with Organic Grapes Chardonnay-Xarel-lo White (Penedès)
properties.address: Can Vendrell, s/n, 08739 Sant Pau d'Ordal, Barcelona, Spain
properties.description: Feels sturdy and properly acidic, with melon, papaya and apple flavors running alongside almondy bitterness. Simple and quick on the finish; 60% Xarel-lo and 40% Chardonnay.

properties.title: Brugnano 2010 Kue White (Sicilia)
properties.address: Contrada San Carlo SS 113 Km 307, 90047 Partinico PA, Italy
properties.description: Kue is a floral blend of Insolia (70%) and Viognier, with subtle notes of peach blossom and jasmine that would pair with basil pesto or fresh tomato bruschetta. The wine presents a thin, simple but crisp feel on the finish.

properties.title: Brugnano 2010 Lunario Catarratto (Sicilia)
properties.address: Contrada San Carlo SS 113 Km 307, 90047 Partinico PA, Italy
properties.description: Although the wine is made in stainless steel, there's a tiny touch of oxidation here (only a distant accent) that shapes a warmer, broader bouquet of stone fruit, honey and butterscotch. It's silky and smooth on the close. Drink now.

properties.title: Burmester 2010 Reserva Branco White (Douro)
properties.address: Largo Dom Luís I, 4400-111 Vila Nova de Gaia, Portugal
properties.description: Creamy apple and pear flavors give this wine a bright, while full-bodied style. Wood tastes and taut acidity combine easily with the fruit. Drink now.

properties.title: Calatrasi 2010 Terre di Ginestra Catarratto (Sicilia)
properties.address: Contrada Piano Piraino, San Cipirello, PA 90040, 90040 San Cipirello PA, Italy
properties.description: This easy Sicilian white offers peach blossom and citrus over a tight, crisp mouthfeel. This is the kind of no-fuss wine to drink on a hot weekend afternoon.

properties.title: Cave de Lugny 2009 La Carte  (Mâcon-Lugny)
properties.address: 995 Rue des Charmes, 71260 Lugny, France
properties.description: A rich and rounded single-vineyard Chardonnay. It has weight and a smoky character to go with the peach, kiwi and lime juice flavors. The acidity is light, but does give a line of freshness.

properties.title: Duca di Salaparuta 2010 Calanìca Grillo-Viognier White (Sicilia)
properties.address: Via Nazionale s.s. 113, 27, 90014 Casteldaccia PA, Italy
properties.description: The blend is 60-40 Grillo and Viognier and the wine offers aromatic components of both varieties. The first imparts green notes of kiwi and cut grass and the second offers sweet floral fragrances.

properties.title: Center of Effort 2009 Effort Chardonnay (Edna Valley)
properties.address: 2195 Corbett Canyon Rd, Arroyo Grande, CA 93420, USA
properties.description: Sweet, ripe and intense, with vibrant acidity brightening lime, kiwi, orange, pear and pineapple flavors. It's long-hangtime Edna Valley fruit, pure and simple.

properties.title: Jacob's Creek 2010 Reserve Dry Riesling (Barossa)
properties.address: 2129 Barossa Valley Way, Rowland Flat SA 5352, Australia
properties.description: This is a medium-bodied Riesling that seems destined for rather early consumption, as it lacks the fine edge of acidity that distinguishes age-worthy examples. Apple and lime flavors are tinged with gingery spice on the finish.

properties.title: Planeta 2010 Rosé (Sicilia)
properties.address: Contrada Sciara Nuova, 95012 Castiglione di Sicilia CT, Italy
properties.description: Planeta breaks new ground with this Sicilian rosé made from Syrah. Clean packaging and a screw cap bottle set the stage for a modern, pristine and impeccably made wine that is fresh, zesty and very easy to drink.

properties.title: Mount Nelson 2014 Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.address: 1500 Cotner Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90025, USA
properties.description: Snow pea is a descriptor often attached to Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc, but I don't think I've ever tasted a wine that captures it as precisely as this one does. Zesty citrus notes fill out the wine's medium body and linger on the finish.

properties.title: Sineann 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 8400 Champoeg Rd NE, St Paul, OR 97137, USA
properties.description: Aromas of cigar box and dried herbs are light and elusive. The palate yields plenty of tart cherry and cranberry flavors and a light grip of tannins.

properties.title: Sineann 2014 Grüner Veltliner (Columbia Gorge (WA))
properties.address: 8400 Champoeg Rd NE, St Paul, OR 97137, USA
properties.description: This variety is an extreme rarity in the state, with only a small handful of bottlings made. This one offers aromas of herbs, spice and green apple skin that carry through to the palate, which drinks just off dry.

properties.title: Drylands 2014 Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
properties.address: 322 Main St, Lovington, NM 88260, USA
properties.description: Despite some honeyed notes on the nose, this is a bit austere and stony overall. Herbal shadings accent pineapple and underripe stone fruit flavors, while a dry finish reinforces the impression of restraint.

properties.title: Mayer am Pfarrplatz 2014 Alsegg Riesling (Vienna)
properties.address: Pfarrpl. 2, 1190 Wien, Austria
properties.description: The flavor of red and green apples dominates the nose. The palate has a fleshier nature but a huge amount of zesty freshness that pulls everthing taut and straight. Clean and very refreshing.

properties.title: Milbrandt 2014 The Estates Evergreen Vineyard Chardonnay (Ancient Lakes)
properties.address: 707 US-2 unit d, Leavenworth, WA 98826, USA
properties.description: This vineyard has already established itself as a premier Riesling site, but Chardonnay is increasingly gaining attention. Aromas of lees, mineral, toast and spice lead to an elegant but well-balanced palate, with flavors that linger.

properties.title: Neumeister 2014 Steintal Roter Traminer (Südoststeiermark)
properties.address: Straden 42, 8345 Straden, Austria
properties.description: Very fresh and very delicately fragrant with crisp but balanced acidity. This is a wine as light and delicate as a summer breeze and should be drunk on a sunny day as a lovely, scented apéritif. Drink soon.

properties.title: Sojourn 2013 Proprietary Cuvée Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 141 E Napa St, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.description: This wine is supremely pretty, inviting in rose petals and violets. Sourced from Oakville Ranch Vineyard and Vineyard Georges III in Rutherford, it deserves its own bottling. Generously soft and complex, it offers a deftness of black cherry, clove and cedar married expertly together.

properties.title: Jarvis 2014 Finch Hollow Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2970 Monticello Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.description: Caramelized oak and honey give this estate wine an undeniable richness offset by a streak of rocky minerality. Smooth in texture, it's plush, lush and robustly full bodied, accented by green apple and melon. It celebrates a warm site, warm vintage and meticulous winemaking.

properties.title: Lexington 2013 Gist Ranch Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Cruz Mountains)
properties.address: 2000 Dog Hollow Rd, Lynnville, TN 38472, USA
properties.description: This wine, made by the Thomas Fogarty team, presents a complex nose, with aromas of roasting oregano, marjoram, dill and thyme, smoked meat, blueberry and crushed lava rock. Those herbal touches swirl together on the palate amid hearty tannins, rounded blackberry fruits and soy flavors. Drink 2018–2033.

properties.title: Pamplin 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 31235 NE Bell Rd, Sherwood, OR 97140, USA
properties.description: Though not labeled as such, this 100% varietal all hails from Red Mountain, with the fruit coming from Klipsun (64%), Scooteney Flats and Tapteil vineyards. The aromas are brooding and locked up at present with notes of mineral, black currant, spice, pencil lead and blackberry. The fruit flavors are black as night, supported by firm but exceptionally well-integrated tannins. It will be at its best from 2023 to 2031 but should last well beyond that.

properties.title: Doren 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
properties.address: 2560 Crosby Herold Rd, Lincoln, CA 95648, USA
properties.description: A tiny-production, 100% varietal wine from a tiny ½-acre site in heart of Kenwood, next to Chateau St. Jean, this is a wow wine, melding flavors of baked plum, moist earth, mocha and blackberry. It has a lively richness that's both lush and expansive, with a soft, firm tannin structure and lengthy finish.

properties.title: Hall 2013 Eighteen Seventy-Three Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 401 Saint Helena Highway. South, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Made from fruit grown in the eastern reaches of the Vaca Mountains, a warm place for grapes, this 100% varietal wine delivers a voluptuously smooth experience, shining in baked cherry and plum. Amid its biting tension of ripeness awaits a swath of dark chocolate and tobacco.

properties.title: Dr. Loosen 2014 Erdener Prälat GG Alte Reben Grosse Lage Dry Riesling (Mosel)
properties.address: 20501 Tranquility Ln, Oregon City, OR 97045, USA
properties.description: A glaze of honeycomb lends a waxy sheen to crisp tangerine, pineapple and gooseberry in this delicately framed dry Riesling. It's gossamer-fine in texture, but there's a scintillating power within, powered by an electric core of acidity. Subtle hints of exotic spice and tart lime pith reverberate long on the finish. It's enticing now but should gain depth and finesse through 2025.

properties.title: Sextant 2013 Kamal Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (El Pomar District)
properties.description: Quite dark in the glass, this bottling, which includes a bit of the other main Bordeaux varietals, shows concentrated blueberries, blackcurrant, cola and fudges notes on the nose. It's soft and rich on the palate, with fine-grained tannins revealing more dense, dark fruit, touches of mint and chocolate, and a nice floral component.

properties.title: Spottswoode 2015 Sauvignon Blanc (Sonoma County-Napa County)
properties.address: 1902 Madrona Ave, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.description: Grapes are meticulously sourced from a range of sites, including Sonoma Mountain and Knights Valley on the Sonoma side, and Spottswoode estate, Hyde and Ink Grade from Napa. Opening with the aromas of grassy knoll, it develops in the glass to show juicy, fresh acidity and well-defined flavors of apricot and wet stone. Young and bright, the acidity is tenacious and supportive, making way for a final lilt of creaminess on the finish.

properties.title: Trombetta 2015 Gap's Crown Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
properties.description: Richly oaked and voluptuous in aroma, this bold, balanced vineyard-designate shows hints of brioche and toffee, complemented by clouds of sultry Pink Lady apple and pear compote. Its supporting acidity steals the show, never allowing the concentration to speak too loudly.

properties.title: Wakefield 2014 St Andrews Cabernet Sauvignon (Clare Valley)
properties.address: 8297 Diagonal 1500 Road, Stuart, OK 74570, USA
properties.description: Wakefield (known as Taylor's in Australia) was founded as a Cabernet-focused estate. While the range has expanded over time, Cabernet Sauvignon remains a strength. Brown sugar and cedar frame cassis fruit on the nose; the palate shows just enough juicy, mouthwatering fruit to support the ample oak. This is full bodied yet supple, with crisp acids showing on the finish.

properties.title: Bethel Heights 2014 Casteel Chardonnay (Eola-Amity Hills)
properties.address: 6060 Bethel Heights Rd NW, Salem, OR 97304, USA
properties.description: As befits a reserve-level wine, this is big, bold, rich and full-flavored. It amplifies the ripe apple and peach fruit, and slathers it in buttery caramel and sweet spice. Drink now through 2020.

properties.title: Vasse Felix 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Margaret River)
properties.address: 4357 Caves Rd, Wilyabrup WA 6280, Australia
properties.description: This is firm, dusty and seemingly built for the cellar. Toasty, cedary and chocolaty oak frames dark fruit, yet it remains fresh in character, not dried or overripe. The finish is long, tannic and reminiscent of fine Bordeaux. Try after 2020.

properties.title: Alma Rosa 2014 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 1623 Mission Dr, Solvang, CA 93463, USA
properties.description: This bottling by pioneer Richard Sanford is much more widely available, affordable and stylistically accessible right now than the single vineyard option. It's delicate on the nose with bright lime spritz, Meyer lemon pith, crushed lemon verbena and a grippy brie cheese rind component, then proves tangy on the nuanced palate, with lemongrass and pomelo skin meshing into nectarine and apple flesh.

properties.title: Bouchaine 2013 Chêne d'Argent Estate Vineyard Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.address: 1075 Buchli Station Rd, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.description: This is an amazingly fresh and fruity tank-fermented wine, imparting a subtle hint of grass before unleashing sublime layers of melon and apricot alongside measured, zesty acidity. New winemaker Chris Kajani is taking things in a refreshing, aim-for-the-top direction with this bottling.

properties.title: Bridge Press 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 39 W Pacific Ave, Spokane, WA 99201, USA
properties.description: Cocoa, vanilla, baking spice and green herb aromas are followed by concentrated, palate-coating black cherry and barrel spice flavors that show a deft touch. Coffee notes persist on the finish.

properties.title: Darcie Kent Vineyards 2012 Clone 337 Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
properties.description: A classic style of wine, this has reserved aromas but great texture and structure supporting deep black currant and dark plum flavors, accented by subtle spicy oak. With each sip more nuances of cedar, tobacco, sage and black olive come out. Although delicious now, it will be best after 2020.

properties.title: Darcie Kent Vineyards 2013 DeMayo Vineyard Chardonnay (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 7000 Tesla Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.description: This wine is in the tasty, full-bodied California tradition, showing lively aromas of toasted oak and butter, then ripe fruit flavors and a mouth-filling texture. It also has depth, bringing more nuances to the front with each sip, and lingering long on the finish.

properties.title: Darcie Kent Vineyards 2014 Old Gum Tree Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 7000 Tesla Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.description: Bright and crisp, but with nice depth and length, too, this medium-bodied wine is delicious to drink and holds interest with a light touch of oak. Tangy grapefruit and lime flavors have a hint of brioche and the texture is very lively.

properties.title: Josef Jamek 2015 Jochinger Pichl Federspiel Riesling (Wachau)
properties.address: Josef-Jamek-Straße 45, 3610 Joching, Austria
properties.description: Notions of citrus peel and foliage, of ripe, red-cheeked little yellow mirabelle plums mix exoticism with the homely. Treading on light feet, almost on a tightrope, this is top-laden with fruit, yet focused and taut. A real flirt of a wine, but with serious intent.

properties.title: Lutum 2014 Durell Vineyard Chardonnay (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 1945 Felder Rd, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.description: This wine smacks you in the face first thing, demanding attention, before settling into mouthwateringly succulent layers of Asian pear, graham cracker and Nilla wafer. An underbelly of oak supports the fruit, remaining subtle and providing structure. The acidity shines most on the finish, inviting further exploration.

properties.title: Marangona 2015  Lugana
properties.address: Localita' Marangona, 1, 25010 Pozzolengo BS, Italy
properties.description: Aromas of white spring flower, mature orchard fruit and a whiff of graphite float out of the glass. The fresh, concentrated palate doles out ripe white peach, mature Granny Smith and Bosc pear while mineral and almond notes back up the finish.

properties.title: Domaine de la Bégude 2015 L'Irréductible Rosé (Bandol)
properties.address: Route des Garrigues 83330, 83740 Le Castellet, France
properties.description: Darker in color than most Provence rosés, this impressive wine is made almost entirely of Mourvèdre. With a rich, full character, it is generous and ripe. Sweet strawberry fruits are right up front, balanced with a touch of citrus and freshly ground pepper. The aftertaste is tight and spicy.

properties.title: Domäne Wachau 2013 Smaragd Terrassen Grüner Veltliner (Wachau)
properties.address: Dürnstein 107, 3601 Dürnstein, Austria
properties.description: Notes of pineapple and verbena tisane hint at some maturity. While the nose suggests richness, the palate reveals a concentrated lightness that is nonetheless dense with aroma: said pineapples as well as notes of hayflowers and dried moss and dried citrus peel. The long finish celebrates this multilayered scope beautifully.

properties.title: Umathum 2015 Rosa Rosé (Burgenland)
properties.address: St. Andräerstraße 7, 7132 Frauenkirchen, Austria
properties.description: The almost luminous pink hue promises exuberance: the wine delivers a plethora of fruit notes—spicy elderberries, luscious strawberries and juicy red cherries all take turns to dazzle. Is this your typical rosé? Certainly not—it's more of an ultralight red that needs chilling. But it certainly delivers sophisticated yet fun drinking. Simply abandon yourself to its joyful flavors and celebrate summer!

properties.title: Saintsbury 2014 Sangiacomo Green Acres Chardonnay (Carneros)
properties.address: 1500 Los Carneros Ave #9742, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.description: Dark golden color gives way to a taste of yellow apple, pear and a touch of ginger spice, with the midpalate mellow and veering on rich. A punch of guava and lime is accented in vibrant acidity on the lingering finish.

properties.title: Salomon-Undhof 2015 Steinterrassen Riesling (Kremstal)
properties.description: The purest notes of ripe lemon zest are the first to rise from the glass, then comes a slight notion of yeast—so fresh is this wine. There is a savoury timbre on all this gleaming citrus sleekness, adding extra interest and verve. Utterly linear and driven, this will relax into a sleek, sound beauty with just a little more bottle age. Ready from summer 2016 and for at least a decade after.

properties.title: Château Grand Boise 2015 Rosé (Côtes de Provence Sainte-Victoire)
properties.address: Chem. de Grisole, 13530 Trets, France
properties.description: High-altitude (up to 1,800 feet) mainly north-facing vineyards give this wine its intense character. It is crisp, tight, mineral and concentrated. Acidity cuts through, making this wine right for seafood and spicy Asian cooking. The aftertaste continues this fresh, textured character.

properties.title: WillaKenzie Estate 2016 Estate Grown Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 19143 NE Laughlin Rd, Yamhill, OR 97148, USA
properties.description: All stainless, no malolactic and widely available distribution make this a pure-blooded warm weather go-to white wine. It's young and still a bit yeasty, aromatic with scents of seeds and grains. Tightly wound fruit flavors of apple and green melon come with good depth and texture.

properties.title: Willm 2016 Cuvée Emile Willm Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 12526 SW Bank Rd, Vashon, WA 98070, USA
properties.description: The nose gives little away and the palate still holds tightly onto its ripe yellow pear fruit. The flavors are rounded, helped along by a little residual sweetness that creates a fine plump richness on the midpalate. There is a core of juicy fruit on this fresh, easy and fluid wine.

properties.title: Willm 2016 Réserve Pinot Gris (Alsace)
properties.address: 12526 SW Bank Rd, Vashon, WA 98070, USA
properties.description: There is a touch of yellow mirabelle plum on the nose. The palate comes in with a more tart note of pith and zest. The slender body unites full fruit and lively freshness in a compact package, boosted by a little residual sweetness that nonetheless lets the wine finish dry.

properties.title: Jean-Marc Bernhard 2016 Vieilles Vignes Riesling (Alsace)
properties.address: 21 Grand Rue, 68230 Katzenthal, France
properties.description: The nose is very restrained: barely an aroma escapes. The palate comes in with shy reticent freshness but reveals a serious vein of grapefruit zestiness underneath. This has ample freshness that needs to be teased out. The finish is dry and clean.

properties.title: La Cave des Vignerons de Pfaffenheim 2016 Tradition Riesling (Alsace)
properties.winery: La Cave des Vignerons de Pfaffenheim
properties.address: 5 Rue du Chai, 68250 Pfaffenheim, France
properties.description: The nose is a little subdued but the palate comes in with fresh, tart and aromatic apple notes. The palate is slender and dry, and driven by refreshing lively apple notes of both Granny Smith and Red Delicious.

properties.title: Alessio Komjanc 2015 Pinot Grigio (Collio)
properties.address: Località Giasbana, 35, 34070 San Floriano del Collio GO, Italy
properties.description: This full-bodied Pinot Grigio offers aromas of sunbaked soil, hay, mature apple and dried herb. The rounded palate offers yellow apple and orange zest alongside soft acidity while a light mineral note lifts the finish.

properties.title: Ca' Lojera 2016  Lugana
properties.address: Via 1866, 19, 25019 località Rovizza di Sirmione BS, Italy
properties.description: White spring flower, yellow stone fruit and a whiff of Mediterranean herb come together on this savory wine. The bright juicy palate offers creamy peach, Bartlett pear and a hint of nectarine while an almond note gives it a pleasantly bitter finish.

properties.title: Castello Monaci 2016 Kreos Negroamaro Rosato (Salento)
properties.address: Contrada Masseria Monaci, 73015 Salice salentino LE, Italy
properties.description: Here's a vibrant savory rosato made entirely with the native grape Negroamaro that boasts aromas and flavors of juicy sour cherry, crushed raspberry, Mediterranean herb and a saline note. A blast of orange zest and aromatic herb close the crisp refreshing finish.

properties.title: Chamisal Vineyards 2014 Chardonnay (Edna Valley)
properties.address: 7525 Orcutt Rd, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.description: Jasmine, honeysuckle and gardenia aromas show on the nose of this bottling, which also offers peach custard and ripe grapefruit skin scents. The palate is welcoming and very familiar, with butter, sea salt, lemon and ambrosia melon flavors, all framed by solid acidity.

properties.title: Château Petit Moulin 2016  Bordeaux Blanc
properties.address: 4 Les Thorins, 71570 Romanèche-Thorins, France
properties.description: Tight and crisply fruity, this wine comes from a property in the Vignobles Signé family since 1649. With a strong herbal character, it is refreshing and already delicious, bright and lively. Plenty of acidity keeps this wine packed with forward fruit. Drink now.

properties.title: Chateau Peybonhomme-les-Tours 2015 Le Blanc Bonhomme  (Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux)
properties.address: Château Peybonhomme-Les-Tours, 33390 Cars, France
properties.description: Unusually set in a Burgundy-shape bottle rather than the normal Bordeaux bottle, this low-sulfur wine comes from a biodynamic vineyard. It is ripe with yellow fruits and rich acidity. It has a rounded character, with an edge of minerality and light spice. This delicious wine is ready to drink.

properties.title: Cusumano 2016 Shamaris Grillo (Sicilia)
properties.address: 432 S Main St, Old Forge, PA 18518, USA
properties.description: Aromas of citrus blossom, orchard fruit and sea salt emerge in the glass. The crisp savory palate offers lemon, nectarine and a hint of white almond alongside bright acidity.

properties.title: Domaine Fernand Engel 2016 Pinot Noir Rosé (Alsace)
properties.description: Faint notes of red currant and rhubarb appear on the nose. The palate is fresh and light, combining lemon and berry freshness with earthier notes. This is slender, dry and very refreshing.

properties.title: J. Scott Cellars 2016 Dry Grenache Rosé (Rogue Valley)
properties.address: 520 Commercial St unit g, Eugene, OR 97402, USA
properties.description: A copper rose hue, this has a strong phenolic grip and a burst of heat at the finish. There's good texture, with wild strawberry and a push toward cherry-fruit flavor, with a wash of citrusy acid.

properties.title: Baron Knyphausen 2015 Feinherb Riesling (Rheingau)
properties.address: Draiser Hof, Erbacher Str. 26, 65346 Eltville am Rhein, Germany
properties.description: Steely and sharp yet delicately sweet, this medium-bodied Riesling keeps a balance between austerity and forward fruitiness. It's vibrantly fresh, with crisp grapefruit and lemon flavors anchored by a core of acidity. Drink now through 2021 to enjoy its freshness.
